title: Dont trust and book Spice Jet. Worst ever Airlines!!
text:
Booked tickets for my 75 year old parents coming to Dubai (for a family function) as connection time was less and bought an expensive flight!!

At durgapur checkin counter spicejet staff informed that they dont have full system in Durgapur and my old parents have to collect luggage at Mumbai and rebook. A big inefficiency of spice jet. We had no choice but to accept. 

Then the departure flight got delayed which got cancelled. Reason ‚Äúoperational‚Äù.

After war like situation my parents managed to get following day flight. They had to travel back home to neighboring city 100km away again in taxi after collecting luggage back. Total time wasted 6 hours, strength and total Harressment.

On same day at 11:30 pm india time we were informed that again following flight is delayed and only option for my parents is to take early morning to Mumbai which means they have to wait for 10-12 hours at Mumbai airport. They have made a joke out of it. They are not ready to provide solution or any compensation. They are totally stubborn!!

The counter lady Trisha Banerjee said there is no other option. Either wait for 10-12 hours in Mumbai or cancel the flight. 

When i insisted to talk to senior spoke to Nitesh Kumar Senior Executive. He was same as the counter lady. 

There is no senior management in Spice Jet!!

Its a shame i bought tickets on spice jet and went through such a bad experience. Its late nite and no resolution!! For sure my parents will not be able to attend the family function in Dubai!!

I WANT SPICEJET TO STOP PLAYING WITH PEOPLE EMOTIONS AND BE RESPONSIBLE!! DONT BOOK SPICE JET!! HIGHLY UNRELIABLE!!

title: NOT ALLOWED TO BOARD SPICEJET FLIGHT No SG242 Kolkata to Mumbai
text:
I was refused entry in to the Spice Jet flight no SG 242, 9th December, despite having bought the ticket through Trip.com. I have a receipt of this purchase and confirmation that my booking was successful. 

When I checked in to the flight a boarding pass was issued to me of a completely different flight, which I did not want to take or had paid for.

At the boarding gate, I was refused entry saying I did not show up in Spice Jet's system. My attempts at showing my ticket and receipt were met with rude remarks and I was blamed for having an incorrect boarding pass - obviously the boarding pass is created by the system and not hand written by me!

Now, because of this miscommunication, I missed my flight and a very important meeting in Mumbai. Also your airline staff, in particular one lady at Kolkata airport was extremely rude and refused to provide support or further information. I was asked to sit down and "forget about this flight."

I would like to file a complain against this particular person, please let me know if there is a specific procedure for doing so. I obviously don't wish to name them on a public forum, but please let me know the procedure for filling a complaint for harassment. 

Finally, I have now bought a brand new ticket with INDIGO, which cost me GBP 177.47 - unnecessary expense that I didn't need to pay. Not to mention the panic, insult and desperation this situation cased. 

Please can you look in to the matter and refund me the full amount, with compensation, as soon as possible. I have also reached out via email to custrelations@spicejet.com

Many thanks

title: If there was negative marking, I would give that
text: Spicejet still remains at its worst. Late flights, no refund of cancellations. There was one time when I had booked a meal and my money was paid online. However, I didn't receive the meal on flight as they said it was not showing in their records. After escalation of the matter, I never received the refund. My fathers flight to Dubai was cancelled by Spicejet and he never received the refund. This time, unfortunately I had to book Spicejet again as it seemed reasonable. Although I always prefer Indigo over anything. 3 hours before the flight, I received a message saying that it's delayed by 55mins. title: Won't let you web-checkin without paying money and will stress you out with invalid information
text:
Happened multiple times with Spice Jet
There are many options to pay for a seat as part of a bundle or to choose a paid seat. Alternately there's "Auto Web-Checkin", which claims that it will email your boarding pass 12 hrs before departure. But no email comes. They claim over phone that there are no charges for web-checkin at the airport, or assistance to checkin, but their rules clearly state that there is a Rs200 charge for assistance with checkin or boarding pass. They have also wasted my time at the checkin counter to run out the clock so that the mandatory web-checkin which is only allowed 2hrs before departure time is not possible any more. They still will not assist you at the checkin counter seemingly busy, so you are left waiting in stress regarding the ticking clock reaching closer to boarding and departure times, and you are still outside the secure area. At that point the options become limited and the traveler gets frantic and pays whatever is required at that point to try to pay for a seat and checkin on their mobile device. This has happened to me more than once now, so I imagine that this is a way for them to penalize travelers who try to book the supposedly advertised fares without paying the extra for the seats, which appear optional, but isn't really.

title: Glitchy Mobile App & Worst Customer Service
text: I did an flight booking for travel on October 7, 2022 using their app for the dates October 19th and 20th. Their app had a glitch and it issued me a ticket with the wrong dates October 18 and 19th. I called the customer care within 24 hours to get the dates changed but were told by a very rude and arrogant customer service staff that we need to pay an extra fare for the change in dates along with a convenience fee.  I did not agree to the extra charges and in the meantime the call got disconnected. I called right away and was connected to another customer service person who processed the cancellation and confirmed that I would receive INR 41972 instead of the amount paid INR 44788 . I quoted their "Look in Option" posted on their website but they did not oblige to it. I emailed their customer support with a recording of their website glitch and did not receive any response till date. After all that I did they gave me a refund of INR 15180 stating that there are applicable charges. I had contacted their customer care many times and they said they would listen to the previous call conversations and respond back but no help so far. The customer support staff are not capable of handling real time issues. They are only trained to read out pre-written statements and make sure to keep you hold for long with no solution to the issue. Is there any Government Authority that would question the discretion the airline? More than losing my money it's the terrible experience that I had to go through interacting with these customer service staff.

title: Flight was delayed by more than 3 hours

title: Worst experience with Spice Jet*** PNR- KYM3YC ,SG 327
text:
I had booked a ticket for my dad (Age 64) PNR- KYM3YC from BLR-IXB for 13/11/2022. He is an old man and uses hearing aids too and I thought Spice would care for him when he is travelling but my expectation was upside down.

Here are the series of events:

Priority Check in

The ticket says priority check in. But when my dad asked for it, Spice ground staff denied it and asked him to stand in a long queue which took more than an hour.

Check in Process:

His baggage was checked in and the ground staff said the weight is good. Then ground staff decided to weigh the hand baggage of my mom and dad and told them that they are carrying excess hand baggage.

ground staff saw that he is old and can be robbed as he is paying cash. Then spicejet staff asks for Rs 6000/- which my dad paid and they give him a handwritten receipt which doesn't have details of weight , tax etc. Shouldn‚Äôt we get a printed receipt with the details?

Then I got a text that an excess of 5kgs was charged Rs 3000/- . Shouldn‚Äôt I get the message of Rs 6000/- if it was genuinely charged? It's clear that ground staff took extra cash and it's a clear indication of robbing the passenger (senior citizen).

When asked for clarification your ground staff was rude and denied to provide any sort of clarification.

I kept on writing to SpiceJet Nodal officer, Blr manager, customer relations, social media team and I get generic responses saying we will check and get back. They are checking since 13 nov and they haven't got back to me with answers.

Never ever book tickets with this airline. Deserve a big Zero because they aren't customer friendly.

title: Though the Name of the Airline has changed but the level of service remains as poor and pathetic
text:
The cabin crew is highly apathetic to customers . I had pressed the call button to request for a glass of water as I was really thirsty . 2-3 crew members passed through the aisle but nobody turned up to ask what I need until 10 minutes . Later a male crew member comes and switches off the call button without even bothering to ask what I needed . I had to myself request for a glass of water and the guy goes away and does not turn up even after the flight lands . The call button which I had pressed later after he had turned off and did not come back until 5 minutes remained on , until I deboarded . I had terrible experience in spicejet earlier as well . Pls try and keep this as the last option in your list unless you are not finding a suitable flight . 

Pathetic Service and Arrogant Crew

title: Poor experience
text: Took the flight from Dubai to Delhi. They WILL weigh all your carry-ons + laptop bag AT the gate (note: NOT weighed or even reminded about this at check-in) and they WILL make you pay at the boarding gate for each kg over 7 kg. I could have easily moved items from my carry-on to my checked-in luggage (which was 10+ kg under the max allowance). Myself, along with  10+ passengers complained about not being reminded about the rule at the time of check-in. They were all made to pay. In the end, the whole thing seemed deliberate, and hence, like a money making practice. I noticed poor management and upkeep as well. For example, the airline double booked my seat to me and another person. When we brought this to the in-flight crew's attention, the in-flight crew assigned me another seat because luckily, the flight was not full. Moreover, my seat belt was tied the wrong way. Needless to say, I am never flying with this airline again.

title: DO NOT RISK TO TRAVEL WITH SPICEJET
text: I hope that I could have rated spicejet in -ve. The worst customer support, rude and insensitive ground staff, no etiquettes to speak with elders, senior citizens, women and kids. Prolonged delays in flight timings, rush to board and deboard the passengers, inefficient managers on ground staff. I experienced all of these while travelling with then. So, chose better options and save your family and yourselves what we had gone through.

title: A bad experience

title: Delay Delay & Delay

title: Horrible customer service. Never pay with international credit cards. You may never see any refund. Flight gets delayed.
text:
I have been frustratingly dealing with them about a simple refund for over 6 months without any result.

I used the same credit card to book my flight and select preferred seats. However, the seat selection didn't properly go through online but they charged me. This happened twice. The first time I called them, they told me it'll take 10 days to issue the refund. I waited 10 business days but there was no movement from their side. I called them again, had to tell them the same story again and they asked me to wait for 5 more days. I waited but nothing happened. Then I called them again and repeated the story. This time, they 'formally' registered a complaint by taking every minute details about the transactions manually and told me it'll take them 2-3 days to issue the refund. I waited for 5 more days. In the meantime, I received an email from their customer service team asking me about the same details that I gave them over the phone. I called them again asking what was going on and they said that they were having internal communication issues between their departments. I had to provide all of those details again. They promised that I won't have to provide them via email anymore. However, my perils didn't end here.

After a couple of days, I got a follow up email from them asking me to provide those details over the email again. And this went on for days. At one point, I got fed up and started telling them to read the email thread carefully every time. It's the same answer over and over again. That they are looking into it and my issue is their utmost concern.

Eventually, I lost hope and let it go. Now after 6 months, I sent them a reply again asking for an status update. For the last 4 months, they made zero communication and are acting as if nothing happened.

NEVER go anywhere with SpiceJet. They are frauds.

title: My flight got Cancel , however  Terrible Staff , and not Helpful in alternatives option
text:
with -Booking flight reference DEV2UF via Emirates
We are travelling from Europe to India with serval connecting  flights. and today 10-nov 2022 we get email and call information that our flight from Mumbai to Belgavi has been Cancelled. Frist of all it not good feeling and upsetting when we planned our tip and paid so much of money and as the day come close to travel we get information of flight cancelation, and i am trying reach the Coustomer help line for and hours no response. even when i write on what's App message no reply , if you do not want to do the service , please close all the service line. After waiting 1.5hrs i manage to speak with person named Ananya , being honest not helpful at all only mention as per policy we need to check with booking source's, even i explained her that we got call from SpiceJet information the flight got canceled  she check with her superior and mention the same to contact the source of the booking i have informed her that i had spoken with related to issue of my flight tickets cancelation in the day time of 10 nov  and the person informed me  that there are no flights available with this route , so asked her if she can change my flight from BOM to IXG to BOM to GOI, so its not long travel by car to IXG as i am travelling with baby. her only reply was they cannot do anything and we need to call the source of the booking , i explained her my booking made via Emirates airline , however SpiceJet has canceled the Booking and send me the booking cancelation. and also on the Emirate website mention related to all information we need to visit SpiceJet website. after long conversation , i requested to speak with the superior person he was not helpful at all His Name Joykem very helpless person only try info according to the policy we cannot do anything and you contact us next day by 10 am , we can check recording for the person informed booking can be changed, 
I do understand there might be challenges and due to that flight get canceled , however the service and there is no empathy by staff and not help full even the mistake was from SpiceJet itself. 

I don't Know if anything will happen with my booking, or whole trip will secured up only because of SpiceJet.
VERY UNHELPFULL STAFF AND SEPICEJET.CO 

Regards 
Ravi

title: Heavy theft on forced Check-in Luggage
text:
Dear all, 

I read now multiple stories similar to mine, but I can support the claims of theft from Spicejet staff. 

We were made forcefully to check-in our locked hand luggage in Durgapur Airport.
When arriving at the Mumbai Airport, my luggage arrived without the lock. I therefore instantly checked the content of the luggage. 
Valuable items have been stolen and the staff went thoroughly through all my luggage.

Neither the airline nor the airport did respond. I have flying experience in multiple continents and countries, this is the first experience of this sort. 
I am shocked not only by the theft itself but also the behavior of the companies. 

The airline should be held accountable for this.

title: Worse experience of Spice Jet airlines
text: Very much rude staff. They don't realize their own mistakes. I have a 2 confirm ticket with web checking. We requested many times for boarding pass and take a luggage but they don't agreed and told us if you want to travel we don't allow your luggage. Without luggage how to travel 12 days Diwali vacation. We tried and request them many times to understand our situation but they were not ready listen. Their behavior was very rude. And almost 25 people also their in same situations. Very much bad experience.  They spoiled our complete program. We were going for himachal. title: Worst staff with zero customer satisfaction on top of having delayed flights
text:
I was traveling from Delhi to Srinagar on 07.10.2022 with Spicejet. I was carrying one piece of checked - in luggage, one piece of cabin luggage with a laptop bag.

I had done web check - in well in advance, yet NO BOARDING PASS was mailed to me. While the passengers are completing timely proceedings from their end, Spicejet fails to do their part on time. 

I came well advance in time and was checking in my luggage. The lady at the counter weighed my checked - in luggage. She also insisted to weigh to my cabin luggage and Laptop bag as well. A practice which was not equally applied to all passengers but only to me. 

Why did the lady at thr counter all of a sudden wanted to scrutinise my luggage only and not care to check other passengers? This is a airline that works on whims and carelessness. No rule is uniform and they pick and choose passengers to harass them just for fun. Beware of booking your flight with this airline, you might be their next target. 

The lady told me that I had extra luggage. As she weighed my laptop bag, she said that is the only piece of luggage allowed. Thought it is clearly mentioned on their website and ticket that one piece of cabin luggage and one laptop is allowed. She dismissed all that and began harassing me. She said that for that extra piece of luggage, I had to pay Rs. 7050. 

Looting passengers is their new form of income. Probably they are struggling so much they have stooped so low they think they can harass common people for fun. I told her I will return my luggage as someone was waiting outside the airport. She had the rudest tone possible and informed me that counter will close in 40 minutes. 

I know what trouble I had to go through with CISF to return my luggage. When I finally checked-in and past my security checks and I was waiting at the Boarding gate, this shameless airline had the audacity to announce that they are running 40 minutes late. I repeat 40 minutes late. 

The kind of rush they created for me after harassing me and demanding money for a luggage which other passengers were allowed to carry. It was pure mental harassment for me. I would never ever recommend this airline at any cost. They lack the most instincts of humanity.

When Spicejet was late who was taking responsibility for that? No one. 
Who was answerable? No one. 
Shameless people. No integrity.

title: Very positive experience and a thank you massage to ground staff at that time.
text:
On 14/10/2022 we had flight from Kathmandu to delhi and then delhi to rajkot. The Kathmandu to delhi flight (Nepal airline) as schedule was supposed to reach Delhi airport Terminal 3 at 2:35PM IST but, due to delay flight reached at delhi terminal 3 gate at between 4:30-4:35PM. The departure time of our spicejet flight(SG3755) from Delhi Terminal 1D was at 5:35PM. So, we had only 1hour for completing immigration> baggage claim > travel from terminal 3 to 1D > spicejet cheak in > security > boarding. Delhi immigration helped us a lot due to that we reached at terminal 1D at 5:10-5:15PM. We were 7 people and upon requesting spicejet ground staff allow us to board the flight even though cheak in was closed. 

We are very thankful for the ground staff as well as manegement of that flight and and spicejet. If i had chance to personally thank them... I will thank them personally because they helped us to save approx 70k-90k INR ( cost of rebooking the flight and hotel for night for 7 people).

Every one like to write review and feedback when there is something wrong with experience but i thought that it is my duty to also write positive customer experience.

Thankfully,
Tirath Faldu

title: Worst airlines just to rob passenger in name of excess luggage
text: We 5 members were flying  from Srinagar to Delhi on 11 the October and we had 5 checkin luggage of 75 kg together. Suddenly few staffs came and told us to weight all our hand luggage too. And he instructed that not spare even a gram of weight to them . We had some food packets and some almonds which we bought in kashmir. Our luggage was not more than 4 kg excess from all 5 passengers. We told it's only 800 gms excess in hand . And our checkin luggage is accurate . They started saying  aggressively  to weight our hand purse and kids hand bags and food packets aslo. We requested them it's very unhuman act to do so with person flying with kids . But they claimed they will charge us 9 kgs . We told how could one charge for jackets in hand, food packets and hand purse of ladies. Looking to them we understood that they were waiting for only excess luggage charge and have no concern for flight delay. We finally have to pay 5400 rupees and then they again at boarding gate started staring to us.  We told we have already paid 5400 now what else you want . Do you want to rob us then take a pistol and put on our head and take everything from us . Many Public also suffered same thing and when they saw public has started opposing they went way. After getting into flight we were inside the flight for 65 mins on the run way . Flight did not take off. After all public strated shouting and loosing patience finally flight was takeoff and we reached Delhi . We came to know from many staffs and concerned persons that spicejet is bankrupt and don't have money to pay salary that's why they rob money from passengers by giving them harrasment and earn as salary. It was worst experience and we have decided not to fly from spicejet anymore. It's worst airline with worst airport staffs

At night in Chennai K.Kamaraj Domestic Airport,inside terminal building escalator speeds were slightly higher.At night(11.45pm) some passengers are sleepy so,speed should be reduced to prevent falls.

title: Horrible Customer Service, Uncourteous, No Transparency
text: I made a booking on flight SG2933 ON September 14th. Considering I was to attend a relatives father's death ceremony on 15th morning I booked the 7.20 pm flight. Little did I realize that my misery had begun. While checking in they told the flight is delayed. We had not received any prior notice. The ground staff kept us in the loop and telling us that the flight is delayed due to bad weather. From bad weather the reasons changed to cleaning etc. When the pilots arrived they revealed the plane had not landed. The girls at the counter were extremely rude. If you don't believe you can check fact that she once shouted at her fellow colleague which was extremely inappropriate behaviour especially in front of passenger. Our flight took off at 11.00 and during all these while we were not offered even a glass of water. How pathetic can you get? I SHALL NEVER RECOMMEND YOU TO ANYONE.

title: Money taken by booking website but no tickets issued -> still not solved 6 months later
text:
Sadly this is the 3rd update of my review...

In March 2022, I tried to order tickets for a flight from Delhi to Gangtok Pakyong Airport (I have indicated another airport as the destination in this review because TripAdvisor does not seem to know Pakyong Airport). At the time SpiceJet was my only viable option to fly to Gangtok. The SpiceJet website malfunctioned and no ticket was issued. I tried a few times with 2 different credit cards but nothing worked. I noticed later that money was taken from my credit cards.

The error message shown in their booking website stated that in such case the money would automatically be refunded within 7 working days but of course that didn't happen. ‚Ä®‚Ä®I have contacted SpiceJet customer service about this but all they have done so far is tell me that the issue was forwarded to the relevant department where it would get priority treatment. Those words turned out to be just hollow empty promises, nothing was done. I was able to recover the money that was taken from my Belgian VISA card after submitting a dispute claim to VISA. Due to different time limits I could not do the same for my French VISA card unfortunately so there I needed to rely on SpiceJet customer support. But they have been absolutely useless so far.

What is more: I am actually in India for the moment where I have had the opportunity over the past week to travel with other Indian airlines such as IndiGo and Vistara. I have had 0 problems with them, everything went smoothly (including the booking online and payment with foreign credit card). With SpiceJet on the other hand, I have had nothing but problems.

Would give 0/5 rating if I could.‚Ä®‚Ä®SpiceJet customer support has all the details of my case (PNR No. : IJEJSR / SIJLPH / T8W38F)

title: Nightmare of an Airline !!!
text:
SpiceJet Airways E873PV
Well I don't know where to begin had a awful experience with their App. Could not do Web checkIn at all used website, what'sApp nothing . Send them countless  emails and only got response saying will get back to you within 48 to 72 hrs. My flight was within 48 hrs. Send email to their customer service and only got an link which was not helpful at all. So my only option was to go to the airport early possibility to book using Self CheckIn Kiosk. So went early to the airport and guess what the Self CheckIn kiosk has all the other airline icons except Spice Jet. Why am I not surprised!!! OK so waited for the counters to open and when I went to  checkin my luggage the staff tells me that there is only middle seat available no aisle or window. Now for a guy like me who is 6'3" and heavily build middle seat is not an option so she is trying her very best to sell me the exit seats with leg room which comes with some benefits and finally since I don't want to sit in the middle opted to purchase it for additional INR 1400. At the boarding gate NO announcement was made every one was huddled to board, I had one ask the ground staff and showed her the boarding pass then only she allowed priority boarding to me. Flight left at 09:36 hours. Took off from runway A11 L9 smooth take off. Well the complimentary meal was a complete disappoint was thinking would be getting a proper tray meal instead got a sandwich, which could be described and tasted like boiled shredded chicken slapped between two stale bread. The juice RAW MIXED BERRY tasted like concentrated sugar syrup. The only good thing was that the flight left and arrived on time.

title: SPICEJET - HARROWING EXPERIENCE
text:
My wife and myself were booked onto economy on SG8363 from Delhi to Nasik travel on 7th. August 2022. Booking was done on Jul 21 2022 with ETD 5.00 pm.
Spice jet - roller coaster started the very next day when I get SMS that the flight is rescheduled to with ETD of 07.55 am. Since we were going on pilgrimage trip had to make all the necessary changes to hotel conveyance etc. We did not have any choice as the Spice jet was the only flight supposedly to leave in the evening.
Day before travel I checked in printed boarding passes with seta no.'s 1A & 1C (priority Check in). As mentioned on revised ticket and boarding passes my flight was scheduled to leave from T3 at 07.55 am.
I was pleasantly surprised when in evening prior to my travel I got a message from cab service supposedly managed by spice jet offering drop service to T3 and they seemed to have all my travel details. I immediately opted for this service although it was expensive compared to Uber, as I thought that they would be more dependable. Taxi reached well intimate on the date of travel but it was a small hatchback contrary to Seadn which was booked by me due to luggage. But with a few calls (and since cab had come before time), the cab was changed as per my need.
We reached T3, was allowed by security at the date after seeing my ticket. Just as I was about to drop the luggage at the counter (online check in was already done), I was told that my flight is from T1.
I rushed to the SpiceJet counter at T3, and the lady there confirmed that the flight is from T1. When I showed her the ticket and boarding pass mentioning T3, she said it was changed the previous day and SMS was sent to all passengers. On my countering that I had not received SMS and they have confirmed such critical information by making a call...she brazenly said "You did not book ticket from our site, why did you go to travel agent". She further created panic, telling me that now it will not be possible for me to take the flight and i would miss it.
Now, getting out from the airport again was arduous task, with the security personnel asking me to come in a queue...she also got mad at me when I insisted that i need to go out quickly to try and catch the flight from T1. After lot requests and cajoling by my wife the security relented and we rushed out.
As soon as we cam out a private taxi guy approached us (apparently he seemed to be waiting for us...smells of connivance.
The taxi driver charged us Rs. 1050/- for driving us from T3 to T1 all the way assuring us "Do not worry, I will make sure you will not miss your flight), seemed more positive than the SpiceJet staff.
Our agony did not end their..on reaching T1 as we tried to enter the security personnel did not allow us saying that our flight was from T3...I told him that I have come from T3 and the SpiceJet has confirmed that the flight has been shifted from T1, he rechecked and told me that they do not have any such information.
I again approached SpiceJet counter only to be greeted by a very calm and casual lady saying "No problem sir, actually flight number has also changed to SG9363. I will give you a fresh ticket" Obviously, it was noir problem sitting behind the counter munching her breakfast and sipping Tea or Coffee.
Finally we managed to drop in the luggage and we rushed to the boarding gate...we were immediately taken to the flight on the bus. Surprised to see a very small flight, we were feeling relieved at least we got the flight. Even boarded, we realised that the seats allotted to us were 1A & 2B...tried to change with co-passengers but cannot blame them for their adamancy as little or no help was coming from SpiceJet.
Reached Nasik and vowed NEVER to think of travelling on Spice jet.
Sharing this to make fellow travellers aware of what might be on store fro you... TRAVEL ON SPICEJET BUT PLEASE DO NOT EXPECT ANY SERVICE THEY ARE TOTALLY INSENSITIVE TO PASSENGER TRAVAILS. 
Foot Note: We paid Rs. 15694/-, to get this experience and yes this included Rs. 2998/- as seat charge for Priority Seats.
God Save us from this...

title: Poor Customer Service. Luggage bag missing and broken!!
text:
Worst airline I can say, first flight was one hour delayed (good thing they informed via text message) the problem is we have total of 6 luggage bags. 12th August at around 9:40pm arrived in DXB airport with one missing bag after waiting, searching and checking the entire area of about 2 hrs, and finally DNATA made a report for our missing luggage bag. With flight PNR# -QY926P, flight SG 005. Today, 13th of August, my husband picked up the missing luggage bag in dxb airport as SpiceJet does not deliver it to your address provided in the report (so useless/none sense giving your address)and take note. It‚Äôs broken!!! The handle was broken. 

I will not recommend SpiceJet to any of my friends and relatives. Very hassle as we traveled with infant and my mother in law which is a senior citizen nobody wanted to help in a timely manner. 

The agent from customer service has lack of listening and sympathy with the client. His name is ‚Äúhashid/harshid‚Äù something like that. 

The email provided for  the complain will have the Auto reply for so many time. 

No update from SpiceJet and DNATA as informed they will update us within 24hours. You have to call DNATA and wait on hold for 30 mins for the agent to answer the call.

Indeed terrible  and poor customer service.

title: HORRIBLE SERVICE -
text:
I booked a flight from Mumbai to Goa on 7 July 2022. I don‚Äôt know what happened but after the Booking was completed somehow it was not the flights I wanted. I cancelled my booking immediately after that by calling their customer service and I was assured my refund would be credited to my account in 10-14 working days (I don‚Äôt remember what they promised).

I eventually rebooked my flights on another airline.

It is now almost 2 months and I have not received my refund.

I have called 3 times to follow up my refund.

1. They promised it would be made on priority and I would receive the money in 72 hours. A week passed nothing happened.
2. I called yesterday (10 Aug) they said payment has been initiated. Today is 11 Aug and I have not received any payment.
3. I called them again they said it will take 7-10 working days.
4. I requested their Operator to lodge a complaint (Complaint No: 10107890)
5. I am still awaiting my refund after 2 months of waiting and after having called them 3 times

The most horrible part is the long wait time of almost 20-25 minutes for their Customer Service to answer your call.

I would never ever book a ticket or fly Spicejet and I would caution others if deciding to choose Spicejet.

In this day and age of e commerce / online transactions one would have expected better service. 

I wonder if the owner‚Äôs of Spice Jet know the kind of service they are offering their customers.

Time to move on and change your old ways and be responsive and use digital tools to enhance customer service.

HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE AND STILL AWAITING MY REFUND.

title: Excellent Experience
text: Very courteous staff. I was impressed with the way an elderly gentleman was being helped throughout the journey.

title: Worst don't fly.
text: Our flight was from at first 6:30am to 12noon. And first flight was delayed for 2 hours and 2nd flight for 3 hrs. They are giving reasons technical issue.

title: Airport service Spice Jet
text:
Super rude personnel at the DXB airport. It is one thing to not be helpful, but it is totall inappropriate to treat your paying customer completely impolite and rude.

We had a problem with our booking and couldn't meet their needs in time. Instead of helping us they just sent us away, told us to come back within 5 minutes. We did that and when we came back they just said they can't help us anymore. At the same time there were at least 5 other people with the same problem.

Even the managers at the Spice Jet office at the airport did not take time to listen to our problem or offer us any solution. They were not even willing to help us find another flight that we would pay for.

This is not the right way to deal with your customers, even if they have made a mistake.

Having travelled with several airlines, also during and after the pandemic, this was by far the worst airline. No information was given prior to departure and the staff were not understanding at all.

title: Worst staff behaviour
text: While boarding flight, walking in jetbridge they started checking bag. People standing and they are checking. I asked why you are checking, you could check at starting point so people doesn't have to stand. The staff then told it's for aug 15 , if you tell anything more I would take you to cisf and boarding gate would be closed. They threatened me, i was in official visit otherwise I would have make that staff apologize to me. Moreover the flight was delayed for 1 hour they don't have that much shame to apologise.

title: Terrible airline booking experience in my life
text:
I am made booking  may 6th 2022  on spicejet portal, for return journey from mumbai to chennai. and the journey date was 31st of may. morning flight from Mumbai to chennai and same day night flight back to Mumbai. 
One day before journey, I received message from spice jet that your morning flight has been postponed to 1st of June. However my return flight was unchanged that was of 31st May. This was a impossible journey. I tried  calling spicejet helpline but none of their lines were working I tried chat too, However it was giving me standard pre-coded messages.
So I had to canceled my tickets on the very last day of journey. Obviously it was going to cost me since they deducted huge amount from frair. 
On top of that today is 30July and they still havn't made refund yet. I wrote serval mails to customer care   and every time I received standard auto response from spicejet.  This is a fraud in broad day light

title: Not good experience with spicejet
text:
And once again very pathetic experience with spice jet..booked to and fro tickets in spicejet being the only option from Amritsar to Patna as non stop flight... definitely have gone for indigo if there is option of direct non stop flight....and to the expectation, the day I have to travel ..I kept on receiving message of delay and delay..anyhow it got delay by 2 hours 15 mins but got my nerves up and down thinking it might get cancelled as in earlier case it is already happened with me with the same spice jet...
And now comes the message of return flight, they have rescheduled that flight after 2 days..is it a joke ( delaying flight by 2 days)...and the worst is yet to come....I kept on calling on spice jet provided two toll-free nos and I was in queue for almost between 15-25 mins on phone and it never connected... finally it got connected on the 3rd day after waiting in queue for more than 16-17 mins and then i told them to cancel my flight from Patna to Amritsar as I have made my mind if spice jet is the only direct flight option from Patna to Amritsar, I will change my destination city as chandigarh with INDIGO. Now no more flights of spice jet unless it will be the last option on this earth

title: SpiceJet fraud alert
text:
SpiceJet Fraud Alert
	1.	I had booked my flight from Leh to Delhi at 07.55 am from Leh airport. We reached the airport at 7 am and I did web checkin before. They closed the luggage counter at 6.55 am and when I requested them to do something about they ignored me and no one was not even helping me. When I missed my flight they told me that my flight was overbooked so they closed the luggage counter before time. I have a question from SpiceJet that why are they taking overbooking when they can‚Äôt board all the travellers in the same flight?? 
	2.	Not only this they told me to wait for next flight which was at 10.10 am in the morning. Similar situation happened with other customers as well. There was a group of 7 people who came for 10.10 am flight and they arrived 1.15 hours before flight time. Again they said that we can‚Äôt board 7 people only 5 can go and we will adjust rest two. They didn‚Äôt even allow us to fly in 10.10 am flight. After that they talked to GoFirst member and make the rest of two to pay 11000/ person (approx) and booked a ticked in GoFirst flight.
	3.	Again they told us to wait for 12.20 pm flight which we did because we had to reach at our place. In the end we had to reschedule our flight next day because they didn‚Äôt allow us to travel in any of the flight. Again a family with 3 member came and they told the same thing to them that the luggage counter is closed. They closed the counter 1.30 hours before flight time. When they got panic just like me, they went to their office and told them to do something. But again they were not paying attention to them. Also , they told them the same excuse of overbooking. When his father requested them that his daughter has an exam tomorrow they told that only a single person can go. Others will have to take another flight for which they will have to pay again.
My only question to SpiceJet is why are they taking more bookings when they can‚Äôt make their customers fly from their flight? You can take bookings as per your flight seats. Why are you making money by making people fool? 
Our hotel manager also told that most of the travellers face the same issue in Leh.

title: 3rd class airline, misbehaved ground staff, rude and ill mannered cabin crew!
text:
I booked my flight tickets with this pathetic airlines and that decision to choose SpiceJet turned out to be the nightmare! First and foremost, the airline added a stop (Jabalpur) at the last moment without seeking any consent from the traveller. I booked my flight for 8th June 2022, non-stop from Mumbai to Chennai. Had to postpone my journey as my wife is pregnant and she couldn‚Äôt take a 5 hours since the unprofessional airline- SpiceJet added a stop thereby routing my journey from Mumbai to Jabalpur to Chennai and making a 2 hours direct journey to a 5 hours journey. Left with no other option, I had to shift my journey date to 9th June.
Reached airport and there started another another round of drama.Ill mannered, rude and arrogant ground staff at the counter made me stand for 30 mins and then she finally came up with a form which stated that if any things goes wrong with my pregnant wife‚Äôs health, the airline will not be responsible for anything including any expense incurred in health.
Me, my wife and my 3 year old son- we all were allotted a different seat numbers. Even after requesting multiple time, that lady refused to give us sequential seating arrangement. At last, I had to request my fellow passengers to change the seats (they were kind enough to accept my request).
Highly unprofessional, rude and arrogant cabin crew: I went to washroom and at the same time captain announced about a brief air turbulence. The moment I came out of the washroom, the air hostess started shouting and yelling at me infront of my family. I was shocked to find her so angry and frustrated.
On 9th June 2022, I vowed not to ever choose SpiceJet. I have even raised this issue with DGCA.
I am a frequent traveler but I haven‚Äôt ever faced such incident in my past. Usually I prefer only Vistara and Indigo as my preferred air carrier. But this mistake to choose SpiceJet has taught me a lesson for life.

title: Mental agony by spicejet airlines
text:
I had my neice's wedding in jaipur on  26th& 27th  April.
Convience is what a person requires the most when (s)he is traveling and for the purpose of convience i paid extra not marginally but exceptionally. 
I booked return tickets for direct flight from Amritsar to Jaipur with spice jet owing to their good reputation for me and my family. ( which they failed upon miserably)
To my utter shock, a day prior to the scheduled flight the flight got cancelled and despite paying extra I was left with nothing. 
I tried calling spice jet customer service, but to no avail. No one even bothered to connect or talk on call. 
Being left with no other option I had to book even more expensive ticket at the last moment (last moment tickets are super expensive).

The refund I received had cancellation charges but Why am I liable to even bear the cancellation charges at the first place. 

Somehow, I managed to reach jaipur and attended the wedding. 

Upon checking for return tickets the only available direct flight was from spice jet. My family insisted to not book tickets with spice jet but for the purpose of convience and having faith in such a reputed company i booked tickets with spice jet. 
But again to my utter shock, a day prior to the scheduled departure again the flight got cancelled causing due hardship to me and my family. 
I faced mental agony despite paying INR 72,000/-.

Im a doctor by professional and i cannot leave my patients unattended. I've a a commitment towards them so i had to reach back on my scheduled time. 
Now without trusting any airlines,   I booked a cab for me my family and had to travel back in cab in this heat which generally takes 12-13 hours. 
I reached back on 
But the failure on the part of spice jet has not only caused monetory loss but has caused due hardship and mental agony to me and my family. 

It was the biggest nightmare and i would suggest everyone to never rely on Spice Jet. 
The worst possible service.

title: I HAVE NOT RECEIVED MY REFUND AMOUNT
text:
I have been waiting over 4 weeks to get refunded my money for a booking that did not go through due to an internal system error their end.
I tried to book flight tickets on 27/04 which failed but the money was taken from my account. It stated at the time on the website that in case your booking is not confirmed but your amount is deducted then it will be auto refunded in 7 to 13 working days towards your account. I called them the following day to notify them but they told me to wait for the auto refund. I then called again on the 13th  working day and was told that i  should have called and sent in a complaint by email with the screentshot of bank statemnet with amount that has been deducted which I was not told on the first call. 

When I give PNR number don't you see that amount has been taken and your system will have all the details? if I have not given the proof of bank statement why you didnt email us asking for a proof? 

Your customer care rep told me it will take 72 hours to respond after sending proof. I have called after 72 hours.I have been told complaint has not been logged properly.I NEED MY MONEY 18,111 BACK.

I am not going call you again and again. All I am doing to do is  filing a fraud case against SpiceJet

title: Repeated last minute cancellations/reschedule
text:
I've had the misfortune of booking with Spicejet twice in the last couple of weeks. The staff at the airport and in flight are pretty good, but the odds of Spicejet actually operating the flight as scheduled is abysmal.

We got a random text a couple of days before the flight, stating the flight had been cancelled/rescheduled, due to operational reasons. This happened on our first family holiday in years, and we had to rebook, at the last minute with other airlines, at a massively higher fare, the costs of which, as you can imagine, is for us to bear. 
The airline really doesn't seem to be aware or care about the knock on effect their random rescheduling has on people's lives. 

If you're the gambling type and likes the uncertainty of will you get to your destination as planned, Spicejet is the airline to choose!!

title: Spice Jet staff so rude and unhelpful! Avoid them if you can!
text:
My mum was meant to be transiting through Dubai on her way back from India to the UK. She is a UK resident. When she travelled from here (UK) she got a transit visa on arrival in Dubai. 

On her way back we thought it would be easier if we got the visa before she leaves as it would mean less hassle in Dubai obtaining visa on arrival.

The Dubai immigration got my mums date of birth wrong on her visa, we got the visa one day prior to departure and I phoned them so many times asking to correct the date of birth and they said it would not be an issue and would be sorted when she gets to Dubai airport.

Spice jet didn‚Äôt let my mum board the flight regardless of the fact it was the Dubai immigrations mistake and they said they would fix it and also she could obtain a visa on arrival. We begged them and explained this was an admin error and the Indian immigration was helpful after checking all her other docs and they let us to go to board the flight but Spice jet didn‚Äôt listen to us at all. They asked my mum to get off the flight and she lost over ¬£2000 by missing two flights because of them, from Amritsar to Dubai and Dubai to the UK.

Their customer service is absolutely shocking!! They are not knowledgeable at all, UK residents can obtain visa on arrival in Dubai but they won‚Äôt listen to me. Nobody is going to compensate the money we lost. We are not happy at all. We will never use them again, they treat you like numbers they have no idea how much distress they caused us.

title: Hurtful, shameless
text:
So this happened to us as well.

Our SpiceJet Mumbai to Chennai flight was preponed by 14 hours without any kind of intimation. It is only when our multiple attempts at web check-in failed that we realised that our flight was changed from SG 251 to SG 611 and it had already departed.

The SpiceJet counter at the Mumbai airport denied any help, saying that since it was booked via the third party Happyfares, it is their responsibility to inform the customers about any change in flight schedule.

I've thoroughly searched my mail box as well as the SMS, and also the spam folder, I haven't recieved any message regarding the flight, from both SpiceJet and Happyfares. However ironically, my inbox is full of all kind of promotional messages from both the parties.

SpiceJet site doesn't have any option to process the complaint. The customer care number directs us to the 'Alexa' model saying that they are experiencing heavy call volumes.

Happyfares people attended the call and blatantly denied any responsibility.

Obviously we have lost our money on both way flights because we had to cancel our trip, and not to forget the hurt caused to us and our friend whose wedding we were going to attend at Chennai.

title: Love the way you Serve..
text: Service is outstanding. I did two flights with SpiceJet and on both flights, cabin crew were super sweet, polite, friendly and helpful. The customer service provided by Muskan (at Jaipur) and she was excellent. It was a short flight from Jaipur to Amritsar. Even on a short flight, they gave a really nice light meal that some airlines don't. Special mention for Ms. Eshita(Cabin Crew), who warmly greeted me and my colleagues on board and kept watching our comfort during the flight. The plane was very clean and the restrooms were cleaned more often than pre-pandemic. Crew was also with face mask on. It was a real hard work which shows their tremendous commitment to their high standard service. Meals were served quickly and they gave us enough time to eat and then cleared up really well. Planes were at a nice temperature. Flights all departed on time and landed punctually or even early. Only the Cabin Crew with its dedication which will be missed. I am happy to fly with Spiceajet and will continue flying whenever possible.

title: Worst Flight Ever!
text:
OK so we booked Spicejet from New to Goa and Return. While going the flight was delayed by 3.5 hours. Upon reaching, one of ours bags dint arrive. After waiting for 1.5 hours at the airport, the bag was located at the Delhi airport and due to the airlines Negligence, it was not loaded. They assured, it will be delivered the same night but it was delivered the next day due to which we had to buy our personal belongings while on a leisure trip. 

While coming back, the boarding was on time but we were made to wait for 1 hour inside the flight without any air conditioning. They said ac will only work once the engine starts. Passengers were suffocating and were seen airing themselves with the help of brouchers kept inside the flight. 

Trains these days are much better than these cheap low cost airlines that even charge you if you want a seat next to each other. And try calling their customer care with a minimum of 45 mins wait! 

Worst flight experience! Never flying Spicejet again!

title: Great experience
text: We had a long car journey on the way to the airport and my 8 year old daughter was car sick. As soon we boarded the aircraft she got nauseous and wanted to throw up. I asked the air hostess for an air sickness bag and tissues to which she offered me 3-4 bags and an entire box of tissues. Unfortunately my daughter had the worst flight experience ever throwing up atleast 7 times. But the air hostesses were kind enough to get us sickness bags and even offered me cut lime slices with water and enquired about my child's health from time to time. The air hostesses were kind enough to arrange for a wheelchair as we were departing the aircraft because my daughter was visibly too weak to walk. I would like to thank Merlyn and her crew for all their help for assisting us.

title: Joke of an Airline with no value for customer service. Waiting over 6 weeks for a booking that did not go through!
text:
I have been waiting over 6 weeks to get refunded my money for a booking that did not go through due to an internal system error their end.
I tried to book flight tickets on 09/03 which failed but the money was taken from my account. It stated at the time on the website that in case your booking is not confirmed but your amount is deducted then it will be auto refunded in 7 working days towards your account. I called them the following day to notify them but they told me to wait for the auto refund. I then called again on the 7th working day and was told that i should have called and sent in a complaint by email which I was not told on the first call. Long story short I have still not received my money 6 weeks later. I am getting hung upon after spending hours on the phone and spending a fortune on making international calls to them. I am receiving basic generic emails not answering my questions and not giving me any further timelines just asking me to wait. A joke of an airline that has no value for customer service.

Also after landing we were told that we have two options 1) To board the same flight and return to Bengaluru 2) Take a refund and get your way out to Bagdogra‚Ä¶third class service by Spice jet‚Ä¶will never trust them again‚Ä¶even local bus service are better

title: Very Poor Experience
text:
The boarding process at Dubai airport was taxing and stressful. FOr starters, we had announcements going on for about 30 minutes stating that the boarding process would be orderly and on a row basis, 10 rows at a time starting from the back. When the boarding actually started, nothing..! No calls for people to board in an orderly manner, felt like being herded as cattle.
I understand when an airline has issues accomodating the cabin baggae and has to be moved with the checkin bags, but this was done in such a haphazard and nonsensical way. Travelling as a group of 5, we had 3 carry on bags between the 5 of us - all under 7 kgs). After being herded like cattle, I was asked to weigh my cabin baggage which I did and it came to under 5 kgs, the Rep then took my moms baggage and placed  it on the same scale and says you have exceeded the limit and only 1 bag is allowed!!!!!!!!????? WHYYY?? Per the ticket ALL 5 of us prchases each passenger is allowed a cabin baggage provided its within the limit right?? I obviously argued with him and he let us in... but hold on... after our tickets were checked and in the entrance bay to the aircraft we had SpiceJet reps saying ALL the cabin baggage slots were full and all bags need to checked in now... REALLY?? so if this was the case why not say it at the first check , not 2 mins before? again I was let through after a small argument with them. Once Inside the aircraft, lo and behold we had plenty of space for my baggages.. no issues whatsoever.

Extremely stressful, irritating and DEFINITELY NOT FLYING SPICEJET ever again and I receommend the same for anyone reading this review.

title: Pathetic Experience. Dont even think about Spicejet.
text:
SPICE JET

Remember the name is enough to make you think twice before booking. After international flight in 2019 one more pathetic experience in 2022.

Dehradun-Delhi-Ahmedabad SG 3762 & SG 193. First the boarding staff asked me to take off 1 baggage as they said they had only 1 piece policy. Even though my both bags didnt had total 15 kgs as per their weight policy. On the other side when I was travelling Ahmedabad-Mumbai-Dehradun through Indigo, their staff said, "Sir if its not important just drop off your another bag too in the luggage section.You ll be tored carrying here n there."
This is the difference between Indigo & Spicejet. 

And the story doesnt end here. I am roaming around with my 7kg secondary bag on Delhi Airport for 6 hrs & at the time of boarding, they informed me to put that bag in luggage section again as they didnt had more space in cabin section. So at the end it went inside. So when is now 1 piece baggage policy? 

This is heights. Harassing people even after charging premium then other airlines. 
Will never ever recommend Spicejet to anybody. Be it Domestic. Be it International. 

No wonder why Indigo has more than 70% Indian domestic market & spicejet will be a history shortly just like Jet Airways. üëéüèª

title: A model for courtesy
text: Three of us, all elders above 75, travelling to Shirdi to offer prayers at His temple, received the very best of unfussed service from your staff, be it at the pre-boarding phase or while checking in or in-flight service. We couldn't pre-book our lunch because there was no supply left. Yet, from somewhere the on-board staff appeared with just three sandwiches and assuaged our hunger. While returning from Shirdi, we were a tad late to arrive at the airport; there was absolutely no fuss and, instead, we noticed an eagerness to assist us. However, there is an area they could not help us: we could not get seats together because the adjoining seat was a paid-for one. We travelled separately. The staff wringed their hands and apologized. Perhaps, services have a limit!

title: Luggage Check-in bag withheld- without any fault
text:
I Jivesh Anand with family had traveled from Delhi to Goa on 15th March 2022, flight- SG 8171, PNR- G9Q7PC. Had an unexpected very bad traumatic experience with SPICEJET without any fault.

My luggage Check-in bag which had children's (including infant) clothing, my office laptop etc. was withheld at Delhi Airport, citing that it has 4 copras (coconuts) identified at level 4 checking. The searching and claiming activity at Goa wasted 3 hrs at the airport.

It was really challenging to deal with such a situation when I found that Goa staff of SPICEJET are not answerable and they were reluctant to share any authoritative credentials to speak to in this matter. After a long struggle, I could only sign the declaration and consent form for SPICEJET to open my bag and validate the objectionable item in person. I was intimated that the bag will reach Goa airport by 2200 hrs. Post this, we left the airport to our local destination.

I continuously tried to follow up with the SPICEJET team for the next 24 hrs and despite no fault from my side, struggled badly to connect with anyone from SPICEJET to speak to. No one from them cared to call me and update me on the further steps.

At night 2400 hrs, I received a call from one executive that your bag has been identified and will reach Goa tomorrow morning. The cited reason for withholding the bag was a misunderstanding of the laptop with lose battery. I iterated to them that this carrying of the laptop was suggested to me by the SPICE JET officials only at the boarding counters in Delhi, as it has an inbuilt battery (DELL- Latitude 3410) which is not objectionable.

I tried to inquire about the objection created due to the existence of coconut in the bag. They refused the existence of the coconuts and apologized.

I had to unnecessarily discuss in length, requesting the bag to be delivered at the residing hotel. Earlier they refused, however, confirmed after a detailed discussion on the matter with the new concerned person.

Further, the next day, I continuously struggled to contact SPICEJET team to receive my bag and nobody cared to contact me or guide me till 1400 hrs. It was difficult and very inconvenient for us all without that important luggage bag. They were reluctant to share even the driver details with whom I could coordinate.

Finally, I received my bag after 24 hrs of struggle with SPICEJET.

I will never suggest anyone to consider believing that such instances can not happen with you. Such misconduct which spoil your plan and roadmap can give you immense stress, worry and trauma, are totally unexpected in this serious profession and business.

Considering this experience with SPICEJET, I will never recommend for SPICEJET.

title: Terrible experience. Charges exorbant amount for baggage.
text: I had a backpack, carry-on bag and large bag to check in. Shubangi at Pune airport made me check the carry-on bag and charged me 9250 rupees. She wouldn't allow me to fly with the carry-on bag despite the dimensions being appropriate, stating my backpack was too big and didn't count as a women's handbag (despite the fact that it fits under airplane seats). Online, they were charging 6250 for an additional bag but at the airport it's apparently 9250. The experience was terrible. Shubangi and the male placing my bags on the conveyer belt were laughing at me as I handed my credit card, which I felt was unprofessional behavior. To check my bag cost almost double the price of the flight. SpiceJet wants to make money off of you in every way possible and will look for anything to charge you extra. And it's impossible to do anything about it because otherwise they don't allow you on the flight. Terrible experience. First and only time I'll ever fly SpiceJet. Never again. If you're thinking of flying SpiceJet, don't do it. Pay a little more and fly another airline.

title: Worst experience !!
text:
I would like to request everyone who want to travel with Spice Jet, THINK AGAIN or FIND ANOTHER Airline. Starting from their staff to their managers all are completely untrained and unprofessional. Last month I was due to fly with them from Amritsar to Dubai and reached airport 6 hours before and their staff member firstly refused my entry as my test results had expired. Well, their SMS said to carry RT-PCR report issued within 48 hours prior to departure and my report was issued only 24 hours prior to departure. In their language they meant that you need to have your sample taken within 48 hours.  

Anyways when we thought of ignoring this issue and finding a solution to it, my husband who was over the phone with me, quickly contacted the nearest lab to get the quickest RT-PCR done before the flight leaves. I took a cab with all my luggage from the Amritsar airport and sat within the facility till my results came back and again took all my luggage on the cab to the airport. This time they had another issue with me ‚ÄúHow did I get the result soo soon‚Äù. I explained the manger Ajay Dutt that these days you can have express RT-PCR done from anywhere. In return he didn‚Äôt believe me and said I must be lying and that this result from the lab is fake.  

 
That‚Äôs it I just couldn‚Äôt believe the amount of pressure, anxiety and helpless I felt at that moment as they took my luggage off the conveyer belt. I had done the right thing but obviously they didn‚Äôt have enough training or knowledge to read the results. My husband rang the lab to complain of the result not being accepted at the airport and the manager at the lab asked to speak to the Airport staff member who believes this is fake. Ajay Dutt wouldn‚Äôt take my phone to talk to the manager of the lab and instead rang 50 other places to confirm if the express results are even possible. He kept telling me that he has confirmed from places and that this is not possible. 

After requesting him soo many times he finally rang the number of the lab I got my results from and spoke to the lab manager. He was explained that its genuine result as there is QR code which will confirm him that the result is from an ICMR approved lab and to not hassle me for this issue. IT IS NOT THE JOB OF AIRPORT STAFF TO DEEM A TEST RESULTS AS GENUINE OR FAKE, THEY NEED TO LOOK FOR THE QR CODE AND SCAN IT FOR ITS LEGITIMACY.  

He didn‚Äôt like what he heard and then hassled me for the visa for Dubai, I advised that I do not need a visa as my transit is only for 4 hours at the airport. He then asked me if I have a transit visa, ARE YOU KIDDING ME. Dubai doesn‚Äôt need a transit visa unless you are transiting for more than 24 hours, the whole world knows that. 

Finally, after consulting with other people he did let me go and this is where my journey of all the problems came to an end. I sat on the plane and promised myself that I will never ever fly with them again in future.

title: horrible response & care from Spicejet, after rescheduling flight over 7 hours

we were way back to home after 7 days of TREK in snow covered Tungnath & surroundings, completely drained. When we asked for some facility for delay, they denied. Its so horrible - even at Railway stations they have waiting room facility, better one for AC bookings. The airlines gone so careless to provide basic food & accommodation. It was Friday & prices were shooting up for Delhi bangalore flight, they sold these tickets for higher price & we suffered.
When i sent them mail for same, again its kind of irresponsible reply, dragging & asking to switch to next level officer...

title: Spice max issues
text:
Dear Customer care

I booked a flight ticket two days back to travel from Sharjah to Madurai with my family of 4 traveller. Yesterday I received a call from Spicejet to Spice max. Initially I was not convinced later he explained me the benefits like Priority checkin, complementary meals, Extra leg. And later I upgraded my ticket with all my family to spice max by paying additional amount of around 8500 rupees

But today while I was checkin I dint see any spice max counter in sharjah airport. While I was asking customer service officer they told me they don‚Äôt have any special queue line for this. After the long conversation I was directed to counter and they checkin my baggage, during that time I am not aware of priority sticker which the customer agent dint put in my baggage.
Later

once I entered the flight I dint see any spice max seats like extra leg to sit comfortable. The traveller who is sitting next to me also booked this in Normal spice ticket.¬†
After that they provide me the food which is like cashew packets. While the customer agent calling me he asked me the options of chicken Briyani and veg meals. While I am asking this to air hostess she told me they don‚Äôt have any option like this for now. And my baggage also dint come first. So I am totally disappointed with spicejet now. And we dint bring any food and we expect to have lunch on flight.Last year 2021 January 17 I travelled my family of 4 with spicejet from dubai to Madurai. That time we had experience of 8 hours flight delay and I struggled a lot with my kids in airport¬†

The guy who sit infront of me also having same issues but luckily atleast he got the luggage baggage as priority as I noticed there was a sticker mentioned on his packages. Even I am the one received the luggage atlast which makes me more disappointed

title: DUBAI TO COK FLIGHT SG702 DELAYED BY 1 DAY, UNHYGIENIC FLIGHT & LUGGAGE BROKEN INTO 2 PIECES
text:
We had a very bad experience during our flight from Dubai to Kochi on 30th Dec 2021, the flight was initially scheduled on 30th Dec 3.35 am and we came to know after reaching the airport the flight number and the date was changed without any phone call or text message from spice jet.  We had to bear bothway taxi charges, time & effort for the carelessness and irresponsible actions from the spice jet team.
The Next day again the flight was delayed by 2hrs 30 mins, My parents, 69 years old, had to wait at the airport without any food/ refreshments from the spice jet.
After reaching Cochin airport we received the luggage in such a pathetic condition that half of the bag was broken and we couldn't even open the lock to see what all items were missing from the bag as the lock was also damaged. After checking with customer service team all they said was sorry and nothing can be done. They don't relay care about maintaining customer relations. If you are looking for some cheap means to travel without any commitment to time or baggage assurance you can definitely go for this.

title: Spicejet came a long way and should beat Indigo
text:
After the incidence of Indigo ground staff beating passenger , I switched to spicejet and they are doing fantastic. Especially keeping flight on time. Staff are super courteous. After Indigo becoming top domestic operator there are certain degree of indifference , arrogance and rudeness with Indigo. That‚Äôs the reason I and many of my known dump Indigo forever. 
You will be surprised( at least I was) that spicejet fly on routes where no other airline are ( like Jaiselmer) .

I am sure that Spicejet and Vistara will displace Indigo and they surely deserve to. Just remember after coming on top, don‚Äôt start beating customer like Indigo , they are the one who made you no 1 by choosing to fly with you.

title: Poor customer service.
text:
Didn't at all like the customer service provided by them. Even with pre-ordered meals we were served way later after everyone who were buying meals on the spot and paying. 
At the start of the flight, an announcement was made by the crew that they would serve the meals to those who have already paid and pre-ordered but the two air hostesses were way too slow and they spent around 40-45 mins to serve the first 10 seats who were ordering meals on the spot, which is exactly opposite to what they announced.
Further to add, water was not served to all customers at the start of the flight. The two Air hostesses were very slow with that and they stopped serving water when they got a call from other crew member. They didn't even bother resuming the service after they came back. 
Very poor customer service by the air hostesses present on this flight.

title: My most recent flight experience with SpiceJet.
text:
The staff were very kind and helpful towards everyone. I mean to say that, they were even more than what is required of the job. To be honest, i hadn't travelled through Spicejet for a long time and I had even heard certain disappointing tales from my friends.  But I must say, 10/10 allll the way.

I would like to mention, that the manner in which they executed the step-by-step, batch disembarking of the passengers, was really polite. In most cases, you would see the staff being very rude at that moment and personally I feel they can't be blamed at that particular point of time. 

In spite of all that, the staff on our flight did a wonderful, patient job.

title: Memorable Experience on Spicejet on route to home!
text:
Today I traveled from New Delhi to Jodhpur via SG2277. I was on seat 2B.

So far, I have had great experiences while on board Spicejet but today was extraordinary! 

Niharika the lead crew is fabulous!!

She not just took good care of me but of everyone else on this flight. She is a great example of how one can handle the passengers inspite of a delayed flight. Always smiling and making sure that we were all comfortable!

She even apologized a couple of times for the delay and I loved her humility! I also noticed that she has a unique way of greeting passengers when they enter the aircraft! 

She was great at handling the kids too! 

I wish Spicejet and Niharika best of luck and make many more passengers loyal to the company! 

Regards,
Dr Nitin Nagrale
CEO India and Emerging Markets
Quality NZ

title: Appreciation for Cabin Crew
text:
Dear Spicejet & Trip Advisor Team,

I flew on SG 8253 (13/12/2021) from Delhi to Kolkata & this was one of my flights where i felt extremely safe admist Covid-19.

I travel all over world for my business trips on regular basis & everytime have a different inflight service & safety experience.
I thought to mention about this flight crew as it was extremely professional and i throughly enjoyed my journey. 

The service of the crew was great & on time and they were always present throughout the flight for the passengers be it serving water or helping senior citizens with there bags and making them feel safe and comfortable throughout the flight .

I always wonder how the crew can carry the PPE on them for long flights and follow all the safety precautions and handled them so efficiently. Each of them were wearing masks, gloves & faceshield during & after service which I have hardly seen any other airlines crew wearing it each and everytime I travel.

Kudos to all the crew members for doing their job with such dedication & enthusiasm & for making my flight experience memorable.

I somehow managed to get all the names of the crew and I'm extremely delighted to put this across that Mr.Mahe Tanzeel : very hard working and extremely kind person.
Ms.Lisha : very sweet and polite 
Ms.Alpana and Ms.Supriya who were working in the front cabin are also very good.

I would sincerely request to please pass my Regards to each and every crew of SG 8253. Hope to fly with you guys soon.

All the very best and do take care of Yourself. 

Mumtaz Ahmed
PNR : DCNRKG
Flight No : SG 8253
Seat No : 30C

Thank you

title: Unexpected service
text:
On 12th early morning traveled from Chennai to Hyderabad SG731, I have an doubt on whether their cabin crew are really happy working with spicejet.
Travel of nearly 1 hr. did not see even a single second that cabin crew carried a smiley face, non of them was smiling at all (They were wearing Mask- but again we can easily find a person smiling or not thru eye contact)

The way the talk with the customers not a great hospitality service at all example their was a person next row to me who's table tray was in open during landing a cabin crew lady said - CLOSE THE TABLE TRAY that's all the word she used with hard face to the customer. I feel that she could had said in better some professional way. .If I was in her place I would have said- excuse sir we are about to land in few minute requesting (or) would you mind to fold the tray or some other trained professional way.

I feel that they are in lack of service staff or lack of training or not paying a staff on time or something else.Luckily my returned flight was booked in different airlines. Its my personnel opinion that.s all.

Hospitality Service Industry is something whether you are happy or not, while on duty while in uniform you need to carry a smile face to the customers.

Sure will travel soon again and hoping to see a pleasant journey.
Thanks!!!

title: UNNECESSARY AND FREQUENT FLIGHT DELAYS AND OTHER ADDED HARASSMENT
text:
I, am a highly suffered customer of Spicejet Airlines want to make all aware of the horrifying customer service they provide. 
I availed a ticket from Spicejet airlines on behalf of the Managing Director of my company and faced a treacherous issue regarding the flight time as it delayed and hanged up for 2 hours 30mins and also the time frequently changed for 2 to 3 times in minutes and my sir missed a very important meeting with business delegates due to lack of time. 
This frequent change of flight time is just not acceptable and very much annoying for the customers with a busy schedule.
Calling SpiceJet customer care is a nightmare. The phone only rings or else is busy and we are not getting any support. Previously also in an international flight, my boss faced similar horrifying issues from their end. 
My objective of writing this review is to convey all reading this review as well as to the other innocent customers of SpiceJet and also to business communities making sure that they should not get fooled by the company in near future.
Please avoid their service as they will harass you in no time and also will put you in a horrifying state turning you helpless during urgency.
In a line, Spicejet doesn‚Äôt know how to honor the time of valuable customers they are only interested in siphoning money from customers with false promises.

title: About Spicejet

title: Poor performance - handling baggage
text: The airline misplaced our bags when travelling from Pune to Jammu (via Delhi). The purpose for travel was to attend a wedding so you can imagine how painful and inconvenient this would be for anyone in our situation. The information provided by the airline was inconsistent as well. Per the airline, the bags were not loaded at the origin point (Pune). Online, the status of the bag is "missing". Expected response time is about 3 days, which is basically the duration of our trip. This entire scenario is uncalled for and demonstrates an inability to handle operations smoothly.

title: They reschedule so much that ruin your vacation....NEVER BOOK IF GOING WITH FAMILY
text:
Booked flight SG 8645 to Goa (PNR TJN65B) which was schedule to fly at around 5 PM. Got a reschedule sms two days before that it would now go 4.20 PM. OK I got the things set up now for it.....then before one day of the travel got another text that it would now go at 8.20 PM....think 4 hours of shifting forward...all planning gone.....now they give me option to change the flight if I want..so same day I was thinking travelling with kids so selected another flight SG8411 which was scheduled to take off at 7.20 PM.....when was travelling to airport for it ,again got a text sms that this new flight now has been rescheduled to take off at 8.20 PM..what a mess...then we reached the airport and it again rescheduled to go at 8.45 PM......we were in terrible situation with spicejet....ultimately we had no option but to just wait...finally new flight took off at 9.14 PM....now think you are travelling with kids and so much mess in flight rescheduling......never book with them please guys and if you have courage to do then always check the flight history  on flightradar24.com. May be you would change your mind...I called makemytrip for this mess and they said I myself opted for cancellation to go from one flight to another...Yes I opted because of so much trouble and even SpiceJet do not bother you once you pay....worst service ..BIG NO IN FUTURE...In return I booked with AIRINDIA and they are amazing. On time and also on flight nice service. 

I had missed the whole wedding and reached Goa at 12 AM and baggage came after 40 min of landing...reached at venue at 2 AM in the morning :( .

title: My flight got canceled and Struggling to get refund since 1 April 2021.
text:
I am a senior citizen and had planned to comeback from Muscat to India in November 2020. I booked Spicejet tickets PNR HDR1XD which got canceled due to COVID-19. I took alternate flights and came back to India in November 2020. My refund from Spicejet was due since April 2021. In spite of continues flow ups via mails and phone calls I received only fake promises that they will refund it shortly. Every time I have to call them and wait for 20 to 30 minutes to connect their customer care executives. Every time I receive just hope that they have informed their concern department and this issue will get resolved soon.

 I feel like being cheated with this airline. Recently their customer care told me that they have refunded, when I asked them for the transaction details, they said, I will get it on email but have not received transaction details on email, nor my money in account. So being responsible traveler, I advise other travelers to be cautious with respect to cancellation and refunds with Spicejet. I have attached my followup emails. Please refer it.
