title: Worst Airline with worlds worst customer service
text:
SG 8905 was suppose to depart from IGI Delhi airport at 19:55 on 29 Mar 2019 but was DELAYED FOR 6 HOURS and departed at 1:30 on 1st Mar 2020 on the false pretext of bad weather conditions!! I just have one question: how did the flights of other airlines managed to depart and arrive at Delhi airport if the weather condition was that unpredictable?? Is Spice Jet Boeing flight made of cotton candy that would have melted in the air if it would take off!!

When the passengers began to question the spice jet crew they even had the guts to VERBALLY ABUSE THE PASSENGERS, forget about courtesy, dinner or lounge facility!!
After an hour of heated argument with the crew we came to know that the actual reason was that the crew was late (for 6 hrs) maybe they just quit and left, after all who would work for such a toxic organisation. Well that definitely explains Spice Jet going out of business and if, not I‚Äôm pretty sure that‚Äôs gonna happen soon. 

After all the drama they managed to bring a crew that was not even able to give safety instructions properly which caused major concerns.

After raising a grievance with Spice Jet the incident was closed ignoring all the concerns and misbehaviour with the false excuse of bad weather conditions!! I can‚Äôt believe that this airline has NO REMORSE whatsoever and can treat the passengers with such MISCONDUCT!!

Please just go out of business and save other people from such pain.

The tour operator booked all tickets. They said that all tourists will be taken to Delhi.
Our ticket was booked in Spicejet on 23 December 2019 Monday. Our journey in the flight was pleasant and trouble free.
The incidental advantage was that the Spicejet flight landed in Terminal 3 in Delhi and flight for Kuala Lumpur also scheduled to start from Terminal 3.
As wheel chairs were booked for both of us, we could reach from domestic terminal to international terminal.

text:

title: Bad food flight delayed and seat forcefully changed
text:
I guess the subject line says it all

But I would like to describe a little and the food in detail.....it was a 3.25 flight and I had been travelling from 12 pm to get to Amritsar airport 

The flight was delayed....while I was doing web check in....it forcefully made me change the seats which were pre selected 

The food I was given cold hard paneer tikka and some alu paneer.....both of which were hard and tasteless 
I looking at the food asked the crew to give me an alternative and she refused ...saying she can't give me any other veg option
They had the instant poha upma biryani and noodles but she refused 
Sad service

I got an awesome hospitality by one of the inflight crew member named Nidhi. I will never forget this experience. I am a mathematics teacher and was looking for pen in flight to solve a mathematics problem I had. I asked Nidhi for pen and with a great smile she offered me her pen with instruction to return when flight would reach to destination. Her pen would have been proved lucky for me and problem I was trying to solve from last two days finally get solved. Thanks a lot to Spicejet to have such great crew members in team

title: Cancelled Flight..Efficient Handling by SpiceJet Staff
text:
We booked our flight from Kochi to Male months in advance because we were on 5-week vacation in India & the Maldives. Feb 14 we showed up at Cochin Airport for our flight but was told it had been cancelled because the runway closes from 10:00 am - 6:00 pm daily and it has been this way for the past 5-6 months. We were in a shock as this is the 2nd time this has happened to us during our vacation in India...the 1st time was with Air India...they cancelled our flight from Delhi to Jaipur without notification...we had to wait in Delhi Airport 9.5 hrs for the next flight. This time neither we or our travel agent in Canada received any notification from SpiceJet for the flight cancellation...yet for months SpiceJet has been emailing us about their flight discounts and even allowed us to make a meal selection for this flight...it‚Äôs Bizarre & Mind-boggling. But here comes a SpiceJet staff member Keath Joseph...he efficiently sorted things out for us...he arranged a refund, helped us book another flight to Male early the next day...he got us booked for an overnight stay @Cochin Airport Courtyard Marriott Hotel. Although we we were disappointed we couldn‚Äôt get to the Maldives as scheduled...we comforted to have Keath Joseph taking charge. Thank you, Keath. Much appreciated. NOTE: We are only giving SpiceJet an excellent rating because of Keath Joseph.
David & Iris

title: Mixed Feelings
text:
For fellow passengers, all I can say is that SpiceJet is a mixed bag. 

To start with the 1st row is astonishingly uncomfortable. This first row is meant to be a ‚Äòmax‚Äô seat but instead it‚Äôs cramped and awkward. Everyone of the 6passengers that I was traveling with on a recent trip (despite their size or build) were uncomfortable. Basically SpiceJet took over JetAirways aircrafts and refurbished them for an all-economy flight. If you are flying in such an airport please avoid first few rows. To ‚Äòmax‚Äô passengers I‚Äôll say please opt for emergency seat instead

Next comes the service : this is where the airline needs to take a long-hard look. I fly for work every week, sometimes twice a week and often end up with a SpiceJet booking

Their ground crew needs serious dose of training. Especially Harpreet who I‚Äôve had the misfortune of checking-in with on two occasions. And each time her attitude is high-handed. She is inefficient, impolite and in general does her job with plain disdain. 

On the other hand the crew in crew on board, especially Kamna provided exceptional service to passengers who were visibly uncomfortable with the silly ‚Äòmax‚Äô seats. Not only did she make this flight exceptionally comfortable for me, i observed as she patiently helped a copassenger - an elderly gentleman - with patience and elegance

People like Kamna make an airline special. I wish her all the best.

I really hope that SpiceJet reads this and brings at least its staff training upto mark so deliver a consistent service experience.

She didn't know how to talk and handle passengers' concerns. She was arrogant and rude to the point of not carrying out her responsibilities as an air hostess properly. title: Excellent experince in first time fly with Spicejet
text:
As a first time flier was extremely happy with the service meted out on all sectors - crew were young, energetic and very helpful, polite but firm. All the supervisors were well trained, Rickt, Sandeep, forget the name of the third - but best was Aarti - absolutely superb service.
the only downside of the entire trip was Ahmedabad airport - considering it is the main airport for India's richest state the domestic and international airports were appalling - it was as if Indian airports had gone back in time by 30 years. there was no duty free to talk about and the lounge was but a hole in the wall. 
While I would surely love to travel by Spicejet again, will never want to go thru Ahmedabad airports.

title: An excellent flight journey with spicejet

title: A confusing experience for travelling to shirdi
text: I had a very bad experience recently though not sure that whether airline is responsible or not. I planned my travel to the newest airport of shiridi with my family. There is SG 431 form CCU to SAG via MAA which means it will have 1 stop at MAA will de board and board passenger but there will be no change of aircraft, same I confirmed with customer care. I booked a ticket for my family from CCU to SAG via MAA and one for me from MAA to SAG as I was in chennai. Now in the day CCU flight got delayed by 3 hrs. I cheked in . Then my family was informed that there flight will go up to MAA only. Though they arrange for a separate aircraft for MAA to SAG passenger and ask me to board. I told them about my family and ask for reschedule or refund but they refused so I had to refuse boarding, unload my luggage. Though they arrange for my family to reschedule for next day as there is no aircraft to shirdi at that day because it does not   have night landing facility. Though they did not give a penny to me and no accommodation given to my family only free of cost from reschedule from MAA to SAG

title: UDAN Scheme an excellent initiative, however execution particularly on timeliness leaves much to desire for
text: Excellent initiative of connecting India's Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities with mainstream metros of the country under the Modi government's UDAN scheme. However, this must not be seen as an excuse to be punctual with their service. More often than not these are connecting flights and flights get delayed by close to an hour on a daily basis. Airline must set a time which they can honour and punctuality must be given top priority for UDAN airports as well.

title: No social responsibility
text:
Everyone in the world knows Thailand is second highest affected country for corona virus . 
I was about to travel to Thailand on 3rd of this month with a confirmed return flight on 10th.Considering the serious spread of virus, I decided to cancel the tickets. 

My hotel has refunded a complete amount understanding the serious threat to lives at the moment. 

But hats off to SpiceJet team. They are more concerned towards making money even at this time of threat. When I called the customer care, the lady kept on repeating herself that she‚Äôs sorry but that‚Äôs the policy. When I told her this cancellation is not for any of my personal reason she repeated again I am sorry ma‚Äôam but this is how it works.

When I asked her to transfer me to her supervisor, ( omg can‚Äôt stop laughing at this but she said) mam he will tell u the same thing as if she was quite sure he‚Äôs gonna say the same. 

And then she mentions mam if u were travelling to HongKong I would have helped you full  refund. WHY should I go to HongKong when I wanna travel to Thailand. 

Nowhere on their website it says every cancellation has 5000 rupees as their fee. It infact mentions 3500 for international flights. She was so confused about what she was talking -just kept repeating the same lines for everything I asked. 

Make your money guys but in a right way. Not by taking the advantage of such situations. Spicejet show some social responsibility.

title: Change of aircraft causing distress.

However, they brought an aircraft from Corendon Airlines of Turkey, which had hardly any legroom in the first Row specially booked for the purpose of good legroom. title: Not a great experience
text: Flew with Spicejet for the first time on a flight from Delhi to Goa. When you book be prepared to be bombarded with emails asking if you want to upgrade.  I had to amend my preferences with them to stop the daily emails.  That didn't stop them sending emails just before the flight suggesting that I upgrade to SpiceMax. One of the key messages that influenced me to upgrade was the 'Seat with extra legroom'. In reality once I boarded the aircraft the only thing I got was a seat near the front.  Legroom was exactly the same so false advertising and a waste of money.  I have flagged this to SpiceJet customer experience prior to writing this but received a less than satisfactory response.  My advice if you have to fly with SpiceJet - Don't upgrade to SpiceMax!

title: Spicejet

title: Cheap not very cheerful
text:
Sunday 19th January we travelled on Spicejet flight SG 455 from Mumbai to Goa. The flight was due to depart at 15.35 and landing at 17.05 a scheduled flight of an hour and 30 minutes.

The aircraft pushed back at 15.45 and was airborne at 16.00. We were informed that the flying time would be 50 minutes. We landed at 16.50, which was 15 minutes ahead of schedule.

We travelled as SpiemMAX passengers we got seats with extra legroom. The seating was a bit narrow as the table was in the arm rest which reduced the size of the seat. As a person with a 28 inch waist, I found the seats uncomfortable and a bit of a tight fit, not sure how a larger passengers would cope.

We also received a complimentary meal with non-alcoholic beverage. When booking the flight we pre-ordered the vegetarian option. 

We were served Paneer Tikka Shaslick, which included slices of stuffed tandoori aloo, along with a vegetable croquet. On opening the food tray it did not appear very appetising, did try some, not very nice so was uneaten 

We did also get priority check in and our baggage was off loaded as priority. We had pre paid an additional RS 1,200 for an extra 8 kilos of baggage. This was a connecting internal flight from an International flight with a greater baggage allowance.

Spicejet is a low cost airline with no frills, this was rather apparent as we boarded the aged aircraft which was in need of a refurbishment and modernisation.

The crew's uniform was a pair of black jeans and a red polo shirt with the Spicejet logo on it. Some might consider tacky, we thought it was rather youthful and looked good on the crew.

title: Good staff and great service, very old aircraft
text: Our Aircraft was very old and urgently needs an overhaul. Otherwise no complaints on keeping schedule, staff service etc

title: Excellent Ground Staff
text:
The ground staff - Debarun was the first staff on your team who seemed really cheerful and chatty. 

He helped us do the check in without feeling that we had to wait while he sorted out the computer and gave us the boarding pass. He kept us occupied by talking to us and his friendly disposition definitely impressive and all 7 of us travelling felt the same. Wish more of your staff at check in learn from him. Kudos Debarun!!

The two air hostesses (terribly sorry to be forgetting the names now) were very pleasant and patient with passengers.

title: Upkeep of aircraft
text:
The tray table in the first row was missing. It happened twice in the same aircraft. They didn't replace for 2 days at least. 
The previous dress of female crew with skirts was more appealing than the red trousers they are wearing now on weekends. Unlike Spicejet class. May reconsider to revert back.

title: Worst Airline in India at present!
text:
Well my parents flight was scheduled at 3pm. We stay 50km away. Being a weekday and heavy traffic in bangalore they got delayed by 10 mins and arrived at 2:25pm. And they were denied boarding and onward journey stating checkin closed 10 mins back!!  
I have seen airlines like Indigo going extra mile in terms of customer service esp when it comes to dealing with senior citizens. 
And here is an airline going down day by day, be it customer service, etiquette, flight quality etc. 
They simply dont care. The behaviour of the staffs at boarding counter are clear indications of this. 
Ideally this airline should ve closed some years back had it not been bailed out. Then these staff would ve understood the value of hard-earned money. 
Yes, i lost INR 11,0000 but you lost customers for a lifetime.

No great company has been able to survive for long with bad customer service. It is only a matter of time until you guys will need to shut your shop.

title: Book if you have time & patience to sit on the airport
text:
Unlike my past experiences with spice jet, I had high regards and expectations from SpiceJet as I was flying their international flight for the first time. Not only was I disappointed but was surprised to see non apologetic behavior of Spice jet staff in listening to the customer‚Äôs concerns. My flight was delayed more than 5 hours. So concerned was spice jet about the delay that offered refreshments for their delay - well don‚Äôt get ahead of me yet. The arrangements were for passengers who were inconvenienced were done was on different gate from where they were supposed to board from and that was not near either. More or less the time I was supposed-to land in Jeddah I was still on the tarmac. We were told that the connecting flight from Dhaka arrived late and hence the delay. The logic says if your flight is delayed by more than flight flying time then the passengers on the airport should be compensated and taken care of. Well there was no sign of it. Either case we reached Jeddah early in the morning at 04:30 am which as per schedule was 22:50 previous night. 

This wasn‚Äôt one off the case , on my return leg the flight was delayed by 3 hours. Again no sign of passenger sympathy. Even as per Saudi GACA rules if the flight is delayed more than 2 hours the airlines has to provide refreshments at the boarding area. Forget about the refreshments there were no signs of spice jet staff to even attend the passengers. As soon as we land in Mumbai our immigration was done in less than 1 minute as I was once of the first to get off the aircraft and I had to rush home since I was flying out again in less than 12 hours considering the delay. The baggage arrived after 45 minutes. Signs of Spice jet staff? I don‚Äôt think they exist

title: Treated us like cattle ! In humane experience.
text: How can one treat a person like this? We were flying spice jet from Dubai to Mumbai and then to USA . We had 8 hours to make our international connection. Our flight fro. Dubai was supposed to take off at 12:10pm so we got to the airport at 9:00am (due to rains most cabs refused to take us) we get there and there is no one at the gate till 12 . Then a spice jet rep comes tell us that the flight is delayed and looks for info on the board. It said rescheduled to 2:00 then 3:30.. then 5pm and then suddenly our flight number stopped showing up on the board. No spice jet rep was there in the entire airport. The Dubai airport told us to contact the airline as they would not help us. We called the Indian spice jet office and were promised that the flight would take off at 8pm. Nothing and no one showed up at 8 to the gate. Then we called again and were told it was rescheduled to fly at 3am . Little did we know that Our nightmare had just begun as we were traveling with two little hyper energetic boys age 3 and 7. As always we reach the gate at 3 and no one . We waited there till 4:25am and then out of no where a rep came and started boarding . We got into a bus and they drove us to the aircraft . We were delighted . The bus got us to the aircraft but the bus driver refuses to open the gate. We knocked and pleaded but he could not hear us from the other side. We sat in the bus for 2 hours before they opened the gate. Finally we boarded the aircraft and were so tired that we went to sleep after the pilot announced that we will reach there in 2.5 hours. We woke up at 9am to be told that the pilot had to take the other flight to Calicut and the entire crew with him. We had to deplane and go back and wait for further instructions. Crazy right! Now when we get off we are made thru go thru security and given Mc Donald vouchers. There was a 2 hour wait to get to the food so we decided to skip the line and pay somewhere else. We finally were told that the next flight was booked for 5pm. With no hope left we reached the gate like idiots at 5pm. Thankfully the flight took off at 7pm . Got our bags soaked thru and through with water and damaged in Mumbai. We missed all our interconnections, hotel bookings as we had no insurance. I‚Äôm surprised Dubai airport did not help us nor did the spice jet apology to date. horrible experience. Can never travel to Dubai ever again. Or take spice jet. I hope you get what you deserve.

title: Review
text: The flight was really good and I really enjoyed it... And also my family really enjoyed... Thanks to all the cabin crew who assist us and gave us a good service

title: Mr.Gaurqv sumbria ,127835

title: Very uncomfortable seating arrangement even for paid seats, good food and in-flight services
text:
They charge you Rs 1,200 for premium seats and I paid Rs 2,400 for two premium seats. Couldn‚Äôt fit my bum in what was supposedly their most comfortable and premium seat (front row). Moved to third row and had to keep my legs folded for the entire trip.
A much shorter and around 60kg old lady sitting next to me also could not sit without legs folded. Have never faced these issues in any other airlines including Indigo, GoAir, Vistara.

The entire mood for the trip became sour and I will never fly Spicejet again.

On the positive side, the air steward tried to pacify me. The pre-booked meal was of good quality too. The service by air steward and air hostesses was good too. 

But sitting in such an uncomfortable posture for a 2 hour + flight when you have paid so much for comfy seats is just not done

text: Wonderful service of Spicejet from Banaras-Delhi-Pune. New place, nice food... polite staff... Fast and reliable ‚ô•Ô∏è

title: Delayed...again...
text: For Christmas my friend and I decided to spend a couple of weeks on the east coast of India, travelling around Tamil Nadu, so we booked flights through a search engine and came up with Spicejet as being the most convenient time as well as the best price combination. To give them credit, we did receive an SMS in plenty of time advising us that the flight had been delayed by 2 hours, so we were able to adjust our taxi times to leave later and meet up at the airport. Once there, we checked in together and were given a window and an aisle seat since the aircraft was only a relatively small turbojet Bombardier Q400. We went through security and waited in the departure hall where after some time there was an announcement that we could collect some food and water at the gate due to the delay. They gave us a carton of spicy vegetable biryani and some water which helped but we still arrived much later than planned and had to stay closer to the airport rather than in Chennai due to the later arrival time. It was just an average flight, but the seats reclined a little and we were able to sleep...and water was provided.  But it does seem that more and more frequently these days flights out of Goa particularly are very often delayed....

title: Great Service!
text: I had booked seat 1C, for the extra legroom, which also entitled me to an on-flight meal. The level of service I received from the crew was truly remarkable! Roselina has the perfect attitude for the service industry. When I expressed my displeasure at the breakfast (I'm not fond of fried eggs), she readily swapped her own breakfast with mine! Who does that nowadays? She and her colleague Grace made my journey very comfortable and most memorable. Thank you, ladies - you just ensured a loyal customer for the carrier!

title: Thanks
text: Good service and timely departure and early arrival . I travel with infant crews Cooperate nicely. Thanks to all

title: Travel vagamon
text: Good for entartainement see nacked beauti of nature with adventure .Paragliding is the main attractive activity there

title: In addition to my initial review of Budget Airline and Fly SpiceMax - Degrading with time
text:
Initially with the launch of HK-Delhi sector all was good and slowly the airline picked up its original behavior of being late, delays and below par crew services. Out of a handful of such lousy experience sharing the recent one (11th Jan 2020) flew from Delhi to Hong Kong and the flight got delayed by almost 3+hours. The journey of a passenger starts not from the time of boarding the flight but the taxi from hotel/residence. I felt this time the travel was never ending. The temp. in the flight was not optimum, the pre booked food options weren't available. The reason I keep booking them because of low price compared to only other two options Cathay and Air India. Sad that Jet Airways went south and don't operate any aircraft now but their services were at par with cathay.
If you find cathay price is say 500$ - 1000$ more than Spice then go for that, it will be worth. Again is SpiceJet then only SPICEMAX can save you.
Safe Travel.

title: Good journey
text:
I took the direct flight from Dubai to Pune to avoid flying to Mumbai and spending time on the road to Pune.
Journey was quite nice. Flight was on time. This is a red eye flight so can be strenous for those who dont sleep in flights. Food was good. Flight arrived on time in Pune.

Overall good experience.

title: Pathetic customer service
text: They just don't care about customers. Just want sell everything in flight without providing any comfort to customers. I can just on and on. Flight delays are very frequent, planes are old and frequently gets into technical glitch

title: Spicejet Riyadh
text: Staff are friendly.No Tea avail as there is no hot water.Delay , reschedule and delay again. Overall it was not a pleasant experience.

title: For Business travel
text:
It's a better option to save early morning wake-up calls rather travel inadvance for meeting a day earlier on cool night. A direct flight saves time.
Hope it suits you r convenience.

title: Crew Service
text: Today SpiceJet the Crew was very Courteous & Excellent Hospitality extended to all Passengers ...I sincerely Recommend Flying SpiceJet

title: Best domestic airline we flew in India
text:
SpiceJet is sold as a budget airline and is no-frills, exactly as expected. But the service was much better than we expected - very friendly and professional. The flight wasn't full and we got moved to an emergency exit as these rows were empty - that was really nice.

We purchased the priority luggage package, and while there was no priority check-in queue, our luggage was out super quick - I would recommend this add-on.

We flew on 3 different domestic airlines in India and SpiceJet was by far the best!

title: Too Bad first Rows.
text: Its difficult to sit and travel for 2 or 3 hours. Spicejet needs to revisit the quality of arm rest in window seat is missing. Modified Business class of Jet Airways. Do not take this row if you are flying in Spicejet

title: One of the best flying experiences
text: This was one of the smoothest landing I‚Äôve had in many years. The pilot was brilliant and so was the rest of the crew. Great flight, reached before time.

title: Menu
text: Efficient staff and effective . Both at departure and after landing. The staff was alert and efficient. Signs of very high morale.   Good menu. Very elaborate. Must taste the coffee.. lots of option on preorder. Don't find them in other airlines.

title: Recommending spicejet for your future travels
text: I am a frequent flyer. Every time i go anywhere i give 1st preference to spicejet, i like the behaviour of the in-flight crew members. They are very professional and very helpful

title: Mr. Shouvonik Bhattacharjee
text:
Best food variety in the domestic airline sector, Eye catching flight interiors, service by flight attendants with smiling face.
Only spoil spot appears flight delay which is quite common everyone I travel

title: Very Good Travel
text:
Everything concerned to the travel from food to services offered were very good.
Airports both at Hyd and Vha were clean

title: Excellent service by very nice young women
text: It was a safe and pleasant flight made friendly by the very good service staff. They were so nice and helpful.

title: Poor service from in flight staff
text: Flight is ok but staff is pathetic with no thread of customer service. The word sorry does not exist for them. They should learn from their competition it will help them to retain customers

title: Delayed service :(
text:
The flight was delayed my more than 3 hours. None of the staff was apologetic and it was business as usual for them. Some seats are very much cramped. We paid extra for the seats 10A. Surprisingly there was no window in seat 10A it fest suffocating.
My suggestion do not take late night flights on spicejet. Its likely to be delayed.

title: Get it Together and Train Your Employees
text: I was instructed to proceed to the kiosk for self-checkin even though I had a piece of luggage to check in. Then I went to drop off my luggage. The employee placed my suitcase on a large tray and told me I was 4 kg over. I said there is no way I weighed that before I left my friend‚Äôs house. How about that tray? She said, no that is excluded and ordered me to go to another counter to pay. I was seething. I waited as the counter helped three other passengers in front of me. It was my turn and she placed my luggage on the belt without the tray and I was .4 kg under. Definitely lack of proper training. Why would she put a suitcase on a tray? It was not a backpack. It was inconvenient and annoying.

title: comfort in the skies
text:
Recently had an opportunity to fly Spicejet from Tirupati back home to Mumbai.
The schedule was apt for an evening departure from tirupati and coming back home around sunset.
The airline was on schedule ,in flight service was excellent.
the flight had a halt at hyderabad and despite heavy air traffic over Mumbai,we landed on time.
The baggage service was prompt and we were driving home within 20 minutes of landing, inspite of the long walk from the bay to the exit gate

title: A nice flight experience
text: Everything is ok. Staffs are courteous and helpful. There online service is awesome. Thanks . I have a request to all staffs of SpiceJet. They are energetic, polite but be please a little more sympathetic to senior citizens above 65, better above 60. A little help costs nothing. Regards.                  Dr. Dipankar Mukherjee

title: Spicejet
text: Spicejet staff is amazing.  Special thanks to Rahul for helping throughout the hectic process. Thank you all.

title: Excellent service
text: Excellent service and was really amazed by the way the captain had introduced his fellow cabin crew and it was wonderful flying in this spicy aircraft.  Good job... Keep it up... the wonderful service

title: Best of Grace
text:
Flight delay intimation must be streamed in WhatsApp for passenger comfort.                                  
Complimentary Tea or Beverage can be included in the inflight journey experience. 

Namaskar.

title: Flight experience
text:
Spice jet timely flying and landing cabin crew are very upto mark and hospitality was amazing 
 I‚Äôll recommend to my friends
Thanks

title: Too happy with Spice Jet servicec
text: Excellent ticketing and ground staff, would love to travel with them again and again. The flights were absolutely on time. The departure as well as arrival. I informed the ticketing staff that I am asthmatic and need a good cool seat, she then alloted good seat for both the flights I travelled. I am extremely happy with Spice Jet

title: ordinary Airline not upto the Mark
text: we are Business trip from Kolkata to Mumbai( 5th jan 2020) and Mumbai to kolkata (7th Jan 2020) both the time the flight was delay due to flight touchdown. foods are not upto the mark. During the flight from Mumbai to kolkata the air hosts , Purobi is really very good and helpful and polite .

title: Overall good but not as per expectation
text: We were flying SpiceMax. Checkin was very smooth with a dedicated counter. Crew inside the aircraft were helpful and courteous. Food generally fine. But the seats in the row 2 did not appear to have extra leg space or width to make it a Max experience. Depending upon the kind of aircraft - the ones belonging to old JetAir with 2*2 seating - can make or mar your Max experience. So pray for the old JetAir aircraft while flying. And if you are in middle seat of a 3*2 there is no comfort either.

title: Ordinary Airline
text: Boarding was good. But aircraft inside was terrible. Very compact seats & poorly maintained. Not cleaned properly. Magazine holder was broken & when informed to in-flight person, showed helplessness. In flight service needs improvement a lot.

title: Spice Jet domestic travel
text:
I tried Spice Jet for liesure dometic travel.   The airline is a good replacement for some of the ones that are lost in India over the last few years.  

Well trained staff. On time arrivals.  Good timings for travel.

title: Spicejet flight review from New Delhi to Hyderabad
text: Flight is good in cleanliness and food services but lags into the area of boarding, on time departure, on time arrival and legroom especially for people with 6 feet height or more.

title: Prompt flight to Jammu
text: We take the non stop morning flight from Mumbai to Jammu every November for Vaishnodevi . It leaves Mumbai at appx 6 am and reaches Jammu at 10 am. This flight is the best if you wanna return back to Mumbai the next day. On time every year

title: Amazing Experience
text: The crew are polite and the flight is on time even though was delayed because of the previous flight they made sure assistant was provided and helped me board the plane

title: Thanks for connecting to Shirdi. Going there is quite convenient now.
text: I had booked a to & fro flight from Chennai to Shirdi. SpiceJet is providing daily two direct flights for the same at afternoon. Without direct flight, going to Shirdi via Pune or Mumbai was quite cumbersome. If you are planning to go to Saibaba temple, try SpiceJet.

title: Dr.
text: Excellent service and on time departure and arrival. The staff and crew members are very cooperative and hekpfull

title: Overall very good experience
text: Self check-in system is really good and hassle free. On time arrival, despite 10 minutes late take off is also worth appreciating.

title: Very Good Experience!!!
text: As the flight was in time but more time taken for Check-in and boarding as well as to collect luggage. Leg room was not upto the mark.

title: Most efficient and courteous crew best among present Indian airlines.
text:
Excellent service. The premier seats get special attention at 10-15% extra cost. 
Spicejet has lately been my most preferred airlines. Let me share my very recent experience. I had booked 6 flights seats for my sister and cousins from NewDelhi to Mumbai. At airport check due to excess luggage they had to shuffle luggage to save extra charges which the check in officer patiently allow. Sister and cousins had 5 luggage‚Äôs however the mix up due to weight management in luggage they got tags for only 4 luggage‚Äôs and the fifth was left aside. At time of arrival 11pm night at Mumbai the group realised and notice to arrival luggage help desk about missing luggage. Since No tag it should be a No support excuse from Spice jet but they noted her address and assured will be found and delivered to her address. 
Midnight 3 am I get call from delhi airport Spicejet officer asking me about and luggage left behind and send me pics of the luggage and checking if its mine..which was luckily ours and we shared the lost luggage complaint receipt and glad they find it. The officer assured the luggage will be deliver to Mumbai in early morning flight.. In morning the Spicejet arrival department reconfirmed luggage received and promptly delivered to my sister address.
Lucky and super happy to get lost luggage wrapped and neat. 
Strongly recommend Spice jet a go to flights for pleasure and business travels.

title: Spice jet
text: Very good experience, nice service provided by hostess , very humble and polite towards passengers,find no problem in traveling

title: Had worst experience!!!
text:
We had pretty bad experience with Spice Jet. Poor service at airport with fake promises. It has been almost a month now still I am behind spice Jet to get my refund amount.

And the response from the customer service is also really pathetic!!!

I sent a mail to customer service (below mail) and Check their reply, have attached screenshot.

Hi,
 
I had a booking with Spice Jet on December 9 2019 with PNR P9PBQP . I had my web check-in done and reached airport by 5:00AM in the morning.
 
Even after having my Web Check-in done the Spice Jet in charge person asked me to stand in the same line of the counter check in, which was a long queue.
 
Due to this when I reached the counter by 5:30 AM they said boarding is closed.
 
The issue was purely because of the irresponsible reply of the spice staff who asked me to stand in the check-in queue even after mentioning that I have a Web Check-in done.
 
After explaining these issues to the duty manager and we came to conclusion of partial refund of the money of ?4000 which was initiated by one named Meenu in the Spice Jet Airport office.
 
It has been almost 20 days now the amount has not been refunded when I contact the customer care they say only ?500 will be refunded as no proper message is updated in the portal.
 
The airport Spice Jet duty manager promised for an amount of ?4000 refund and now the customer care person says ?500 refund, this completely a disappointing service from Spice Jet Airways.
 
Already we had a bad trauma in the entire trip because of this and more over that now I am being slogged for the refund!!!!
 
 
Regards, Srigant Madhavan

title: Sanjay Dwivedi
text:
Flight was late as on most of the occasion 
Though it was lucky for me as I was getting late to the flight but we need to stay a long near the aircraft for boarding as usual and it is with almost some other air lines also this needs urgent attention 
Food was Good 
arrived late at Delhi

title: Never again
text:
90% of my travels are with emirates, then Qatar, then Turkish so I don‚Äôt have much experience with low cost. However when I was checking flights Surat to Kolkata the price was approx 4000 Indian rupees then about 10 days before flight I checked again & it was 9000 rupees so I thought i better book it but this being India it wouldn‚Äôt accept my Uk RBS credit card so after a few hours I gave up , went to book it about a week before and it had gone up to 14000 rupees- what on earth is going on? To make sure of our tickets I paid them 28000 rupees- how can they keep jacking up prices? Surely they have published fares? Don‚Äôt think easyJet or Ryanair do this
To cap it all off the 3.15pm flight took off from Surat at almost 6pm teaching Kolkata in the dark and robbing us of a cosy get together with friends - so if can help it NEVER AGAIN with SPICEJET

title: The Late airline
text: This airline was supposed to fly around 8 in the morning but was 3 hours late and we missed the connecting flight. However, Touriq was very helpful and commended as a good service personnel. I will never recommend this airline or choose this airline.

title: No resolution provided
text: The inclination of the seat 17F was not working. The entire journey was uncomfortable. There was no resolution provided after the same was intimated. That too after paying for the seat... thorough unprofessional behaviour.

title: Feedback
text: I would like to say thanks to Ms.Angelina who had a great hospitality. I travel a lot by flight but i never ever seen a girl who show her smile face to everyone while she was very busy in that time.these is  my first time in spicejet and Ms. Angelina make me feel like to travel again only by spicejet... Once again Thank you so much.

title: Comfortable flight
text: I along with my wife and son decided to visit Shirdi and accordingly took SpiceJet SG 946 from New Delhi  to Shirdi and return by SG 942 . During winters the flight leaves New Delhi around 13.50 hrs and the return flight takes of from Shirdi at 15:50 hrs the next day. The flights from both sides not only took off bang on time but also landed ahead of time! The interiors of the Boeing 737-800 had been spruced up the seats in rows of 3 were adequate for the flight of 1hour 50 mins duration and the two first rows have good leg space. The warm meals and beverages served were exceptionally good and the cabin crew were friendly attentive and very helpful. The boarding and disembarkation was smooth. Baggage was put on the belt at Shirdi almost as soon as we landed but on return to Delhi it took almost a little over an hour which was an unacceptable period and almost the duration of the flight.

title: Cheap price. Friendly but poorly trained staff regarding safety measures
text:
Not too many options so booked on spicejet 

Cheap price. Front desk told me that flight was delayed due to weather. Check in staff said it was because late arrival. Flight was delayed by just less then 2 hours. They did not offer any other options. 

In flight - was served with a tasty sandwich. 
Flight crew was ignorant about safety. My next seat passenger had his table tray out just before take off - crew member did their last walk by check and didnt see this. I had to explain why tray should be up during take off and landing. 
Many passengers had their seats reclined during take off and landing. Staff doesnt realize this is a hazard during sudden stopping and evacuation. 
Wonder if they ignore safety of planes also. 
Back of seat has safety signs hidden between advertisements- shows they probably would ignore safety for profit. 

Will avoid unless i get a proper response.

title: Baggage theft!!
text:
Very poor check in experience as airport was very crowded. No lane discipline and utter chaos. 

On top if it after reaching home found that lock of one of the bags was missing and security tag and lock was found inside the bag. Obviously, someone broke the lock either at Jaipur or Dubai. At Dubai it took over 45 minutes to get the bags. My jewelry and cash was missing. Now I am being told that I should have lodged the complaint at Airport itself. This is unacceptable. Lesson for future to avoid SpiceJet and Dubai Airpprt.

title: Amazing service
text:
Nice service very nice and cheap rates for food and beverage.i like it so much.
Maintained timeingly good hospitality.

title: Domestic flight
text: Good overall experience. The Frontline staff and cabin crew were very cooperative.The food served was also good but may be some more variety would be welcome.

title: Service improved
text:
Compared to last time when I flew the flight was on time 

Couple of things that they need to improve 
- make available more choice of beverages as per Menu
- pilot should brief passengers just after flying and after landing at least inform about temperature outside

title: Spicejet
text: Excellent,courteous and helpful ground and onboard staff,well maintained  ,neat and clean aircraft,good ambience.

title: Baggage misplaced
text: We had a flight from Chennai to Port Blair. On arrival at Blair , we learnt that our luggage was not loaded in the flight she to some technical reasons. It was very unprofessional and uncaring to be honest. We had to wait for our luggage for it to arrive later.

title: A really spicy flight!
text:
If a picture says a thousand words, below is what sums up my flight, on the 30th December.
The interior certainly could do with some TLC; in fact I wondered if it was legal for the aircraft to operate with the seat in the condition it was in.
The flight was on time; but we had an extreme pilot in the cockpit who probably thought he was on the set Fast n Furious Airline Edition.
Lewis Hamilton could learn a few tricks from this cowboy considering how the aircraft was maneuvered during taxiing; felt like I was back at an Universal Studios theme park.

title: An average experience
text: The flight check-in was late due to long queues as some desks missed executives. No announcement was done regarding delayed luggage drop. Number of employees was less to handle that kind of crowd. Got my desired seat and baggage drop was an easy process. However, had to rush through the security gates and made it to the flight huffing and puffing. Spent about 40 minutes at the luggage check-in. Arrival was on time despite delay. Got my bag quite early. Would recommend overall but departure needs to be managed better.

title: Good Inflight experience
text:
Hi,
I would like to mention special thank you for your cabincrew members because i was travelling with my old mother, wife and an infant.all cabin crew members were very supportive and caring. thanks to Miss Sweetyfor being a patient lister and extending support to make my old mothercomfortable. A very special thanks to Miss Ishita for being not just anexcellent air hostess but also a great human being because when my mother wasdeboarding the flight in a wheel chair she had supported my mother with herarms and, she had bent down to place my mother's legs properly on the wheelchair. that was a really a kind gesture and we are completely touched andmesmerized with such services and staffs‚Äô behavior.Thank you SpiceJet!¬†
Regards,Ashwine

title: Best Crew Service in Spicejet Flight SG-192 Bengaluru to Delhi on 04-Jan-2020
text:
The Cabin Crew of Spicejet airlines are very much helpful, courteous and very kind in nature to the passengers while servicing them.

I was really heart touched when I was greeted with warm gratitude and best wishes for me & my family during this journey. Also Crew members provided me with extra cookies & beverages for my kids to make their day. It was positive & kind nature and courteous support from your Crew members - Jasmine, Neha & Scally who helped me and greeted me and my day very happy.

Also later I found that, the Crew Leader, Doma, was the one who have given the Crew members a free hand and all support to take their best decisions and make customers happy with their best of service during airplane journey. We should really en ourage and support such Crew Leaders and members like, Doma, Jasmine, Neha & Scally, to upscale them, empower them and enrich them to make them perform at their best to supervise customer experience.

Atlast its Customer who needs to be made happy to get the Business grow by keeping good relations and best service to them.

I again Thank you and give my Best wishes for the Crew members for their personalized and best customer service provided to me during my journey and making my day very happy.

Flight - SG-192
Date - 04-Jan-2020
Bengaluru to Delhi
Crew Team Members - 
1. Doma
2. Jasmine
3. Neha
4. Scally

Thank you and have a wonderful & growing Business ahead.!

title: Food rocks
text: Best food is seved hot hot in Spicejet. Class food always be it breakfast lunch snacks dinner etc all are good and ore book reasonble rates

title: Love to Travel Flying bird
text:
Best budget flight to travel,,, Better they add food but its available on flight menu on payment.
Best staff. and cool landing always.
will travel with spice always.

title: On of the worst experience
text:
I have booked for this flight to travel to Hyd recently due to my work purpose and the flight timings have been changed which was been intimated
However the flight was further delayed was not at all intimated and good that I ate timely meals and had my dinner before boarding the flight

On board associates knew that the flight is been deferred and it‚Äôs almost 10.45 in night and their might be some patrons or boarder who are travelling with their teen-agers and folks might not have eaten or may have need of some sort of nourishment

I do recognize that they have limited meals on board and can‚Äôt oblige to any one except prior authorizations, however as curtsey they could have asked for tea, coffee or may be cookies to old generation and kids
They should have been considerate on this and could have eluded making cash on this, I have also mentioned this earlier but I think other feedback are more important than this
 Otherwise every time I have travelled with Spice have been good experience, however felt this time hence the evaluation

title: Good value for money
text: To be honest I didn't have any problems, low cost airline, no inflight entertainment, no free inflight meals but the staff were professional and decisive, the check in went smoothly. if you can afford better by all means go Gulf Air or anyone else but don't whinge, you get what you pay for with these guys and even the baggage allowance is stripped down to just hand baggage of 7 kg unless you purchase it at check in!

title: DOT ON TIME SERVICE EXCELLENT EXPERIENCE
text: My wife and I had to go to NDA, Kharakvasla, Pune to attend my Golden Jubilee Reunion at NDA wef 12th to 14th Dec 2019. We travelled by Shatabadi Exp train from Chandigarh to New Delhi on 11th Dec afternoon to catch a SpiceJet Flight SG 8185 to Pune at 08.45 hrs on 12th Dec 2019. We reached the Terminal-3 at Indira Gandhi International Airport at 06.30 hrs. It took just 10 minutes to check in and after going through the Security we parked ourselves in the Lounge. After a hearty breakfast we moved to the waiting aircraft. The Staff at the Gate was very courteous and efficient and we were in the Aircraft in no time. We were pleasantly surprised to see ten more couples (our coursemates with their Spouses) on the same aircraft. The Flight took off in time, the cabin crew spared no pains to take care of us. It was a very smooth flight and the Capt kept us well informed about the ongoing journey and the various stats connected with the flight. We landed at Pune 25 minutes before time, courtesy the Friendly Tail Wind. It was a wonderful experience. Thank you SpiceJet for the most happy experience we had travelling with you.

title: Cheap and Best Flight with added spice.
text: Very Good service sometimes delays are a worry...otherwise very good Airlines and good services. Very friendly staff and cooperative.

title: Doctor
text: Small, cozy, neatly maintained aircraft with very courteous flight attendants, adequately maintained cabin temperature and some great food choices. Perfect take off and smooth before time landing

title: A brief holiday in Mumbai and back.
text: Quite professional. Courteous service. Kept good time. Snacks we ordered were of good quality. Aircraft was clean. And so over all it was a good experience.

title: Trip to Home
text: Very good experience , awesome service , actually flight delayed , bit they we're very generous towards passengers , nice service , I would prefer and recommend spice jet to travel in for ur travelling

title: Motivated Team Member  Rakhi
text:
Our journey started with a bad note but Rakhi made up and ensured we had a pleasant experience
- When checking in at the counter we clearly requested for a reclining seat and which was confirmed by the counter lady it was reclining
- When we were at the counter one of the counter staff was rude and insulting to a traveller who probably has not had much of flying experience. 
- The staff need to realise there are other travellers around and who would draw a opinion which is what happened.
- On boarding we realised the seat was non reclining and imagine the frustration a passenger would go through
- On expressing displeasure to Rakhi she was highly apologetic and in a a few minutes as the flight was about to take off offered us seats which were reclining.
- We had the senior cabin crew member come to us and regretted the inconvenience 
- We were observing the attitude of Rakhi and must mention she seemed to be highly motivated and seem to be enjoying her work.

I suppose every organisation must have team member like Rakhi and that would be possible only if they are recognised and motivated. In service industry we need happy team members.
Bravo Rakhi

title: Happy travel experience
text: Loved the cabin crew,staffs ..Food, cleanliness,will recommend my friends also.. Have a wonderful year ahead..

title: Very bad experience in Port Blaire airport
text: The staff on the POrt Blaire airport was extremely unprofessional, unhelpful and even human, namely my husband was heavily injured and they didnt care and didnt help us. Unbelievable bad experience  and I have a feeling they tried to cheat us later as they didnt transfer money back to us,  we payed 4 tickets instead of 2. DONT RECOMMENDED AT ALL !!!!

title: NEVER AGAIN
text:
Extremely bad experience ! My husband had an accident and was heavily injured, while check-in Port Blaire  they told us that we needed the original credit card with which the tickets were bought. We didnt have it as the agency bought the tickets. I understood and immediately proposed to buy new tickest, we needed to come to Kolkata asap to flay home asap. They were extremely unpolite, not understanding and just waited till the last minute and then finally sold us the new tickets. When we came home I contacted them many, many times...first the Port Blaire management and then the customer service, no response.....finally we got our money back. Very unprofessional staff, I have a feeling they tried to cheat us. 
DONT FLY IT

title: Our return journey to Delhi
text: Our return journey was more painful. Scanning of luggage was very very slow. There was a long line for getting boarding passes. Passengers were not following line system. There was chaos and chaos only. Somehow we got the boarding passes. We got our changed to more leg space. We pre booked meals and paid price also. Inside staff to supply meals of our booked choice and stated that only this variety is left and you accept or go without meals. Seats were damaged and inconvenient to sit.

title: Worst airlines - spicejet
text:
The staff of spicejet is totally unprofessional , i booked my tickets to Mumbai from Kanpur , i was only 3 mins late from check-in time and i requested them to pls allow me to board-in but they were very rude they didn't allow me  , I'm the co-operate customer but still they do this .
Never book Spicejet.

title: Our visit to Kovalam
text: My kids planned to celebrate new year at kovalam. We booked tickets on spice jet flight leaving Delhi around 10 AM. There was chaos at counters of issuing boarding passes. Though boarding started in time and quite good, but it was delayed in departure. Still it landed in time at destination. Inside flight service was good. Collection of luggage was quite Normal. Leg space between seats were very tight and inconvenient.

title: Value for Money
text: Did a round trip from Pune to Bangaluru & back. Wonderful flight experience. Reached before the time. Supportive staff. Aircraft was neat and clean.  Food items are costlier which is the case with any aircraft company. Need to work to make the food items at affordable rates as flights.

title: Nice flight expereince
text:
I cached the typical morning flight of spice jet Pune to Delhi. Flight was on time, nice staff, polite and very professional.
Very nice expereince.

title: Fly home in SpiceJet
text:
I love the Spicejet flight from Gwalior to Bangaluru. 
Pro:
1. Very punctual, sometimes it reaches before time
2. Very helpful and cheerful crew
3. Very helpful staff at the airport. Helps in self check in of luggage
Cons:
Nil. What can you expect as long as the flight reaches on time with no hassle.

title: Very average
text: Need proper guidance from Airhosters Better experience but not that much no quick response saying something for no reason

title: Flight on time
text: Flight arrived before time. Food was healthy and tasty, cleanliness is maintained. Overall the experience was quite impressive.

title: T3 Delhi: Poor floor/passenger management
text: Very poor floor and passenger management at counters at Delhi T3. Floor is poorly manned , floor staff is slow, indifferent, out of depth to help hassled sr citizens, ladies with kids, transit passengers. Counter staff were much better.

title: Value for money
text: Spice jet is value for money for its services as a budget airline. Reasonable range of food selection, cleanliness is just ok, restrictive leg space though for even reasonably tall passengers in the economy class.

title: Mr ganeriwala
text:

title: This was a disastrous flight
text:
I was travelling to Delhi with my family and my father is a senior citizen, his seat was not tilting so he requested to switch to another seat since some other seats in flight were empty to which a male crew obliged and showed him the way to another seat.After the plane took off my father realised that he forgot something on the previous seat and came to take it however what he didn't realise is that the seat belt sign was on and a female crew on seeing this began yelling at him and shouted that he can't understand simple things also. He said that he will definitely listen and understand but she should speak a little politely. To which she kept on yelling and didn't stop and we had to intervene saying that if he was quiet and seated she should stop yelling which didn't go down well with her. She then proceeded to move further and then argued with some other passengers at the front to which the other passengers stated that she was too rude and needed to speak in a better way. She was yelling to a point where the other crew had to request her to go back to her seat and she didn't come out for the rest of the flight.
This was just the start, the pilot then came on speaker and warned that all the passengers who were a part of the scene with this apparently HEAD air hostess would be deboarded at Ahmedabad which is a 2 hour diversion and the rest of the passengers would suffer but then they decided to keep the seat belt sign on so that no one would get up to question them. The seat belt sign stayed on through 70% of the journey with all passengers strapped in so that no one could get up. 
Though we all still cooperated and didn't see the air hostess or any message from the pilot through the rest of the flight.
As we landed we were relieved that this was over but sadly it didn't end. We realised that our one bag and another couple on flights' bags went missing at the belt with no ground staff from spice Jet in sight. They inquired at the front desk and told us that the staff was supposed to be attending the passengers. But no staff showed up for 1hour and 15mins and we kept trying at the front desk. After all the wasted time and effort a crew shows up and states that the bags will now arrive in the next flight and we could pick it up then. 
We kept waiting for at least 2 hours at the airport and our bags showed up at another belt. 
This was the most disastrous flight I have been on , all in all Spice Jet you have given us one of the worst experiences ever.

title: Late, and misleading announcements by Flight crew
text: This is probably going to be my last flight at Spice Jet, SG-272 had my worst experience ever, now the flight has been delayed but i have been on delayed flights before this but this takes it to new heights because my flight was to depart at 9:25 but I received notification that it was going to depart at 1:45 pm at 11:15 am which was already 2 hours after the original departure time, thats going to be an inconvenience because I am definitely not going to bath and get fresh at the airport. All other flights namely indigo were departing at their times normally only spice jet planes somehow didn't take off, thats just so problematic. Then again I received a message on my phone at 1 pm that it was going to take off at 2:30 then finally it took off at 3pm. When we landed the crew were least bothered to know the belt number the luggage is going to be available at, they said it was going to be at belt-8 but it was available at 9 which i found out on enquiring separately, after waiting almost 15-20 minutes at Belt-8 which stopped. It was a horrible spice jet experience, and thats why its probably going to be my last flight with Spice Jet.

title: Lateness and the worst landing ever

On the way to rajkot, the flight was delayed by half hour which meant that I reached rajkot half hour late. Again on the way back to Mumbai the plane was late which meant that our flight was delayed. The check in was rushed, the instructions by the air hostess and stewards was rushed and the pilot rushed the take off too. It was not a comfortable flight at all. When coming up to the landing, the pilot landed so hard that the wheels could have come off and he couldn't control the speed. It was the worst landing I have ever experienced in my life and I am never flying with spice jet ever again! The worst experience ever.

title: think twice about using this airline if you are older and/or require special assistance
text:
This is regarding the travel related to SpiceJet flight SG 59 taken on Dec 28 2019, departing Mangalore at 12:20 a.m., arriving to Dubai at 2:30 a.m. (final destination: Newark, NJ).  My father and I are both US citizens and we were returning back to the US after one week in South India (our flight path was taking SpiceJet from Mangalore to Dubai then Emirates from Dubai to Newark).  Because of his age and related health issues my father had requested wheelchair service, which has NEVER been an issue or problem with other airlines.  SpiceJet and its associates handled this request EXTREMELY poorly in both Mangalore and Dubai.

Mansoor (I think that is how is name is spelled), a SpiceJet agent in Mangalore, was nice and courteous but unfortunately he was not around when the following occurred.  My father and I had requested that his wheelchair be brought to the waiting area after immigration and security.  This did not happen for quite a period of time, despite several guarantees I received from one of the SJ agents.  After waiting and waiting, my father became frustrated and decided to walk to the gate rather than wait for his promised wheelchair.  It is sadly surprising that an airline handles those requiring assistance in this manner.

It became even worse after we arrived in Dubai.  Upon arrival, my father was escorted off the plane by a SpiceJet agent named Kunal (I do not know if this is his first name or last name but the Dubai airport duty official made some phone calls and found out that this was his name).  Kunal left my father with a wheelchair attendant at the exit of the aircraft and started walking up the exit bridge towards the airport.  I was standing at the end, waiting for my father.  I noticed that the wheelchair attendant did not take my father's duffel bag with him when he started the transport.  This bag is very crucial and must remain with my father at all times, for medical purpose and financial purposes.  As the attendant started transporting my father, I noticed another individual (not sure if they were associated with the airline or airport) reaching for the bag as though they were going to sneak it.  I became very alarmed and concerned and loudly said "The bag !  Get the bag !  You're forgetting the bag !  Please get the bag, it can't just be left there, he can't be without it !"  The wheelchair attendant didn't understand English, and Kunal (who was standing at the exit of the bridge into the airport) started sharply shouting at me "Say please, ok ?  Don't be rude.  You are not in India anymore.  Don't talk to me like that."  I said "I'm sorry.  He needs his bag though, it can't just be left there."  He shouted and repeated what he had said a second time, including additional insults about being Indian and being Hindu.  I was shocked and stunned.  I could not believe an agent of ANY airline would have such a gunshot and harsh reaction to what is seemingly a simple request, that is please don't forget my father's bag (the wheelchair attendant had no idea that he had forgotten my father's bag).  Kunal was attacking, inappropriate, out of line, and discriminatory.  This was my first time flying with SpiceJet, I have only traveled with Air India before when traveling to or within India.  SpiceJet provided my father and I with a very distasteful and discouraging experience.

I am strongly advising friends and relatives that require assistance when traveling of this incident, and to think twice and thrice before traveling with this airline.

title: Very bad flight experience
text: Took this flight SG 8719 from Delhi to Bangalore. The flight was delayed. That is understandable but there was great inconvenience in terms of standing in queues at every step, especially during boarding. Long wait in the queue for boarding. Normally when the boarding starts and boarding pass is scanned, there is not much wait but in this flight, even after getting the pass scanned, long wait to get seated in the aircraft. When I entered the aircraft, I got to know the reason for that. It was an old aircraft with very very cramped space and hardly any place to move. On the entry, even one person could barely fit. The leg room was so small that the person seated next to me was not able to keep his knees straight and just after 10-15 minutes, his knees started paining. Very bad experience. I will select this airline in future with a pinch of salt.

title: Never seen before such a delay
text:
This is what happened . The flight schedule time of departure was at 20:30.
At check in they gave me the boarding pass with new time of departure 22:10 without informing the client (me) of any delay, I realised hours later that there was a time change.
Close to boarding time I see on screen the departure time of flight had changed again now for 00:15 am.
They start the boarding time at 23:30.
Once on the plain they had us inside, door closed and we had to wait still for an hour and half  with no explanation on why the airplane was not moving.
Instead of arriving at 22:35 as per reservation I arrived at Kochi at 3:30 am.
This is unacceptable . I had never seen this in any other part of the world and my job is to travel.

title: Expect delayed flight, mini leg space and horrible service
text:
1. The flight was 1.5 hr delay. No update on flight status display, it was updated as 'Boarding' then 'Closed' (after 45 mins) but actually there was no boarding. Staff is non-responsive, first of all, they should teach them how to talk to customer and provide up-to-date flight status.
2. Most of the passengers are first time traveler in this flight. Passengers don't know where to seat, front raw passengers went to last raw and vice versa (boarding was not as per row sequence), crew were unable to handle the situation. It took 65 mins for boarding the flight (in addition to 1.5 hrs.)
3. Toilets were overflow, not clean and stink in the flight.
4. Most of the seat's recliner is not working. There is minimum leg space between two seats (except SpiceMax, first 4 rows, with additional cost of INR 2500/seat), if front seat is reclined and your seat is not reclined then it will 100% broke your nose and chin.
5. Only in SpiceJet, there is no auto luggage transfer between International/Domestic sector. Passenger should manually transfer the luggage; this is most unconvinced. Only one counter was opened at BOM for luggage transfer from international to domestic flight and it took 55 mins in queue, elderly was unable to stand, kids were crying and adult were hungry.
Conclusion: SpiceJet didn't not even left one spot untouched to harass the customers across all age group.

title: Excellent service

title: Avoid spice jet if you have option!
text:
The worst service you can imagine. Every single time they come up with a new type of problem. No professionalism at all.
They often delay their flight and act like it‚Äôs very easy. I'm supposed to reach at Mumbai by 4 pm. Now it‚Äôs 4:40 and I'm waiting for boarding. I have missed very important schedule.

title: Very good travel
text: On time,food was good,airports,amenities etc and conditions in both the Vijayawada and Bangalore Airports everything top class.

title: Well maintain aircraft
text:
