title: No frills
text: You pay for the services you get which is basically ok for short trips, but they have maintained basic comforts and services.

title: Worthwhile airline
text: Great service overall. Just wish they made more of an effort to compensate as the flight was delayed 3 times

title: Bad Customer Service
text: We had booked a flight From Jaipur to Goa Via Ahmedabad.Spice jet changed the 1st part of the flight 3 times from when we booked....The final change was less than 24hrs before our flight from Jaipur and got us into Ahmedabad 2 hours after our connecting flight had left for Goa.Their attitude to this was total disregard for our welfare.They did not inform us that we would miss our connection and were quite happy for us to spend 22 hours in the airport.Very very poor customer services.

title: Good service of Spicejet and Professional approach.
text:
Being frequent traveller I have to travel by different airlines. I find Spicejet is best among all. I miss JetAirways here. They were equally good.
Presently no other existing operator has inclination to serve and care for traveller friendly systems.  Worst is Indigo but that‚Äôs other story...

title: Mr Mathew George
text: Very good travel experience this time. Last month Mumbai to Delhi travel, flight was delayed considerable time.

title: Bad customer service
text:
i travelled from kolkata to banglore ,Due to heavy traffic and rain, i reached airport 40min before actual departure , spicejet staff cancel my ticket and ask me to another flight by paying difference amount of 25000,i request them that i am am traveling with infant but they have not even tried to contact their crew members and behave very unprofessional (laughing )...i asked to call their manager but they said manager is not available.Finally i paid extra 25000 to get another flight ...
This happened once with indigo in banglore , i was late at airport ... indigo staff tried every possible way and make me boarded at plan evenif i was very late ...
I know i was not upto their rules ..but going extra mile to serve customer is always customer are looking for ...
I think spice jet people are working on compliance mode while indigo on customer satisfaction mode...would never recommend spicejet ...

title: Steady Improvement
text: My Experience this month on the Spice Jet Flight from Chennai to Mumbai was far from Satisfactory.But thisd Flight to Hyderabad was of different kind.Punctual,A Good Aircraft and Courteous Crew.More than satisfied.Wish they continue like this

title: A reliable and punctual brand
text: SpiceJet has managed to build for itself the reputation for being an "On-Time" operator with extremely hospitable cabin crew. They are always polite, warm and helpful. The airline too maintains clean aircraft and great punctuality. I would always rather travel by SpiceJet if given the choice.

title: Deteriorating Service
text: I used to prefer SpiceJet over other airlines due to its Cost and Service. I fail to understand as to what has happened in recent past.Their Flights get delayed.Planes untidy.Service Deteriorating. Some thing needs to be done urgently

title: Fairly good
text:
The flight was delayed by 24 mins as per the TV display board. The check in staff mentioned there could be probable delay which they were not sure about. Finally there was a delay for half an hour.

The most surprising thing was that after a bus left with passengers for boarding the 2nd bus did not turn up. The ground staff had to call the transport supervisor whose mobile number  was not available with the personnel. This is something ridiculous and unacceptable.  A call was made to some other person to get the number of the Transport supervisor. Finally after getting the number the call could be made to the Transport supervisor and then the coach for boarding the aircraft did arrive.

title: About airlines attitude, professionalism
text: Worst service. Cabin crew behaviour was so terrible; they are not professional. Toilet is not totally clean. Landing & take off not smooth. Slow & rough service. My recommendation is if you r frequent flyer never choose Spicejet

title: Worst Flight - Regular Late departure-SG 456
text: Hi SpiceJet, why always this flight will get delayed. Better you should change time to 9 to 9.15. Always it will be delay 45 min.

title: Spicejet Airlines
text:
My journey was from Dubai to Mumbai. After check in my luggage and other security procedures.. Like 
always I was keen on purchasing Some stuff from Dubai Duty free which was given full justice. When the boarding announced, to my surprise they were checking cabin baggage weight out there. (have to 7 kgs or less) 
Most of the passengers carrying extra weight as they had purchased lot of stuff from duty free. N airline auth announced that they will be charging almost 300 Dirhams for 5 kgs. Insane..
Either the cabin baggage should have checked in the beginning. Or else what is the use of duty free to customers travelling on Spicejet?
 or this policy of Company should  have been clearly told while issuing the ticket..so at least passenger prepare themselves accordingly.
To be very frank no one really have so much interest nor time to go thru each and every sentence written on the rules on website of company. Also people book tickets via some booking app causing unnecessary harassment to the traveller. 
Have travelled in so many airlines but never felt so embarrassed tht passenger have to return the purchased duty free as Airline is not able to accommodate. And stating some policy which is mentioned in small somewhere in their ticket(like conditions apply).

title: Travel with luggage
text: Need to improve the luggage awaiting period.musr creat a user friendly service and provide quality and importance of time.

title: It was a bit late
text: Attendants were good, flight was almost on time, overall service was satisfactory with respect to other airlines

title: Great Service and Excellent Food
text: It is always fulfilling to book meals on Spicejet over all business visits and relish the gourmet of offerings,

title: Visit to Jaipur
text: Good experience always with Spicejet. I travelled with Spicejet and in my case I got every time flight was almost right time.

title: Spicejet is maintaining its sheen. However there are still much space for improvements.
text:
1. Should have auto upgradation mechananism for inflight passengers travelling in eco class, economy class passengers should automatically be upgraded in LIFO manner in case biz class seats are vacant.

2. 200ml water bottle and nation newspaper should be provided as complementary to each passanger.

3. Passanger should not be disturbed during inflight F&B services, while he/she is sleeping, rather passanger may be given his /her F&B supplies as parcel either at the time of landing or at the time he/she wakeup.

3. For long distance flights, cabin lights should be dimmed to minimul permissible level, or otherwise customer have the privilege to use/ switch-on the individual lamp placed right above each seat.

4. During inflight, Plastic packaging/Serving Materials must not be used or should be used marginally where it's inevitable to replace plasit with other eco-friendly packaging /serving materials. 

5. I believe that air crew members are given with best of industry standard working environment and comfort however i personally feel that crew members should be given better aminities and proper rest after every long duartion flying so as to minimize workload exertion and to improve overall customer experience.

Thanking you,

title: Airline review
text: I was a bit taken back for the delay such a small flight and so much delay I missed my Darshan of Padmavati Mata

title: Best deal for a Max customer
text: On any spicejet flight a max seat (specially front row) gives the best value for money deal in india. I am spoilt and addicted to it.. for 640 odd bucks you get good meal, first row seat (on first come first serve basis) preferred check-in, preferred boarding, preferred and first out baggage.. simply the best in india

title: Room for improvement but not bad.
text: We left two hours late but that was because of the fog. Great food choice for nominal fees, much a lot of it not available, and on the way back not enough time to serve everybody. Probably if you order your meal with the ticket not such problems. All other things, like legroom, boarding etc were not the best but by no means bad.

title: Good
text: It was an average flight direct from Chennai to Ahmedabad. Flight was delayed by 30-45 minutes. Being low cost flight , it is as average as most airlines. Hardly anything to mention about. They did I not announce the belt number for checkin baggage collection.

title: Spice Jet...Bad Customer service and Commotion at Counters
text: Traveled 0n 3/12  on a return Spice Jet Flight..M-ND-Mumbai ...its from T3 @ Mumbai these days, Lot of confusion at the check in counters at Mumbai and also on return  at Delhi..Unlike Jet earlier there used to be separate ques destination wise...Here at Spice all are in one que with over 50 travelers at any point with big bags...indeed frustrating...More over no staff to guide first time and new travelers...

title: AVOID- horrible experience
text: This was my second flight in 2 years. I was too worried to book this flight but because of time constraint I was forced to fly with Spice Jet. They are probably the worst airline in the world. My first experience was  extremely horrible. They damaged my bag were hardly bothered to compensate or get that repaired. This flight was too bad. Delayed by an hour and inflight service is bad as always. Crew is rude. Luggage took about one hour to reach the belt in Delhi. AVOID if you can.

title: Wonderful Service - Old Aircraft
text: From Check in to boarding everything is more than perfect (same for my Return flight from AMD to MCT), wonderful reception at check in and on borad all the team members were doing their best to serve each and everyone and with smile. I would like to particularly name two Team Member who were serving was Rohan and Apeksha, both were wonderful. Well my reservation is - the aircraft was pretty old and not properly maintained. There were visible issue on seat - so my concern is, is the Machines operating plane is prorerly maintained or not?

title: Pleasant Flight
text: Well, I normally do not fly by this Airlineand clearly preferred Jet Airways and Now Vistara or even Indigo. I flew Spice jet after a long time and I must acknowledge that the service has certainly improved. It was a seamless flight from T3 Delhi , take off was smooth, flight was on time and the landing was also very comfortable. All the grievances I had from some flights that I have taken earlier by this airline were not visible and I found a transformation in all respect. I wish they maintain the puncyuality and cordial reception as I experienced during my flight to Aurangabad and return also.. Now I think I will certainly think of flying by Spicejet again.

title: Comfortable low cost flight
text: The carrier is ex Jet Airways plane and so leg space seats were comfortable.Staff and services also matched the plane and everything was good.

title: Pune-Goa-Pune
text:
The airline, its aircraft & staff are great, no complaints. The issue is with the sector. 
The Pune Goa flight departs at 12:20 & although the scheduled arrival in Goa is 13:30, it is usually before time. Problem arises when you are travelling with kids as you have to skip a meal. Even if you pre-book the meal, the flying time is so less that by the time the cabin crew hands out the meals, the pilots announces descent (tray tables closed). Pune airport departure & Goa arrivals both are under renovation & hence food options are limited. So from the time you leave home till the time you reach your hotel in Goa, you're starving.
Goa-Pune sector is slightly better as Goa Departures has a fully functional food cour

title: Check in counter experiance
text:
No point of travelling with spicejet if you are travelling with family!  Unless you pay well in advance for your seats and I was travelling with total 5 members of my family and each of us got separate seats including my 3 years old little one! Patheric travel time!

Regards 
Manoj

title: Tidy up your interior
text:
The interior of the aircraft needs attention. Back seat covers below the Tray table and arm rest were torn and hanging. The arm rest could not be lowered beyond 45 degrees. Please check rows 10 to 14 flight on 3/12 

Overall the interior was not as expected.

I wish I could have taken photographs. (Battery died)

title: Nice journey
text: We booked this flight through airlines website about three weeks before our journey. The flight was smooth and convenient in all respects. Since the flight landed at International Airport, the travel time to destination by road took more time

title: On time / Before time
text: Everything right from Security / Check inn departure and arrival was flawless. In fact flight took of 15 Minutes before scheduled departure as all passengers were on board and we reached destination before scheduled arrival time

title: Tardy n unappologetic turns you red
text:
Choose Spicejet only cos was a direct flight, start at 11, reach by 2:30pm. But then they revised it to only fly at 3:20pm. Moreover it was late. Then the luggage took 45min to hit the carousel. Meaning I was unbearably late for the ceremony. 

I did try to reschedule but they had hopping flights at unearthly hours which would eat into hotel bills. Cancel n refund was giving away money.

I wouldn't take Spicejet unless there is really no option.

title: Spicejet - Pathetic Customer Service!
text:
I have a travel experience from multiple airlines, where Spicejet was the worst and from that day I haven't booked a single Spicejet flight even the prices for Spicejet flight are just half, compare to others are offering.

Due to some emergency, I had to travel BLR - DEL by flight ‚úàÔ∏è and then need to take other transport üöêüöå to travel more than 6 hours from delhi, this was an overnight journey. 

Due to time constraints, I didn't got a chance to eat anything and was arriving to airport at last minute. By keeping that in my mind I had booked the food üçù of my choice in Spicejet flight (online). When it comes to serving the food, staff üë©‚Äç‚úàÔ∏ècame and told that all food has been finished and they don't have what I have ordered, and staff handed over me a business card üìá by stating that if you want you can make a complaint about this. I told them that the food I had ordered was for my hunger not for complaints, where should I go now. Staff was having only one answer, please take the business card and make the complainant, we can't do anything now.

Point is - if you are taking any order, then why can't fullfill that and if can't fullfill stop taking orders online. No one is interested to book that dam costly, tasteless food for travel. We are booking only when there is a much need. Try to keep yourself as a place of customer and then imagine.

I would never recommend to travel with SpiceJet‚úàÔ∏è

title: smooth confusion
text:
it was in july Mumbai airport was shut due to runway flooding. we went to the airport with doubts in our mind. at airport the screen displayed nothing in front of the afternoon departure of spicejet flight to mumbai. time passed by our flight was still showing on time. staff too arrived at the boarding counter and just 15 mins late boarding procedure started. we boarded had a bit bumpy ride on monsoon clouds. and landed safely in Mumbai. 
Conclusion the staff was functioning smoothly as always it was only us the passengers who were in confusion.

title: Return flight
text: Recently I had to travel for a family emergency to Hyderabad. On the way back I took SpiceJet SG468 to Mumbai. As luck would have it, it was the chaotic day when Indigo's servers crashed and there was chaos at practically every airport in India and some other countries. Flights were delayed by many hours. The airport was crammed up with hassled people. Everything seemed to have come to a grinding halt. However, must appreciate the staff and crew of SpiceJet who forged through that and helped us get on out flights (with delay of course, for no fault of theirs) and reach home in a shorter flight time than usual. Thank you, guys. Tough situations will be there but it is always string character and values that help you sail through. All the best.

title: Terrible operations
text:
My flight was at 7:45 and I reach the departure terminal at 7:30 because of the pathetic way of operations of SpiceJet at the airport.
The Self Checkin kiosk would crash most of the times. Then I stood in a long queue; after standing in the queue for half an hour I feel that I might miss the flight, so I enquire. It turns out that there's a seperate queue for Varanasi flight but none of the passengers are aware of it. Upon arguing with them, they realize and make an announcement and around 30-40 customers, who were also waiting in the long queue like me, line up for the Varanasi counter. The same apathy for the senior citizens. Somehow everyone reaches the terminal by 7:30 only to find out that the flight is delayed and finally departs at 8:45.

Please keep this in mind and use SpiceJet only if all your option run out!

title: Disasterous leg room
text:
Terrible flight, simply terrible. No leg room. Is the airline thinking people with 5.7 above are non existant in the country!!!

I would prefer Air India any day or Air Vistara on this airline. WORST ever decision on this. Dont fly such airlines.

title: Very rude Staff at the airport and very bad over all experience
text: I travelled on the night(11 March 2019) when all Boeing 737 max 8 flights were grounded following the crash except spice jet and quite honestly I was very scared to fly and asked the staff if any alternative has been arranged and was shocked to knw that they had absolutely no idea about the situation and were even rude to me for asking to accommodate in another aircraft if possible .The aircraft was also grounded the very next day and I did raise a complaint about the staff behaviour but never got a reply . I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this carrier as the baggage policy is also crap even on international destination.

title: was a good flight but little delayed. Seats were comfortable.
text: It was a leisure trip. We travelled from Mumbai to Madurai via Delhi as our Air India flight was cancelled. We went from Madurai to Kodaikanal and then back to Madurai for a day and then again from Madurai to Rameshwaram for 2 days and then back to Madurai and then back to Mumbai next day,  Our train journey from Madurai to Rameshwaram was memorable as  we passsed through Pamban bridge on sea.

title: Zero relatability, complete lack of professionalism
text: I was traveling from Delhi to Mumbai. My SpiceJet flight got delayed by 1.5 hours. I reached at 11:35pm whereas I was supposed to reach by 10pm. To add to that, while returning from Pune to Delhi, I was supposed to go to my office once my flight would have landed at 9:25. I received a call at 5am in the morning when I was starting to get ready, that my flight has been delayed to 11:05. This not only spoiled my working day, they made us further wait till 11:40. A total delay from 7:20 to 11:40 i.e., 4hrs 20 minutes. Worst experience ever. The staff seemed absolutely unapologetic. Moreover, SpiceJet offers everything for a price, even the worst of window or isle seats are activated by paying an extra sum for SpiceMax. I'd suggest noone to step into such an inhospitable and unpredictable flight.

title: This Spice is nice.
text: I like the concept of' spice names' this airline gives to its aircrafts ! I keep making  a mental note..this time it was' star anise'. We travelled to & fro Mumbai Goa by SpiceJet. It was  smooth cruising as always.  The  check in counter,ground staff  are all very  efficient. The hostesses are on their toes & ready with a smile at all times. I will definitely recommend flying by SpiceJet.

title: Lack of knowledge and confusion in among staff
text: Staff at Dharamshala airport not aware about luggage checkin rules when there is a transit in Delhi. As a result they checked-in luggage only till delhi but gave me boarding pass till Pune. I objected but they said it is their rule when there is a change of terminal in Delhi.

title: Very comfortable flight helpful all crew.
text: We were traveling from Delhi to coimbatore to n fro.it was very comfortable flight.and all crew was very helpful and friendly.

title: Horrible Experience
text:
Our plane was delayed by more than 2 hours. When asked, we didn't get appropriate replies.¬†

The staff in the plane wakes me up to serve food...I requested him to give me something I could take away with me as I was exhausted and didn't want to eat then...the crew member refused outright. This never happens in other airlines like indigo and go air, they always have options.¬†

When we landed after an exhausting and tiring journey we had to forbear a lengthy drive to the arrivals terminal from the runway...

Nothing went right...

title: Delay and no apologies
text: The flight that was to depart at 7pm finally left at 10pm past! The crew was normal like it happens everywhere.. don‚Äôt care attitude.. disrupting people‚Äôs time!

title: Memorable experience while travelling to Srinagar by SpiceJet
text:
Excellent arrival and departure! Comfortable seats and good leg room which was crucial for me as i am 6 ft tall. Good check in and check out facility as it was in time. 

I had gone in Jan 2019 & at that time many flights were cancelled. But the customer care at Spicejet called me arranged my flights as per my convenience without any extra charge.

title: Good airline but online checkin absent
text:
Spicejet is generally a good experience. Checkin,crew all good.
The biggest negative is you cannot checkin online without choosing a paid seat. Really irritating.....Have given them  1 point less because of that.

title: Spicejet is not worth of its band value.
text: The service of the air hostesses are not at all satisfactory. They can‚Äôt deal efficiently with the demand. The bathrooms were water clogged.

title: it was very commercial  flight
text: Standard  Operation system, the flight was delayed  by around and hour with out any compromises, as nobody talk, any how we landed Pune

title: Good Short Trip
text: Short flight.  Good service.  Flight was on time. Madurai to Chennai was one hour flight.  Food was served but we did not avail.

title: Good Service & staff co opration
text:
Good service , advance information & confirmation ,time of departure & reach followed as given
Recommend to all

title: Very Bad Experienced
text: Representative at Bengaluru airport was not so experienced and professional. They don't able to guide properly as they may be don't know properly. Being a Spicemax passenger, I didn't get the priority facility. Actually the staffs are not well trained. Crew members are also not polite and they seems like very irritated whatever may be the reason but they didn't behaved good. The worst part was my luggage was also not tagged Priority and I had to wait a long. Lastly Flight was delayed as usual. I definitely not recommend. Only the good thing was the Cappuccino. Very very dissapointed. Wastage for money for Spicemax booking. My suggestion is to improve your staff's knowledge about your policies and give them some good training.

title: Shirdi trip
text:
It was good flight üòÑ, staffüòä and foodüòå. Customer care center called and update us on the change in travel was bit late and they didn‚Äôt conveyed the message properly. It would be great flight if SpiceJet provides some transport from Aurangabad to Shirdi as free or with minimal charges. There were so many elderly co-flyers struggled in getting transport. Food: Give some complimentary food for below 5 age kids to attract families.

title: About the Spicejet flight
text: The ground staff was good. Excellent check in experience. However, the cabin crew ladies were rude, lacking warmth while talking to the passengers. Otherwise, things were maintained OK.  Flight and service was overall good.

title: Can improve
text:
Online checkin sucks. You could allow check in without seat selection like indigo. This causes lot of inconvenience. I wished to carry dark fantasy home for my daughter like everytime. I could not as your credit card machine hanged, I had no enough cash with me unfortunately and the way staff offered to take it for free was not very professional for spice jet staff. So I missed on surprising my daughter with spice jet dark fantasy tin box like everytime. üôÅüôÅ
Toilet was very dirty.

title: travel by spicejet from Mumbai to Trivendrum and Kochi to Mumbai
text: We traveled to Thiruvanathapuram during end Nov. 2019. The crew was supportive. There was no hassle and our travel for comfortable.

title: Decent Flying Experience
text: Have traveled after long time in Spice Jet. Checking, boarding and on board experience was decent. Only problem seems to be cabin cleanliness and maintenance, it looked quite run down.

title: Overall good flight, but need to improve on time perfromance
text:
Good flight exerience on the Q400 Bombardier Aircraft. Good service inflight and well informed crew. Decent inflight food for the category. Good handling of turbulence by the captain and crew. 
Though the flight schedule from Bangalore is during non peaks hours the delay in departure is a little annoying. Otherwise recommended.

title: Shocking
text: Booked online from Australia a ticket for Indian friend to travel from Bagdogra to Goa return.  Online portal is difficult to use, very easy to make mistakes when booking.  I accidentally booked the wrong month so I again when online and rebooked paying high penalty fee.  Then on booking immediately realised that they had changed the flight connection in Mumbai from few hours to several.  Again went online and was showing Rs.5000/- penalty fee to change the flight back again although they have policy of if you make change within 24 hours there is no penalty.  Immediately sent them an email with screenshot and no reply.  My colleague then rang them several times and still they were refusing to make the change themselves. I then rang them myself from Australia and spent almost an hour on the phone with them and still they were refusing.  Posted on Twitter screen shot of my call and them immediately the social media team had them phone me. Received partial refund and partial voucher.  Simply not worth booking with this airline, they deliberately try to overcharge you. Also they have habit of never flying on time.

title: Excellent service
text:
After a long time i traveled usually i traveled with IndiGo but  i glad to see improvement of spice Jet services and food and beverages Verity among with Quality. Very good and prompt service of cabin crews.
Well keep it up!

title: On Time Flight
text:
Flight was on time. But for international flight they atleast  should some serve complementary food. 
Personally I feel they should also serve some budget food for inflight during international transit.

title: On time performance
text: Departure time and landing times are very punctual.Ticket prices are reasonable. Smooth take off and landing.

title: Worst experience ever
text: I was flying from Patna to Chennai on 3rd Dec. First of all flight was delayed for around an hour and no prior information. I got to know only when I reached airport. It was horrible experience to collect boarding pass from counter. It was long queue of almost 200 people and staff were not well trained to handle it. I have noticed one of the guest screeming and shouting on one of the receptionist. And the floor manager was talking on open speak through walkie talking to various people. It was damn annoying. Also would share the experience of my previous flight from Chennai to Patna on 18th November. First of all flight was delayed. When I went inside the flight I asked one of the crue that I am hungry if she can serve me something. She said nothing is available right now. Every thing is finished with pre booked order. I asked for a masala tea. She told me that your turn will come soon and then we will come at your seat with trolley and serve you, she came after almost 30 minute after serving everyone. I handed over her 500 rs for a tea and sandwiche. She did not returned my 200 rs remaining. I was still waiting. However I end up asking at the time of arrival. The guy was apologetic and he returned my 20p rs. After first incident I thought of trying 2nd time which was also bad. The boing had TV screen I asked attendant to help me out. He mentioned that sir even I have never seen this in any boing. God must bless Spicejet further.

title: Do not fly SpiceJet! Worst customer service EVER
text:
I flew with SpiceJet from Mumbai to Kochi: where to even begin with how horrible this airline is! Our problems started at the check-in desk, where the woman checking us in visibly rolled her eyes at us when we approached the counter. From that moment, I knew we would have problems. When we arrived in Kochi, I was informed that my bag had been kept in Mumbai because of a powerbank (which the check-in lady did NOT ask us about). Now, I completely understand why they have this policy, and that's not the problem I had with SpiceJet, as I realize that part is my fault. The problem was how SpiceJet customer service handled it. No information, hanging up on me every time I called to check the status of my bag, needing me to send the appropriate paperwork MULTIPLE TIMES before removing the powerbank and sending me my bag (which took over 48 hours). I honestlydon't understand why it's so difficult to simply remove the powerbank (which I gave permission to do) and send the bag. Yet for some reason, the people who work for this airline are completely incompetent. 

Not only that, but I received a message on WhatsApp that my bag was arriving on a certain flight, so I drove 1.5 hours to pick it up. But when I arrived, the bag WAS NOT ON THE FLIGHT! Instead, it was on the next flight which landed 3 hours later. Since we were about to leave Kochi and go to Alleppey, I had to wait for it. I spoke with the people working at the SpiceJet counter in Kochi airport, who didn't seem to care at all and kept saying "well maybe it will come tomorrow". I made it clear I wasn't leaving without the bag, and told them I'd wait for the next flight. I left to get some food, and when I returned, NO ONE WAS THERE -- the counter was closed. Fortunately I was able to get the terminal manager to help me get my bag, but if they weren't going to be there, why the hell didn't they just say so when I told them I'd be returning?? Truly a horrendous experience with SpiceJet customer service, both in person and on the phone -- completely unhelpful in every way possible. 

The second time we flew SpiceJet was no better, as we were charged double the price of our ticket to change our flight by one day (even though online it says you only have to pay the difference of the fares, which is a lie). On top of that, there were over $100 of hidden fees added to the ticket price, which we were not informed about until it was time to pay. We were told we either had to pay it, or we'd lose our current flight AND the new reservation. Nothing about this airline makes sense, worst customer service I've ever experienced. DO NOT FLY SPICEJET!!

title: HAVELI TRIP
text: Keep it up. Connect Jaisalmer to more cities for ease of travel. People can feel the difference and enjoy the limits very fast. Sometimes the land travel time is discouraging. More route to change our mind.

title: Arshad Ali Abbasi
text: Wonderful service. Helpful and Friendly Staff. Cabin Crew by the name of Damini and her other colleague had served us with warmth and beautiful smile.

title: Business Strategy Consultant
text:
Friendly, cheerful chek in staff and cabin crew. On time arrival. 
Very comfy seats in Spicemaxx. Cold chicken kebabs or cold pasta is inedible. Menu should only have items which can be served unheated.

title: Good flight
text:
Spice jet is like the wind. Sometime it's very good. Sometimes average. Today was one of the better days. Very good crew, very smooth flight. Meal options need to improve. 
This flight timing is very good for a day trip to vizag.

title: Fantastic
text: For such a small airline this was fantastic. The staff were all lovely, and the seats were comfortable.

title: Spicejet Services
text: Everything was average professionalism of check in counter was below average and the baggage waiting time was very long which could be improved.Overall nice flight. Check in counters should be their for people with no baggage then the check in could have been faster.

title: My  spicejet travel from Pune to Trivandrum

From Bengalore to trivendrum, we had a small aeroplane which was very good with 2 sitter rows, we enjoyed the travel. Usually, I get a small earpain while descending. But, I noticed that there was no such problem in spicejet and I will travel again by spicejet even though it was not cheapest flight.

title: Don't hesitate ... Go for Spicemax !
text:
We travelled to nd fro Mumbai - Trivandrum on 25th nd 29th November 2019 on Spicejet . We had our tickets upgraded 2 Spicemax having seat numbers 3 A nd 3 B. (Thnx 2 the assistance on telephone by Vandana Madam )

What did we like - 

we found it worth of money nd fully praiseworthy.
There was a very l...o..n..g.. queue at the check - in counter , but as we had the Spicemax tickets , we were told 2 go 2 Spicemax counter where we got the boarding passes in just 2 minutes .
Same thing happened at the boarding gate , they asked the Spicemax ticket holders 2 go first . 
Meals were served free to us ... It had snacks , beverages etc.
As our seat no.were 3A nd 3B , there was an extra leg- room which made the journey very comfortable.
Nd the most fantastic part was at the baggage - claim counter ... our luggage had priority tags ... so we got our bags in the very first round itself.
So nice experiences !!!

What we didn't like -
No , I don't hv anything 2 write about in this segment.

We had the same gr8 comfortable experience in both our journeys .

Yes ... I recommend ... spend some extra money nd b Spicemax travellers nd travel with a soothing feeling .

So while concluding , I will repeat .. Don't hesitate .. Go for Spicemax

Nd yes ,
Keep wandering

Pramod Godbole
Thane , Maharashtra , India .

title: Wonderful experience

title: Horrible service and poor club membership rules
text:
I was unable to create a club membership due to an error "Service not connected status code: Internal Server Error". I raised it multiple times through email and their pedestrian IT team was unable to solve. Finally I solved it myself as I am an IT professional and created the account.

I asked them to credit the miles for the journey done last month. It was because their website has been programmed to return only "Name mismatch" whenever you try to get miles credited by providing a PNR number. Whatever you give, it will tell "Name mismatch". I called their customer care who refused to credit the miles stating that it is their "policy". They don't have a full customer view and do not know that in Indian conditions people write their names in different ways. Because they don't want any miles to be credited to any account.

To the outside world they want to show that they have a club membership program. Their club account also does not allow to add family members who are born after 2002. This means they don't consider your full family. 

Dear people don't get deceived by this club. It doesn't exist.

title: poor customer service.never recommend
text: I am a spice-jet customer who booked ticket from Cochin to Chennai on 4th December 2019 at  8.40 A.M.To be frank i am very disappointed on your service.We came to know that the flight is cancelled when we arrived at airport only.This was so disrespectful from your side.It was your duty to inform us at-least 3 hour before.we came to know the flight is cancelled only at 6.48 A.M.Time is something that everyone values the most,who is gonna pay compensation for that or can you people gave us back that time to us.None of the authorized people give as a solution.one thing you could do is a chart a flight for all the customers in that flight in your own expenses or you should have book the tickets for everyone because you are a  reputed company,this is ruining your company name.you  also changed your flight number on November 21st.we did booked ticket for another flight and you changed the flight that is not an issue still,you are not sticking to anything. customer service is so poor.we need full refund and also we booked train ticket at that point of time so we need compensation for that too.its all your responsibility.

title: Cheating-backstabbing-cheapest-worst-unethical-low minded people
text:
i travelled from portblair to chennai 2nd dec 2019.

Booked the ticket on Sep21 2019, to return on Dec1st and timing was 14.45PM
All of sudden timings was revised to 10.10 AM.
Now the option is either board or refund or choose some other day
When called customer care, i asked for some discounts on hotel booking, because of timings changed i need to stay in island. First  i got answer as a seperate team will contact and help out
And then nodal officer a lady name Ruchi (she is poison), said you agreed to terms and conditons and we cannot offer any hotel.
Now after paying money , i need to succumb to this bladi rascals....
I cannot board @ 10.10 AM. if i go for refund i need to pay convenience charges, which is 250 + taxes per head(we were two ppl) and need to pay extra money for other flights tickets.

Simply keeping the terms and conditions as a weapon to shut the mouth of the passengers and disrespecting passengers and cheating their money.....I sincerely pray to lord of death to ring the death bell for this airline soon...... as  it happened for BSNL

and today dec 2nd ..timing was 10.10 AM whereas flight took off @ 11.15 AM ....
So every word they utter .....oh my gosh......lie ...cheat...backstabbing

this would be my final trip on this airline..

dont take chances of leaving your self respect to these low minded management.
Avoid this ariline EVEN AT THE CRITICAL SITUATION

title: Refund payment not received / Unethical behaviour / AVOID
text: I requested and paid for a ticket on a specific flight over the Spicejet counter in Madurai on the 30th October 2019. The Spicejet agent booked a ticket on the wrong flight instead and when I requested for this to be corrected they asked for more money and refused to refund my money there and then although it was Spicejet‚Äôs fault. After ‚Äúsenior management‚Äù been involved I was told that I would have to wait for 14 days before I see the refund back on my card and that if I want to fly, I would have to purchase another more expensive flight. That left me with no money at the time and although it has been over a month now, 2nd December 2019, I still have not got my money back. I had to call from abroad which incurred further charges to speak to another Spicejet agent, who told me that my refund is still pending as ‚Äúsenior management‚Äù has to approve and process it and that I would have to wait for another 14 days. Spicejet has been using my money, 10,104.00 INR, for over a month now without any reason and they have been only unhelpful and disrespectful on every encounter.

title: Don't value customers time (Unpunctual)
text:
I was supposed to board my flight from COK 6:25PM, They made us stand in queue for around 15 minutes, then they informed us to go back to seats as their would be 15 minutes delay... Well their 15 minutes delay took our 1 hour... 6:55pm flight started after 8pm... Pilot was repeatedly telling sorry...well in my mind I was saying go to hell with your sorry just start the flight...I was supposed to catch a train after reaching BOM... Being a single lady travelling alone... Time would be more important to me to reach my destination safely... We were supposed to reach at 8:35pm at Mumbai... And we reached around 9:45 pm...i had to w8 one more hour to get baggage the process was too slow...i got it by 10:30 pm...as I didn't get train... I had already booked another one standing on the aisle in the flight... Now I don't trust the airline so I booked one after 12am reached railway station around 11:30 pm...reached 4hour late at home.. By 4am...

I noticed that everytime someone complaints about punctuality the management simply says sorry Or you can get refund.... Just understand that We are not interested in your refund neither your sorry we will be happy if your ppl work better... 

Frequent delays like these never happen with any other flights... 

So you can't always put up the same excuses again and again

title: Pleasant experience

title: Terrible
text:
My advice is to avoid this airline as best as you can. If you don‚Äôt have any options then opt for Indian Railway.
Now why I am saying so...

1. I have not seen any airlines to weigh the cabin baggage, not even International airlines like Emirates and Qatar airline. Personally I have travelled 4 times with Qatar to USA. 
On other hand SpiceJet actually weighed my cabin baggage & my laptop bag and charged me for every single gram of that is overweight. I felt like I have been caught by traffic police and it seems those crews in counter has a target set for squeezing money. They were utterly misbehaved. Disgustingly arrogant.  
As if ‚Äúcustomer care‚Äù??? Go to hell. 

2. As usual the flight was delayed by 1hour but eventually instead of arriving to BLR at 7.45PM it reached at 9.10PM . And basically it killed the very own reason for choosing this flight, and it ruined by rest of the evening. Eventually reached home at 11.45PM. Thanks to great service by SpiceJet.

When I tweeted they said I quote
‚ÄúWe always try our best to maintain the departure time as per the schedule. However, at times, due to unavoidable reasons, we face delay. We sincerely regret any inconvenience caused.‚Äù 
So they are sorry that‚Äôs it and every trouble we faced has been washed away. 

So I could have also said that regarding my excess baggage ‚ÄúMy overweight in cabin baggage was due to unavoidable reason , and I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to the flight‚Äù 

3. Once you enter the flight you will feel you entered in world of advertisement. The interior itself is a walking marketing metal
Box. Similar like F1 car driver with all logos sticking out from their costumes. Everywhere there are ads. 

This is the last time I am flying with this nauseating spicy red. 

Please avoid SpiceJet it worst of the worst.

My ranking 
1 Indigo
2. Air Asia 
3. Vistara

title: Room For Improvement
text:
Mumbai Dhaka flight SG 77  was to leave from Mumbai at 8.55 am on 18th Nov19. 

It means one has to reach 180min before as per rule means at airport at 5.55am. It means one has to start 1 hr early from home or hotel means starting point can be 4.55am. Considering to complete morning routine one has to wake up 1 hr before means 4 am can be waking up. 

He or she becomes ready and suddenly gets message that flight is delayed to 10.50 am. So waiting and or starts for airport. 

After reaching airport and checking-in, one gets message that flight delayed to 11.40am but courtsey shown to give breakfast. Gate declared is now changed. Again waiting period starts and suddenly gets message flight further delayed to 12.50pm and lunch will be served. So for taking lunch again walk up and long way and come back. 

Meantime people gets irritated, few started talking with manager to confirm timing which is not answered properly. Then 1.45pm was new given time. Which was then postopnded to 3.30 pm. 
Now patience of people went off. There were lot of children, their parents go t annoyed. Lot of business people who had arranged meetings, for them it was problem. Their schedule went off. 
Everything was unkown scenario, disorder, total chaos. Surprisingly no ground staff or manager was there who could correctly tell what was issue, when this flight going to take off, is it going to take off. One gentleman staff was just saying now it will be taking off. But it went as false assurance. 

Please understand the gravity of situation that people who have woke up at 4am and planned their day for going to native place or on tour or for business or any urgent work are having no clue whatsoever if they can go or not. It will be better for airline to understand the scenario of peoples's mind and needs to improve upon such situation, which any time should not happen. Airline can think upon making alternate arrangement on humanitirian ground in such situation. So also depute the senior team to handle the people and give correct information instead tossing or false commitments.

title: Spice jet - worst airlines ever
text:
Though it's Budget airlines, customer can't simply change the plans because of delay delay delay...

The flight never started at on time in their history. 

Following are two instances happened in last two months,

1) They cancelled Diwali flight which I booked and given free reschedule and rescheduled flight also got cancelled.

2) The flight which I booked is at 11.15 Pm and arrived airport at 10pm / took boarding pass and then only get to know the flight timing at 3.15 Am . There is no communication thru mobile or something about it .. I was stayed back at airport for that night .

The above instances happened from Pune to Chennai.

Hereafter I won't go with this airlines for sure !

title: Exhausted
text:
1) domestic flight delayed by 1 hour for no real reason. 
2) Receive pre booked meals same time as other passengers.
3) Boarding gate opens, then wait 20 mins standing in line since they go by first come service and flight hasn't arrived. If you are seated at the back, good luck. 
4) Finally serve food 30 mins before landing.
5) Random announcements regarding violence against females.
6) Random Punjabi music playing loud in the background.
7) Extremely slow service. 
8) Too tired for words.

title: Smooth landing
text: in all my years of travel and i have many, landings were always those moments my heart skipped a beat. especially in mangalore where the runway is on top of a hill and known for being short and abrupt. there is always a bang and screech when the wheels touch the ground. so this time too as i was sitting in my seat 10F i expected the same screech and bang as the wheels hit the tarmac. but to my astonishment and shock none of this ever happened. it was the smoothest land i have experienced in my life where i never had to clench the seat. job well done capt neema singh. it was a pleasure to travel with spice jet. and i would highly recommend this airline for being punctual and professional and making my flight pleasurable.

title: What a garbage
text:
This is the worst airlines that can ever exist in the entire universe. They operate their crappiest airplanes where no direct flights are offeres by any other airlines. Dhaka Mumbai Dhaka, and both times flights got delayed by hours(7-8). The worst part is you keep waiting and every 50 minutes, it gets delayed by another hour. They dont declare 8 or 9 hours at the very beginning but update every 50 minutes. I feel like they operate just to torture passengers. They never get air traffic clearance to land, so wherever you are flying be ready to hover over at least for an extra hour. Food was Ok but not expecting anything special for a 3 hours long flight. People should avoid this airline at all cost. The only good part was the 3 crew members were nice and accommodating.

Worst flying experience of my life both ways.

title: One kg excess baggage
text:
I am travelling from Udaipur to Jaipur . Was shocked to learn that if a passenger is having a kg of  of extra baggage and if he does not pay excess baggage it will be deducted from the traffic assist who is maning the counter . 
I have been travelling for last 40 years and this is the first incident i. Was asked for one kg excess weight charge. No where in any airline it is a good gesture they don't ask for 1 kg atleast . 
And if it is true spicejet deducts salary then the poor guy will have a negative salary . This was confirmed by the station manager . Very poor state .
I have paid for my seat for my food and now you want to charge me for whatever excess you can find . 
I came from Kolkata by indigo no excess jaipur to udaipur Spicejet no excess all of a sudden Udaipur was bent upon on charging. 
From the year 1982 to 1998 I was looking after a blue chip company's airport Protocol so it was more surprising ..
Anyway god help Spicejet.
Thanks

text: The flight was delayed by over an hour. Gate handling was disorganized. The seats were crammed, no leg room compared to the other domestic airlines. Seats were uncomfortable & dysfunctional. AC was not working properly, it was very warm and uncomfortable. Overall, a bad experience.

title: Better than other indian full service carriers
text: Check-in easy and stress free. Inflight services were smooth and the attendants and flight crew  were professional in their services and attitude towards flyers. Despite being a budget carrier, the services are value for money.  Definitely would opt for SpiceJet again.

title: Awesome.
text:
ABHISHEK Singh <asinghs2000@yahoo.com>
To:
custrelations@spicejet.in

Oct 24 at 4:02 PM

Dear Sir/Mam,

I flew From Tir-Bom on 23/10/2019 From SG6451.
