title: On Time, smooth boarding and arrival!
text:
First time chose this flight on DEL - BHO sector on November 15th. The check in was smooth. Take off and landing on time. Supporting crew. Saw my luggage in the first 10. What else do you want?
Small air craft (Bombardier) - ATR, yet smooth sail.

title: Time flies
text: The check-in process was horrendous as it seemed they had more flights departing and not enough check-in counters to accommodate. The flight service thereafter was great. I have no complains other than the one above.

title: Worst experience ever
text: Worst flight experience....I had taken flight from delhi to mumbai flight no 8169 with my daughter...firstly its delayed once reached airport came to know bags of 8-10 passengers missing...representative says so rudely that same left in delhi....what the hell its 4hous post handing....now they said will contact you....

title: Helpful and polite cabin crew,
text: Leg room is comfortable. Seats are well kept. The cabin was adequately pressurized, so no earache or discomfort. The cabin crew was very polite and helpful. We flew round trip Mumbai-New Delhi-Mumbai and both times our experience was ditto! Special recommendation for disabled travelers. Very good wheelchair facility provided at both airports.

title: Value for money
text: Long line at check line yet was fast moving.staff at check in counter are courteous and helpful. Recommend this airline to all travellers

title: Extremely Poor Services
text:
Our flight from New Delhi was cancelled due to smog. We weren‚Äôt informed by phone or SMS- only an email sent -3 hours prior. As we hadn‚Äôt seen it , we were told @ Checkin counter that we didn‚Äôt pick up phone when they hadn‚Äôt even called us. 
Despite Taking Spice Assurance By Paying Extra Amount , we were not given same day flights or Stay facilities in an unknown city - we had to make our own arrangements for stay
We were told to email for ‚ÄúSpice ‚Äôs Assurance ‚Äú after the trip to get compensation as per policy .
The reply was ‚Äî-‚Äú as you have already availed the alternate travel , we shall not be able to do anything ‚Äú. 
This is a very irresponsible reply. 
Why were we told to board the flight and email later ? 
NEVER TRAVEL BY SPICEJET

title: NEVER EVER FLY BY SPICEJET
text:
I took flight from Delhi to Bangkok for holiday but it was horrible and nightmare for me. My unforgettable experience were:
1.	Aircraft was old Boeing 737-800, take-over from Jet airways.
2.	One fourth of the seats were not working properly
3.	The AC nozzles were damaged
4.	No Blankets available 
5.	To make more profit you created Spice max seats resulted in total cramp space for all economy class seats

The height of services and etiquette of flying staff were demonstrated, when I asked for cotton to avoid ear barotrauma during landing at Bangkok, the flight attendant started arguing with me that it is not available in flight and even cottons are not part of First Aid and asked me to bring cotton during travel. 

Just to save few grands, do not mess your abroad trip, it is better to pay some more grands but go for international reputed flights, were you can enjoy the international level quality. The Spicejet quality is just a road side one, in context of all. Just there objective is making a money on the cost of compromising with travelers comfort level.

title: SO SO feedback
text: Low cost airline of India dealing in International route. must have something which can keep customer engage during 4-5 Hrs flight. Not Bad but Not good also.

title: Flight to Patna
text: It‚Äôs a flight for 50 minutes . Good food for veg breakfast served . Prompt services. Flight was smooth but landing was very bumpy.

title: A comfy and safe flight.
text: I would highly recommend this flight for Patna Chennai passengers as it is a non-stop flight so it is the minimum time and hassle taking flight. All the crew members including air hostesses were great in giving their services.

title: Service
text: Even being a morning flight great service marvellous experience.excellent food and beverages.bording and getting bording pass also great

title: Good Experience
text: The ground staff and cabin crew were so friendly and helpful. I specially would like to thank the cabin crew - meenakshi, punchung, tashi and Jane for celebrating my daughter's birthday on board. Thank you üå∂ spice jet

title: Baggage service
text:
Very delay for the baggage service 
My child waited 1 hours to get the baggage from cochin (SpiceJet ) Chennai flight just know

title: Pleasant experience
text:
Just few things which can be changed like quality of tea. Soft drinks was totally warm.
My new shirt got scratched by cabin in side chairs.

title: Unprofessional staff
text:
Flew from Delhi to Chennai on Nov 10th. Flight SG 105. Had paid for an exit seat. However the staff at the check in counter misled me to believe that my original seat was a regular middle seat. He magnanimously changed me to an aisle seat for no extra cost. Well it was a rude shock to see that somebody else was enjoying my original exit seat. 
Adding insult to injury, the flight crew decided to hold a chit chat and impromptu drink sampling session with a few passengers without any regard to the rest of the passengers who were trying catch some sleep. Afterall it was after midnight as the flight was delayed for 2 hours. This is not my first bad experience flying with spicejet. 
This airline needs to put some serious effort in customer relations n integrity in business conduct with a pinch of common sense and empathy.

title: Kochi/Chennai Trip
text: The flight was on dot.Right from the checking in to the boarding and the announcement on baggage arrival was very professional. Both the on-board and ground staff were courteous.

title: Saket
text: Recommend spice jet for domestic travellers . Nice hospitality by cabin crew members and good food and service

title: Trip with spicejet
text:
I am happy with the services provided in the plane
Only concerned is about flight late departure, due to this i could not able to board my train from new Delhi...very much disappointed for this

title: One of my worst flight experiences
text:
Flight operation from Varanasi to Mumbai

I try to summarise my experience in short :

I had booked for 4 persons in advance, incl wheelchair service. Somebody from Spicejet customer service in Delhi/Gurgeon called me immediately after my booking by offering me an upgrade for all in the name of " Spicemax"...means/involving : priority boarding, free of charge meal service on board, extra large seat with more space. Additional costs : INRS 4,076 . I accepted this offer and paid by credit card.
....and this was reality:
---we appeared at the airport 2 hours before scheduled departure in the evening on november 5th ,2019
----wheelchair service was available immediately
---first surprise at airport entry : whilst Spicejet tells you to avoid print of booking confirmation Indian police insists on prints and refuses entry if not provided.
----second surprise at luggage check in counter : this airline allows only 15 kg luggage plus 7 kg handluggage. We paid for 15kg excess , multiplied by INRS 400/kg ....in total INRS 6,000
--- third surprise : Spicejet could not provide Spicemax-service due to change of plane now. They promised, however, refund of my extra paid 4,076 via my credit card....I am curious whether it will happen.
---security check normal according to indian standard
---boarding procedure : we were waiting patiently for the wheelchair service...nobody came . So I had to call for this assistance again for not being left behind.
---the plane itself was an old B 737-800...dirty, small,... hardly acceptable
----4 stewardesses on board , but instead of being available to service guests they rushed through the plane and only distributed pre-ordered meals....not even mineral water served for other passengers during the whole flight but instead sitting behind the curtain and doing nothing .
----I nearly forgot :unnecessary hectic before take off: everybody was asked to show boarding pass again...apparently for security reasons.
----additional remark : the crew existed of two Indian and two Turkish stewardesses and especially the two Turkish ones proved to be extremely unpolite towards some flight-guests. Besides ,those two made jokes about the indian ones and this left an additional bad impression of Spice Jet.
Sorry to say : it was my first and last experience with the indian airline SPICE JET.

title: Airport staff are very helpful
text:
I would like to thank the staff of Spice Jet at A‚Äôbad Int. Airport who went out of their way to help me out on 3rd Nov 19. Special thanks to Vishvesh ( Staff No. 120681 ), he is a Star !!! I am posting this review because of his efforts and helpfulness. 
Keep up the good work :)

Kind Regards,

Nikeet Desai

title: Pradeep Rohra
text: It was a pleasant flight,the service was too good, very comfortable seats and prompt service. Grow more

title: Flying economic, expect economic.
text: For a flight providing economic fares for maximum distance it would be unfair to ask for major perks during on-board, but a couple of basic luxury like a masala chai on the house with a couple of cookies is not much to ask for. Ten out of ten for punctuality and staff behaviour, but 8/10 for cleanliness space between the seats.

title: Had a great journey
text: As the other flights were delayed, it took off perfectly on time. The cabin crews were awaome, cooperative n helpful. food was good

title: ‚Äúgreat job with excellent service‚Äù
text:
My PNR No. is QHWW2R .I had book round the trip ticket of Spice Jet to get the Spice max facility of extra leg space and on-board meals during my journey to Thailand as a tourist.I Found that seating arrangement of Spice max more comfortable and priority check-in service is very nice at Bangkok & Kolkata. The flight experience was good from STV-CCU-BKK and BKK-CCU-STV, Crew members and staff were  really good.  
Thanks to Spice jet for serving to your customer efficient and warm onboard sevice.

title: Poor staff attitude
text: The cabin staff was showing cold shoulder attitude. Not courteous. No mail in the face. No greetings.

title: Amazing flight onboard SpiceJet with their Bombardier Q400NextGen
text: This was my first time flying a Bombardier Q400NextGen me being so enthusiastic about aviation that the Crew seemed to even notice and they appreciated it, Probably the most aviation enthusiast friendly Airline and proverbly the best LCC we have in India they just won my heart also to mention about the Male Cabin Crew Members along with one female the Male Crew was so friendly and we became such nice friends in my flight is just wish and hope that he's alright and doing well now! :D

title: Please Avoid
text:
One of the worst flight i have traveled. They give me non recliner seats which was very uncomfortable to travel for 5 hrs from Bangkok to Ahmedabad. No service at all on the flight. They don't provide blanket or any food. I know this is low cost airlines but the cost is not low cost.
It is not such international standard flight. I think spicejet should stop flying if they don't provide enough customer care services.

title: Best Indian Low Cost Airline!!!
text: I just love SpiceJet specially their employees who fly/work,"With all our Heart" it's a 10/10 from me and I would even go as far to recommend it to anyone flying any other Indian LCC to fly with SpiceJet instead!! Really felt so amazing on my flight

title: Safe
text: Quite safe. Its as safe as flying with any other airline. Standard is good enough for domestic airline standards.

title: Connecting Flight (SG-519)
text:
It wasn't my first flight to home but I believe my first experience of traveling with SpiceJet.
It was kind of rush for me where I opted to fly with SpiceJet from Dubai to Bengaluru/Banglore which happened to be layover at Pune (SG-519).
It's truly said ,that the people working with the company makes it great but not just the company.I really don't remember anything other than guest/customer service which I received.May be it's a small thing for others but the quick and kind gesture being shown towards me is  really appreciated .
As I was feeling poorly dehydrated ,one of the flight attendant rushed and got me water quickly(I miss the Angel, who just saved me from getting my condition worst )
I remember everyone's name who were  really into handling each and every single request with priority within the short span of time, thats what hospitality is .
I would like to thank Java,Pooja,Seema and Payal for taking care of the people on the flight being efficient and cooperative amongst each other .
All the best to you.
Thanks a lot .

title: looted money prior to boarding
text: my dad n sister travelled to mangalore yesterday from Dubai. Hand luggage allowance is 7kg each , despite spicejet asked them to pay 60dhs( 120dhs) for hand luggage, though  the weight was just 3kg and 6 kg. this is a serious scam, money was not just taken from my dad but also from the other passenger. am not sure what the weights of other people were, but my dad n sister were below 7kg. how can u charge money ??

title: Sandeep
text: Feel good to fly with SpiceJet....class service...and 99% on time... easy to get boarding pass... safely to get luggage... good in service and friendly to behaive passenger.

title: Good flight
text:
Took a spice jet flight from Delhi to Bengaluru. The flight was on time. The leg space is just like other domestic airlines.As corporate meal plan for dinner was served veg Biriyani(Opted for veg option)/Mirch ka salan,curd, a desert and a beverage(Masala tea). The Biriyani was just OK. Masla tea was very good.

                 Suitable for 2-3 hrs flight time .

title: Getting better leaps and bounds
text:
SpiceJet has adopted a number of automation in Bangalore airport.

1. Printing boarding card
2. Leaving check in baggage
3. When boarding

Their inflight service is also getting kinder and more attached to the passengers.

My loyalist is shifting to them fast.

title: Prompt people
text: Prompt service by spice jet make your check in very comfortable.. smooth transfer and baggage handling is the toppings spice jet offered.

title: Travel experience with spicejet
text: Everything is good but need to improve in baggage handling Rest is very good with  good rate in ticket

title: Amazing Service
text: Myself and my friends were traveling to Shirdi from BLR on 10th November. We were well taken care on board by Ms. Arushi Mishra and Ms. Lucky. Arushi was very attentive and polite. Thank you for the excellent service and making out flying experience with Spicejet a memorable one Shall fly Spicejet soon !!

title: Never ever travel by Spice Jet
text:
My relative passed away so to reach coimbatore I booked the earliest flight available and by my  badluck it was spice jet.
 Flight was at 9.35am and first they postponed to 10.35am and then to 11. 20am and then to 12.45pm. When I reached the counter at 12.30pm asking for status they said incoming flight not landed so not sure and expected departure is 1.10pm but I was not ready to believe this and I won't reach on time even if spice jets does some magic to meet their latest commitment . 
I got my ticket cancelled and on the way back. Thanks to spice jet for making  sure I won't reach on time to see my lovedone one last time. 

This will be my last flight ticket booked on spice jet. 

Advise never ever book on spice jet.

title: Spicy fly
text: Welcome and departure services were of class but lacked introduction of crew members other than pilots and should have announced that what are the languages known by crew members passengers could relate to announcement more better.

title: Good budget Airlines
text: It is Okay experience. Budget Airlines, so wasn't expecting too much. Cabin Crew were nice. Missed captains voice. Don't know for some reason nothing from captain. Normally we hear a lot about what's going on from captain. But nothing... Didn't know we have arrived. Apart from that, it was okay.

title: Spicejet Late on Departure and Bags come after 30mins
text: Firstly the flight got delayed thrice. No formal announcement for the last delay. And no redemption for sitting at the airport for 2hours. Flight was delayed in landing too. Bags also came after 20-25 minutes. This is the only Spicejet flight which I had such experience.

title: My experience on board SpiceJet
text: While the overall experience was good,Ii must mention that the upkeep of the interiors of the aircraft on both the sectors I flew; Bangalore-Delhi on 16 th. October 2019 and Delhi-Bangalore on 8 th. November 2019, was not good, particularly the seats. Seats were retracting on press of the button. I could not make payment through my American Express Credit Card, as the machine did not accept the same !! At the Bangalore airport they do not have enough counters/personnel to welcome and guide the passengers who come into drop the baggage/check-in. Their online feedback link does not provide enough opportunity to express what you want to express.

title: Singapore to Surabaya -  great flight
text: Everything went smoothly.  I did get some grief for my rollaboard suitcase. But other than that, it was a great flight.  The crew was polite.

title: average flight
text: Nothinhg out of ordinary, but would like to point out they charge for web check-in for any seats. That just looks desperate and cheap.

title: Old planes and slow service
text: The plane was old, the safetybelts has lost already the red colour and were worn out. The Service was very slow, after I got my dinner it took over one hour to get the remains cleared

title: Dept.cell in charge of our organization
text: Good to arrive on time as promised.It was good to fly on Spicejet.Services were good.Bus was cramped

title: Worst Flight & Customer Support Services
text: The flights operated by SpiceJet are always running late due to operational issues. They come to know the issue 24 hours before the scheduled Departure Time of flight and instead of working on that they wish to delay the flight. I travelled twice in last 2 months by SpiceJet and both the times it was the same story. Secondly, if you ask for some support from customer service desk. There Custrelations will not revert you, whatever be the reason of writing. You can not even demand an invoice for services purchased because they don't understand the operations. All the efforts of Mr. Ajay Singh getting into vain as his team lacks the vision he has for the company.

title: Good experience ......
text:
After a long time travelled from Delhi-Kanpur-Delhi , my experience with the aircraft is very good particularly the following :
# Nice clean aircraft .
# Well groomed in-flight crew .

title: Delightful fly
text:
Travelled from delhi to bangalore on 3rd november after finishing my presentation in the IAPS conference.
Perfect timing though the whether was not good. Had a last minute change in gates, but no issues.
Flight attendants were warm and welcoming. Suggest be proactive in offering water-was not an issue for me.

title: On time arrival
text: Happen to travel SpiceJet after some gap. The flight was on time and the staff were courteous. It was a small aircraft and there was no reclining to it. The seats are straight and bit uncomfortable. Otherwise the service is great. üëç

title: Its okish
text:
Not the best, but when in need, it's ok to travel with.
The plane in which I was travelling SG7820, must have seen better days. The plane was rickety and seats can be compared to any public transport seats. Hard and very uncomfortable.

title: Better than I thought
text:
I was booked on the flight by my company. I read the reviews and was not looking forward to a late running flight with stroppy staff.
The flight was on time and the staff absolutely fine. 
Yes, I would use them again

title: They have become a fraud airline
text:
Terrible experience. Had booked 10 tickets for Mumbai delhi on above flight for 26th oct 2019 over 2 month in advance. I had booked normal corporate economy tickets. From the moment tickets were booked i kept getting calls from Spice jet trying to convince me to upgrade to Spice max at a special upgrade rate and promised that they would give me all spice max seats in first 2 rows. After calling me over 10 times with all the promises I booked the spice max upgrade. We had pre booked meals 2 months in advance for all hot meals. The disappointment started at the check in when they said that 3 seats are not spice max but we would get meals. They would refund the spice max amount. After we boarded when meals were being served they informed us that no meals are booked for us. We showed them the ticket with all the dishes mentioned, he informed us that it is not showing in our sheet. After many arguments he gave some sandwiches. The spice max seat at window was broken and the handle was cut and poking in the leg. We brought to the notice of cabin crew and we requested for a blanket or cushion to avoid the pain but they said they didnt have any. Once we got off the flight, I complained to the Ground staff Mr Karandeep who was extremely casual about  it and said meals are not even reflecting for return flight and you have not paid for the meals inspite of showing him the meals mentioned on the ticket.
He gave me a complain book to write my complaint and said they will contact. I am still waiting for their revert

title: Worst leg space
text: Worst leg space in an International flight I have ever seen. This was my first international flight with them newdelhi-bangkok-newdelhi. I am 5.7 feet and my legs are totally tight in the seat. Cabin crew sleeping while coming back from bangkok to delhi. Food is okay. Captain didn‚Äôt mind giving any information while going from delhi to bangkok. Cabin crew is super cheap. In the presence of passengers they are talking cheaply like road side about their love affairs.  Will never ever travel with spicejet on international flight. Air India is way more better than them in all aspect.

title: Very disappointing service even after charging so much for air tickets.
text:
On 5th November I travelled by Spice Jet Flight SG2763 from Jaipur To Surat along with a office colleague on seats IA & 1B. In this flight the seats did not had the TRAY TABLE to keep the morning sandwich and coffee ordered by us. This is greatly dissatisfying and deficiency in service. Besides all along the change in departure timings ‚Äì about three times on Jaipur - Surat route was very annoying. It appeared that threes no one who is actually responsible and has the control over the operations.
I hope this shall get looked in to and corrected.

title: Chennai to Kochi
text: I traveled to Kochi from Chennai at night. At this time this flight is good with a reasonable price. But most of the days there is delay.

title: Average but more expensive
text: More expensive but everything is normal, nothing different. Good flight experience, good check-in, have food and beverage by additional payment.

title: Planes not upto mark
text: The planes kind of "crumbles/shakes/makes lot of crackling noise" during take off & landing. Not sure if they are old, refurbished.

title: Worst Cabin Crew
text: Cabin crew is the worst in spicejet. The company might be working hard to establish their presentness, but the cabin crew will definitely spoil it. No vocabulary while speaking, and doesn't care whether the person understood what she speaks, just uttering something and going off. Not even cared to attend a passenger's basic request. Pls give some water.. Uff!!

title: Pleasant experience
text: Had a flight from Jammu to Delhi. It's a short flight therefore didn't opt for food, so can't comment upon. Staff at Jammu airport was helpful and it was a smooth check in experience. Cabin crew was helping passengers and was looking after requests. Both Pilots were at their best and had good landing at Delhi

title: Great crew at spice jet
text:
Hi travelled from Mumbai to Delhi on a spice jet flight,   On spice max and the crew Andrea and Susmita were exceptional, also as I was in row 1 the leg space was awesome. 

Keep this going. Amit

title: Not up to expected standards
text: There was not much spice to be seen, but very badly maintained cabin. How do they maintain the rest of the aircraft? Will try to avoid this airline in future.

title: SpiceJet not advisable
text:
Never ever go in SpiceJet, the worst coordinations among the staff and poor response. Never picks the calls. 
Two days regularly visited airport and waited for more than 4 hrs on each day but still I have not received a bag. 
Not only me, on same day I have seen 4-5 customers facing same issues. 
SpiceJet better shutdown your jetüò†

title: Spicejet Flight.
text: Very good staff and service.  No sms received that the flight was delayed where some other passengers did receive notification.

title: Most helpful staffs
text: Most helpful ground staff at Vijaywada airport. My last night's AI flight was cancelled without any information. I decided to try spicejet and right from alloting seats to faciliating the connecting flights, the staff were most helpful. I'm so glad I changed the airline.

title: An absolute NO!
text: The cabin crew was another level of arrogant,the temperature of the flight almost froze our feet and inspite of several requests there was nothing done about it. In flight the announcement for baggage to be collected was from belt 3 and was changed to belt 2 after we stood several minutes with the both belts screens showing different flight details altogether. After confronting the crew we were all the more disappointed as they were least apologetic and walked away calling us liars. Detest the whole experience. Could not have come home feeling more upset and tortured.

title: M.P.Gangadharan
text: Good service on time takeoff and landing smooth clean travelled more than 6 times in your flight all on time and good service excellent staff pleasing thank your team

title: Mostly a good service
text: Spice max booked for all 4 passengers. Got priority checkin and boarding! Yay! Boarded flight to be told they had no intimation of us being spicemax!! Bit annoyed! Had to show my downloaded booking itinerary to prove I wasn‚Äôt fibbing to be offered hot meal for my family! Bit cheated I felt! Since the promise was cold towel welcome drink and a meal aside from priority checkin and boarding!

title: Amazing experience
text: I was traveling from Delhi to Goa I choose Spicejet(SG8144) and totally had an amazing experience with them. Ms.lika and team have literally served us amazingly and had taken care of all the passengers beyond our expectations. Ms. Lika have totally an great asset to you. Looking forward to enjoy SpiceJet hospitality in future as same as my previous travel.

title: Avoid It if you Can!
text: This may be the worst Indian LCC we have ever flown. The ground service in Delhi was horrible. No wheel chairs for my parents. Additionally, Spice Max pre purchased option was not reflected in our boarding options or on the in flight manifest. At the gate in Delhi, we were made to wait an hour with the false assurance that a supervisor (Mr Gupta) would show up to addresses our concerns. Predictably, he never showed. Flight attendants were more focused on selling their products than making sure that the toilets were clean or had toilet paper. Their service was very disorganized. This was the same on our return flight. It may be easier for this airline to charge an extra 200 bucks and give everyone a meal or drink, as opposed to the cluster of a service that we witnessed. Flight attendants can also perhaps smile more. This airline takes the cake for the "low" in airline carriers.

title: Bad Check-in Experience at Coimbatore airport
text: The guy named Promesh or similar at check-in were nasty and wanted to weigh in laptop bag also. they are rude and crying for each and every extra.. Supervisors didn't help! Avoid and take AirIndia...Was travelling Spice Jet max

title: We are senior citizen. In spite of requests, in 2018 we were not provided with wheel chair assistance
text: Irresponsible while providing wheel chair assistance, (request was placed immediately after booking as on line portal is silent on this) to senior most passengers.

title: Most appalling customer service ever
text:
I wonder, how many more messages on your facebook feed, messanger and emails do I have to send for SpiceJet to merely acknowledge my query's very existence? Despite multiple attempts, I have had no response for a week now and this is way beyond acceptable. 

Ad rem, you guys managed to damage my check in luggage en route Delhi-Jaisalmer. Staff at Jaisalmer, while apologetic, was clueless as to what to do on this matter - but promised I would be contacted. Surprise, surprise this did not happen. 

HOW DO I GET IN TOUCH WITH A HUMAN BEING AT SPICEJET, WITH SOMEONE THAT WILL ACTUALLY RESPOND TO ME??

title: Great flight experience
text:
We were upgraded to the very first row, which was great!! the in-flight food and crew was great. The crew was very co-opeartive and courteous. We had a great filight. Only, we missed the Captain addressing the passengers in-flight.
The check-in process was too bad,. It took us about 100 minutes. Many of us stood in a line for an hour and then shifted to some other line, which was very looong.

title: Miscommunication
text: After being a spice max passenger wasn‚Äôt informed in advance of some of the F&B services not available on the flight

title: Neeraj
text: Flight well on time. Informed for early departure by sms and call. Fast service at counter. Safe landing. Thanks

title: Inflight service
text: The attitude of the hostess in rear was poor. She must have a smile and also have an interest in the service. She was utterly disinterested in serving and doing her job for the sake of doing. No life. Such staff bring down the image of teh company. How they select such crew members

title: Mumbai once again
text: Leisure and work together make the visit memorable. Hotel and air travel by Spicejet was worth the comment

title: Feedback for spicejet
text: Its highly recommended to start Business class in this rout Ahmedabad to Bangkok. I will like to say that Business class must on this rout more fruitful and people of ahmedabad highly needed.

title: This time on time service.
text: Was not very confident as per previous experience. But seems SpiiceJet has improved much, and no cancellation this time. The complimentary food was superb. Thank you.

title: Worst Carrier
text:
Customer service is the least, They count Laptop weight in Hand luggage unlike Indigo.
The staffs are terrible, Haven't flew with them since the incident

title: It was great flying with with them, but need to upgrade the comfort
text: It was a good flight !!! Need to improve comfort & food & beverage was good!!! Overall  I'd them rate it 6/10. They need to improve the leg room space as well.

title: Business trip
text: Good flight ...spice jet services are friendly. Baggage collection was easy n quick. Will fly next time also.

title: Short and quick trip
text: Small Dornear flight with limited seat making a high sound but okay for a short duration travel. Seats are comfortable with just 2 +2 seats in a row.

title: Venugopal STP
text: Travel by spice Jet is an experience itself.. Awesome maintenance and punctuality. I recommend to everyone.

title: Top class cabin Crew
text: The flight was delayed due to a technical fault but the cabin crew handled the situation very well..

title: Good
text: Spicejet provides good service. Smooth baggage process. Flight is good to board. But due to some passengers issue, flight was delayed about 20mins but landed in destination within time. Food was delicious and crews are hospitable. Good experience.

title: 'Very good experience'
text: Spicejet girls at the  Delhi airport were very efficient and helpful. My parents and I were travelling.We forgot to book the  wheelchairs when booking the tickets for my old parents, who cannot walk very far. But when I requested them for the chairs, they quickly organised one. They were having problem organising another one as all the wheelchairs were in use. They asked us to wait for a while. They tried their best and organised another one. Which was very impressive. The wheelchair boys were very generous and took us quickly and we were right on time near our gate.

title: Lack of professionalism
text: The crew is not cordial, impolite at times, they quarrel with each other openly. When passengers complain about non functional air conditioning, they just keep passing the bucks from one to another and they could be careless to allow passenger reaching near the aircraft without the boarding pass being stamped (also resulting in flight getting unduly delayed). Risky!!!

title: Spice is on fire
text:
I frequently fly from delhi to bhopal and back again . I have always preferred spice and i am always happy with everything. No delays and some times early arrival. Spice team members always give their best and make the journey safe and comfortable. 
#loveforspice  
#spice is on fire

title: Niyas Mohammed Ali
text:
Awesome experience... I recommend Spicejet 

Experienced and professional crews, well behaved 

Hospitality

title: Not a very pleasant experience
text: The seats were uncomfortable inspite having the business/ priority seat 1D-1F. The tray rebels were unkept and while having meal the food was falling off more from tables than being stable on it. While the staff while de-boarding said they are providing us with a goodie bag, it was not given.  The exit gates from the bay were not open and while being asked from the staff they replied very rudely. Also, the announcement for baggage was made on a different Bay Area while the baggage came on a different belt and no announcement was made for the same.

title: bad experience
text: very bad service. they made us waiting for over 2 hours in bangalore. service is terrible. staff is non co-operative.

title: OK experience
text:
standard flight .
It was a 1 stop flight 
The flight from Kolkata to  Patna was not Good as all the back side of the desk was falling down.

title: Good experience in Mumbai-Dehradun round trip direct flight
text: I opted for SpiceMax from Mumbai to Dehradun. The aircraft was Boeing 737 which were probably operated by Jet Airways in the same route. This aircraft had SpiceMax seats that were probably the Jet Airways 'Premium Economy' class. So in a fraction of extra penny what you get is amazing leg room and service and seating arrangement which is separate from the economy class. The flight time of about 2 hours is very comfortable in the wide seats.

title: I really had to post this
text:
I really had to post this, because I was so grateful for the service I received on the above flight on 22nd October 2019. I came last in the flight and the all the cabin crew members where so happy to help. When I entered the airbus, I have not found any space to keep my bag so then one crew member came her name was HERLEEN KAUR, I saw on her face, she actually trying so hard to solve my problem. Bcs the bag size is not that much small we can adjust anywhere. So at the end she put my bag on her bag‚Äôs space. Thank you to the HERLEEN KAUR that initially helped, during the flight she was so positive with me and spreading happiness around Also thank you to the SpiceJet. At the time of food service when she is serving I really don‚Äôt want to eat anything bcs I usually prefer non-veg and when she asked me I said Do you have Biryani she replied with yes Sir Veg Biryani then I Smiled and said Thank you but I like the way how she asked me again Would you like to have some coffee they I really like the way she ask me so I ordered  Cappuccino it was nice. This was the first time I experienced this in the flight usually I used to go to sleep on airbuses bcs I hate flights. The staff on this flight were brilliant and a credit to spicejet. I would recommend the airline to so many as a result of today, once again many thanks to the staff :) thanks to Herleen Kaur (Flight Name SG 108 Timing 8:45 PM from Chennai on 22 October 2019)

Jatinder Singh Dhami
PNR HB7FSJ

title: Tray tables broken, staff not announcing for premium seats on oublic address system or even start of boarding
text:
Staff at the gate did not announce boarding start on public address system. Flight wa sdelayed by 50 minutes at least and there was so much crowd. How could someone hear them if they were trying to should without access to a public address system?

In-flight tray table was broken and hostess had no clue of what passenger was asking for. Seat wasn't locked in upright and always swung back..Had a lot of back pain trying to stay upright without support.

Lot leaves to be desired from spicejet for apicemax class of service. Least is the upkeep of the aircraft

title: Very helpful staff and great travel experience
text: The staff at Pune airport is very helpful and cortegius, they converted my checkin bag into priority so I could make a smooth arrival. Flight and Services were also very good. Thank you Spice jet.

title: Good experience
text: Good service. Courteous crew. Comfortable flight. On time service. Good choice of beverages. Overall a very  good experience

title: Amazing experience with SpiceJet
text: I frequently travel to MP because of business purpose and always had preferred to take GoAir but this time I choose Spicejet and totally had an amazing experience with them. Sarita Nair and team have literally served us amazingly and had taken care of all the passengers beyond our expectations. Sarita Nair and her team members are totally an great asset to you. Looking forward to enjoy SpiceJet hospitality in future as same as my previous travel.

title: SpiceJet SG 279
text: On time performance was perfect but the airline made sure to wait inside the aircraft for almost 20 to disembark. After disembarking bus service was pathetic, thereon had to wait for another 20 mints for the arrival of baggage. I don't know what measure airline is taking to ensure quick baggage service and reduce the wait time after arrival.
Best flight in spicejet till now. The crew were amazing. They had a blasting smile on their faces. So friendly kindhearted

title: SpiceJet Flight
text: Very much on time. Great service and feel. The inflight crew was very helpful too. Good experience. I recommend it.

title: Delay at the eleventh hour

title: SpiceJet Travel
text: We booked the flight for their lowest fare with the shortest duration of journey compared to other airlines, The service is good, staff is cooperative and helpful.

title: Being a Defence veteran I invariably like to fly Spicejet. So far have flown only in their domestic sectors
text: What I like the most about Spicejet is their punctuality, service with smile and ready to help approach of the staff both that of the ground staff & the cabin crew. title: Short flight

title: Lack of service at Check-in but overall good service

title: SpiceMax a must
text: SpiceMax is cheap and gives a lot of benefits. On one of the flight the chair space was not as advertised (normal seats), on the other yes. The food included is normal airline. title: Worst
text:
Worst flight I and my family had.
1) Late by 1.5 hours to board and take off - imagine everyone waiting in the night (no seats to wait due to congestion).
2) Flight is worst maintained. There were few places where cello tapes were used to stick broken pieces. Scary.
3) Before boarding commencement, I received a call from Spicejet Mumbai ground staff that one of my luggages (we traveled from Amritsar to Hyderabad transiting through Mumbai) had powerbank and I should go there and remove it. I went there and that information was found to be wrong.
4) After landing in Hyderabad, it was announced that luggage will be on Conveyor belt 3, but it actually was on belt 8.

Cabin crew were very professional and helpful.

title: Not great
text: Old aircraft. Broken Tray table was stuck with a cello tape. Recliner function was not working for my seat (it was always reclined), and staff couldn‚Äôt help too. Poor quality of aircraft maintenance is not giving confidence to fly again this airline.

title: Not a very good experience with Spicejet
text: The flight was delayed by two and half hours. Usually I travel by this flight and it's on time. Other services were good by the airlines.

title: Good experience

title: Great Ontime Service
text:
I travelled earlier this month on Spicejet.  This is one of the few Indian airlines that has self-check-in and baggage tags prints at a kiosk.  I was surprised at how efficient the whole process was.It took just 5 minutes to get into the airport, check-in, check a bag, and walk to security.

I normally take the early web-check-in option, but the system would not let me check-in without first paying and securing a seat.  I refuse to pay for a seat on an aircraft.  This was the only irritating feature of the SpiceJet web-check-in.

The boarding process was efficient, with pleasant flight attendants, and an on-time arrival into Corpus.

Overally, a great experience on SpiceJet.

title: AVP TAXATION
text: Good flight timings and also good updates by sms alerts. Best use of digital technology platform. Staff neat and good guidance provided in-flight.

title: Good Experience with SpiceJet
text: I am a frequent traveler with Spice Jet from Bengaluru to Pune. It has never disappointed me. Keep it up!

title: SpiceJet experience
text: This time my SpiceJet experience was bit better than my Kolkata flight experience, aircraft was well maintained

title: Baggage Lost on International Flight - Apathy by Spicejet
text:
We lost our Checked-in Baggage travelling from Delhi to Bangkok.

On losing my baggage:

1. I found out that there is no representative from Spicejet on Bangkok Airport to report the issue.

2. On my own after running around, I found out the Baggage Handling partner.

3. I coordinated on my own with that Partner with difficulty, as the employees are not well versed in Basic English.

4. I registered complaint with them in writing, after running from pillar to post taking over an hour. 

5. In the process I missed my pre-booked transportation to Pattaya (where I was travelling) and had to take a cab on-the-spot.

I received my baggage afterwards coordinating with Baggage Handling partner.

Spicejet remained clueless, if I received my bag or not.

I went through Severe Mental Trauma, as I was travelling with my wife and 3 yr old kid. 

The airline refused to compensate me for the baggage loss and the mental trauma.

Never travel in this crap - low cost budget airline, which does not provide any Care and Service to its Customers and take them for granted. They need LESSONS on BASIC CUSTOMER SERVICE.

title: Terrible experience
text:
The flight took off after one and half hours delay without any proper announcement. When it was reaching Bangalore, there was an announcement for landing but the aircraft kept on flying. There was no announcement. At around there was an inaudible announcement from the flying deck about diversion to Chennai. Landing was abrupt and after landing again there was complete silence. We were completely at dark. Then we requested one air hostess to find out about our further plan. And she informed that it would take off after 25/30 minutes. Finally it took off around 10PM and landed at Bangalore close to 11PM. 
1. Handling of the situation was totally unprofessional.
2. Aircraft interior was not maintained properly.
3. Take-offs were very noisy and scary.
4. Pilots appeared to be inexperienced.
OVERALL - better to avoid SpiceJet till it improves.

title: The flight with Spicejet was from Delhi to Patna via Varanasi
text: The flight with Spicejet was from Delhi to Patna via Varanasi. I keep in mind about having a good in-flight experience and flight landed on time despite having a stop, and the whole onboard stay was good as it has been my previous flights. It was a bit longer trip as we had landed in Varanasi station as it was the one-stop station to Patna. The crew onboard welcomed with a positive smile that I like. The running of the flight was good- great traveling with the flight.

title: Inflight food service
text:
One of the best food menu amongst all Indian airline services. 
But aircraft dirty and my pull out tray table on seat # 1F was broken which had me keep it on my lap and precariously balance the hot box so that food didn't spill over..

title: I'll be flying with SpiceJet again
text: I had heard different things about SpiceJet, but when I actually used this carrier myself I was pleasantly surprised. Great flight staff, good inflight dining, arrived on time. No real complaints, I'll be flying with SpiceJet again.

title: Service
text: I always prefer indigo because of their comfort and hospitality which spice Jet lack behind..only the crew member name Jeet is atleast has smile attitude and feels welcome to the customers..Thanks Jeet

title: Our international credit card info was stolen by the customer reps.
text:
Our luggage was a few kilos heavier so we were asked to pay extra. We had kept a international cc for emergencies which we only used once and it was with SpiceJet.

Their was a lady on the counter who we have gave the credit card to. It was suspicious when she called someone else to make the transaction and the guy took our card somewhere inside and brought it back a few minutes later. I did not know he would steal our info. Recently someone took out a cash advance of 2000$ . The location of this transaction was India. But we are here in the US. 

We do want to mention that the flight experience was good. Their are no complains about that. I think their should be a protocol in place that they shouldn't be allowed to take anyone's credit card out of their sight while making payment or make a copy of the cc.

title: Hmmmm
text: Small plane..... my friends and I were quite scared while plane was taking off and landing.  Tea and coffee are sold for  in flight. Was quite disappointed with the service.  The good part was that we reached our destination safely and were happy about that.

title: SPICE MAX - Not so spicy
text:
I had made the booking 2 months in advance and from next day Spicejet started calling to opt for Spice Max with some payment. I did go for same just a few days before the flight. This premium service was offered at a price of Rs. 2398/- for two passengers. I opted for 1 way only on trial basis. I was offered the following in this package:

1. Priority Check-in : It was fulfilled 
2. Priority Security : It was fulfilled for me but for my wife, there was a long queue with more ladies from economy class passing security.
3. 2 x 2 first row seats : We got First row but only 3 x 3 seats. At the time of taking Spice Max services, I was specifically told about 2 x 2 seats. In fact these 3 x 3 front row seats are cramped since between two seats, folding table is also accommodated. So this was a negative point plus the folding table was broken and was not able to hold itself during use.
4. Onboard Food : Served and was excellent.
5. Priority Baggage out : First Out. One bag was first to come on belt but the second one took a long long time.

Overall, Spice Max is not I will take in future.

title: Divine Visit
text: I had been flying via Spicejet since last so many years.... wanted to have so spicemax experience ... wasn't worth it...tall promises priority baggage and all ... miserable experience

title: vacation in Chennai

I am loyal to this airline as it is best for the economy flight with good flying experience.

title: Experience with Grond Staff Poonam
text:
My Worst Experience in interacting with Ground Staff Poonam, i entered 50 minutes prior to my flight time, but she didn‚Äôt allow me to get the boarding pass.

I went there but there was also a long queue. I waited for another 10 min. Later on  She said please go to the 1st counter. No one was helping me there as well. Please teach your ground staff, how to behave with customers. Infact she was not accepting her mistake. I had my 8 months pregnant wife and parents with me. Despite of giving me priority, they even didn‚Äôt allow me to board. Hell they are..

title: Smoothest Landing
text: The flight was dot on time, very smooth take off and the smoothest Landing. The pilot was quite informative and made both left and right side seaters view the Eastern coastline which was treat to the eyes. The cabin crew were awesome and took good care. Kudos to Spicejet to maintain their time Everytime . Keep it up. So next time you are flying Spicejet must be your option.

title: Awesome Job Spice Jet.
text: Took this flt from Adampur{not listed by TripAdvisor, yet} to Delhi. I must admit, absolutely professional staff at departure airport. Equally fantastic cabin crew, Mandeep and Jyoti. Courteous, efficient, tireless and welcoming. Extremely effortless job by them. Kudos to the brand and the Ppl behind it who r running the show. Happy Landings.

title: Vast improvement
text: There is vast improvement from the past in the quality of service. They fly without much delay (Spice Jet was an unpredictable airline till a couple of years back) and have well groomed cabin crew. However, the upkeep of the aircraft needs a lot of improvement. That the seat pocket did not even have the safety card in it was a shocker. Later I realized that it is not the negligence of those who are responsible for this but the condition of the seat pocket itself. Anything kept in the seat pocket falls through to the floor as the bottom is found torn completely. I brought this to the notice of a cabin crew, not as a complaint but as an advice, and he was smart enough to have a new safety card, air sickness bag etc inserted into a large plastic pouch and made sure that the same will not fall through; he also promised me that he will take up the issue with the maintenance department. In effect, the cabin has good crew but bad maintenance. Food on offer was at par and the trendy makhana was available for purchase. Good low budget airline needing improvement in the infrastructure, upkeep and punctuality.

title: Now fly Direct to Shirdi with SpiceJet
text: It‚Äôs very convenient service by SpiceJet that Shirdi connected to Delhi, Hydrabad, Bengalore with direct flights .... it helped us to get SaiBaba Darshan in time & also easy to travel to Nasik for business visits ...

title: Better another!
text:
Around 1 month ago I booked multiple lrgs for Dec-January.
I received 2 mail saying that: 
1) one flight had been canceled by the company and I needed a new booking. 
2) They had intoduce their new winter schedule (absurd they did not know their winter schedule in September!) and I had to rebook my flight. 
Please note that every rebooking is not free, but it costs around 52 euros. And December is far to come. 
I wrote them saying that if they ask me money to change my booking for their fault I will notify authorities and Police of a scam. 
If you have other options to fly, better let Spice jet on the ground and take another company. Apparently low costs, but asks for money every month, therefore they are a high cost company, indeed!

title: Our advice don‚Äôt bother
text: We arrived at the airport to find that the flight had already left. Eventually we found a staff member, not an easy task who dismissed us with a shrug and it‚Äôs your fault we emailed you. Unfortunately for SpiceJet I keep all email and we had not been notified. We are also registered SpiceJet app users and had been notified of flight details for previous flights but not this time. The staff member then called us liars, saying that we had the responsibility for ensuring we were early for flights. A manager was called and a replacement flight found the next day meaning that we were out of pocket for a nights accommodation in Jaipur and Amritsar, his response ‚Äúnot my problem, take it up with complaints‚Äù. Upon arrival at the airport the next day, 3.5 hours early to ensure that we were able to get a flight at all, the staff refused to scan our luggage until 2 hours before the flight. We have missed 2 days of a 4 day trip to Amritsar because of the sheer incompetence of this company. We have not heard back from the customer care line and expect that the response will be equally unsatisfactory anyway.

title: Excess baggage chargec for duty free liquor two bottles
text: I checked in with hand baggage. Thereafter visited the Duty free shop and picked up two bottles of liquor. When I was about to enter the aircraft, Spice Jet staff stopped me and asked me to weigh the check in baggage including the two bottles which were sealed in the Duty Free shop bag. They found 02 kg overweight and billed me Rs 2460/- with a credit card on the spot.  I have traveled the world in various airlines, buy never had such an pathetic experience where the staff weighs the Two bottles purchased from the Duty Free shop. They even asked me to de board if I had a problem. The staff was extremely rude. Spice jet should be made to refund my excess baggage amount and pay for      for causing harassment at the boarding point. I would never recommend anyone to travel by Spice Jet .

title: Spicejet flight
text:
The services offered and cleanliness are well maintained. There was kind of turbulence felt though for very short period of time. May be because of bad weather.
The announcement made by cabin crew for baggage collection towards end of our journey was somewhat not clear. However, crew was attentive towards passenger needs. Rest all good.Thanks.

title: Totally unprofessional and terrible airline
text:
I took their SG517 on 9th October scheduled departure at 3.45 pm. The aircraft got some technical issues after reaching Bengaluru. They asked us ( about 9 passengers going to Kolkata) to deplane. A customer service rep took us along but we had to wait at a Security gate for more than 15 minutes because CISF was not informed as per protocol.
The flight took off after 10.30 pm from Bengaluru well after 4 hours delay. 
I had a front row aisle seat but while boarding at Bengaluru the representative changed my seat to 17A . When I objected and mentioned that I paid Rs.1200 for the seat the girl then gave me a front row window seat- this is without giving any reason. The aircraft was of same configuration so it was surprising that they changed my seat even when my boarding card mentioned my original purchased seat. After boarding I found that my front row aisle seat was not occupied at all. The hostess then sold/ upgraded another passenger to this seat. I had to suffer because I had pain in my left leg.

After we landed in Kolkata to our horror we found out that our luggage didn‚Äôt arrive in Kolkata and all the luggage of passengers who came from Pune was left behind in Bengaluru. 
It was already 2.00 am and there was only one representative at the Kolkata airport and it was utter confusion....
I left the airport after taking a receipt and when I phoned the Kolkata airport next morning the SpiceJet rep informed that the suitcase arrived by another flight around 4.am but the luggage delivery person will join only at 10 AM and then they will take action to deliver the luggage- there was absolutely no urgency.
All the perishable items in my luggage will be wasted and my essential medicines is already causing difficulties.. most of these disruptions and problems were totally avoidable if SpiceJet was responsible and accountable to passengers.
In the last few months I have noticed several unusual delays from SpiceJet. This airline will be my absolute last resort and would never ever take one of their flight if I would have any urgency.

title: Cheap and affordable
text: Good, cheap and affordable. Available for last minute bookings also. Legroom space is less but can be upgraded by paying little extra money.

title: Excellent services
text:
The quality of services have significantly improved besides on time departure and arrival !! 
Professional approach and servicing by staff at check in as well as in cabin !!
Impressed with the improvements 
Keep it up !!

title: Scope for betterment
text: Good experience. Right on time. Getting the luggage was a hassle as I had to wait for more than 30 mins to get it. Good hospitality. Crews were friendly. Toilet was not up to the mark. Quite filthy, needs improvement.

title: Best airlines for short trips
text: I use Spicejet all the time when I visit India for domestic travel. In my experience, they never canceled my flight and always on time.

title: Terrific Experience
text: From the check in counter to the cabin crew, you just find a fault. the cabin crew, as expected were exceptional. But they did go one step ahead in terms of comfort and service. They were casual, yet comforting and exceptional in their attitude. Kudos.

title: Navneet
text: Nice flight experience and we'll behavior by crew staff. Seats are comfortable and reached on time. Thanks for journey

title: Excellent customer service
text: Very professional and helpful personnel all round, excellent cabin crew, food and beverages clean interior of aircraft and most comfortable timings with punctual reliable services

title: Among the Best Airlines in India
text: It is always a pleasure to fly with Spicejet owing to the service standards that are best w.r.t. On Time Performance and on-board F & B service. Keep up the good job done!

title: On time chennai
text: Flight was a Bombardier small aircraft flew on time.. no frills cabin crew was loud and clear in instructions and kind enough not to disturb when was sleeping. The seats were non reclining but enough leg room even for a 6 feet (180cm) tall guy like me

title: Best value for money
text: Timeliness of flight departure and arrival, friendly customer service at the airport and in flight and best value for money are the key reasons for my rating. Would certainly very highly recommend this leg of air journey to any traveler.

title: Cheap and cheerful
text: Took off 15 minutes early and arrived 30 minutes early! Messed up my collection arrangements. Not as professional as GoAir or Indigo but better the Alliance Air/:Air India.

title: pay for the services and forgot to get them
text: Most unprofessional staff. we got our e-boarding passes but they have no system to check that. so you need to get boarding passes again from shirdi itself. Even i was called number of times to get spice smart for priority check in but no priority was given. no one even bother to greet you. when we told we have priority boarding they deny and said it was till you get the passes not applicable for boarding.the person standing was so damn rude despite the fact we have a senior citizen with us he make us stand last in the queue. the tone he use was so abusive and after giving boarding passes he stopped us by saying not all boarding passes is there. after a argument when i kept urging him to check his hand, he saw he already have all the passes in his hand. despite this rubbish attitude he didn't bother to say sorry. the air crew was again too much way below average. They were not at all checking the list to whom they should provide meal. we already have pre-booked meal but still they provide us meal after we asked for it as they were too busy selling the food to those who were paying them at that time. when we asked for certain things they said they are out of those items as people already took them. they were suppose to make us the priority but they were busy with selling items and there was a family member of one of the staff. so all the attention was given to them instead of any one else in the flight. the staff was flirting with each other and was not at all bother to greet and serve. worst crew and worst flight experience.

title: Unprofessional and irresponsible attitude of SpiceJet airlines
text:
This is not the first time I am facing such a reckless and irresponsible attitude from this airliner. Owing to my long route, I had split my journey from Uttarkhand to Guwahati into two, former being through bus (Uttarkahand to Delhi) and the latter through flight (Delhi to Guwahati). I had scheduled the flight in way that would be plausible for me to board on to after reaching Delhi by choosing the spicejet flight SG-231 (11:25 am-01:35 pm). Though I was sceptical about their commitment but I thought that they must have improved by now. But to my surprise today (07/10/2019) I got a call, a message and an email, all of them being shoved down my throat forcibly that my flight had been changed due to the introduction of their 'Winter Schedule' from 09:25 am to 2:55 am via kolkata without any other alterntaive being presented to me. Now its impossible for me to catch the flight from Delhi and also a hassle for me to find cab in Guwahati. Nowhere have they mentioned even any alternative to choose from. This is not the first time they did this. It has happened to me twice before. In the first case they had changed the time of my connecting flight and I had to wait for 2 hours without any sort of penalty levied upon them. Moreover when enquired over the issue the person on their counter shunned me away by saying that it was my responsibility to catch it on time (I literally ran for the connecting flight the moment I landed). The second time they cancelled my flight together just a few days before and I had to pay double the price for which they were not penalised either and didnt bother to reimburse the price differnece. I am uterly appalled by their attitude towards the cutomers and their sheer and stern response over such cases. They should'nt change the flights at the first place. Are there novices handling the reservtions behind the bench? Don't commit at the first place if you can't abide by it, so that we can choose other able ailiners. To add to it they are not in the mitest of a chance embarassed over their incompetence and thus are never concerned to provide the customer a well suited alternative and reimbursement for the hassle caused. Its time the authorities take actions against them and avoid such unprofessional players from tainting the calm and managed environment of the airlines. I vehemently discourage the usage of this airliner.

(The filght is scheduled for november 10 2019, but due to unavailability of option in the form in this portal I am putting it as october)

title: Scam
text:
Guys beware of this spicejet airline, they are running a scam. I recently took flight from Dubai to pune and I can't believe what great cheats they are. First they are taking undue advantage of your situation and charging heavily for any excess baggage (approx 1400 inr per kg). I paid 15k for my excess baggage and they did that for most passengers and later all of our baggage was left behind as they did not have enough space in the flight and no information was provided to us. They just keep making money by accepting all there is to take. Upon landing in pune  like shameless people they informed us what they have done and delivered lot of false promises about refunds and compensation to pacify all. Later when I followed up with their customer care first few day they didn't even bother to reply; cause u know they already got the money and later when I complained again they bluntly refused to pay any compensation or refunds. 
They are extremely unprofessional and liars and cheats. Don't fall for their scams like me and from my experience I will tell you better to pay 1000 bucks extra and travel with other airline who don't do all this monkey business and have better professionalism.  
Look at their beautiful reply in screen shot below.

title: Cabin Crew is Awful
text:
Cabin crew Attitude was too high to speak with them. Seat belt was torn, cleanliness was poor. no seat comfort.

Overall AWFUL, PATHETIC

title: In explicable Delay
text: We came back to Chennai by this airline on our way back from Shirdi to Chennai.The Darshan at Shirdi was excellent.The return flight was delayed. Though the Ground Staff knew at the time of check in,it was not announced.We have to jostle in the Small Shirdi Airport. The  Food Choices in the Lounge was limited. Being Lunch time if there would have been announcement Passengers would have planned. Lack of Communication mars the otherwise good airline

title: Compliant
text: Hi! I am Rakesh Sharma, a CA and lawyer by profession in Delhi. I was unable to reclaim my baggage upon my arrival in Dubai yesterday. This airline is the worst airline I ever came across. I am trying to check the status of my bag since yesterday morning but I haven‚Äôt got any success with their customer care numbers and email addresses. The grievance redressal line does not work, moreover all the customer care numbers available online are not operational. My baggage contained very important daily use medicines for conditions like B.P., diabetes etc. but I haven‚Äôt been able to locate it at all so far. I never expected this from any airline. There is no communication at all and my entire trip in Dubai has been ruined. I strongly recommend NOT TAKING THIS AIRLINE AT ALL. As it is they had a very poor track record of flying on time, this problem with reclaiming the baggage was an eye opener for me. Please take this into consideration when booking your flight, not HAVING MEDICINES IS A SERIOUS HEALTH THREAT. NEVER TAKE THIS AIRLINE

title: A Good Airline
text: Spice Jeit is the only Airline operating from Chennai to Shirdi and it is a welcome option as it makes Darshan affordable and easy. We were a group of Eight and chose this airline .The Timing was comfortable.Checkin Smooth. The Flight was punctual..In Flight Comfort Adequate.

title: Nice Hot food
text: Served nice hot food, which has become rare in precooked boxes era. Also an Airline which serves Water to ALL immdly on boarding.

title: Good service, but captain never speaks
text:
It was otherwise good service in boing aircraft for domestic sector, with smooth take off, and little turbulence, but a little hard braking while landing. My only complain is that captain never uttered a word over PA system, it was only the cabin crew announcing.
Service was good and courteous....and seats are better than A320 of other LCA.

title: VERY high standard of service, comfort and the basics others don't supply
text:
Most airlines cost cut wherever they can, and give you nothing but a seat and a seatbelt.  SpiceJet gives moist towels pre-flight to refresh, a free drink to make sure you're hydrated. A free pillow for back support, or in case you might want to nap, and a free blanket in case you find yourself a bit cold.

Other airlines cut all this to save a few cents.  Not only was it a wonderful flight from these things alone, but also their standard of training and service of staff was world class.  Let's reward airlines who invest in the comfort of their passengers, not airlines who scrimp and save a few cents at our expense.  SpiceJet was a great airline to fly, and I wish they flew in my country!

title: Horrible Service
text:
Dear friends,

I am here to review my travel on Spice Jet Business class which was horrible and will never reccomend any of you to take spicejetbusiness class. After charging 4 times the economy fare the service I get was a feeling like I got a seat in the lavatory. 

No courtesy for business class passengers. People paying spice max were also accommodated in business class and I even saw 2 passengers being upgraded to business class cabin FOC. Then why was I charged 20k where I could have enjoyed the same service FIC.

Beware DO NOT TRAVEL such airlines.

title: Never fly SpiceJet, it‚Äôs the worst Indian airline ever
text:
The people at Checkin sell expensive spicemax with promise of 15 kg cabin baggage and urgent airline staff I have seen ,sriraga don‚Äôt agree that at boarding gate. 
They keep people on hostages for 1 kg additional baggage. They don‚Äôt ever care about customer service. I am sure they will be bankrupt soon. I had to pay 10000 rupees without any reason. 
Avoid them..

title: Worst customer experience will never travel in spicejet
text: My check in baggage is completely damaged at arrival airport spicejet officials told to write customer service when I wrote to customer service they dint recieved any complaint from departure airport and they won't compensate for bag damage. I tried checking with customer care many times no response. Even cabin crew dint ready to sell cookies when my one year infant is crying in the flight.worst experience.

title: Completely unprofessional, flight delayed to and fro
text: So I'm a frequent flyer in southeast asia, and have never seen such bad service from an airline. Flight from delhi to bkk delayed TWICE, then return flight from BKK again delayed. When you ask staff they have no real answer for why this happened. I talked to another passenger who told me this is a regular occurrence with spicejet, probably 75% of flights are cancelled for bogus reasons, sometimes citing weather when the sky is perfectly clear. One  thing is for sure, I am never flying with them again. Their company can crash  and burn for all I care. This is the level of service of Indian companies. Shamefully ridiculous.

title: Never travel Spice jet, you'll feel cheated
text: I am a frequent Traveller and take about 20 flights in a month within India if not traveling international. I was traveling to Delhi now and at the boarding gate, a team member called NAVYA approved me asking to weigh the laptop bag, I said sure, but was a but of surprise as laptop bag is never measured , she was very unprofessional and misbehaved with the conversation we had I was shocked,I wanted to approach someone there, all ignored,I think it's their new SOP to cheat the customer whilst boarding so they have no other choice but to pay and board I was charged 2800 without even telling how much weight and why, I take this as CHEETING. For sure, I will never take a SpiceJet flight and strongly recommend ,not to take this ever.

title: Most Callous , heartless , deaf and dumb management
text: Cancellation of flight for technical reason  even one hour n half hour after boarding must be put up with for safety and passengers knew that they must accommodate   the inconvenience .. but Spice jet did not have the minimum training how to act on such situation and there was no body to communicate the update for more than one hour and then a series of confusing information and announcements and chaos . All the 180 passengers were at dark where to go and what to do . A total pandemonium . The attitude of the crew and ground staff was as if they were  not answerable. they just said ----" ask our big boss "   but no answer how to reach the big boss. there were cancer patients and very aged persons in wheel chairs and senior citizens and children . for them rushing from gate No 41A to 45 C and then again to 45 A and finally waiting on the runway under the mid day sun was really a horrible experience ----  finally the flight of 5.15 am took off at 11.45  am......

title: Terrible flight experience - should not be used  for international travel unless there are no option
text: Terrible service , charged for checkin bagage , checkin does't open until 3 hours , poor crew - with no sense of service and not to mention a pathetic food

very irresponsible about to handle luggage
