title: Delays are terrible
text: I had to wait for a significant amount of time, as my flight was delayed by more than 9 hours! The pilot was late and organisation was poor. I highly recommend people not to be swayed by the cheap prices, and to not book any flights by Spicejet.

title: good, efficient and on time
text: efficient boarding, friendly service, clean cabin and on time. easy checkin. good airline. will fly SpiceJet again.

title: Beware International Passengers - Cheating by manipulating the total weight of the bags
text: I traveled from Madurai to Boston by SG612 which leaves at 8PM with a connection at Chennai that night, with my 8 year old daughter.  I had purchased international excess baggage during my ticket purchase.  I had 4 bags to check in, 1 small backpack as my carry on, and my daughter had a small backpack with her stuff.  I had weighed all my 4 bags at home and the total was less than 90kgs.  In fact, one of the 4 check in bags was small (typical carryon) and was only 19kgs.  When I checked in at Madurai airport, the front desk person weighed all bags together and said they total to 96kgs.  I told him I had weighed them at home and they were less than 90kgs.  He refused and said they four weigh 96kgs.  He gave me discount and asked me to pay Rs.2000 towards excess baggage.  I was delayed and got worried that may be my weighing machine at home was wrong and paid the extra Rs.2000.  But when I checked in my bags at Chennai airport for my international flight, the 4 bags together weighed only 88.8 kgs.  I was shocked to realize that the front desk person at Madurai airport had cheated me.  I am not sure if it is the attitude of the person at the front desk towards international passengers or SpiceJet instructing them to do so.  I approached Customer Service with my concern giving all evidence and requesting them to refund my excess baggage fee.  Instead of resolving this issue, they asked me to contact Madurai airport.  Any international passenger traveling from Madurai by SpiceJet, I suggest you weigh your bags at home.  At the check in counter, ask the person to weigh each bag separately.  If you do not agree, call the manager or ask to weigh at another scale or call airports authority of India.

title: Water bottle
text: The Spice Jet flights has a good legroom for Economy class. Seats are comfortable and cosy too. All we ask is to provide atleast a small water bottle as a complimentary. Tea and Coffee is far away, however we just ask for water as per Air Industry norms we are not allowed to carry water bottles. Just a request that's it. Rest all good.

title: Needs Passion
text: Private airlines in India have had a chequered past. Many have disappeared without a trace leaving behind unpaid employees and huge losses. Spice has the backing of extremely wealthy promoters and political patronage. What is lacking is the passion and commitment for customer satisfaction.

title: Taking ¬£116.09 sterling & can‚Äôt account for it !
text: From July to now , still awaiting this airline to explain  (and refund) why ¬£ 116.09 sterling was deducted from a UK citizen account instead of 40.00 USD. This was for an upgrade. All the necessary information e.g boarding cards, correspondence with the amount for the upgrade, all parties name contacted ( about 8 ) and a foreign bank statement, but all fore mentioned information was to no avail. Still receiving automated messages that is sent seconds after contacting them.

title: There was no meal available for those who had not pre-booked.a meal.
text:
My wife and me traveled on this flight on 15 Sept. At the time of booking the departure was 11.20 AM, hence we had not pre-booked meals. Later the airlines announced departure time as 1 PM.

Check-in was hassle free. Since we were senior citizens, we requested for priority boarding and the airline graciously agreed, for which I am thankful to Spicejet.
On the flight when we asked for sandwiches, we were told that meals were being given to only those who had pre booked meals and there were no extra meals for sale. We had to console ourselves with a box of cashewnuts.
This is the first time that I have experienced that no meals were available for sale on the flight... and I must have flown over a 100 times.
This is carrying cost cutting to the extreme and I am extremely disappointed with the experience.

title: Spicemax is bad.
text: Spicemax is bad. I was called online to provide assistance and fast service at the airport. They told me that they would provide wheelchair to my father but the counter girl at the airport was indifferent to me. The ground staff didn't provide any help to me and I did all on my own. But the food and baggage facility was good. Overall experience was poor.

title: On time flight on a worn out defunct Jet Airways' Aircraft
text:
I am travelling this morning, 21st Sep 2019, from Kolkata to Mumbai on Spicejet flight¬†SG 242. The scheduled departure¬† was at 9.10 and I reached airport at 7.30. Following is my overall experience about the flight ( Rating given out of 5, 5 being the highest):-
A. Check-in: I had my tele check-in done and boarding pass printed. Travelling with Hand Baggage .(Rating 4).
B. Lounge access: I was flying economy and hence there was no lounge faculty offered. I used my Mastercard to access airport lounge.(Rating Neutral)
C. Boarding and departure: Flight was on time. Boarding opened at 08.20 at Gate 20 by aerobridge. Boarding process was smooth and fast. Push back was at 9.05 and we took off at 9.15 (Rating 4.75). 
D. Seats and interior: The aircraft was a Boeing 737-800 series and looked old and tired. It was one of the defunct Jet Airways' abandoned aircraft, still having their outer paint and blue and light grey interior. Interior looked very old and worn out with signs of poor maintenance of a struggling previous owner written all around. Seats upholstered in dark grey faux leather was comfortable. My selected seat was 19C, an aisle seat at the middle. Seat pitch was comfortable legspace was cramped. Seat recline was about 110 degree.(Rating 3).
E. In flight Service: Being no frill flight food can get bought in flight. I avoided food. Inflight magazine Spice Route provides good reading. (Rating 4).
F. Arrival and baggage: Landing was not smooth. Flight landed at 12 noon, with a delay of 10 minutes ,usual in Mumbai due to air traffic congestion. Gates were opened at 12.15 .(Rating 4)
G.Overall flight experience and suggested area of improvement : Good service, on time, but very old and worn out aircraft (OVERALL RATING 3.75)

title: Flight delayed for more than 3 hours today
text: Worst experience, don't use this airline, no fix time to fly and continuously changing time, rest of the flights operating, so SpiceJet cannot make an excuse of bad weather, useless airline.

title: Cheap ticket, cheap service
text: if possible it needs to be avoided, cheap airline. poor quality of planes/ maintance. extremely poor service in Delhi airport counter.

title: Very poor cabin baggage rule
text: I have been in the gulf for more than 20 years and I am a frequent traveller of jet airways  ( I always loved their service üëç) but due to cancellation of flights I had to choose spice jet and this was my first ever bad experience in terms of cabin baggage , I understand if you have big bulky cabin  bags ( which mostly people do carry ) on top of which is duty free shopping so when I use to travel by jet and air India Express they both had similar rule in terms of cabin bag that it should be max 10 kg including duty free shopping and EXCLUDING laptop which makes sense and I had never ever cross my limits for the first time I paid 60 aed per kg ( total of aed 420) for a cabin bag including laptop because airline has a rule book which says 7 kg INCLUDING laptop and duty free ( my company laptop it self was 8 kg including the iPad and personal laptop and charger) . So I eventually paid for my company laptop and my tablet üò° and I had nothing in my cabin bag other than my shoes and a pair of cloths which i usually carry as a backup . Sorry to say this guys u just lost a customer.i will never ever travel with you guys to mangalore  and I have already told my family and friends also not to travel with you guys .u guys should consider from customer to customer . If I had too much of stuff in my cabin bag with duty free shopping you  charge me I don't mind paying you but now this experience  I don't mind air India Express even if they have poor Custer service

title: Not Soo Good....OK Flight
text: During take off....lot of turbulence....in a particular time flight is going down and up too.....getting scared....otherwise OK....

title: Comfortable flight and arrived on scheduled time
text: I and my wife, both senior citizens had a comfortable flight. The staff was absolutely professional and courteous. The aircraft was neat and clean. The flight was on time.

title: Good flight
text: Though it is a short duration flight, food is good and staffs are courteous. It was on time and enjoyed the flight.

title: Poorest of the poor
text: The worst flight experience can be availed on any Indian Airlines and Spice Jet is a standing proof for the worst available quality of service. Worst service.

title: Good Flight staff and good menu for food
text:
Liked the Service of crew. They were very friendly. i was not feeling very well and was standing at the back of the plane where crew normally sits or keep food stuff.

One of them came forward and asked me if i want any thing . i asked for green tea and she was kind enough to bring tea to the place i was standing.
My friend loved the food menu and he enjoyed the biryani .

i also noticed that now you can preorder salad etc on the flight which is amazing.

title: its not good
text:
nothing to say

It is baddddd
 no entertainment only boring
with more makeup air hosters
no food tastes well as well as with small quantity
no varities in food
never choose this airline Indigo airline is better

thank you for choosing spicejet and never choose it again . Jai Hind.

worst airline experience

title: Excellent Cabin Crew
text: Whats a flight journey without some friendly cabin crew! I flew from Chennai to Bangalore in March and boarded a SpiceJet. Both the male and female cabin staff were mingling so freely with the passengers. None of that 'Nose in the air' attitude i've noticed in other airlines. One of my unique experiences.

title: Friendly staff are eager to help
text: On the domestic flights of India, try to make your trip during the day; afternoon, for example, only to enjoy the views of the cities when taking off or landing; At this airline, I found most of its ground staff friendly people eager to help, with professionalism and love, the plane clean and Indian airports were nicer Than I expected, I'll try to come back next winter.

title: Ridiculous service
text:
The airplane delayed and delayed after we got airport. Finally we can't catch our next airplane. The most ridiculous thing is THE STAFF REFUSED TO GIVE US DELAY CERTIFICATE UNTIL WE PROMISED THAT WE WILL USE IT FOR OUR OWN TRAVEL INSURANCE IN OUR COUNTRY .
Another ridiculous thing is when we ask the first staff for giving us the delay certificate, he ask us "wait for 20 minutes" . Then 20 minutes later, HE WAS OFF. So we need to ask for another new staff and explain whole things again.
We spent more than 1 hour to get a certificate.

Another thing is they destroyed my luggage wheel. But when I ask for compensate, they want me to wait again. I have no time because I need to catch another flight. I don't know if a delay certificate could take more than one hour, how long does it take for a luggage compensate for Spice jet?
Is that the India style staff ?? Or Spice jet style?? Or both?

title: Short trip Delhi to Bombay & Back
text: on Time and very professional staff (on the ground & in the air), willing and assisting. Good Experience

title: Small and Quick
text: This is a Bombardier Q 400 flight connecting Guwahati and Dibrugarh. It is good for short distance and the best is that airlines is connecting this two important destination inside Assam. In-flight magazine is worth reading.

title: Spacecrunch!!
text: It was a jetair aircraft repainted. It has very small seats. If there is any way to find out seat size before booking please do that.

title: Ahmadabad to Bagdogra
text: I traveled from Ahmadabad to Bagdogra with my family, it was a not good experience through this airline. The overall facility, plane cleanliness, seating comfort and the crew of this airline was helpful, the ground staff was ok but it has to be more customer-centric. I suggest traveling with this airline. From begining to end you will be dissatisfied and left irritated. The web check fails often, the physical check in counter is not easily available nor any instructions. The staff have a poor attitude so don't expect any actual help. The planes are not the best or even good ones.

title: Cheap, fast bt little miss match timing
text: Flight hav no issue...service, duration time, seats all gud....bt mismatched with hotel check in timing...I reached bangkok airport around 1 am bt usually hotel check in time between 12 PM to 2 pm so toomuch gap between flight nd hotel check in timing.

title: Flight
text:
Flight on time. Good service
Happy to choose again. Travel time was within the projected time.     
Cost of flight is also affordable

title: Worst flight service in the world
text: We travelled from Bangalore to Andaman. As soon we reached we found our luggage was not in the flight.It was not mistakenly put somewhere else.It was the decision made on spot not to take few person luggage with out informing us.Its not like we got the luggage in the next flight. We had to wait for two days to get it. There were old couple traveling and few medicine were in the luggage. No help for them as well. Think twice before choosing Spicejet.

title: Noisy flight
text: The flight was on time. The aircraft appeared to be leased from Jet Airways as the Spicejet red colour branding was missing, instead it was blue. Good leg room and interiors, with not too bad seat comfort. But what put us off was the extremely high decibel noise of the engine coming into the interiors and stayed that way through almost 3/4th of the flight duration.Also landing was not as good as should be and this is the second instance of uncomfortable landing experience with Spicejet recently.

title: One day trip
text: SpiceJet Experience nowadays has really not been of the same standard of service , what it used to be couple of years ago. Crew members should be groomed further and to be more professional and courteous.

title: Random cancellation, rude and ill-mannered stuff -worst airline of the world
text:
The flight was postponed by more than 8 hours and the communication said they will refund money if flight is more than 2 hrs delay. However, website didn't allow any refund. I couldn't book an alternative flight till they refund my flight.
Called their 24x7 number several times(they won't call but just send a text stating your flght has been delayed) only to see all executives are busy with other customers. They have 2 people sitting in Delhi, India to handle all customers - that too only for 3-4 hrs a day (weekdays only) - rest of the time its automated voice.

When finally i got connected they were not able to confirm if this is case for refund and asked me to call back to resolve.

this is a cheater airline and definitely the worst airline of the world. 

The modus operandi is this -
they offer cheap tickets initially at prime time of flights only to re-schedule the flights at most awkward time later. Thats the mode of forgery they induldge in.

Avoid this cheater.

title: Disaster Experience
text: I had no choice left without selecting spicejet for kolkata to dhaka travel. Their flight was very expensive but plane was tiny, And service was also very low standard. Try to avoid if you have another choice

title: Horrible experience
text: Useless airline. Pls avoid. They detained my baggage in mumbai citing security reasons. Instead of clearing the doubt in mumbai about its contents they let me travel sans my baggage. Had to pick up the baggage next day to collect the bag since they refused to deliver. Never again on this stupid airline.

title: First time with SpiceJet
text: This was the first time with SpiceJet & the experience was just ok. I flew SG6438 on 31st August on my return journey from TRV. They are slightly cheaper than Indigo but not on par with Indigo. In entertainment is zero & I can't understand why. They were flying a borrowed aircraft from Jet & the legroom was better compared to Indigo. The arrival terminal was the International one at Mumbai. They did not make any prior announcement about this (I guess they were using the Jet slot) which is unprofessional, in my opinion. Some may not approve the dress code of the on-board crew(I wouldn't want to comment on that). The service was pleasant, otherwise. On-time performance was worse than Indigo. Between Indigo & SpiceJet my preference is for Indigo for better professionalism. One thing I liked about them was the online booking experience. SpiceJet send your boarding pass through WhatsApp on your mobile as soon as your booking is completed, which is very convenient for people like me. I wish other airlines follow the same.

title: Spice Jet
text: Very poor experience. Aircraft is not in good condition. Staff is unaware about lots of internal policies.

title: If another choice , I will avoid this airline
text: Midday robbery? Dubai-Mangalore, Baggage allowance is 30 Kgs . But Checked in was 17 Kgs only. At check in counter offered an upgrade for AED 80... accepted. Check in counter staff told up to 10 Kg Cabin baggage is OK due to two reason's , Check in baggage weight was low and upgrade...they told me to tell this at the gate. Went to boarding gate with 10 Kg Cabin Bag(Less than). The Spice jet guy at the gate was like a Bouncer or Goon. Arrogant, inconsiderate, insulting....basically an uncivilised and barbaric, did not allow a Kg extra above 7Kg. Adamant....his question is are you travelling in this flight? Or I will offload you? I have to reach India Urgently...I emptied my baggage some cloths and other material. Still weight is 9 Kg. Grabbed AED 120 for excess baggage. Then I told him OK take to bag to the hold, why should I carry. No, take it to the cabin yourself was the order of the bouncer guy. We have seen in India...Air asiatic, NEPC, Air Costa,Jet Air, East west,King Fisher,Modiluft,Paramount,...where are they now? This was my first Spice jet experience probably last. Now even more menace...every day getting promotional messages of Spice jet. Flight details are SG 60 date 20/06/2019.

title: Very good online service
text: I flew SpiceJet few times both international and domestic flights.  What I like about the airline is their customer service (online and through calls) as they responded to my requests very well and even called (internationally) to check, so I really appreciated that.  In terms of inflight service, well it is the low-cost airlines so you can't expect a 5-star service.  However, I paid extra for Spice Max so I had extra space for legs and bigger seat plus welcome drink and meal served.  So it is really worth to pay extra for extra comfort.

title: Value for Money - Mumbai to Hyderabad
text:
On time departure and arrival. No long queues during check-in and arrival of baggage on belt was also quite prompt.

 Did not utilize in-flight meal services, however all paid in-flight meal services are known to be below par for the money charged irrespective of the airlines.

title: Third class airline with no accountability
text: The flight was supposed to take off at 4:40 but it did at 8 pm. For a journey if 1 hour 40 minutes we were late by  double the time of 3more than 3 hours. There was no clear information by ground staff and the behavior of one of the staff anuj was so rude that there was a situation of almost dog figyat the depadtire. Thetoilets are stinking like public toilets and the seat was broken, sink choked. I think it's high time spicejet should review whether at all it wants to continue its operations. Bweter shut down for good.. If not for yourself for the beeterment of passengers.

title: SPICE JET IS CARVING ITS OWN NICHE IN THE AIRLINES MARKET
text: The SPICE MAX which is an upper economy class (they don't have business) is really good. It gives you priority check in, priority luggage on arrival, enough leg space in the seat, a blanket and cushion, and of course Food. The little extra you pay for the MAX is really worth it. Plus they have new air crafts and journey is on Time. Really worth the Service and a great value for money.!! Try it to believe it !!

title: Flight cancel due to bad weather but staff recommend to fly from more dangerous airport
text:
Our flight from Leh to Delhi was cancelled due to the bad weather which is acceptable for that so we ask more the earliest flight that we can take as we already spend 10 days in Leh. Airline officer at the airport cannot give any answer so put us on call with customer service. She told that next flight will available in the next 3 days and they have no policy for extra flight. So she recommend that we can reschedule to fly from Jammu to Delhi on next day. we accept that to find out later that there is not possible for us to travel to Jammu during the crisis. After that there is email to confirm new e-ticket for 3 booking (we made total 4 bookings for 10 people) and another 1 booking reschedule to fly from Leh to Delhi in next day.
This is very unprofessional at all to recommend passenger to travel 17 hours from Leh to Jammu to get the flight especially during curfew. 
Communications with customer service is very terrible even we have Indian to help, finally we request for refund, cancel all flight and take a risk to get the flight from other airline next day. Other airline manage for extra flight to serve passenger but spicejet refuse to do so. Finally until now, one month after we still not get refund back yet.

title: Flights are late which affects the plan of the day
text:
If you are travelling with planned schedule, then better choose other flights. DElay of flights something common here. 
Inflight crew is good however food is again very avg. 

Well, they are not cheaper either ways . 

Disappointed..

title: Not much of a choice
text:
The only airline operating on this route.
A propeller aircraft.
Exorbitant rates for choosing seats,though all seats are the same.
Cramped up journey.
Both ways the pilots were very good as they gave soft,smooth landing.

title: Where is the Service in Low Cost Airlines?
text: Pre-Flight experience was terrible and not much different from In-Flight. Long queues at airport check-in counters, followed by one of the lousiest and horrid last minute surprises where seats booked in front rows at the time of ticket booking were changed to rear side without any information. In-Flight service was just about OK considering low cost airline. However the only silver lining was in the form of hot food served which is not available in many of the low cost airlines.

title: Good experience and punctual
text: Its a good airline to fly between Dubai and Pune. Very convenient timings and punctuality is what distinguishes it from other airlines. However, its a bit too pricy.

title: Very good service
text: I forgot my power bank in check in luggage ,the staff was really kind to help me come back take it out of the bag , clear security everything under 30 min

title: My first visit to Kolkata by SpiceJet
text: It was early morning flight, heavy rain at Delhi airport,I boarded my SpiceJet flight to Kolkata, takeoff, onboard service and landing were equally smooth.The flight was ontime, so I could chase my target of the day, as planned.Thanks SpiceJet.

title: Left to roast in aircraft without air conditioning
text: We took spicejet flight from Dubai and boarded the aircraft approximately 45 minutes before takeoff. The air conditioning of the plane was not working and it was extremely extremely hot. Despite our complaining again and again, the AC was not switched on and only about 15 minutes after the take off, the AC started working. That was pure 1 hour of torture. Add to this the ‚Äúdon‚Äôt care‚Äù attitude of the air hostesses. Will recommend Spice Jet only if you prefer to be slowly roasted.

title: Respect one's time
text:
So I booked a flight from DXB to dehradun via delhi through spicejet.First thing, I got a message that flight has been delayed and will depart at 1:45 I.e almost 3 hrs delay. Eventually it departed at 2:40.
A weekback my wife's same flight departed 1.5 hours late. Then when I called them after the msg to ask,i was been informed that I can't fly this trip as I can't catch my connecting flight due to this delay.WHY, is it my fault. So after I urged them to book me for another connecting flight,that lady finally changed and sent me the updated booking.
Then there were no beverages in flight, coz of the delay.

Overall, not a pleasant experience. You guys need to respect someone's time.

title: Great service.
text: It was great experience in traveling with this airline. Every thing is good. Service is also too good.

title: Flight experience
text:
Hello all
I would like to share my experience with the domestic flight of spicejet
Flight is very uncleaned and tear seats. 
Spicejet has tied up with the ava and will recommend to buy the product from arrival shop of ava but would not recommend to buy as they provide local quality of the products

title: Inexperienced and unprepared...Don't pay for this. Not worth
text:
Upgraded to SpiceMax, supposed to be kind of Business Class or Premium Economy.
Firstly there was no preference at time of boarding. Not even an announcement related to this for Bom to HK.
The leg rest recliner wasn't functional for all the seats of SpiceMax seats.
The staff wasn't aware if the phone charging points were working (which weren't). Then we were welcomed UNAPOLOGETICALLY with Water Dripping Cold Towels.
The free meals to be served was Dinner for a 1 am flight and no breakfast before landing at 9.40 am. On asking was offered Dal Rice as breakfast.
The Air hostess seemed unprepared and untrained for handling international flights.
The worst was the return flight from HK to BOM which had Checkin time of 10 am was cancelled, message of which was sent, previous day at 11.30 pm. Obviously read the message next day morning at 5 am. 
Then started the horrible experience of trying to get in touch with the customer service for rebooking...
On the return in the Economy there wasn't enough food to purchase for lunch. Flight departing at 12.15 pm and landing IST past 3pm. 
The ONLY silver lining was the cabin service, for the return flight, with a smile and an attempt to help the passengers.
Last option for international travel....

title: Dr.
text: Excellent flight. The attendant was good and helpful. Legspace in front row is great. Quick disembarking was quick!

title: Avoid Spicejet
text: Had taken spice-jet max seats...to my surprise, to increase seating capacity, they have put the seats just at the entrance...i had to get up and leave for sometime as i was in way of all the travellers boarding the plane. Even couldnt seat properly after takeoff as hardly any space to stretch as crew were seating in front of me

title: Short & Sweet
text: The flight was on time. The seats were clean and the hostess were co-operative. The landing was smooth.

title: Poor service
text: Service was under the expectation even for the spice max booking .toilets were stinking .needs more improvemnt

title: Quick reach to HomeTown
text: Last time i flied on SpiceJet was in 2017 and i really hated it and decided never to take SpiceJet again. But had to take SpiceJet to attend Sissy‚Äôs wedding. But i was Super Impressed how Airline changed by looks, service, food, seats, seat accomodations and Cleanliness. I am an Hygiene Freakie by smell and looks. Loved their New Menu. Food was delicious i meam i had Nachos on airline and it was freaking delicious.

title: Aircraft interiors needs to be reconditioned and maintained.
text:
Tray tables were held in place with plasters. It could not be used. The adjacent table was rickety.
The hostesses were not customer friendly. One of them was even behaving a little rudely with a traveler.

title: Cash Stolen from Checked Bag
text:
1. How can the bag come without Ziplock which was applied after screeing?
2. Why the process of sending bag at airport belt was delayed unprecidently?
3. Why no one from Spice Jet was present on belt no 11
4. Whos responsibility it is, Airport authority or SpiceJet?
5. How can I get my money back?????
Please check on priority.

Regards,
Dr Rashmikant Shah

title: Worst experience
text: I had a very very bad experience with spice jet. I never recommended spice jet to any one. My flight was at 9:30 pm. As soon as I entered airport I got a message that it's postponed to 11:20. Within 5 mnts got 1 more message that it's postponed to 11:50. Finally 1 more message saying it's postponed to 12:50.I was travelling with my 3 year old son.They don't value our time.

title: Amazing experience !
text: Since was travelling solo, so got a wonderful seat that made the flight even more comfortable.. Spicejet has always been one of the favourite airlines to fly with.. very good in flight service. Check in & security was hassle free.

title: Spice jet really cares for the passenges
text:
Good service
quiet improved with the earlier reputation by this flight
dont prebook your meals and seats
As it was only the Jet airways which had the policy
to serve meals the pre booked ones
All other airline do not follow this policy, its irritatiing

title: Good airline
text: I flew with SpiceJet on a round trip from Delhi to Dharamshala and found their service to be efficient and professional and the flights comfortable. Would not hesitate to fly with them again in future.

title: Comfortable
text:
Take off and landing was well in time
Attentive staff
Safe travel. Good bitings
Seats comfortable Speedy luggage collection

title: Good Service
text: Flight got delayed and SPICE jet informed us just in the airport thereby wasted our two hours. Flight is good.

title: Flight attendant & Air hostess are very friendly and polite
text: Keep it up for your good work. It's a very good experience with Spicejet this is my 15 times flying with this airlines. I hope I will fly again with Spicejet where ever I travel

title: Fantastic
text:
The wonderful service which I got during my recent flight to Jaisalmer from Jaipur. It was indeed a lovely flight and Sarita Nair crew made it exceptional. I felt good and liked the way she handles the customers and gave the services. I keep flying on this route very often as I have my hotel in Jaisalmer but this flight was fantastic. 

I would like to thanks Sarita Nair and your team for such a  wonderful experience. During Conversations, I found her very knowledgeable in terms of her job and she is surely a credit to you guys.

title: Old broken Jet Airways aircraft used
text:
The flight was horrible. They are using an old Jet Airways (now defunct airline) aircraft which is in serious need of repairs. The table was not holding, the TV screen was broken and the inside was as if it was a vandalized aircraft.
I had to hold the table with one hand to eat my pre-ordered in-flight meal.
The return flight was the same aircraft and it soured my travel.
There was a sticker with the name SpiceJet on the outside of the aircraft to show that it was a Spicejet. I will never fly Spicejet again.

title: They will not turn on the AC until the plane takes off and is in the air ascending. Until then get ready to choke death
text:
Stingy pathetic airline. They don't turn on the AC until the aircraft takes off and is ascending. Had to wait in suffocation for 45 mins after boarding until the flight took off.

One of the worst ways of saving money by putting travelers lives at stake.

title: Return trip from Goa
text: Our return trip from Goa was a bit delayed, as we were taken to the international terminal it got further delayed due late arrival of checked in baggage. Overall spice jet is a professional airline the crew seems to be efficient and professional. i would highly recommend for less than three hour journey destinations.

title: Goa visit with close relatives
text: It was my first experience flying with Spicejet. A short flight from Mumbai to Goa. Staff was courteous right from ground to the cabin we reached the destination before time, it was very smooth flight a nice experience in a no frills airline ( Budget airline).

title: Amazing Service in Business Class
text:
I like to write. It it is bad then we do write, but for good things also we should appreciate. 

Today September 1st, I travelled 1st time in Business Class with Spice Jet Flight 6362 from Coimbatore to Mumbai with Seat No. 3F. 
Had an amazing experience. The flight cabin hostess Nitu Mousam Navraj Lamu (which I remember) were just great. There was a super team work amongst them. But most important the service which I as a Business Class passenger received was unforgettable. 
The hostess Nitu Mousum were highly professional and courteous. 
Thank You SPICE JET for making my 1st Business Class trip memorable.

title: delayed flight
text: Flight delayed and airlines has no regrets. As if it is okay if flights are delayed routinely for trivial reasons. Do you have any ethics in your business?

title: Hopeless Airline
text: Hopeless airline,Flight SG 3272 is delayed for 45 mints and the airlines has no courtesy to even inform their passenger,No communications ,Saurbh at 23 E has no clue whats happening,Never travel by Spicejet ,0 Athithi Debo Vabha.

title: The most successful scam airline of the country
text: I was traveling to Hyderabad from Guwahati. The flight was scheduled at 5:50pm. It got delayed to 10:10 pm. After waiting for around 3 hours they told that flight has been again delayed and now will leave at 11:05. A no of passenger were angry at them and we're demanding refreshments. To this SpiceJet representatives agreed that  refreshments are available at the boarding gate. But once we rachei there was nothing and not even a SpiceJet representative. We can't even call for someone as the security won't allow you to go back . When I called the customer care number,they told me that they can't do anything from there.

title: Highly unsatisfied and displeased
text: Highly unsatisfied and very displeased with how Spicejet has handled the situation with my luggage on a recent flight I took from Delhi to Mumbai. My baggage was withheld in Delhi for a prohibited item (coconut) and I was asked to sign an authorization letter so that they could unlock my bag and I did that before taking the flight from Delhi. As the boarding had almost finished they said my bag couldn't be sent on the flight I was taking but will surely be sent on the next flight which was at 3.50pm. I was also told that I will be contacted and informed about the same. At 6.05pm I was at the Mumbai airport trying to find out where my bag was and whether it had been sent from Delhi. I didnt get any communication what so ever from Spicejet. I went to the spicejet desk at Terminal 1 and they said bag had been received, went to Arrivals as suggested but bag was not found. I called customer care for spicejet and that guy, Navneet told me my bag was still in clearance in Delhi and that I needed to send the authorization letter so that it could be released. He gave me a WhatsApp number and I messaged the authorization letter again, getting no response still what so ever. I was again told my bag would be sent on the 8.30 or 8.50pm flight from Delhi and would reach Mumbai by 10.45pm but that didnt happen either. I called customer care again to check the status as still nothing was communicated from Spicejet. This time they told me bag had been cleared now and that it would be sent by the next flight and would reach at 1.45am and that I would be contacted the following morning about the status. I received no communication or information or any kind of status on where my bag is even till the next morning. My cousin who went to pick up the bag the next day again contacted the terminal staff in Mumbai but didnt get any confirmation on the bag, had to wait at the airport for 45 mins before he finally got my bag. My bag is now in the worst condition possible. It was a new bag that I had just purchased from Delhi and now it is all black and dirty from everywhere. This situation has been handled by Spicejet in the worst possible way. Mumbai staff was not aware of what's happening in Delhi and vice versa and asked me to communicate with either side, where it should have been taken care of by the Spicejet staff. I have never experienced such atrocity with any other airlines. Here on I will be making sure never to fly with Spicejet and want to recommend everyone of the same so that no one has to go through such an experience.

title: Very Convenient flight
text: absolutely perfect flight to travel Pune. very convenient time and very good service and on time departure and arrival

title: SpiceJet lacks spice
text: Imagine a budget airline charging you for seats. I was traveling with my wife and the airline staff told me that if I wanted free seats then I could not sit with my wife as free seats were only in the middle rows. I ended up paying 2,000/- extra for companion seats to ensure my wife was not uncomfortable during the flight and the extra monies I paid had exorbitantly priced sandwiches also included. Real rip off

title: Avoid this airline!!!
text: Really bad service from their office to the actual plane itself.  I had a mishap where my company misbooked the flight for the wrong day, the office admin and I went to the Spice Jet Office in Dhaka and they were absolutely useless.  It was surprising how incompetent and distant they were.  All I wanted to do was to change the day of the flight to a different day.  They suggested we call up the Spice Jet in India.  The irony was that I was in the Spice Jet office in Dhaka.  Why the Dhaka office couldn't call up the New Dehli office shows how uncoordinated and cheap this entire company is.    There was no offer to help nor did they allow us to use the phone to call up Spice Jet.  Seriously, what the hell?  I didn't have a sim card and the office admin was running low on his minutes, so we were forced to go back to the office and call up Spice Jet from there.  Thankfully, I was able to change my iternary to the right day.  When I got on the plane, I had to use the bathroom and the toilet seat had pee all over it.  It was disgusting.  (Since I used the bathroom before take off, I assume I was one of the first people to use that facility.  They didn't even clean it off.)  Although it was a 2.5 hour flight, it felt like eternity.  In the future, I would rather pay extra and fly another airline than to ever use SpiceJet again.  For all future travelers, considering using SpiceJet, it's a horrible, horrible airline.  No customer service, dirty, and cramped.

title: Worst airline service
text:
Worst airline ever. You should have stopped servicing back then. You don't deserve to be operating. 
Sh*ttest service. It gets delayed without prior notice. Customer care sucks. They don't respond and you have to call them multiple times to talk to them because they cut the call without listening. 
You suck SpiceJet. I don't even want to give 1 rating. 
Please objectifying your air hostess to attract customers. Please learn something from Vistara.

title: WORST AIRLINE I HAVE EVER FLOWN!!!
text:
We travel 11 months out of the year, so my husband and I do A LOT of flying with different airlines. During our 7 week Asia trip, we decided to fly from Bangkok to Delhi and then Delhi back to Bangkok. It was frustrating enough for them to screw us over on the way to India, but not surprisingly, they screwed us over AGAIN flying out of Delhi. 
We paid for first class, top of the line, Spice Max seats. For both flights, they "changed aircrafts" and sat us in basic economy. What we were trying to understand was...okay but we still paid for first class....so even though the aircraft is different, why can't we still be in first class? Their answer? THEY COULDN'T EVEN GIVE US ONE.
As if that wasn't bad enough, the lady working the priority counter at the Delhi airport for our flight back to Bangkok was extremely rude. Like, the worst service I have ever experienced in any airline. I tried explaining our situation to her several times and she would not ever let me even get a single word out. She constantly interrupted me, refused to answer my questions and raised her voice at me when I never once raised mine at her. She was clearly unprofessional and inexperienced in the service business. I wish I could have grabbed her name, but I was so upset in the moment that I didn't even bother to look at her name tag. But, if SpiceJet reads this, she was working at the priority counter at 1:00 PM on August 25th. 
I normally hate calling people out, but it was such an upsetting experience working with her. 
WE WILL NEVER FLY SPICEJET EVER AGAIN!!! And we will tell all of our friends visiting India to NEVER fly with SpiceJet. What a horrible, unreliable, poor-serviced airline.

title: A carrier to travel from point A to B
text:
Its a 2 x 2 Bombardier aircraft hence small with not much space to move. Cabin crew was expressionless, not even fake airline smile : (   
Most of the cabin announcements were inaudible, could't make out what she was trying to say.

title: Crew member preetha
text: I got a excellent service from SpiceJet crew member preetha she give excellent service with the smiling face I like to travel again and again in SpiceJet because of her

title: Bad service guaranteed, from web check-in till you leave the destination aiport
text:
SpiceJet is excellent at giving you a BAD experience.
From begining to end you will be dissatisfied and left irritated.
The web check-in fails often, the physical check in counter is not easily available nor any instructions on where to go.
The staff is quite "no effs given" In attitude so don't expect any actual help. And if given help its you who needs to put the effort.
The planes are not the best or even just good ones. They seem too old for 2019.
Inflight servic is alright. Staff has the same attitude in the air as on the ground.
If your bag is detained, don't expect them to let you know. You'll have to find out yourself, and they'll do little to help besides bring the bag to th city later for you to pick up 
No inflight internet
Overall terrible service and experience.
Would highly not recommend

title: Worst experience in spicejet
text:
worst inflight service.i think there was less crew to serve  , since number of passengers were more.even for a glass of water we had to call the attendent too many times.

flight was late and was not neat and clean.

title: OK airline as a last option. Would not recommend over other options
text: I took several Spicejet flights in the last couple of years. One consistency I noticed is : they are consistently late and their planes are older.  Prices are cheaper though. I guess you get what you pay for. They do have several flights and options to choose from. So, no matter how much I resist, I still end up flying with them for timing or pricing reasons.  My first pref is IndiGo. On a recent Spicejet flight from Hyd to Tir on 16/8/2019, I noticed a window scotch taped up (see pic). Is it safe to fly ? Is it air worthy ? Who approved scotch taping it and going to 30000 ft ?  I know what happens when a window breaks at 30000 ft. If the things you can see are like this, how about those that you can't see like aircraft maintenance ?

title: Never on time
text:
My flight from kolkata to bagdogra was delayed for over 2 hours. there was no the definitive announcement from the staff members at airport. Announcement was sporadic and never bothered to tell the actual time or reason for delay.
Indigo provides free snack box if flight is delayed over 1 hr, but not by spicejet

title: Worst crew ever worst chekin stafff
text: My flight was to depart at 4 35 pm ..i was at airport by 3 30 i was at counter by 3 45 after tryi  my luck with their highly unstable kiosks..n guess what they didn't allow me to.checkin....45 mins before they were not allowing to.chekin when she mentions passengers are getting board..n what else i was there for?? She was not talking me on my face and wasnt just accepting... The worst of all crew..

title: Must Avoid
text:
Frequnt cancellation of flights, change of connecting flight and delays of flight. And if this is not less then, poor and misbehaving staffs.
All together, a worst experience. Never use this company flight for your Air travel.

title: Very unpleasant experience
text:
I had to travel to Chennai with an infant and the service provided was very pathetic.
Please find below few things which made my journey troublesome.
1 The flight was delayed for more than an hour 
2.there was no space left on top for the hand luggage storage and had to keep it stuffed besides and under the chair ,and no help was provided from the crew for managing this.
3.the attitude of crew members were very unprofessional.
4.No instructions were shared for infant care,which was not the case when I travelled in other flights
5. Air conditioning was absolutely zero, till takeoff and the passengers were literally sweating inside
6. Space was too less that I was unable to open the food tray with infant on my lap 
7.Too much jerking and shaking while takeoff and landing

Surely would double think before booking a SpiceJet flight again and will not recommend it to anyone else.

title: Flight delay by 3 hrs
text:
I booked spice jet ticket for today sunday 18th aug2019 evening. After passing through 2 hrs lengthy process of security check I came to know the flight is delated by 3 hrs. My monday all planning is failed.  I will have to avail unsafe late night uber taxi.  I will not be able to go office.  My daughter is sleepy but could not sleep due to unavailability of space. Conditions is so pathetic and there is nobody from spice jet go support.  
There is no delay in any other flight schedule. It is unexpected poor service.

title: SpiceBiz (BKK to BOM)
text: Overall the service for this flight was alright for its price compared to other competitors (Thai Airways and Air India). The only issue I faced were the seats as they didn't recline to the full extent so it was a bit hard to sleep but I managed it of. I would not mind flying with them again since they were cheap but the sad part was that there was no lounge access in Bangkok. However, I believe they should revamp the jet airways seats business class and upgrade their standards when it comes to customer service.

title: Horrible exp with spicejet
text: Waste of time... Poor service.. Not attending on board passangers on time.. Smell in flight.. Unnecessary and lazy staff

title: Delayed flight; tired old 737
text:
The flight was delayed from DXB.
The 737 had a tired cabin but was clean enough.
As it was a night flight, there was little service to report on.
A very average flight.

title: Utterly disastrous service
text:
An utterly terrible experience.  My baggage was removed from the plane along with several other passengers'.  We were only informed about this after we had waited at the baggage rack for an hour in Dubai.  This was at 12PM.

Thereafter, we were told to come back at 3PM as our baggage would be flown in by then.  Even though SpiceJet caused the issue, they refused to have our baggage delivered AND they refused to compensate for costs to go to and from the airport (which is quite high in Dubai).

When I got back to the airport to pick up my baggage at 3, they delayed further and we waited until 4:30-5 to get our luggage.  The SpiceJet manager at Dubai airport refused to speak to us and was literally hiding in the SpiceJet office.

Look, these things happen, but it is the airline's responsibility to do everything it can to ensure no further trouble/inconvenience is caused.  I have never had such a disgusting experience with any other airline and will never, ever travel with SpiceJet ever again.

title: Overstaffed yet very slow
text:
Took a flight from Bhopal to Udaipur. As soon as you enter the airport the fun starts. They scan all your luggage with an x-ray machine. There are 4 or 5 employees sitting in front of that machine just for scanning, incredible. Since they are bored with their job they feel obliged to bother you with your luggage content. In spite of them being so many, the process is very slow. Same story at the counter, unbelievably slow. After you pass the security check, spicejet still feels they need to check your luggage just before boarding. Lol. They are concerned so much with passengers but not with cars parked anarchically just in front of the airport, amazing.
Overall a cheap overzealous company with overmanned staff.

title: enjoyable..
text: enjoyed throughout with some breath taking view, could have helped better if the PA was used to identify some of the cliffs.

title: Exceptional Legroom and Very comfortable Seats
text:
It was a real surprise to find exceptional Legroom and very comfortable seats in the economy class. 
When compared to my trip on same route on a indigo flight it was really pleasant

title: Not so good
text:
Firsr time in small plane but washroom seem to be very compact. dreadful experience. But got window seat
.

title: Decent
text: I had a decent flying experience with spicejet on my Mumbai - Goa return trip. The seats at the back are a bit cramped and the cabin was a bit noisy. Leg room was decent enough for a 5 foot 6 inches man like me. The best part was that the flights were on time

title: Nice Flight
text: the plane looks new, clean and relieved legroom, fast boarding, on time no delay, nice flight attendant

title: Great Service
text:
We were at the start of our 36hrs overseas trip with a year old baby. Flight was fully booked and our baby wasn't well, have been vomiting at the boarding gate. One of your Staff member "Pratit Kumar" noticed us. Since business class was almost empty, upon request he was kind enough for an upgrade. 

We were sincerly thankful to him for his empathy. He appeared to be a life saver for us.  He's an awesome person doing a great job !

title: Flown with it twice and always right.
text: I first flew Spice Jet in August 2014. Back then I had no issues whatsoever: ontime flights, quick check in, on board snack, no problem with my luggage. Upon reading so many bad reviews online, I hesitated quite a bit. I asked a few Indians about it and they assured me that most of the time Spice Jet is just fine. So, I bought my ticket online, no issues at all. Quick confirmation via email and even WhatsApp! The proof is on the pudding, on the day of my flight everything went smooth, as back in 2014: no problems at all, though the snacks are no longer free! Very nice staff at all points of the flying experience. I hope that more travelers have an analogous experience like mine, because I think Spice Jet has a lot to offer. I hope the airline listens and follows up with customer complaints to become a better carrier each day. All the best to Spice Jet employees.

title: Domestic trip in India
text:
Buying a ticket online is very easy, payment rather time consuming. Check-in was very good at the Spice Max/Spice Club desk. Luggage well marked and checked. Boarding als at this airport is chaotic and no Priority status kept, although paid for.
Seat 1A has little less legroom, but still ok. Service on board is just average. When the purser/steward requests for putting our mobiles on Airplane Mode, he sits down afterwards, and just for take off just opens his mobile again...
Heavy Monsoons rains during this time of the year and then no protection arranged at the plane entry/stairs, so all the rain inside the plane and most passengers wet.

title: Delay in services
text: Spicejet flights are not on time. I faced delay of 2 hours both from Bombay to Coimbatore and back  Indigo Airlines service is best, they are on time. I observed that Indigo flight from coimbatore left on time whereas spicejet flight by 2 hours.

title: Punctuality
text: Never leaves on time and no proper information regarding delay. After every given ,gets further delayed .passengers are stranded and confused.Appears like that of a railway station.

title: Good Budget Travel
text:
Traveled so many times in Spice Jet. I considered spice jet as one of best low-cost airline in India. While travelling from Delhi to Mumbai i found the flight was very stable despite of poor weather out side. The way pilot handled the flight was truly appreciable.
Leg room was good, seats are comfortable enough for a short journey. Crew members were little slow in handling passengers queries. Overall experience was really good.

title: before time!!!!
text: despite bad weather all through our flight, the plane was quite stable, on top of it, during peak time in Mumbai, we reached 30 minutes before scheduled arrival. Kudos to crew and off course ATC for allowing us to land without much go around

title: An average airline travel
text: It was an average flight journey. from the check-in counter to the staff wasn't acted politely they are not given any guidance to us.  even not informing us the gate number also. and crew also not contacting with us

title: Worst Flight Experience!!
text:
Booked SpiceJet air tickets for my mother in the last minute as there was some family emergency in Hyderabad. There were no suitable flights in other airline services which we normally travel frequently like Air India or IndiGo....So forcebly i had to book air tickets for her in SpiceJet....She was travelling alone and to my shock she had a worst experience ever!!! I wish me or family would have traveled with her, so that she wouldn't have faced any inconvenience. So now, i am going to jot down the points as to what are the inconveniences and trouble she had while travelling in SpiceJet flight i.e. from Bangalore to Hyderabad during 2019:
1. Shortage of wheelchairs and staff negligence/careless behavior to help senior citizen like my mother who needed assistance
2. Constant reminders and follow up to the check in counter to allocate wheelchair as they made her walk from entrance till boarding pass issue counter
3. Instead of arranging wheelchair, they asked my mother to walk till boarding the flight as there was a shortage of wheelchair without even asking her medical condition
4.Non professional behavior of the cabin crew and wheelchair boy to assist senior citizens, not even apologetic to the flyer for their flaws
5. Untidy seats and again constant reminders to provide wheelchair once landed the destination. I would warn and request everyone those who are challenged or senior citizens who opts for wheelchair to travel in SpiceJet at their OWN RISK.

Thumbs down to the management for not realizing their mistakes and hiring some stupid manner-less staffs. Please improve your services else, your business will be shut down too in the near future.

title: Stranded without luggage
text: We arrived in PNQ from DXB on 4th Aug & aft an hour were informed our luggage will arrive after 3 to 4 days. It's been 2 days we are stranded without our basic necessities in Pune and have to buy everything. Spicejet isn't taking responsibility for this inconvenience nor offering any assistance or compensation for this. This is not my story but also the story of 26 other passengers who traveled that night from DXB to PNQ. The worst experience  Spicejet needs to compensate all the passengers for the inconvenience they have put us through and bear our expenses for clothes and other necessities.

title: Ok only SG-83
text:
Well this flight CCU to BKK will be delayed by 20mins average. If you are planning to ctch the next flight from Bangkok to Phuket then its 100% sure that you will miss the fligh. If you are carrying an evisa then there is a chance to catch the next vet jet flight to Phuket. Your whole journey to BKK will be mentally tortured as the Spicejet will flight 20mins late only.

So friends if you want an easy travel then you may avoid these scheduled flights.

title: Worse Airline ever
text:
I took two flights with Spiceje and both had 4 hours delay! One of them becuase of...
Problems with the engine! 

During the waiting we didn't know neither if the flight was going to be cancelled or how long was going to result the delay.

Ok. I can stand all this. What it is a completely shame is that they don't want to take responsibility of our several flights and hotels lost because of the delays, valued in 14.128 INR!

They offer me a voucher of 1.000 INR... valid 90 days. Common I don't even live in India! They are kidding me.

I don't recommend this airline to anybody who 
1. Values its life and 
2. Values its money.

Worse experience is impossible.

title: Worst Flight Service.
text: SpiceJet has a reputation for delaying flights and cancelling them without providing any particular reason. Their customer care lines are absolutely useless. Me and my family have experienced such troubles since April 2019. Try as much as possible to use any airline other than SpiceJet.

title: Worst ever journey
text:
Orignal time for flight was 22:45 than got delayed till 3:40 in the morning Than at 12 o clock they said that flight will be going at 10:30 in the morning than soon after we got told that it has been delayed till 12;10 n than they updated to 2;30 in the afternoon asked them but got told they can't help with any food or room stay or even a couch.First time i'm travelling with spice jet it taken me off the hook from this flight. We had to spend around 15 to 17 hours on the airport without helping us with any food or accomodation.

Worst Worst ever journey.

title: uncomfortable
text: The flights were delayed for more than 4 hours and there was no facilities for passengers strayed at the small airport at Shirdi . Later on board  the passengers were compensated with veg rice bowls and water bottles but no spoons and not even tissues to have rice easily . such a noisy aircraft .

title: Cheap flight to international destination
text: SG-82 checking start exactly 3 hrs  which creates the long que at checking counter at BKK this is practice of the Suvarnabhumi now a days rest checking and boarding process is smooth in flight menu chargeable basis is good even if missed to booked the meal in advance.

title: Good Small Aircraft Flight
text: Nice small aircraft with a good name "imli" of the Plane which is rather thoughtful. Although the seats are a bit uncomfortable and leg space very less due to the plane's small size but crew is nice and the warmth in welcome is felt. The timings are ok and the flight is on time.

title: On time arrival with good service
text:
It was raining and was expected to be delayed on departure. Still we reached Ahmedabad on time. Good overall experience on board of an ATR plane. It is small plane with 76 seats. Service was excellent and food was good(pre-booked). 
Worth flying back by this flight.

title: They are thieves! They opened my checkin luggage and stole my stuff from Ahmedabad-Dubai flight. SG-15
text:
I was traveling on a SpiceJet flight SG-15 from Ahmedabad to Dubai on 26th July 2019. When I checked in, the airport staff had put a white SpiceJet strip on my bag. The on flight crew were Neelam, Dipika, Eteisile and Xavier. 

After landing in Dubai, I see that there is no strip on the bag. However, I think that it might have been removed by the Dubai airport authorities but I was wrong. When I reached the hotel in Dubai and opened my bag, I saw that my bag had been opened at the airport! All my clothes were a mess, my bag of toiletries was open and cash was stolen!

It is a clear sign of theft from the SpiceJet team. I have been trying to contact the customer executives, the nodal officer and the SpiceJet team but there is no response. I have traveled across the world but have never had such a bad experience in the past. All I request is for you to check the CCTV footage and you will clearly notice what I am saying. In addition to the absence of leg room, in flight entertainment and horrible food quality, this is something nobody expects from a reputed airlines. Have sent them 6 mails but not heard anything yet. Have tweeted them but nothing. 

Guys, avoid the airlines. There are many other low-cost carriers you can choose for your journey. They will at least keep your belongings safe and secure. Horrible experience with SpiceJet.

title: A great Spicejet Experience
text: Had an excellent experience on Spicjet flying from Delhi to Dhaka via Kolkata from a very smooth check in to a nice inflight service including a delicious breakfast and good lunch (served on a 35 mnt Kolkata Dhaka flight.Baggage delivery was a bit slow in Dhaka more due to the airport infrastructure.All together a wonderful experience.

title: Pathetic service, pathetic airline...Horrible experience
text:
Horrible experience flying Spice Jet from Dubai to Delhi. Please don't choose this airline.
1) Airline is delayed 3 hours...SG-12
2) Flight is packed with workers...not suitable for families...
3) Uncomfortable seats
4) Spice Jet offloaded our baggage without informing us so my wife waited over 2 hours at the belt only to be told that baggage will come with next day
5) Horrible experience. Will never fly spice jet again

title: SpiceJet Max Service
text:
Was lucky to get upgraded to the famed Spice Max. Thankful for that. We could look at a few improvements that could make a leap of improvement in the service. 
1. Better trained crew in serving with PAx‚Äôs. Esp on laying the table. The cutlery was reverse, the food bowls were towards the passengers etc 
2. Food which is usually good, was average. The bread was really hard and food very bland
3. The temperature was cold for most of the flight. Can be maintained better. My co-passengers and one sitting ahead also complained 

They were courteous though !

title: Pathetic Service
text: had a meal pre-booked as mine was a corporate booking  I was seated in 27F and the staff were just wasting their time, in fact in Seat 26 and 28 they spent around 10 to 15 minutes in handing over the meals. over and above that they were more concerned in chatting with some of their colleagues who were sitting in Seat No. 29 B,C,D and E rather than attending to regular passengers. Just 15 minutes prior to landing an Air-Hostess comes to ask if I wanted anything in a very casual manner clearly indicating total lack of concern. End result was I was not given my meal and none of them had the courtesy of apologizing. while getting down when i spoke to lead, just a informal sorry was what i got. -- Its really pathetic that even after paying had to fly hungry, the staff rather than attending to customers were more interested in their colleagues and attending to people who are paying rather than customers who have pre-booked. - Really Really Bad

title: No frill, no space. Will get you there
text:
We got return tickets for 19k inr, so cant complain much. It's a neat clean flight, but yes seat are cramp and small, in 4 hrs u you just might manage to reach without pain, but discomfort yes. 
Carry your own eating, that makes more sense.  Toy do have few eating offerings.  No in fight entrainment. So use your mobile. 
It been cheap flight, be ready for rustic co passengers, mostly tour operators. Had bad crowd both ways, couldn't sleep.

title: after being loyal to jet I was told that spice is super
text: I was expecting an excellent service based on peoples comments. not so. I was booked on a spiceMAX ticket. the breakfast served was average. it takes great diligence to eat bhurji from a flat wooden spoon. the flight was 20 mins late, no information on screens, till we reach gate at boarding time, then they suddenly announced the 20 min delay. at the checkin there was nobody manning the spice max / business counter, came shortly though. priority checkin I was allowed first on gate but as the aircraft still had cleaning personnel on, I was asked to wait 10mins at the aircraft door. and to make matters worse the overhead air vents didn't work, so made for a very warm flight. also the guy at counter would just point upwards when asked if flight was delayed?

title: Pathetic flight and services
text:
SPICEJET is most pathetic, customer harassing and poorest airline I have ever experienced. On my flight from Dubai to India following happened -

1. The crew kept 3-4 weighing machine to weigh each and every bag going into airline and customers were charged for each Kg of extra luggage above 7 kg.

2. Only airline which counts duty free shopping within the 7 kg cabin luggage. Every passenger was surprised by this behavior and even Dubai Airport Employees mentioned that they have seen nothing like this ever before.

3. There was a complete outage of Air conditioning for 1 hour inside the plane. The pilot acknowledged the same but said he is unable to do anything. The funniest thing he said that the temperature will go down once we fly and reach heights. 

Only Airline which depends on external weather for cooling instead on its own cooling system.

4. The crew started shouting and behaved very arrogantly when passengers complained about the same.

5. Every piece of food was sold and nothing complimentary with ticket.

title: Pathetic service
text:
The flight was delayed for 4 hours without any explanations.even after 4 hours we are still waiting for light
The bar code in the tickets failed to pass the security gate neat immigration clearance causing  confusion
An empty Airbus with spice jet logo was seen parading across the flying zone causing irritation.
Horrible delay

title: Avoid this airlines as long as you can! Horrible!
text:
I had booked flights for 18th July from Jaipur to Udaipur. We had very horrible experience with SpiceJet customer service. Our flight was delayed. Customer service was so unprofessional as they did not inform customers will flight be cancelled because of some technical problem or can we still fly after getting problem fixed. They just told us always, they will inform later but nobody came to inform. People who had booked ticket for this flight, were so frustrated and angry about service. In the end our flight was late around 2 hours.

Really if possible, avoid this airlines as long as you can! I'm not going to use SpiceJet anymore in future. Horrible customer service as nobody cares. This airlines is good for ruining plans. 

SpiceJet doesn't even deserve one star!

title: Cheating
text:
The airline mobile application having glitches, have reported this several times,the I app does not complete transaction, all the times. Within few minutes, the call center agent calling and admitted of having glitch, sending the payment link of the same booking.  While processing the payment, the airline charges more than the confirmation received.  When reported, the templates answer.
Even paid for the seat and meal combo, SpiceMax, the meal not offered, the Pax list not showing details. Having shown the confirmation to the cabin crew she refused to look at it.  When reported this the so called customer care office, not even apologetic, but just responded that will refund the meal amount of $5.00, which is just a promise but never refunded.

This is not an exceptional case it happens often and airline has no respect.
It operates only for blue collar?  Such work attitude will not last longer.  Every dog has his days.

title: Flight delayed
text:
Flight SG60 , 23rd July, was delayed by 3 hrs due to air conditioning issue and didn‚Äôt even provided any food or water. Passengers were seated inside for the whole time.
There was no consideration for senior citizen

title: Poor substitute for Jet
text: Aircraft was old and shabby. torn seats and non existing air conditioning. boarding process in CCU was disorganised and i was not offered a replacement meal for my prebooked cold meal and had to purchase an alternative

title: Spice Jet - average airlines to fly with
text:
Spice Jet is just an average airlines to fly with. 14 Years back when I took spice Jet flight from Del - Mum - Del sector, it was much better than other airlines at that time. With time, It failed to maintain its standard. 
Although on Goa - Delhi route, they operate with a bigger aircraft. But they need to work on their crew, food and cleanliness.

title: Just A Comfortable Flight
text: The flight from Delhi to Bagdogra was comfortable except some issues like the waiting time in the aircraft at Delhi was very uncomfortable due to the Aircondionting of Aircraft not working. The seats were not comfortable as pushback system seemed to be not working and Aircraft was old which needed upgradation. Although the staff was nice rest services if airline was also satisfactory.

title: nightmare with spicejet
text:
Hi

I was traveling from dubai to chennai transit delhi.I had such a nightmarish experience.First at the check in counter when i asked for a seat next to a lady i met with a rude reply that we do not do that.when i said other airlines do it she  said we do not do that.then she called out to the guy next to her and that guy also started saying the same thing i said give me my boarding pass i will not travel in this airline again.The guy started calling out to the supervisor saying the passenger is screaming . iwas shocked i was not screraming or shouting.it was a lie .the supervisor came i said give me my pass i want to leave he started telling me all stories.it was so infuriating .worst customer service and the guy wanted doing the check in was on purpose trying to create a scene whereas i just wanted my boarding pass.my pnr number is EFUB8U.the lady was rude but the guy sitting next to her was horrible .lying that i am shouting when that was not the case.I will not travel in spicejet again after this experience

title: SG 530, Chennai- Pune early morning.
text:
As ever, one is forced to shell out money even to pick a middle seat in back rows, merely to web check-in. Despite the web checkin by paying for a poor seat,I had to wait for printing my boarding pass as the checkin machines didn't work. 
The boarding was chaotic, confusing and anxious for many. The gate assigned to Pune flight was used by the Bagdogra flight, but the digital displays were otherwise. In an era were people are glued to mobile phones, how would the hailing ( rather yelling)  at the gate to attract the attention of passengers to the gate work  ? The poor infrastructure of Chennai airport to run such simple digital displays is appalling. 
The flight was almost ontime , landed in Pune close to ontime and was uneventful.

title: The worst of the airline I could choose!!!! WWOORRSSTT!!!!
text:
Best in ruining plans.
Worst in customer experience.
Anyway their market reputation is zero, travelling in another level, people don't even want to work with such pathetic airline. How could you guys even exist in this industry.
So many other better options in terms of faith, value for money, customer delight and what not.
I am still waiting for your management to intervene for the cancelled flight SG-1005 Pondicherry to Hyderabad on 4th May 2019 as I had connecting flights to Ahmedabad and Delhi afterwards. 
Now, not only for the other flights, I want  the compensation for my office leave as because of you guys I have to take a day off because of the canceled flight. 
And also teach Nishu Chaturvedi (Customer Experience team) some email etiquettes.

title: Spicejet redefines lack of customer service and hospitality
text: Checkin at Dhaka airport was a nightmare with the counter staff taking between 8-10 minutes to check in each passenger and only two counters operational. When I enquired about the slow pace (redefining glacial) I was advised they were operating slowly due to VIP traffic! Couldn't have anticipated a more bizarre response! Advised that the flight was on schedule I then found to my dismay it was delayed by an hour, with no intimation forthcoming on the display panels or indeed from the airport staff. Never to be repeated experience!

title: Very bad experience
text:
Very bad service never travel with spice jet 
They don‚Äôt even deserve one star, no customer service, worstexperience

title: Harrowing Experience
text:
I was booked on above filght on 18th July Evening, the flights scheduled time is 6.35PM and I received a SMS and a call at around 3.00PM saying the flight is rescheduled to 9.00PM obviously I had started off to airport from Noida to reach on time. After a long wait of 4 hours at the airport again a reschedule was flashed for 9.45PM this time no personal communication was done like a a message or email. 

Though I was book on Spicemax the flight arranged by Spicejet had no special seats and inspite of our additional payment we were forced to sit in the normal three in a row , on asking the staff for a complaint book the same was not provided.Nor anyone tried to pacify the disgruntled customers who had paid for spicemax seats

I accept that delays do happen but this approach was completely unacceptable

title: Unprofessional and unethical behavior encountered while checkin - Patna Airport
text:
Pledged not to use SpiceJet ever again, did a mistake.

July 19th - SG 732, boarded at Patna Airport, had two 16 kg checkin bag and 9 kg carry on bag when we weigh our bags at the airport. 

I agreed to pay for the extras even we weigh few kgs less at home. No hassle.

Then I was asked to pay for my laptop bag weight as well, which was unjustifiable. Never ever I paid for my laptop bag as an extra carry on bag in last 10 years. No other flights charge such an extra bag fee.

I agreed to pay for the laptop bag as well, but asked the spicejet staff their IDs which they declined to provide, they get all our informations and unwilling to provide their IDs, which would help me to streamline complaint against them. Our co-passengers were too carrying carry on bag above 10 kgs, but we're singled out.

They even said, it's BIHAR we do what we want here.

Their names
1. Divya Nandani
2. Praveen Singh

and their boss - Wasim

It's a terrible experience in last 10 years. NO SPICEJET again in future for me and my friends and family.

title: Flight experience
text: Experience was ok. Cabin crew were courteous.They served and beverages on time.Some had kind words to passengers. Both Pilot and Lady co Pilot were courteous and willing to show the cockpit after landing. The most horrible part was  their timings, they never acknowledge that their flight is delayed they keep displaying on the board as if it is on time. Our flight was more than an hour late and no apologies from any one. I guess too much over confidence or arrogance

title: worst in flight services
text:
While I was traveling with Spicjet with PNR: BGRFRE

We tried to call flight attendant many time for water however the y did not response to us and never provided the water, we also push the help button for the same however there was no response from there end.

title: Perfect Flying
text:
As per our good luck, we found everything in order. The Flight was on perfect time.
Good treatment at the check-in counter, sufficient guidance, no hassles in boarding. Had a comfortable flight.

title: Horrible
text:
There seats were dirty and bad smell in the entire cabin. I also had another flight from Jammu to Delhi. That was the scariest one ever. And same problems there as well spiders and flies in the cabin. Only snake was missing that‚Äôs probably there too. 
The worst part was my son left his GoPro in the seat pocket so I told the bus driver rite away and he send me to the spice jet office in the arrival section in Delhi, There were 2 girls working and they gave me THE WORST service ever.  They told me the camera is not there and so they can not do anything. I showed the pic on my phone where my son was holding the bag in his hand in his seat. They were so rude and and no manner to talk to customer. It‚Äôs nightmare talking to them. They simply told me to get out of here and they are the boss so leave. I asked for the supervisor number they won‚Äôt give me. 
I will never fly again with SpiceJet that‚Äôs for sure .

title: SpiceJet-should be renamed as Delayjet....
text:
The never on time SpiceJet should rename themselves to match their service ..... horrible waiting hours.... usual of them....wasted a day at destination..... reached early but all in vain.
Never travel spice jet...they are good for nothing.

title: Flight delayed more then 1 hour. Missed connecting flight. never got reply from custrelations.
text:
I had very bad experience with Spicejet. It depart on right time from Dubai but got delayed more then one hour.I missed my connecting flight. staff told they will help me to catch my connecting flight. no buddy help.The next flight was next day . After losing my flight I went to spice jet counter and explain every thing they really NOT USER friendly. They don't know how to talk to their guest. Then  I wrote 5 to 6 emails to their customer relations no reply from them.

Their customer support and communication media is WORSTTTT....

title: Worst experience
text:
Worst experience i have had with spice jet SG 161 jammu Delhi flight. First message came that flight is delayed from 13.25 to 14.40 but when we went to check in, we were told that its further delayed till 17.55.
We were promised to provide meal due to delay but we had to ask many time as if we are beggar and asking from counter staff.further message recieved that flight terminal is also changed at Delhi airport from T1D to T2 but my next flight is SG 143 from T1D. This is more pathetic as i will have to change airport terminal also and when same was asked ground staff at jammu, we were simply told that it will 10min changing through shuttle. It is very easy to say but difficult to go from here to there when you have next flight at 9pm. This review is being written while still sitting at jammu airport waiting for flight.

title: Pleasantly surprised
text: I was a little skeptical booking because of the poor reviews I read but it turned out to be a great experience. You get what you pay for. It‚Äôs not luxury flying but it did its job of getting me safely from point A to point B (nearly on time). Spice Jet had the best times (for me) and the best price so overall it was a success! Yes the seats are older and you don‚Äôt get food/drink service included but I knew that in advance and wasn‚Äôt expecting it with the budget price.  I would definitely fly again with them and recommend it to friends. Thanks SpiceJet!

title: Flight 3022 constantly delayed
text:
Booked Spicejet SG3022 (CJB to MAA) as departure time 8:40 pm was suitable. Received message a day before that flight delayed by 2hrs and another one the next day that it was delayed by another 2 hrs. Flight departed only at 12 am - almost 3.5 hr delay. When I check the flight history , I get to know that this flight has been delayed from Coimbatore by 3.5 hrs almost every day for last month. 
Airline has to change the schedule instead of misleading customers to pay more for 8:40 pm flights but delay take-offs. If you know you have an operational issue - why do you take us for a ride?
