I would rather book another airline that leaves at scheduled by paying extra instead of being misled and made to wait 4 hrs at the airport!

title: Pretty good airline but need to focus more on leg space
text: Pretty happy with the way self-check In process but couldn‚Äôt really find a seat with the leg space. But when I asked at the counter for a seat with leg space  to my surprise I was told that I have to pay extra for that which I did not really like it and was also not informed at the time of booking. The boarding process was also hassle free but while I was seated in the aircraft it was really inconvenient and I felt really uncomfortable for 1 hour and 30 minutes but the best part of all this was the captain that we reached the destination 30 min before arrival time. Also a big shoutout to the cabin crew who was at the best with service for such an early morning flight.

title: Flight from Bagdogra to Mumbai
text: Flight timings from Bagdogra to Mumbai are very early so you have to reach Siliguri one day in advance so you have to take one more holiday

title: visit to Sikkim and Darjeeling
text: For going to Sikkim Darjeeling side from Mumbai Spice Jet timings are quite convenient it reaches Bagdogra at 8.15 am and from there to Gangtok is 4 hours and to Darjeeling is 3 hours so you can utilise that day for local travelling

title: RELIABLE SERVICE AND SUPPORT STAFF
text:
I am writing this on behalf of Mr. Sagar Nagpal . I would like to thank Mr. Ashwini Nambiar for being a helpful service provider and i would want to thank him for making my flight journey a success and hustlefree.
Thumbs up and Five stars to his support and service.

title: OVERWHELMING SERVICE
text: i am writing this on behalf of Mr. Sagar Nagpal. i would like to give 5 stars to the service by Mr. Adhunik and Miss.Sonali ( spice jet staff) . Their wonderful service made my trip  full of utmost comfort and joy. I would like to recommend them to all the travellers who seek high class service.

title: On time with a very efficient crew.
text:
The flight boarded, took off and landed on time.

The on-board crew was extremely professional and super efficient. Had a great flight!

Also, the food served was delicious!

title: Come back to work place
text: Great filght and great staff but timing would be great. If will fly early so people can do utilize thire hole day. They will drop u at 2:30 your all day has been stuck. But over all you have great flight.

title: Most unreliable service
text: 2nd time in a month where a delayed flight was not notified. I have already suffered losses by rebooking international connections because of SpiceJet. This will probably be the last flight I'm taking from them and will take an Indigo flight even if it is couple of hours early.

title: Travel safe not cheap
text:
Worst experience ever. I tried this airlines thrice and everytime i had the worst of the worst experience. They charge you even for a kilo that may exceed in your bag. As when it comes to looting money they are on the top but by the time it comes to deliver value for that money, baby they are long gone. Yesterday they lost baggage of around 30+ passengers traveling from Leh-Delhi and they made an excuse of fuel compromisation; hence can't ship the luggage. What they think we are, dumb of the dumbest. How other airlines fly, with all the passengers along with fuel, cargo and most importantly with customers luggage. Just because my bag wasn't shipped, i had to buy all new sets of clothing and accessories. But what about my documents that i can't buy. Don't fly cheap just fly safe for couple hundred rupees.
I think this is my last trip with spice jet.
If you wish to avoid trouble then just blacklist Spice-Jet from your choice. 
I'll be just glad if I just receive my bag.
I'll post either way even if i don't receive any.

title: Feeling scared
text:
My friend and I booked a flight scheduled for July 9, 2019.  This is SpiceJet's daily flight to Jaipur from Dehradun.  It was suddenly cancelled after we waited an extra hour for boarding.  Technical difficulties.  One of the attendants explained positively that in the last six months this is only the second time that this flight has been cancelled.  What!  It is not ever acceptable to cancel a flight.  People miss weddings and other important events.  What was wrong with the plane?  I'm left wondering about the condition of the planes that SpiceJet uses.  Are they too old?

My hats off to the technical crew in having the courage to declare the plane unsafe to fly.

title: SpiceJet
text: Pathetic flight . Ac not working . No information about delay no information. About gate change unprofessional staff

title: Pathetic Service
text: Took an hour of waiting just to have us board the flight, sending passengers in rows of 10's, and the ones boarding last had seats in front but had to cross the entire aircraft to store overhead luggage. No support from arrogant staff. Unfortunately I have return ticket also booked with them. But this is the last time I have booked a ticket from them

title: Decent flight, old aircraft
text:
The check-in experience was pretty ok. the flight was full. the boarding process was well-structured & pretty hassle-free. good job to airline there. the actual aircraft was pretty old & the interior seemed dated as well. the seats can be a little cleaner but nothing to complain in specific. the legroom was pretty tight, which can definitely be improved.

 the trip was on schedule so good job there as well.

title: Lovely Crew
text: I was pleasantly surprised with the crew and staff. It was a great flight. The ground handling was good and quick. Best was the on board experience with crew polite, friendly and nice.

title: Great service by Palash.
text: Although leg space is very less but the cabin crew is excellent. Soft spoken firm and service oriented. Special mention of Palash great person. Will help you with everything. Thanks Palash for the memorable moment.

title: Breathless
text: This flight was in the afternoon and it was a sweltering 33 degrees hot and humid.  the airline did not even switch on the fan inside till it took off which is a good 20 minutes. people were using the magazines as a fan.  Pitiable these airlines take the passengers for granted.  It is nauseating inside the craft without ac.

title: Avoid this carrier!
text:
The flights operated by Spicejet are nothing but "flying train coaches". Super unclean, soiled worn-out upholstery and greasy window panes. Luckily the journey was for 4-5 hours so could tolerate the surroundings.

Undoubtedly, there is always an abundance of ill-mannered fellow travelers who give the aircraft crew a hard time. However, this crew was not only frustrated but with poor attire & presentation skills.

On the positive note, the flight arrived 20 mins early! So thanks to the crew.

Note for self: Pay a few extra thousands and use good carriers.

title: Best Airline in India
text: Spicejet is clean and punctual.  No problems with lost baggage or items being stolen, which tends to be a problem with airlines in India.  Priority boarding is helpful and affordable.  I always pay more to take extra kilos on board and that can double the cost of your flight, so be careful about that (as will all airlines in India). Only spicy food options for the meals, which is a disappointment but they have lovely mango juice.  Book meals in advance when you book your ticket to ensure you have something on the flight.

title: Suffocating
text: Airline offers no amount of leg space due to which the flight is very tiring and not at all comfortable. Pathetic low cost airline.

title: Pathetic Airline - never go by SpiceJet
text: Very very poor service...Bad attitude of crew members very rude....not at all cooperative.....we were late for the flight but staff members did not allow us to board flight

title: Poorly trained staff
text:
Spice Jet has very poorly trained flight attendants. My round trip from Mumbai to Guwahati in the first week of June was one of my worst flying experience till date.
The terminal was not mentioned correctly, we had to rush from the Domestic terminal to the International terminal in the early hours of morning. There were only 2 staff at the ticketing counters and the system as well as the staff were extremely slow. They kept asking passengers of other destinations to come forward when we were way past our check-in time without updating us about the status of our flight. The legrooom is way too constricted. The flight attendants don't check if seats are straight, window shades are open and trays closed during takeoff and landing. I had to ask the passenger in front of me to straighten her seat during landing. While returning, there was a passenger 2 rows behind me who was playing a video game on full volume. I requested the flight attendant to ask him to lower the volume, it was done halfheartedly and the passenger continued with the nuisance till we landed. The flight attendants just chose to turn a deaf ear to it all! Once again there were passengers reclining during landing. The captain announces that the flight is landing at the Domestic Terminal whereas it landed at the International Terminal. The luggage belt number too was announced incorrectly. I have vowed never to fly with SpiceJet again. They definitely can give you a nightmare in the skies!

title: Unpreparedness and lack of empathy mars the airline growth
text: Spice jet is using the grounded 737's from JET airways, the problem with spice jet is that they do not boast a proficient grounds handling team and their ground staff is not that courteous, The problem with the flight started during the push back at Patna airport, the flight was supposed to leave Patna around 3:00 p.m but it auxiliary power failed and it took about 2&1/2 hour to fix the glitch during the time all the passengers were forced to remain inside the plane in the sultry summer, Some passengers requested the flight attendants to open the doors which was not considered at first but when the request turned into complaints the flight attendants opened the doors. This carried on for an hour and the temperature inside was unbearable at last the flight left and reached the destination after delay of 3&1/2 hours. I missed my connecting flight . This was not at all a nice experience.

title: never go for spice jet
text:
Never depend on Spice jet especially connection flights.I had booked spice jet to bangalore from kochi 6.00 am at a low price one month back and from Bangalore to Bagdogra in Indigo.

Sfter 15 days they told spice jet is cancelled they will refund full amt.My connection flight from bangalore was at 10.30 am .Since no other spice jet at that time I had to book in indigo for almost double the rate for 8 persons.

title: Ok
text:
Never on time. We flew to and fro baroda-mumbai-coimbatore. The flights were late by 30 mins to 2 hrs!

You feel like you are waiting for a bus. Even the boarding staff is not on time!

title: Side effect of having no competition in airlines
text: The staff at check in gate was efficient & courteous , however the experience was ruined by ignorant and rude staff at Boarding gate who insisted for disallowing overnight bag with 4 kg as accompanied luggage on the fight was full? The above resulted in waste of over 30 minutes at destination .

title: The Worst
text:
Economy class at it's worst, No leg room, My Father's height is just 5.4 and he was uncomfortable, think about me I am 5.10. 

And when the passenger in front tries to lean back on his seat, it's literally in your face. Because seats are too close to each other.

And don't ask for any blankets for the young ones, because they all are for the people in the first row.

In one word, they are trying to make Air Bus a literally State Transport Bus. SG Keep it up, but I am never flying with it again.

Don't get me started on the quality of free water.

title: Poorly managed m=boarding
text: the flight was taking off on schedule. The boarding process was a nightmare. It reminded one of experience of getting into a state transport bus in its depot. People literally crowded near the person handling the boarding. Airline staff was trying to organisee the boarding priority wise and zone wise. But people just wouldn't listen. And the blame as much goes to the airline as to the passengers. Rest of the flight and deplaning was uneventful.

title: Very poor time management
text: On this particular day I had hop in journey from Manglore to Chennai @ Banglore. The time to board my chennai flight was less than 45 minutes I was rushing myself to catch the flight then upon arriving my gates I realized that my flight is delayed by 1:30 hr and the reason for delay is due to delayed when I about to on board the flight I realized I'm taking the same flight that I came from Manglore :( and waited in airport for no reason.

title: On time
text: Flight on time. Cheerful in flight staff. Quick check in at the reporting counter. Quick delivery of the baggage.

title: Old flights
text: SpiceJet safety worries me as they still use old flights. They don't seem to meet the safety standards and are very sensitive to turbulence.

title: Good Airlines
text:
We have traveled with my family‚Äôs from surat to Udaipur and return 
No any issue relating to flight and crew members 
Good service

title: Low Budget. Low Quality
text:
Unfortunately the only airline operating a direct flight in this route.

Seat pitch is tight for a big person and that is considering I travelled Spicemax.
Absolutely lousy food. The only saving grace was the mouthfreshner.
Toilets were smelly.

There is no air conditioning until you are airborne.¬†i had this exact same issue 2 years ago when i travelled the same route. Passengers had in fact started threatening to get off the flight if the air conditioning was not turned on. I thought it was a one off issue. Looks like it is one of their cost cutting methods.
The cabin crew were polite and absolutely patient, realising that i, like other passengers was sweating and they couldn't do anything. 
Hope other airlines start operating this route.
An earlier flight(mumbai to madurai) was delayed by over 2 hours and the ground staff were unavailable at the scheduled departure gate for clarification.

title: needs improvement
text: Ground staff & air staff good at service & cooperative,Food served quality is also good but punctuality & air craft not upto mark

title: No to Spicejet ever...
text:
I had booked my flight to Calicut for 6th July and it was a morning flight at 6:35. One I landed at the airport, I get the information the the flight is delayed for four hours. I had to be there at Calicut by 9. Because of the flight delay, I somehow managed to postpone my meeting. Later after 10 am, it was announced that the flight is cancelled and if required the passengers can cancel the ticket of reissue it for the next day. By this time all the other flights have departed. The connecting flights were also not available. The airline was least bothered about about our time and value of our business loss. There were doctors also among the passengers who had to attend surgery at Calicut. It was so easy for them to say, "if you want you can cancelled and get the refund or travel tomorrow". What's the use of going another day when you have something to do today. I finally had to book another flight which costed me more than double to travel to Calicut. I expect SpiceJet to pay for my ticket fare and the other travel expenses and the business loss happened due to their flight cancellation. 

I would never recommend anyone to travel SpiceJet here after. 
I would have chosen to travel by train the previous day if the flight cancellation was informed earlier...
I wouldn't have traveled by air if I knew that it would cost me so high.

title: The pits
text:
The spicejet International flight ticked all the wrong boxes.
1.rude staff... Hit you with the trolley and then curtly tell u to get out of the way... They don't hesitate to hit sleeping people either
2. Torn seat covers with foam peeping through
3.seats don't recline on pushing button
4.Seats throw back during take off hitting the person sitting behind
5. Pathetic inedible stale food priced 7 to 8 times the street price.
6. Staff ask for payment to shift the passenger from a broken seat to an only vacant proper one if its in the emergency exit row!!!
7. Flight delays... No apologies
8. Careless staff... Spilled an entire glass of water on a passenger because attention was on chatting with colleague rather than handing over the glass
9. If a little kid is feeling cold and asks for a blanket, the parents are told it's a paid service only for spice max customers and there are no blankets to be given to any other person!!! 

All in all, even if they fly one for free one should avoid taking their flights... 

Utter disgrace on the name of Indian Hospitality!

title: Awesome upgrade
text: Spice jet gave me an awesome upgrade to its business class but the food and the service is still like economy but the seats of old jet are awesome and complete dejavu

title: PATHETIC, HORRIBLE, TERRIBLE, NO VALUE FOR TIME
text: If only I had an option to rate 0 or negative instead. First time when it got delayed I thought it would be for a genuine reason but then it happened multiple times. They first delay the flight, then prepone it, then again delay it and so on so forth. There is lot I can right but I don't want to waste time on this airlines. If you have no value for your time then book SpiceJet coz they don't really care about your time.

title: All the staff the best
text:
I with my wife and son went to Chennai from Colombo. Everything is good. And came back same airline from  New Delhi.  I must say the staff of ticketing office in Chennai air port and  Kolkata office the best. I appreciate the service they gave us.
Kolkata staff did best service for me when I need to cancel the Bangladeshi ticket due to election there.

title: Pathetic every time, took 20+ flights so far
text: Seats are uncomfortable. Some carriers are old. Staff is extremely unprofessional and always frustrated. Had horrible landing experience. Turbulent flights every single time. Just happens to be cheaper option hence select otherwise would go for other economy carriers

title: Cabin crew extended good hospitality
text: I've flown by Spice multiple times, the hospitality extended by the crew wasn't upto the mark but this time I was surprised at the crew being so pleasant and helpful. Aisha in particular was very helpful!

title: Terrible experience
text: One would normally associate an air travel to have a good experience but mine was just horrible to say the least. I had a pre ordered food in my ticket but the crew never took notice and simply came and asked me whether I am interested in buying food. When I mentioned that I have a pre ordered food, they looked lost. I asked them why they did not ask me in the first instance, they simply wanted to dodge the question. When I mentioned that I would report in public domain, the airhostess coolly said that I can go ahead and do that. Very disappointing!!!

title: Flight kolkata to bangkok
text:
Last month i flight kolkata to bqngkok spice jet.
All seats is not comfortable  small leg space . One washroom  wash basin chuke all are disturbed. When you flight outof coutry flight have must pillow and blanket but spice have not .i requested to spice jet management pls care your  plane  . But flight have good crew members

title: Worst economical flight....better to buy ticket of indigo airline
text:
No sandwiches were available in flight. Only popcorn and maggi.....what pathetic service.

On the other hand INDIGO AIRLINE gave us whole meal....with variety of food....

title: poor service at jharsuguda
text: as trip advisor do yet not include jharsuguda airport in this list i have choose raipur.this review about jharsuguda airport from where spicejet operation for hyderabad and kolkatta.most of the days it was delayed by more than two hours and any change of weather make the flight cancelled

title: Flight cancellations overnight due to low passenger reservations
text:
Spicejet seems to have the poorest passenger service in recent times. Due to low passenger load they decided to cancel their afternoon 1pm flight and force the passenger to opt for a 7pm flight.

With no apologies, no stay, no compensation the airline makes an excuse saying there was a technical error and we have cancelled our flight.. 

Unfortunately technical snags appearing at 2am in the morning can be rectified within 6 hours - still making the plane available to fly at 1pm the next day.

Poor excuses, no apologies and couldn't care less attitude of the staff makes this airline highly undesirable and unpredictable.

If you ever have another airline option within the same time.. please DO NOT CHOOSE SPICEJET. 

Hopefully they value our feedback as much as we value their excuses!

title: Nice flight and on time
text: First of all had a reasonable flight fare considering we were flying on a off season month. On time departure. Flight interior was pretty new. Although missed onboard entertainment. Turkish airhostess had a bit difficulty in speaking and following English. Otherwise they were very friendly. Had booked meal online but they failed to deliver the meal ordered for my daughter which made it a bit disappointing. However the male attendend was kind enough to apologize and provide a free snack as a kind gesture. All good otherwise. On time arrival.

title: Worst experience
text: Limited seating space, negligent staff and delayed flights is all You end up with if you opt for SpiceJet. Avoid this airline if time is valuable for you!!!

title: fine Airline
text:
Spicejet is a fine airline, and flies mostly on time.  The seats and space was average. The checkin and boarding experience was good.  
Though international flight but seem like a domestic plane.  The flight attendants surely need more sprucing.  Where are the smiling courteous staff gone?  The airline inflight attendants are totally unsmiling and not that well groomed.  However the service was ok nothing great but not bad.

title: Spice Jet..
text:
1.Quick Check-in
2.Good food in flight
3.Kind staffs
4.Right time

Spice Jet is houseful nowadays and if they are not maintaining the response from public will be awful.They sustain a revenue by their well planned system.

title: Fairly decent
text:
Spicejet is one of the options when flying to GOA, especially when you are looking for a direct flight. Spicejet flies a bombardier craft, so expect a fairly decent and comfortable flight.
Short eat on the flight such as sandwiches are available. Good thing is it was on time, so can't really complain about this trip.

title:
Flight from amd to mumbai, mumbai to delhi then delhi to bagdogra
Return flight from bagdogra to kolkata to surat
text:
Timing wise perfact but spice jet cancelled our direct flight from amd to ixb and return ixb to amd.
After that horrible experience with spicejet call center and spicejet management.

title: Budget friendly airlines
text: A super budget airlines . Please book it before two months , so you can get their lowest price . Do web check-in before going to airport , so you can get the desired seats . Overall a good flight . Experience may wary in seat comfortability .

title: Let Spicejet be your last option
text: Low cost and low standard..that's what this airline is all about..they try to keep the ticket price low but try to make the most by fleecing unsuspecting passengers. Extra baggage, seat, food, check-in..you name it and they just try to make money out of anything. Day is not far when they'll change you for using the washroom too!

title: Worst experience
text: Very poor customer handling, untrained and unprofessional staffs including manager, very poor approach. Hope spice jet will look after and train the manager that how to approach to a customer to handle the credit card verification issue. And also if the flight are delay, keep a manager to explain the reason.

title: SpiceJet
text: I used this line to book many flights in India. I flew from Dehli to Armistar, then Dehradun, then back to Dehli. Every flight that I took was late. Hours late. The flights were short but rough. It was like the pilot was driving the plane on the road. And every flight was like this. I didn't like having to pack into a bus and ride to the aircraft either.

title: On time, Value for money travel
text: We had an early morning flight - overall experience was good. The service was on time, and coordination between check in, boarding and on-board services were good. It was a very short haul flight, but overall we enjoyed it.

title: Worst Flight Service
text: Worst Service . They didnt even give water inspite of pressing the help button. No vomit bags were available . Horrible basic facilities .

title: BANGKOK TO DELHI SG 90, VERY BAD FLIGHT
text:
It was really a bad experience to fly in Spicejet from Bangkok to Delhi.
The aircraft was in bad condition and the worst part was the washrooms.
Washrooms was so dirty.
I will think once again to fly with them.

title: SG 678. Yet another long bus ride in Chennai airport !
text: It is as such so stressful to travel to Mumbai during rains, adding the pressure of advancement of departure time , that too in the early morning makes it worse. The advancement of departure time is to cover the time required by the airline to take the PAX on a long ride within the airport in the bus. Such a boring, long and terrible ride it was ! Eventually, the flight left well after the original scheduled time.  I managed to get an aisle seat for free during the airport check-in. The flight was not full. Didn't eat anything onboard. Fortunately, Mumbai was bright, sunny, dry and gleaming when the flight landed almost on-time. Didn't have checked in bags !

title: Cover many smaller cities - good airline
text: Smart airline providing quick connections to both big and small cities - this is exceptional since they were the only airline willing to start services to many of these smaller towns. Good quality service.

title: SpiceJet Del-Blr
text:
It was a very hot summer evening. I have never traveled in spicejet. Thought I would do this time as they had offered lounge access and spicemax seats at a nominal additional cost.  It was a decent experience. I would request them to provide proper space for cabin luggage. Also, Get the ac vents repaired and damaged seat parts replaced. I feel for the poor flight attendants. They are very courteous and friendly. The airlines has lot of scope for improvement 
Cheers

title: Simply shocking experience
text: 4 flight reschedules and a 2 hour delay on return I had to rebook link flight. Stressful legroom bad

title: Chennai Return
text: Traveled to Chennai By Indigo, returned by Spice Jet. Good experience. Flight landed before time. Service, staff and aircraft good.

title: Pathetic experience insulting our intelligence
text:
Flight was delayed by 55 minutes, but we understand it was due to weather disruption of the incoming flight.
So at check-in, our bags were 3kgs over the limit. 2 pax travelling together, 2 bags weighing 33.2 kgs. The counter staff very clodly said you are overweight and this wont be allowed (her exact words, I mean, if I pay excess baggage, then suddenly it would be allowed, so why do talk about allowing or not allowing). I requested her to have a look at my co-traveler, age 76 years, and I showed her hand-baggage (containing ticket print-out n medicines only) and explained to her that she prefers to not carrying any weight on hand, and therefore the check in bag got a bit heavier. The counter lady said, so? what can I do? why can you not carry the extra 3 Kgs for her? (again her exact words - you look capable enough)
I wish I could tell her - do you know who I am? (unfortunately, I am an aam admi traveling cattle class for work)
When I nicely (I conduct trainings for softskills) again asked her to use her judgement and authorization, she said the system doesn't recognize my co-traveler as a senior citizen??? I asked her to look at my co-traveler again, and to check her Adhar as well, and to have a word with her seniors. Then she said something that shut my mouth up, and I stopped arguing. She said "My seniors are all sitting in Delhi, how can I show them something when the system isn't recognizing her as a senior citizen."
I quietly moved away from the counter, only informing her that I am shifting the weight, and getting the bag re-scanned, and that when I come back, I won't stand in the Q.
When I rerturned, I spoke to the gentleman in the next counter and while handing us our boarding cards, he said, you see, our staff is under a lot of pressure, but you should have requested for a supervisor. However, you have already done the needful, so there isn't a problem. 
?
Hellooooooo!!!!
My father was an engineer with Air India, and my wife works with Emirates. I worked with Virgin Atlantic Airways for 5+ years, and know there's a scale difference leeway, so we were talking about only 1-2 kgs here.
I cannot believe it when I come across such illogical, pathetic service. Wish I get a chance to conduct a training with them. Spicejet is focusing only on grooming I suppose.
BTW, Spicejet may want to google my co-traveler's name - Sabira Merchant, so it wasn't about saving money, it was an expectation of humane considerate and hassle-free check-in experience. Shame!

title: Irresponsible approach to business
text: Their flights have always been just about okay but they have pulled a fast one on me by cancelling my ticket for the peak season without providing any real options. I was obliged to buy tickets from Indigo at a much higher rate.

title: ‚ÄúExcellent associates and  great service ‚Äú
text: Fly with spice jet  more than 6 time and the service is always best, the cabin crew‚Äôs is always there for assistance, comfortable flight, good value for money, Next journey is July 6th (DXB to IXE, SG60).

title: Dirty flight a d worthless staff
text: Very pathetic service ground level staff are really worthless,I recommend not to fly through spicejet at any cost it's better to go by any flight than spice jet ....the ground staffs behaviour is really ruthless...the way they behave with the customers really worthless....

title: Last minute delay
text: I was scheduled to travel to kochi from Delhi by 7.30pm Flight and just before the boarding time it was intimated that the flight got delayed by more than 4 hours.  This is absolutely disappointing in terms of ground handling and professionalism. Whatever the reason for the delay,  the time and efforts of all passengers gas gone for a toss.  Last minute delay is not a surprise from spicejet and I have had worst experience always with spicejet. Because of technical issues they delay the on time flight many times.  They don't have a respect for time of others and this is totally unassuming and unprofessional from the airline.  I would prefer indigo and vistara 100 times better than spicejet.

title: Very bad
text:
I have booked a flight (PNR:- H4KSJL & DDWJSN) in advance to go to Jaipur in summer break via Cleartrip app. When i tried to web check in a couple of days ago before my travel date - my PNR was not showing valid and after being on hold for 45 minutes - spicejet said they have cancelled my ticket and refunded the money. 
I have never called to cancel my ticket nor have authorized any one to do the same. 
How can they cancel my ticket which I was also not informed about , no mail, no SMS.
Basically they have downgraded their plane and offloaded the passengers on random.
After lots of back and forth calls, no one was ready to help and I had to re-book my ticket at 3 times the original fare.
Have been trying to follow up with the airline and cleartrip from last one month - but no one is ready to answer.
Very shameful !

title: Spicejet is best.
text: We travel on flight no SG638.Flight is on time arrived and also reach mumbai on time.webchecking is faster.good service

title: Great
text: Travelled first time with spice jet whole experience was very good. Air hostess was very well trained. But food was very expensive.

title: Early Flight but good one
text: This was an early morning flight around 8am from Jaipur. It was a layover flight having 1 stop at Mumbai. Had to change terminals there. The flight was smooth not much bumps and the seats were comfortable too. The onboard breakfast menu was good and the onboard crew was friendly. The view was very good as majorly it flew over arabian sea.

title: Good Experience...
text: Check-in was very smooth at Mumbai Airport.. Customer Service was good.. Might have been because I had purchased Spice Max Add on service which included seats 7A and Non Veg meal with priority Boarding...Flight was comfortable and Bags were delivered fast at Delhi Airport on landing..

title: terrible customer service
text: I booked my ticket  from mmt . and before 7 day of departure i get call that flight canceled. so i call the customer care and they give another flight thats i feel very good . but in flight i saw that  there are not bother of your query or anything just they do there work for get salary . i don't know that its over time pressure or other thing but in there face no genuine smile at all . I am also from hospitality so i feel bad i am the FNB manager in royal orchid hotels group .  also my flight was direct but when its landed on mumbai they don't have courtesy to tell me that sir you have to change your flight . when i see that i am only in flight so i stand that time attendant come and tell me this flight is not take off you have to go our another flight .  if i compare in guest service basis than indigi is very high than your service .

title: Flight no SG 14
text: Literally trying to fool people, had very bad experince at Dubai airport. They check the weight of the hand bag along with yr computer bag & shopping from Duty free. All put together tge weight should not  be more 7 kg. And in my case my check in luggage weight was less than 30 kg. They could have informed during check in. 1st they convince to upgrade yourself by paying extra to Max upgrade & in that even yr bags does not come on time. Never in my life would fly Spice Jet.

title: Never again in spice jet
text:
On behalf of my brother i am writing this review. Never again would i like to fly by spice jet or recommend it. In no airlines have i seen that a hand carry weight allowance includes a laptop bag also. (First their weighing scale was wrong not working properly so they got another one). Either i had to pay or throw the excess exactly of the laptop bag weight 3kgs. I paid for 2kgs which i agree was more threw 3kgs food away. Its ridiculous i think. When i checked i asked if they can take my hand carry as well they said no. Then i had this problem of throwing food away & paying. How can they count laptop bag weight in hand carry allowance do they weigh ladies purses? Then after i paid they said sir you can give us your hand carry as check in at the gate all this happened. I said no & that now i will take it with me.
Will not want to travel again by spice jet unless no option & nor will i recommend.

title: Seat Problem
text:
Travelled by SG 125 from Bagdogra on 25-06-2019. My originally booked seat No. 9F was changed to seat No. 8A while issuing boarding Pass. person at Seat No 7A pushed his seat backward and put me to a lot of discomfort all through out the Journey. The Air hostess on duty did not care and bothered to change my seat inspite of repeated requests. As a result, I have developed a stiffness in my lower back by adjusting to the narrow space between seats.
Dr. Sushil Kumar Sharma, Phone No. 9810675094, ETicket No. VG985H

title: Worst flight ever.
text: Never recommend spice jet to anyone. One hour flight from Bagdogra to Kolkata was delayed by 5.30hrs.  ultimately missed connecting flight. Had to cancel and rebooked the travel at high price. Blacklist SpiceJet for life. No spicejet for me ever.

title: My first experience with spice, Delhi to Bagdogra.
text: The journey didn't start at a very good note because the spicejet check-in counters were overcrowded because only 2 were open,the queue was extremely long. Being a low cost Carrier, spicejet doesn't have aero bridge and they transfer passengers in Buses that are over crowded and stinky. The flight didn't have any In flight entertainment services and they didn't even offer newspapers. I personally requested the cabin crew (shweta) if she could get me a newspaper but she declined instantly stating that they were not available as it was the third sector. My Pre booked meal was served hot but the quality was just about average. The touch down was very hard and bumpy. While DE-Boarding, to my surprise I saw stacks of newspapers lying in the over head bin which I was told that it wasn't available. I will think twice while booking spicejet in future.

title: Charged extra for luggage
text:
Charged extra for luggage for no reason to my mother. We were with in the cabin and check in baggage limits but because of the executive lack of knowledge we had to pay extra for the luggage and send all through check in baggage.
I personally feel very discomfort in their 737‚Äôs ,always in a hurry and unprofessional.request to avoid .

title: It was wonderful experience. Thank you Gaurav and team.
text: Mr. Gaurav is one of the kind person ever I met during my travel. He make sure about the safety of passenger and the polite way of his conversation with passenger is mind blowing. Thank you Gaurav and team to making my experience wonderful. and Thank you Spicejet.

title: Indifferent Kanpur Check-in Staff Member
text: The male check in staff member was indifferent and haughty. No pleasantries to begin with. I was directed to another line, when his line was free. Waited for a while while he chatted with other colleagues. After some time, he signalled me to come forward. Spicejet would do well to train check in staff to be courteous and prompt, and not have an attitude problem

title: Air hostess Rude and insensitive towards medical emergency
text:
Most rude, insenstive, egoistic, extreme attitude and shouted at us. My mother is highly diabetic And on insulin injections. She is highly sensitive. We got the last seats without recliners and there was an aisle seat available just before us.  She told us that she might faint foe there was not breathing space left in that corner. We called out for help but she dint bother. We decide to shift her to the aisle seat which took us only 40 seconds. Demo was just about to start before take off. Suddenly air hostess started shouting. We explained to her about the situation still she kept shouting. We let it go. Again after demo she comes to us n shouts and agrues about the same thing n we tried to tell her that my mother could wait till take off n plus we shifted her coz demo had not started. But she kept shouting without listening to a word. 
 First thing first is to KNOW HOW TO ATTEND TO A MEDICAL SITUATION. 

WE NEVER FACED THIS PROBLEM IN ANY OTHER FLIGHT. Spice jet is thw first one n we WiLl never recomend spicejet to anyone ever again. 
Worst in public dealing n at human level.

title: Satisfactory but need improvement.
text: Check-in at Spice jet counter was smooth and hassle-free with pleasant staff, however after the aircraft took-off after half an hour delay without any declaration regarding that. Cabin crew was courteous and pleasant, seats were comfortable however with tight legroom. I asked for veg meal but the same was not available/exhausted and hence I had to satisfy my hunger with veg sandwich only. Overall an OK experience but the airlines need to improve some of their aspects.

title: Pretty Ordinary - You get what you pay for !!!
text:
The check-in experience at the airport was pretty good and the staff were efficient and courteous. However the seats are extremely crammed and pretty uncomfortable. One can almost feel the co-passengers breathing on you !!! 

Add to that a bunch of thoroughly uncouth crowd, having scant respect of any safety instructions -- within 30 seconds of the flight taking off, they are off their seats to meet n greet other co passengers or to rush to the toilets !!! Opening the overhead lockers to pull out their luggage while the flight is still on the main runway -- as if they will de-board earlier !!!

The landing in Bangkok was pretty hard -- but that might happen at times. In all - a pretty uncomfortable flight -- glad that it was a short one !!

title:
Pathetic service pathetic food
 Landing experiemce was horrible
text:
The service extremely slow. Half of items were over. Plus landing was very bad. 
Plane interior wss dirty

title: Terrible, terrible flight, service and unsafe
text: Flight SG6431....on19 June. Terrible, terrible, terrible experience and I will never fly Spicejet again if I have a choice! From the point of reservation I have been pestered with emails, phone calls, messages.... a complete invasion of my privacy....no advice that the terminal was changed to T2 though!. Advice that the flight was preponed and then flight took off an hour late!. Taken onto tarmac by bus and waited in hot bus as steps not at plane, plane not serviced, seatbelts not on seats....Under age children allocated seating at emergency exits! Ordered meals not available as ovens not working. Cabin crew did NOT check seatbelts or reclined chairs before take off and landing!!NOT GOOD ENOUGH, UNSAFE AND NEVER, NEVER AGAIN!!!!!

title: Highly not recommended
text: Very bad experience travelling with SpiceJet airlines..the seats r very uncomfortable with no leg space, not worth the amount we pay for the flight... irresponsible and arrogant staff members

title: Average Flight Experience in a Dated Aircraft
text:
From my past experience with SpiceJet, I had high expectation from them during this flight. However, this time the experience came out to be just average. The flight was on-time, which is the only positive point. Other than that, everything else was just mediocre or bad. The aircraft (VT-SLG) was 13 years old. But the terrible interior condition of the aircraft was really pathetic! All the seats were still from their old Ryanair days and covers were dirty and torn. Many tray tables were semi-broken. Carpet on the floor was torn at many places. Flight attendants were at their best though - always smiling and taking care of passengers. This being a short-haul flight of less than 1 hour, we didn't order/purchase any on-board food this time. 

The current airline market leader of India also has many old airplanes from other airlines, but they always change the seats and interiors to look them fresh. SpiceJet cut down the cost by choosing not to do so in this case. But that gave me a bad impression this time.

title: Surprisingly quite good!
text: I was actually quite surprised on how good the flight was... it did not scream as budget as some of the other airlines, still not the best, but good enough

title: Spicejet flight delays
text:
SG-51 from Pune to Dubai
This is on of the worst flight one can take to travel to Dubai.
It almost always delayed and the worst part is they don't even inform you on time.
The flight is generally delayed by 4-5 hours and this is minimum it can get worse as I have experienced a delay of 15 hours and you are not even allowed to leave the airport.
Request you all to please avoid taking this flight

Regretfully

title: Overcharging and profiteering by Spice Jet
text:
Myself, my wife, my daughter and two grand daughters are the latest victim of over charging and profiteering by Spice Jet. I booked 5 tickets from Kolkatta to Pakyong (Sikkim) in the first week of April 2019. Just a day before they informed me that the flight to Pakyong would now terminate at Bagdogra due to alleged bad weather.   

There was no mention of how they will assist us to get to Sikkim from Bagdogra. When I checked the fare from Kolkatta to Bagdogra, I discovered that the difference was about Rs. 3500.00 per passenger. So, I ended up paying Rs. 17500 extra for my 5 tickets.

When I took up the matter with their customer service, which got escalated to the nodal officer which was later escalated to the Appellate Authority, all of them refused to refund the fare difference.

Please note that they charged a higher fare and under performed by flying to a lesser fare structure. I am publicizing this to show how these so called low cost airlines are exploiting this kind of situation. Had I booked my ticket to Bagdogra in the first instance, i would have paid a lower fare. Neither did they provide any kind of help to get me to my destination with the ground staff both at Kolkatta and Bagdogra just smilingly saying that they could not help. The only succour they offered after prolonged correspondence was a flying voucher of Rs. 500 per person. It was an insulting offer which I immediately turned down.
So, be wary when you book with them. They will profiteer at your expense and then say proudly that they have made profit in their annual financial report.

title: Clean Service
text: We have booked SpiceJet from Amazon and received a cash back as well. The service from the first point ie check-in and all was seamlessly done. The flights were near. Overall it was a good experience. Always there is a chance to perform well.

title: Very bad services
text: Very bad services, 60% passengers baggages got after 3days. Very irresponsible, cruelly negligence, dishonest and insincere services.

title: It can improve itself
text: Recently flown with them. I know they are an absolute budget carrier but the fares they charge are almost equal to the full carriers. They are fleecing the passengers due to the closure of a certain airline recently. Service is with a stiff upper lip and at times tilting to the rude side. I will fly again with them only because I am helpless.

title: SpiceJet
text: Everything is Good About SpiceJet, except for the Fact that they have taken Dilapidated Jet Airways Aircraft's and Air Conditioning is a Disaster until take off. We don't pay to sweat it out for moving from Departure Hall to Our Seats in Aircraft and Until Take Off and until we reach an Altitude..... You are Losing Me for Sure, as we don't know which Aircraft is being used for my routes.... either mention during booking stage or that's it.

title: Poor service
text: Received only half luggage at the arrival and was informed that the other half will receive it tmr i will never ever recommend anyone to spicejet its worst.

title: Nice experience !!
text:
After a very long time I took a Spice flight. Every thing was perfect right from check-in to landing. The service in flight was very professional and courteous. The flight started on time and landed before schedule.
Keep it up Spice !!

title: Very efficient
text: Spice max is nothing short of a business class. Priority check in, boarding, extra leg room and hot meals. Very efficient staff. Smooth journey.

title: Good experience
text:
Far better experience than my previous one from Pune, this was a Jet converted SG flight. The seats were good, cleanliness has improved a lot, not to forgot to mention the cheering & helpful staff.

Thank You

title: Price gouging on hand baggage
text: I have traveled extensively over the world, on smaller airplanes. Everywhere, they allow a laptop or camera bag in addition to the hand bag. This was the first time where they insisted that 7kgs allowance was for everything including the laptop and camera. Ended up charging me excess baggage fees of Rs. 2400. The checking was selective too. Lots of other passengers with big bags, never had theirs weighed. It seems you need to know the guy behind the counter. Be warned about this excess baggage scam.

title: Worst domestic airline
text:
My flight was originally scheduled at 7pm, but eventually flew at 11:40pm i.e. almost after 5 hours of delay. Not just that, even when it landed, it just stayed on the runway for almost 30 mins.
Its the worst an airline can offer, especially for families like me with kids.
I pledge to not book Spicejet again

title: Denied services
text: Very bad service when we reached on time services were denied to us . Staff were rude and laughing at us.No assistance ,they tore out boarding pass in front of us

title: Good!
text:
We were five. We had decided to pay a week long visit during the vacation of our grandson. As we decided late, the rates of tickets had gone up. It was not possible to web check in. They were charging for all the seats. We decided not to pay this extra money. 
In fact, Airlines should be prevented from such a practice. They show that the fares are low when you book a ticket. But when you want to check in in advance, they charge you. This is no good a practice. This is an irritant. I feel like never ever travelling with such airlines.
There was a hassle at the security gate. The security personnel was not ready to accept our makemytrip document. We were not able to use internet to download the tickets. The self check in kiosks were not responding. There was no one to assist at T1. However, we could finally get net connection, downloaded the tickets, printed the boarding passes and rest of the process at the airport was smooth. Our seats were close to each other.

title: Very bad, getting worse
text: This was one of the worst flight experiences of my life! The employee at the airport was incredibly rude. I had booked my flight for the wrong date, and he charged me a very high rate to take the flight. On top of that he was bossing me around like this was a military boot camp or something, and also overcharged me for my extra weight by 1-2 kilos. Dharamsala Airport and especially Spice Jet should really be ashamed of itself because it's gaining a very bad reputation among both Indian nationals and foreign tourists. Please learn how to treat your customers like guests and stop trying to squeeze every single last rupee out of them.

title: Rude Staff
text: both delay airports t1 and t2 encountered rude and inefficient staff. They delayed 2 passengers and their flight got missed. Very unhelpful.

title: Very good in flight experience
text: The start was not to good. We had gone to Domestic airport and realized only when the security at the entrance told us the flight was from International terminal. So it was a rush hour. But once we boarded the flight wa svery good. Staff was polite and helpful. I think spicejet serves the best meals. The most tasty food I have enjoyed in any flight

title: I did a mistake of booking thus flight
text: My three consecutive trips in spicejet are delayed. The worst thing is their queue management. Big queues at every point. And and even worse , the flight is already delayed by an hour still they talk about priority check in and first bag. Should not all be first bag when the flight us delayed. I should have gone for any other flight but not spicejet. Better to pay a higher price in other flights if available.

title: SG679 bad management
text: The flight SG 679 got delayed by 3 hours. This is a late night flight and everyone had some or other work / connecting flight in morning. Due to storm this delay was informed way later after crowd demanded explanation SMS and customer care call from spice jet came. Passengers only had to demand for food and Mumbai domestic airport doesn‚Äôt have place to sleep. Spice jet should at least inform in time and explain situation rather then wiring for crowds agitation. Still waiting and not sure when flight will come.. avoid this flight in monsoon.

title: People traveling with cameras beware! They make you check it in and gives it back destroyed /lost.
text: First hand this is the worst flight you could take anywhere, the window and isle seats are paid!200 for each in online check in. Above all, you have to check in your camera gear if it's just over 7kgs,even after hrs of talking to the supervisor. They charge rs 100 for priority check in, but chances are your gear gets totaled. Icing on the cake.. You're luggage is not automatically transit in cases of connection flights! You have to collect the luggage yourself at every stop!! I'm a frequent flier and this was my first time on spice jet (also my last) and the experience was very frustrating! I'd say you're better off on any other carrier, its worth the extra you pay. Because here even if the tickets are cheap everything else is paid with terrible service. For a relaxing experience... Take another carrier. Steer clear of spicejet!

title: NEVER FLY SPICEJET
text: Worst flying experience in my last 20 years of travel. Never ever flying Spicejet again.flight delayed beyond 5 hours in the middle of the night. No airline counter/office/staff att BKK airport to take care of stranded hungry passengers. After arriving back home raised a complaint. They bluntly refused to accept their mistake and order any compensation. I would not event give "1" rating.

title: Spicejet‚Äôs baggage policy sucks
text:
All I felt about Spicejet is that they are ready to rip you off with their bogus rules specifically baggage. I have used spice jet a few times Dehradun-Delhi flight 
They have a weird baggage policy. They will cite safety issues. If you don‚Äôt pay for baggage in advance then it may cost the same amount as you have paid for your seat. 
They allow max 15- 20 kg it doesn‚Äôt matter how many bags do you have. Basically you can split 20 kg in 20 bags. Safety issue? 

I had packed my cabin bag according to the dimensions mentioned on the website but the manager at the airport tried to fit my bag in the small metal bin. He showed me it doesn‚Äôt fit. He never tried put the bag inside properly. Well, I packed according to the dimension on the website and not according to the metal bin. Even if it is 1 or 2 cm above it shouldn‚Äôt matter. It won‚Äôt bring the flight down.
Later I saw a person traveling with a disfigured bag which I am sure could not have fit in that mold. Bad customer service.

We ended up paying the same amount we paid for the ticket. It was far from low cost ticket.

 Hot tea was cold. Didn‚Äôt try their food though.

The only good part was, flight was on time 

In this amount we could have hired a taxi to New Delhi.
I wish we had more options to fly. 

I hope to see some good airline companies  in future that will follow some principles rather than looting people in the name of baggage policy. Such policy doesn‚Äôt help international travelers.

title: Overall good flights but we experienced delay of 2 hours
text: Overall good flight but it delayed for 30 mins from Pune to Kolkata and from Kolkata to Bagdogra by 2 hours.

title: Nice flight
text:
Although rescheduled flight was a good flight 
Since the flight was rescheduled SpiceJet could have arranged some light snacks

title: Great ground staff
text: The ground staff at Cochin were excellent, especially Maria and Subin who is based in Mumbai. Really kind and considerate when I asked them to change my seat. Being a 6ft guy, they are cramped, but they get you there on time.

title: Sketchy Business or Outright Collusion?
text: For months FlightNetwork held on to my refund--without, the very least, a notification email that they had received said refund from SpiceJet to be deposited to my account. So for weeks I contacted SpiceJet--as I had received news of the flight cancellation only from SpiceJet, and instruction to contact them for a refund--and all they kept saying was that they had process said refund to my account--which technically wasn't true; failing to tell me they had refunded FlightNetwork who in turn should have refunded me. I received no email from FlightNetwork, no instruction or notification that they had my money. This is sketchy business practice, at best, or outright collusion, at worst. FlightNetwork has yet to process my refund, even after I've contacted them on this matter.

title: Worse airline
text: Hyderabad to Ahmedabad. The flight was cancelled without any information. On asking why has the airline not informed, they gave me an excuse that sms to all members have been sent and it is not their responsibility, if I have not got the sms. No courtesy at all. And also flight has very dirty window u can't able to see clearly

title: Official travel - Juned 2019
text: The flight was a little late - say 20 minutes or so.  The cabin crew were very professional and courteous.

title: Making best out of closure of JET AIrways
text: The seats in the first row are supposed to be spicemax ( with more leg space ) as they are charged extra . But instead are too cramped . In fact so much so , that window and aisle seats ( 1A and 1 B ) are even less spacious then the economy seats. If you happen to sit on 1A then the legs hit directly on the door. Refre pic. Probably thats because they have placed additional seats which are right in the way of front door passage . So please avoid seats 1A, 1B and 1C !! I was sitting on 1A and had to change the seat immediately upon take off. I was looking enough as the flight was not full.

title: Slow and Steady
text: Slow and steady rise of Space Jet is really remarkable. We realized it when we travelled from Delhi to Mumbai on thirteenth of May. An airline that was on the point of extinction has quietly moved upward and showed remarkable profit in the last report. The credit goes to meticulous planning and very dedicated staff.  As a result, we had a very comfortable flight well organized at every level. I wish them all the best.

title: Absolute chaos from start to finish
text: I usually fly Indigo or Vistara as I've been able to rely on them both for good service in the past. But on this occasion, unfortunately my flight search led me to inadvisedly booking with Spicejet which was a huge mistake. After bag security at Goa airport yesterday I went to check in, and there was complete disorder and lack of passenger control, with only one check in desk open and the girl unable to cope with the increasing queue. After 40 minutes of waiting I went to find the manager who was not interested and sent me back to the unruly 'queue' where people were fighting over not wanting to pay for excess luggage or the fact that they were next in line. When I finally managed to get my boarding pass security screening was a nightmare too, not necessarily because of Spicejet but the volume of people travelling with young children which didn't bode well for the impending flight. Boarding was late, with no explanation for the delay, and the aircraft was shabby and old with seats that wouldn't come into upright position and stitching coming apart at the seams. The plane had an overall grubby feel to it, masked my COUNTLESS advertising slogans and banners plastered EVERYWHERE on the walls and seat backs, including an advert for nicotine patches which I thought was weird for an airline to be promoting. No-one came by to check that electrical devices were off for take off, or tray tables stowed, passengers were still walking around as we taxied out, with no passenger control. The drinks trolley didn't have the full selection as listed in the glossy brochure. No inflight information was given by the pilots or any explanation given for the delay. Children were not strapped in for landing. No seatbelt reminders were given as we flew through turbulence. Upon landing at Delhi almost an hour late passengers were up and walking about getting their bags AS WE WERE LEAVING THE RUNWAY, with no-one telling them to sit down. They were playing some kind of rave music over the inflight system, not conducive to a calming atmosphere onboard. After the flight all luggage was delayed so that we were all still standing there well after 6.15pm which was ridiculous. Absolute havoc and zero flight safety concerns. Avoid this airline at all costs...

title: Vijayawada through Air
text: I traveled with my aunt(78 years) to Vijayawada in late May 2019. The customer service at the airport was very good, received the wheel chair on request at the airport within minutes, the escort ensured that my aunt was comfortable throughout. The bombardier plane didn't have the walking facility and hence they converted the wheel chair to a palanquin. Since the flight was for only 45 mins, we received only water in the plane.

title: Delayed for 5 hours
text: I have booked two tickets in two different days and in both days, the same flight was delayed for 5 hours approx. Can't even get to know the status of the flight while waiting as no official was there.  In flight experiencewas average but the starting was so much borin.

title: Scam scam scam - do not use
text:
My daughter is currently volunteering in India and took some time to travel. Having booked flights in February she has tonight arrived at the airport and was unable to produce the debit card which was used to book the flight as her card was STOLEN.  

She has been refused boarding and been made to rebook her seat at an inflated price. ¬£150 for an internal flight which originally cost less than ¬£50 !!!! 

Despite speaking to a supervisor and explaining her card made for payment was stolen she also was able to show via her banking app the original transaction. She had all other forms of ID needed. 

Several posts online about travellers having to produce cards and spice jet staff writing card numbers down. Disgraceful company. Avoid !!!!!

title: Good service
text: Took a late night flight which was on time. Good hospitality by cabin crew. Overall had a good experience.

title: Not Bad
text: I read a lot about this airline. I booked my tickets first and lately read about this airline on Tripadvisor. The flight timings suites me so I booked this but after reading the reviews I thought to change the flight. Was very tired after my more than 20hours International flight so I stick with this airline but I upgraded to their Spice Max option. The check-in was fine. The first impression of the plane was not bad. Was a little outdated but never mind it‚Äôs just 2.5 hours flight. I am not going to stay in their for rest of my life üòä. The inflight staff was awesome. The crew manager was amazing. The food they provided was nice. Actually I recommend their Spice Max option. In 800 rupees you get good leg space in domestic airline and good food too. My experience with Spice jet was perfect and I will definitely fly with them when I will come back to India.

title: Amount deducted, No ticket
text:
1. While booking my ticket, the amount was immediately deducted without generation of ticket. 
2. Customer care generation of complaint number is so painful through unprofessional customer care ‚Äúexecutives‚Äù. Even after generation of complaint number, I had to write them a mail. 
3. They take ‚Äú3 days‚Äù to respond to an email written to them! (Proof : Read their responses to your emails!)
4. Also, despite all the details including transaction id being given to them, they said they‚Äôll take ‚Äú7-10 days‚Äù to take action! Again, as per their policies as told by the customer executive. 
5. Poorest, most pathetic customer care ever seen in any field in my life. 
6. My sympathies with anyone expecting any good out of spicejet customer care.

title: Poor seating and very late baggage arrival
text: We had a corporate booking and and had chosen 2nd row seats. We had booked seats many months in advance. These were changed and were given seats way back in row 23 and some place else. family was split up. Food was below average. and when we arrived at Kolkata the baggage arrival belt was changed after we had waited for 20mins. And then we had to wait for another 25 min at another belt......appalling. Very irritating since we had been travelling prior to this for 13 hrs on a previous intercontinental flight.

title: Good
text: Flight was on time, service was good, food (non Veg) was excellent, in fact never had such good airline food in a long time. Seating was charged as this was jet airways plane they were using, how ever the seat provided was ok.

title: Say no to SPICEJET for a good travel memories!
text:
When an airlines delays your flights by hours, informs you few hours in advance and you are stuck in a foreign land, how will you feel? 
Scared- I was
Pathetic - I felt
Lost a working day at work back home- I did

And above all, the airlines does not have the audacity to either provide you with some compensation, let alone provide you with some accomodation for the night.

Did i ended up paying extra for my trip then anticipated, 
Hell yes! 
Spicejet is a NO for me forever ! 

PS- They have super unclean windows!

title: VERY PLEASURE TRIP  AND CREW ARE VERY FRIENDLY
text: Pune City being fast growing both industrial as well as software hub, next to Mumbai, Hyderabad, Bangalore. Pune has very potential in every sphere. needless to state here that most of the business people as well as software employees settled in Pune from Andhra Pradesh. Especially, people from Vijayawada, Guntur, Ongole, Rajahmundry have settled in Pune. Due to lack of direct flight from Vijayawada, people are facing problem to reach Pune from this area.  It is needless to state here that there is a lot of demand  from Vijayawada, a newly carved Capital of Andhra Pradesh.  And thus, it is suggested to Spice jet to   introduce / operate one direct flight in this region, at least thrice in a week, initially. Subject to increase depends upon occupancy ratio.

title: Not consistent
text:
The reason for the title is that the airlines doesn't have a uniform service standards & ius up to the staff. I got the spice max ticket which gives priority check-in as one of the benefits however on both going & coming journeys we had to stand in Que with other fellow passengers & board this despite we having an infant on arms. Not consideration or priority what so ever, hence a waste.

In flight service is fully dependent on the personnel & not on the airline standard as while going the service was below average & the staff seems disinterested however while on our return flight it was reasonably better.

Overall an OK travel experience with this airline, not a preferred one but also not the  worse also :)

title: Picking up well !
text: I guess SpiceJet is picking up well now, and giving better service than ever, great food on board, decent legroom. However, have faced issues with their boarding method/ people !

title: Cheap & Cheerful
text:
1.30 flight- packed.
Everything was quite good until we got onto the plane- very cramped. God knows how a tall person would manage.
Otherwise, the staff are extremely friendly & helpful & without attitude & the flight was on time.
We got some water.

title: Baggage and clothes spoilt by water. False assurance of getting back but nothing has happened
text: 20th May 2019 On receiving luggage one of the baggage was completely drenched with water. All the clothes were wet except for Lehgna which was packed. I was going for holidays to celebrate my daughter's birthday. I had no clothes to wear and had to immediately purchase. New clothes with tag on were spoilt which was showed at the counter on New Delhi airport. Yamini assisted with bags - garbage bags to keep clothes and no manager was available.Took pictures and asked me to write a complaint and would get back in 48 hours. No revert for 9 days.  On way back on 29th May when I contacted Mumbai Airport they had no clue and told me to call customer care and gave me complaint number and said the complaint was not written. I have travelled many times domestic and international but never ever water has been put on baggage. It was good 3 - 4 litres of water and wondered what water it was. Mistakes do happen but the way the assurance was given and no one came back I think spice jet is good at getting the traveller out of the airport and then sits back. I did not take the flight back of spice jet because I was so disappointed.

title: Everlate airlines!! Can be renamed SpiceBullockcart!!
text: It had been already several times that I travelled this airlines and number of times its been delayed. Especially the delay of the flight leaving in the night beyond two hours becomes a great irritation and nuisance. Further the communication of delay reaches the mobile after arrival to airport. In this case it is further annoying. Also the ground staff are not geared up to handle such situations leaving a bad experience to the passenger!!

title: Short but sweet experience
text: This was a wonderful experience with Spicejet. The aircraft was clean and spacious. The flight had arrived before time at the destination. Food quality was quite good.It was raining at the time of boarding so the ground staff had assisted the passengers with umbrella on the way from the bus to the aircraft. This flight is highly recommended to everyone.

title: INCRESING IN QUALITY DAY BY DAY
text: I have become a fan of Spicejet & its services. For last 3 months i have taken 3 flights with them and from check in counter to aircraft ,all services were very nice and comfortable.

title: Money makers
text: So my flight was at 0740 am and I did check in and passed through long security check queue and reached boarding gate at 07:17am and I was told boarding gate is closed. Staff is not even bothered I get only one answer gate is closed and book new flight. Good way to earn money when u know u r the only option as airline like jet airways is closed. Than helpless I approach Indigo staff he helped me to get my bag back helped me to reservation counter and spicejet staff no where to be seen.. at reservation counter two staff members chitchatting and asking me to wait for 5 mins as they have to finish handover. I mean cant u see stressed passenger. There are other two passengers who were also struggling with similar issue there was no one to help. When I call customer service they said to give a phone to staff there but no one is ready to talk on phone as they started boarding of other flight and they dont have staff to help me... when I booked tickets that time only I was not sure about travelling with spice jet and this incident gave me confidence that not to travel with spice jet... only bunch of idiots there to rip u off with money.. also when I booked my other flight tickets they wants to charge me 750 rs as a no show charge... Are u guys for a real.... u guys should run a auto rickshaw business n not a flight

title: Hopeless flight
text:
Their staff doesn't know how to behave. I had a bad experience from DXB terminal one. When the passengers were about to board the aircraft SpiceJet has a policy to levy additional charges for weights in excess of 7 kg. Mr Sangeeth who was dealing with the customers was behaving very rudely with each and every customer and he was shouting at them. This is not expected from a staff of SpiceJet. When the customers told him that complain would be made against him he said he was not bothered about the same.

Already you guys are overpriced and you delay the flights. Nobody from the customer care answers the call. Inspite of all this the rude behaviour of staffs like Sangeeth can impair the image of the flight.

title: Pathetic service by inflight crew
text:
While visiting Spicejet page got to know they completed 14yrs... though they proudly claim they completed 14yrs but their inflight experience sucks...their staff attitude is as high as the altitude of their airplane is flying! 

I don't know what they think of themselves? We passengers are paying their salaries and they must believe in service rather then care a damn about it.

let me share my recent experience with Spicejet flight, I was flying from Mumbai to Hyderabad on 19th May and my experience is elaborated as under to Spicejet customer care team:

I am writing this mail with great grief and 
disappointment on behaviour of your crew member Vaibhav and Julie.

While ordering my meal I had taken Cocojal bottle and requested your crew to replace with other Britania Milk shake, Julie Crew gave very cold response and asked me it's already opened which I replied its sealed and she disappeared, once again I have given a call and vaibhav came to attend me to my surprise he too gave same response without even checking the bottle.
 

I was pissed off and returned the drink and Vaibhav just took it back after checking the seal, how sad is that!

Don't understand this logic of your crew members ? Why would any guest return his drink if he has already opened the bottle, we too have that sense and will never expect it to be replaced.

After paying for my meal I am returning without having my drink, is this the service you offer to your privilege guest....extremely pathetic.

I have requested to talk to supervisor Faizal but till I landed nobody bothered to attend my complaint.

Must tell you, your crew members have lot of attitude and this wont help in long term.

So just converting Jet Airways plane into Speicejet wont bring service attitude in your staffs let me tell this to Spice Jet customer service custodians...they have to believe in service and also do it with pride... at the end what matters is how many happy travelers fly with your airline not those swanky girl staff with sky high attitude !

By the way I did complaint on Customer service and they simply wrote a generic mail and trying close this matter, no courtesy to customer's loss of money and time! I have paid upfront for food and the seat which costed me Rs.1798/-
Why would I let go when I paid for my drink which was not served and taken back without any apology by the inflight staff!

Thanks and hope you look into this feedback and take necessary action and refund my money which I paid for the product.

title: Poor service at all levels
text:
Disconnected staff at airport and in flight
Poor security screening. Can‚Äôt communicate what the issue is. 
Counter opens late
No regard for international travellers 
Poor baggage allowance. 
No table in seat
It‚Äôs like you are on your own despite paying the highest fair for the flight. 
No CR management 
Wonder if I will fly spice jet again. 
Sorry

title: Poor service
text:
I travelled by SpiceJet flight 6704 from Mumbai to Delhi and faced several inconveniences as follows: 
 
1. Sudden change in terminal at Mumbai, communicated silently by 1 sms more than 24 hrs prior
 
2. Boarding time mentioned 4.45pm, whereas ‚Äòboarding last call announced‚Äô at 4.45pm...resulting in last min run when there was a long queue inside the connector from airport to aircraft of more than 50 people.
 
3. Unhelpful crew - did not make any attempt to serve me my prepaid dinner in 1 hr; did not help me in getting space for my cabin baggage; promised to changeit and did not; promised to bring it to me after landing but did not (air hostess: Anshika)
 
Will avoid flying unless no other option is available

title: Bad experience
text: First airline who does not even give evacuation or life saving instructions!looks like you flying at your own risk!

title: WRONG DECISION
text:
I wanted to go to chennai with my wife and 7 month old son, when i checked online for prices, I found the "Spice Max" price to chennai was similar to Srilankan airline Economy Prices but Spice max included with Extra Legroom, Entertainment, Alcholic Bev, Priority Service, Etc. I was happy and tried to book the flight, while trying i was pausing at the last stage for some reasons, I immediately received a call from Spicejet asking if am in need of any help to complete the payment, even the lady said she is extending the booking for payment. in few minutes time I received another call asking if I need help to complete the payment, I requested a bit more time and was trying to complete the payment but the system did not accept my payment at the end of the process but in less than a minute time, I received a confirmation from my bank that my card has been charged. what was surprising to me was, when I tried to make payment, I received 2 calls to help me to complete the payment but when I needed help to get clarification on the payment that spice jet system did not accept, even after 30 minutes on hold my phone was never answered. I had no choice than making another payment on the same booking after numerous calls failed in the process of getting help. having that to be sorted out, we went to the airport expecting to get help from the chennai airport on the duplicate payment.

When we were checking in, we were Told that we could take the baby stroller up to the flight and again can be taken when we leave the flight, we were happy and took the stroller up to the flight and gave it to the officer before getting in to the flight. When we got on the flight, there was no greeting or welcoming at all :(, We sat on the seat allocated and was looking for flight entertainment, there was non :(, extra legroom?? was not so good, Alcoholic Beverages were never offered. The cabin crew was not friendly or attentive at all on the flight to Chennai. we got the meal but the trays were not cleared until the flight was landed. when we were leaving the flight, I requested for the stroller, I was told by a crew lady with a very frowning face that it will come on the Belt. I have been a frequent traveller but never had seen a poor service like we had on this flight.

On the way back to colombo, I inquired about the duplicate payment at checkin, I was told that I have to get in touch with the airline on emails. I did sent and an email and the refund received after few days was nearly LKR5,000 less. after numerous emails, I was not successful in getting my over charged amount back.

The flight back to colombo was not so Bad as the flight to chennai. Staff were very attentive and helpful. we were properly greeted upon arrival and departure.

title: Great Service. Punctual. Smooth Flight.
text: It was a short duation flight but the expirience was smooth, the staff was very cordial and courteus. The food was good and the serrvice was great. Overall a lot of improvement than the last time I flew on SpiceJet. Keep it up.

title: Just a bunch of amateurs.
text:
How can you operate a airline like this. I'm so glad I live in Europe well organised, rules and regulations. This airline is just a dirty mess. 

Delays, delays and delays. Dirty cabins, pore flight crew, broken environment.

title: horrible decision choosing spicejet
text: this review based on my real experience i faced from spice jet, i booked my flight Del to Bkk the flight was in the night 9 pm i took a flight from Dehradun and reached on time to new Delhi i reach 3 hour before on the airport  . when i reached on the airport they said the flight status changed now it will fly at 12 pm i was shocked one its too late for this timings second i booked my another flight from Bangkok  to Phuket. i reached on their counter they seems helpless, one guy came who said he is the manager his behavior was not so professional looks like he will fight with us if we ask for help on our issue unsatisfied. please beware from this kinda airlines.

title: Emerging airline
text: Well operated airline, which is emerging as a major airline trying to occupy the void created by grounding of Jet Airways

title: Deliver what they promise
text:
They promise to deliver low cost flying option and deliver just that. No frills airline. Plus point is that they connect tier 2 and tier 3 cities all across india.
Flights are mostly turbo prop planes with reasonably short flight times.
you have to pay extra for exit row seats or food, but thats okay i guess.
There is no ife and seats are mostly comfortable.
