Good option for domestic flying

title: Poor services
text: The flight was 4 hrs delayed during my recent travel from dubai to delhi. No measures were taken to inform the passengers about delay, the check in took almost 4 hrs. Worst than a cheap bus travel in India. Pathetic experience. Must avoid if not for cheap travel.

title: Never Fly SpiceJet
text:
This is a very hard way of learning lesson not to fly SpiceJet .
This reservations were made and 5 days before the scheduled date an email is sent that the flight was cancelled and they regret the inconvenience .
They take more than month to return your money and your money ends up being an interest free loan from the time of booking to the time of refund.
The customer care executives are incredibly rude.
Even Jet airways when it was going down refunded the money in a weeks time.
I wish Jet Airways had stayed and SpiceJet had gone down.

title: Feels like travelling budget
text:
In today's times, if you reach from point A to B without any major mishap, you should be happy. So we were.

Our flight SG 263 from Delhi to Kolkata of 20th April was cancelled due to unexplained operational reasons. Customer care was kind enough to accommodate us in the flight next day without extra charge.

The tray table lock of the seat next to me was broken and unsuccessfully secured by ugly black tapes. The leg space was just enough to remind us that we're flying budget. The crew was casual and spoke in gestures. Maybe the 5:55 am flight was too difficult to serve in.

I have had better experiences with Spicejet. Maybe it was not one of their good days. I am happy to see the revival of this airline on the last 2-3 years but they need to be consistent.

title: Did the job
text: Check in easy, boarding was easy, flight was good. People also smiled and did a fine job. Bags came out on time.

title: Kashmir trip
text: This flight got delayed due to weather conditions in Srinagar, but ones we got in to it we were comfortable , escaped from the hash weather outside . flight is comfortable one , we enjoyed the trip .

title: Good service but delayed start by half an hour though arrival time matched with the arrival time mentioned
text: Overall good trip with Spicejet. They started late by over half an hour but they kep the leeway in the arrival time so that was not really delayed much. Decent food and overall good service. Wish they let us book more free seats beforehand since we didnt get seats together though we were travelling as a family.

title: Connecting flights be cautious avoid if can
text: was made to believe cost saving when a prominent company booked me on mum-kolkata-bkk flight & return. had a v troublesome experience with airlines careless handling baggage recheckin , nearly missed connected flight. kolkata airport is worse than a train station. one has to walk to maybe the only lift to take to ist floor with the trollies. ,no snacks ,coffee stalls. security checkin is a joke. arrogant security personnel. avoid kolkata altogether if can. .spicejet rep is seldom assisting. a direct flight is best but chose a good airline because services matters.

title: Pretentious Marketing, do not be fooled. (first time flyer of this airline)
text:
1. Perpetually delayed flights one way or another. 
2. Marketing seems like a deception to me. Shows that they have good service and experience. Nope. 
3. Old aircrafts. 
4. Challenging booking service website, higher possibility of making an error.

It might seem to be a well-marketed airline but do not be deceived. Glad I didn‚Äôt get the SpiceMax option. No special feel with those at all if the rest of the flight is less than mediocre. First of all, I was already having issues while booking using their website. It has insufficiencies and also major errors that got me redoing my booking a couple of times. I booked for two people with the seat & food package but only one went through and got it and then the other person got selected with only the seat priority, that means I have to repurchase the food in a different transaction, not until after learning it because I review my flight after I purchase it; reviewing it before you purchase also isn‚Äôt a very efficient interface as well!!!! (so mad) So yeah, fine, ticket done purchased. Come flight HKG-DEL. Already 5hrs delayed since 2 days before the flight. Thanks for the notice. But the only reason being, because of ‚ÄùOperational Issues‚Äù. What the hell is that? Is it legally valid to have incompetence as a reason to delay flight? Haha so LOW. Soooo, we got to our flight. Old aircraft, below average service, not so nice air con system, all in all, the same feeling of having that delay, same level of feeling inside the cabin. Low. Yeah, this is what I get from choosing a cheaper airline. Now, moving on to the flight going back to HKG from DEL. My friends and I are so glad there weren‚Äôt any updates regarding delays so our flight is well flying on time. Our flight should be arriving few hours before our work call-time (I know, never again!) so we are thankful about no announcement of delay. But NO, SpiceEFFINGjet decided to delay the flight while everyone‚Äôs there waiting in front of our gate at the airport. Reason: IDK. The aircraft is just there in front of us, apparently, there was no clearance to board it, not even the crew who went there on time, like everyone else. Guess what? Delayed again for 2hrs and 30mins. Almost missed worked by a margin of ZERO minutes. Plus the fact that flying experience is as below average as always, plus the cabin is hotter than the flight going to DEL, and this is a midnight flight! 

DO NOT, I REPEAT, DO NOT FLY SPICEJET. Unless of course you understand what you‚Äôre getting and you are saving money. By all means, proceed.

title: Worse ever!
text: I have been visiting 146 countries and fled many, many airlines but this is THE worst ever. Unpleasant checkin personnel, filthy seats and surroundings. Smell urine all over the cabin.. no way, no way one more time. I rather take a taxi from Delhi to Goa if necessary.

title: Lied to, ignored, aggressive advertising strategies, terrible experience!
text:
This was one of the worst experiences I've had with any airline. This company:

-Lied about the price of the flight

-Ignored my emails, I sent 5 emails to the customer service people and was ignored in all of them

-and used extremely intense brainwashing and advertising techniques to try to manipulate people into spending money

I'll elaborate on all three. Overall, however, this company is terrible, unethical, and possibly downright evil.

On their webpage booking site, it shows the price of the flight, in my case 11,433 rs, and it says in the bottom left corner "Prices include taxes and fees". When you attempt to purchase the flight, however, it adds another 1000 rs in "convenience charge" for 500 and "convenience  fee" for 500. This is complete blatant lying and theft. It doesn't even make sense to me how you could pretend this is anything other than a total lie.

Then, when I emailed them about this to ask for the 1000 rs to be refunded, I got a single, extremely terse email asking for my flight booking number. The best part is that the email ended with "assuring you of our best attention at all times" HAHAHA, what a joke. I quickly provided the booking number and didn't hear back from them for 3 days. Then I sent my first email asking to confirm that they got my previous email and re-stating my request for the 1000 rs that was dishonestly charged to be refunded.

I never got any response to this. Three days later, I sent them yet another email, this time quite annoyed, that I still hadn't heard back from them and was obviously being ignored.

Then I sent them ANOTHER email asking for a response and still have not heard back from them. They completely ignored me and refuse to assist me in any way. "Our best attention", yeah right.

And worst of all was how terribly manipulative their behavior was on the flight. They had every single seat back covered in an advertisement for some flight add-on and it used very obvious psychological manipulation tactics. It was bright red letter saying "Choose [add-on]". The idea behind this advertisement is to unconsciously influence people into purchasing the add-on because the statement "choose [x]" is an attempt to subliminally influence people. By plastering this advertisement all over the entire plane, they're trying to make it so you can't even open your eyes without them trying to subconsciously manipulate you.

If that wasn't bad enough, they also blast similar advertisements over the speakers. I tried to deal with the ads on the seats by keeping my eyes closed as much as I could, and reminding myself that this was a manipulation attempt whenever I did open my eyes and see the advertisement, but every fifteen minutes for the entire 2 1/2 hour flight they would come on the speakers and make some announcement about their brand, ending it with "thank you for choosing [brand]". As above, this is a blatant manipulation attempt to try to psychologically program people into purchasing things from them. So, I tried to deal with that, but then they also run the food carts up and down the aisle over, and over, and over. They're constantly attempting to get people to spend money and subconsciously influence them into making purchases that they, for the entire 2 1/2 hour flight would every ten minutes bring the food cart down the aisle asking over and over again "Would you like to buy something? would you like to buy something? would you like to buy something?".

This made it impossible to get any rest during the flight, not to mention was equally upsetting, because it was yet another attempt from this company to try to squeeze more money out of you.

So basically, these people are so greedy and rude that they 1) lie to you about the price, 2) ignore you if you ask for justice, 3) try to subconsciously manipulate you into spending more money on their company in the future by attempting to psychologically program people with advertisements, and 4) constantly barrage you with attempts to ask you to spend more on the food cart.

I hate this company, and this was one of the worst travel experiences I have ever had. I highly suggest no body ever use this company, especially if you do not like people trying to manipulate you.

title: Nice Flight
text:
On 30 April flew by Spicejet,along with wife..she wanted front row... had nice experience, asked front row, as she was feeling bit tired after hectic schedule...hostesses told me pay some extra amount and we got Good Seat...with Food also... in-flight experience very good...Nice Dinner 

Flight Landed ON time...wife enjoyed her meal and had good sleep...

Thanks for all the Hostesses, who took special care...

Sridhar

title: SG105, Delhi-Chennai.
text:
As ever , the most annoying part of travel in SpiceJet cropped up during webcheckin, I had to pay for webcheckin, since the airline forces you to pay for choosing a seat  !! Ridiculous. This flight  was on one of those early days of the crisis in the domestic airline industry of India. 
The flight was bit delayed, but I had a comfortable seat in the front row ( after all, I had paid for it). Came along with the bundled offer, the food. It was decent. 
The bags were also out quickly, as part of the ' extra payment package'
But, what if I didn't pay extra for these basic things? It's just not a pleasure to travel in air in India these days. It's expensive and annoying.

title: Book in spicemax only.
text: No entertainment, very less leg room. Book in spice max for comfortable seats.no food, alcohol or welcome drink for non spice max tickets.

title: Pleasant Cabin Crew. Good Service
text: Travelled SpiceJet for the first time. The cabin crew was pleasant. The pay for meal menu options were good, available on board and tasty. The aircraft Bombardier was nice. Seat comfort was good.

title: Not enough food supplies and being late by an hour.
text: I honestly hated the airline as they were late by an hour and they did not have enough food supplies even though I was sitting at the front near the engine view. Plus, I wished I had gone on IndiGo as they were always on time and had enough food for the whole airline. I would never recommend this airline to anyone ever. I hope this airline also dies like Jet Airways did. So, I HOPE YOU DIE.

title: Decent flight
text:
Spicejet is an Indian budget airline recently showing signs of aggressive growth. Good communication from the airline which kept me well informed. Checkin was smooth. Boarding was nearly on time. Spicejet was operating an aircraft of Jet Airways. The old livery was still apparent. 
The major drawback is the minimal legroom. Evacuation in an emergency could be a challenge.  The airline serves only water. They could serve a beverage and a cookie like some US carriers.  The major attraction is the low cost though full service airlines have also a similar cost structure. 
Service was acceptable and the flight was nearly on time. Deboarding took time in the absence of an aerobridge. My baggage came out quickly.  The cabin was clean and overall the flight was decent for a 100 minute journey.

title: Delay delay and some more delay
text:
I took two flights to go and to come back from Hong-Kong. Both planes were delayed at least 2h30 !

They tell you about delay at check-in so obviously too late.
They insisted for me to get a visa from Hong-Kong but with a French passport you don't need a visa !! Took a moment for them to understand.

Just for the delay, never take SpiceJet ! It will ruin your flight transfer, your hotel booking because I assure you they are going to be late

title: horrible nightmare
text: i wish there was a 0 star option for the nightmare we went through with spicejet in dubai airport. first of all they always fly few hours late, it is default to fly 1-2 hours late for them - never seen this kind of lazy pathetic attitude with any other airline. so we were not suprised to get a message 5 hours before departure that their flight is late by 2 hours. in any case we were on abu dhabi tour and delayed our return by 1 hour - we reached airport at 8pm and checkin was done by 9pm - then the horror story revealed - in 5 installments they delayed they flight by 16 HOURS, never giving any accurate info till the very end , useless staff at airport who were hiding behind the airport and emirates staff to shield themselves. everytime the departure time apporached, they pushed by 1-2 hours so that they could inflict maximum TORTURE and avoid giving compesation to stranded passengers. We had senior citizens and small kids in our group and we had to sit at the departure gate for 8 hours. then we asked for their senior staff as they said flight is delayed from 5.30 am to 12.25 pm. there he is saying - we have arranged lounge for you, but no one informed us. again lounge has only chairs - no place to sleep. again flight is delayed by 1 hour and finally left at 2 pm  instead of 10.45pm departure of last night. HORRIBLE, HORRIBLE staff and airlines, pls avoid at any cost them - no concept of customer concerns for them.

title: Flight delay
text:
My flight SG 103 was scheduled to departure at 3pm but it was rescheduled to 4.50pm with out any advance message.
They charge for even 3kg of excess baggage but they don‚Äôt have any value for human time loss of 2 hours.i suggest airline to change their name to latejet because u people are generally late for every flight from delhi to chennai.
For passangers I advise keep this airline as last option if they don‚Äôt get other .and add at least three hours if you are traveling.

title: Economical Airlines
text:
This is one of the Cheapest domestic flight available. The journey was very good and enjoyable. Cabin Crew was very nice and polite. The Plane was very clean and tidy.
Only one difficulty is that the flights of Spice Jet always late. this time also we had to wait for more than 30 minutes. 
OK to travel per Spice Jet.

title: Affordable budgeted airline
text: Me and my wife reached Kochin intl airport around 2400hrs on 25th March 2019, due to some technical reason check in was very slow and immigration clearance  took almost 1 hour due to rush, we couldn't make our usual visit to priority lounge, airline insisted us to board our flight SG17 directly, our seats were assigned  on 17  E and F, flight departed one hour late from Kochin, it was comfortable cruise without much turbulence,  flight crew served our dinner against cash  payment, took almost 4 hours to land in Dubai, Landing in dubai was very smooth, no jerk  better than EK, AI or Air Arabia, immigration clearance and baggage claim in dubai  took only 45 min. Our both sons were at the meeting point to receive us with their usual smile and hug, overall rating of our Spicejet  travel was fairly satisfactory. No hesitation in using and recommending Spicejet to my friends and family members

title: Good Experirence
text: each and Every staff was a helpful, really good experience with SpiceJet. Air hostess did their best, they explained safety things, etc.,  I'm satisfied with the air travel with SpiceJet.

title: Ohh No ...SpiceJet
text:
Guys , writing from Chennai Airport,
This is my last trip with Spicejet. I'm tired of it. Flight delay is a mandate option of spicejet.
Never choose SpiceJet if you are a person with time commitments.i booked 9.50am flight as i wanted to reach Madurai before 1pm. And i received a message that the flight got delayed to 11.40am due to the operational issues. Now again the shedule got pushed to 12.10. I spoke to one Mr.Ashwin one of the SpiceJet officer incharge and he confirmed that affected passengers will be compensated with "Samosa ,Cake and a drink"ü§î. Even last time (18June 2018)my flight from chennai to SriLanka got delayed by 4 hours.(with the same Operational issues). So I'm not going to recommend SpiceJet for any good reason. You can find proof in attached photographs.

title: No empathy for senior citizen and wheel chair assistance customers
text:
I had booked spice jet to travel with my elderly mother and pre Requested for wheel chair assistance , when the boarding started there wasn‚Äôt any consideration or announcement to board the wheel chair passenger first , as a result of this my mother who has severe challenges to walk was made to board in the last and had to walk through the aisle with fully occupied rows where it is impossible to walk in this air craft without any assistance .

Staff had zero empathy and was getting offensive when questioned why was wheel chair passenger not boarded first , I was told by their crew don‚Äôt teach us how to do the boarding .
Staff with Absolutely zero empathy and organising abilities.

title: Last minute cancellation & resheduling
text: Flight is postponed 3 hrs and after take off it is delayed further for 40minutes without any announcements. Hence we have missed the train to home town. Spicejet eaten away 12 hrs in our tour program (In round trip) and made our return journey a miserable one. In initiat booking i have booked the flight as Bagtogra-Bengaluru- Chennai and paid for convinience (Airport charges for Bengaluru) charges for stop over airport which is not returned by them after the flight was resheduled by them as direct flight. They have not responded via mail as well as in airports.

title: Pune Dubai pax need be aware.
text:
Just because Spicejet is one of the few or lets say one of the only 2 - 3 airlines that have a direct flight from Pune to Dubai, they have assumed and taken for granted that regardless of the condition of the aircraft, kind of seats, filthy atmosphere and carpets etc, we will as passengers endure, bear and not complain about the same.

SHAME ON YOU!

On our way back from Dubai on 7/8 may (past midnight landing into Pune) we even SWATTED A COCROACH COMING DOWN THE ROOF OVER THE WINDOW PANE with our shoe, just before landing into Pune.

The condition of the seats. Broken tables that are SCOTCH TAPED. 

Horrible carpets stained and unclean.

Seats and covers have holes and look like there could be bug and maybe even some other pest infestation inside them.

SERVICE WAS FANTASTIC, but the condition of the aircraft is only to cry about.

Shame that Spicejet and the DGCA have turned a blind eye to this menace or this aircraft , maybe it could be called a converted ST BUS THAT CAN FLY.

Deplorable. 

By the way this flight has no entertainment, no music headset nothing. Almost 3 hours of nothing.

title: A decent flight
text: Good check in. Good boarding. Very comfortable seat with good leg room. Crew was decent. Food has scope fo improvement. Overall a decent flight

title: Last minute cancellation
text: My flight got cancelled at the super last minute,and was only known to me 2hrs before check in. Terrible experience and ruined all my plans. No compensation done and i lost all my expenses for the hotel on that day. Never take this airline as they are lots of bad reviews on it. Suggest to take better airlines and reliable ones. Very disappointed as i am travelling from Singapore to Shridi and supposed to transit using this airline. Regret for choosing spicejet. Thanks spicejet.

title: Rubbish airline
text: I had booked a flight to bengaluru which was cancelled because of the 787 max jet grounding. But it took over a month before I got my refund after promising me it within 48hrs .customer service number always got cut off and would take 3 days to answer emails . Ruined the rest of my holiday and I would not recommend flying with spicejet

title: Poor Customer Service
text: I booked the outbound on April 24th and inbound on 27th through an agent in India. After couple of days I received an email mentioning one segment of inbound flight was cancelled and rebooked for next day. We contacted the agent and mentioned to them we have plans and we cannot take the offer made by the airlines. The agent and the airlines refused the refund and I ended up booking the entire trip through another airlines. I was expecting a full refund since it is not my fault. Repeated requests were denied and I didn‚Äôt get my money back. Poor customer service and I will not recommend this airlines to anyone.

title: Indigo is 1000 times better than Spicejet
text:
To be frank I am a frequent flier. Most of the time I reach Airport an hour before boarding to complete the check in process. 
 But today (7th May 2019), I had worst experience with airlines in my life. I booked an emergency ticket at 4 in the morning just after I got news of my Grandfather's death. I rushed to Airport at 5 as I had  to travel 2 hours from Nelamangala to Devanahalli. I couldn't reach airport 45 minutes before scheduled time as I was stuck in Traffic. I had booked flight of 7:50 and I reached at 7:35. But, Spice Jet representative refused to help me even after explaining my situation.
Since the next flight was in the evening I dropped the plan of rescheduling the flight. With no options left I booked Indigo flight which was scheduled to leave at 11:15.

The main differences which I observed is that I had got no messages from spicejet about check in time and online check in link, but got the same from Indigo team.
Further, I din't get any calls from spicejet team to know wherher I am willing to travel or not, where as Indigo representative was calling (phone call) the passengers who didn't turnup even after final call.

Such a irresponsible team.

title: Worst service ever
text: Their flight was almost 6hours delayed at night and they didn't give any complimentary dinner for this reason need to buy our dinner separately. My flight schedule was to land on Delhi at 8pm local time but we were landed at 1.40am local time.

title: Refund
text: I booked this airline from Delhi to Ahmadabad on 16 th April and on 4th April they sent me a SMS regarding cancellation this flight then I again I booked this flight as they sent me a ling for refund or rebook, so I rebook this flight even they sent me a greeting sms on 15th April regarding my journey  but when I went to airport on 16th April then I come to know that this flight is cancelled but I didn't get any SMS regarding this, so I ask for refund they ask me to dial customer care and customer care said we forwarded your request and you will get your refund with in 15 days but still I am waiting for my money I called up lots of time and I went to their reservation counter at terminal 3 but no response

title: If you value your time and want a pleasant experience please go for Indigo
text:
Flight delayed by 5hr and 20 min, then they change the boarding gate and not inform anyone.

They make you pay for Spicemax for extra legroom, priority boarding and terrible meal on the plane and don't oblige to the privileges. 

If you look at the arrival time which is 3 hours earlier than the departure time. The boarding pass said that travel time from Ahmedabad to Chennai is only 45 mins which in no scenario is possible.

They have poor tech and disappointing customer service where they will make you wait on the call for 30+ mins and then disconnect the call.

Please refrain from such scams and look for a different airline.

title: Refund
text:
I have been very disappointed with spicejet's service.
I boarded a flight from Chennai to Guwahati on 26/04/2019 (hand baggage fare only) initially i was supposed to pay a sum of *** rupess for a check-in baggage, I paid it via my debit card, the airline staff charged me extra which was a mistake made by their side. I informed them about this mistake, the airline staff told me that my money will be refunded within 24 hours, I've been calling the customer service for the past 2 days with no sort of any response from your end, finally I was able to connect with the customer service after 2 long days, I informed them about my situation, they told me that my money will be refunded within 7-8 working days.

Getting back to this it has been 10 days now where is my refunded amount which I was supposed to get back from them?? I have tried calling customer service more than a 100 times but with 0 response from their end...

title: Still cannot get over the transformation
text: From bankrupty to one of the best domestic airline. Just amazing. The Spice max is just short of business class. More room, centre seat is empty and super hot food and service.

title: Serves the purpose (barely)
text: The flight with the worst legroom. The staff can be nice sometimes and indifferent at times as well. But the cabin isn't the best I've experienced. This is fine for a short flight. Not recommended for long flights.

title: Un reliable
text:
We were to take a flight with them from Jaiselmer to Goa via Surat fir the last week of our holidays. A day and half before we were due to fly out l received an sms informing me that our flight had been cancelled. We wrre given two options in the message, full refund or rebook. We tried ringing on the number they had provided that night, but could not get through. We finally got through the next morning but l had trouble understanding the woman on the phone and when l asked her to repeat my choices she started to get very impatient and annoyed. Told her l would have to ring back after l spoke with the other's. As they had cancelled all flights except one we were worried that we would not get on the flight. Thankfully, our tour company Creative travel, were wonderful and said they would look into it for us and we're able to get us on the flight, virtually last seats on plane, 3 Flights later we finally arrived in Goa a day later than we were to originally arrive and paid double the amount of what we had originally paid for our flights.
We were told by our hotel that them cancelling a flight was nothing unusual and that they cancel because they can. My guess is that our earlier flight wasnt fully booked so they just cancelled it.
Would never fly with them again.

title: Worst flight service everüò£
text: I'm writing this review from the experience my family and my fellow passengers had to go through.the flight time was changed twice, almost 5 hours delay. And after waiting in the airport like forever, after reaching ccj we were struck with other nightmare, 4 of our luggage (30 other passengers as well) bags will be received only the next day, this also there was no info about it. The service of spicejet is so poor and pathetic that I (who has never ever written any reviews before) am writing this and would never suggest spicejet to anyone and I would never travel in spicejet.

title: Refund for cancellation ...
text:
Oh my Dear ,
I had cancelled a return ticket issued ,  dated 19th April 2019
Hyderabad to Jharsuguda , 
PNR : YGF27H 

When I cancelled it over phone on 18th April 2019  I was told that it would take 5-7 working days to get a refund . As of today I haven‚Äôt received any in my account . It is very difficult to connect to the phone numbers provided by your company‚Äôs website. They don‚Äôt work and no email confirmation from them either ... why  such delay. I don‚Äôt think I will ever advise anybody for their service ever ... so unprofessional and irritating ...

Dr. Dev Paramanik

title: Nothing special about flight. I chose a economy flight and i got a economy flight.
text: You will get what you choose. Do not expect anything from a economy flight. No comfort or special experience. Wanted save few bucks and i saved few bucks.

title: very very fast
text: it was a small aircraft but ample space for sitting.... crew was polite... it took lesser time to reach jaipur than scheduled. my overall experience was very good.

title: 5star service even though low cost airlines.
text:
With more than 2decades flying international bussiness experience, observed quality & human touch was dimnissing drastically & was almost forgotten/not expect that quality service any more until my this previous flight. Thank god, family atmosphere, services with smile without compromissing on Safety was practiced maticulesly from check counter until disembarkation.
To narrate few: 
1) Check in counter staff humble expression "Sir, flight estimated to be delay by 10mins".
2) Embarkation staff was double checking the extra steps(portable steps) to make sure was aligned perfectly before passangers climb up.
3) Passangers with special care was treated so well until she comfortable at either destinations.
4) Previously I too had excellent experience with call center staff handling special assistance for my family.
Truly felt like 5star service even though low cost airlines.

title: Confusion
text: I dont understand why an airline so big in India confusion among there employees is crucial. Since the minute you check in confusion starts.  Coming from an airline industry myself there employees need; there employees need better training in customer service and reliability.  SpiceJet you need to step your service up. Indian people dont complain I guess but as a westerner you see the confusion among them. If spuce Jet would hire me for just a month, I could make it a better experience for the passenger.

title: Just booked flights, but already disappointed
text:
I've just booked flights with this airline and already not liking the service. 
We would like to extend the stay in Udaipur and tried to contact customer service for a day, but unfortunately were not able to reach them. When finally got hold of them but then it passed Spice Jet 24 hours policy which barred me to change my booking and I couldn't change the dates for free, but charging more than I actually paid to change (even though prices are same)
I really like Air India airlines as they always are very helpful, accommodating and understanding especially with these kind of requests, so now I really regret that we haven't booked flights with them, just thought SpiceJet will be also provide good customer service - but it was a bad thought!  Never again with SpiceJet

title: On time Flight
text: It is a Boeying 737 Aircraft, ample leg space, Scheduled departure and Scheduled arrival.  Lunch served was good and tasty in quality.

title: silicon sealant to hold the plane together.
text:
The flight was over 5 hours late. I had paid for "priority boarding" this didn't happen
The safety briefing recording stopped so they did it manually, forgot about the life jacket. Then they had to close and open the door on the plane to fix something and there's me wondering why they are using silicon to hold the plane together.

Their maintenance is appalling and I wish my flight was the only late one for them but at least one other when I was traveling and another on Friday before, If you want to get somewhere on time I would avoid them. I will be.

title: Delay + Baggage Allowance
text: A terrible delay of 6 hours only to recive a lame explanation from a Spicejet staff with no apology and states... You are atleast lucky that your flight was not cancelled at the initial check in counter. And the experience gets worse when your duty free baggage is also included in the 7 kg hand bag allowance with not even a waiver for 1 kg. Hope i am not bpund to travel this airline again.

title: Terrible User interface of Spicejet website
text:
I was trying to book a flight on May3rd which is on friday...once when i ahve choseen may 3rd on home page and then continued to go to payement for summary the departure date automatically change to 5th of may...and i oinly notixed it after the booking. 

I tried to call the customer care mentioned in the site but they dont even ring...such a shame and poor customer support...All i had to do reschedule my itineary.

title: Worst experience ever had
text: 1st time im using this flight and it was horrible.me , my fam ,relatives wont use this flight from now on . Worst service and horrible staffs u have . On 28th April 19 , actual dep time was around 3 pm and it took around 10.we wait all this time. All the other flight will allow hand bags with weight upto 10 kg emirates ethihad airindia etc. but the spice jet staffs was not allowing the baggage that too below 8 (7 and a decimal)

title: Last movement flight cancelled and preponed.
text: It was our travel visit to Darjeeling  . We booked flight at 4.45 pm from Bagdogra. But airways cancelled it on previous day and preponed by 4 hours. It was very much disturbing situation for us. We didn't expect such thing from so called reputed airlines.

title: Just an air shuttle
text: I have been traveled with this airlines for first time and felt scared of the way it took the journey with shakes and jerks. BTW, it's a thrilling experience.

title: Not spicy enough üòÑ
text:
International air travel is different from domestic and SpiceJet is trying very hard to come to terms with it. But they are far from cracking it. 
Delay on both the sectors 2 hrs while going. Downright rude staff at Hong Kong terminal ( the lady actually does not deserve to be in hospitality industry) , less than average food if you precook Spice Max , average aircraft , no aerobridge both sides , Incabin crew tries to make up for many of the shortcomings , advertising panels in the cabin which are hideous and ridiculous. Too many things to improve

title: Pathetic
text: Not on schedule.never ever travel by this airline.both the ways the flight got delayed by two hours.i missed my connecting flight.we were 8 of us ,when approached they said they could do nothing.

title: Disappointing customer care system
text:
Dear SpiceJet Customer, 

Thank you for writing to SpiceJet ! 

This is an automated response to your e-mail vide reference no. - 03690108 . Please do not respond to this mail. 

We will get back to you within 3 working days. For any urgent assistance please call us at our 24 x7 helpdesk number +91 9871803333 or +91 9654003333 or visit our website www.

The above statement will always automated generates against your each and every time you will send your issue to to spicejet customer care mail but you will never get response from them, what a nice customer care, I don‚Äôt believe how they can do this to customer

title: Be ready to sit in a congested place
text: The seats offered in the airline are very much uncomfortable. The rest rooms were barely lit as well as very very limited space was offered. Plus, it is the airline, which charges for web check in. Even for the middle seats.

title: Nice Travel Experience
text: Clean aircraft cabin. Nice service by Caring crew. On time schedule. efficient check in & luggage delivery process.

title: Pathetic service
text:
I had my laptop in my check-in bag and while checking-in I told the executive to handle this bag with caution as this was having laptop. She put a red-coloured 'fragile-tag' on it. Upon arrival at CCU I got very disgruntled on finding my bag rolling over the belt with no protection at all. To my dismay, the laptop was broken.

Moreover, I requested the lady at check-in counter to provide me with an aisle or window seat to which she replied that she had already alloted me 16F which is an emergency seat. I enquired whether this seat reclined to which she nodded in 'yes'. To my amazement, that seat turned out to be non-reclining.

On the top of that, the reading light focused onto my seat was not working and I was not transferred to any other seat by the crew citing the reason that the aircraft was full. This all provided me with nothing but trouble in reading the book I wanted to.

I would conclude that service provided to me was pathetic in terms of seating (non-reclining seat even upon requesting), spending my 2 hours onboard(light not working), and lastly in handling my luggage (breaking of my laptop).

title: Rip Off
text: First, the airline charged me nearly $100 more than what was originally quoted when converted from rupees to US dollars. I got a shock when my girlfriend showed me our credit card statement. When I mentioned it when I finally called after United Airlines canceled my flight due to Pakistan shutting down its air space 11 days before my departure, the airline agent didn‚Äôt say anything. When I inquired about new dates for my flight due to the situation, she simply said, it‚Äôs not our fault and wanted to charge me a change fee or a cancellation fee. Poor customer service and the airline overcharges. I will never fly SpiceJet and I won‚Äôt recommend it to my readers either.

title: SpiceMax NOT Worth for your money!
text:
From the ads, SpiceMax offers an extra legroom, a complimentary meal and beverage including blanket and cushion, priority check-in, priority boarding and priority baggage handling, so I decided to buy the service for my group in order to get a worth experience. However, what I got from SpiceMax was extremely unsatisfied service as follows:
1. Priority Check-in: we had been waiting at the counter for SpiceMax, but the staff wasn‚Äôt ready while counters for regular SpiceJet passengers were ready and served people in line before the SpiceMax counter.
2. Priority Boarding: we were waiting at the gate (14A), and no one announced for SpiceMax boarding. There were many people in line, so I asked the ground staff, and also showed all 6 boarding passes with SpiceMax, and asked him about ‚Äúthe Priority Boarding‚Äù. He said ‚ÄúNO‚Äù and told me to wait in line. So what is Priority Boarding?
3. Priority Baggage Handling: When we arrived at BKK Airport, our baggage was NOT being handled on priority though we had priority tag on all of our luggage. Many SpiceJet passengers had their luggage before I had mine. Do I pay extra for a non-priority service?
4. Meal and beverage: thank you very much as we had this service on board. However, for blanket and cushion, when I asked the staff, they said they already placed on our seats. They were kind enough to look for it from another passengers, and finally they got two more for us, but we didn‚Äôt want to use them as they are used by someone else.

title: The airline of the masses !
text: This airline carries the masses across India providing the service to the huge number of people . The serpentine queues are an indication that due to its cuttting edge pricing of the tickets its is the preferred choice of many . The vast network links the various destinations across the country . The seat comfort , / legroom and the attention is at the bottom line of the consideration for travellers . I have seen many a seen on various airport due to late arrival / canceled flight s and the people holding the valid tickets were to be acomoded after a great fight broke out between the aggrieved passengers and the airline personnel . All in all it still a preferred airline  after the exit of Jetairways and next to Indigo airline . Ticket prices are compititive but your money‚Äôs worth ,Food and beverages are sold on board .

title: No frills airline
text: I found it impressive that this no frills airline believes it to keep  'on time schedule'. The crew is well mannered and nothing wrong during the flight. The sandwich  paid for was good and filling.  For short distances it is superb.  Do not expect any luxury.

title: No major complaints, but there are drawbacks you will notice.
text:
I flew on SpiceJet's Bombardier Q400 (flying time 75 min). The aircraft was well-maintained and the crew were friendly. The food (which I pre-ordered) was also not bad.
One thing I didn't like was that while boarding (via bus), we were taken in the bus to a remote stand where the aircraft was parked but we had to stand in the bus for a good 10 minutes (I assume the cabin wasn't ready). This was unusual. Also, in the cabin, not every seat had the airline magazine (mine didn't). 
Apart from these, the flight was good and the captain's cheerful announcements were also wonderful.

title: Poor standards for international airline
text: Cramped seats, no tv and pathetic boarding experience. Don't remember anything good about the experience.

title: Very worst airlines
text: Very worst airlines always this airlines makes delay or early flight these airlines make the passengers to wait for maximum 3 hrs 40 mins

title: Would not fly with this airline again
text: 4 hour delay.  Received conflicting information regarding the length of delay making it difficult informing our onward transport and accommodation. No refreshments offered

title: Always Delay
text: Always Delayed, staff are not supported, No information is providing for delay by the airline staff. the staff is always busy in their gossips.

title: Problems during check-in
text:
We encountered some problems during check-in at Mumbai airport. Apparently, our travel agent hadn't booked check-in luggage and we got to know this at the counter. I thought it was just us, but 10 other people behind us had the same problem, which led me to think that there was something wrong with the airline policy and not us.

We ultimately ended up paying for the luggage because there was no other choice. Also, while showing some terms and conditions from the SpiceJet website to the person at the counter, we were informed that the information on the site is not updated. I would like to urge the airline to give the latest information on the website regarding baggage policies so that people don't have to go through the same hassle at the airport.

Luckily, the person at the check-in counter was really friendly and helpful. Hats off to her!

title: Flight delay no gate info at airport very last minute
text:
Flight delayed several hours
No info on gate departure until last minute
Very stressful that it was not even announced on the big board with other airlines !!

title: Decent!
text: The flight cabin services were very good but the flight was delayed but yet the airlines services were nice and decent!

title: Not worth UPGRADING
text:
Pretty much an attitude as far the fares are compared, lots of laughter!!
Definitely a budget airline but doesn't mean you hire staff who degrade experience. When I do my tickets last moment but still not get a good deal as we pay roughly upto 16-17k [One side] for last moment fares to this destination.

Kolkata needs to re-check staffing, unacceptable attitude.
I'd have upgraded but because of the way they spoke at their own unprofessionalism, did not for a 45-50 min flight!

title: Nice trip
text: Staff at flight is very courteous and helpful . Flight has reached destination before schedule time.

title: Worst Experience
text: I have traveled from Goa to Ahmedabad on 13-04-2019 at 5:00 PM but at last moment they cancelled flight..and no alternative flight till 15th....we have wasted our lots of time on Spicejet customer care in Goa....and also flight conditions are also bad... continuous noise... terrible journey.... Volvo bus comfort level is much better than Spicejet... never go with Spicejet...go with other flights... but never Spicejet...

title: worst experience
text: I have travel from Port Blair to Chennai with my Family members on 24.12.2018 with pre booking meals while buying Air Ticket. I have Booked 2 nos. Chicken legs piece with chicken tikka with veg tikka haryali of Rs. 300.00 but the Airline has served Chicken Sandwich Rs. 200 only. I have complain to the steward but they have not solved my problem. I have lost a sum of Rs. 200.00.

title: An Average airline nothing much to say
text:
This is one of the airline where you travel just to get to the destination. Do not expect any travel experience with this. Frankly there is nothing coming to my mind on what is best in this based on my experience.

But the biggest issue for me was the legroom. this has the worst leg room comparing to other economy flights. i am 6 feet tall and i could not keep my leg properly and had to fold it back for the entire journey. it was painful.
Would not recommend for any traveller.

title: Not worth upgrading
text:
We paid the upgrade fee for priority boarding, meals, leg room, priority baggage (premium service upgrade). All we got was more legroom. No announcement was made about the priority boarding so we didn‚Äôt receive that. Everyone received the same meals. We did have more leg room so that was good. We did not receive our bags before anyone else (or in reasonable time‚Äîone bag was dead last! Despite the priority tag on it). 
Also there is no entertainment on this flight unless you download it before the flight. I wouldn‚Äôt fly it again. At the end of the flight we were also supposed to have priority deplaning however the flight attendants had no interest in maintaining that and the passengers all moved up to empty seats prior to landing so the front of the plane was packed for the last ten min of the flight. It was bizarre that was allowed. When the planes stopped the passengers literally stampeded to the front of the plane in the absence of any announcement to do otherwise. So don‚Äôt waste your money. The behaviour of the passengers would indicate this is typical behaviour of this airline. We flew another airline return and did not experience this at all.

title: Upgraded flight from Amritsar to Dubai
text:
I upgraded my Fathers return flight from ATQ - DXB with SpiceJet before his flight from DXB. This provided my father (who is almost 80yrs of age) with Priority Check-In at ATQ, select an Extra Leg Room Seat and have Priority Bag Retrieval upon his arrival in DXB.
At check-in my father was told to show the card which was made for the upgrade. My father explained that the card is with his son in Dubai. After long delays and bickering, he was forced to pay for the upgrade again. What should have been a smooth hassle free experience actually caused my father mores stress and anxiety with the priority check-in.
The selected seat (1A) on the aircraft was meant to have extra leg room but in fact was hindered by the aircraft door so my father couldn't stretch his legs. This was stated as a seat with extra leg room which was clearly incorrect.
Upon his arrival into DXB his checked-in bag should have been the first bags on the belt but he was left waiting for his luggage like others who had not paid for the upgraded service.
He was told by the check-in staff in ATQ that the money for the upgrade which was paid by credit card will be refunded back to the card. I tried to contact SpiceJet here to claim a refund and was informed I have to email any complaints. I did so and am still awaiting a response and my refund.
Overall it was a terrible experience for my father and he will never fly with SpiceJet again! The check-in staff were not helpful in anyway and the customer service with regards to claiming back a refund is non existent. DO NOT BOOK or UPGRADE with this airline!

title: Spice Jet - Punctuality
text:
This is the only flight from Chennai to Shirdi and is almost full everyday. The departure time is also very convenient. Only drawback is , it is late almost all the days. They are not maintaining the punctuality.
Otherwise it is a decent flight.

title: Pathetic Treatment by Checkin staff- Spicejet never again!!
text:
I travel every week between Delhi Pune(return), and often take spicejet amongst other airlines. But one incidence, on 18th Mar 2019, has mired the entire experience, making me never to take SpiceJet again. 
The checkin staff singled me out and asked me to pay extra as my checking baggage was over by 2Kgs (15->17Kgs). I agreed to pay 800 rs for extra 2Kgs, but then i was asked to weigh by cabin bag as well, which was 8.7(7->8.7) and I was asked to pay 800 more. Total 1600. I was appalled as in my previous weekly trips to Pune I have never been charged for cabin baggage. I asked the checkin fellow to weigh everyone‚Äôs bag who are behind me in the check-in queue and 90% of them will have over 7Kgs(one can easily make out even looking at them that those bags were over 7kgs). But he insisted upon me coughing up 1600, and once I did he didn‚Äôt bother to check weight of anyone‚Äôs checkin bag, who were behind me in the queue. 
I am upset by the fact that I was signalled out. 
If you( Spicejet) is so keen to follow rules to the letter then it should be for all. Since then I have decided never to travel with spicejet. Even if their tickets, for my weekly trips, are cheaper than the other airlines, I still don‚Äôt book Spicejet.
Unfortunately, because of one checkin staff the airline has lost a valuable customer ( and many more as word-of-mouth spread) and even after posting the incident to the airline, there was not even an acknowledgement from their end. 
I have given them 3 stars because the staff onboard is courteous and crafts are clean.
But Spicejet, never again.

title: FLIGHT FROM KOLKATA TO GUWAHATI
text: On the particular day, the flight was scheduled to leave Kolkata at 1 30pm. It got delayed by two hours and was rescheduled at 3 30pm due to some technical problems at Bangalore from where the flight was about to leave for Kolkata and further Guwahati. Then all of a sudden all the passengers got to know that the flight would be again delayed by another two and a half hours and would leave at 6pm or might be would have been cancelled. The ground staff of Spicejet at Kolkata were there for the passengers throughout and even arranged for snacks in the food court.Though all were disturbed due to the delay, many were furious and some were in the verge of getting into fights with ground staff, they managed it well and finally we all boarded the flight at 6pm for Guwahati.

title: SHIRDI TRIP APRIL 2019
text: very low standard service after paid cost like full service,aircraft are very old and need over haul maintenance of aircraft is very poor,only plus point is ontime

title: Flight from Chennai to Varanasi
text: On that day of travel (26th March)the flight was delayed due to consequential effect of bad weather at Bagdogra by near about five hours. But the staff at Chennai took care to provide us with snacks(cake,samosa and cool drink.).  We were informed before hand about the delay.

title: ASIM CHAKRABARTI
text:
Seating comfort is not there. Handrail and seat belts are not clean.  Even you will find broken knobs on the ceiling. 
Hostess were got upset if you demand! for water. First time they may be offer but second time you have to be careful. 
Though, I have highlighted some of these points as a feedback which had been provided by them. But almost 6 months gone nothing have been reverted.

title: Convenient time to reach destination
text:
Good service. Flight crew was very co-operative. Arranged wheel chair for my mother immediately on deboarding the flight at Mumbai though it was not informed in advance. The porter was with us till we got into the car.
Very polite staff at both the airports ... Delhi and Mumbai

title: Took it only because it was the only flight from Pune.
text:
This was the only flight that I could find from Pune to fly to Dubai. The timing too was suitable (7.50pm from Pune). 

I wasn't aware that the food had to be pre-booked.

title: Love this Airline
text: We flew from Mumbai to Goa and then  Goa to Delhi. Everything seems to happen on time starting from boarding to takeoff and landing. We upgraded on flight to Delhi and it was nice touch. We would love to travel this airline when we will visit India again.

title: Small flight with good amenities-Value for money
text:
It was a good flight, well maintained but with no additional services. YOU need to pay for all the services, food etc. Flight was on time. 
Good landing and take off.

title: Worst airlines looting your money
text:
I recently travelled by spicejet from kolkata to Mumbai. I booked my tickets through Goibibo which I got on some discounted price. After final booking I got to know that they haven‚Äôt provide option to select seats whereas other offer to do so. So to get preferred seats (as we are 7 members) I did web checkin at the time of doing I shocked by clearly understanding their looting strategy. These cheap airline has very low level cheap strategies like they free seats avialble only in middle of each row that means if your 2,3,4 or more family member then you will get single seat in the middle of every row. And If you want desired seats then you have to pay extra charges which 200 for each seat WTF!! However it was urgent i paid 200 and allocate desired seats. After that I got three times calls/Messgaes from them to inform me that My seats has been booked and flight schedule on this day. 

Now in evey call they haven‚Äôt mentioned single word about luggage or check in baggage. When I reach to airport and goes for check in then lady shamelessly said that you can not carry your luggage, I said is it more than 15 kg? (As per airline limit) she said, no your tickes doesn‚Äôt include luggage‚Äôs  only hand baggage. i told them that neither it has mentioned anywhere nor your CCE told me in their calls. She said i don‚Äôt know its our process you have to pay, you booked tickets from third party so we won‚Äôt allowed you to take luggage you have to pay for this. I denied to pay she said we won‚Äôt allow you to take luggage.

 This is completely unprofessional behaviour she charged me 400 Rs for each bag and given normal hand written receipt which can fraud or looting agenda. These idiots won‚Äôt inform you earlier they just gives you tickes not allocating seats even neither gives any information about luggage or checkin rules or their so called process because they want to loot you. I seriously hate this airlines as I travelled lot but never faced this. I will never travel by this third class airline. #SpiceJetIhateYou

title: Never again
text:
I just got off a call with my parents who are travelling in India.  I can‚Äôt believe what I just heard from them! Are we in the 21century?! My parents are currently in India and boarded a flight from Chennai to go to Mumbai. After the flight had ascended, my elderly father asked an air hostess to point him in the direction of the washroom.  She told him that he couldn't use the washroom on board because people are eating. He tried to talk to a couple of them and told them he was diabetic but they told him to sit down. He had to hold it until they landed. This situation really humiliated my father who has never experienced this in his life.  

I have never been disgusted in my life toward anyone or a company. In all my travels, I have never experienced this nor have I heard it from anyone else. No one  should be denied of this basic human function, especially when you paid money for you flight seat which includes the right to use the washroom. Spice jet probably is tying to make the washroom pay per use ? They could have told him how much and he would have paid. 

My parents have been in India a few times before and have always flown on Indigo; they never experienced this there. 

This would be the last time my parents fly spice jet. I will make sure to spread the word about the experience to everyone so they are not humiliated as my father was. 

Spice jet should be ashamed to treat their paying customers like this.

title: Delayed flight but well done
text: My flight was delayed by about 2 hours. Staff made sure that there is no further delay and managed it very well. They made sure food is delivered even though it was late.

title: No complaints
text: We took Spicejet for three sectors chennai to Varanasi and return, Kolkata to Varanasi during last month. Our flights were on time, didn't have to wait too long for the luggages. Our Varanasi flights used to be connecting a flight at Delhi, this time with the direct service, no multiple stops.

title: SpiceJet
text: This being one of the cheap cost effective airlines it was an average flight.  Nothing to complain about or praise about.

title: Overcharged for luggage and charged for seat upgrade that I declined
text: Do not fly this airline.  When I went to check in, my checked luggage was slightly over the limit.  I was going to switch some of my material to my carry on, but the woman told me instead that I would also have to check in my carry on luggage.  The fee that she charged me didn't discount the weight of free carry on luggage that you are allowed to take with on the flight.  Also, she kept asking me if I wanted to upgrade my seat. I told her no three times.  Apparently, she upgraded me and charged me anyway.  She didn't give me an itemized receipt for the charges.  Since I needed to get to Delhi to catch my overseas flight, I was caught in a trap.  I filed a complaint with the airlines when I landed in Delhi, but they ignored it.  I paid close to the amount I paid for the original flight in these extra fees.  Do NOT take this airline!!

title: Pathetic service
text: SpiceJet is so pathetic. They do not respect their passanger's timings. They delays with lame excuses and you never know when you will reach your Destination.beware from SpiceJet,if you have Xtra day then only book here keeping in mind that flights gonna be delayed anyhow. Such a pathetic service and they do not have proper information about flights. We have been misguided from the staff and due to this we missed our flight.

title: Spicejet flight to Guwahati
text: The flight took off on time and landed five minutes ahead. For a small fee we got upgraded to Premier with Priority luggage arrival.The meal was good and tasty. It was a very smooth, relaxing experience

title: Travel expreience
text: Travelled today from Kolkata to Hyderabad by SG 752 .The flight was to depart at 8.05 PM but the Spicejet resheduled the same at 11.00 PM without considering agony of the fliers . Finally the aircraft could take off at 11.45 pm and landed at Hyderabad ,at 1.40 AM.The air-conditioning system didnot work and it was very warm inside the cabin.Over all ,it was a very bad expreience.Difficult to reccomend SpiceJet to any flier .

title: The worst airline company in my travels of 50 years!
text: No customer service whatsoever to advise in the confusion of Kolkata Airport with the Gate Number,  Other airline company Indigo, there were plenty of employees to advise, they tried to contact a Spice Jet employee, so did a policeman, to no avail...the flight went without me...6 hours in the airport endeavouring to solve the problem.  The result was to pay for another ticket for the next day, WITH another company Indigo, and pay for a hotel for one night, plus taxi expenses!  Somewhat stressful to say the least.

title: Cramed seating, good service in flight
text: Boarding was easy but not organized. Flight was on time. The air hostesses were very good. Food was assable. Ride was quite bumpy because of turbulence. Seats are uncomfortable

title: good
text: yes i have used spice jet for travel many times..even this time the flight i booked was boeing max.. but they changed it .although it was n hr late to fly but the flight was good

title: Fraud airlines
text: There was an attempt of theft of my luggage and on complain spicejet tells we r not responsible for the damage of passengers luggage

title: Unexpected Delayed no prior information has been given
text: Such an Pathetic service .So far Flight got delayed1 hours 30 minutes SG 263.Just bcoz of only one reason since they telling us from started to Before Bording and Boredom also its been 45 Minutes delayed bit still its not been departed.No apologize even no announcement been given .If asking to staffs regarding the issue no such Apologize been ,instead of apologize they are talking very rude.This is very unexpected service as expected to other airline .Science there was a Help butten was there after Pressing that no concern person was there ,after 10 -12 minutes later a lady was came behaving like its just a normal thing .im not mentioning the name this is hw spice do there Red hot spicy.even though there is a nobody to help for the handicapped passenger also there was another old lady was there to pushing a which chair with the handicapped passenger ,its so terrible

title: Madurai to Colombo
text: A good experience.  I‚Äôm a bit of a nervous flyer and having booked with Spice ‚ÄúJet‚Äù I was a little taken aback to arrive st the airport and discover it was a propellor driven plane.  Very good flight though, smooth, only 50 mins long.  One thing to be aware of is that for reasons completely mysterious to me prop planes seem to only take quite a short run up before taking off.  I was surprised.

title: A very misplaced choice
text: I had the "great" idea to make a round trip arriving to Bagdogra to visit Darjeeling, Kalimpong (in West Bengal) and Gangtok (in Sikkim), and then to return from Pakyong airport in Sikkim so I could avoid to do all the go back the same way to Bagdogra. I had a plane ticket from Pakyong (funny that your format not registered this as a functional airport) with Spicejet, not knowing that this route is hardly used (with the excuse of inestable weather) so I ended traveling in a rush for 4 hours to fill, conveniently for Spicejet, a plane to Delhi via Kolkata for the double the price, instead of the direct flight to Delhi at 3:45. It was really a bad airline choice. Please consider other airlines to support your travel plans to that region.

title: from surat to new delhi
text: very nice clean fleets and on time and i always prefer spice coz  very good experience . i would wish to fly again

title: Excellent service
text: Pleasantly surprised with the excellent service levels. For a low cost airline it offered excellent value for money.

title: Average experience, generally delayed, Keep it as last option
text:
Have flied multiple times to various destination, The flight is mostly delayed. 
They have few counters at airport so long waiting lines for Luggage drop.
This is my least preferred airlines in India.

title: LATE AIRWAYS
text: avoid this airline like a rash , never on time . Please check flightaware every single flight out of Amritsar is late like everyday. Very poor performance on part of the airline will remember never to fly with them again . Already made the mistake twice his month and paid with 12 hours of delay and inconvenience collectively . Waste of airspace !

title: Least bothered about passengers
text: Worst customer service. our flight was delayed and we were stranded in Hyderabad as our connecting flight took. There were 7 of us. After numerous calls from all people the ground staff at hyd was made aware of the delay which was just a 10-15mins delay and they assured they would help us with the situation. But on getting in hyd, every SpiceJet staff (tough to catch one) told a different story and played innocent. after a lot of struggle finally we decided to buy new tickets for the next flight. This is a BS airline, try some other one.

title: Worst staffers rude and unapologetic
text:
I had a nightmare while dropping bags for check in at its airport desk. Luggage was less than normal. Suddenly a potter asked me to see if my carryon is within limit. He found it less than suggested. He wanted let me check my wife and my brother in law hand baggage too done. Most surprising that a guy who claimed to be boss never bothered the harrassment to us by this porter. 
It was reported to SpiceJet by me on Twitter immediately. They have no decency of even acknowledging my bitter experience. 

WORST AIRLINE TO TRAVEL WHENIN INDIA.

title: Pay as you go
text:
Worth for the money .Save my 48 hours of travel.
Flight was on time and short and sweet journey as I had kept no expectations.

title: Pleasant flight
text:
One of my close family members recently travelled on SG 2977 from Jodhpur to Ahmedabad.

Check-in procedures were good, boarding was efficient. The aircraft was a DH8 or Q400 Bombardier Dash, a turboprop which was well-maintained and clean. 

The crew were helpful and friendly. Complimentary glasses of water were served to all passengers before takeoff, a gesture I truly like from Spicejet, which markets itself as a Low Cost Carrier (LCC). May some other LCCs follow suit and it would be appreciated.

The takeoff and landing were smooth. Arrival was ahead of schedule by nearly 25 mins.

The web check-in policy leaves much to be desired - a point mentioned in an earlier review of flight SG 2976 to Jodhpur which was taken a day before this flight.

Recommend Spicejet for domestic and international travel.

title: Nice flight, but awful web check in policy
text:
It was a good experience travelling via Spicejet to the Blue City from Ahmedabad. Actually it was my family member who travelled.

Check-in at the counter was quick, boarding was flawless. 
The crew was all smiles and helpful. 
Aircraft was a DH8 which was comfortable and clean.
Flight departed on time, landed before time. 
Being an LCC (Low Cost Carrier), I obviously didn't expect complimentary meals and didn't buy any either, hence can't comment on that.

However, the web check in policy is horrible. No free seat selection while doing web check in even 4 hours before the departure of the flight. Even some other LCC competitors like Indigo and some others like Jet Airways allow free web check in at least 12 and 4 hours before departure, respectively.

Personally I didn't like that at all and was bitterly disappointed. Web check in is meant for the convenience of passengers so that time at the airport can be saved. Change such policy, please, Spicejet, otherwise I'll reconsider twice or even thrice before flying the Red, Hot, Spicy.

Nevertheless, thanks to the service levels and crew and staff, sans the web check in, I truly recommend Spicejet.

title: Transformed - unbelievable
text:
As Jet airways is struggling due to financial crunch and Indigo is short of pilots, started using Spicejet after a long time. To my surprise, they are completely transformed. They are mostly running before time, connecting T2 cities (first time travelled by air from Kanpur to Mumbai and they also have a direct flight from Kanpur to Bangalore) and the vegetarian food offered free with Corporate fare is simply awesome and quite rich. And, last but not the least, their flight staff serves with a smile (which is mostly missing these days). Keep it up !!!

One small issue, the feedback link sent by them after every flight has a question to rate their in-flight entertainment, which is currently not available and hope it must be coming up soon.

title: Pathetic
text: Dear Travelers by mistake also please don't ever book your flight on SpiceJet my flight was booked afternoon 04:20 pm on the way to o just called to check terminal number while checking I was told your flight is delayed 9:20 night is departure myself family waited in the airport we weer told 08:50 is our boarding time when we went to boarding gate we came to again delayed no information was passed still waiting at the airport no SpiceJet Staff here

title: Flight okay but money stolen
text:
The flight itself was fine. We left on time and arrived early. No complaints about that. 

When we went through the checked bag scanner one of the staff grabbed my bag, stuck a tag on the lock and then accompanied me to check in and waited. I could not understand why he was there. I checked in my bag and went to the gate. When I arrived at my destination my lock had been tampered with and my key could not unlock it. I had the lock cut off and the money that had been in my suitcase was gone. It seems very likely that the man who had seen it in the x-ray and followed the bag opened it and took the money.

title: Mixed experiences
text: Flew after several years on this airline. The seating is very cramped; however the food options were good. The vegetarian breakfast was diverse and tasty. The lack of consistency in each plate of food served was disappointing. The staff was courteous and professional. My flight arrived on schedule, which always helps.

title: Fair Enough Experience.
text: I flew Spicejet recently. It was delayed by over an 1.5 hours and they changed gates atleast twice. We can understand that it can happen but the way their ground stuff and stuff were behaving was real pain. If anybody go and ask to their stuff memener about flight status they just ignore it and when u keep asking they said "We do not know !!". Couple of passanger were old and kept asking so that guy threatened them to put on no flying list.! Pathetic airlines

title: Delayed flight- upsetting the whole programe
text:
The flight was delayed by an hour and finally it landed 1.30 hrs late at the destination airport.

In the process missed seeing the sunset in the desert.

The airline is over burdened and doing too many sectors with limited no. of planes and this is the result of the over use of the aircrafts.

title: Excellent
text:
Excellent flight, brand new plane (although it was a 737-800 Max) with great service. We had Spicejet Max service comprising extra legroom, a meal, drinks and priority boarding etc and it cost very little for all the extras. cabin service was great and right on time. Very comfortable for a 4 hour flight - no complaints at all. 
Only issue was that they demanded to see the credit card we booked with, even though they had taken the full amount at the time of booking. If we had not had the card, I suspect we would still be in Amritsar.

title: Delayed flight
text: I am dismayed by the incallous attitude of the Spicejet airlines. They did not offer any tea or snacks nor did they inform me about the delay. I reached Surat quite late.

title: Terrible flight
text: The flight was delayed and I had to wait at the airport. It was terrible. They offered no tea or snacks. I request all fliers to check the on time performance of the Udaipur flight before booking.

title: Convenient flight
text: I had booked Spicemax tickets and got the first seat and complimentary snacks and beverages. The flight reached on time.

title: Good flight
text: The flight was on time and reached in time. Comfortable seating via Spicemax. Received snacks and hot capacino complimentary.

title: Early morning flight on time
text: This was an early morning flight. We received an SMS that this flight was not 737 Max 8 which was good. The flight was on time and smooth. Even though I had booked at short notice the price was not very expensive.

title: Extremely poor customer service
text:
We had a flight from Bangkok to Hyderabad on 14 the March for which we reached the airport. To our utter surprise we were infouthat the flight had been cancelled due to the grounding of 737 max boeings and that they had sent us a message. We received no such message at any point in time which was a big lie by the airline. The alternative they provided us was a drop till Kolkatta or full refund. It was very inconvenient and we told them that Kolkata was very far from Hyderabad and that they should make arrangements in alternate airlines till Hyderabad. They said it was not possible for them and left us absolutely helpless in international territory.
Finally we booked ourselves in indigo airline flight which was a transit flight and would have led us wasting 12 hours.
We will never ever book SpiceJet ever again as they did not provide prior information of the mishap, did not make arrangements for travel in other airlines, did not assist in anyway. Absolutely unprofessional. No wonder these airlines are shutting down.

title: Satisfactory
text:
Dot on time Smooth take off and landing

Hetal & Zaiba two airhostes managed everything on board efficiently
Food should have variety like ldli dhoka etc

title: Worst experience as always with spicejet
text: So here you go... u call spicejet as always late... and they do not provide any update for delay to it‚Äôs passengers flying...if u are smart enough you check the status before you depart from home.my advise please do not fly with them. It‚Äôs the delay of 5 hours

title: comfort travel
text: After spending our leisure trip at Dharamshala we cose to fly back to Delhi by spicejet flight. When we booked the tkts flight departure was around noon.When winter schedule started the departure was advanced by few hours.The airline crew were alerting me through mail and phone calls about change in schedule few times.It helped me to replan my other commitments in time.Thanks to Spicejet crew informing me well in advance.

title: SpiceJet is a simple, comfortable airline with on-time fleet!
text: SpiceJet is a great airline with on-time service. It is quite affordable and has great connectivity across India. My flight from Kolkata to Chennai was easy and comfortable. As the name suggests, the veg snack (Panneer Tikka) with dessert and juice was delicious. The crew was, as usual, courteous and helpful. Keep this up SpiceJet!

title: Excellent on time
text: Excellent flight - on time departure and on time arrival . Baggage check in quick and efficient and retrieval of checked in baggage was quick

title: Amazing Customer service !! Impressed !
text:
My recent trip to Kochi was completely possible due to Spice jet employees being able to help us out and respond in a very humane manner that was very helpful.

We were delayed due to an accident on the road and we were almost on the verge of missing the flight, we were in constant touch with SpiceJet customer care about our status and as soon as we reached the airport the spice jet employees assured us of no worries they were able to check in our bags, and ensured we were able to get our boarding pass and get to the flight. 

Ground staff did an amazing job thanks to all of you who were present on Thursday morning 14 March 2019 for our flight Mumbai to Kochi. 

And also thanks to the In flight staff for being so courteous and helpful. 

I always thought that low cost airlines does not mean great customer service and never expected too much but not anymore. I am pleasantly surprised and happy about the way Spice jet ground staff and In flight team helped us thanks a lot everyone !!! Continue the good work. 

Low cost does not necessarily mean bad or not so good service !!!

Happy and pleasantly surprised. I have travelled a lot and I am happy to see this change coming in if it continues !!!

title: The Worst Plane I flew on in India
text:
On a recent trip to India, I flew on several domestic and regional Airlines. SpiceJet was easily the worst of the 4 (The others being, Air India, Indigo, and Vistara). 

Early on a Monday morning, February 26th, we caught the first flight out of Hyderabad heading to New Delhi. Our seats were surprisingly cramped, my seat-back tray table was broken, the seat pocket was torn, and it was dirty. It was an uncomfortable, unpleasant experience. I expected more from SpiceJet.

title: Overworked but getting you there
text: Check-in was chaotic with multiple queues. We split up and then rejoined at the queue that was doing best. The number of counters was limited and located in a corner behind pillars so heated interactions were plenty. Systems had just restarted after an hour, the staff were stressed but still on top of the game. Cleared us fast at the counter and tried to seat us together. Boarding was smooth, but again queues. Cabin was clean, but a little busy with ads. Seating was good, comfortable even with a bag under me. Captain addressed us mid-flight which is always a nice touch. Baggage took some time to come and was intact. It was a busy flight but the staff stayed focused so we could relax.

title: An average airline with unnecessary delays
text: I took a multi-city trip with spicejet and my route was Mumbai to Varanasi, Allahabad to Delhi and Delhi to Mumbai. Mum-Varanasi flight was delayed by half an hour and till the boarding time, the spicejet display was showing that flight is on time. Basically it meant that the passengers are illiterate and can't read the display / schedule board. Allahabad-Delhi flight again delayed by half an hour while the Delhi-Mumbai flight was preponed by  20 mins. Now the passenger is left in God's hand whether he will make it or not. Basically mismanagement, nothing else. And since they delay the flight and immediately board the flight with next lot of passengers, the seats are not cleaned properly and the pockets are left with empty glasses and bottles and leftover food packets of previous passengers. Pathetic.

title: Low cost high flying experience
text: Flight was on time, seats were comfortable, in-flight service was good. We used handbag only fare, did not even have to go to check-in counter. By mistake, the title of my co-passengers was wrong, which I noticed after web check-in. I called their customer service, and the error was promptly rectified. Great service!

title: Airline cheating at its best
text: Spicejet is one airline that has taken airline cheating to new heights in india. The airline underreports delays just so that the passengers don‚Äôt ask for compensation. The staff starts showing policies when you have genuine requests however they themselves don‚Äôt follow the policies of correctly reporting the delays. #neverflyspicejet

title: Staff's are not attentive
text:
I've booked 3 ticket with my cousin's, we went to the counter and asking to 3 seat's together but he refused said we are late. Actually he is trainee, no one to help him at the time, trainee alone managing boarding counter that's why he may not know how to say, he did not even to check the system. But at the end he smiled. 

Management has to take responsibility to help someone instead of keep trainee alone at the boarding counter. 

Thanksüôèüèª

title: Pathetic airline
text: Avoid Spice jet airlines as its not a worth for the money u r spending. Legroom is terrible, so congested airline, customer service is also awful

title: No call centre response
text: They have cancell3d my flight to bangkok and now they are not picking up the call since last 6 hrs and I am nowhere

title: Fairly comfortable for a short flight.
