text: The crew was pleasant and the seats were in good condition. Left perfectly on time and arrived just when promised. Met all my criteria!

title: Felt like travelling in a bus
text: The flight from madurai to hyderabad was very bad. It was so hot and crowded felt like I was travelling in a non ac bus. The ac was pathetic. I happened to travel on women's day and they announced a cookie and a hot beverage free for all women but they couldn't give to many as they had very little stock. My question is why announce when you don't have enough material to give. All in all didn't like the travel experience.

title: SG104. MAA-DEL. Pay for non reclining , narrow seats.
text:
The worst part of SpiceJet is that I have never found it easy to check into the flight online, hours ahead of the flight without any payments for the seats. I grudgingly paid Rs.200 for the aisle seat and Rs.99 for the middle seat, that was the only way I could do the web check-in. Then comes the next surprise from the airline, they sent a message stating that the flight has been advanced to 6.45AM from its original schedule of 7AM, which is what we had booked for. That played havoc on our preparations.
The worst was that the two seats given to us were non reclining seats and the check-in staff told me that they are reclining seats. Worst, there's just no legroom in this exit row 2 seats on each side. We had to sit tight for those 3 hours. The other two passengers were relocated to comfortable seats, after the take off.  But we  two were left alone to struggle with these seats as we were modest in raising our objections. That clearly didn't work.  Only those who get aggressive seem to have their way with the airline !! I felt cheated, being robbed by the airline. Never has been such a bad domestic flight experience in India for me. 
I hope I don't have to travel this airline once more in near future !!

title: Have a huge history of delayed flights
text:
Just a piece of advice to the management, if you know that the flight is delayed, please don't let the passengers board the plane until the rescheduled time is decided. I am a frequent flyer of SG-58 and three times I have faced this issue of waiting inside the flight for nearly 90 minutes. It is very frustrating for us if you get to know after boarding that the flight is delayed for more than an hour. 

Secondly, the laptop should be excluded from the 7 kg rule as is the case for every other flight. For some people weight of the laptop itself constitute more than 4 kg and they are not able to buy anything from duty-free because of this.

PS: My last travel was on 10th March 2019 and the flight was delayed for 1 hour 50 minutes with fine weather conditions.

title: Flight from Varanasi
text: Great service, quick and efficient.  Everyone off the plane a quick clean, load everyone and go.  Staff were pleasant.  A great flight.

title: Best in Low Cost
text: They provided what they promised. They were on time, professional, helpful. I know what to expect from a low cost airlines, and I am satisfied with the service.

title: Convenient flight to Shirdi.
text: Spice jet has started this convenient direct flight to Shirdi from Chennai. Earlier one had to go to Mumbai or Pune by flight and then by road. This is a good and convenient flight for pilgrims going for darsan of Sri Sai Baba.

title: The funniest airline ever
text:
So we all boarded the flight super quickly.
The flight was very clean.
The air hostess did the safety instructions in under 2 mins. I have never seen anyone do safety instructions that quickly before.
The snacks we received being in SpiceMax seats were flung at us not even handed to us.
The flight is supposed to be 3hrs. It took 2hrs.
As a SpiceMax customer luggage is supposed to be a priorty but it didn't arrive on time.

I have never witnessed such a speedy flight with such speedy service. It was hilarious but shockingly bad st the same time.

title: First time and it's last time with spice jet
text: I traveled from dxb to cok on March 8.i would like to say it is bad experience in my lyf and I will not travel any more in SpiceJet. There staff attitude is very poor n thier attitude towads pasangers as slaves  .They are even charging extra payment for duty free and even for laptop. They don't even informing us this extra charges in check in time.unprofessional n courageless flight.

title: Worst Airlines. Avoid it like a plague.
text: I flew with my family Delhi-Bangkok-Delhi on 1st and 8th March 2019. I was shocked to learn on flight that they don't provide food on flight. If that was the case they should have mentioned that clearly on the tickets which they have not done..they have rather done it in a very round abt way on ticket. When I tried to talk to air hostess she was down right rude. We finally had to buy four sandwiches which costed us Rs. 300/- each. Not just food they don't provide even a blanket when we felt cold. All this over and above the cramped seats they provide. This is worst International Airlines I have ever flown in my life.

title: Actually a pleasant experience
text: We flew Jet a couple times while we were in India and compared to other Indian carriers I would choose Jet over the others. We flew 4 different Indian airlines and I found Jet to be the most pleasant. The plane was very clean and newer, and most importantly I felt safe flying this airline. My flights were all on time and the food was actually quite good! All in all i‚Äôd recommend Jet without hesitation.

title: More than average experience of travel
text: We had long travels during our Dec-2018 holidays. The flight timings of Spicejet were most suitable and convenient to meet our schedules. We travelled from Mumbai to Udaipur & Return, Mumbai to Tirupati via Hyderabad & return. Total about 9 flights we had with Spicejet. These were our first-time travel by Spicejet during our visit to India.Overall flights experience was good. We could not incur any travel points due to a very typical system of Spicejet.

title: Pleasant experience
text: Experience exceeded my expectation with on time take off and landing. Internal flight service with new aircraft stood out for me. Baggage handling was good and did not lose any time at the airport. Request for specific seat was accommodated without ay hassle.

title: Excellent air hostess
text:
My journey was only for two hrs but i enjoyed every minute hostess were very courteous and very polite. That was my first time with spicejet.......... First impressions is last impression.... 
Awesome service.... Very polite.... 

Thanks

title: Bad staff attitude "they don't know the meaning of customer services"
text: I was travelling from Madurai to Chennai to catch an international flight, the attitude of the staff, managers were pathetic,Obviously they have not been taught, how to take care of their customers.While checking into the counter they treat you like your travelling for free on this aircraft.If you want to connect to an international flight DO NOT trust SpiceJet. Late arrivals and take off's are also one of their traits.

title: Delhi Airport Taxi Service 9910666007 DecibelCabs
text:
Why Decibel Cabs is Best Option for Taxi Service in Delhi
There are so many times when you are finding the trusted cab booking company for your journey and you need the best service provider because you want to ride with the safe and hygienic way. Some cabs are not neat and clean and that‚Äôs why riders face the problem of hygiene in the taxi. Therefore, if you book the online cab booking services in Delhi with all amazing features then the choice of Decibel Cabs is best for you. 
Fare List of Taxi Services in Delhi:
The taxi model or cab models define the fare of taxi service in Delhi. The fare of the cab depends on the clients choice because if you book the min cab as a comparison to prime cab or taxi because your requirement is not big then the fare may differ from the model of the cab.

title: Find another airline
text:
We flew from Pondicherry to Bangalore on Spicejet.  Since Spicejet is the only airline flying into and out of Pondicherry, they have a captive market.  
Arriving early we found a rather spartan airport that one accesses across a rutted wasteland.  There are no services at the airport.  As we had driven from Tranquebar, leaving there before 6.30am without breakfast, we hoped to be able to get something to eat at the airport.  On arrival, we were directed to baggage security who scanned our baggage and taped and locked tied each article.  We very nearly ended up on the Hyderabad flight as the staff kept pushing us to the check in.  We then waited several hours without any food for our flight which was slightly late.  The check in staff who had also been trying to put us on the Hyderabad flight were then upset that our luggage had been scanned and locked well prior to our flight.  I was about to explode at their incompetence when they decided that since we had not been out of the airport with our luggage (where in heavens name could we have gone?) they would accept the check in luggage.
When calling for boarding, they started at row 8 and failed to call us at row 2.  Only when we found that we were the last in the lounge that we decided to head off for the plane.  We had booked and paid for front row seats with extra leg room but found ourselves in ordinary seats with no leg room for my over 6ft husband.  We had also pre paid for a meal which indicated that we could choose from a variety of dishes.  We were given soggy veg sandwiches and a diet coke without any choice!  The sandwich made me sick.  We left the other.
The uniforms of the female crew left nothing to the imagination when they crouched down or bent over.  SpiceJet needs to review its uniforms in line with the uniforms of other airlines.
The information provided by the crew was spoken at record breaking speed and we did not understand a word of what was said.  If critical information was provided we certainly were not informed.
We will never fly SpiceJet again.

title: Fast yet furious
text: The budget flights is fast, yet the services are disappointing. The washrooms are ill-used and not well maintained. The plane we boarded had no water in the washbasin in one of the toilets. Not much variety for food on-board. No special instructions are  given to people with infants.

title: Excited to fly Spicejet for the first time from Bhopal to Hyderabad and then Hyderabad to Bengaluru. Flight was on Time.
text: Spicejet has introduced Daily Flight from Bhopal to Hyderabad. The flight from Hyderabad was almost full on the journey date ie 27th February 2019, with 90% seats occupied. The Inflight attendants and Staff provided good service. They were polite and very helpful.

title: Terrible customer service
text:
I am very disappointed.
My flight from Bangalore to Port Blair got 5h postponed. Due to that delay I couldn't catch my ferry to Havelock island and didn't stay in the hotel I payed for on Havelock.
I have called the customer service and the reply I received was that since I have boarded the flight there is no option of any compensation. I have sent them an email demanding the hotel and the ferry fees compensation. Unfortunately I got to know they won't do anything about it. Terrible experience.

title: Lousy Ground staff of Spice Jet at Ahmedabad!! | Feb 20th
text:
Spice jet ground staff at Ahmedabad airport - Ms. Krishna Budhadev needs to learn about customer service, she is not fit to be at the desk, arrogant, with a huge attitude.
Ref to my letter to Ms. Nair, followed by grievance escalation to Ms. Sethi - however no response ! 
Spice Jet Ground Staff team at Ahmedabad- keep up the lousy work !!

title: Luxury in Budget
text:
Recently had a chance to use the recently launched non stop flight from Bangalore to Kanpur via Spice Jet. Was pleasantly surprised with the absolutely new aircraft deployed on this sector. The interiors were plush & the cabin crew quite helpful.

I would also like to point out that the smiles & expressions of the crew were natural & not tutored with plastic expressions as has become the norm across airlines.

On teh way back there was a medical emergency which was also quite well handled by teh cabin crew without much panic although looked like they were facing this sort od situation in rela life for the 1st time.

Keep it up.

title: Good service
text: The flight was late due to aircraft fault but we been informed well in advance by email and text messages. Check in was too slow because of airport computer system failure,   very long time in queue. But crew was very nice and helpful. Will use this airline in future.

title: Delayed flight
text: This was the first time,I was taking a flight out of Allahabad.Since,Bamrauli is not a very large airport,I expected flights to be on time.But,my flight was delayed by forty minutes due to bad weather in Leh,a place almost 1500 kms away from Allahabad.Either,Spicejet doesn't care about small airports or they don't care abou the weather report.Rest everything was average about this average flight.

title: A delayed flight but good onboard experience
text:
I have never had a great time on Spicejet before.But this time,it was different.First of all,the fight was delayed by forty minutes due to unknown reasons and I was preparing myself for writing another negative review.But,when onboard,I got a good seat and got to experience somewhat out of the box professionalism.The pilots completed the journey whuch takes an hour in twenty six minutes and cabin crew went out of their way to help an aged woman.
The experience was quite good.

title: ON TIME AND GREAT TIME
text: I was travelled from Bangalore to Vizag for pongal festival and the experience with that is really made me to feel good and it was on time and great time I had ..

title: Worst Airline - Spicejet
text:
Pathetic boarding experience.
Late as always (they have scheduled prepone departure time but it took off even after original time).
Luggage handling is worst.
Food quality is also bad.

title: On time No Frill Professional Service
text:
I am travelling this morning, 7th Mar 2019, from¬†Kolkata to Delhi on Spicejet flight¬†SG 130. The scheduled departure¬† was at 7.40 and I reached airport at 6.00. Following is my overall experience about the flight ( Rating given out of 5, 5 being the highest):-
A. Check-in: Checking at the self check in kiosk was smooth. Baggage dropped at the counter.(Rating 4).
B. Lounge access: I was flying economy and hence there was no lounge faculty offered. I used my Mastercard to access airport lounge.(Rating Neutral)
C. Boarding and departure: Flight was on time. Scheduled departure was at 7.40. Boarding opened at 7.10 at Gate 23B by bus. Boarding process was smooth and fast. Push back was at 7.40 and we took off at 7.50 (Rating 5). 
D. Seats and interior: The aircraft was a Boeing 737-800 series and looked new and well maintained. Tm The interior in Light Beige and Black looked bright and well lit. Seats upholstered in black gives vibrancy to the overall interior. My selected seat was 19D, an aisle seat from the rear. Seat pitch was comfortable butlegspace was littke cramped. Seat recline was about 110 degree.(Rating 4.5).
E. In flight Service: Being no frill flight, there was hardly any in flight service offered. Food can be bought at the flight. Spicejet offers good range of hot food (Spicecafe) that can be bought. Water was made available as and when asked. In flight magazine Spiceroute provides interesting reading. (Rating 4).
F. Arrival and baggage: Flight landed at T1C of Delhi at 10.25. Gates were opened at 10.40. Luggage at Bekt arrived at (Rating 4)
G.Overall flight experience and suggested area of improvement : Overall flying experience was good. Staff was well groomed and polite. New aircraft was great positive.(OVERALL RATING 4.75)

title: Seat covers were dirty and no legspace
text: Seat Covers were very dirty. Luggage recollection took exact an hour. No leg space. Too much food advertisement in 3 hours of flight for example they were selling Roti and sabji also. Due to no vantillation , the smell was unbearable. Bad very bad experience

title: Service need lot of improvement
text: I was travelling from Varanasi to Bengaluru with my disable mother who is on wheel chair. Initially they provided assistant at Varanasi airport who left us somewhere and left telling someone will come at the time of boarding. But when announcement going on no one came later we need o call them and inform about us. As we entered the flight no one was there to help us to make my mom sit in seat, I only struggled to do that. In flight also no food option for vegetarian. Once landed in Bengaluru they took almost 30 min to get wheelchair and before we disembark they we hurry in cleaning and all stuff. Once out again baggage didn't arrive waited for baggage for a very long time. Totally disappointing journey with the carrier.

title: Worst airline
text: I was supposed to get off at Silchar.But the aircraft stopped at Gwahati and they get my luggage off the plane!!!Now they call me and say they had to check inside the bag again even though I only had my clothes and my baby's! I don't recommend it for anyone!poor service, won't even take responsibility for their fault!

title: pleasant to fly
text: traveling with spice jet was nice. only thing is that lay overtime was more at delhi. affordatble flight. flight on time.

title: Worst ever
text:
Scheduled departure was at 1:10PM. Flight departure was delayed just before departure not once, not twice but thrice. (No reason was given!) Finally it departed at 3.45PM. 
Missed connecting flight because of the delay. On requesting to be accommodated in their next flight in that route as a compensation, their straightforward response was a NO - WE CAN'T DO. 
No apologies, no repent, absolutely no regards to the inconvenience caused. This is a horrible horrible airlines and if this is how airline operations work at SpiceJet, I will boycott this airlines for good.

title: Be warned about flight re-routes that cause you to miss your connecting flights without compensation for your disruption
text:
I had originally booked flights to Goa from Madurai for myself and my 12 old year old daughter via Bangalore. The first leg was with Spice jet and a connecting flight from Bangalore to Goa with Air Asia. Spice jet changed our flight from Madurai to an earlier one which was to Chennai and then we were instructed to get a connecting flight from Chennai to Bangalore at 5pm arriving at 5.45pm. As our connecting flight with Air Asia left for Goa at 5.40pm, we would have missed this flight and have had to get another one. We were given the option of flying directly to Goa with spice jet on a 7.30pm flight which we accepted but this meant paying a whopping 18,000 Rupees in addition to the Rs 9111 that I had already spent on the Spice jet initial ticket. It also meant a lengthy stay in the airport from 12.30 to 7pm but I was travelling alone with my young daughter and did not want to risk being unable to get another connecting flight out to Goa from Bangalore. In Chennai airport, my daughter and I were told that we were not eligible for food/refreshment vouchers as the flight time was changed but not cancelled.
I was informed by a Spice jet customer care manager that I would be compensated fully for the Chennai to Bangalore portion and that an email would be sent in confirmation. I did not get any emails and when I contacted the customer care team, they offered a "partial full refund" of just Rs 702 in total. I feel that I have been misled and and cheated. Poor customer service.

title: Good Experience...Could be bettered
text:
Good experience all together, Good flying experience, Mostly on time, Attenders are friendly, Clean interiors, 
Though the delays are not informed and dealt appreciatively SOMETIME.

title: FLYING DUBAI 18TH & RETURN 22ND FEB
text: In spiteof 200 passengers on board we never felt congested inside the plane.  The Air Hostess wore a smile all the time and attended us in a friendly manner. Nice Leg room and comfortable journey.  Baggage delivery & check-out was prompt.

title: Ok but......
text:

it wasn‚Äôt until we had gone through security that we realised that the boarding tickets were issued in the wrong names! 
It seemed a completely disorganised trying to get them changed! 
Various security people got involved! 
Passport control hadn‚Äôt checked them correctly! 
Cheap airline but the only flight available.

title: Value for money
text:
Overall good experience - check in, boarding was nice and smooth. Onboard crew were also attentive and flight reached destination ahead of time.
I do have some qualms about their dress-code though...I find it very odd the cabin crew should be dressed from above their knees, and it's somewhat unprofessional in my opinion.
I also don't understand their marketing strategies revolving around a similar theme with slogans "higher the spicier" or the sort.
Ridiculous..
Thankfully none of the crews were trying to seduce any of the guests as was implied by the ads.

title: Poor airlines

Captain didn‚Äôt make any announcement for one hour after it‚Äôs departure.
Seats were not comfortable.
Would not recommend to any one

title: Very cheerful staff
text: My entire journey was wonderful.the staff were extremely kind however I felt that the food was a bit too overpriced.

title: Comfortable and efficient budget airline
text: From check-in to collecting bag, it was an efficient process. seats are comfortable and the staff very friendly. Above all on time departure and early arrival

title: Ok flight but last min schedule changes
text:
Flight was ok but we had some terrible experience due to bad scheduling. We were coming back from
udaipur and we had a connection flight to Trivandrum. Initially Udaipur flight was chartered around 9 pm but just before 1 week they pre poned that to afternoon around 2pm. So we had to make several changes in our plans as well. 

If the preponement was done earlier we could have caught an early connection flight to Tvm but that also could not happen

title: Arrival at Jaipur Airport for flight by SpiceJet to Goa I was refused boarding passes.
text:
After bag check, at check-in desk I was asked to produce the ‚ÄúCARD‚Äù I had paid for the flight with.

I produced my MasterCard and was told it had the wrong number. i.e. not the number of the card that paid the bill to SpiceJet. I was refused a boarding pass until I produced the card which made the payment for their services.
i.e. Transfer to Goa via SpiceJet flight SG923. SpiceJet had details of a payment card number on their system which did not agree with the number on my credit card.

I was escorted to the Airport SpiceJet office to be shown the small print on ‚ÄúImportant Information‚Äù para 8.
i.e. for foreign (non-Indian) credit/debit card payments, the card must be produced for physical verification at airport check-in counter etc etc‚Ä¶‚Ä¶. 

They would not accept any paperwork I had as verification of payment. All they wanted to see was a credit card giving the same number from which the payment for the flight was made.

Eventually, I was given the opportunity to write a statement explaining this predicament. This statement needed details of my home address, home telephone number, email address, current credit card details, travel agency details,flight booking details, plus a photocopy of any payment confirmation. 

After even more considerable time and consideration by even more officials at the airport, they finally agreed to produce our boarding passes. This process took nearly 2 hours to complete and had I arrived at the airport any time later I would have certainly missed the flight.

Who do I consider at fault?.....

SpiceJet for expecting unreasonable requirement in their small print as there are a number of scenarios which could easily produce this situation. Card replacement, cash payment, lost card  etc, etc

The only alternative offered by SpiceJet was to buy further tickets and claim the extra cost back from my travel agent. 

All this at the airport with very limited time for me to decide was also exacerbated by the English/Hinde language barrier and the urgency of creeping time constraints, plus I find it difficult to believe, unless I am the first customer you have booked on a flight with SpiceJet that situation has not occurred before.

This took the shine off otherwise a very nice holiday.

title: Holiday Trip
text: Short and comfortable flight, on time take off and landing. Friendly and helpful staff. All information was provided in time.

title: A decent low cost flight!
text: Spicejet may be the second most preferred airlines in India I guess. That's because the service is not as great as Indigo / Jet. I would prefer Indigo / Jet than Spice if it was available, just for the food quality and overall service.

title: Made Kumbh visit possible
text:
Must thank Spicejet for starting daily flights from New Delhi, India to the world's largest human gathering "The Kumbh" at Prayagraj (earlier known as Allahabad).

Not only did they set a precedent for other airlines, but they also made it possible for me to comfortably visit and enjoy the greatest festival of the world.

Hats off to them

title: Spicejet travel
text: Spicejet bombarded airline is exactly saving for money but seats should be good quality and time management is good

title: Trip To Goa
text: Such A Nice Trip, flight cabin crew very nice & polite. Being its a economy class flight seat not that much comfortable seems like a Bus Seat.

title: Personal trip
text: The staff at counter needs to be trained to speak more politely and be courteous..we had 3 baggaes..overall it was well within the weight limits..we just requested whether the hand baggage could be booked as we are already booking 2 luggages..The counter staff was very rude in her behaviout..But otherwise..we love spicejet..as its way better than other airlines in timing..food etx.

title: Spicejet airline
text: Spicejet sis good airline overall with reasonable price for domestic and international travel. I prefer Spicejet as it is Upto Dubai from Ahmedabad and timing is also good. It‚Äôs best in the economic travel range.

title: Surprise visit
text: Had to surprise my bff on his bday hence this travel. Spicejet aircraft is too good, it's environment friendly too. They're using Boeing fleet currently. Also I'm surprised that they're actually before time as compared to IndiGo which has become a pain for us. The food served in the flight is way better in taste than other budget airlines. It was a great experience indeed.

title: Absolute shambles and a risk operator!
text:
We travelled to and from Dabolim to Amritsar, the flight up to Amritsar wasn't brilliant and not worth the upgrade for the awful food and limited and single drink offered.
The return journey was a disgrace!
I appreciate it was before Christmas and there were children on the flight but there were no controls children running up and down the aisle, climbing on seats, as the flight was not full people moved around and then kicked off when their food was eaten by the people who moved into the vacated seat. Food was spilled on me despite me not even having food. The cabin crew had no control what so ever and I did tell them I did not feel safe.
There were no prelanding checks made and parents passing their children to their grand parents who were not belted in either at point of landing!
I did complain to SpiceJet CEO and the Indian CAA but got know response from either which sums up the attitude towards safety.
I would not recommend anyone uses this airline as they are an accident waiting to happen!

title: Comfortable and on-time flight journey
text: Keep up the good service spice jet.  It was a very comfortable flight. I had actually travelled to Pakyong, Sikkim from Kolkata and return. The spicejet service at Pakyong airport was not great and was very unpleasant. Hope they become little considerate to passengers and creat less inconvenience. Our baggage was within the baggage permit but still they asked us to shift our stuffs from checked to carry on, which was quiet inconvenient.

title: Ontime and well managed
text: The flight started on time. However the checkin was poorly managed. There was no announcement or display of airline for checkin even 3 hours before flight time. The takeoff and landing was smooth. The flight provided prime economy class, which may be tried.

title: Flight scedule changed by 4 1/2 hours and not even a message
text:
Had booked Spicejet flight SG-8561 Delhi Coimbatore departure 7.55 am for our daughter travelling alone.

She reached the airport by 6.15 am and after checking in notices the flight departure on boarding card mentioned as 12.40 pm. Now she has no option but to keep waiting.

On calling Spicejet their call centre incorrectly says we have messaged and emailed you on 11 the February IE more than 2 weeks ago for a schedule change.

Smart phone messages stay a long time and I have checked all the way back no such message has come.

Moreover it is common sense to send a message a day earlier as well.

Extremely poor service and very dissatisfied Spicejet.

title: Terrible experience on flight in February, 2019
text: Reached the airport on time and checked in. Flight kept getting delayed and no reason was given. When we checked the flight schedule at 9.07pm, it showed that the flight had left at 7.30pm! This caused a great deal of incovenience. Reached Coimbatore at 10.10pm and travelled by car thereafter for 2 hours to reach home. Have sent an email to Customer Relations with all details on this as well.

title: On time service
text: Flew to Varanasi for the Kumbh Mela and returned in 2 days - both fly‚Äôs on Spicejet were on time - the inflight magazine had a great article on the Kumbh which was very helpful

title: Terrible experience
text: I had a very bad experience flying with spice jet. They couldn‚Äôt even provide drinking water in the flight as they said water is finished. We couldn‚Äôt even buy water bottle as it was finished.

title: ATR - spicy and fun
text: It is always a fun experience to fly ATR. Though the aircraft itself is small, the seats are spacious and comfortable. The open propellers add to the whole flying experience. Hope the ATR's are not completely stopped and we enjoy thie lovely flying experience at least to the smaller sectors.

title: Really Spicy and Comfortable
text: the checking in process can be tedious with rush, but something to say that they make every effort to offer to comfort the passengers, while checking in they ask if you like to upgrade and if the option is available its worth going for it as you get the front seats which has more leg room.

title: Several fails on two flights
text:
Nearly missed our flight out of Jaisalmer, due to incompetent staff. When we got charged for extra baggage, several people appeared, one to fill out a form (with carbon paper, if you know what THAT is), then another to work the credit card machine. And still another who took our bags off of the conveyor belt. The CC machine simply wouldn't work, but the staff just stood and stared at it for 25 minutes. Security was calling for us because we were the last customers on the flight, but still, staff could not waive the fee. Thrice they asked us if we had cash, and yet, no cash machine in the entire airport. And only ONE credit card machine in the whole airport. "Thankfully" the flight was 50 minutes late, so we still made it. 

On both flights, the meal was not at all what we had paid for. Instead of a chicken tikka wrap, we got a bland mayonnaise sandwich, and an offer of porridge. What?

Fact is, Spice Jet is the only airline that goes to Jaisalmer, so you're stuck.

title: A comparatively smaller aeroplane
text: I travelled by SpiceJet on 1st February 2019 from Mangalore to Bangalore. The journey was about one hour`s duration, and even though the aeroplane was small, I found it quite comfortable. The staff was friendly and helpful. All in all, I am quite satisfied with the airline.

title: Why Spicejet does not let you select Spicemax seat on Corporate fare while Indigo does
text: This is one area which bother me specially flying on corporate fair. Indigo let me choose the max seats with good leg space while Spice does not. Also it does not let you earn any miles on spice membership when booked on coeporate fare. I always quote my membership it never adds any points.

title: Long flight via Guwahati. Too much time waste in Guwahati Layover
text: Seems too much of time waste waiting at Guwahati for onward flight to Silchar. Inflight Service was good. Dont mind travelling again via Spicejet to Silchar.  timing is good too starts at 10:15 am and reaches just about at lunch time. You dont have to get up like at 5 am to catch your flight.

title: Friendly efficient service
text: We traveled twice on spicejet and both times upgraded to spicemax. The twin propeller plane is a little noisier but upfront with extra leg room was great. The service was on time and the staff helpful.

title: A very good experience.
text:
I liked everything about their service - the check-in was pleasant. Punctuality. Onboard service. Nice aircraft. comfortable seating. 
I have traveled Spicejet for domestic travel but has not experienced it in international travel but look forward to it. All said, a very pleasant experience.
I just wish the That curry could be less bitter :).

title: Worst airline I have ever come across!
text:
We had a very bad experience to the point where one of the customers slapped a staff at the airport. I have written a complaint so it is easier to summarise the whole experience:

Subject: RE: Complaint: Flight SG-8172 on 15 February 2019 from Goa to Delhi

Dear Sir/Madam,

This is the first time I have flown with your airline as a tourist and to be honest this is the worst I have ever come across. Here is a summary of events:

Checked in online and paid to choose and reserve seats
Arrived at the airport and the computer system was down causing chaos at the check in counters
Me and my friends were first in the Goa to Delhi counter (after trying to find which was the correct counter)
We paid extra for S.Max seats, priority boarding and luggage, meals etc
The tickets were handwritten (see attached) due to the system being down as mentioned
We paid for priority boarding but the staff at the gates allowed non-priority to go in first and my friend was annoyed and ask that we go first
When we arrived at our seats, there were other passengers claiming these were theirs and it turned out there were quadruple bookings for the same seats
A big argument arose and a staff arrived asking us to change seats; my friend refused stating we were first in the check in counter and this was an issue with the airline and not us, so we remained at our seats
Other passengers had the same issue and it must have taken a good 30 minutes to have this dealt with
When we arrived in Delhi, 3 of our 4 luggage had the priority label but the fourth did not so we had to wait for about 15 minutes, I believe the priority label was attached with two staples which was pathetic when you should have used proper plastic tie-through labels.
My advice to your staff when this issue happens again is to:
Have a manager/supervisor who has an aura of confidence between staff and passengers
Print an A3 of the destinations and stuck these to the monitors so passengers can queue accordingly rather than pushing and shoving each other to get across to the correct counter (see attached) 
Use the public announcement (PA) system to help passengers accordingly and do de-escalate all incidents
If your staff gave me the opportunity on that day to help, I am sure I would have been able to resolve this fiasco for free; this incident left a bad reminder to staff and passenger and the carrier next door, Vistara was quite amused looking at the chaos in hand.

I hope you will learn from this and make recommendations for your Goa staff to be retrained with higher levels of customer service and to deal with customer conflicts and resolutions; otherwise your company will go bust in the near future.

Regards,

Mr HM Yip

title: Flight to Dubai

but expensive also

title: Seating

title: Chaos at check in ruined SpiceJet experience
text:
We have never experienced such poor service; this was booked by our Indian travel agency; never again will we use them. Here is a summary of events:

Here is a summary of events:

- Checked in online and paid to choose and reserve seats
- Arrived at the airport and the computer system was down causing chaos at the check in counters
- Me and my friends were first in the Goa to Delhi counter (after trying to find which was the correct counter)
- We paid extra for S.Max seats, priority boarding and luggage, meals etc
- The tickets were handwritten (see attached) due to the system being down as mentioned
- We paid for priority boarding but the staff at the gates allowed non-priority to go in first and my friend was annoyed and ask that we go first
- When we arrived at our seats, there were other passengers claiming these were theirs and it turned out there were quadruple bookings for the same seats
- A big argument arose and a staff arrived asking us to change seats; my friend refused stating we were first in the check in counter and this was an issue with the airline and not us, so we remained at our seats
- Other passengers had the same issue and it must have taken a good 30 minutes to have this dealt with
- When we arrived in Delhi, 3 of our 4 luggage had the priority label but the fourth did not so we had to wait for about 15 minutes, I believe the priority label was attached with two staples which was pathetic when you should have used proper plastic tie-through labels.

My friend informed me later that one of the staff was slapped by a passenger so that's how bad the situation got.

I must admit the ground staff and cabin crew were very helpful towards us but this was tainted by the situation at check in.

I hope SpiceJet will learn from this and retrain their staff to de-escalate such situation

title: Flight Cancelled  Charged for the Next Flight
text: Unethical company with poor customer service. Cancelled our flight, gave us incorrect information and charged us for the next flight.

title: Decent flight
text: This isn't a review of the flight but of the airport. In the rush to create Pakyong airport, that doesn't yet show upon tripadvisor, the government has overlooked/done away with cutting a massive hill on the flight path. In other words, the locals advise you to take the longer yet safer route via Bagdogra.The Bagdogra airport is a mess, the security staff is ill trained,the airline staff over busy and there are very few food options. Totally avoidable.

title: spice max gets you max
text: Took the max seat # A1. A wonderful deal at airport, Rs. 600 extra gets you express check in, express boarding, express luggage, meals besides the all important front row seating

title: Spice Max
text:
I recently flew Spicejet, for the first time, and availed of their Max feature for a little extra cost. It entails Baggage Priority, Meals on Board and front four rows seating with extra leg space. Fantastic was the experience. I would also take this opportunity to request the airline authorities to include GoAir like Business seats for 20% extra. SpiceJet is very efficient and hospitable and with Spice Max one gets extra. Why was I paying Jet so much for so many years ?
V Shankarnarayan

title: Spicemax is altogether a good deal
text:
One gets a good deal if booked in time. Go for spice max...1k extra but worth it with food, legroom, priority baggage delivery and priority check in...Priority checkin required badly in bagdogra!. altogether 6.5 k is a good deal considering the distance and perfect flight timing. You will love it when your check-in  bag is the first one to arrive when you are in a hurry to go home. 

go for it...book early. Its worth it.

title: not bad for the price
text: not a very expensive ticket and the crew were good. the seats were average and the equipment was just ok

title: get what you pay for, no frills
text:
Have no complaints, flight was exactly as i expected and luckily i slept for most of it. We booked economy with no extras.

Check in was fine, we arrived a little early and were at the front of the que, no sales push to upgrade. 
Seats were not great, no inflight entertainment.
I had read the rules on hand luggage so no issues with overweight or credit card.

title: Most uncomfortable journey
text: normally i go through web chcek in select my seat. I donot mind paying 200 or 300 rupees more. accordingly this time i have gone through the website and provided with teh seat map. in the seat map, i normally select any thing above 25,25,27. I could see rows upto 32 and i preferred 25F and then i was take to pay site. it was failed. again i tried to repeat the procee but that time 25F was blocked due to my earlier reservation. so i had to choose 25A. in that time i am sure i was given information that behind me too many seats are available. but when i boarded in the flight, i was shocked to see the 25A was the last row and behind me the toilet. that is not the end. the woes continue. Becuase it was a last row you are denied of seat push back option. 90 degree  some plus stright seat. no leg room. worst of it in my row, on the asile side a traveller with 46 or 48 inch shoulder occupying the half of the middle seat too. middle seat traveller tried to put his shoulder over me and i had to stick the to the window panel like lizzard. further during the whole journey, i could not widen my legs as the middle seat traveller was shaking his legs continuously as he was having the earphone in his ears and must be listening to some foot tapping music. for providing wrong seat map, the airline should compensate for all my ordeal

title: Chaotic Chennai Airport and a badly timed flight. SG 731 to Hyderabad.
text:
At the time of booking, the scheduled time of departure from Chennai was 5.05AM. Later, the airline sent repeated messages that the departure has been advanced to 4.50AM !! That isn't being very kind !
I had done we check-in, printed the boarding pass and had no bags to check-in. I did all I can to make my boarding easy ! But I could only get seat #31, and that a middle seat which I always avoid ! There's hardly any seat which is given free when you do the web check. So, the airline does everything they can to push you to pay for the seats, even for middle seat. This is not the first time i experienced this challenge. So bad the airline is. But then what choice do we have? 
The Chennai airport, which is anyway mismanaged; is now slipping from bad to worse. The directions/ signage for Gate 16 was misleading.  Despite Chennai being my home airport,  despite my  deep familiarity  of this chaotic airport with over 500 departures by me in the past 7-8 years, I was still put to confusion on the departure gate's location !! What a mess ! The airline didn't have any staff to guide the PAX after the security check point. 
The most shocking experience was the 19 minutes bus ride from the terminal to the aircraft which was parked at the hanger, very far away from the terminal. The bus first headed north , all the way to the St.Thomas Mount end/ beginning point of the runway on the road parellel to the runway, then turn around to the other side of the runway to reach this remote hanger. I have never experienced such a long bus ride within the airport!  So, by the time the flight pulled out of the bay, it was 5.10+am ! Perhaps, the advancing of the scheduled departure is to bridge the time required for the  bus transportation! Sounds wierd. 
The flight was turbulent, the food/beverage sale services were delayed. 
The only good thing was the service of the in-flight crew;  very efficient, friendly and pleasent they were. 
This flight goes further to Patna, seems popular with folks from Chennai who are traveling to Bihar. 
This is certainly not a flight you wanna take if you have serious business work in Hyderabad. You won't be productive, with sleep deprived previous night. It wasn't even dawn in Hyderabad when we landed , but we waited for so long in the bus to take us to the terminal, it was beginning of the dawn, as seen in the photos attached.
Definitely not a good experience. Am hoping I don't have to fly this SG 731 again !!

title: Height of Unprofessionalism in Spicejet
text:
This review pertains to my experience on board SG 8913 from Delhi to Ahmedabad on 16.02.2019. 

I was unfortunate enough to be on-board todays flight and the lack of professionalism and courteousness shown by the Spicejet staff, who are supposed to be the creamy layer of the Hospitality industry was astounding. I experienced the following on-board the above mentioned flight today morning: 

1. While it may or may not be a necessary condition in this particular airline, certain characteristic behaviour has come to be expected from airlines by frequent travellers such as I. The behaviour i am referring to is, usually, as witnessed in all other airlines (even other low cost airlines, such as Go Air and indigo), during boarding, the airlines ensure that the cabin crew welcomes their passengers with a smile on their faces and maybe direct them to their seats. 

Though, while boarding the flight today, the first sight on stepping into the aircraft was 2 female cabin crews putting make up on and ignoring us (the passengers) 

While I support and fully stand by women‚Äôs right to look good and also understand its importance while working in the aviation industry, i am unsure if Spicejet Gives precedence to how its staff LOOKS over How they BEHAVE.

2. In this point I‚Äôd like to specifically mention one cabin crew, Ms. Deepansha. A trivial situation had occurred with the over head baggage compartment, wherein someone sitting next to me had stuffed his bag in such a fashion that the compartment couldnt be closed. Ms. Deepansha tried to stuff the baggage in, and on being unable to do so, shifted it to another compartment. Once she had shifted the bag, another passenger sitting two rows ahead of mine, asked her if she could also adjust his bag in one of the compartments. 

Now, forgive me for making assumptions, but i am of the opinion, that had this happened in any other airline, the cabin staff would have helped the passenger out. Instead, Ms. Deepansha, glared at him and said ‚Äòbhot jagah hai, aap khud rakhlo,‚Äô i.e. there is plenty of space, put your bag yourself. 

As insignificant as it might seem to the airline, this behaviour doesnt really say ‚Äòthe best and brightest in the hospitality industry.‚Äô More like, ‚Äòthe worst and rudest.‚Äô Maybe NOT the image Spicejet wants to portray. 

3. Further, While trying to close the baggage compartment over my seat, Ms Deepansha sought the help of one of her colleagues, Mr. Lohit. Who very gracefully came over to help her through the pickle. Though, my issue began when, since i was on the aisle seat, in his attempt to close the compartment, he pushed so hard that the ‚Äònot very public parts‚Äô of his body were brushing my shoulder. 

I was taken aback to say the least. Not only wasnt there any ‚Äòexcuse me,‚Äô so i could maybe move first, there wasnt any apology rendered to me either when i made a face. I wonder if caressing women‚Äôs shoulders with men‚Äôs privates, is an everyday part of the spicejet cabin crew job description. That is definitely some company policy. Though does spicejet really want to stand apart from the crowd in this way?
Food for thought. 

4. Last but not the least, this is also something that really bothered me for hygiene purposes. Both the female cabin crew members i came in contact with, namely, Ms Deepansha and Ms. Shefali, had their admittedly beautiful LONG hair open. While serving the on-board meal to me, their hair kept coming in the way and over my food. It was majorly disturbing to see that happen, making it almost next to impossible to consume the food paid for by me. What worsened it, was the cup of water i was given. It had certain things floating in it and i couldn‚Äôt help but wonder if that was a present from the Spicejet Cabin Crew‚Äôs hair. 

Needless to say, today morning‚Äôs flight was an extremely unflattering and disappointing experience for me.
Who knew ‚ÄòRed, Hot, Spicy,‚Äô in its truest sense stands for ‚Äòobnoxiously inappropriate, unprofessional and rude.‚Äô 
Maybe, just maybe, Spicejet is a tad bit TOO ‚Äòred,hot and spicy‚Äô for its own good.

Needless to mention, that while Spicejet airline might be low cost, their passengers ARENT. And it‚Äôs time the company realises, embraces and respects that fact.

title: Poor quality service
text:
Flight time changes multiple times before departure 

Poor ground service

Poor in air experience 

Late arrival

title: Lousy online experience. VERY Rude ground staff
text:
Wanted to book 3 tickets in their mobile app to avail a promotion. It errors out each time. Could not book. So, booked in their website. It was also sub par experience. It needs a modern makeover.

The itinerary pdf has overlapping characters. Airport security will not let us into the airport. They asked us to get a printout from the airline counter. Spicejet counter person - Ramkumar was VERY rude. He is NOT fit for any service industry profession.  Spicejet charges Rs. 100 for a printout !!! Though it is not much, it is unfair to charge for a printout when it was airline‚Äôs fault to send a faulty pdf. The counter person was unprofessional and thought he was doing me a Favor and being condescending. If spicejet has more of these crooks, I am sure it would be a defunct airline.  When I complained at check in counter they apologized.

Rest of my flight experience was ok. Friendly flight staff. 

Hope spicejet takes customer service seriously.

I will avoid spicejet in future.

title: SG 2327, to Doon from Delhi.
text: This is an evening service from Delhi's T1 to Jolly Grant Airport ( Dehradun). It was one of those better evenings of Delhi in September and boarding the aircraft by bus from the terminal was okay. The flight was comfortable and was almost ontime to land in Jolly Grant.

title: SG-517 BLR_CCU
text:
Ticketing: online experience was hassle-free
Check-in: Did an over-the-counter check-in cum baggage drop. The queue was long, but the handling was efficient. Was offered an emergency exit seat, which I accepted. Extra leg space advantage gets traded off with laptop usage being discouraged in those seats.
Travel: Slightly delayed departure carried over into 30+ minutes of delay in arrival. Air hostesses were helpful with finding space for cabin bag.
Baggage handling: Usual efficient, nothing to complain about.

title: VERY bad airline
text: I thought some of the European budget airlines like Wow and Ryan Air were bad, but Spice jet makes them look like luxury airlines in comparison. I have never dealt with more difficult and unhelpful staff. Rather than trying to find solutions to problems the airport staff just repeats themselves over and over like robots. What is the point of having staff that operate like computers? I‚Äôve had bad experiences on airplanes but this was literally one of the worst flights I‚Äôve ever taken. The only redeeming factor is that the seats are not horribly dirty but besides that I only have bad things to say. Fly JetAir or Air India instead. You will get better value for the money.

title: Terrible Budget Carrier
text: This airline is one of the worst I‚Äôve ever flown with. Unbelievably incompetent staff and inflexible with their policies. I spent over $400 with them on three flights that I was unable to use because of my travel schedule and they refused to help me rebook one of my tickets to an earlier flight without paying an excessive fee even though there were seats available on the flight. I ended up having to take a taxi 200km in order to get to my final destination. DO NOT fly with them unless you have money to throw away. It does not pay to be cheap and you will be completely disappointed with the quality of the flight once you board. Fly Jet Air or Air India instead. Much much better service for a small amount more. Trust me.

title: Horrible airlines
text: One of a worst air travel experience i had wid spice when I traveled from delhi to bombay. They dnt update any information regarding gate change/ flight delays on screen.. even the ground staff is terrible. The flight was late and no information was circulated.. if a person is travelling for d first time in flight, definitely it shud never be spice.

title: SG-530 to Pune.
text:
Its too early in the morning, at 5.15AM at Chennai when this flight departs.  It landed in Pune well ahead of time and I was out of the airport quickly.  The flight was comfortable, in general. Didn't buy anything on-board. 
One of those  few " no complains" SpiceJet experience !! Travel date: 8th Oct 2018.

title: Surprisingly good!
text: I'll be honest I was DREADING this flight, I'm not a fan of budget airlines but it's the most direct way to get from Dubai to Jaipur so needs must! It's clearly not Emirates but for 2.5 hrs it was pretty good. The check in was a bit slow and protracted from Dubai and the flight times are shocking!! But once on board the plane is smart and clean and we took off and landed on time with very friendly staff. On the return leg we went for the upgrade and it was nice having that little bit of extra room. No worse than Easyjey MILES better than Ryan air, I'd be happy to travel with SpiceJet again.

title: If this is not harassment then what is?
text:
My wife and I were booked for 8th Feb 19 by Flt SG-158 . Since the Mumbai airport closure from 7th Feb on wards  between 11 am to 5 pm for maintenance was already announced we were anticipating some rescheduling or delays. We were therefore checking on airline web site flight status every couple of hours. Till 4 pm on the site our flight was showing only 15 minutes delay (ETD at 7pm) reason given was bad weather at SXR Srinagar Airport. We got another message by SMS asking us to report 120 minutes before departure time. Since it takes almost one hour from residence to Airport we left home at 4 pm. On reaching airport check in counter we were told flight is delayed till 8 pm but eventually left at 9 pm.
Is it believable that bad weather at Srinagar will cause a delay of only 15 minutes-is it not misleading passengers?. Moreover only at 4.02 pm messages were sent informing more than one hour delay. Could not the Airline inform of such a long delay earlier than 4.02 pm. Why wait till we leave home at 4 pm and did not access phone messages resulting in waiting at airport for more than three hours.

title: No professionalism airline
text: This airline need a lot of professionalism improvements. Our flight got delayed for 2 hrs at Delhi airport. I can understand the unavoidable situations. But there was not staff available at the desired gate to provide the proper information or to help the needy / aged travelers.

title: Amazing Food & Hospitality
text: Good Food... The crew offers water without being requested for...It makes a lot of difference.. I travel very frequently on this flight... Ms Pallavi specially has been always takes good care of all travelers

title: Perfect Flight - On time, good in flight service, past baggage delivery
text: Having suffered a disaster with Jet Airways we took a Spice Jet flight and it worked perfectly; nice little plane, Bombardier Q400.

title: Budget Airline to be AVOIDED
text: We were travelling on a group booking with 11 people and at checkin, the combined total of the baggage was 6 kg over the limit (165kg for 6 Pax @ 15kg per Pax). This meant that on average, each passenger was 0.6kg over the limit. This was our 4th flight in India, having flown IndiGo up till now. The checkin staff were intractable as to the overweight abount and insisted that we pay excess baggage of 3,000 rupees AND a handling charge of another 2,000 rupees. We were travelling with our Travel Agent who went to see the SpiceJet Airport Manager, who verbally abused him for having the "audacity" to challenge him. NEVER AGAIN!!!!

title: Mixed experience
text:
Travelled from Bengaluru to Mumbai  Spicejet Flight SG456. The flight was late due to bad weather delay. The flight was fully booked.
Was most disappointed by the cabin crew. They seemed clueless. They did not check  the seatbelts and seats pulled forward before take off and landing. They were more interested in selling the foods & drinks. 

But the saving grace for this flight was the amazing banter of the pilot. He was hilarious as well as informative. He chatted away telling us about the flight path, what part of the country we were flying over. He had a great sense of humour. I made it a point to compliment him on landing.

title: Nope, not again
text:
This was supposed to be a return flight, but the return was simply cancelled without an advance notification and we found out only when we came to the airport. Counter staff was not helpful at all, and the options provided were either a refund of the portion of the ticket or come back the next day to take the flight. But the cost of going back to city and the hotel for the night was of course not even a remote possibility. No asssiatnce in terms of getting another ticket on another airline or even getting a voucher for a lounge at the airport. 
On the flight into Ahmedabad I was told that the blankets are not provided while a person travelling with me and sitting 3 rows apart was given one! At least seats were clean mostly because of no food or drinks being served unless paid for.

title: Massive delay on a Monday morning
text:
We had our visa slot with the Spanish Consulate Agency (BLS) in Mumbai. My daughter who is based in Bangalore had to catch the 7.50 AM flight so as to reach Mumbai at 9.30 AM and reach for her appointment with us at noon.

Just as the flight was at take off speed, the pilot aborted the take-off and the plane did not leave until 10.40 AM.

Until the take off, the air hostesses were saying that the plane would leave in 15 min but those 15 min never came for 3.5 hours.

My daughter missed her appointment and I had to pay an additional charge to get her an instant slot. 

Very poor of the airline to cause a delay in a Monday morning flight by not checking the equipment well.

title: SpiceJet- Delhi to Dubai - corendon airlines
text:
I start with indira gandhi international delhi airport and is among the best airports in world, I can say and do recommend to travel for connection flight

SpiceJet is budget low cost cost airline so charges for food and bevreges are extra. You will get drinking water free of cost. This particular route seems to br outsourced by corendon airlines. Planes were small but were not noisy.

Ques at boarding were exceptionally long both at Dubai and Delhi. They were charging extra in return for faster chek in and in flight food which I dont like.

In flight entertainment was not there. It was approx 4.50 hours flight

Rest it all like budget airline mention to be. In Dubai T1 terminal was there for budget airlines which seems to be fine.

title: SpiceJet - Horrible Experience while travelling from Dubai to Mumbai
text: Airline staff was arrogant and totally non-co-operative.Using unfair practices to extract money from psssangers for hand baggage.They included weight of laptop,duty free items and warm clothings also in hand baggage while checking weight of hand baggage. Hand baggage was checked just before boarding and not at the time of check-in thereby denying opportunity to reduce hand baggage.They wanted to make money anyhow.Offer of help by a fellow passenger who had negligible hand baggage to share part of hand baggage was denied.Some passengers with 2 or more hand baggage weighing more than 7kg were not charged thereby discriminating between passengers. Weighing machine used was without calibration certificate and showing more than the actual weight. Airline staff were using their whims and fancies for charging for hand baggage even that just before boarding the aircraft.Never fly SpiceJet.

title: More charges but uncomfortable seat
text: I flew this airline for first time as options from Jammu to Mumbai are limited.Not a bad airline. Check in was good. I paid extra for spicemax as it is advertised that you get more leg space. But on the first row leg space was less than a normal seat and you could not stretch your legs as the partition restricted the space. Staff was professional but not very friendly.

title: Bad choice. SG 679.
text: I chose this flight as I had work till about 8pm. This flight was scheduled to depart at 10.55 PM. That was a bad Idea, the flight was delayed by an hour ! Didn't have onboard food. The crew onboard were doing their best to manage the guests. By the time I got home in Chennai , it was 3 am !! Bad idea to choose such irrationality timed flights, even of it's cheaper.

title: Major complaint
text:
My first experience with FlySpiceJet and the worst experience ever..
I have booked a flight from Amritsar to Goa sg281 which was supposed to depart at 18:45hrs. on 6th Feb but got a notification saying that the flight got delayed by 4 hours n some minutes and now the departure time was 22:45hrs. And then when we reach the airport then again we get a notifications saying that the flight is again delayed by 1 n a half hour and now the departure time is 12:20am on 7th Feb which is in total delayed by more then 6 hours already and the boarding opens at 12:50am without any information n finally we get into the plain but again there's a twist that we get a announcement in the cabin after sitting for 10 mins already that there is some engine issues and it will again take around 10-15 mins to rectify and they were trying to make us understand that this is for our safety only and Ofcours we had to wait because there was no other option and see the best part we again get a announcement around 20 mins that it will still take another 10-15 mins and yes of course it was for our safety..
Now it's already 1:47am and we are still waiting in the plain..
The worst experience of my life on my first wedding anniversary..
Wouldn't dare to travel with SpiceJet ever again in my life..

title: Not soo comfortable.
text:
The flight had no delay in departure as well as in the arrival. The problem of the flight comes when it comes to comfort. The flight had a very small legspace. The push back seats are there but once if you go back, there will be a call from the traveller to move the seat front. 
We had a pre-booked meal. Please don't expect a good tasty meal in the flight. The temperature was kept warm in the flight. Overall it was just a better experience.

title: This Airline is a total ripoff.
text:
Was looking to buy two tickets for my niece and her husband from Delhi to Dhaka. Based on my search the price showed at US $236.00 And I started filling out information. Every step I passed a new kind fees kept adding up. Like they allocated seats (I didn't choose) with a fees. OK. Let's do it. Then they charged travel insurance. Ok-let's do it. Now when i was about to click pay now another charged poped up as convenience fee (WTF)

It was just a waste of time. Right away, I declined and checked on our Canadian agent "CheapOair". Less price and I paid what I saw at the beginning. Took less than 2 minutes to get everything done.

Don't fall prey to their online rip off booking system.

title: Horrible service
text: I have traveled in December and in January and both the times my flight was rescheduled causing me much  inconvenience.They don't even give you a good connecting flight.Its up to us to find out and reschedule.A very bad experience.

title: very prompt and able economic airline
text: i used to travel to jaipur to delhi and viceversa monthly and have used most of the airlines but the quickest adn most efficient airline experience i have received is from spicejet. no frills but quite prudent management it s a delight to travel with them if ion a buudget.

title: I feel like poorly manage people and aircrafts
text: I will use SpiceJet if there is no other option is available. The plane was not properly cleaned and I had a doubt whether proper maintenance. The staff also just doing their job as there is no other option. Overall, my feeling is the management has issues.

title: Paid seats.
text: The flight was on-time, it also landed in Hyderabad on-time. Didn't have checked in bags, so was out of the airport quickly. Also, didn't buy the on board food, preferred to eat  the breakfast after landing at the food court of Hyderabad airport, arrival area , ground floor. The web check-in didn't give me the option of choosing a seat for free. Strange !

title: Spicy with humour
text:
Domestic flight with great fun. The captain on the first leg to Bangalore was very amusing and certainly made the journey worthwhile. The seats were comfy and good landing.
The attendants were really good and I would recommend flying with spicejet.

Thanks Captain you made my day.

title: Spicejet - everlate, Poor service
text:
The flight I had booked was incoming from Madurai and was onward to Mumbai. At the outset the information being given is ever glossed. Even though fully aware that the flight hasn't left the earlier station, the announcement just states the flight is just 20 mins delayed while it will be at least an hour!! Never the reason for delay is informed nor the quantum of delay. This irks for two reasons - one our plan getting jeopardized and the other being we cannot plan to do something over there in the airport which could hv been had the quantum of delay is known fairly correctly

The flight was delayed by about 70 minutes finally!! The counter services were ok. The boarding process was fine and the aircraft fairly clean. The take-off fine and the announcements fairly clear. Since it was already too late into night, the meals/snacks ordered were served much beyond the time to be of interest! Further the serving efficiency was poor and there were cases when the ordered items were unavailable which was further shocking!! The standard response being Sorry sir, Sorry mam!! What is the use of then booking meal on-line and paying ages in advance??!!

The flight finally landed almost two hours behind schedule!! My thoughts - why ever should I fly again this airline if other service is available.

title: Budget friendly
text: Flight was delayed one hour & not sure why? No explanation was given. If you want a meal on one of the domestic flights you can either pre-order or buy it on the plane. It's a budget airline so having no in flight entertainment and little elbow room is expected.

title: Average Airline
text: Spicejet is an average low cost carrier. twice i flown with Spicejet and both times i was happy with their on timing. The main concern for me was the leg space. I got a middle seat both times and width of the seats and leg space were terrible. I wont suggest this flight for a six feet height person like me

title: Pathetic customer service - will never use this airline again when travelling in India
text: Pathetic service at call centre when requesting a very minor error correction in name. Customer service centre in New Delhi is the worst to get hold off when calling as an international traveller. Will never use or recommend this airline when travelling locally in India for anyone - both Indian and foreign nationals.

title: Just look at their customer responses
text:
I just received a response to my comments on tripadvisor .
The comment began with ‚ÄúHey‚Äù as hey you! One has to ask what sort of airline guest representative could write in such a vulgar and childish manner. The rest was equally unhelpful.
Warning to all, use this airline at you peril. Just read their responses to guest comments, so obvious they not only do not care but are thoroughly uneducated.

title: multiple travel
text: The flight was delayed on December 13th 2018, there was no indication, information about the same, all passengers were angry and upset at "Messengers". Personally I had to go and calm down people, because at the gate the agents were bombarded, we were told that if the flight won't depart they will send us by a private bus to our destination by road, if we want, 10 hours road trip at night? after I talked to people I requested them to provided some food to passengers, they obliged. also finally we lest at 5:30 in the evening with special permission from Jaisalmer airport, because of Military camp there, and night landing is not allowed. We lost our half day of stay there, but then there was no apology from spice Jet. My cousin was to travel next day to Jaipur and their flight left 3 hours early and they were not even informed, they lost entire day in Jaipur.

title: SPICY HOT!
text:
I was super surprised with the kind of legroom i had in the regular seats. It was much more than the other airlines. (NON spicemaxx seats). 

The Cabin crew was also very helpful and supportive. Very friendly too, though can be case to case as it is an individual choice.

title: Delay spoilt all positives
text:
I am travelling this morning, 31st Jan 2019, from¬†Kolkata to Mumbai on Spicejet flight¬†SG 488. The scheduled departure¬† was at 7.50 and I reached airport at 6.20. Following is my overall experience about the flight ( Rating given out of 5, 5 being the highest):-
A. Check-in: Checking at the self check in kiosk was smooth. Traveling with handbag only.(Rating 4).
B. Lounge access: I was flying economy and hence there was no lounge faculty offered. I used my Mastercard to access airport lounge.(Rating Neutral)
C. Boarding and departure: Flight was delayed. Scheduled departure was at 7.50, but flight was delayed by 49 minutes. Boarding opened at 7.50 at Gate 23B by bus. Boarding process was smooth and fast. Push back was at 8.20 and we took off at 8.40. Delay of 40 minutes (Rating 3). 
D. Seats and interior: The aircraft was a 3rd generation, Boeing 737 Max-8 series and looked new and well maintained. This type of aircraft are environment friendly, generates 14% lower carbon emissions, 50% lesser Nitrogen Oxides and 40% lower noise. The interior in Light Beige and Black looked bright and well lit. Seats upholstered in black and cherry in different rows, gives vibrancy to the overall interior. My selected seat was 17D, an aisle seat from the rear. Seat pitch was comfortable with good legspace. Seat recline was about 110 degree.(Rating 4.25).
E. In flight Service: Being no frill flight, there was hardly any in flight service offered. Food can be bought at the flight. Spicejet offers good range of hot food (Spicecafe) that can be bought. Water was made available as and when asked. In flight magazine Spiceroute provides interesting reading. (Rating 4).
F. Arrival and baggage: Flight landed at Kolkata 11.35, delay of 55 minutes from scheduled arrival (sic). Makes lot of difference in your business schedule with same day return plan. Gates were opened at 11.40. Didn't have checked in luggage (Rating 3)
G.Overall flight experience and suggested area of improvement : Barring delay, which spoilt every other positives, overall flying experience was good. Staff was well groomed and polite. 3rd Generation aircraft was great positive. DELAY WAS THE BIGGEST SPOILER for a frequent flyer like me. üëéüëé(OVERALL RATING 3.5)

title: Bad experience on Spice Jt SG-354 on Jan. 29, 2019 from Kolkatta to Delhi
text:
1. Spice jet is a low fare airline but fools customers by charging same fare as full service airline.
2. Meals/snacks/beverages were pre-booked.  but was asked to pay for beverage even though complimentary with corporate deal.
3.  Food service is so slow that middle rows have to wait for their turn only when flight is in descent mode leaving very little time for most passengers to eat.
4.  Passengers who had pre booked food/beverages should have been given preference in service, instead preference  was given for sale of food/beverage, with every possibility of pre ordered food/beverage being not available to passengers who had pre booked them depriving them of their ordered food/beverage.
5.  all seats were permanently reclined, which is a safety hazard, because they must be upright during take-off and landing.
6.  All tray tables were permanently inclined causing food tray and beverage to slide towards passenger.
7. They used old aircraft with no effort to rectify seats and improve service. it seems customer service is an alien word for them 

Jai H. Dalmia
Seat 19 c

title: Dry Day
text:
New Delhi To Hong Kong Jan 28 2019
I booked a ticket through spicejet for my father to visit us for Chinese new year holidays. To make his travel comfortable i did not mind paying extra for spicemax experience which included a couple of extra services which was good. But at the time when the food was being served my father asked the air stewardess if he could get a glass of whiskey, in return she asked which whiskey he would like to have 'Indian or Foreign? He replied by saying " Black label please". Being unsure she said Sir, i will just check for you! After 5 minutes she returned and said Sorry Sir today is DRY DAY. 
I mean i heard India is dry day on Jan 26 due to Republic Day but dry day extending for another 2 days is something new and shocking for us.  
International Spicemax Offering clearly mentioned on the Itinerary: Complementary Meal + Non-alcoholic or Alcoholic beverage but getting such a respond from the staff sounded very unprofessional. 
I hope when he is flying back to Delhi later in Feb the airline is still not celebrating Dry Day.

title: Good air travel expereince !!
text: Aircraft interior should be improved in terms of its cleanliness and ambiance, rest experience was good !!

title: Typical economy airline, no thrills
text: A typical economy flight, you get what you pay for, it did depart late hence arrived late but only by a few mins so no real problem. And the luggage arrived as it should.

title: Worst airline ever
text: My flight was from Bangkok to Ahmedabad, they canceled the flight by lack of passengers and shifted my flight to one day before and again we slept on airport because of flight delay 5 hours, please don‚Äôt choose this worst flight from Ahmedabad to Bangkok

title: Pay Spice Max and receive Spice Min
text: please have your representative at the luggage belt on arrival hall as if priority baggage arrives post all other baggage a spice max customer will be unhappy...since you do not have a rep on the baggage below you will never know of this goof up as DANATA rep will never report their goof up....I approached a DANATA staff hanging around far from this belt altered them and then could received my baggage (and all other baggage of my spice max co passengers)....post all economy baggage arrived

title: Spicy airlines in domestic
text: Spicejet is cheapest airlines in India and worthable to flight in domestic sector travelled from Mumbai to Hyderabad and it‚Äôs wonderful experience

title: Food onboard can be improved!!
text: Was traveling on a late night flight scheduled to depart from Bangalore at 10:10 and it was delayed in normal process by around 30 mins and the same delay came about at the destination. The Boeing 737 had reasonably comfy seats and everything was alright. However not a fan of the food delivered, for the veg multigrain sandwich was barely eatable, can be improved.

title: SUDDEN SCHEDULE CHANGE
text:
Sudden schedule change

We were 7 friends who had gone on vacation to Savai Madhopur tiger sanctuary. We booked our return flight on SPICEJET from Ahmadabad to Jaipur & back on 3rd December.
Jaipur To Savai Madhopur traveling time is 4 hours & our return flight SG621 when booked was scheduled for 12.55 pm which was convenient to reach in time to airport from Ranthambhore.
But to our surprise we received text message that flight is rescheduled to 
7 Am which means to reach airport in time we have to leave from Ranthambhore at 1 Am & drive during night to reach airport.
We had to cancel our tickets & ended up taking indigo flight in the evening which was Jaipur-Delhi-ahmedabad & reached home at midnight and had to pay double airfare than originally booked
Will never fly this airline

title: Never even intimate about flight delay
text: I had never seen such poor customer service from spice jet staff and further its for sure that their flights are never on time. This is second of such happening with in 15 days of time. Its seems like only god knows when their flight departs. No prior intimation about the delays. Check in crew are quite casual about the delays and infact they says that if you want to go on time better go with Indigo and not to expect it from Spice jet. Thanks Spice jet team for that wonderful suggestion.

title: Comfortable and timely flight
text: A long needed direct flight to Pune from Kolkata at a suitable hour. Flight was comfortable, the cabin crew very helpful and friendly. And on both the legs - going and return - the flight was exactly on time.

title: Poor food, terrible seats
text: The flight was on schedule and thankfully it was short. There were some particles lying in the seat which had to be dusted off and removed. The storage sleeve of the seat in front was town preventing me from keeping anything there. Even the safety instructions sheet kept there kept falling to the floor. Many seats in the aircraft had such a torn sleeve. Does the airline not care about repairing these? The sandwich given as a meal was utterly tasteless.

title: Low cost airline... Lower customer satisfaction
text:
To start with, flight was delayed by 2 hours, no announcements at airport (as it is silent airport) and no communications. 

Hardly anything good to write about, but if you are a budget traveler you

title: Beware if you paid by non Indian credit card!,
text:
We arrived at the airport, complete with ticket including seat number.  It was row two, in line with all our other tickets I believe to be business class. When we arrived the agent pointed out among  the small print, issues relating to credit cards used outside India for the purpose of purchase. The travel agent we use had obviously made other arrangements for  for payment.  Neither of my two credit cards were helpful. We then had to go through the performance of re-purchasing a ticket. In a crowded airport this is far from amazing and fortunately did not prevent us from getting on board in time. 
 Easiest way I can think of is to use another airline, we did not have any issues with jet Airways. Very strongly recommend if you are on this airline that you have the credit card with you used to make the original booking.

title: I was warned not to fly Spice Jet, I didn't listen
text:
I was warned that it's Spice Jet, that the flight will be delayed or cancelled, that even a short flight of 40 minutes will turn into a half day journey.

I was stupid and didn't listen to those warnings.
And yes, my flight was late. All other flights to Dhaka are departing on time, so the "bad weather in Dhaka" excuse was obviously a lie.
Spice Jet claims that "If a passenger has checked in on time and SpiceJet expects delays of 120 minutes or more, refreshments are served. " and that is NOT true. Nothing was served and requests for refreshments were met with blank stares and outright laughs.
