When we finally board the plane, the pilot announces that he doesn't feel comfortable flying the aircraft, because "there's a problem with landing gear". We waited nearly an hour for a mechanic to show up and look at the landing gear and other than that do absolutely nothing. I kid you not. You couldn't make it up if you tried.
We finally flew to Dhaka and it was a very tense 40 minutes. Fortunately, we landed safely.

Needless to say, this was my first and last time flying SpiceJet.

title: Worst customer service
text:
You have a very immature, inexperience staff that need to be trained. The worst crew that I have seen in any of my travels. 
I usually dont put up complains on social media & I let go things but this one incident of bad customer service has never been seen or heard of in the service industry. I was travelling from Mumbai to Ahmedabad on 22nd Jan with the spicemax ticket & had ordered my meal also. I was in row 3 & the flight is about 60 mins long. The crew took 45 mins to serve first 2 rows & by the time it was to serve the 3rd row, the plane had already started the decent & the seat belt sign was on. The crew tried to serve us in a rush & was told that we will not be given hot beverage though I had requested. I was ok with that & took mango juice. Just than they served another fallow passenger with hot beverage hence i asked the crew why was I not served hot beverage though they served the other passenger. To this question of my the crew showed extreme disappoint & said that she will get it in a very rude tone. She did eventually get us coffee when the plane was almost landing. While we just took a sip of the coffee the member of the crew asked us to return on of the beverage because we were entitled to only one beverage. they infact even took the "sipped" coffee This shows the immaturity of the crew & the training you provide. This is totally unheard of that. Even if we were not entitled to more than 1 drink but due to the staff inefficiency they could have told us but taking back the sipped coffee is a slap to the hospital industry. Please see that the staff is well trained. paid & knows how to deal with such situations. If I do not hear back from the spice jet folks on this incident, I will need to find other ways to educate the folks travelling/thinking of travelling on spicejet
I hence forth would not ever want to travel on spicejet

title: RUDE customer representative
text:
I would like to report an extremely rude customer representative, Deepika Chudasama, at Ahmedabad airport. My SpiceJet flight was delayed by 2 hours when travelling with my family on Friday, 18 Jan 2019 from AMD to MAA. There were 6 passengers on the itinerary including 2 little kids and 2 senior citizens.
I asked Deepika Chudasama if we could check in our carry on baggage as we were travelling with little kids, she totally ignored my request and had us put all our carry on baggage and check-in bags on the weighing machine. She even had us put our laptop bag, diaper bags (which are usually excluded with little kids) to add on the total weight. 
Deepika Chudasama kept forcing us to pay for our carry on luggage and when we told her that we would rather have our family member in Ahmedabad pick up excess luggage, she became very rude. I asked her the reason for why the flight was delayed for 2 hours as now it would be reaching Chennai at midnight instead of 10 pm and with little kids, it‚Äôs too late. Instead of showing any compassion, she made a face and said that we could go ahead and cancel our tickets if we wanted and SpiceJet would gladly refund our ticket amount. She 
She kept repeating that you want to talk about rules with me, let me show you what rules are. She added every single gram in our bags and was ticked off from the start. She treated us very rudely by using her position to demean us and repeating that I‚Äôll show you what rules are. 

I understand that sometimes flight are delayed due to unavoidable reasons but customer representatives do not have to be so rude and reply by saying that we can go ahead and cancel our tickets. 

I have travelled with Spicejet in the past and this was by far the worse experience dealing with Deepika Chudasama at AMD airport. There needs to be some kind of training for your customer representatives on how to deal with customers and show kindness and still abide by the rules. I did not ask for any favour but the way she responded rudely is completely unacceptable. 

I hope you‚Äôll take some action regarding this.

title: Worst Experience With Spuce Jet
text: This is the third time i am flying with Spicejet worst experience always delayed at airport at the same time delayed on air with whatever reasons... Worst nightmare to be on borad.. On birad staffs are excellent but doesn't matters ehrn you have to wait for hours to collect you luggage at belt.. I would recommend Indigo or Vistara in this route rather. Totally unsatisfied may be my kast trip to this ccu Bangalore route with Spicejet.. Not worth a single pennyüôÅ

title: Good budget option
text: Being a budget airlines it serves the purpose well. I never faced cancellation but got delayed few times. Well behaved crews.

title: I was asked to pay for half a kilo excess
text: It is utter stupidity when someone at the asks you to pay for half a kilo excess. They should educate their staff to use their common sense

title: Spice Jet - sweet n sour...
text: i was on a leisure trip of Beautiful Pondicherry along with my family and friends. On 09/01/2019 the flight from Pondicherry was late for approx 1.30 hours and as per rules passengers were scheduled to report 2 hours in advance, but an early flights  if getting late they must consider bit light refreshment because everyone starts bit early and when this unexpected delay is announced, it melts some sour in sweet. Though the flight was excellent with a new aircraft and decent staff at airport and crew. overall this is an advice may help to increase passengers pleasure.

title: Spicejet is useless
text: This was one of the most horrible experiences I have had recently , many times spicejet  flights are delayed so, you can't really trust them if you have a connection flight, today it was 6 hour delay then + 3moor hours , and the nicest part is that no one from this company bothered to take a responsibility and give us some place to rest or provided any drinks or food!  Basically they left us there to sleep on stone floors, the staff was very unfriendly and not helpful at all,  so people if you don't want to lose lot of time energy  and nerves just skip spicejet! Do not use spicejet! I would skip Chennai airoport also,  not very organized, no food  no good resting places and so on..

title: 1st time with domestic flight
text:
1st time i have experinced, fast check in procedure, the service is good and polite staff
Extra cost for overweight is expenses only 15 kg perpax 

All ok

title: It Cant Get Worse
text: Our group was all from Mizoram and even though we're Indians we were met with a shock every time we mentioned this fact in Thailand. The Thai staff at the SpiceJet BKK check in counter was no exception and was visibly condescending towards us who rather stupidly forgot the baggage policy of 25kgs and NOT 30kgs, my friend had to stuff her Platheora of shoes from Pratunam market into my bagpack while this fiasco was going on the lady at the check in counter gave us a window seat of 18B which was not possible, after my enquiry she kindly assured us "Its the best seat in the plane, you can come back to me if you dont like it" surprise, surprise, it was a non reclining emergency seat 5 feet away from any window with the worst leg space ever, trust me, I've also flown Indigo. Had the flight been more than 3 hours, Im sure I would have decided it was time to pass on to the afterlife. The flight attendant was very nice though, she did apologize for the seat plus the flight was full, Im sure she had to apologize to a lot to customers like us who were blessed by the Thai lady with the "best seat in the plane" The funny thing is I imagine her giving the same false statements to this day to a bunch of other customers who just wont know.

title: Economic Airline with spicy touch
text: This was the first time I have experienced Boeing737MAX all thanks to Spicejet Airlines, I was on a SpiceMax seat which is a extra legroom first four front row seats along with that you get a priority check in, priority boarding, priority bags out and a meal at a Extra Cost of Rupees 1000/- which i think  is worth it, Aircraft was new,there was no noise, Service was very efficient and prompt ,flight attendants were very polite and helpful which is very rare on indian LCC , flight announcement were audible clearly, ground service were perfect... All in all it was smooth ride and new experience of B737MAX with a touch of spice in indian Domestic sky

title: nothing much to say
text: nothing much to say about SpiceJet... It's surprising that they have put domestic aircraft on international route... The services are frustrating and the food is paid.....overall nothing great about it.

title: Good experience on premium economu
text: This was a first time traveled on spicejet and with premium economy class. The experience was good. I had to pay extra 1000k which also include a hot meal on board, priority check-in, and baggage service.

title: Terrible service
text: It was New Year's Eve. Flight was initially delayed 2 hours - not a problem. Flight was delayed another 2 hours - annoying but it happens. Flight was then cancelled after which a bus was maybe going to be organized for the 9-hour land journey or a refund at a later date. I read in the paper the next day that the plane did have a technical issue, which happens, but the I felt so abandoned with little to no real options proposed to help me get to my next connecting flight.

title: Pathetic Experience with SpiceJet..
text:
I was supposed to Travel by Spice jet flight SG1216 from Jaipur which was scheduled at 8:25pm to Bhopal and we're supposed to reach by 9:45pm. How ever the flight timings were rescheduled respectively from 10:30pm to 11:05pm to 12:05 pm and it actually Take off after 12:25am only .. so if u are planning to travel by Spice jet Think again as it's not a value to money deal to me.. My complete Night has been Ruined in traveling despite I have booked it only to reach timely at Bhopal..

Even for Refreshments I don't know what kind of contract they have with the vendor at Airport whom were selling local product at Airport and when asked to change it with some other product and do Charge Excess Money to me. He denied and we're not ready like he is doing some kind of Favor to me.. seriously Even after paying money this is not an Experience I expect.
I understood that Crew in the flight tried to do the damage repair to the passengers with their courteous and polite behavior but things were
Screwed by the Airlines only.

Need Serious improvement in punctuality & Policy @ Spice jet.

title: Comfortable & Hospitable
text: The flight was slightly delayed, due to fog issues at the take off destination. The crew were very kind and hospitable. We were served water immediately after take off. The seating was also spacious and comfortable. Even though we held ordinary tickets, we were given preferential seats in the 3rd row, for which we were not charged anything extra. The captain on air apologized twice for the slight delay. Enjoyed the flight.

title: Cancelled flight NO MONEY BACk !!
text:
SpiceJet cancelled my flight 15 days in advance (due to weather) and they say they won‚Äôt give the money back !!!!

One word: thieves !!! 

What‚Äôs a shame and what a frustration to feel so impotent.

title: Senseless staff
text:
I had a flight at 5.55 AM and stood in line which is of around 150 people at around 4.40 AM. There was no intimation of flight details neither on the Spicejet counter display board nor any staff has helped.

When it was my turn to check-in, I have told my destination and the staff over there told me to go stand in another line. When I went there controller said, sir you cannot board the flight it has been closed. When I asked whether there was an intimation of the check-in, she was saying that she shouted out from the counter about the flight.

Looks like it is a local bus, that will stop at each place and call out " bhayya kaha jane ka"

Haha, never going to book a flight from them again, 
SpiceJet thanks for such a beautiful experience.

title: Rude crew members
text:
Hi, we had a flight from Bangkok to Ahmedabad SG-86 on 13/01/19 departing at 2:05 am and arriving at 5:30 pm. firstly as soon as we entered the crew did not wish or greet which is a normal protocol for any airlines, which was quite surprising as if you are not welcome on  board.
 secondly we were 6 adults and 1 child who were travelling in economy class. it was midnight and my daughter who was having fever was feeling cold. unfortunately, i was not having anything to warm her up. on requesting for a blanket which was offered to spicemax passengers, the crew denied any blanket to non-spicemax passengers and said that one has to pay for it.
agreed, but exceptionally if a child who is not feeling well and a blanket if at all is needed which was not even used by spice max passengers, the crew bluntly denied. they were rude to such an extent that on asking for water they said you will have to purchase it. you ask anything and pat comes a rude reply.
this type of behaviour is unacceptable for such a reputed airlines. i have flown many times with spicejet never ever it has happpened. i did not know what went wrong but the crew were highly impolite and inhuman.
i would request the authorities to do the needful and also should take appropriate measures to avoid such incidents.a mature person should always be part of the crew particularly at odd hours when everyone is tired so that such delicate matters can be handled with grace and maturity.
pathetic experience with spicejet because of rude crew members
hoping to improve your performance on board
Dr Amisha Shah

title: Good value for money
text:
I traveled by the Boeing 737-800 on a red-eye flight from Bengaluru to Mumbai. The check-in kiosks did not have SpiceJet option to get a boarding pass and had to wait in the queue. The check-in counter staff was friendly. The aircraft pushed back on-time and also arrived in Mumbai on-time. The baggage came on the carousel pretty quickly.
The aircraft I traveled in looked really old. The overhead baggage compartment above rows 6 & 7 had sticking tapes on them. The condition of the cabin was not clean and did not look fresh. The Boeing 737-800 seat configuration that SpiceJet has, provide poor front leg space.
However, the crew were friendly and helpful. The snack service was quick and efficient. SpiceJet does offer value for money and their flight timings for the Bengaluru-Mumbai sector is ideal for Business passengers.

title: below average
text:
To start in a chronological order, srinagar airport has different queues at the airport for different airlines. Airindia gate would be mostly occupied by serving millitary personnel. Spicejet has long queues. I find Vistara airlines has less queue.

Flights originating from srinagar airport diesn't offer web checkin. So next queue is at the check in counter. So a representative from spicejet has come to us, while we're entering the queue and did a sales pitch: offering a premium service for INR 2000 that includes meals onboard, faster clearnace etc..I said not a rupee. after a while in the queue we got nearer to the check in counter and that's when I noticed that the spice jet personnel (a lady) at the check-in desk is doing the same sales pitch for each and every passenger. utter waste of time for others waiting in the queue.

During the flight, for the first time ever, I'm subjected to in-flight advertisements! The flight attendent does the advertising through the speaker system. It's like radio advertisement albeit live. For next  few minutes we've heard advertisements on products as niche as matrimony.com 

The connecting flight from ahmedabad to bangalore was delayed by 3hrs which is common for spicejet. 
One more thing, spice jet should deploy enough buses to ferry passengers to and from the runaway instead of stuffing them in one  or two buses.

title: Worst Indian carrier
text: Let me start by saying that think twice about flying this airlines even it‚Äôs the end of the world. Never had a worse experience. Firstly I booked flights for my entire family of 4 from Del to Kochi and at the time of booking it was a direct flight (I never take stop over flights in domestic circuits). Just a month before the travel the airline unilaterally changed it into a stopover flight with Pune in between and conveniently adding 3hrs to the journey. With minimal other options due to increased fare I had to go through that. Secondly they charge extra for e-checkin and if you try to get seats for the family together. Another way to extract more money. Sheer fraud (since this is never mentioned upfront or in print). They use the garb of preferred seating and they call all window and aisle seats in every row from front to back as ‚Äúpreferred seating‚Äù. And to top this up they are perpetually delayed which caused my onward journey to take over 11hr that should typically have 2.5 hrs.

title: fantastic experience
text: The best experience of flying by a budget airline. The cabin crew was extremely helpful and friendly and made the entire flight a pleasure.

title: Concern about drunk passenger
text: I had a flight from Bangkok to Ahmedabad. Departure time is 2.05 AM. The flight is on time and staffs are lovely but one thing that I would like to ask airline staff, crew and captain that how could you let a drunk passenger get on board. I think airline should concern if drunk passenger is fit to fly or not. This person sat behind me and he scream and hit the seat all the way until we landed. He not only bother me but other passengers. Anyway, they value is fair enough for this flight and I recommend to purchase SpiceMax because the seat is more comfortable even for a short flight.

title: The joys of Udaan
text:
Thanks to the Government's Udaan scheme, many more places are now on the air map in India. Pondicherry is one of them.

I have been to Pondi before by road from Chennai but this time I decided to fly in with my family. I expected good views from the low flying ATR aircraft and was not disappointed. 

The eastern sea coast was visible for a long distance despite the clouds. Before it landed, the lush green fields of Tamil Nadu were pleasing to the eye.

Some not so good points were the slightly old toilets in the aircraft and the waiting time to get a cab on arrival. Both can be improved easily by authorities.

At the next opportunity, I'd take this flight again.

title: Does what it says
text:
We travelled a family of four (two adults, two kids) on SpiceJet for an internal Indian flight.
The plane we used seating arrangement two seats on both sides of aisle. 
There is the option to purchase food and refreshments, even if not pre ordered. Reasonable selection.
Easy check in 
Flight was good. Would use them again

title: My experience with spicejet
text:
Hi,
I was travelling from Chennai to Kochi on 6th jan 2019 on flight SG 3073. My brother had booked ticket for me with his credit card and I didnt know that I had to carry a copy of the card and authorisation letter.When the lady at the counter said that it was required I was trying to contact my brother.My phone had got damaged  when I had a fall the previous day. I was also not comfortable standing for long time as I had a foot injury also.A person from spicejet team Chennai, named Mr.Prakash helped me and let me use his phone and I could contact my brother.I really appreciate his gesture.After reaching Kochi I realised that my baggage didnt come in that flight and had to wait in the airport for another 3 hours. But again when I explained my condition another staff from spicejet Mr.Inderjeet helped to get first aid for my foot and helped to get baggage.Thanks to both Mr.Prakash from Chennai spice jet staff and Mr.Inderjeet from Kochi spice jet team.
Mary Smitha
New Zealand

title: Never really departs or Lands on time
text:
Spice Jet is the worst when it comes to punctuality. I had booked my tickets 15 days in advance but my flight got cancelled 24 hours before the departure time. The next flight which i got was after 2 days and it departed 3 hours later than the schedule departure,

On my return journey, again the flight was delayed by 2 hours. Overall, a very bad experience. I have not taken a Spice Jet flight since.

title: Red. Hot. Spicy.
text: When you take a SpiceJet flight, remember that you are not in the "developed" world. Check-in counter is slow. Flights run late. Passengers board on stairs, not a jet bridge. SpiceJet is a regional airline, so expect intermediate stops on the way to your final destination. Once onboard, however, service is good. Food is Indian cuisine (and can be very spicy, so ask for "not spicy" if you don't like heat). But the most interesting part of the flight for a Westerner is the variety of cultures one meets aboard a SpiceJet flight. One will see a sample of many parts of Indian societies.

title: Worst Airlines
text:
I had international connected flight via domestic airlines spice jet and we were travelling 6 persons. 

We had few extra luggage because of international flight and they did not allow us 1 kg extra per person (other airlines allows 1-2 kg extra) and asked to pay 400 Rs. per kg whereas I checked online for excess baggage 
which was only 150 Rs. per kg for international travellers.

Staff behaviour was so rude and not at all supportive.

I would highly recommend every one to do not travel with this airlines specially when you have connected international flight.

title: First Experience with Spice jet.
text:
My first experience with Spice jet. Quick boarding helped to take off in time. However landing were delayed by 15 mts might be due to traffic on run-way. The cabin found in appropriate condition. Staff were found very helping to passengers.  

Due to economical airline, no complimentary  food or beverages served.

It has observed that number of advertisement displayed in the cabin to earn non-operating revenue. Surprisingly, Airline has not offered a small single bottle of water for such a long duration flight instead one has to purchase the same.

I am of the opinion that, at least  a small water bottle should be provided on board especially in long duration flight as passengers  are reporting to airport well in advance.

This is my first experience among all other airline that time to time announcement in cabin was helping passengers to remain updated. 

Will love to fly again with Spicejet.

title: Not Happy, Would advice reconsider.
text: Really bad service, There was no food onboard, it was not Spice jet it was some other flight. I'm really unhappy with the service, will never prefer Spice jet again.

title: Pathetic experience with spicejet
text:
My flight
Delhi to Mumbai 
Pnr SDLU2N and S6M8TI
Concern 1.
Delhi to Mumbai flight 
Delayed for 1 hour without any prior intimation.not informed even at check in counter
2 .When we were boarding flight we waited for cleaning staff to get down & airhostess was instead of welcoming the passengers at the rear gate was busy talking over accounts of number of supplies of cuppa noodles and biryanis 
3.I bought on board snack. Rs 300 for noodles and paper boat. give air hostess Rs 500 . She says she will come back with change . I forgot to ask for change later and so did she.i recollected when I was in bus. So spicejet earns Rs 200 by stealing money and not returning to its passenger. Isn't it the responsibility to mark seat number and return the change 
4.Delhi to Mumbai with same luggage I carried which I came back with,one hand bag and one laptop bag.On ward flight they weigh my hand bag and allow it .Return flight they weigh my laptop bag with it ,total was 9 kg for both.ask me to check in when I took only hand luggage ticket. So i pay Rs400 more. 
5.if you choose the web check-in you can't ... Coz the Seats are being sold . they block all the Seats as full or available for check in only at airport. Then why should one web check in. That's why long ques there on all counters all the time. When I went to counter they even offer ile or window .
6.the flight looks like an advertising commercial of metro or bus ... all the cabin is full of a commercial selling a brand .
I understand it's only about earning extra money from passengers for airlines. But will you ever recollect that at the end it's a hospitality industry
I'm going to put this review on all possible social media. Never ever fly spicejet or recommend to anyone to do that.

title: Worst airline ever
text:
Spice jet is the worst airline. They do not explicitly state that the cabin baggage is inclusive of the laptop bag and then make this as a reason to charge you a hefty amount during check in which leaves you with no option but to pay the huge sum of money to them.

Also the check in staff at Mumbai airport was really rude when confronted with the details of this rule.

Over and above this, the life jacket in the flight was removed from one of the seats. Even after repeatedly reporting it to two flight attendants, one of which was the head of the crew did not pay attention. It was left removed during the whole flight and the attendants were busy selling the snacks.

This was my last trip with spice jet.

title: Great experience
text: Overall good experience... co-operative staff and best services. Slightly costlier than Indigo airlines but not good than Jet airways. Jet airways is always recommend than Indigo airlines and Spicejet. No free food in spice jet. Good experience

title: uneventful and smooth flight
text:
no online check-in.
quite irritating with their frequent calls to upgrade, none of the airlines i flew with called me so frequently before a flight. upgrade options are emailed and if we want, we will sign up. check in at the airport was smooth. flight is alright, nothing to complaint. only two flights fly directly from dubai to pune and spice jet is one of them.

title: Tight seats
text: It was recommended at check-in that I purchase the add-on services, which I did. Unluckily the person beside me was very large and took over some of my space. The only added value was that my suitcase was one of the first ones to get on the carousel.

title: Another great find.
text:
When I was putting my holiday together, I googled where I wanted to go and it comes up with Spicejet amongst others. I had never heard of them along my travels, so was a little sceptical at first but the prices was very tempting and after a bit of researching I felt more optimistic. 
Now having taken all 3 flights I booked with them, I can honestly say I was more than happy. For a budget airline the seats were very comfortable and we upgraded to SpiceMax for which you get a meal, seats with extra legroom and your cases get priority treatment (on all three flights our cases came out first).
The flight crew were very helpful and friendly and the pilot had a great sense of humour as well (as we were just about to take off he said "I hope you enjoy your flight to Mumbai and if that's not where you want to go, that's where you're going now".
My only mistake was I didn't check the baggage allowance when I booked the tickets, so when we were checking in I had to pay a little extra, it wasn't a great fortune like certain other airlines who shall remain nameless but I do travel heavy.
If you're travelling around India they are well worth a look.

title: Costly in comparison to travel
text: A great noise . Due to noise i feel pain in my ears after completing my journey. Further the cost of the tickets is more than travel.

title: A gentle ride
text: A pleasant flight which was perfectly on time. The aircraft was clean and the ride was smooth. There was lack of info from flight deck as to how are we were going and where was aircraft passing from or overflying.

title: Above average.
text: Good for cheap price flyer. We buy premium seats 1 and 1A and food at the time of booking. They don‚Äôt offer anything free in this international flight. You have to board the flight by stair case.

title: Wrost service
text: World third class flight service by spicejet . Final moment cancelling the flight and running always late . Please avoid spicejet . Ridiculous ground staffs don't have manner how to behave with customer.

title: DO NOT USE THIS AIRLINE!!This company is rubbis!!!! Ok if you don't need to change your flight. If you do watch out!!!!!
text:
Two years in a row I needed to change my flight by two days and both times I had an absolute nightmare.

The first time it was technically my fault as I didn't check that the payment had been processed. But this is because the website is designed for people to make this mistake.

My friend later told me that you have to scroll right to the bottom of the page, a long way, and push a confirm button. He said he very nearly made the same mistake himself.

This disaster cost me 25,000 rupees as I turned up at the airport with no flight.

And when I visited a travel agency in Kolkata and told them what had happened to me they explained that they had already had two other people come in that week with the exact same scenario

The second year I changed a flight from 2/4 to 4/4. As I booked this flight through Cleartrip I could not do this on the phone for 2349 rupees administration charge. I had to travel 70 kms to the airport and pay 6000 rupees over the desk at the airport. 
After changing my flight on the phone I went onto my email and checked the itinerary and it was the new flight that I wanted. I was told to go to the airport pay the 6000 rupees and I was good to go. I was unable to print the itinerary at this time

On the way to the airport, the nextday, I stopped in an internet cafe to print out my new itinerary, which they required, and somehow the flight I now had an itinerary for was not on the 4/4 like it was the night before but 30 minutes later on the 2/4, my original date, but on a different, much longer route.

When I got to the airport I told them what happened and the fact that I had seen the correct itinerary the night before. They refused to listen to me and kept telling me that this is the flight that you have changed to. 

I kept asking them " who pays 6000 rupees to change a flight to 30 minutes on the same day??? on a longer journey???

They then said that if I wanted to change it again to the 4/4, like I did the night before!, I would now have to pay another 2349 rupees!!

So in total I had to pay 8349 rupees to change a flight by two days. The original flight only cost me 11,000 rupees. Because of this I then said "well don't worry about it, I will go on the 2/4 like originally planned" I was then told "you can't do that as we have cancelled your flight on the 2/4"  I asked them why they had cancelled my flight as I had not paid any money to change it yet??

This also fell on deaf ears!! So they basically left me in no mans land with nowhere to turn and no flight for the 11,000 rupees I had already paid!!!. By this time to book a completely new flight had gone up to 15,000 rupees.

So in the end I paid the 8349 rupees as it was the best option open to me.

After travelling 70kms back to Palolem I proceeded to sort this out with them via phone and email. They finally admitted that it was their mistake and agreed to pay me back the 2349 rupees. I said good I will pick it up at the airport the day before I fly.

"Oh no, you can't do that" was the reply. we will refund it to the debit card you used for the original booking.

I then put the case forward that "This money is not connected with the original booking.I paid you this 2349 rupees in cash over the counter so this is how I want it returned" Perfectly reasonable request I thought but oh no!!

You will get it paid back to your debit card.

I HAVE STILL NEVER RECEIVED THIS MONEY BACK!!!!!!

So be warned!!

I have never used this airline since and will never do again.

I have already had the situation, three times, where I have had to pay more to go on another airline but this is the way it will be for me from now on.

THERE IS NO WAY ON EARTH I WILL EVER GIVE THIS SCUMBAG COMPANY ANY OF MY MONEY!!!!!!

title: Guwahati to Kolkata -flight no. SG3217
text: Although it was the last flight to Kolkata from Guwahati at 10.15 pm but the flight was very much punctual and it left Guwahati at 9.50 pm i.e. before time. Will certainly recommend to others.

title: Worst on time performance among all indian flights
text:
I took 3 Spicejet flights in the last month alone because of their very economical offerings. If only I had known at that time that spending ‚Çπ800 ($10) would have given me a much better experience.

The latest flight that I took was from Mumbai to Goa. The flight was originally supposed to leave at 12:50AM and I got a message that the flight was delayed till 1:40AM, upon reaching the airport I checked in and got through security according to the new time told by the carrier. However I waited there for more than an hour, and there was no sign of boarding starting anytime soon. I asked the staff at the gate multiple times and the only response I heard was that there were some technical snags. It's already 2AM and there's no hope that the flight is gonna start boarding anytime soon.

Avoid this carrier like a plague of you can.

title: Okay!
text: Flight was okay, Cabin crew were helpful. They don't give free food, so take your food or book food at advance!

title: Get what you pay for
text:
I have used 3 budget carriers in India and this was the least value for money. The lg space was smaller than Indigo and Jet Airways and the seat pocket was hanging off on several of them meaning that the bar was lying against your legs. 

Only a short flight but if going further I would avoid them.

title: Sucks in India
text:
The flight was originally scheduled at 7.35 PM and got postponed to 9.15 PM a week before the scheduled date. And looks like they do this re-scheduling a lot. Why have so many itineraries to select from while booking if you actually cannot run those?

I called up the Customer Care and requested to change the flight to 5.40 PM which is available, just so that the risk of missing the connecting flight is less. But I was told about the policies and stuff that I have to pay the Ticket Fare + Change Penalty if I have to get it changed. 
Seriously guys!? is this what you call customer service?  The flight is re-scheduled by 15 Min less than 2 Hrs which is the minimum time interval required for the ticket to be rescheduled free of cost according to "Policy".

When you say "Sorry, we regret the inconvenience caused", at least try to make up to the customer rather than making more money out of the customer's inconvenience.

title: Decent flight for short distance travel
text: Overall a decent experience. They have a good in-flight menu and also very clean washrooms . They should add self checkin kiosks service at Bengaluru Airport.

title: Timely departure is important
text: The flight was more then a hour delayed which impacted my other day activity at Goa. The Airlines not seems to be sorry for their delay. Otherwise all other part of the flight was ok.

title: Good boring flight
text:
The airlines was clean and the service was good. The Leg space is not so bad. My flight was on time. So I am happy with the journey. 
There is no entertainment arrangement for the long rout, this need to be introduce.

title: Worst
text: Worst experience they won‚Äôt let you board if u r just 5 min late after getting boarding pass,all my money got wasted,0 performance spice jet

title: No difference between this and any other airline in India - they all are great...
text:
I could see no difference between this and any other airline in India - they all are great...
some of them want to see the VISA card used for purchasing the tickets so be weary of this when you pay for someone else - they will need to have a copy of your CC - both sides..

title: Nice economy airline
text: Well not quite a jet, but a relatively new clean Bombardier Q400 turboprop, a really nice plane. Beautiful smooth and relatively short flight to Shirdi India from Hyderabad.  Very well trained flight attendants.  Very pleased with the airline, equipment and staff.

title: Spice jet need to focus on maintenance & safety
text:
I took this afternoon flight from Goa to Chennai on 18th December 2018. 

Staff at the counter sold to me spice max at the time of checkin. I was happy to pay extra for it as it allows me extra baggage ( I did have a few kg more than the limit of 15 kg in domestic budget airlines) and also entitles priority boarding & priority baggage handling besides better seat with more legroom. 

When I boarded flight, first surprise (should I say disappointment?) was that the push back mechanism on the back rest was broken so my seat was was always leaning backwards. Captain asks you to keep the back rest straight during take off and landing. Back rest was not in control. But I was trying my best to keep my back straight most of the duration of the flight. It  is indeed a minor inconvenience for me but the concern is ‚Äúhow could they miss this as back rest is important for the passenger comfort and more important from safety perspective‚Äù. If they could ignore a seat in a row that they sell as spice max. How vulnerable area other seats to lose attention....?

This was seat 2D. I noticed on the other side seat number 3A which was also emergency exit was occupied by a young mother with an infant. I believe it‚Äôs not common to allot seats at emergency exit people with infants.

It was really surprising for me to see one of the reputed airline company like spice jet having such lapses on safety issues.

Hope this attracts the attention of this concerned. 

Thanks

title: Okay experience
text: Spicejet is okay for 1.5 hr flight. Tuticorin airport is small and only 2 airlines operate there. The flight was somehow delayed in Turicorin. When flying from Chennai, it was on time. Service was okay. Our aircraft was a small bombardier dash 8 so it was understandable on why we had to check in some of our bags.

title: very courteous staff
text: it was a night flying experience. Being a late night flight, we didn't feel cold, as temperature inside aircraft and airport were regulated. staff was very helpful and even served hot water. will fly again by this airline

title: On time travel
text: Spice Jet was efficient and on time.  The baggage limit for economy is lower than other airlines but it was not too expensive to pay for the extra weight.  It is the only airline that flies into Jaisalmer. Would recommend it.

title: Harrowing experience
text:
Spice Jet service was simply awful. Firstly, within a day of booking, Spice Jet changed flight schedule by an email. This was not owing to weather as flight was booked 3 weeks before departure date. And on the actual day of travel, Spice Jet flight was delayed by many hours.this time owing to weather and missed connections. Owing to the delay, staff at Spice Jet gave us pot noodle breakfast and then offered us lunch. The lunch provided was such poor quality that some of us refused it. All along the manner of handling passengers was poor and abrasive. We have seen delays with other flights before but the staff are usually more polite and accommodating.

The staff refused to allow waiting passengers to even go to a nearby hotel at our own expenses. We told the Spice Jet staff that they could hold onto the checked in luggage or even hand it over and we could come back and then do security and check in again when the flight finally arrives. A few of us were feeling unwell but the staff flatly refused. This was not an international flight, so the refusal seemed arbitrary. Spice Jet staff refused without any reason. Calls to the Customer Care were of no use as they said Airport's Flight Staff had the discretion. This was sheer harassment to the passengers who were forcefully made to sit in one place for 10-11 hours. Almost after 8hours of waiting, we found that flight had been cancelled. Finally, we were given some respite as we managed to fly with Indigo at 21:30 hours. 
We shall not fly with Spice Jet again.

title: Not so budgetary, last option when other budget airlines are out
text:
Claims to be a budget airline, although it costed me a hefty amount even when booked 1 month prior to journey.
Aircraft was a very small one. Very clean. Leg room okay. No complementary goodies, which are frequently given other similar airlines. Take off and landing were rough.

title: Bad Experience with SpiceJet flight
text:
Spicejet cancelled the flight and informed us just the previous night. They have not provided us any hotel, food  or travel options with other flight services. They only gave their own flight tickets. Also nobody at airport to assist the passengers.. 
Spicejet employees wearing Vistara tags.. Very confusing and not a good experience overall. Hope this helps.

title: SpiceMax Leg space is a joke
text:
Initially we booked a spice saver, however at the airport we upgraded to spice max. We were promised that the leg space is better in these seats. We were alloted seats 1E and 1F, however those seats were the worst. We could not even stretch our legs even a bit, infact normal seats - we could have stretched legs under the front seats. Also, the tray holder is fixed in the seat - so sitting space is very less too. This seat should not be categorized as SPICE MAX...there is nothing MAX about these seats infact was worse than regular seats. To think we paid more for these uncomfortable seats makes me cringe with dissatisfaction and a feeling of being cheated by the airlines.
The baggage restrictions of 15kgs is another irritant, min they should allow 20kgs.

The food was included in our ticket once we upgraded so it was ok, otherwise dont bother buying food.

We being seated in the front row had to hear a lot of banter from crew. Apparently they met an old friend or a colleague and they were constantly giggling or chatting, so i could not rest. I thought air hostess training includes speaking softly and not disturbing passengers.

Will i fly SpiceJet again - Definitely not!!

title: Very good.
text: This airline has improved a lot. Good service, time management , aircraft maintenance and honesty. They paid me back against some ticket cancellation in 2014.

title: Quick and efficient Service
text: The service was quick and efficient, best to upgrade to spice max as definitely there is more leg room and the meal is included. you can even upgrade from economy class to spice max in the plane or at the check in counter if the seats are available.

title: Never fly on this airline
text: Our flight from Kolkata to Pakyong Sikkim SG3324 was cancelled on 22 Dec 2018 due to bad weather. The airlines promised to refund the fares and refuse to arrange the passengers to other alternative flight. This is very irresponsible, especially during this festive seasons all other alternative were fully. I have traveled other airlines when there is any cancellation they will provide other alternative but not Spicejet. I swear I will never take this airlines again...(it seems Pakyong is new airport, it is not found in the box, so I put Bagdroga just to get the review through)

title: Disgraceful opportunist service
text:
travelled to Adampur from New delhi
attendent Akash was only interested in maximising charges on excess luggage
The matter dragged on to the point that we nearly missed our flight

title: Really pathetic ground staff
text: My flight was at 3:40 PM and there was a big rush at that time at the Udaipur airport. The ground staff allowed multiple lines for the same counter, creating lot of confusion and wait for the passengers. Really pathetic experience. The flight experience was good, though.

title: Terrible service
text: Tried for several hours to book a flight on this airline without success.  I had the same problem in the past.  When I did get on this airline the seats were uncomfortable and the planes old.

title: Flight on 22 December Spicejet SG 249
text: On 22 Dec the departure of sg 249 was scheduled at 2:55 which was late by 3 hours and also the service of the plane was very poor. The flight had lot of mosquitoes and spiders and as refreshments  they gave little bit.

title: Not on Time and Below Average satisfaction level
text:
Okay So I went to Bangalore from Delhi on 22nd December by Spice-jet flight SG-197 it was around 10-15 mins late but that's okay. I ordered some canned snacks on the flight but that were unavailable, When we reached Bangalore it was announced in the aircraft that luggage will be available at belt no. 6 but for surprise it came on belt no. 3, that too without making an announcement... which caused delay and frustration of 30 mins.

When returning back from Bangalore to Delhi by SG-192 on 25th, Boarding gate was changed without information, that's okay but the real blow was that amount of time we had to sit in the plane before getting airborne.. it was around 45 Mins.

title: Windows of the aircraft a total mess
text:
The staff were very courteous and friendly. Priyanka took extra care to make sure we had a comfortable flight.

The windows of the entire aircraft had scratches and scrapes as though someone had used a sharp object from the exterior to clean it. This totally hampered the view, there was a lovely sunset from the aircraft and I could not get pictures with the phone, however i had to use manual focus on my dslr and finally got the shot. Its a shame that the  Bombardier has such useless windows. I wish someone would do something about the same.

title: never on time
text: i would not recommend spicejet to anyone, unless you have no option.. pathetic service and departure was not on time..

title: Only option every morning
text: This is the only option to fly early morning, no direct flight before this. The service of this flight is not so good. It‚Äôs just ok...

title: Late flight
text:
Flight had arrived late in Goa . It was supposed to take off @ 1:30 but took off around 2. 
Arrival in Mum was at 3pm maybe coz of congestion at Mumbai airport.

Meals were served on time with good options.

Served water before flight started. Good young crew .

Flight cost was INR 6K one way.

title: Good on time flight
text:
This flight was on time. People with corporate meal got a decent precooked food/Sandwich.

Per ticket cost was INR 6K one way.. a bit more expensive due to peak season.

Crew was new and efficient. It was on time by and large . They inflate the arrival time by at least 45mins so their on time performance improves but either ways it wasn't bad.

title: Terrible experience at check in
text: The staff is so focused on selling the early check in ticket, that they will inentionally get the check in que as long as possible. They even started selling those tickets at normal check in counters also. I was with a toddler and my parents, senior citizen, and requested them to get my check in early as my daughter started crying. They said that i could ho only if i paid AED 160. Pathetic service. This is the first time i encountered this while travelling with a baby. Unprofessional staff.

title: Irresponsible careless airlines and not at all supportive
text: Damaged my new bag and they are even not paying compensation for it. They don't care about their customers or their requirements and damages. One should not fly with SpiceJet if concerned about luggage. Irresponsible and not at all supporting airlines

title: Budget Airline - better fly with spice max option
text:
Finally we have a good competition for regular airlines. Spice jet has a good option from Hong Kong to Delhi.
Pros- 
- cheap price
- spice max, good add on 

Cons-
- arrival terminal @ delhi, was conjugated and flight got delayed by 30mins
- regular seats are pain for long journey so do opt for spice max

title: Bad Service
text: I was returning from after attending an international conference on concrete organised by India chapter of American Concrete Institute at The St.Regis,Mumbai when I encountered this airlines service..no food/tea/coffee/drinks.The experience during my onward journey to Mumbai was most frightful..I had  my flight at 7.55AM & my check-in time at airport was 7.25AM..still I was refrained from taking the flight.I was asked to cough up an addition Rs.16000 by SpiceJet authorities for their next flight to Mumbai which was at 6PM.

title: Spice Delay jet
text: Had to cancel meeting and completely rescheduled because of Flight delay at Bangalore Airport during my Business visit to Ahemedabad.

title: considering the low price, good service
text: we flew from varanasi to jaipur with no hassle and on time flight. the price was also very competitive, although booked 5days before the flight. will use them again

title: Budget Airline
text: A low-cost carrier . Simply put, you get what you pay for. Spend the additional rupees for priority baggage claim.Spice Jet has got the message and is improving their services on each passing day

title: You get what you pay for
text: A low-cost carrier with a-la-carte service. Simply put, you get what you pay for. Spend the additional rupees for priority baggage claim--it will save you time.

title: Excellent Food Options specially comes hot preparation than ready to cook in competitive airlines
text: Good food, on time service. Thats the good part of Spice Jet. Rest may be can have better options for Healthy Drinks in inflight menu

title: A Good Budget Airline
text: I think Spice Jet has got the message and is improving their services on each passing day. The Staff are more attentive and courteous now,The Check in was very fast as Pondicherry is a Small Airport. Boarding was very fast. The Inflight attenders were good. Thew Flight was punctual . All in all apleasant experience.

title: Worst flight experience ever
text: Spicejet is the worst flight. Do not book this flight ever. They destroy valuable luggage, charge a huge amount of money for little extra luggage and don't take care of it. They don't reply to feedback or complaints either. The staff is the most rude staff I've ever met.

title: Average service
text: I had upgraded and paid extra for extra leg room, class etc. Despite it they did not give me anything to eat or drink which was offered to other passengers seating next to me. Leg room and seats were good/comfortable. On ground staff was friendly and efficient. On flight staff was average.

title: Friendly staff and reasonable service
text: Staff on ground was friendly both on ground and on flight. They did not offer any food or drinks. Chareged for anything you ordered to eat or drink. Seats were okay and limited leg room

title: Time has come to SpiceJet to make crucial decision
text:
The spicejet operating quite long from Indian subcontinent has to revive it's market urgently by taking serious decisions. Surviving with it's strong competition with the same trend and service may push back the success of this airline soon. During my recent travel and booking experience with this airline I found it as a most inconvoenent aircraft for the present days of travel.  They can enhance the cabin cleanliness and comfort by really changing the seats at least immediately for spicemax. With a bit more bigger seats. The sales team has to gear up more in improving the sales by a more systematic follow up and interest. I received a call for upgading offer to my 12 seats onwards but they failed to call me for the return trip I booked. Otherwise I would ve upgraded my return trip too. Small things like these only give impact of their quality on customers minds. The interior resembles like the old Indian airline flights and not spicy. But the cabin crew is ok and as part with it's nearest competitor.
Do something extra to retain your market share. Do something big to improve your market.

title: Hopeless Airlines
text: Spicejet claims having record of Ontime but I had bitter experience not once but twice. The recent one has costed me huge amount for the delay by Spicejet aircraft . The SG 1057 has been late by morethan 2 hrs , it reached Hyderabad from Vizag at 640 instead of 430, due to which I missed my international carrier. The response from Spicejet, the airport operators ,i.eGMR has been very disappointing.

title: Not allowed to board the flight stating flight was full
text:
I had my ticket and was not allowed to board telling I was late.
The lady in the SpiceJet counter of Hyderabad airport was talking as if she owns the company
Very bad experience

title: Good Flight
text: It was right on time, very smooth process. Very good experience. The inflight food options were quite good.

title: Average flight experience with SpiceJet
text: Well, I had read plethora of negative reviews about SpiceJet and I was frightened before flying, it was an average journey experience with them. I know, they do not treat their customers like Vistara Airlines, especially groundcrew. During the journey, we felt huge shock before 30 minutes of landing and everyone on flight got scared. I experienced this thing very first time. Moreover, cabin seemed quite old as compare to other airlines.

title: Less experienced staff
text: The crew on board were girls with less competence to handle the customers on board .this flight always remains full the either increase manpower or increase competency.request for buying food came half an hour before landing when the captain had already announced of boarding!

title: Good Flight
text: I took a round trip from Bangalore to Pondicherry- One of the new destinations introduced by SpiceJet. The Flight service has improved since I last travelled in this airline and also on Time Performance.The Flight though short was smooth and Flight Atendants pleasing. Overall apleasant Experience.

title: Worst airlines
text: Spicejet has become one of the worst airlines in Indian aviation history ever. There is no professionalism in this group. Staff at delhi airport is extremely rude and unprofessional especially when you are arriving. There handling of luggage is extremely poor and besides this even after several mails & complaints they don‚Äôt bother to reply to customer, & when they r pressurised to be answerable they have no answer. Punctuality is highly missing in this airlines. If u have connecting flight or ur punctual regarding timing don‚Äôt opt for Spicejet. Above all if u are travelling with FAMILY AND KIDS PLEASE DONT BOARD SPICEJET.

title: Worst Service ever seen
text:
I travelled with my 4 friends from Bangkok to Ahmedabad today (21st Dec) in SG86, we had prebooked our seats and prebooked veg sandwich & paid for it but at Bangkok Airport, we upgraded ourself to SpiceMax, the night mare. We were given Dry Face Wipe telling it as Hot n Wet Face Wipe, were denied bringing other, were not served Hot Meal for which we were entitled and were informed that only 1 hot meal is available that too on payment basis and no coca cola or any other soda beverage is in stock. We were served veg sandwich for which we pre booked and had paid but were given only partial benefit of SpiceMax promised Food

The flight attendant was the most rude lady we had ever seen

Spicejet needs to improve its services

title: Good flight
text: The flight was good CERTAINLY on time. But something could be done for in-flight entertainment. All in all good low cost flight. Onwards crew was okay but return was really good.

title: Low cost punctual airline with good staff
text: I took a round trip weekend from Bangalore to Mangalore with a Bombardier Q400 aircraft. The check-in, boarding and in-flight service was of a very good standard. I used a carry-on baggage ticket both ways but the airline proposed  additional checked-in bagage at a nominal cost.

title: Okay
text: It is a budget airline company and it was the cheepest when I bought the ticket between all India and Sri Lanka. The only good thing about that company was its cheap tickets.

title: Great flight!
text: We flew from Jaipur to Varanasi on 11/12/18. The flight was on time, and the help we received in the airport (we are not Indian, so they took pity on us as we were very confused with the luggage scanning), was first class. I read the reviews on here before we flew and I was a bit concerned. I needn't have been. SpiceJet made some of our English carriers look second rate! And the plane was spotless, and the cabin crew were outstanding. I will use SpiceJet again in future no doubt!

title: Bad experience while checking in
text: Worst things first. It took more than an hour in the queue at BKK airport to check in. Even though I had a spicemax ticket I went in the queue to accompany my other friends. The boarding process was also the same. Inflight service was good and the food (to be purchased) was good. Flight was clean. As usual the regular seats were cramped. Overall not a great experience.

title: Budget Airline.
text: A simple economy airline which transports you from point A to B. Nothing to complain and nothing to praise. Just does the job.

title: A good no frills attached experience
text: It was a good experience no much frills nothing worth a mention nothing bad and neither anything that made me wonder. Only thing worth a mention in the hindsight is the considerable sound of the engine which was annoying after a while.

title: Budget airline
text: On time flight. but conversion rate in droller while purchasing ticket is high. So the fare is not what it shows if you are paying by credit card.

title: it is not an international airline
text:
This was the first time I used the Spice Jet for international travel. It was pathetic and no where they stand as International airline. 
1. seats- No space, uncomfortable. U cant push them back. 
2. Meal- Not provided. 
3. Water- U have to ask many times. 
4. In flight entertainment- Nothing is available
5. Staff- Pathetic, having lot of attitude. Poor service. Not ready to work, Lazy. 

I think they should learn from other low cost airlines in terms of customer services , staff behavior and professionalism.

Will I travel again - No way.

title: Never fly Chennai Colombo
text:
Spicejet is the last option for anyone flying from Chennai to Colombo. The staff allow most passengers to carry huge bags and boxes as carry on baggage, probably weighing much more than the limit of 7kg. It is a very unpleasant inconvenience for the passengers who abide by the baggage rules and wish to have a peaceful flight leaving at midnight.
It could be a budget airline, but couldn't they at least offer a cop of water?
Also why do they charge an additional fee for online check-in?

title: Excellent low cost airline
text: Ontime, clean, nice and friendly staff.  Budget airline but ontime and good flight.  Lucky we reserved front second ro seat, so cannot go wrong with that.  It worth the price.

title: SMOOTH TAKE-OFF, GOOD SERVICE IN CABIN, PURCHASE OF PRIORITY SEATS DID NOT SERVE PURPOSE
text:
We were not able to web check-in as we had availed a Senior Citizen discount, which is classified as a special service.
The attending counter staff member, Ms Himanshi, while being very courteous, helpful, and polite was also very persuasive as a sales person.She convinced us to purchase 2 priority seats in row 1 by paying an extra amount of  Rs. 1000/- .
However we have the following issues :

1. The mechanism did not work; we could not recline the seats and, therefore, were not as comfortable as was expected.

2. Overhead racks in row 1 cannot be used by passengers as they are occupied on either side by demo and first aid kits respectively. Space in those for rows 2 and 3 and 5 to 9  was not available when we boarded. We had to manage to store one each of our 2 bags in racks of rows 4 and 10. We should have disembarked before passengers in row 2 to the last row, but we had to wait till all passengers had left before we could retrieve our bags. 

3.  There is no space for passengers in row 1 to store computer / ladies bag below the seats in front because there are none. A hostess took our small items to store in miscellaneous spaces in other rows. They were also retrieved at the time of deplaning.

The purpose of buying seats in row 1 was not served !

title: flt crew not friendly
text: flt crew not friendly. served half food on the menu. after query, she given me juice. not at all attentive. very busy between them.

title: Whiff of positive change
text: The flight was punctual - both departure and arrival. The food was hot and tasty. Ticket cost was much lesser than competition. Comfortable flight.  All these were my earlier issues with spicejet. They seem to  be getting addressed.

title: Travel by SpiceJet
text: Travel by SpiceJet is comfortable and in proper time. Food quality in flight is good. Air hostesses are nice.

title: Unhygenic and dirty flight
text:
Once I realised what it was I couldn't seat comfortably. It was blood nose mucas on the tray table.
Don't these people clean the flight nicely, how could they have missed out such dirty tray table. Often if you open the tray table, it is dirty with remains of food on the table.
But this problem is not alone with Spicejet but other airlines too

title: Pathetic service
text:
Hi,

The SG 456 flight from Banglore to Mumbai was delayed by 4.30 mins 
For the journey Of 1.45 mins flight was delayed by 4.30 mins .
As we were travelling with our 5 year old it‚Äôs was so hectic. 
From the start we did our web check in and got the seats they made us upgrade and make us pay 2000/- rs ,we have booked meal earlier but they said it‚Äôs not there and made us pay for that as well.
My other relatives boarded with Jet they reached their home and we were still there .

The pathetic part was they didn‚Äôt informed the timing anyone till the boarding there was no communication from their side . 

All the customers were yelling at the gate . 

Pathetic 
Not recommended.

title: One boarding gate for 2 flights in Chennai
text: They have small bombardier dash4/dash8 flights for most of the routes. Since the number of passengers are less, they would be alloted only a single gate for 2 flights in Chennai airport sometimes. I almost missed the flight because its written that its boarding for Mumbai flight and relaxed thinking that Hyderabad flight is not ready. But Spricejet were doing simultaneous boarding, this would be confusing for passengers too. Last minute I came to know and boarded the flight. One of my friends boarded the wrong flight because of this simultaneous boarding. Spice staff saw that in last moment and deboarded him, but his actual flight left by that time. So be careful and take extra caution while flying this airline.

title: SpiceMax option by SpiceJet is good
text: Opted for SpiceMax on my SpiceJet flight from Delhi to Mumbai. As promised, I was given priority check-in and boarding and my bags were delivered first after landing. The best part, for me though, was the extra legroom in the dedicated SpiceMax seats. Being tall, I am usually cramped for space on budget flights. So, it was so relaxing to have all that extra space. The complimentary hot meal and beverage were delicious and surpassed my expectations. All in all, a good offering, especially given the price.

title: Spicejet - mild taste
text: Spicejet flights are functional, not full service carriers. But a lot better then other LCC. The flight that I took was with an old aircraft. Not that very clean. Dont expect any newspapers. If you have ordered for snacks, beverages you will be served. Crew is okay.

title: Horror of a Flight
text: There‚Äôs absolutely no system in place for boarding and queuing. We took the 3:30 AM flight from Dubai to Jaipur and it took over one hour for the passengers to board. The seats are really small. No accommodations were made for families with small children. I‚Äôll never fly with them again.

title: Great experience
text: Was a great flight with great service and a well maintained aircraft. Was my first time on SpiceJet and it was a pleasurable experience. I would gladly recommend this airline.

title: Flight delayed more than two hours, no SMS or call alert
text: Flight delayed by more than two hours. Based on their SMS, I reached 3 hours early at airport, so waited for more than 5 hours. SMS about flight delay was received just 30 minutes before departure. If airline could have sent flight delay message early, I could have utilized the time in other productivity activity instead of waiting at airport. Even when we were waiting, there were no updates by ground staff, no one was at boarding gate till last minute.

title: Great Flight..
text: Excellent flight it was a brand new aeroplane with the wonderful in-flight air-hostesses who gave great service..

title: Awful airline with the WORST.CUSTOMER.SERVICE.EVER
text: I booked a flight from Pondicherry to Mumbai, with a layover in Bangalore. An hour before the flight, they canceled it claiming the bad weather was causing visibility issues and the plane could not take off. Except there was no bad weather. We were then told to drive 3 hours to Chennai and book a new flight to Bengalaru and that they would NOT pay for the ride as the bad weather was not caused by the airline. What the hell?!?! At the very least, they could have delayed the flight or gotten a better plane to fly us. Or at least PAY for the drive! I've never heard of such bad customer service before and the staff dealing with this were cold and uncaring. I have never experienced such bad service or treatment before. My guess is, they were in cahoots with the drivers and probably got a cut of the money we paid to get out of Pondicherry. WILL.NEVER.FLY.WITH.THEM.AGAIN. I ended up driving to Bangalore instead to catch a later flight home and spent more money that I should have. There are budget airlines and then there is SpiceJet. AVOID.THEM. If I could give them a 0, I would. One is too generous.

title: Review for airline.
text: It was nice. The staff was courteous. Cleanlimess was maintained as well. Would love to travel again.

title: On time
text: Flight timing are suitable for travelling to Kerala -Cochin  from Pune. Weekend holidays can be planed

title: Like all low cost airlines
text:
Pretty good aircraft. Nowadays one can expect a delay in departure as routine. Such is the case with practically all airlines, rarely do you have a on time departure. 
When doing a web check in, only the seats in the centre will be available free of cost. All other seats are sold. Instead if one reaches the check in desk early you stand a good chance to get better seats at no extra cost
The staff is courteous and helpful. Seats are tight to accommodate more travellers. So low leg space. Food services are paid but expensive.

title: Mumbai to Jaisalmer
text:
It was a good experience. 
From Mumbai to Jaisalmer, the flight was on time.
Although, from Jaisalmer to Mumbai it was delayed by 1.5hr.

The leg space is compact.

title: Service
text: It Has been good traveling with spicejet courteous staff and helpful, flight arrived on time and would love traveling agian

title: Worst Airline ever
text:
I had the worst experience ever.. i am travelling to delhi from kolkata from spicejet..SG130 at 7.50 am today on 23rd august itself..
PNR B6Y5YF

i am travelling with my grandfather who is 86 years old.. first of all i waited in the queue of checkin for 20mins , i requested can we proceed first but no one listened..

Secondly togther our luggage was 32.5kgs which is 1 kg each extra.. and the girl at the counter at kolkata airport her name is Aparajita never listened or considered even once even after requesting so much.. ive travelled in other airlines indigo, air india and i have always been given 1 kg consideration which is quite fair..1 kg margin..
i requested i understand the rules and i am ready to pay just waiver off a lil but she was rude, arrogant and blunt and said pay and pls leave mam..
i ended up paying 1200 rs.. 
I had checked the weight at my home and it was exact 15 kgs..1 kg error can happen from machine to machine.. is it fair to be rigid.. i agree rules are rules but a minior can be considered..

I had asked for 2 seats togther she said pay and get it else seperate seats.. i asked her pls make it fast he has been standing since long she said who asked him to come here he should have sat down..what the hell.. is this a way to talk to a customer..i am nevr gonna travel with spicejet ever again in my life.. worst experience travelling with spicejet in my life..not a single consideration given..
Is this how you treat your customer ??
Pls explain.

My husband and my father in law is a frequent traveller to delhi.. if nothing ill make sure my friends and family dont travel via spicejet..

pls do not travel via spicejet ever... worst customer service..

title: Delay of flights
text: I traveled twice in SpiceJet. Flights got so delayed in both flights. I also heard that most of the flights of SpiceJet get delayed.

title: Average = Compact Flight
text: The Plane was very Small and so as the seats and it was very compact. The comfort was pathetic.It was looking like plastic chairs has been put in the plane, it has very less cushion so feels hard chair. Great Value for money, they offer the cheapest flights to Dubai, Sharjah etc. Food was an average quality and menu options. The Flight Crew were good and helpful. SMALL COMPACT okay for Cheap and Short Distance.

title: flight to Hyderabad from Bangalore
text: Not a great experience in this flight, check in is very slow, always some issues, seats are cramped, not much of leg space

title: Good, timely and professional crew !!
text:
Airline is the 4 seaters plane, guess Bombardier is what it's called with two rotary fans.

Airline is good and timely, hassle free check in and out , with no issues with any stage of the services.

Had just challenge with claiming miles because customer care couldnt follow my email, still couldnt comprehend.

title: With no reason they delay the scheduled flights
text: With no reason they delay the scheduled flights. In my case it was 3 hour delayed and person on the desk everytime increased departure time by 10 minutes.

title: Chennai Hyderabad
text: BOMBARDIER  flight had a delayed take off, the cabin noise was high and the aircraft looked old,  Seating was not comfortable

title: Not Good Experience
text: Flight was untidy, seats were uncomfortable. Although the flight was in time but was not a good experience.

title: Worst Ground Staff and Customer Handling
text:
I had a very bad experience while flying this Airline. While going from Hyderabad to Guwahati, I paid extra for maxi seat and was allotted 1A,1B and 1 C seats for 3 of us. While 1D, 1E and 1 F which were better seats were not allotted to us by the Airline as they claimed the seats were already booked. When we entered the Aircraft, the seats we requested were empty and no one was sitting in the seats. Later a lady from row 2 was asked to move forward and as we already settled down in the Aircraft, could not stake any claim.

On our return, we did again ask for the same seats row 1 D, E and F  as we were not at all comfortable with the bulkhead seats in our flight from Hyderabad. The online staff claimed that the seats were already allotted and we had no choice to request the staff to change to row 2 of the aircraft as recommended by the Airline staff online.

The flight was from Hyderabad to Jaipur and from Jaipur to Hyderabad. From North East India to North West India to south ( What a stupid route) When we entered the Aircraft, this Aircraft was a different configuration and actually the seats which we were allotted before changing to row 2 were the best and Exit Row seats with Ample Leg Space.

None of the ground staff or the online staff had any clue of Aircraft configuration. We had a grueling 6.30 hours of flight to reach Hyderabad from Guwahati via Jaipur though we paid for Maxi Seats with ample leg space. Worst experience

title: Delhi to Jammu Spicejet Flight
text: It is good flight and very less time taken, overall experience was good. Staff is very cooperative..

title: The another option
text:
There are only 2 direct flights to Ahmedabad from Chennai and SpiceJet is one of them.
I would say it's better than Goair for sure.

title: Baggage lock broken
text: I traveled with my family from Delhi to chennai on 12 Dec 18. At the time of check-in everything was intact but on arrival at home we found that the lock of baggage was broken and missing,also its chain was damaged. we got terrible experience on our first meeting with SPICEJET

title: Spicemax
text: If you need leg room in this low cost airline flight of approximately 2hrs and 45 minutes duration, select the Spicemax service at an additional cost. The service offers priority check in, free meals and that additional leg room in an otherwise cramped seating.

title: Cheap fare , good experience
text: It was my first trip with Spicejet. I had read many negative reviews about them online. But the overall journey was smooth and was on time.

title: Worst service
text:
Spicejet staff worst in Chennai.i have opted wheel chair for my father,they didn't provide even after multiple requests
,.................................................................................................

........

title: Courteous and Pleasant Team.
text: Had a very pleasant experience during my recent flight on Spice Jet. Very courteous staff. At the check in I must appreciate Mr.Edwin, who was very helpful.

title: Excellent experience.
text: Flew from Mumbai to Kochi in Spicejet new Boeing 737 max. Was a good experience. Though we took off a little later than the scheduled time, landing was exactly on the proposed time. Good hospitality and very good looking flight.

title: Budget airline
text:
Fast checkin. Security check took a very long time. Airport recently renovated, more coffee options! Finally a bookstore too.
Flight on time. Effective boarding. 
Luggage in Bangalore took a life time but it was a busy time in terms of: number of planes landed, Diwali ,extra luggage etc.

title: Try it...you won't regret
text: On time, polite staff, clean aircraft, good lighting, courteous stewardship, can rely and try once  to feel it yourself.

title: Economy Airline
text: Spice jet being a flight which is famous for reaching on or before time is a real economy flight which exorbitant prices. We travelled this week in a flight and it was a comfortable journey.  The planes are without any entertainment option. We paid almost 2200 per person for a return flight and it seemed alot to pay as we had no additional services included in terms of meals or priority services.

title: Surprisingly Good; Arguably Better Than Indigo
text:
Like many others, Spicejet is not my default option; more often it is Indigo and sometimes Vistara (if it flies on that route). My wife and I flew Spicejet to Kochi and back in early December 2018, after several years. We were taken aback by the experience which was (in almost all aspects) extremely pleasurable. We had booked ourselves on Spicemax for which there is a separate check-in counter, free meals and priority baggage clearance. But what impressed us most was the professionalism of the staff, especially the cabin crew who were outstanding. The presentation of the shopping catalogue and the on-board dining menu are superb, and the items offered on each are good too. Most importantly, the flights to and fro were bang on time. 

The only disappointment was the weighing scale at Kochi which I thought was suspect but I have no proof. Secondly, our baggage was the last to arrive when we landed at Delhi. I was refunded Rs 100 after I submitted an online complaint, and while it is a paltry sum considering two of us were affected it was nevertheless a welcome gesture.

I will now seriously consider Spicejet ahead of Indigo, whose arbitrariness and money-minded approach has put me off. I recommend others consider Spicejet too.

title: VERY UNPROFESSIONAL STAFF
text: We bookeed a flight from dubai to pune on 17th dec 2018. Let me inform you since beginnings. As we went at the check in counter staff was not at all presentable she was in her own world. Fine later all documents were provided as per requirement. My wife is expecting and is on 25 week and as per the law we presented her the fit to fly certificate. Later there was twist, My wife received a call at lounge counter from spicejet check in counter asking to send them the credit card copy from which the booking was done. Whereas spice jet should be aware that asking credit card copy is illegal and customer has rights not to share the details to any unknown person and on top of that spicejet is informing my wife she cannot fly if she will not send the copy of credit card. Let me inform you (spice jet) this procedure should have been done at the time of check in which you people should verify the card as per the uae bank law. If you people cannot even do your job properly than y should we suffer for the same. I think you people should be given training to all staff and then send them to perform. Very unprofessional behaviour...it's our bad luck that there is no other flight going to pune directly from Dubai otherwise we traveling in spicejet neverrrrr very pathetic service and flight.

title: Spice Jet Flight SG 8481
text: Nice Air hostesses , Flights are mostly late so they will allow you some extra luggage. Seat are comfortable.

title: Worst service
text: It‚Äôs one of the worst flight in the world. In patna ground floor staff doesn‚Äôt have manners. They don‚Äôt know how to speak with customers. Kindly check who was on duty ( 16 dec 3.53 pm). Specially on boarding counter.

title: Very Cold Hospitality. Certainly Not Red, Hot, Spicy as they Claim
text: I flew SpiceJet to Bagdogra, for a holiday in the Darjeeling Hills. I chose their late morning service because the other airlines flying were all arriving in the late afternoon. I had planned to land by noon and be up in the hills as early as I could. When we arrived at the airport, the check - in staff told us the flight would be rerouted through SIlchar (IXS) for "operational reasons". We were told to expect arriving in Bagdogra by 1.40 PM. However, when the flight was rerouted to Silchar, we found out what they meant by operational reasons. They were just trying to drop off three engineers to fix up another SpiceJet Q400 lying there, which was possibly in need of repair. The wait was long, and passengers protested, while the ladies in the cabin crew put up a nice play of tears and helplessness. The captain came out of the cockpit to warn us of being handed over to the CISF Security Force. After all the pandemonium, the flight landed in Bagdogra at 4.30PM, a delay of 4 hours. We wrote emails and tweets to SpiceJet, but they responded by offering us 1000 INR vouchers per passenger instead of giving a refund, as we wanted. Morover, they seem to have added my email (which I used for the complaint) to their mailing list, and keep sending me lots of offers. I have flown SpiceJet in the past, and the experience has been good, but I didn't like this particular journey.

title: One of the best flights between Dubai - Ahmedabad, if schedules are followed
text:
