Requesting management of Spicejet to look at the historical data of the flight between Ahmedabad  and Dubai & reschedule timings. They can this flight as one of the best one between two cities.

My review is based on spicemax booking.

title: Flight from Ahmedabad to Chennai on the 26th November , SG 925 Dep: 19.30 hrs
text:
Though flight was delayed by 30 mts ,it was well informed by SMS  at noon itself on the estimated delay .So,communication was good . Airline staff both at the check in counter and On board were courteous .
Luggage delivery at Chennai was delayed by 15 to 25 minutes...May be the logistics agency at Chennai airport are not efficient .
We ordered for Sandwich in advance ONLINE . But, there is no priority for First serve and deliver it only when they come to our row . Otherwise the Journey was good

title: Worst Airline
text: Worst customer service, never got to fly, my name was misspell.. they refuse to let me enter the airport.. numerous times emailed customer service... they refuse to assist.. never fly on this airline.. the worst of the worst..I was a NRI in India..this is the way I got treated...

title: Poor Service
text: I am flying from Kolkata to Bangalore on 15th at 0900hrs. I called up customer care of spice jet saying that i wont be able to make it so help me for rescheduling on comp basis. I had a talk with Mr. Navneet. Instead of helping me he was like not interested and he simply said no for the rescheduling and told me to get a new one.

title: Spice jet sucks ! Really how can anyone run such a shabby airline?
text: I have down spice jet a few time and everyone time I vow not to fly again with them. The check in in Mumbai is a serious problem and the staff is clueless on how to mange the traffic of checking in pax. Everyone is trying to upsell and don‚Äôt care about anything. On board, the food is absolutely Tweeiblw and I am not even sure who they cater from. On return, were1.2 KG above the 15 KG limit with no hand bag, except my laptop bags and yet the lady in Delhi insisted that either I reduce the weight or pay! How crappy of that? I travel around the world for a living and I can tell you, spice Jet is the worst airline in the world ! Never again. Also expedited staff apathy on my recent Tirumala flight, so I believe it is the lack of customer orientation and empathy that is at play! Someone at the airline needs to take notice and do something about it. Oh not to forget, the airline sent me a feebaback post the flight and provided my feedback and it has been 3 weeks and I am yet to get an acknowledgement and response! Proves another point of lack of responsiveness and willliness to listen to customers ! Will never recommend them to anyone !all the best to Spiec Jet in their endeavor to work towards becoming t he worst airlines in indian !

title: Over all very good Experience for Spice jet
text:
Crew members are very good in nature and communication and well care taker.
Every time i used to fly getting some awesome light food from spice jet depend on availability

title: Pathetic condition of seats
text: The interior looked very ordinary. Worst were the seats. They were shabby and looked worse than rural bus seats, all torn and the stuffing showing out. (picture attached). When pointed that to the hostess she did not even bother to apologize! When we spend money the least we expect is a decent aircraft.

title: Airline for low earning class.
text: Just a local Bus type facility, food is very expensive and tasteless. Airline staff is rude and disrespectful.

title: Worst airline...do not buy spicemax
text:
I am a regular international traveler......but this was the worst experience of all.

I had purchased Spicemax....which gives priority for boarding, additional luggage..etc..and still I had to go through this.

At boarding...staff was weighing luggage of every passenger. I can understand, they want to check if any passenger is carrying extra weight than the limit.
I went through that, went to the gate below, where bus was standing to take passengers to the flight.
Again here, staff was weighing luggage and with additional drama.
in 2 minutes, why do they need to weigh again and again.
For me, they didn't weigh, but told me that aircraft is full and does not have space in cabin for anymore luggage. I got agreed and left my luggage with them. 
Then I heard conversations staff was doing with other passengers.
One passenger was told, he is carrying additional luggage (already luggage WT was checked upstairs...and it was okay there)
Another one was told, you are carrying 3 bags, whereas he had paid for his extra luggage and he was showing the recipes of the same.
Another lady and her daughter was told  they are carrying 2 bags....so one should be left here.

WHAT is all this?? what for????
Worst! Worst!!

Amazing was bus went before us had all passengers with at least one bag per person.

Surely, I am NOT travelling with spicejet again.
Do not buy Spicemax.....my to and fro both journey they didn't give me extra leg space....with reason that there is a change in the aircraft.

International flight and this behavior by the airline...shame

title: A mixed bag feedback
text:
Feedback as follows

SG 516 - 10th Dec 2018 - Pune to Goa

Flight delayed by 1 hour. However, the SpiceJet ground crew did not have the courtesy to announce what caused the delay. Had to walk to the SpiceJet team member to ask and it was informed that due to foggy conditions in Bangalore, the flight was delayed.

Happy to see the staff greeting passengers with a SMILE as we boarded the plane.

Inspite of a short flight all cold beverages were not available inspite of being on the menu which was paperboat 

Last but not the least Capt Diljeet, Sir your flying experience says it all. Takeoffs have always been smooth across the multiple trips I have had, however the landing was such as it were a piece of cake. Well done on the same.

title: On flight experience not worth addressing
text:
Feedback as follows

SG 517 - 7th Dec 2918 - Goa to Pune @ 14:00 

On boarding the flight staff was too busy chatting among themselves and giggling - group of 3 girls.
Didn‚Äôt seem interested in greeting the incoming guests all.

Pilot and supporting crew seemed new, extremely hard and uncomfortable landing. Luckily seat belts were on, else all passengers would have been off their seats.

title: Coming up very fast
text: Spicejet is really improving it's standard & operating in a very satisfactory standard. Previously we used to avoid this airlines for it's unprofessional attitude. Now, what a change. No wonder' Spicejet has become No.1 airlines last year (2017).

title: Great Service and Assistants on internal flight Delhi to Goa
text: Great Service on this flight and indeed during booking in.  Decided to upgrade for an additional 10,000 IR and it was well worth it.  Got an Exit seat and a choice of sandwiches or snacks with a drink included.  Served water also even though the flight was only just over two hours.  The staff were incredibly turned out and very polite and obliging - given the attitude of some of the passengers they deserve a medal!

title: Stunning air hostesses
text:
This an Indian budget airline and as such the timings of both departure and arrival are hit and miss but in it's favour are the most beauiful air hostesses I've come across in a very long time.
It's worth the hit and miss ETD & ETA times just to gaze upon these stunning beauties.
Every one I've seen have been stunning beautiful girls.

title: Morning delay that costed me the entire day
text:
Imagine waking up at 6 in the morning to get ready to reach airport at 0730hrs  for catching a 0845hrs  flight. And then, the airlines shamelessly postponing flight for 15 minutes, five times in a row.

We flew around 1010hrs.A complete waste of 90 minutes!!!!!

And before that, the check in guy informed me that only middle seats are available. And of course, the web check in offered aisle or window seats with a CONVENIENCE CHARGE!!!

VERY POOR EXPERIENCE.

title: Horrible  Experience de
text:
What a pathetic experience it was. We have booked Spicejet first time while flying to Bangkok. But it was our biggest mistake i think. The flight got late 3 hours. above that the plane was so old ,the seats were so congested and seat cover were not in a good condition. And it hardly look a international flight. We surely will not be booking Spicejet again . and recommend others to book others flight in stead of this as this will ruined your journey .

title: Easy Miles with Beautiful Smiles
text: The excellent service you could never ask for, value for money! Specially, two cabin crew members (Sammu &Aka Andhra) are very helpfull and friendly. I wish those natural smiles, all the best for their rest of miles.

title: PSHHHHHHHHHHHHH
text: Dumbest airline ever. I am a kid so I was put under unattended minor. The person at the desk made me sat on a chair for 30 minutes and gave an awkward look and I didn't do anything being the good boy I was. Then another lady took me to the gate and ditched me like literally, I have never seen this act before[ Not mentioning that I'm an unattended minor. Then the air hostesses were in their own world and were never caring. When I landed they just kicked us off the plane like literally and I just ran for my dear life again I was never found after that boarding a SpiceJet flight. Trust me dont fly SpiceJet. Instead go to GoAir or Air India They are waayayaayay better

title: Overall good experience
text: It's a good flight and clean. The maintenance is not so good as it was an old flight when we were returning from Cochin to Mumbai. The dining thing was broken but they don't care as they don't serve you free food. Still it's a value for money so recommend as we didn't had any bad experience.

title: Good flight and on time departure and arrival
text: A good flight and good food.   As you take flights at odd hours, it always helps to carry Avomine tablets and take one before Flight or Bus journey to help avoid travel sickness.

title: Decent veg dinner
text:
Flew the Spicejet airlines to Ahmedabad from Delhi in Economy class.

Seats were ok but seat belts are a little too less for a person of more size.

Dinner served was good. Veg fried rice with chilly paneer. Appetizer of tangy pasta and dessert was dhodha.

Beverage was various juices, tea and coffee.

Service was a tad slow for my liking.

Flight was half an hour late.

Smooth landing and take off. Overall a better experience than my previous Goa trip.

title: Very Bad Experience
text: Delay in flights is one thing, but the approach of airlines towards compensation for its passengers' loss of time and its ground staff's impossible position in facing angry customers is beyond redemption... We were lucky that our flight was late by just two hours. However the SpiceJet flight to Calcutta was late by a whopping 7 to 8 hours... And we could only empathize with those passengers and their outrage... Then there was a SpiceJet flight to Pune which was late... So the passengers of all these three flights were simply stranded at the airport and were given zero compensation in terms of either airfare or food / drinks... The ground staff said they have arranged food but when we went to the food counter, the promised options were unavailable. This has been the worst domestic flight experience I have ever had in my traveling life... I hope SpiceJet understands the importance of passengers' time...

title: Horrifiying experience
text: The horrifying night was 13/11/18. Our children's were strolled whole night on the airport. The flight of 2;05am was announced delayed at 1:45am when all were at the boarding gate. At rescheduled 6:30am time they announced it is cancelled. No staff to help and advise from which belt to collect luggage. No water, food, accommodation was made available. Passengers were left on their won.

title: Nice Journey from Vizag To Hyderabad
text: I travelled from Visakhapatnam to Hyderabad and it has been a nice journey. The flight is a bit late departing from Visakhapatnam but it reached Hyderabad on time. The best thing about this flight is the ticket price which is very cheap and since the journey is only for little more than an hour the cramped leg space did not bother me much.

title: Good service
text: We family traveled this month. Flight was good in quality & service, cabin crew service was so co-operative. Spice max service was good & we enjoyed.

title: Lacks Punctuality
text: Our flight was delayed by an hour not because of technical fault or bad weather but due to lack of management skills

title: On time !!
text:
We booked ourselves on the "inaugural" flight between Goa and Amritsar on 6 Nov 2018.
The flight was on schedule and there were no delays upon arrival.
The crew were professional although the meal service could be hastened.

Considering that the inaugural flight was on the eve of Diwali, we expected a little bit of a celebration and probably a token gift for every passenger, but this was not forthcoming.

Baggage handling was efficient upon arrival at our destination.

title: Lacks Charm
text: For a national airline, the ground staff obviously has no training in charm and etiquette. They always come across as stern, very different from IndiGo or Vistara.

title: Good flight
text: This flight was fine, we flew on an ATR 72 600 turboprop aircraft anf the flight took about an hour. There were no inflight refreshments ar inflight entertainment. The staff were fine. The checkin was a little different as you depart from the Airforce base in Agra so the security was a little tighter than usual and everthing took a little longer.

title: Spice jet  ,has been best fiying  experience
text:
I have travelled to Sikkim  every fortnight to Sikkm between May till last week.Except two time I travelled by Spicejet.It was great experience of flight.
Punctuality,inflight services over all great pleasure of take off and landing unparalleled professionalism of Pilots.

I Travelled to Pakyong Airport   first week of  Nove Pic ,whic are of average resolution,but awsome experiencember,great experience.Sharing few

title: Spice Max - Grabbing Money
text: Very rare I'm using Spice jet. Last week I've booked Spice max. When I entered for Priority Check-in, the staff in that counter didn't allow me without ask me anything. Later I had check-in in normal counter, explained about this, they didn't even apologize. There is no Priority boarding. Food is average. Flight was around 1hr of delay. Finally no priority bag out. So guys, please don't book Spice max, They are just grabbing money from you. Its completely useless. I had very worst experience with Spice jet. I'm Gold member of Jet airways. Unfortunately I didn't get seat that day. I'll never come again Spice jet. I won't recommend to any one.

title: On time flight. Good service
text:
An ok flight. Left on time and arrived early 

Check in easy and efficient 

Online booking hassle free 

Recommended

title: Time To Bring About A Change
text:
I have personally never been a fan of Spicejet Airlines since its inception primarily due to the fact that their services on ground and in air left a lot to be desired. The way they used to address people initially near the boarding gate was nothing less than rude and it always looked like they were running behind schedule. .Had almost stopped travelling on Spicejet till recently when we had to fly to Delhi due to an emergency. Needless to say that the price of our tickets went through the moon. On reaching the airport well in advance,  the ground staff at the airport offered us two front seats on their own saying that the seats at the back are not together and that the front seats are more comfortable etc. The price quoted was 1000 per seat (and they promised 2 meals free along with that). We bargained a bit and their staff agree for an amount of  Rs. 1000 for 2 seats. On boarding the flight, we were made to feel as if we are basically a burden and there was no customary greetings et all. It took the attendant almost more than an hour to come to us with a meal as they were attending a couple of other customers. Never have I seen an airline taking so long to serve just about 3 to 4 passengers in the front.  Then there was a small discussion about the meals and they said that we are entitled to just one meal. With great difficulty, we managed to convince the staff that we were entitled to two meals.
The meals came in another 15 minutes and it was actually the most shoddy packaging  I have ever seen in a long time. The packaging was coming off from corners, the cutlery was missing in one of the meals, one meal had a dip missing. Except for one dish, the other dishes were so cold. To eat one of the dishes was an ordeal in itself as it  had become quite hard.   The only good thing was that it was a brand new plane and the landing was real smooth . Kudos to the pilot for the same.

Its time for Spicejet to really look into the areas where they can improve upon and bring about the necessary changes which can put them on par with the rest. I believe that they should brief their staff and teach them about the ways to conduct themselves in front of people. I am sure a smile will surely not cost them much and in turn will ease out the stress.

title: COMFORTABLE
text: It was a direct flight, initially it was delayed by half an hour but we landed in time. The crew members were helpful. Overall experience was good.

title: Water water
text: Little better experience this time. Getting water is a problem. I advise to keep water with you. They give priority to serve food.

title: My flight experience
text: Great service. Team is great. Specially Shyam,Cinterly, Rumano, and Priya. They were very nice made my trip very comfortable. Very courteous team of flight attendants. I was very surprised with the improvements Spicejet has made over the time.

title: Water shortage (?)
text: It is hot in India and when you get onboard they offer you water. That‚Äôs like a salvation in the heat...BUT if you got a place in the last rows/seats and the plate of water they prepaid are finished before it gets to you (around seat number 25ish), well then that‚Äôs it. So i just don‚Äôt get it, why would they skip the last rows, is it too much hustle that everybody gets water, it just leaves a bad taste in your mouth.

title: Unhappy With Airport Staff
text:
We travel from spice jet from Goa to Ahmedabad, We have one child, the company policy for hand baggage weight is 7 kg per traveler, our child is 7 year old, so we pack our all luggage in one bag. When we go to airport the person who do check in do weight our baggage and tell me that you have to pay money for excess weight, i explain i have 3 tickets and my weight is not over then ur policies, but he tell me that you have to separate your luggage in 3 pics. i explain how can my child carry his luggage sparately. but he cant convince and he pressure me to pay extra money. he behave very rudely.

In future i cant refer and prefer fly from Spicejet

title: Overall Good
text: Had 4 flights with Spicejet in last trip to Anadman....Overall good experience...Had pre-booked meal...which was delicious....They should offer more meal options...The other problem is Spicemax...The meal with Spicemax is not that good..So airline should provide an option to select spicemax seats with prebooked meal....Once you book spicemax seats the meal you would be provided is not as good as the prebooked options...So one should be able to book Spicemax seats without fixed meal option...We were lucky to have a flight with new Boeing 737Max that spicejet has just got...New planes are much better than old ones and offer better legroom...

title: Spicejet does not keep to its schedules
text:
3 out of 4 times that I have flown Spicejet, they have changed the flight time.
This is my history of various flights with Spicejet
* Mumbai Delhi - flight was canceled, which caused me to miss my connecting onward flight to Dehradun
* Delhi Mumbai - flight was delayed by 1 hour
* Dehradun Mumbai - flight was cancelled. Fortunately, they gave me an option to book a different flight, which I did. This flight was later 'preponed' according to an email they sent me, however it took off late!
In my opinion, this airline is notoriously unreliable in terms of keeping to its scheduled departures.
On the positive side, they detected a lighter in my check in bag. Although it hardly had any fuel in it, the lighter is a restricted item. Instead of just offloading my bag, they took me to the baggage loading area to remove it from my bag. Thanks to spicejet ground crew for that.

title: Premium still well worth the money
text:
This flight wasn't quite as good as our trip up to Udaipur but buying premium was well worth it. If only there was a priority security line at Udaipur....its a very slow process.

You were first on, first off and our luggage was the first to arrive on the carousel, significantly before non-priority.

The seats seemed to be a bit tighter than on our previous flight and the cabin crew a bit more up tight.

Overall a very good journey.

title: Spice Max a waste of time
text: Booked 9 months in advance and was rung  offering SpiceMax seats upgrade we took and paid extra. The only reason for going for this upgrade is for the extra legroom. On the first flight to Hyderabad we were seated in non SpiceMax seats. To their credit they went out of their way to re away us and got it sorted. On the second flt to Bangalore we were again seated in non SM and they managed to get one of us into more legroom seats. The thing is that you can do without the angst. If they can‚Äôt supply it don‚Äôt offer it. Just typical of Indian chaos.

title: First SpiceJet Experience: Revenue and rules centric, not customer oriented
text:
- Pre-booked Priority check-in, and excess baggage of 10kg on a flight from Jabalpur. 
- The pre-booking Online process itself took multiple attempts and my account was had a double charge 
- Did not notice any ‚Äòspecial process‚Äô geared for priority checking except for a sign. My money felt wasted, it did not even work for priority boarding.
- Despite pre-booking 10kg excess weight, the absence of hand baggage was not adjusted for calculating extra weight. This was a first time experience in 30 years of my travel. We hadn‚Äôt prepared our ‚Äòhand baggage‚Äô to suit the rules of the airline.
- The rate of excess weight was just 5% more than what I paid for in pre-booking, making me wonder why the hell did I go thru‚Äô the whole pre-booking process.

 Clearly the airline seems un-geared to bring value for the much touted and marketed Add-Ons, and the Check-in staff is groomed to stubbornly stick to rules, as against spirit for customers.

Yes, the airline can argue that they went by the book in every point above; but having a discretion is what distinguishes a customer friendly airline from a revenue friendly rule-based one.

title: Worst Airlines ever on Earth
text:
It‚Äôs the worst Airline service u can opt to travel ! 
We strongly ‚ÄúNOT RECOMMEND‚Äù !

They cancel the flights every now and then according to the convenience, and just say ‚Äùsorry‚Äù, operational issues !

title: Extremely poor concern for customer feedback
text:
Had to forcefully travel on Spice Jet recently from Dubai to Pune. 

Before the check in, you've to pass the 'weight test' and the airline seemed more interested in troubling it's passengers than resolving the issue. 

Mr Vishnu Prasad, Supervisor @ the airport representing Spice Jet made the passengers read the fine print 'lap top weight is included in the 7kg cabin luggage'. Bizarre.....Have been traveling on different airlines for a number of years & never ever has this happened where the 'passengers  are shown to read the fine print for cabin baggage'. No consideration even  for passengers flying frequently on Spice Jet. 

Mr Vishnu mentioned, 'we have given our feedback to our management for relaxing cabin baggage regulations especially for flights from Dubai due to large number of passengers buying at Duty free shops on Dubai Mumbai & Dubai Pune sectors, however, feedback from the management is  awaited'. 

While he was doing his duty, he pleaded his helplessness to most of the passengers which included a few ladies. 

It was indeed surprising to observe Spice Jet does not charge its passengers for serving water & allowing them to use the lavaratories on the flight!!!!!

Spice Jet does not understand the difference between passengers & guests!!! May be, they don't need to as there are very limited options for flying between Pune & Dubai.

title: Spice Jet Airways - Bangkok to Ahmedabad Flight
text: Worst Flight experience. Usually I do not fly in spice jet airways as it is usually unpunctual & lacks customer services. But unfortunately as I had No option so had to book the flight. Right from the departure arena at Swarnabhumi Airport - Bangkok they do not have sufficient counters to manage the public for Luggage Check - in and have to stand atleast for 2 hours in queque waiting for a turn as their staff is extremely slow and lethargic as compared to other airlines . Later after luggage check in have to literally run for the Immigration procedure and then to the final boarding area. Its better not to take Spice Jet as recently they had cancelled this same flight in the month of November 2018 and had harassed a lot of passengers. It is best to take flight of other airlines which is more reliable.

title: Zero passenger care
text:
Flight SG923 got off to a bad start. About 2hrs late due to an earlier tyre burst incident, we were told. OK accept that.
At the scheduled stop in Ahmedabad the approx. 50 Goa passengers were advised of a further 2 hour wait. The SJ staffer who looked after us was very cool and despite much abuse from some mainly foreign passengers, did a good job. He also said we would be offered food and drink vouchers.
Unfortunately this message didn't make it to the cabin crew on the second leg. No, there was no food voucher, no complimentary tea or coffee and my wife was denied a cup of hot water.
Zero points for PR SpiceJet!
Your cabin crew or purser should at least have enough discretion to help passengers who expected to have landed 2+ hours earlier.
Poor show.

title: Good flight
text:
We were very impressed with the efficiency of Jetspice everything seed to work. The staff were friendly and the food good. 

We opted to pay R1,000 (¬£10) to up grade to priority and it was well worth it. Unlike some other airlines you did get on first and your luggage was waiting us in the arrivals hall.

title: Nice and good Services
text:
Nice Flight and budget airlines 
low cost Indian Carrier with good services 
seats are too small for big size people 
must travel once and save some money

title: Value for Money!
text: We had early morning flight from Ahmedabad. The flight was on time and the customer service representative was good. We also pre-ordered some food for the flight which got delivered without any problem. Flight was decent and overall value for money.

title: Spicemax but NO benefits
text:
Staff was found doing make up in front washroom while ladies waited to take a leak!
Beverages were not served though paid for in advance.
Spicemax advantage was only limited to early check in while real benefit of lwg space as travelling with kids was not given.even after 10 days of flight the refund is nowhere!
The washroom latch was bit working from inside and when told to staff was not bothered at all.
My suggestion is to take thai smile flight from mumbai to bangkok instead

title: SpiceJet- more space and their dressing code beautiful.  Food - not tasty.
text: Their dressing codes is eye watching,  nice to look at the girls. Clean with more comfortable space . During check in time, the officer are more practical and friendly in lugging check in.

title: Worst Customer service
text:
After issuing online boarding pass, flight was cancelled 3 hours before the departure.
No compensation was offered as we had to book one night stay at the hotel and had to cancelled our next day plan. They dont know what is customer satisfaction. Do Not travel with Spice Jet. Will be better off paying little extra to other airline to avoid inconvenience, stress and extra unnecessary expenses. Will not recommend at all.

title: Terrible experience!
text:
Spicejet has no value and regard for it's customers. We were returning from a family holiday from Bangkok and had a flight back at 2:05am. It was delayed to 3:05 am and then eventually to 6:30am. 180 people were made to wait the entire time without blankets or even water. There were old people, kids and ill people on the flight. No care was taken at all. When we questioned the staff, all we faced was ignorance. They acted as if they were deaf and called the airport security to threaten the passengers when we questioned their behaviour. At 6:30 am it was randomly announced that the flight got cancelled and they were not responsible. They did not give us any kind of accomodation or help. The staff was clueless. They escaped from the back door to avoid questions. They are spineless. Every flight can have a technical issue but it is the airline's responsibility to not keep the passengers in dark, provide them with proper information, accomodation and a booking for the next flight. We had to make hotel and flight arrangements on our own and faced extreme inconvenience. The vacation enthusiasm got ruined. 
If even I get a lifetime of free travel with Spicejet, I would prefer not to have any kind of association with them.

title: Worst experience with spicejet
text: I have travelled  in spice jet for the first time & this was the worst experience , as compared to other airlines. They are charging for checkin bag, you can carry only hand bag. if your carrying checkin bag you have to pay for that as per the weight. For most of the airlines you can carry checkin bag upto 15kg with free of cost . In spice jet the seat arrangements are very compact as compared to other airlines, you can't stretch your legs properly. There will be no complementary food in spice jet you have to pay for food . most of the airlines provides food as complementary . The most important thing is the behaviour of the crew & airport staff , they don't know how to treat the customers , they are very rude. Don't carry any fragile thing in your baggage , because they don't how to handle your belongings even your paying for the baggage.

title: Snobbish Airhostess
text: Was travelling with a kid and asked for ear plugs or some cotton. She said will give some warm water, however she never came back and the kid didn't have a pleasant flight.

title: Flight time moved forwards 4hours without telling us
text:
The 10:30 am flight that we booked was changed to 6:30 am without notification. We only found out 4 days before we we checked on line direct with Spicjet.
The baggage allowance is only 15kg - not enough when transferring from an international flight where the allowance is more than double that.
Otherwise, pretty average.

title: A Mix bag...
text: Flew in September to Kolkata.... and back.... It was late at night, but the flight was smooth and meal was hot & nice. Though this plane had very less leg room.

title: SpiceJet flights were well before time on the DEL-GAU-DEL flights I took on Oct 24, 2018 and Oct 31, 2018
text: Both the flights landed 15-20 minutes before the scheduled time of arrival at the respective airports. SpiceJet is proving to be way ahead of its rivals in the business.

title: Worst Customer Service ever!!!
text: I‚Äôm appalled that a medical emergency request I raised the morning of November 3 for me to rebook flights due to my dads medical emergency couldn‚Äôt be serviced ‚Äòfor at least 48 hours‚Äô per the Spicejet team. Hence, we went ahead and booked the jet airways tickets instead, since the customer relations team at Spicejet isn‚Äôt allowed to talk to customers. It‚Äôs now been 8 days since I raised me request, still haven‚Äôt been able to hear back from Ms Priya Chettri, the customer relations team exec. She‚Äôs not reachable on the phone even to her own Spicejet colleagues. On the other hand, indigo canceled the full related itinerary overnight due to the emergency. I‚Äôve provided all necessary documentation, also Spicejet is well aware that the medical emergency occurred due to them deplaning us after making us sit for 1.5 hours on a flight that they decided to cancel after all. This caused us to change our entire itinerary, spend 12 hours at the airport, and do an additional 3 hour drive (with no support from Spicejet ground staff for the additional cost of driving at midnight) to reach our actual destination which Spicejet couldn‚Äôt arrange for us to reach. Pinning my hopes on Digant baruah, spice jet call center exec, who has been desperately trying to reach Priya chettri, since last 2 hours to get another update since I haven‚Äôt heard from her in 2 plus days...

title: Cheap Flight with limited good facilities
text:
We travelled on this flight on our return from Tuticorin to Chennai.. Fare is comparatively better with very good reception and services, This is the morning flight which was delayed by more than 45 minutes. Air Journey was very good.. As this is a cheap fare Air service we could get only water as complimentary that too on our request. Air Hostess services were very excellent. We enjoyed this one hour flight journey in toto..

Suggestions:  These Cheap Air Flights to provide at least Welcome Drink and chocolates to their passengers as a courtesy

title: Cheap Flight with OK facilities
text:
We travelled to Tuticorin by this flight on 13th October 18.  The fare was comparatively cheaper. The flight though delayed reached the destination on time. The Journey was good. As this is the Cheap fare Airways, they did not provide any complimentary eatables except water that too on request. The service was good and the air-hostess  were very polite.
My suggestion:  At Least the Cheap Flight Airways to provide a welcome drink and chocolate to passengers.

title: Good if you buy spicemax
text: The leg space is very less if you are above 5.10" and it is advisable you pay more and buy a spicemax with better leg space or fly some other airline.

title: Poor Service
text:
I went on a long vacation, so I boarded around 7-8 flights. SpiceJet was the worst of all. 
- There's no leg space, I even couldn't cross my legs. 
- The button available to recline my seat was broken.
- I had to press the call button around 4-5 times to get a glass of water. 
- The air hostesses were very rude, when I asked her for a glass of water she literally scowled at me. 
- I booked my tickets 2 months before my holiday, in these two months I got around 5-6 calls from SpiceJet to upgrade my seat to spicemax. It was very irritating, they don't understand the meaning of a simple no.
- Compared to all my other flights,  traveled in economy class, travelling with SpiceJet felt like travelling with Indian railways. Very disappointing. 
- I am never travelling in SpiceJet again, and I would recommend everyone else to avoid it as well.

title: Good one
text:
It was last year but I remember it was a comfortable journey to the end.
Had no problem at all in legroom or food.

title: Pathetic airlines Spicejet. Poor service. Miss handling of luggage. No answerable staff.
text: Spicejet has become very unprofessional airlines now. Nothing they are doing right. Flight are almost delayed from minimum 30 minutes to one hour with out any bad weather or unavoidable situations. Miss handling of luggage‚Äôs. no answerable staff. Flight doesn‚Äôt have suffecient food even on prebooking of meal. Rude behaviour from air hostess and flight stewards. Very very poor

title: 100% never again to Spicejet
text:
Allow me share my experience,Recently flew with spicejet on 9th October ( SG 58) from Dubai to Jaipur. It was the worse experience ever in my life and embarrassing too while traveling Internationally 5/6 times in a year. 

While check-in I was told I can carry 7 KG hand bag. There was my laptop in it and a DSLR camera and a lens. It was less than 6 KG. So I bought Chocolate and 2 liquors from Dubai duty free. After boarding gate open they found my hand bag is more than 7 KG and I was asked to pay 180 dirham from a unprofessional staff as I had 3 KG extra.
Honestly I was surprised and enquired about it when I have only ine laptop and camera and two bottles of liquor of duty free products.It was too embarrassing infront of all passengers, So I refused to pay and wanted to speak with supervisor or incharge. But the situation became more worse when that gentle man came with a huge attitude. Without even knowing the situation he behaved like I stole something and was get caught. I dont wanna write his name, but the way I was told was not acceptable at all. I tried to explain that even in the check in counter no one told me about laptop and duty free products would be count. His final words were throw the bottles if I dont want to pay.
May be he was doing his job in his stubborn way but trust me never faced this situation ever. I dont know any airline even bother to check the weight of laptop and camera with duty free products. Spicejet company made my dream true and showed the reality.
100% I will not recommend to my friends and family to fly with Spicejet. Thank you.

title: Very good with ontime departure and arrival
text:
Check in very quick and boarded and departed the plane via an air bridge. Plane very clean and cabin service staff very good.
Plane departed and arrived on time.
Luggage quickly arrived at the carousel.

title: Horribly unprofessional experience
text: I had one of the worst flying experience on my flight on 4th Nov 2018 on SG 939 (PHF6HR) to Delhi. Scheduled Departure time was at 12.30 however it was delayed by 30 minutes which was quiet logical considering un seasonal snow fall in Srinagar. We were asked to board at 1 pm. Upto this point it was fine. Then we haf to wait at the aircraft till 3.45 pm. There was no proper announcement. We were first told that due to deicing requirement flight will leave at 2 pm. Didn't happen. Everytime passengers created noise we were told it will happen soon and not in their control. In the meantime all other flights took off. Pilot announced at 2.45 pm flight will take off in few minutes. That slso did not happen. Ultimately we took off at 3.45. In the process I missed my connecting flight to Kolkata due to leave at 5 pm. This being Diwali time no tickets were available and whatever were available were abnormally priced. Spicejet Ground Manager in Srinagar flatly refused for any help for my missed flight since the connecting flight was with other airlines.

title: Best for some select sectors !
text: My favourite for Bagdogra - Bangalore - Bagdogra Sector ; the non-stop service is the best and fastest reach to South India.Timings are convenient for onward journey.

title: Good Domestic Flying Experience
text: New Boeing Flight .Good Cabin Crews.Nice journey ..Landing at Delhi got delayed for 30 minutes due to congestion as mentioned by the Pilot.Journey was comfortable

title: Good to travel in less sound
text:
Need more professionalism to hospitality crew
Seat to seat space is very less not comfortable good thing is very less engine sound and also comfortable fares 
Finally its feel good journey deal of the day was not good please stop it

title: Un Hygenic Food and Careless staff
text:
I was traveling from Mumbai to Tirupati and when I bought a cashew nut from the cabin crew I was surprised to find a dead fly in the tin.
I hope SpiceJet cares for the health of their passengers, I and my wife were aghast to see this negligence from SpiceJet.
Moreover when the same was brought to the notice of the cabin crew they asked us to file a complaint as if this was a daily affair for them.
I am marking a copy to DGCA with all the relevant evidences .
If I don‚Äôt receive a feedback on my complaint in another 24hrs the same will be flooded on social media.
SpiceJet will be responsible for any health issue of me and my wife .

title: SpiceJet! Worst Airline To Fly From Dubai
text: Never ever suggest anyone  of flying by Spice Jet from Dubai.... Had terrible experience with SpiceJet departure from Dubai to Mumbai Flight on Monday October 29, 2018 Flight number 014 departure 01.55 Hrs. At Check -in counter the lady said cabin baggage 7 kg including duty free purchases EXCLUDING Laptop bag. So I made purchases of some chocolates and 2  bottles of drinks. But boarding gate experience was really horrible and humiliating. The staff had 2 weighing machines I check my purchased items weight was 5.54 kgs. and laptop bag with 4.30 kgs the staff asked me to pay 60 Dhs (INR 1200 ) per KG totally 180 Dhs. When I told them no airlines in the world charges for laptops even the check-in counter lady told me the same (as being IT company owner I am frequent flyer flying almost every 4 th day to different destination across world I always re-confirm about baggage weights at the check-in counters) but extreme rude and arrogant staff didn't listen at all not only me but tens of passengers were forced to pay.... It was SpiceJets clear ripoff or to be more specific Extortion. . . Love to see this airline shuts down soon

title: Ouch
text: Despite opting for the first row extra legroom seats, it was a cramped experience. The aircraft was a Boeing 737 and the seats felt unusually narrow. I had first row seats  on the right side of the plane and the legroom was not as much as other economy airlines because of the placement of the divider. Snacks and beverages were included in the cost of the upgrade.

title: Hassle free, but should give options for pre booked meals
text:
Travelled on November 1st. It was an early morning flight and started almost on time.

The crew were all helpful and efficient. Had a veg meal pre booked. Disappointed that they do not give options to chose from the vegetarian options available on board. Either you take what they offer, or leave it. 

Suggest them to look into this. Otherwise no issues at all.

title: old aircraft
text: flight was good but the aircraft looked very old ,seats  were worn out .food served was very good  and the crew member were cooperative

title: Efficient and prompt flight
text: Ground crew, cabin crew and support staff all are good of this airline.. good airline to travel. The flight took off as planned and landed on time. Announcements etc were clear. Food was good.

title: Good option from dubai
text: Decent airline with an improved service after take over by the new management. Quite good in keeping their schedule and their Spicemax option is great. Gives you all perks for a nominal payment. Need to expand their international sector though

title: Terrible experience
text: We were 8 members group and we were travelling from goa to chennai yesterday night. It was really terrible that they were not maintaining needed air pressure inside the flight. Initially I thought it was only me who got ear pain but it seems everyone had the same issue.

title: Budget airline with better service & on time flight services
text:
After almost a month of office work in Bengaluru, it was time to get back to the mainland ‚Äî this time in the back of the plane. The SG-635 flight from Bengaluru gets you to Mumbai.  After some searching, I found a solid deal so I jumped on this fare & booked, where I got huge discount which made the deal more irresistible. 

My check-in experience was quicker & easier than normal. I breezed through security (though it was a bit crowded) & popped in to the departure zone to have a snack, sip a coffee & shop before the flight. I had left early than my flight time in order to give myself ample time at the airport. My flight had gate no 04 assigned to it, which was at ground level. I walked a long way away from the assigned gate browsing through the shops checking the Indian artifacts & other stores in the airport. 

I was inside the flight at around 14.45, now with confirmation that my flight was right on time. Scanning for seat no 14F (thank you spicejet for a window seat) I realized that the aircraft was a bit old, but the economy cabin is legit. The flight attendants were friendly during boarding and meal services.

The flight was completely full, I could tell that the seats were a nice step-up from your average economy seat on a widebody aircraft. Each seat had a footrest, an adjustable headrest. When the passenger front of me reclined all the way back, I didn‚Äôt get claustrophobic, & I was able to straighten my legs almost completely through the footrest & under the seat in front of me (I do have short legs, but this was great). It was a pretty standard economy experience seatwise.

Overall, Spicejet‚Äôs service is better than other airlines, maintaining its standard well.

title: Scope for improvement
text: The management by the ground staff is not at all good. The crew members of the flights are good but they need to improve on that. The seats are manageable. The food served is comparatively better than other airlines in India.

title: spice jet
text: this is budget airline.prebook in advance particularly on sale period,It is sheduled and good service.

title: Taste of full service in a no frill flight
text:
I am travelling this morning 26th Oct 2018, from¬† Kolkata to Delhi ( On our way to Srinagar )by Spicejet flight SG 471. The scheduled departure¬† was at 06.00 hours¬†¬† and we reached airport at 4.50 am. Following is my overall experience about the flight ( Rating given out of 5, 5 being the highest):-
A. Check-in: Checking¬† was smooth and reasonably fast (Rating 4).
B. Lounge access: I was flying economy and hence there was no lounge faculty offered. I used my Mastercard to access airport lounge(Rating Neutral)
C. Boarding and departure: Boarding opened at 5.30 am at Gate 23E. Aerobridge was not available and passengers were boarded by bus. Barring little commotion at the congested basement departure hall, Boarding process was smooth and fast. The departure was delayed by 15 minutes due to early morning congestion at Kolkata Airport and we finally took off at 6.20 am. (Rating 4). 
D. Seats and interior: The aircraft was an old Boeing 737-700 series and looked tired. The interior in dark grey upholstered seats and cream wall looked slightly dull. My selected seat was 2F, a window seat at the front. Seat pitch was reasonably good with comfortable faux leather upholstery. Much comfortable than all its peer airlines. Seat recline was about 120 degree, not bad for economy class(Rating 3.5).
E. In flight Service: My seat was booked under corporate booking and breakfast was included in the service. Hot breakfast¬† was served comprising of Masala Omlette, chicken sausage, hash brown and crossoiant. Food quality was reasonably good. In flight magazine Spice Route provided good reading material. (Rating 4).
F. Arrival and baggage: Flight landed at Delhi T 1 at 8.40 am , 15 minutes delay and gates were opened at 8.45 am. Our luggage was booked through to Srinagar, our final destination.I booked special service Luggage First paying Rs.100 per bag. My luggage came very quickly on the belt. (Rating 4)
G.Overall flight experience and suggested area of improvement : Overall flying experience was good. In a¬† flight on no frill service what you expect is on time arrival and hassle free flight, which was experienced. Staff was well groomed and polite. (OVERALL RATING 4)

title: Unprofessional and bad attitude
text:
Let me start by saying that service providers must remember that one unprofessional staff can ruin the reputation of the entire brand & experience and the company cannot excuse themselves from the bad recruitment.
My husband and I were traveling to Mumbai. At Dubai airport terminal 1, we were offered the upgrade to SpiceMax for 80 AED per adult. It would include seats with more leg room & a meal & priority boarding. We paid and took the offer. When it came time for boarding, the representative at the boarding gate was announcing for SpiceMax passengers. We went forward and showed our boarding pass. The representative named SARAN said we are not SpiceMax passengers which got us confused. So we waited. But then we heard that all the other economy passengers were called. So my husband found the receipt and went to show it to him. Saran then confirmed that we were indeed SpiceMax passengers but with absolutely no apology or regret or the courtesy to lead u to the queue and let us go in first before the economy passengers. My husband asked his name and his response was to show his badge with a sarcastic reply by spelling his name out to my husband. It threw us off and left a bad impression about the airline. Seems like when it comes to up-selling, you do a good job but when it comes to fulfilling the service, it‚Äôs a stinky attitude that follows. Very disappointed!

title: Just Fly
text: we made spicejet flew form Kozhikode to Dubai, and return. it is cost effective. but the service is bit dull by comparing with other flights.

title: Expect Lots of Security
text: Many checkpoints and extra tags on everything. Be sure you don't have a single thing untagged when you board. Ex. You take a coin purse out of your backpack. Courteous personnel. Safe flight.

title: its manageable
text: Price wise its ok,,but on board facilities are not available at all, even to get a blanket on board for some time also need extra money. The trip was ok,, but not better.

title: Not punctual
text: This flight has always timing issues. Very neat and clean inside. Food served on board is good. Crew very nice. But you have got to improve your timings.

title: My Amritsar to Bangalore - Flight Ordeal
text: We were 9 people booked flight from Amritsar to Bangalore on Sep 1st. The airline has terminated this sector almost 25days back without any intimation or call. When I went to do web checkin, i was in for shock. They curtly told me, we will give you100% refund, and you can look for flying with any other mode. Total waste fellows in spicejet, and lowest attitude for customers. Never recommend this airline again! I had to rebook via makemytrip with Air Asia and travel back the same day. Thanks to Air Asia!

title: Worst Airline don't think to fly with it..!
text:

But seiousally guys I had never seen this before in my life because I usally travelled by airline but  " SpiceJet "  just took Rs.1200/- (400 per kg) surchages for

I am on the time". After some conversation they finally took 1000/- Extra for being late.but somehow I paid for an urgent.And guys you know what

they denied to return back my money.

Really guys don't go and think to travell with this airline ( SpiceJet )Now day's they cheat to us, and try to make our people fool!!.. especially  " SpiceJet "  was most

title: Extremely horrible!
text: I had booked flight from Mumbai to Make from Spicejet for 29 October. 1 week before I receive email stating connecting flight is cancelled. When I check online both Mumbai to Kochi and Kochi to male flights are there. It's disgusting ...I had booked hotels and flight 1 month before. When they rescheduled flight for 30 October I asked whether flight is confirmed. They say u may reach male on 30 ...may reach

title: Vastly Improved SpiceJet
text:
I flew by SpiceJet after a gap of few months. The airlines is vastly improved. It has also recently added a loyalty program. 
Check-in was quick and efficient; the boarding  was smooth and timely.
The seats were comfortable. The was a significant improvement in the in-flight service, which was polite and efficient.
The effort to improve in all aspects was clearly evident.

title: Value for money
text:
It is a very useful connection. 
Try to checkin early as flight is normally full.
Meals can be avoided as they are chargeable and not prepared well.

title: Amazing traveling
text: I have enjoyed traveling, Having become a regular Singapore flyer for the past year, it is good to have an airline that allows you to cut through the red tape. Check-ins are a breeze with a devoted Business counter. At all stages customer service is evident.  Turned flying from a chore into a luxury. Thoroughly recommended.

title: Friendly staff, budget airline, gets you where you want to go
text: A budget airline that keeps its promise. No issues. Do note that seat selection, meals, and inflight entertainments are not automatically included, but can be purchased. Staff are very polite. I recommend this airline for those who just want to get from A to B in the most economical fashion.

title: Breakfast menu served at 12 pm ???
text:
Travelled from Delhi to Goa on the 1130 flight from Delhi.

Had booked Spicemax option for seats and food benefits.

At the time of booking, I had clearly asked what would be served, it was mentioned lunch.

 Imagine my surprise, on the actual flight, when we were categorically told that breakfast was picked up and not lunch, because pick up of food was  done prior to 11:30. Not willing to create a scene with the airhostess or otherwise, we quietly agreed and had omelette and Vadas at 12:30 pm !!!! 

I do not understand what has pick up time to do with actual flight requirement. Why couldnt lunch menu be prepared before 11:30 ??

Seats were ok.

Take off and landing too were smooth.

Flight was generally on time.

But I doubt if I will take the Spicemax offer again, unless Spicejet team gets its folly rectified.

title: One of the worst airlines I have had the misfortune of traveling on.
text: We booked two aisle seats online , but when we boarded the flight, our seats were not the ones we had booked. In the name of budget airline, Spice Jet is finding ways to squeeze money from the passengers. I found several customers complaining about the huge excess baggage fee they had to pay for slight excess in the weight of their cabin bags. Even the ones who carried their laptop in their cabin bags instead of carrying a separate cabin bag were made to pay a fee. The terminal is too far from the entrance and we had to walk a lot. Service too can be better. The flight was delayed by almost one hour.

title: A very punctual airline.
text: I had the occasion to travel by flight No.SG197 on 12th October, 2018. It is a very punctual airline with neat and clean aeroplanes. Cabin crew is very courteous. Ground staff is also very efficient and accommodative.

title: This budget airline totally spoil the image of indians ands historical culture
text:
Any enquiry from customers forwarding being ignored by superiors mean 
it is not ruled to accept reliable words to improve complicated situations in the flight schedule as well as ground staff too.

title: Terrible customer service
text: This is pathetic airline in customer service. no worry about customers. I raised an issue with the airline customer service and they are still working on the same after a month. Nodal office and Appellate authority are jokers. Name sake posts. Once the price of the air ticket goes up not many will choose this airline.

title: Excellent Service... Just need to make a few minor improvements.
text: Traveled to Delhi from Pune last week on Spice jet. I purposely took this in spite of having a few other options. This was based on my previous travel experience. I was not wrong. Timely check in, on time departure, food quality, everything was as per expectation. I have decided to give 5 * rating for this trip. However, it is true that your trip experience is not over until you collect your baggage from belt. This is where I was disappointed when I had to wait for about 20 minutes. Barring this, it was a good experience.

title: Terrible experience
text:
Really pissed by this particular airline.
I traveled many time by other airlines also but never faced any problem and not even thought of writing any reviews if any minor discomforts are there.
But these muggers pissed me off by putting too much extra charges on me for not seeing anything written about extra 15kg luggage on my ticket and also 400rs for every extra kg after 15kg.
So thing is that I have never seen any section where it's mentioned that you have to select any thing for your luggage in any mobile application while booking a ticket and second it's clearly mentioned online that for every extra kg they can charge 250 or 300, but these muggers charged me 400rs per kg.
So I suggest everyone not to travel by this particular airline.

title: Graceful, courteous and caring service
text:
Good people to fly with.
I had landed just about the time as the check in was closing. They took care to not just ensure a boarding pass but expedited me through security. That was kinda beyond call of duty. Well appreciated. The crew noticed that I had dozed off during meal service, they let me be and then provided me a meal when I awoke. Well if this No Frills Airlines attitude, is so good, then I will fly them oftener.
And my journey into Hyderabad a day earlier with them was also very good.

title: Extremely unprofessional
text:
Dear Spicejet,

Low cost doesn't mean low standard at all. Lemme explain.

DXB to DEL, SG 12 on October 15, 2018.. seat 24 a,b and c. These three men started loud talks with choicest of abusive words during the conversation even minute. They continued until half hour to land where I had to stand up and force the crew to stop them. Untill then the crew turned a blind eye Nd dear ear. 

If women can't handle such nonsense then pls also have some male crew members alongside. 

Anyways the flight was fit of people unfit to be onboard. Smelly, inconsiderate and disturbing..

Not even worth mentioning that crew didn't have blanket or Cotton balls...

This was my first and last LCC specially on international Circuit.

title: FEEDER CONNECTIVITY
text:
Major Metro  & Small towns are connected by these Low Cost Carriers. The use of feeder connectivity is Ideally preferred by the organisations which save their precious time on a routine basis. Check-in & boarding is good. Majority of the airlines I have flown into Its difficult for me to understand what exactly the cabin crew or pilot is saying in every first attempt, such is the public address systems, but inferring the rhymes & looks on fellow passengers I am able to make out a tit-bit of it.

This time landing was better for all the reasons better known to the operator.

title: Budget flights, with less comfort and space.
text:
PROS:
The check in service staff was good.
Good on pocket.
CONS:
very less leg room.
food quality was just okay.
felt a bit congested.

title: Airline for comfortable journey
text: The flight was punctual. Check in and boarding was comfortable. It reached the destination in time. The services of the cabin crew are very good. The ambience inside the car was comfortable.

title: Not worth International travel yet
text: Not giving basic amenities like web check in and in flight entertainment screen was it self a major disadvantage with SpiceJet and over to that they have delayed my two baggages for two days in my four days trip to Dubai. My whole family suffered due to that and the worst part was that SpiceJet didn‚Äôt even call to ensure us about our bags or tell us the status also not was able to deliver our bags to the hotel. I had to go to airport far away to bring my baggages. They don‚Äôt know how to make customer relations better but know well how to charge extra money for basic things.  Delays happen, economical airlines do give less options.. I can manage with all that, but not with insensitive and poor customer service.

title: Worst experience to fly with spicejet
text: Only few self check-in kiosk has spice jet option. After standing in queue for 10 mins. The machine reads ‚ÄúNo free seats available.‚Äù After so much of hassle, neither the priority counter helps for the check-in. Never to fly with spicejet. PNR - WCJNNT

title: Recent flight from surat to delhi
text: A poor airline with very badly  maintained aircraft,where electrical wires were visible and could be a source of electrical shock.The toilet doors were not closing properly ,inflight entertainment was pathetic,it would just not log in.

title: Plane cleaned with Passengers.
text:
From Bangalore Jet Airways at New Delhi we were asked to get down from a Aluminum Ladder and we got down to Board this plane to board as SpiceJet as we boarded the plane there were passengers already on board and the place was vacuum cleaned, dusted with cloth sprayed with some air spray by 4 people which seemed most absurd to me.
Then for Tea they gave some item I have never seen I had to hold it in my hand and eat it as I took a bite it was foul smelling I kept the tray down.

title: Dirty seats
text: Seats of the airlines are not only cramped but are also dirty. They are not properly maintained. Service is satisfactory but dress of airhostes are gaudy. Management can consider taking steps to improve maintenance

title: Abondoned
text:
I had a very bad experience with SpiceJet and I would like to bring it to your notice. 

On Thursday 20th of September 2018 myself, my wife, my sister-in-law, my daughter, and my granddaughter flew SpiceJet flight number SG658 from Guwahati to Kolkata. 

We had a connecting flight SG377 from Kolkata to Patna. 

Because the flight from Kolkata departed late (departure time was 3.20pm when original booking was done on Tue 15 May 2018 but later changed to 3.45pm) we had very little transfer time at Kolkata (ETD 6.15 pm). 

My seats- GAU/CCU 27F, CCU/PAT 27F

On arrival at Kolkata we disembarked from the aircraft with all the passengers and I started to look for a SpiceJet staff member to help us in boarding our next flight. When I spotted a SpiceJet employee at the end of the building at the ground level, I approached her with my family members and asked for her help for the next flight. I told her that we were foreigners and did not know where to go. I wanted to know where was gate 19 and how to get there. Her only reply was go to the right. No other information was given. I asked her again direction for gate 19 and she replied go to the right. She was talking to a gentleman and her body language said she did not like me interrupting her. Not receiving any helpful information from her, we went into the building where others were collecting their baggage. I approached a complete stranger and asked him to help us find gate 19. He very kindly pointed to the lift and told us to go one level up. If only the SpiceJet staff had told us in the first place to take the lift upstairs and go through two sets of security checkpoints before going to gate 19, which was the last gate to the right. My wife cannot walk fast because she has issue with her feet and we were getting more and more frustrated. There was not even one SpiceJet staff to help us. When I finally reached the check-in counter after security clearances and running some 600 meters, I told one of the staff that my family was stuck at the second security checkpoint and for him to go and see if they have managed to go through the security so that we do not miss our next flight to Patna. By this time I was so tired that I could hardly talk. I am 76 years old and I get stressed very easily. I have travelled all over the world and to India nearly every 2nd year since 2002. I feel I have never been insulted so badly by any aviation personnel previously. I can say this with conviction because I have worked in Civil Aviation industry for 20 years.

Try and put yourself in my situation. I am a foreigner in a strange country. I have my family with me and we are desperately looking for gate 19 in order not to miss our flight to Patna. We have a connecting flight and I do not have the vaguest idea whether the airline will wait for us or not. There not a single SpiceJet staff to guide or help us. They were very quick in taking 2700 rupees for a couple of kilograms extra luggage at Guwahati airport.

The check in staff at Kolkata airport left and I waited for my family to come and join me before boarding the aircraft. We were the last ones to board. I was very upset because the only SpiceJet employee we saw and who could have helped us was far too busy beautifying herself and having a deep conversation with a male. We are foreigners and we do not know the layout and the procedures at Kolkata airport. A little bit of help from this lady would have saved us all that stress and pain. As soon as I boarded the Aircraft I told the lady who was welcoming the passengers on the aircraft that I wanted to make an official complaint regarding our treatment at call Kolkata airport. I told her what had happened and all she said was "I am sorry". 

It is my opinion that when SpiceJet became aware of the delayed flight from Guwahati, at least some effort should have made to ensure passengers transferring to Patna were given help especially when they are foreigners. I am very hurt and disappointed with SpiceJet ground staff for not helping us when we were lost at Kolkata airport. I hope some action is taken to avoid a similar occurrence in future.  

And please ask your ground personnel making PA announcements not to scream but to speak softly and slowly so that we can understand what is being said.

Use of ladders to board the aircraft is very difficult for us older generation. And your staff do not help much but give dirty looks.

I have sent you an eMail regarding our experience but no acknowledgement has been received so far. I am back in my country and I doubt whether anything will change

title: Time bound trip
text:
I traveled by this airline after a long time from Srinagar to Jammu. This time, this airline was well in time, good service. cabin crew was good, helpful, however, onboard food is very costly as usual.
This time, spicejet provided in-flight entertaimnment. One can keep his/her mobile phone in airplane mode and connect spicejet connect via wifi and enjoy

title: Spice Jet
text: The plane was absolutely full.  Service was good  Compared to Air India I found the leg room not so good.  Overall a pleasant experience.

title: Keep fingers crossed!
text: Before I left for airport, checked flight status and it was on time. At check-in counter, the agent told me flight is cancelled!! But he understood the importance of my travel and booked me on alternate route through Kochi. So my 1.5 hrs travel time became 7 hrs. Flights were ok. Can't complain about anything.

title: Friendly & efficient..!
text:
Although this is a budget airline, the overall experience was pretty good. Most importantly the flight took off on time & arrived in Delhi slightly before the ETA.

The cabin crew was efficient and friendly.

Only gripe was that the ground staff were a bit rigid specially the ones at the Baggage screening section who made me open my bag meant for ‚ÄúCheck In‚Äù  to take out a cigarette lighter which was confiscated. Never encountered this problem before on any Domestic or International flights for a ‚Äú Check In‚Äù bag..!

title: Horrendous travel owing to check in staff's arrogance
text: The staff at the check in counters were horrible, they refused to listen to us while we were checking in. Chandni (the staff) kept telling our baggage was overweight and had to pay for the soaked baggage as well inspite of us being drenched in the rain. She said she will not allow us to check in and we were wasting her time. When the weather conditions are bad, the flights can get delayed for several hours while the non-stop rain caused us additional baggage weight and there was no one willing to listen. There was a flight delay from the original time and this has caused us inconvenience(time and additional cab fares)  after we landed at Kolkata. Do let us know who will compensate for these expenses and discomfort? The staff need to be trained to use "common sense"; they act like dumb machines and follow a rule book. Am extremely disappointed and annoyed with their services.

title: Excellent Food, in compare to other carriers
text: I am a frequent flyer and almost used all airlines for travel. All airlines are charging good enough for onboard food, but not providing good service, taste and quantity during journey. In my trip from Bengaluru to Jaipur, i choose spicejet and hope for the same experience, but the food served by spicejet is really tasty and good. I love the food.

title: Worst nightmare in my Life,HELL RIDE
text:
This is my first time Flying with SPICE JETS but i never expect this much worst flight i ever travelled in my life.
For emergency purpose i travelled due to my health issues but this turned me to be a nightmare.

MOST PROBABLY NO BLANKETS ARE AVAILABLE IN THE FLIGHT

There is no space for the legs to accomodate & Torned seats & push back not working.
there is no enough space to use the push back which dash the passenger who sit backside of us.

I HAD A BACKPAIN  ,DUE TO TRAVEL IN THIS FLIGHT

WASHROOMS ARE NOT SO CLEAN

title: On Time
text: It was a nice experiance to fly with SpiceJet from Delhi to Bangalore, flight took off on time from IGI Domestic D1 for Bangalore and reached before time.

title: Flight experience in twin propellor Bombardier aircrat of spicejet
text:
My complain is not against the airline or the service. It is against the aircraft type. When we came to board we found it to be twin engine propeller Bombardier aircraft.
I would suggest not to travel in this type of aircraft due to very high level of turbulence & noise.
The noise was deafening and compared to normal jet planes it is 5 times louder and can cause partial hearing loss specially for infants.
So my suggestion is to avoid these type of aircrafts and try to use normal jet planes.
To identify these during booking look for 4 seat arrangement which is normal for these aircrafts.

title: World's worst airline
text: All seats are paid if you want to check in online and the staff force you to buy on extremely higher price

title: 'So-So' Service
text: I went to Bangalore for an international conference organised by Indian  Concrete Institute(Bengaluru Center).The crew was polite as usual & there was nothing unusual in their behavior or attitude.They charged me Rs.100/- for a Veg. sandwich which was tasty & palatable.

title: Poor Service
text: I was returning from Bangalore after attending an international conference & my luggage was measuring 9.5Kgs but the airline staff refused to accommodate it as hand baggage & charged an amount of Rs.400/- as penalty though she could have easily managed it.

title: Pathetic service
text: I had booked a flight from Delhi to kochi for Oct 17the, reaching Kochi at 10:30 am. I booked the flight around two months back. Based on the arrival time, i had booked our further travel. Today i got a message from Spicejet that the flight has rescheduled and now it will reach kochi at 1:15 pm. This has made all my further travel plans to go haywire. I called them to change my booking to reach around 10:30 ish and their representative told me nothing can be done. It is ridiculous. This is when they have another flight reaching kochi around 11ish. I fail to understand why the passenger should suffer. Will suggest everyone not to book flights through this airlines.

title: Business visit
text: This is my first time with SpiceJet as I was not sure of this airline and then I was left with minimal choice so had to book this. But I was glad all my doubts about the past of this airline had disappeared and I was glad I gave a shot as they are doing their best and have come back stronger. My experience was good and first time I had to choose a veg sandwich as they didn't have non veg option but I was in for a surprise as I liked it and I am glad that I got to taste the veg option. It was bombardier so it felt more of you are in a chopper but it was a good smile Anyway next time this airline wouldn't be my last choice but one of the firsts in LCC options. Wishing the airline all the best and kudos to all the hard work that you have put in to emerge stronger.

title: An airline for Economy and low budget Travellers
text: Travelled from Kolkata to Duabi via New Delhi and the service was very good even though you have to keep a track of the screen as being on silent airports it is very difficult to keep looking at the screen but still the airline is priced very well which makes people choose it again and again.

title: On board Spicejet Dash 8
text: I traveled on Spicejet Bombardier Dash 8 from Mangalore to Bangalore. The flight was completed in an hour. The flight was on time. The check in was quick and boarding was on time. The flight was neatly maintained and the seat pitch was sufficient for me (6'4"). You could buy in-flight meals at cost. Overall a satisfactory experience

title: Cheating official web page
text: They have the most cheater webpage to book! In the last second of payment they change the amount. Not serious at all! In general all online flights booking companies in India are a disaster! Why not to put the amount straight away? I hope I will not have to deal with this anymore it's really frustrating

title: Hand baggage Flight
text:
Basically, it was my mistake in overlooking the legends in small letters " Hand baggage Only" at the time of Booking. At the airport, we were told and we had to arrange our Baggage, asked our Driver to take back the surplus. Myself and my nephew enjoyed this silly mistake.
What had been your fate, if you would have arrived with your wife, I asked my nephew.
After that I pay all the attention while making a Booking.

title: Best Indian domestic airline
text:
In the last 2 years, SpiceJet has really turnaround things for themselves. In time arrival, great customer experience and really good food (though you need to buy it ). In comparison with all other Indian airlines, it has the best premium economy known as Spicemax 

Tip : Do experience Spicemax. Best seats, good food, priority check in and first baggage out. Whatelse you need. That also at just Rs 400/800(depending in the sector)

title: Not good and not bad !!!
text:
We booked the flight almost 6 monthes before. On the check in desk we were asked to show the credit card that we bought the tickets with...  we didint notice that we need to show the card on check in.  We had a renew card that stayed with the same number but the date of expire changed due to the card change.. they didint accept that on  the beginning and asked as to buy new tickets and get refund later for the old card.. because we  refused (6tickets). And started arguing with them they accepted to get us with the new card.  Other with small child had to buy another ticket because she  didin have the credit card with her...
I dont understand... if my father want to surprise me and buy me a ticket i cant fly unless im taking his credit card with me?. What if my indian lover wants to buy me a ticket ? Im also need to take his credit card with me ? 
This looks like a very stupid idea.

 The crew were nice and the flight was quick and quiet.

title: Nice Budget Airlines
text: The flight was delayed for nearly an hour. The seats legspace is small but we cant expect more in a small flight. The kids in our back seat were always disturbing us by kicking the seats and their both parents were sleeping happily without bothering about the kids. The food collection was decent and the staffs were friendly. The new system for inflight entertainment didnt work and the staff who told will come back didnt return at all.

title: before time arrival
text: trainees  are very helpful and even more smily faces talk in avery calm manner to senior citizens and behaved better tahn indigo staff

title: Low fare midnight flight
text: The flight was delayed by almost an hour but reached destination as per schedule. The boarding was easy. The ground staff accepted our request to provide all seats in a single row. The baggage handling was good and there was proper instructions provided by the crew. There was no inflight entertainment apart from the airline magazine.

title: Overall good flight
text:
My family and I flew on 6th September to Pondicherry which was a connecting flight. The flight was on time. I had pre booked our meal as it was early morning flight , and we were happy with the service.However, i had to purchase my preference seat at an additional cost. The ground staff actually lacks customer guidance while boarding which eats up a lot of time and its irritating when you have Senior Citizens travelling along with you.

Overall ok.

title: Good low cost airline
text:
Travel on this rout a lot. Always buy the additional Spice Max as the seats have more legroom and you get a Hot meal Hot meals on Spicejet are really good.
Priority baggage handling is also excellent. Only part that is not well organized is priority boarding, even when there is an aero bridge.

title: Non fulfilment of commitments made under Spice Max
text: We had obtained Spice Max service for myself and my wife on 19th August 2018. We had chosen non veg meals for ourselves. When we were asked for our meal preferences, we stated that we had already selected Non veg meals and that should be provided to us.The hostess stated that she did not have non veg meals any more and was more interested in pushing to us veg sandwiches. When I objected, she stated that I was free to complain to the management.My question is that if the Air hostesses  have already the passenger manifest wherein our non veg preference was clearly spelt out, what prevented them from collecting some non veg meals from Bagdogra or have some more quantity from Kolkata itself from where the flight had originated( it was a return flight) or whether they more interested in selling these off aginst cash at a higher price.I am so fed off by the callous attitude of the aircraft authorities that I have decided against Spice Jet in future wherever possible and Spice Max in particular.

title: Very good regional Indian Airline
text: Departed on schedule. Uneventful smooth  flight. Staff were friendly helpful and courteous. Recommended

title: Short, Functional and On-Time
text:
This Bombardier flight between Bangalore and Hubli is not only short, but the timings are convenient too. Both inward as well as outward flights were bang on time, and took less time to destination than scheduled. The landings were smooth. Being a short flight, there was very little time for service.

Disappointingly, on our outward flight, there was a duplication of seat numbers, with someone seating in our seats when we got there. The staff just asked us to sit elsewhere, and we were lucky to find two unallocated seats. The staff were busy getting the flight off the ground, and were not helpful in this regard.

title: Great Hospitality at Check in counter by Sruthy Mohan
text:
It is always immense pleasure, when you are tired after long schedule in the early morning and ready to take flight and the desk attendant at check in counter welcomes you with pleasant smile and offer you seat what you requested for. 

As a part of hospitality industry, every team member should do their best towards customer satisfaction, which is what exactly Ms. Sruthy Mohan did. Team member like her is always an asset to any organisation (Specially Hospitality industry).Sruthy will surely get motivated with such feedback and it will surely encourage her to continue to strive towards excellence.

One small advice, passenger, especially who belongs to hospitality industry, always notice the standards what they expect for. I did not feel any warmth hospitality in the flight at all; however check in experience was good.
