Cabin crew should be more trained to follow the hospitality standard, which comes first-that is smile. We understand, long schedule  might be the reason, however as we belong to hospitality industry, as a guest or as a passenger, the experience which we get from the organisation's team member, that experience matters!!

title: Change of Aircraft should be informed well ahead
text:
We have selected Spicejet to go Srinagar from Kolkata- only criteria was, it does not require change of aircraft at Delhi airport. But we had to change the aircraft at Delhi airport and interestingly it happened also after loading of passengers who were traveling from Delhi to Srinagar. 

All other services were Okay.

title: SpiceJet SG8913-New Delhi to Ahmedabad Delayed Flight!!
text:
I had an early morning flight from New Delhi to Ahmedabad at 06:20 am. However, even after boarding the flight on time, the flight did not take off until 07:00 am, most probably because of air traffic congestion. So, the passengers had to spend more than 45 minutes inside the aeroplane waiting on the runway.
Poor experience.

title: Very Bad experience in Domestic Flight
text:
It was over all horrible experience. Even though Flight Flight was good and specious.
I travelled on 12/09/2018. I have received one SMS 2 days in advance, requesting to reach Airport 2 hours in advance due to Congestion at Chennai airport. 
Fair enough i respect the gesture.
I reached 2 hours in advance, and our Journey started almost 1 hour + late.
Strange if flight is Late they are updating by default. Now its passengers duty to chase. Spice jet was not bothered to update .
Due to some health issue, I required cotton urgently ( Getting Discharge from my Ear ) I requested from Airhostess, My wonder she replied we do not have . Being in Hospitality i suggested to check in to the first aid box and a reply came that we don't have at all?
Boss, I do not understand they don't have basic First aid box, little strange.

First time in my life i can see, furious people in domestic flight.

Can't you improve your timings and Basic Gesture to update Passengers in advance regarding delay ?
Trust me Vistara is doing Much Better    
Due to delay in flight, next day i went my office tired and puzzled. My next working day ruined .

title: Delay vs service
text:
We were flying from bangalore to rajahmundry. They boarded us earlier than the boarding time on the ticket. But we waited on the tarmac for nearly an hour because of some technical difficulties. When asked the air hostess was quick to reassure us. However I wish they would have announced the delay to the passengers to keep them informed. 
The seats were comfortable and the food and beverage service was excellent. We had a bad experience on an indigo flight flying the same sector but spicejet out did itself with the food and beverage service. They had a variety of options and everything we had was quite good.

title: Flight delayed & people are being favoured
text: Flight was delayed due to this I was about to miss my next flight from Delhi to Raipur. also I could see that some of the people were not being charged for the extra luggage whereas I paid for both the flights why there was favored response for different people. if your are charging one you have to charge everyone. This is disgusting that few are being faouvered (non-members ).

title: Comfortable journey
text:
Staff behaviour are very good. Flight was on time. Very Comfortable journey.
Flight Land in Patna before timing.

title: Confortable flight
text: Nice little plane, comfortable enough for a short flight. a little noise but expected been a propeller airplane.

title: Maldives tour
text: We were quite satisfied with the service of Spicejet , since we had less than an hour to catch our flight from Kochi to Male, the Airline personnel escorted all the passengers from Domestic Airport to the Intl AP, really appreciate their gesture as last year, we unfortunately selected Air China for our US tour & were stranded at Beijing AP while going & coming back for over 24 hours & they were absolutely rude & has no culture of helping passengers other than their country , after literally fighting with them, they arranged accomodation in a hotel, but I would like to suggest all of you, not to travel by Air China, had good experience of QANTAS, JET & Very recently INDIGO also, as we cancelled our ticket from Kochi to Ahmedabad on 9th Sept. 2018, they refunded 100% amount due to the extraordinary circumstances in Kerala, really salute to them as well.

title: Excellent timing
text: Good service inflight.Very good in keeping timing.Web site is good for booking.simple.Best cheap flights all over India

title: Not all Spice Max seats are Max
text: we booked 2 Spice Max seats 3A and 3C  but on boarding the aircraft we saw that there was no leg room.  The seats were not spice max .Across the aisle, seats 3D,  3E, 3F had enough legroom.  the air hostess informed us that in some aircrafts the configuration was such and  so they were very sorry . couldn't they inform us when we were checking in? We had paid Rs 800 per seat . We could have gotten a refund. All they told us was please email the customer care dept and complain.

title: Did not allow boarding despite reaching almost 45 mins before scheduled departure
text: Despite explaining to the check in staff that it was a family emergency due to death in the family and being able to clearly see that the flight had been booked just 2 hours prior at a non concessional fare, the check in staff denied boarding. There were still 45 minutes to go before scheduled departure. Very inhumane treatment in an emergency.

title: cheap flights cheap service cheap staff..every thing is cheap and terrible
text: while i was been travelling from kochi to raipur they rescheduled the flight and the airlines dont even bother to send a mail atleast but they did nothing at the time of check in they asked for printing and it was not our mistake that flight is rescheduled..after calling to customer care they send us mail to next day lol.they charged us rs 150 for printing the new ticket..no help from airlines..worst ever airlines dont take these flights just coz its cheap price its cheap in every thing..

title: worst flight ever
text: worst service worst flight i had ever travelled..we have to wait outside dehi airport coz our flight was at morning 6.00am,indigo was giving check in to passengers having flight at morning 8.00am but this spice jet they came at 4am so lazy staff dont bother about about passengers and after complaining they told us its there policy..third class service.one more while travelling from kochi to raipur the flight was rescheduled but they dont even mail it or any help and taken charges for print out for the same flight.worst staff worst in class..air india is far better then this airlines.

title: Nostalgic!
text:
The aircraft was a Bombardier and flew in one of these after ages.

Smooth flight, friendly and courteous staff.

Drawback - there was no coffee - missed that.

Caught the return flight too.

title: Good in-flight but hidden costs if you are trying to book seats online
text:
While booking my flight - SpiceJet with its strong performance and good reviews became my defect choice for the airline. 
My experience is as below. 

Booked through an aggregator (I think it was cleartrip) Logged in to SpiceJet once I had a PR and tried to webscheckin. Here is where the fun started.
"Web check-in begins 48 hours before the flight‚Äôs departure time. It closes 2 hours before the departure time". For a flight booked in 2 months in advance, I now needed to set a reminder to reserve my seats 48 hours in advance. @SpiceJet - please open the webcheckin as soon as a flight booking is open!

Cut to 48 hours: God forbid if you are accessing the website through the phone - scrolling freezes! Unfortunately I was travelling in a bus and then had to borrow a laptop to book the seat. Surprise - only the middle aisle is not charged. Rest is charged. Was not expecting this. Indigo / Jet also charge for seats but nothing like this. Paid for the seats through the website and somehow the screen went blank. Luckily was able to log in and retrieve my tickets. 

Flight Day: The on-ground staff is very courteous and very very friendly. For a 5 am flight, they were cheerful and trying as much as they could to help the passengers (Unlike Indigo, who behave as if they are doing a favour). Hostess and Stewards were very friendly and put a smile on my kids face. Loved their attitude. When we ran in turbulence, they helped people with kids.

However I may fly them again (if they open their web check-in options) and I also liked their Max option which I will try sometime in the future.

title: Update
text: We were their Priority Customers but we have not given such treatment and in Breakfast they do not have even varieties of Juices to serve and our seats were in front but no space to keep your hand luggage which they have accommodated somewhere else

title: Love to fly with Spicejet for FOOD
text: I am like a frequent flyer of this flight from Pune to Dubai. I always pre book meals and enjoy the  real delicious hot meal with a chilled beer. I enjoy.

title: Chaotic checkin counter despite priority checkin - onboard staff are good.
text:
The checkin counter could use some discipline enforcement to make sure that passengers don't jump the queue (line). Additionally, if you have purchased priority checkin service, then you should get priority service. Web checking baggage drop wait was less than priority checkin.

On board staff were very nice and the food served was ok (you have to purchase the food and the vegetarian cheese cucumber and tomato sandwich was decent but not great).

Overall though on the Q-400 (turboprop), I'd probably say SpiceMax is not worth it.

title: On time and comfortable flight
text:
Hassel free flight! They played some good music before take off while the passengers were settling in! The staff was courteous to offer drinking water during the wait time. Take off was on time so was landing, slightly before time. They were courteous to offer me emergency exit seats, which have slightly more legroom than the other seats for free.

overall, a good flying experience with them always!

title: Better than Indigo
text:
Flight experience was better than what I had expected: check-in counter staff was attentive and meticulous, leg room was comfortable, crew members were polite and pleasing, overhead cabin was spacious, in-flight magazine had interesting articles, flight landed ahead of time, baggage collection was a breeze. 

Hopefully SpiceJet will continue to uphold these standards. 
Perhaps, improve upon Food/Beverage.

title: Nice Experince
text: Flight was on time ..in-flight Food was available  Would be more better if ,water is served complimentary-.All okay...

title: Comfortable flight with good in flight service
text: Flew to Ahmedabad from Delhi and returned the same day by Spicejet flights. The flights were on time and the cabin crew handled their tasks in a professional manner. The range of refreshments available during the flight is very good and the meals served are fresh and hot. I would say that I had good tasty, fresh and hot meals in a flight after a long time. The prices are also reasonable and one gets a discount if the meals are pre booked. Overall a good experience flying by Spicejet !!

title: Decent airline
text: This was a really short flight to Chennai. SpiceJet is one of the better airlines in India. In flight service was ok. Departure and arrival were on time.

title: Flight to Hyderabad this month
text: It was one of those small aircrafts. Flight was very bumpy, in view of turbulance + nature of aircraft. The Landing was late even though flight took off failrly on time. The aircraft was hovering around for long time, and wobbling a lot + making lot of screechy noises (which was scary) but no announcements were made about the reason for delay.

title: They do no care for time
text: They sell tickets at discount but do not care for punctuality. On-boarding experience can be more pleasant if the call is given little in advance and the same in turn can save time.

title: Worst timing and service
text: The flight was scheduled to start at 9.30 PM from Vizag. By 6 PM, got a message that the flight is delayed and would start at 10.15 and then after half an hour, got another message stating the flight is further delayed and would start at 11.00 PM. With the pre-arranged logistics, I was in need to reach airport at 8 PM itself and then waited. After done with the security check formalities, waited inside the lounge till 12 PM and no show of the flight. Finally I boarded the flight at 12.30 and reached Chennai at 2 PM. Worst experience on my first trip in SpiceJet.

title: Pre Order Your Food
text: Overall experience from checking and flight was good. The only downside was Food. I had not pre ordered food thinking that I will be able to buy in during the flight. However, to my shock, by the time it was my turn to be served they did not have anything hot left. Only thing i could buy was Bhel and Cookies. I was traveling with my family and we had difficult time managing without nothing to eat for 2 hours.

title: Experience with Spicejet
text:
If you have an e- ticket with you and expecting that the Amritsar Airport Security will allow you to enter. Please come along with the hard copy to save the money. if you don't have a print one print out will cost INR 100. 
On the Other hand if I will talk about the staff of the Spice jet flight they were to nice and from the starting till end they provide the best of their services. I still have a taste of the best coffee on my tongue.
For the luggage also you will have to wait at least from half an hour to 45 mins. 
But your Air experience will be best. Thanks to the Air hostess department. If little they will improve they will be most desirable flight to take by all the people among the country. Rest it depends upon luck to, might be that was my hard day! Hope all the readers will have the nice flights. Good Luck.

title: Less customer care
text:
It was family trip to goa with 2 infant. as pet the rule 2 kids can't seat in one row.At the time of booking if they collecting data about the passenger then as pet the data the place allocation had to be done.Airline ignored the data provided by us and we got the seats in same row. Its very disappointed and disturbing for other passengers for seat adjustment.
I think airline need to take care of such small but important things before allocation.

title: Crisp trip to tirupati on Spicejet
text: I took a trip from Mumbai to Tirupati on Spice jet, flying into tirupati on 14th September and flying back on 16th September. it was a wonderful trip, as the flight arrived before schedule both on the way into tirupati and into Mumbai.  one could see the visible effort that every one of the staff , from cabin crew, to engineering crew, to the piloting team making a concerted effort to load the aircraft and get it off the ground and land ahead of schedule.  of course I had opted for spicemax and that gives you great leg room in row one, good hot food, priority checking, and luggage out first. great trip and will probably use Spice jet much more for all my travels.

title: SpiceJet Flight from Delhi to Dharamshala
text: Spicejet seems to be a good airline, though this journey particularly was not a long, it was a 1.5 hour travel. Air craft was small and seats were comfortable. The food was good. Overall a good experience.

title: On time performance & Food option available
text: I find this airline best in terms of on time performance & it‚Äôs delicious food! Staffs are also courteous & quick.

title: Amd - bkk
text: Its was a very bad experience. Would recommend not to fly by this flight. It was feeling as if riding in old taxii.

title: Comfortable flight
text: As we started to taxi out, there was a big jerk & the engines stopped ! After a few minutes, the cockpit informed of a technical problem which would get sorted out in and engines would refrart in 30 seconds. The doircwas opened andcan engineer from outside came in. After 20 min the engines restarted and we flew back. Announcements were made and pax were readonably comfy. Butvthrcwas a slight scare !

title: good promotion ..poor customer service
text: All was set for a good short family holiday. from Vijayawada Hyderabad onwards to Aurangabad and Pune. At last moment 4 hrs before departure got a call that flight has been cancelled and no alternative flights available for the Vijayawada Hyderabad sector by Spicejet.

title: Helping tendency of spicejet staffs
text: Even though my flight schedule time was at 6.25 am. I reached boarding counter at 6.05 with my ready boarding pass due to my vehicle break down. By the grace of Almighty the staffs at the boarding counter guided me to the boarding gates and helped me catch my flight. Kudos to spicejet staff at Chennai airport for their helping tendency

title: Hand baggage only Fare type- perforce collection of additional charges
text:
Travelled recently from Kolkata to Mumbai and back to Kolkata from Mumbai under Hand Baggage only Fare Type. In this arrangement,  one can travel with a hand bag of permissible  size weighing less than 7 kg. At the time of check - in , Airline weigh the bag and take its measurement in a cage. 

While travelling from Kolkata to Mumbai, I did not face any problem, but on my return I was forced to pay Rs.400/- for the same baggage on the ground that it was oversize and the baggage was checked -in. I am 64+ years old and the person at the counter was in no mood to listen to my argument . I yielded under protest and decided to write to the Airline.

Now, the Airline says that the bag was overweight and for that reason it was checked -in.

Considering my experience, as stated above, I  could see a design in their approach  to generate additional revenue from the customer. 

I shall never recommend an elder to travel by this Airline.

title: Rude staff. Dirty stinking airplanes
text:
The staff clearly lack etiquettes amd direction.
Upon checkin i had requested the checkin stafg to give me a seat closer to the front. She denied saing there were no seats available. Upon entering the flight, the plane was half empty. Strange.. Spicejet aparantly has this funny system and ive heard of this b4.

The plane was stinking of sweat and like a dirty loo.... It was the most Disguisting 60 mins ever. Upon mentioning this to the crew, she brushed off the matter and walked off like it was part of the deal... 
I would never ever fly this airline amd would ask the others to think twice b4 booking this airline.. Jet and Indigo, class apart....

title: Reasonable pricing and helpful crew.
text: Had a 1hr40min flight from MLE-COK and the flight was not big. Just a 70 seater. However the seating was alright and the crew were very helpful and polite. As it is a budget airline, you may not except much. However its exceptional. Will still fly SpiceJet.

title: Bad spacing of seats
text: Airhostes very rude and not at all accomdating to travellers. I am a international traveler and will not recommend this airline. Row 29 terrible leg room especially for tall passengers. Flight number SG 488

title: highly not recommanded.
text:
Many time I had a terrible experience but I had to travel via SpiceJet if it is in my budget. If there is another flight I would suggest to go with that.

First terrible experience was when they forced me to take spice max and pay for it. When i reached to counter they said all economy seat is filled so you will have to take spice max which would cost 1000. I argued for almost 15 min that why to pay extra when I opted for normal seat and how come seats can be filled when i bought a tkt. they asked me to either take spice max or leave the flight. No manager came when i asked to call him. I had to pay with no other choice.

Second teriible experience when they didn't allow me to board. I reached to airport 1 hour before. I directly went to an executive guy and asked him that I am little bit late as gate will close 45 min before. He asked me to be in queue and wait for my turn. that's ok. when my turn came it was 46min left. The counter guy first took my tkt and ids and then check his watch and said - sorry the gates are closed you can't take this flight. He started expailing me about another flight without asking. I fought saying that its still 45 min but nothing worked. He want me to book next flight. I came out and took indigo flight of next day. I slept on airport and got cold as well.

title: Faced very bad experience. Poor customer response
text:
We boarded the spice-jet flight at 2am 
(20-9-18) and landed in Chennai international airport at 4 am . As we have a connecting flight from Chennai to hyderabad which is scheduled at 6 am did our web check-in. Spicejet have not took responsibility in delivering the checkin baggage soon and  they took almost 45mins to dispatch our check-in baggage , when we asked a spicejet personal he is  not responding and he said wait till u get ur baggage it's not our responsibility  the supportive team will come, No one turned up or even seen near the baggage belt . Spicejet supportive staff should take up some responsibility and  talk to there customer and explain the issues they r facing in providing the check in baggages. There is almost ample amount of time for us to go to domestic terminal and checkin happily but due to spicejet people delay we got late for connecting flight for which we rushed to domestic airport with 2 year old kid which is so hard and risky .
Spicejet team should feel some responsibility in communicating with there customer . Being a reputed airlines in india take some care towards customers. With this experience also i still support and travel in spicejet which offers best flight prices with good connectivity.

title: Not so wow
text:
I took spicejet flight after 5 years or so. Pros and cons jotted down:
Cons:
1. Seat were torn
2. Hard Landing
3.Cashew is better in Indigo
Pros:
1. Flight Attendants were cordial
2. Surprisingly the sandwich and the masala tea was very good
3. Check in was smooth.

title: Hand Luggage
text:
Hand Luggage :
 
As per the policy 7 KG hand luggage was allowed . The crew made me pay for the laptop / purse / dutyfree purchases etc etc 

My First time experience in 15 years of travelling. Never ever I have faced such issue for My hand bag.

I had to pay AED 300 

The flight was half emty.

Staff was very rude.

Each & every customer was screaming & there a huge commotion in the flight

Never Ever I will fly again in Spicejet

title: Good flight
text:
Check-in very long queue in spite of arriving an hour ahead- needs to be addressed on priority or open more counters
Emergency exit seat comfortable with excellent leg room
Cabin and washroom clean and well maintained
Staff courteous and polite

title: SpiceJet worst airline company in the world
text:
Customercare team member Shruthi from SpiceJet says no supervisor no manager Available in the call center at 5:30PM IST. Ground staff sucks inflight staff sucks. They charge you for bag in and out service but they never deliver the service. The chairman Amit was hungry today so he decide scam passenger like me for his meal.

Thanks

title: Bobby
text: Spicejets is a scam, never book any additional services of spice they never deliver and the ground staff are rude. Beware of SpiceJet scam.

title: Great value for money
text:
Booked a spicemax seat for 600 rupees. It comes along with a meal, priority boarding and priority check-in. 

Onboard the service was quite good. Do not expect anything fancy. Among the low cost carriers in India, I would rate Spicejet as the best.

title: Plesant experience
text: We recently used SpiceJet to fly from Jaisalmer to New Delhi with a layover in Jaipur. The agents at the airport were courteous and checked us in quickly. The flights were on time and the in-flight customer service was good. Thank you SpiceJet!

title: Booking done in Makemytrip - Flight Sector Cancelled by Spicejet *Atrocious Attitude*
text:
BOOKING ID: 22697128175291
I booked for 9 passengers in July2018 for flight on 1st Sep flight from Amritsar to Bengaluru via Makemytrip. Till 1st Sep morning, I called Spicejet to do web-checkin, I was not informed by not even 1 single person from Spicejet. They told me, they sent me email and message on 12th Aug about Termination of this sector. What baffled me was they kept my money of Rs 44000 without refunding, after so called informing as per them on 12th Aug. Even makemytrip washed off its responsibility to rebook another flight and I had to spend an additional Rs 15000 extra due to last minute change of flight. Overall, I strongly suggest not to fly with Spicejet - absolutely careless attitude towards customers. More importantly, we may need to check multiple times before the original travel, if these airlines keeps any changes and does not inform the travellers. I had a small kid 8 yrs old and senior citizen aged 75years. How could spicejet telephone centers cannot make one single call and inform me about cancellation of sector. Is this a complete negligence conduct by the airline?

title: Landing Was Scary.......`
text:
I traveled on 1st of September, the original timing of flight was 5:20 am when I booked the flight, but my flight take off at 7:20 am because of congestion on Mumbai Airport.

Flight was overall good, but one family was fighting with crew for luggage, I hate it, the family was behaving like idiots but the Air hostess was very polite till the end.

the take off was really very smooth, the whole time everything was smooth, at the time of landing it was shaking as soon as the tyres touched the runway, because of the speed or the runway was bad massive turbulence felt, it scared all the passengers, but we were safe.

title: Very good indeed
text: Efficient. Friendly ground staff. Quite relaxed about the extra 2 kilograms of weight. Comfortable journey. Very helpful stewards.

title: Evitatela avoid this company
text:
My flight was from Negombo to Chennai √å had  e-visa and at the check in the man didn t want to make a check in because i didn t have and flight to go out form India after the 2 months  he told me to buy a ticket  I ask to show the policy there is no and official policy this people want you buy a ticket because  they have some agreement maybe with someone, ha didn t want male check in another man form the staff told me that also one rezervation at one hotel out of India will be ok  so I have to book an hotel and print it  1 paper 1 usd  it means still  money.   With this document they made a check in. 
AT IMMIGRATION OFFICE IN  INDIA AT THE AIRPORT NO ONE ASK SUCH A DOCUMENTS TICKET OR  HOTEL BOOKING. THISE PEOPLE ARE STEALING YOU.  I  KNEW after THAT THIS HAPPEN OFTEN.  VERY VERY UNPROFESSIONAL.  DON T USE THIS AIRLINE

title: Worst response at boarding avoid SpiceJet
text:
Boarding staff at Mumbai Airport: Worst response
Most irresponsible and same answer: Can't help.
When other Airline in next counter can hear and respond, Spice jet staff turned deaf..

I reached 5.25PM to the SpiceJet counter for 6.05PM flight , check in was closed by that time but boarding was still going on , there was no baggage check in from my side. They just said they cant do anything and book new tickets . I requested them to help, they were simply chit chatting themselves without assisting me for further.
I was keep on asking to help but they just ignored.

My Mother in law was with me 2 tickets and i had paid so much money for booking , they could you have suggested alternative options for me.
I dont want anyone to struggle like me in future , better dont book any tickets in SpiceJet  airlines.

title: Good Service
text: It is a nice budget airlines, which provide service to some very remote places, like Hubali in Karnatak, Jabaplur in MP. etc.

title: Overall OK kinda experience
text: They are usually on time. What I liked most in their flight, is Masala tea they serve, it is savoring, worth trying.

title: Disaster Experience
text:
I had very bad experience with this airline, 
very tiny plane, no good facility was available.

Not recommended for long durable flight

title: Good Service
text: it is one of the best domestic airline I have travelled within India. Cabin Crews are very good in service and their ground staff also equally good in service. Food inside the flight is costly but the legroom and seat comfort was very good.

title: Flight from Mumbai to Male
text:
An airline not worth the price you pay for the ticket.The toilets were really bad,badly repaired with feviquick glue and all seats almost falling apart and even it was quite dirty.
Food as usual had only a very limited choice so nothing great to speak about even though it was an international flight.

title: Unpleasant
text:
They charge you for everything - seat, meals and baggage.

The fare was comparable to an Air India flight. I booked this flight so that I can travel with my brothers who were on flight SG-222.

Given a choice I will always prefer Air India.

title: Good meal and onboard service
text:
The Flight timings, food, cabin service was very good. Flight was pleasant.The seats are comfortable but there is not much leg space available. The crew on board too is welcoming and helpful. The overall experience is a good.
Purchased the Spice value  pack for Rs.1999 but  i just couldn't used it as it was not able added to any of my onboard value added services ,wastage of money.

title: This is a terrible airline with the worst kind of unexpected surprises
text: The airline is an absolute joke. We were allocated emergency exit seats, which were absolutely tiny with no legroom and no space to evacuate in case of an emergency. It's a miracle how this airline has received DGCA approval, since it's a safety hazard. I've flown my fair share of airlines over the years and this is the worst.

title: As usual late!!!!
text: I think airline should do something about. Was traveling with spice jet I think after an year. But still no change they are late as usual. There staff works so slow that it will take u 40 mins to stand in web check-in line and they will not bother about it. Spice jet team do something about it if u  can !!!!

title: Staff behavior
text: My flight from Blu to ccu was 5:50 and I reached at 5:10, it was just 5 mins late to take boarding pass but spice jet staffs didn't help me their behavior was totally rough. People are buying tickets by their money but they are not getting any service then why people will spend their money for this kind of airlines? I am not going to travel again in spice jet.

title: Early Arrival but Late Luggage; Unwelcoming Air-hostesses
text:
They are proud to land us before time, but what about the checked in luggage which comes an hour after landing. You are going to be late anyways.

The air-hostesses were not welcoming at all. Made faces when asked for water.

title: Cancellation insurance in this company is a scam dont do it
text:
Their cancellation insurance cover cancellation of flights by the airflight company!!!!Ridiculous.
Ihad to cancell and lost 2/3 of my money.scamers!

title: Good for First time, Domestic Flights
text: The Flight timings, food, cabin service was very good. Booked for Spice Max and got front seats, with breakfast. A separate boarding for families, elders will be great. InFlight entertainment was ZERO

title: UN COMFORTABLE AND Unfriendly staff.
text:
We are senior citizen couple traveled from VARANASI TO HYDERABAD by Flight no SG705 ON 28May2018(PNR L9JKUZ)

1)When we reached the Boarding counter for Boarding Pass at about 9am one Mr Rohit (VNS 114172) had issued the Boarding passes (Seat nos 28E &F) after checking the baggage .he was courteous and customer friendly.

2)While he was about to hand over the boarding passes to us he was called in to attend an emergency and one Mr.VIRAT (116581) came to the counter and once again stated the entire process and DEMANDED Rs 1500/- from me. when i questioned, we were just kept waiting at the counter for more than 15 minutes as he was attending to other passengers behind me in the Q line.disgusted for the HUMILIATION i asked for his identity and informed him that we shall file a complaint if NOT attended us. then he said that our baggage is oversized and over weight. I challenged the version and protested .when checked by the attendant i NON of them were oversized/ overweight. Finally he realized the seriousness and gravity of the situation when looked at our PASSPORTS and realized that we are INTERNATIONAL and frequent travelers he gave us the Boarding passes printed 20 minutes back lying with him. THIS IS AN ACT OF DEFICIENCY IN SERVICE and UNFAIR TRADE PRACTICE as per sections 2g &2r of Consumer protection act 1986.

3)Even after reaching the gate no 5 after security check we were called and harassed to return to the boarding pass counter without any reason .I received calls from mobile nos =917007092286 (09.37 hrs), +919838474489 (9.38 , 9.39 hrs -2 calls )and I told them that I am UNABLE to return as security check is completed. and we shall NOT be allowed to return.

4)After reaching HYDERABAD AIRPORT wheel chair was NOT provided to my SPOUSE who was suffering with high fever and REQUEST FOR A WHEEL CHAIR was made while booking the flight on 08 May,2018.

title: Convenient n Cost effective Flight
text:
My family n i flew out of Goa for a short trip. 

The crew was friendly n very courteous.

Flight was pleasant, though we faced a little turbulence given the weather on that day.

Would request the airline to kindly ensure that the respective airports cleaning staff is supervised to do a better job with cleaning the seats n food trays.

title: cancelled flight and no msg or mail to customer
text:
I booked my ticket from Amritsar to Mumbai. They cancelled my ticket without prior notice.
I came to know about it when I reached the airport to take my flight on 27 August 2018. 
I didn't receive any msg or email regarding it. Ground staff was very politely telling me only thing possible is refund my money.
They seriously don't value the time and money of the customer.  They are looting the public.  If you want anything to be done in such situation you have to do PhD on the "Terms and Conditions" of this airlines otherwise you are helpless. Because they are not going to utter a single word which can help you and loss their airlines. 
Then they rescheduled my flight from Jalandhar to Delhi and from Delhi to Mumbai for next day. Still, I didn't receive any msg or email for my ticket. But I do receive all the useless msg by this airline like upgrading your seat, discounts or 
 booking meals etc.
very poor service never choose this airline.

title: Spice experience
text:
The service on flight is good. Even the ticket budget is pretty good. The flight is on time. Good service and hospitality during the flight journey. The seats are comfortable but there is not much leg space available. The crew on board too is welcoming and helpful.
The overall experience is a good one.

title: Good experience
text: I keep travelling on this route very often due to my business work. I observed that things are improving at Spicejet. Staff is good and pleasing. Mostly before time

title: Nice Flying Experience
text: Good airline - maintained punctuality- courteous cabin crew - clear announcements within flight - But did not give baggage allowance for baby.

title: Leg room is an issue
text:
Have travelled with Spicejet from Chennai to Pune. 

Low cost airline and its value for money travelling with Spicejet.

Food and Beverage is Good.

Leg room is a concern, which i suffered while travelling an early morning flight.

Couldn't adjust much as there's little space.

Spicejet needs to work on providing ample leg room in their flights.

title: good airline to fly domestic sectors within india. bad for international sectors
text: i had a nightmare travel with spice jet from colombo. there was no flight intimation put on the screens till checkin time. i was travelling their spice max class which is their premium service which allows priority checkin. the lady at the priority counter was busy on the phone and was too slow for the process. 3 passengers in regular counter checkin and i was still waiting for my boarding pass. the inflight service was still better. but their ground staff was awful.

title: Great value
text:
We fly several times with SpiceJet. 
The flights ran on time. Staff were friendly and additional services were affordable.

title: better not to travel
text:
i ve purchesed ticket from a travell agent and the schudual departure was at 1520 hrs so accordingly i need to be in checking counter before  1435 hrs ...so i did ...but the gentleman on the otherside said that the counter is closed and flight is resedual to 1505 hrs with out informing the passanger and i ve to miss my flight ...and here comes the deal...the gentleman offered me a premium seat with a cost of rs 600/- to board the flight...if the counter is closed ...how come premium seat is availble at a cost ?
this the trick of the trade doing by Spicejet...the wrost airline of India .

title: On time flight to Mumbai
text:
No nonsense flight from Ahmedabad to Mumbai.

Seats were comfortable as compared to Indigo and Goair.

Crew seemed very professional and were working very smoothly.

title: Budger Airline
text: Took 22nd Aug18 forenoon flight to Goa from Chennai.  Budget Airline that served sandwich and was on time.  Bit unfortunate that they do not carry mouth freshners.  On the food front, can offer some alternatives.

title: Very Good Service, Great Experience
text: When flying, the most important factor that affects your judgement and experience is the in flight service. I would place SpiceJet among Top 2 in India. Air hostess are well trained and ready to serve you rather than the reluctance and plastic smile on other airlines. Given a choice, will prefer Spice or Vistara, anytime

title: First Flight On Spice Jet
text: My First Maiden Flight On Spice Jet on 13May 2018 , I had Booked on Economy Class and got Upgraded Spice max thou the seats are comfortable but handrest is so narrow that it touches the other passenger next to me ,, over all my experience was good nice service efficient Staff good ambeince.. We were Welcomed with Smile . I was overrall happy with Spice jet Surely Fly them again

title: Otto's quote "Invent an airplane is nothing.To build one is something.But to fly is everything" proven good by SPICEJET
text:
Still I can remember my child hood story "Once upon a time there lived a king in Holland". Likewise still I can remember my life's first flight journey with SPICEJET from Delhi to Mumbai in Oct 2007. I am immensely happy to see the same line of hospitality in 2018 also, with little more areas scope for improvement as below.
Opted for SPICEMAX. During boarding no separate lines for row no‚Äôs & SPICEMAX . Requested ground staff to allow me for which other passengers are objecting. On board crew closed doors & removed ladder by leaving one ground staff person in flight only, again he is grounded after opening door and re-adding ladder. At food, they served just in packet of 2"x2"6' with half A4 size tissue and no water. Seat 1A recliner mode corrupted and need to eject manually. Coffee given cup getting leaking at bottom and stained on brand new Allensolly pant which replaced by hostess with excuses. Even during deboarding time, there is a confusion since deboarding paused for a  minute due to some luggage retrieval confusion.
Crew hospitality is excellent and pilot announcements are crystal clear and fulfilled his pre-announced commitment of before time landing. Cleanliness is excellent on board and hostess approach is too friendly in catering different passenger needs.

title: Insensitive and discourteous hostess made the trip a nightmare
text:
I flew to Delhi from Chenna on 11th in SpiceJet. 

Yes, it was the first time I have booked it in SJ. But, the in-flight experience was not that good. 

One of the hostess Ms Solanki was discourteous and insensitive in her approach to the passengers. 

The key issue is that she was rude on people who wanted to use the lavatory urgently. 

Even though there was an announcement on turbulence in the middle, she didn't allow people ever after several minutes. 

Few of us want to suffer without relieving oneself. So, the whole experience of flying 3 hours was spoiled. 

She should have been courteous and also must intimate people once the normalcy returned. 

But, she was too busy selling stuff and not concerned about passengers agony. (I'm not sure whether she had a proper training and not even doesn't have proper accent and smile)

From now onwards I have to think twice before booking tickets in spicejet. 

I feel this is the reason these guys couldn't fill seats even though the price was less. They should learn a thing or two before it is too late.

title: "Cheap business oriented airline company"
text:
I had to choose Spicejet for the 2nd time in 3years and I believe I made a big mistake!!
As maximum time I travelled was business trips and my tickets were booked under corporate bookings. Many times I travelled with any other airlines in spite of check-in luggage being extra with 2-3 kgs it's been allowed. 
But Spicejet didn't, and they charged extra for hand baggage too which in total actually cost me more than the actual flight ticket.
I regret later on why I chose this flight.
Even in my corporate meal I have to ask them for the beverage which they ignored initially and when I asked upon for my beverage in corporate meal it's been answered "let me check and I'll get back to u" and then finally offered me it. Means are they trying to be smart or they don't even know the basics of their services!!
Please beware while choosing for Spicejet, otherwise you might have to regret like me!!

title: Worst Service, Dont go for cheap
text:
Dont save money by booking this flight, instead pay a little more and take some other flight.
These guys doesnt know how important time is. Flight was delay as usual and no communication from their side.

title: It is below average as its a budget flight
text: The SPICEJET experience was below average as its a budget flight operator. Crew and service was also ok. Food prices are high compared to the quantity and quality they serve. Staff was polite.

title: Avoidable
text:
Not a nice experience. The seats are uncomfortable and leg room absolutely mimimal.The seat in front of me was so close that I could not stretch my legs or sit upright without my knees touching the front seat.
The first thing you saw when the food service tray came to you was a air sickness bag. This was being used to serve the passengers.(See Photo).
The food was also bad and would rate it as poor value for money.
I would avoid thie airline.

title: Good service
text: This airline has improved a lot. Was in Spicemax so express check in and priority boarding. The plane was very clean. The service from ground staff yo cabin crew are very well trained. Very happy with the service

title: nice flight on time
text: Flight was on time but boarding was delayed due to slow processing by staff members. Flight experience was ok. seats are not so comfortable.

title: Flight from Goa
text:
smooth web checkin and luggage deposit
seats were without window - so a bit suffocating
else a nice experience

title: nice trip
text: its was a nice trip by air lines, so mostly enjoyed the trip by air lines, the service was fine,enjoyed a lot in the sky,

title: poorly trained staff
text:
i was surprised to see the wash basin in the wash room was full of dirty water and was blocked by some tissue when i asked the Air Hostess she said she cant't clean it.
The other air hostess did not know how to refill the soap dispenser.

title: "Loved the experience"
text: It was the first time that I truly enjoyed flying with SpiceJet. Check-in and boarding were hassle-free. Flight was on time. Quick baggage delivery was ensured upon arrival. Seats were comfortable with enough leg space for the class. Would love to fly back again.

title: new fresh Airlines with time..
text: Good flights, seats and cleanliness are also good. Maintain the right time .May prefer for the next.

title: Business Trip
text: Flight has been delayed as arrival on delhi is not on time. But after arrival at delhi Pilot has fly very fast and reach ahmedabad in One hour only. But than also it is not reliable that flights delayed.

title: Comfort
text: The lady at counter allowed  our overweight checkin bags. Really helpful staff. Flight was clean and service was good

title: Another good domestic company
text: The flight was perfect: on time, with a great and professional crew, and a small but clean and comfortable aircraft. Check-in in the airport was easy, and the ticket allows to checkin a bag. One of the best indian domestic companies

title: On time!
text: Nice service on time take off and no issues with the baggage, courteous staff. will travel again in spice jet...

title: Low cost but extras expensive.
text:
We chose this flight because of the timing, it seemed a reasonable cost but on getting the details we ended up playing for extras, the baggage was only 15kgs,  we had to pay for a meal and our seats together, this resulted in a more expensive flight that expected.
The seat was not comfortable and the pocket on the seat in front was broken so that I had to wedge the flight magazines between the seat and my knees to prevent it digging in me, my wife pocket was also broken but not as bad. If I was doing the trip again I would consider other airlines if possible.

title: Good Flight
text: This is the second flight I have taken with SpiceJet. The first one was not a pleasant experience so I was a little apprehensive.  Since I had no option I went ahead and I must say I had a better experience. The seating is comfortable, crew is friendly and the food is also good. The drawback is be careful with the aluminium food packing. Its a little dangerous I would say, I had a bad cut on my finger while opening the food served. Overall a better experience compared to my last flight with them.

title: A wonderful flight
text:
The flight was on time. The Patna airport seriously needs a makeover though. 

The crew was full of smiles and always ready to serve. The pilot was in a jolly mood and gave an interesting insight into the flight, the amount of fuel a plane carries  and other trivia. He was wonderful.

Overall tg he experience was good.

title: SpiceJet Only
text:
SpiceJet is the best domestic airline in India.
I wish I was traveling more within India, just to fly Spice.

title: best flight for short duration travels
text:
this is one of the most affordable flight in India. Specially recommended for short duration journeys because for long duration it is bit expensive coz u require some additional services like Extra leg room , meal services, etc which make it overall cost more. So for short period journey this flight is more suitable as well as affordable.
#goforspicejet.

title: Nice Flight
text:
Flight is in budget, Nice Flight with enough space.
A/C needs to be put in more power rest all are nice

title: Average Experience
text:
Recently travelled from Bangaluru to Mumbai in first week of July. My personal experience was not so good kind of. We had been traveling as a group of 12 passengers and have a combined ticket. We tried to check in well before more than 2 and half hours, so no crowd at the counters. Just an hour earlier we travelled from Lucknow to Bangalore on GoAir but we did not have excess luggage problem but at SpiceJet Counter the lady shocked us by saying we have excess of appx 20 kha and need to pay Rs. 12000 odd amount. We tried to convince her about our prior flight and the same luggage was there with us with no addition. But the ladies at counter did not budge. We even tried convinced her about our hand baggage which was average 4 Ks per person... But nothing to avail. Finally we paid Rs. 4000 to settle the matter after transferring most of the items to hand baggage. All this was happening at the counter for 30 minutes. We had to open our bags in the queue to transfer the luggage to hand baggage. A horrible experience.... To add to the agony the flight was delayed around 1.5 hrs than the scheduled departure.

The flight looked ok but the leg room was not enough to accommodate a tall person and found inconvenient... The in flight service was ok not matching to international standards...

I shall try to avoid SpiceJet as far as possible....

title: Reasonable price if you put up with advertisements
text:
I took the 8.50 am flight from Mumbai.  The good thing is that it is the first Spicejet flight of the morning for that aircraft, so all on time.  
Cost of ticket was very reasonable.

Before the journey SpiceJet rties to call you and sell a Rs1000 package for meal, extra bag and choice of seat.  I did not find any need for it.

In the flight, there are product advertisements, which is irritating.  But from next time onward, I will just plug in my headphones and ignore these announcements and reject the marketing calls.

Not bad for an on time flight, basic service.  For a 1hour 50 min flight very reasonably priced.

title: Rough Landing
text:
Probably the prevailing weather conditions clubbed with a propellor - engine driven aircraft could be the reason for rough landing, I can still feel the pain in my lower back or may be I was seated in the last row.....only waheguru knows..

Nothing much to say. The most hilarious part is when a desi Copilot makes an announcement in Firang accent..just love to hear it over & over..ha ha

title: Good Experience
text:
" On 21st March, we began our religious pilgrimage from Mumbai to Amritsar, in a big group [ Jatthaa ] consisting of mostly elderly Ladies & Gents, whom we refer to as "SEVADAARS". Somehow, the crew & cabin attendants were in-sync with the requirements eg. smooth take-off, turbulent free flight, good landing..etc.

All in all good beginning for a pious journey..."

Like someone has said::"well begun is half the battle won..."

title: On time flight
text: Flight was on-time, smooth boarding. Air craft was too noisy, it seems that it need maintenance. Staffing was good.

title: SpiceJet
text: Second Time Scary Check In Staff, reached at 6:02 pm for a 6:45 pm flight and i was denied boarding with just a cabin baggage. I had to argue with the supervisor, who realized that the flight was delayed by 30 minutes and had no choice but to give me my Boarding Pass. Imagine if the followed the same rules for pro rate refund of flight ticket amount for delays caused and loss of prospective business at destination city...

title: Flight was delayed for more than one hour
text: I understand that it can happen but it was not properly communicated at the boarding gate. They were changing the time in by 15 minutes and had no clue why it is so happening or they do not want to tell the customers.

title: Decent cost effective flight
text: Overall the flight was good and on time. The flights are smaller flights and have less space for your carry on luggage.

title: on time
text: travel in spicejet in july 2018 from dubai to amritsar.....flight is nice nd reach before time. food served is very good and tasty. so my experince is very good flying first time with spice jet

title: Very Nice budget airlines
text: Spice jet is very nice budget airlines for frequent flyers. I have travelled one time from Dubai to Kochi & back with family. I booked the ticket through Cleartrip. As it is budget airlines we have to pay extra for food. Leg space is less. Very nice in-flight service.

title: They put me through HELL
text: Their plane was 4 hours late which would make me miss my connecting flight so they gave me direct booking. But at the international airport, they wanted to see my credit card. The number did not match what was in their record. I explained that of course it would not match -  I booked with Flight Network through Skyscanner. Flight Network used their own credit card to place my booking. Then Spice Jet said I should book that same flight using my cash or credit card! But already had that booking. It was their plane being late the caused this problem in the first place. Now it's my fault? I was arguing with them until my plane flew off without me. I missed 2 flights with them over what I would consider mindless incompetence. By the time I left New Delhi airport, I was there for 29 hours! I would caution everyone from taking a flight with Spice Jet. they put me through hell. I wrote to the Customer Service, Nodal Officer, Appellate Department and even the CEO to complain about this. They stubbornly stuck to their version that it was my fault because i was carrying a foreign credit card and the number did not match. No matter how I reasoned with them they stuck to their stupid policy.

title: No checked baggage
text: We bought through kiwi.com the flight from Jaipur to Delhi, including 1 cabin and 1 checked baggage per person. At the counter at Jaipur they didn't recognized our purchase (even showing them the bill). At the end, we had to pay for a second time the luggage. I travel to India every year and this is the only time it happens to me.

title: Pathetic customer service
text:
Very pathetic customer service by Spicejet 
Even they are very lazy to correction name and all
I spoke with lady over phone don't know her name but she was feeling very frustrating while talking 
Dear team Spicejet very worst experience first time and last time it's better to educate your staff

title: Poor Service
text: SpiceJet offers a very poor service as always. They should train the staff on what hospitality is. They did not allow additional 2 kgs in the luggage and I had to throw off few items. There is no courtesy while talking. The baggage was mishandled and was damaged. Not a good experience.

title: Not a great experience. A320 flights of other airlines seems to have much more leg room.
text: Not so great considering you get much more leg room on other A320 flights. The flight was delayed for 1 hour.

title: Best flight to return to Kolkata
text: The flight experience was great. There attendants were very helpful. It was a part lunch flight so very convenient as I got some more time to spend at the island.

title: Not a good flight
text: That was an international flight, but they had not any features for that. They charged me more before the gate to give me the premium economy but those chairs were in front of the emergency exit door, and the back of the seats did not bend. You have to buy everything. I paid for 10 AED, but it was so awful that I could not drink it. Also, their food was horrible. I never use this flight again.

title: Spicy Journey
text: Great experience, by this journey I realized that evening departures are always memorable, filled with amazing views of nature from sky.

title: Very good experience
text: Travelled from Chennai to Mangalore.Flight departure and landing on time.Overall good experience.Service by Spicejet staff is good.

title: Not a good flight to travel
text: What a horrible flight! We were flying from Delhi to Gkp . Flight was smelling like a pee and there were so many fly in the aircraft . We have never seen any flight like that .

title: Refreshing change
text:
One of the rare occasions where I had to fly SpiceJet since my other 2 preferred carriers didn't have any options around the same time of my travel. Since my travel time is more than 2 hours for any trip, I prefer not to take chances with any other airline. SpiceJet was a chance that I took and was a mixed experience of sorts. The start off wasn't very great, since the take off was delayed by 30 mins, which eventually was covered up and we reached our destination on time. 

Coming to the inflight service, most of the airline companies don't provide with options for the onboard corporate meals. It's mostly a packed meal box having a dry sandwich with a tetrapack juice, making the entire experience go down south. I was hoping for the same with SpiceJet and was pleasantly surprised that they had more options to choose from, right from hot meals to subs and ready to eat options. I opted for one of their hot meals and was served promptly hot and fresh, surely a thumbs up from my side. 

They need to work on a few minor aspects, their inflight entertainment- SpicEngage wasn't up, though each of the headrests had them prominently displayed, that was one disappoinment there, wash rooms needed cleaning, overall the cabin was clean, staff was polite and courteous, landing was smooth as was the overall experience.

 Would I fly them again, I surely would, hoping that they would take care of their minor glitches and raise their bar even further!

title: Spicemax
text:
Famous for ontime flights, it will be better if you opt Spicemax.
You get priority booking( no need to stand in long queue), higher leg space, priority baggage dely , chair if reqd. and above all the extra attention on ground.
In air the staff treats all as equal. That's also good.
You will get a choice of delicious small pack of food and beverage,
This airline is good for short distance upto 2 hrs.

title: A good airline gone bad now
text:
Once upon a time it was a great budget airline with very good air hostesses and stewards. They would pride themselves on their punctuality and service. 

Now you can make out the decay setting in and nothing seems right. You can expect last moment cancellations on technical grounds which force you to buy very expensive tickets on the last moment from other airlines. You can ruin all your holiday plans even when you have confirmed tickets

title: Spicejet in Delhi-Leh route
text:
Not a great flight .. leg space was pathetic. The flight was delayed and ground staffs are not in a position to inform the departure time and other relevant information. 

Please avoid Spicejet in Delhi-Leh route

title: Best budgeted domestic flight
text:
Though there was heavy rain in Mumbai and therefore, there was little disruption in flight schedules, the legroom, seat comfort and customer service is one of the best in the domestic flight service providers.
It was not only pocket friendly flight but also the best in the domestic category. I always prefer spice jet flight which has shown great interest in regional connectivity and affordable flights. It has always an edge over other service providers. 
I had nice meal too in flight.

title: Great Flight
text: We flew from Tirupati to Mumbai on Spicejet and we found the service and the sense of time of the flight crew commendable. Highly recommended sector to travel on Spicejet. The flight attendant went out her way to provide us with free coffee when the flight got a little delayed to land in Mumbai due to weather conditions. If I am not mistaken her name was Sonia Iyer.

title: Never take Spice jet for Goa Travel
text: Same small plane that we had to take from Mumbai to Goa. Sadly since the tickets were non refundable, we had no choice but to take Spice Jet on our return too. There is no inflight entertainment system, no leg room.. no space. It was an hour and a half of pure uncomfortable torture. Whoever planned the seating, must have thought Indian are midgets. Anyone over 5feet 2 inches could never be comfortable in that leg room

title: Worst Domestic Carrier
text:
SpiceJet us probably the worst flight to take to Goa.

We had a flight at 12.30am, which got delayed by over an hour. To add to the trouble, the flight is cramped like hell. We wanted to upgrade to business class by paying the difference in fair, but their business class is a joke. Just one row, with little more leg room. No blankets or pillows. It's like travelling like cattle.

title: delay
text: late departure by more than ah hour yes served dinner food platter for it.  but delay departure.  good staff and quality service for money but delay.

title: Currently the best Low Cost Carrier in India
text: What a change this airline has made since my last trip. The airplane is clean and in a very good condition. The staff have new uniforms and are extremely efficient and always smiling. I had a chat with Samhita who was sitting across me during take off and landing. She was very polite and extremely proud of her airline and was very happy with her job. Definitely stood out amongst the crew. They have a service called Spicemax which gives you priority boarding, seats with more leg room and a complimentary meal. Was pleasantly surprised that they offered us a hot meal. The other airlines don't do this. The meal with aloo paratha, chicken, pasta and desert was very very tasty. Felt like I was travelling Business Class. Will surely fly in this airline in the future.

title: Getting to Chennai from Mangalore
text:
Quickest in a flying time of less than 90 minutes.
Apprehension due to monsoon conditions but was a smooth ride.Unfortunate that there were no complementary  food and drinks on board .Such service used to be good time pass and kept mind engaged but sadly missing.Great ride , Overall !

title: Amazing Customer service and Ontime flight
text: The flight was clean and the attendants were super friendly, courteous, and professional! Their ever smiling faces and great attitudes in spite of some jerks as passengers was just incredible, making the flight experience wonderful. To top it all, the flight was on time :)

title: It‚Äôs really true: ‚Äúspice in the jet‚Äù
text: Well I think they need to buy new planes, cause it was horrible to travel in those old Boeing‚Äôs,else their ground staff is way better, courteous at least.

title: Old planes, basic service
text: The planes are pretty old. Hardly any leg room on the flight. Bombardier planes are really bad to travel.

title: Our checked in baggage was tampered & we incurred a heavy loss
text:
Our checked in baggage was tampered with & valuable jackets, expensive perfumes & chocolates were stolen. We were on a connecting flight to Chandigarh from domestic terminal so had no time to lodge a complaint. Notified supervisor & Check in counter staff. On our return we emailed the Airline. They gave lame excuses and failed to compensate. Our research on the internet reveals that there had been many cases filed ion India where compensation was paid but since we do not live therte it is not worthwhile to file a suit.
Travel with your hand luggage & be careful at Delhi Airport

title: Hot meals
text: My flight got delayed, but it was announced well in advance. The leg room was good and the journey was comfortable. I was impressed with the hot and tasty vegetarian meals offered.

title: They have changed, but still OK
text: I have been flying SpiceJet sine they started. They were awesome at first, even inviting me into the pilots cockpit to talk with them and see the instruments. They gave good snacks and everything was clean and good. Now, after the airlines changed hands, it has gone down in service, and quality. I don't even get messages on my phone from them. I didn't even get an acknowledgement of my flight from them one time. On the plane, it is quite simple. Take your own food. They do give snacks. They get you where you are going. But they have changed. I still fly them. Their timing is good.

title: Flight Delayed by more than 2 hours!
text:
Extremely poor and disappointing service by SG on this flight. till the time of 5 mins prior to the boarding it was not announced that the flight was delayed or AOG. they kept changing flights until they told that a spare flight is being flown in from Rajamundry. also the staff at the gate were interns and could not handle the questions of the pax while the SG management kept quiet.
this ticket was booked by our organisations's travel agent and have told them never to book me with SG again! i had a terrible experience a few months back as well and i have promised myself i will never fly this airline even if they offer seats for cheap!

title: A nice surprise!
text:
It's been sometime I had taken spicejet flight .... past experience were bad, thus having to switch to other operators.

Expecting similar experiences of the past ... I was pleasantly surprised.... be it the timely departure/ arrival. Helpful and welcoming ground/on board crew. On board services etc. Guess it made me change my opinion of the airline ..... maybe I'll fly more of Spicejet hence forth.

title: never on time
text: it's the most pathetic airline with no respect at all for their customer's valuable time......they won't understand that people books the flight are time savers for themselves as or otherwise they might choose another options......this morons don't bother and care for their passenger.....every 15 minutes my flight is getting delyed and delayed...... don't trust them......they are not more then tortoise

title: Seat not good
text:
Mere pyare dosto agar aap spice me jate to please spice me sirf chay wafer biskit thik hai par gakti se indian food jeerarice
Dalmakhani and paneer ki dish 360 ki aati hai woh khate hi muje ulti aa gayi to please food avoid kare only coldrink and biskit etc no punjabi food please ise ignore na karna kyon yeh khake meri tabiyat bahut hi bigad gayi thai

title: claim not met
text:
First   morning departure to Mumbai was perfect and on time ..the return was delayed almost two hours . Services at airport and inflight were satisfactory and pleasant.Wish  they were more transparent about delays ..could've planned a good dinner in Mumbai :-) had to make do with 
really lousy airport food .

title: ‚ÄúPathetic service‚Äù can be termed as a polished comment
text:
It is an astonishing ‚Äúcustomer service‚Äù experience with SpiceJet and would be the last one to recommend it again for any travel. 
Had to wait in the waiting lounge after making security check at Patna airport. No update from Airline members (even not found in waiting area) till 2120 hrs wherein flight scheduled to depart @ 2135 hrs.

Not recommended and pathetic experience. Do not have trust whether I will reach my destination in good condition.

title: Cordial Crew Little leg space
text: Check in was fine. Seats were tightly packed with little leg space. Air hostesses were cordial. Take off was in time and so was the landing that was smooth and caused least pressure in the ears,.

title: Most improved airline.
text:
It has become vibrant and fresh. Food has also improved. Timeliness also.

If you want value for money. Just go for it

title: Spice-less- jet
text: If u thot Low cost Airlines is no food think again- Spicejet Airhostess says NO Service & NO smile buddy!!!!! Entire crew seemed to be in ‚Äúbad hair day‚Äù mood. üò™üòí

title: Flight cancellation and harrowing time at Bangkok airport
text:
Me & my family suffered as our flight from Bangkok to Delhi on Spicejet (SG 088 departing at 3:50 AM) got cancelled due to a crack in the cockpit windscreen. Spicejet doesn't have any alliance with any airline - so no other flight was offered, other than their own same flight (SG 088) the day after. No assistance was offered by Spicejet ‚Äì there was only one staff member to handle 100+ passengers. 

I could not spend another couple of days with my family in Bangkok who were already exasperated & miserable due to the delay first for about three hours (from around 3:50 AM to 7 AM Thailand time) and finally the cancellation announcement (around 7 AM) of the late night flight. Note that we reached the airport 3 hours before flight departure time ‚Äì so we were at the airport from around 12:30 AM till about 9 AM (taking into account clearing immigration again, and finding a hotel near the airport and then booking it while at the airport only) - a total of more than 7 hours. My wife couldn't sleep and my son was crying. I also was shivering due to the air-conditioning and had to take a quick decision and booked an alternate flight on Thai Airways for Rs 76000 for 3 persons (since it was a last minute booking) - which was the cheapest direct flight showing at that time. 

Though Spicejet refunded the airfare for Bangkok to Delhi sector and offered compensation as per current laws which is Rs 10,000 or base fare + fuel surcharge : whichever is lower (basic fare was lower in our case and there was no fuel surcharge). I still ended up losing Rs 25,000 on new flight ticket cost alone. ICICI Lombard travel insurance did not honour the claim stating that flight cancellation due to "technical reasons" is not covered. One of the prime reasons for taking travel insurance is for flight cancellation. Flight cancellation & interruption cover of ICICI Lombard is only applicable if flight is cancelled due to - Earthquake, Storm, flood, inundation, cyclone, tempest, fog (optional cover) and Terrorism. 

PS The inconvenience faced and seeing your family suffer - are something that no airline or insurance policy will cover. Rights of average Indian traveller are very limited, and we are left at the mercy of big corporations.

title: Wish their seats were better & had a bit more leg room
text:
The seats on this flight are really tight, be it width or the leg room, even if you pay for premium seats
The Snacks served on board were decent & the flight crew was courteous.

title: Pune Bangalore
text: Took an afternoon flight to Bangalore. The flight time is around one and a half hours. The check-in was smooth, and the flight was on time. The plane was clean and staff was courteous .

title: okay
text: I've flown them a few times for domestic flights in India.  I've never had a problem with them.  You have to purchase food, so do so ahead of time to save money or bring your own snacks.

title: Okay for India
text: I had booked especially a flight with the lunch included ...  The lunch was okay but already at the second row, they didn't have any choice in drinks for the menu ...   they should have a bit more stock, also in case if someone further down the plane who didn't book any food wants to buy something to drink !

title: Travel with tooooooo many sidecosts
text: It is a decent airline, but they have a charge for everything - food, bags, seat, etc.  The pricing is confusing as you are not too sure what the final cost of the ticket will be.  Initially, it seems a decent price for the ticket, then when you add up all the other costs of travel, you feel slighted.

title: Worst airline when it comes to checkin
text:
Never have I ever got the opportunity of visiting a screwed web checkin service like SpiceJet. The weird part is they are so keen on making money that they are stupid enough to allow you to web checkin for 2 tickets but won't let you 2 consecutive seats because they want to make money out of every aisle and window seat. The only option that is available for you while doing web checkin is obviously the middle seat of every row and why would 2 people traveling together book 2 seats in different rows.

It's difficult to imagine that SpiceJet is so stupid to not select 2 consecutive seats to tickets booked together because they are too greedy to let you sit together.

Sad that I couldn't give negative stars else would have definitely given that.

title: Holidays
text: Cheap and best airline.. The distance was supposed to be covered in 45 mins and they made it so easy and on time we were in doon airport in 30 minutes. I would say it is a nice airline to travel with..

title: Excellent effort by Airline staff for ontime departure and arrival
text: I have been using Spicejet on and off but surely not on regular basis. Recently I travelled with Spicejet from Kochi-Mumbai sector and I also purchased another ticket for my daughter to travel by Spicejet on another date in MUM-Kochi sector. The booking was done through Cleartrip as they were not charging for seat (middle one - while Spicejet website booking charges for middle seat). The check-in process was very smooth through web-check and it allows you to check-in soon after ticket purchase. The flight boarding was very smooth and the flight left in time and arrived in time. Even my daughter's flight left before time and reached before time and baggage was cleared in few minutes. The staff were good and they charge at standard airline rate for eatables during the flight. Cabin crew were also nice. Good experience.

title: on time arrivals and departures
text: the flight was on time and it was via Cochin, everything was on time and service was good, the only problem is you have to re-check-in at cochin domestic airport on your way back from male to Mumbai

title: BAD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
text:
On June 7th 2018 I flew with Spice Jet from Dharamsala to Delhi
Upon arrival I was told that my bags did not arrive with us as they were not put on the plane.
I had to take another flight back home to Israel and could not wait for the bags to arrive the following day as I would miss my connection.
After speaking to numerous representatives (none of which seem to be able to help me ‚Äì or didn‚Äôt want to) as they continuously pass me to a different representative each time. After sending all the required documents to Spice Jet I was finally promised that I had sent you all the relevant information in order to receive our bags.
It was then brought to my attention that I also require a travel certificate from the airline I flew with back to Israel.
It‚Äôs as if Spice Jet is doing everything it can in order not to send my luggage to Israel.
I have yet to receive a plausible explanation as to why this is so difficult to send two bags to Israel (mine and my wife‚Äôs) 
This is absurd and frustrating that it has to take so long to get my luggage.
We had a wonderful time in India on our honeymoon and it took one bad experience with spice Jet (which is still continuing to this day) to leave on a bad note of our time spent in India

It has now been more than a month since we returned from India and we still haven‚Äôt received our bags or any semblance of assistance in this matter.
It has become a daily routine to call and hope that some one on the other end will call (which never happens).
Even though I was promised that a representative will get back to me.
This feels like it is becoming hopeless as we have some expensive items in the bags 
Please, I am asking you politely to help bring this matter to an end

title: Over charged services
text: I booked the privileged seats(spice max) in the airline where they promised of giving seats with extra leg space, priority check-in and complimentary food.  There was nothing called as priority check-in and extra leg space. The amount I paid in advance for food was also wastage as it is better to purchase food in airline and as per one's hunger. I will advise everyone not to go for these options as we just end-up paying huge and actually avail nothing. The AC (Air conditioning) was also not working.

title: Jabalpur Airport check in counter experience
text:
I reached airport just in time to catch the flight. Staff at the check in counter was extremely courteous and provided me seat of my choice and assisted me in handling my cabin baggage while boarding the aircraft. Spice Jet is maintaining time schedule and the aircrafts are extremely clean inside.
I would recommend to use this airline frequently.

title: Great Airline
text: This is a nice airline to fly. I opted for SpiceMAX which gives me extra leg room seats. I actually found that the extra leg room seats at the Exit over the wings is one of the best in the industry compared to other airlines. The staff is smart and efficient, friendly. The meal and snack choice is also pretty good. Overall a good experience

title: Improved
text:
Hospitality improved and Good in comparison to other Low Cost Carrier.
Even seat comfort is good.
Overall cost-effective+Before Time+Comfort...
Other Airlines should learn Management from SpiceJet Team.

title: Nice trip
text: We went to Shirdi via Pune through Spicejet from Chennai.Every thing was nice . Every time they are maintaining perfect timing

title: Spicemax not good enough
text:
Spicemax is not value for money and responses were pathetic when asked in the counter. The helpline says baggage allowance is increased, counter person refuses to discuss. Cannot find immediately what's included !!! 
As not transparent in the charges Spice jet to be avoided.  If travelling don't get caught in the gimmicks. 
Amit

title: Horrible Experience
text:
I had Spice Jet flight from Gorakhpur to Delhi on July 07 , 2018.I really regret taking this Spice Jet flight from Gorakhpur, U.P. It was horrible experience and I would never fly again with Spice Jet in my life.It starts with checkin of my baggage . When reached to the counter , the Spice Jet staff (Mr.Aman) asked me to take my baggage to the other side and he needs to weigh it separately. Then he kept me waiting for at least 45 minutes. While waiting on the counter, I was witnessing How Mr Aman and other staff were rude to other customers as well. They were treating like if u want to fly , you need to obey them..otherwise you'll be left behind. Even for small small questions, they were getting frustrated and were responding to customers so arrogantly that customers were quite frightened. Spice Jet, you need to understand that most of the travelers who reach airport will be in state that they have been delayed. As responsible service provider, you need to console them they need not to worry ..rather them scolding them why are they late and they will be left behind. There was one lady with a kid who wasn't having any ID as still she was so young to have any aadhar card or any form of ID. And Mr Aman was was scolding like either you bring the ID or you'll be barred to get inside the flight. After the Argument , station manager Mr GK Singh arrived, and he was super rude as compare to Mr Aman. Even Mr GK Singh threatened that lady to throw out of the airport with the help of security personnels. Dude , there are better ways to handle the situation, at least you can be calm and explain the rules politely. Why are you being so rude and arrogant? And then there were travelers with baggage having extra weights. At this point Mr Aman has his staff were showing their true face. They were bargaining customers to pay extra INR 2400 even if the weight is 1 KG extra. and then slowly they will lower the rate to 2000, then 1500, 1000 etc. With one customer, they settled down for INR 500 only? Spice Jet, if you have a really rule and policy for baggage ..then why are you negotiating with price? Is this the way you loot customers? I'm flying for last 10 years , and have never seen such kind of bargaining with luggage price at the airport. Every airlines either they show some courtesy to allow the baggage or they charge some fixed price . They never negotiate . Then why some different rule at Gorakhpur station ? Are these Spice Jet staff at Gorakhpur station getting some commission based on how much they have looted customers ? There was one traveller who told clearly that rather he will throw the stuff rather than paying INR 2400 for them as they are worth of very less. And He started arranging his stuff and taking out some boxes which were un-important. At this point station Manager GK Singh would come to that passenger and threatened him that his baggage will not be scanned again if he doesn't pack the bag within 5 minutes? Dude, again arrogance ..why ? Can't you be nice to passenger ?  And when my turns come , I was well prepared what I need to do.
