When Mr Aman weighed my baggage , it was 1.5 KG extra weight.Mr Aman quoted me INR 2400 for the extra weight. I asked him to weight and took out 2 boxes of sweets which I was taking to US for my friends. I gave those sweets to other airport staff. After that my baggage was under 15 KG. While I was arranging my stuff, again Station Manager Mr GK Singh came to me and threatened that within 5 minutes I need to complete checkin other wise they will close the door. Some how I packed all my stuff and was able to get inside the flight just 5 minutes before. Though I have reached airport 1 hour before and there were passengers who came after me, but were able to get inside the flight before me.
This was really horrible experience and would regret taking Spice jet flight from Gorakhpur airport.Spice Jet , you need to really train your Gorakhpur Airport staff ,make them to visit at other airports and show them how nicely other airlines staff behave at all other airports. 
I think this problem is only with Gorakhpur Airport as its being a new airport with fewer flights, staff are in the typical mind set of like typical Government office staffs Spice jet , if you think  because there are not enough competitors, you can act and behave the way you want. Then don't worry , customers have thrown many many renowned companies out of business because of their unfriendly customer policies.

title: My air travel, spicejet review
text: My view on jotting down a Spicejet Review. I saw a heavy rush during morning hours at Delhi airport, which is a common knowledge and most people will try & reach early to avoid any unwanted issues. However, nothing can prepare you for long queues and that too, Delhi crowd!  However, I am amazed at the level-headedness and dexterity of the ground staff at airports. In this case, SpiceJet who manage such an unruly crowd so nonchalantly that gives the most seasoned customer care professionals goosebumps in their midsection. Within 10 mins I had my boarding pass and then ushered to the waiting coach whizzing past the security check. Kudos to Priyanka, the check-in counters executive and thank you to SpiceJet.

title: Comfort finds You in Air
text: The fight for giving you comfort in air... Ground service is excellent too .... covers most sectors in India :)

title: Not a pleasant journey
text: The cabin became hot ad stuffy and all the passengers were uncomfortable the reason given the AC was switched off for some time. The cabin crew kept touching their hair to push them back and serving the food which looked unhygienic. The touch down was delayed and hence was hard and as the turning was approaching after air brakes, reverse thrust and brakes I felt that emergency breaks were applied and this resulted in our head almost hitting the head rest of the seat in front.

title: Beware! The NEW SpiceJet may catch you unaware.
text:
So the point is, when the competition hits hard and margins squeeze, fuel prices increase and so on, what does an airline do - resort to service degradation? That is what I felt on my recent flight from New Delhi to Mumbai on June 21st, 2018.

I booked tickets for two through EaseMyTrip dot com (who should share a part of the blame) in good faith, and just like most Indians went for the 'best deal' and time that suited my convenience. Did a web check in prior to the trip as well - all In Good Faith. Atleast one week prior to the trip I started getting a whole series of marketing SMS and phone calls from their executives trying to push me hard for upgrades, add ons and what not (none of which I needed nor bought). Upon reaching the check in counter and handing over my - well within limit - one check in bag per ticket, within 15 kgs limit, the lady at the counter again first pitched an upgrade at an extra charge which I politely said no to. What followed was shocking - I was told that I need to pay Rs. 800 to check in the two bags since there was NO check in baggage allowed on my ticket!! I was zapped completely since nowhere in this whole while I was at all aware or made aware of (this could have been done instead of sales pitch for upgrades) either by SpiceJet or EaseMyTrip. Infact this was the first time I got to know of a provision of no check in baggage. I only felt cheated. Moreover the lady at the airport was impolite and seemingly unhappy that my not going for upgrades. A better handling may have helped.

My advice on the above: Double check your air tickets hereon when travelling by SpiceJet or any other low cost carrier so as to avoid unpleasant surprises. 

Two, possibly it was a bad day for the airline and me - there was a piece of charcoal in my food (bought a chicken tikka roll). My idea not being harassing the staff or being rude in any matter, I quietly showed the sample to the flight attendants, took a few pictures and they acknowledged the problem. Yes, such things can happen accidentally - but better checks are required especially when you are running a mega brand and not a restaurant.

Sent multiple messages to SpiceJet on their social media on this, did not get even a single response. Shape up or Ship out guys!

title: Chaotic Disembarking
text:
Check-in : Smooth and fast
Boarding: Chaotic, Long and slow aero-bridge Qs
In-flight Entertainment: None
In-flight Dining: BYO
Air Crew: Polite and friendly
Disembarking: Shocking, people started getting off their seats even before the aircraft left the main runway and the crew were least bothered

title: Good to Fly
text: Just ok. And I like it to go to Chennai within a short time from Dhaka. My experience is good and next time I try it.

title: Not Very Great , Not bad either
text:
I flew SG197 recently from Delhi - Bangalore. Check in at Delhi was smooth. Boarding was done before the time printed on boarding gate with out any announcement & intimation, hence people were confused . Pilot announced before time departure once the gate was closed & the flight was stranded in take off que for more than 40 minutes with out any announcement & passengers were informed only when we reached no 2 in que. Even the in flight crew were clue less what was happening & finally the flight took off & landed full 40 minutes later than schedule contrary to Pilots proud announcement of Before time. Inflight food was good I should say, though the crew were confused between the terms of Confident or Attitude. Overall lot of improvement compared to my previous spice jet flight. But overall for both Spice jet & Indigo should make Mahatma Gandhi's below quote as their mandatory Prayer for all the crews: 
 "A Customer is the most important visitor on our premises. He is not dependent on us. We are dependent on him. He is not an interruption in our work. He is the Purpose of it. He is not an outsider in our Business. He is part of it.We are not doing a favor by serving him . He is doing us a favor by giving us an opportunity to do so

title: Great to fly with Charmin ladies..
text:
I have flown in many aircraft's but I should tell you that we had a superb experience travelling from Mumbai to kolkata on spicejet. The crews were super helpful. Special kudos to the most charming lady Rashma sardar who managed to serve us with a smile even on her last flight for the day. Great job team such kind of service will lead spicetjet long way. I would rate 10 for rashma s outstanding service..

Kaushik Paul seat no 30abc

Date 6/72018

Mumbai to kolkata

title: OK
text: Just ok. Being a no frills airline one cannot expect much. Leg room is just enough. Paid snacks are rather poor. Cleanliness is not all that great,

title: Only option from Jabalpur to Mumbai
text:
SpiceJet is the only airlines which operates from Jabalpur to Mumbai. Being only airlines, it is very expensive. Average fair is around Rs 7000. Now a days air fares are affordable and almost at par with Rajdhani 2nd AC. But on this route airlines charges very high. Govt need to intervene any fix the air fare on remote routes.
Flight was on time and landed at Mumbai before scheduled time. Other option from Jabalpur to Mumbai is either take a train or travel to Nagpur/ Raipur/ Bhopal to take flight. There are lot of flight option from these cities.

title: Corporate meal was a let down and so was legroom
text: Took this flight yesterday. Check-in was smooth, boarding was smooth,  flight was on time, crew uniforms crisp. Food options for corporate booking was a big let down. Maybe they can improve on it with more options depending on time of flight. Upon arrival luggage took long time. Mumbai airport takes a huge lead in luggage arrival and Kolkata spicejet operations can take a cue from them

title: Pleasant Flight
text:
This definitely must be the best second-homecoming for Spice.

The flight was clean and airy to begin with.
The in-flight attendants were very enthusiastic which helped us settle down sooner into our journey. They had a smile throughout and were eager to attend to us.
The food served was economical and tasty and rather better than what was served in other airlines
The new attire of the cabin attendants looks extremely trendy and they all looked wonderful in it.
The leg space again was surprisingly better than other airlines and the width of the seat was good too.
Overall, no nonsense service with better than our expected service and food and on-time arrival was something we saw and that is all we need, don't we?

title: Average flight experience.
text:
No Trouble in Boarding .
SpiceMax seat was purchased so seats were having sufficient leg room.
On board food is just OK
Cabin Crews are helpful.

Flight was delayed by 20 mins , no communication made. Even Spicejet was informed of preponement of flight SG438 from Mumbai to Bagdogra by 15 minute.

title: Economical travel
text: Service is okay, staff is helpful and now a days there is less delay.  Best part is travel is economical.

title: Spice Jet
text:
Flights are good but the team fails to communicate delay and cancellation of flights.Alternate flights were not arranged by them.Passengers need to cry fowl to get alternate arrangements.Spice jet fails to understand that Customers pulse.I had given a Neutral rating as it happened for one instance.

Suggest to go with Airindia or other flights for Kashmir as Cheap flights like spice jet  has its Impact sometimes.

title: Not Good
text: The Seats in State AC buses are better than this flight.Most of the seats on that flight was old and the appearance of seat was like greasy or oily one.

title: WORTHY SERVICE
text: starting with the bad experience, they didn't allow me to drop in my baggage 3hr before departure, I had to wait outside the check-in area where there was nothing to kill your time. The priority service is average. The boarding was on time, on schedule departure at STD, and as i have purchased SPICEMAX scheme, I was provided with an extra-legroom, hot meals, and a priority baggage out at the arrival in Agartala. The flight was absolutely amazing, smooth landing and before time arrival.

title: We had a connecting flight from Delhi to Kolkata,then to silchar.The flight from Delhi to Kolkata ,then to Silchar
text: It was one of the worst experiences that one would like to never experience it again.We landed at Kolkata by Sg-263 time 5.55am -8.05am flight on 29th of November 2017 and we had a connecting flight to Silchar by SG-219 at 12.05pm-01.45pm on 29th of November 2017. The boarding was supposed to be started and just at around 12pm,it was intimated the flight noSG-219 is delayed and no concrete reason was given as to why it was delayed.There was complete unprofessional behaviour from the SpiceJet staff at Kolkata airport,none of them seem to CO-operate.They were just passing the bucks on one another.At around 2pm finally we were told the flight is cancelled and I was told that since I have a small baby,we would be given accommodation and put on the next flight that is on 30th of November.We had to run from pillar to post for the accommodation.What surprised me was the sheer irresponsible behaviour of the staff.Nobody was willing to help us accommodate at the guest house in the airport but they have previously promised that they would provide the accommodation at the airport only because we had a small baby.Our patience was tested and I was not willing to listen to any excuses and around 4pm I said I will file a complaint at The V.P HR department.Fortunately we got the accommodation at the airport only and next day we boarded the flight in the morning and reached Silchar.It was a very disappointing service below par from a well known domestic carrier.

title: Worst ever experience.
text: This s the third time it‚Äôs happening to me this year .. aircraft has technical problem . That‚Äôs what they say and make me wait for 12 hours minimum to arrange another ticket. Such lame and laid back people who manipulate customers . They announced the problem after indigo flight took off so that we won‚Äôt change to that . Will never fly again by spicejet.Learnt my lesson

title: The flight reached before time.
text: Astonishing to reach home beforetime for  this Spicejet flight.Smooth journey with my wife and friends.Everybody were satisfied.

title: On time rather before time arrival
text:
The flight took off on time and reached the destination before time. The baggage also came on the belt almost immediately.
Thanks for quick and efficient service.

title: Sub class carieer
text: Very sad and horrid airlines would never suggest it to others! The airport staff were very impertinent

title: On Time Performance
text:
Their punctuality is the major contributor of their growth in India . Handling of passengers and customer service is very good . Snack served on the flight was lousie . It is better to serve a good and tasty snack otherwise they should discontinue .
Amolak Rattan Kohli
Former Governor of Mizoram

title: On time from New Delhi to Kolkata
text: It was a mixed experience..I think my daughter enjoyed a lot..Studying for the examination on the next day..

title: HARASSMENT by the  check in staff
text: When  I  tried  to  check in,I  asked  for  an  aisle  seat.Then the  officer  tried  to sell  me  an  add on  service [  priority seat  + something else] . I  said  that  I  don't want any such extra  add on service and  only  wanted an aisle seat if available. This  made the  officer  very angry. He again asked  me  to  buy the add on service but when I  refused, he  reacted  in  a  very impolite way.When  he  found  that  my  check in  baggage  was  below  15 kgs,he  weighed my cabin baggage  and  found it  overweight and asked  me  to pay for the extra kilos.When  I  said  that  my  cabin baggage  contained food  and  water  and that  I  would  eat them  before  I  board,he  refused  my  check in  without paying for extra kilos,even though I  showed him the items.I  was  forced  to  eat  and  drink  before  checking in.I  found  this  as a  clear act  of  harassment  of the  passenger.I  think  the  Airline  is  giving  incentives  to  check in  officers  to  make  the  passengers  buy  add on  services.Otherwise I  cannot  understand  this  type  of  harassment  by  check in officers !

title: on time from Surat to Delhi clean neat and tidy
text: we had a comfortable journey we very 10 members and all accommodated near to each other wheel chair service was given to elder person no trouble atall

title: Not good even for an Low cost carrier
text:
I travelled with them on a return journey from AMD-MCT. Both booked on spice-max(premium service)
In AMD the check in was hassle free being a premium booking  but the boarding was utter pathetic, they were filling up passengers as if we were going on a school trip. During my return journey there was no fast check-in provided as there were 2 counters only that too they were giving preference to deportee passengers first but due to my luck I came ahead in the line. I would suggest you to have less contact with the crew as they can be rude sometime.
Talking about inflight stuff the seat room wasn't adequate even for a spicemax, Jet Airways provide better leg room is there economy, in my return journey i had to check for bedbug infestation as the seat had symptoms for it.
F&B was good on both the journeys and time reliability was also good, these are only the positives for traveling with them.
BOTTOMLINE: Compared on Mumbai on this particular route they are only the carrier in AMD so calculating all the immigration and stuff they were quick, if you are living nearby i would suggest you to avoid them.

title: holiday
text: delayed departure,unable web check in,chaos at check in counter,staff not courteous,delayed departure as well arrival,no proper communication on this

title: Delayed
text: The problem started right from the beginning with boarding which was started late. The flight was diverted many times and then to BLR for refuelling and somehow reached the destination 4 hours late. Has poor ontime performance rating too.

title: OK about the flight Experience
text:
The Overall Experience is not Great, Server needs to be more professional. I personally felt they where Rude to some Passenger.
It feels either they might be stretch.

title: Doctor
text: Very bad service and airport staff rude and non cooperative both in Delhi as well as in srinagar . I felt they wanted a tip from the passengers . Air Hostes were ok but pilot drove very badly too

title: slow ground staff
text:
No self check-in kiosk were working at 930am. had to wait in Q for 15 min with only 8 passengers in front of me & 4 counters open.
We had to sweat on aero bridge after boarding entry for 11 minutes. the staff at aircraft entry taking the boarding pass was too slow.,
during taxing on runway AC was off for 15min.

title: SpiceJet Flight Review PNQ-DXB
text: I have been flying this sector almost every month for the past 12 months and the airline has consistently been very good in terms of service, cleanliness, on time arrivals. The food is one area which they certainly can improve specially the spice quotient is a bit too much for my liking but overall"Value for Money" experience. The crew is very professional. It would be good to have another private operator on this sector so the service can be compared. Currently the only other carrier operating direct flights on DXB-PNQ-DXB is Air India Express :(.

title: Should me practical and accomodative at least in genuine reason
text: I had no problem from the time of Check in till boarding. All was fine. The flight was also comfortable. The problem is the attitude to earn money even in the flight when the aircraft is air borne. I was on seat no 4 D. The passenger on seat 4 E & F were travelling with an infant kid. Seat nos. 3 A B & C which are paid seats, were vacant. It is obvious that, a small child will get into Childish act. I requested the Cabin crew if I can take 3 D as I was getting disturbed and the fellow passenger was also feeling bad. But I was told to pay for the seat if I want to change as if they will pick up a passenger in the middle of the air.

title: Improved
text: This airlines has improved a lot recently after a lump. As we now have initial owners back it seems picking up the pace in customer service and hospitality were it left. Keep up the good work.. Will see you guys soon.

title: Worst Luggage Handling
text: Baggage handling is so bad.... When I complained for my tear bag (damaged) at Mumbai airport, Asst. Manager asked me do you have any idea where your bag has got damaged like in GOA or MUMBAI??  Worst experience till date.... Also the manager tried to convenience me as they have recruited new staff and because of that it may done... After lots of arguments they offered Rs. 200/- for the damages.... Poor people and Poor airlines.......

title: Flight to home
text: It is a flight I immensely enjoyed for two reasons as Jabalpur airport is the smallest I ever filed and aircraft was 80 sweaters only. Flight reached Delhi before time. Flight from Jabalpur is costly if not booked well in advance and since the aircraft is small do not carry big size hand baggage we usually carry in boing or airbus as baggage hold on top of seat is smaller in size.

title: Suitably timed
text:
Spice jet experience is usually good for the price. Only problem with my last flight was poor quality of announcement. Inattentiveness or poor training ?
But value for money

title: Have improved a lot
text: The on ground staff & cabin crew were really helpful and friendly . Most importantly it was on time and baggage came in the belt really quick. the pre-booked meal was also very nice.

title: Good flight
text: We had a good flight, its less than an hour travel, so didnt expect much. flight arrived late, but the staff manages the time with the turn around time

title: Waiver of Rescheduling charges
text:
My sincere thanks to spicejet team for waiving off my rescheduling charges (PNR: - GDSP2X) on medical ground. I would always refer to others due your excellent service and support.

On the same day i had another ticket booked in Go Air from Bhubaneswar to Kolkatta but that airline didnt respond. 

Again I would like to Thank to entire team for their support and Service.

title: NICE  FLIGHT AT AFFORDABLE PRICE
text: The flight was on time. The behaviour of in-fllight attendants were nice.The take-off, journey and landing were smooth.There should have been more varieties of food. Presently, it is better if you carry your own food,

title: Good flight at affordable price
text: Enjoyed the flying. Landed earlier then the scheduled time .Worth for the Money and service was good

title: On time
text: This was my first international trip with SpiceJet. Cost was very cheap and service was extremely good. No delay in take off . We left correct time from Cochin. Staffs are very helpful and informative. Loved the flight Trip.

title: pathetic airline
text: it was pathetic experience i ever felt from the any airline , we had booked spice max for better comfort and handling but it was pathetic ever i found they charge me 2400/person with return flight and it was my big mistake ever i made at the time of boarding all ordinary support and timing i observed also in flight very much discomfort happening inspite heaving max booking due to non recline seats even though at the time of selling they book this for my younger daughter who is 15 yrs old but in flight at the time of check in they denied for max seat and ask me to call toll free for complaint  so that is also not in good support in all my payments are wasted , also in flight during entire flight we felt suffocation due to non effective Air conditioning systems which is common finomina during return  all max amount gone waste

title: Comfortable Flight and Courteous Staff
text: The journey from Mumbai to Hyderabad was comfortable. The Flight departed on time and reached the destination on time. The Airlines staff was courteous and responsive. Will fly SpiceJet again.

title: Efficient
text:
Except for the problem whilst booking,the staff said that there would be a refund but none was done.

The Airline is as efficient as ever.But the staff on board could definietly ask fro water.

title: Raju
text: Spicejet airline service is worst and staff member are not co operative. they didn't know the value of customer and also the time. please i request you to don't travel with spicejet in future.

title: Good Journey which i went with my family
text: Good Trip which i went with my family. The flight is really good and its on time and we enjoyed the entire trip..

title: Good Flight, Convenient Timing
text: Check-in was conducted with Indifference to the host of lined-up passengers - several check-in Staff were engaged in lengthy small talk while 2 counters were struggling to cope. After reaching the counter, the check-in Staff attended promptly, efficiently & courteously. Dep Gate on the Boarding Pass was different from Actual Dep Gate. There was No Announcement & we went to both Dep Gates - on different floors - to reach the right one. The Flight was Full & left on time. Seats were cramped. The Cabin was uncomfortably  warm on the tarmac & again so at our hopping stop in Kolkata. The Magazine pouch in the front seat had some stiff metal lining which kept pressing against one‚Äôs stretched legs. We had pre-Ordered Lunch- a Veg lunch of Rice & Thai Red Curry & a Non-veg lunch of Rice & Chicken. Both were well made but the quantity was too small - about half a normal lunch. The toilets were clean. The cabin crew were helpful when we could get their attention. Our flight reached Bagdogra about 1/2 hour late. We were OK after the 4-hour flight.

title: Fly spice only if you are not time bound
text:
Spice jet is one of the low cost airline and provide simple service. However they are practically never on time and not reliable.

I was supposed to travel from Chennai to Bangalore in the afternoon flight at 13:35 hrs. On the day of depature, in the morning they called and informed that the flight is cancelled because of some "operational Reasons". After calling the call center they rescheduled me on a 16:55 flight. I reached the airport and it showed as on time. But by the time i reached the gate they anounced a delay of 2 hrs which later became 2.30hrs delay.

of the 25 odd times i have flown by Spicejet, they have been on time only on 4 or 5 occasions. So in short, if you are on low budget fly SPICE jet. but if you are time bound choose Jetairways or Indigo only.

title: can be compared to air asia kind of flights only...
text:
First of all they will put buffet of services and will torture you by multiple calls, messages and mails. We do understand that cost is less for no or less services. They can intimate us once and let us take decision and time.I got call at least five to six times and refused on all. Why they can't feed in there crm at once and don't call again. 
Secondly they don't accept change or less currency notes for eg if i want something for 300 baht ... they will not accept any coin/note below 50 baaht category note. If we are coming back to India we might have coins of 10 baaht or 20 baaht notes but they don't accept.
Third they don't even serve water in free till we ask them.

title: Good and cheap flight
text:
This one of the cheapest and most comfortable ways to travel around in India. If one wants more comfort they can pay Rs. 1000 more and get extra leg space and a complimentary meal. The food they provide is moderately expensive but it is fresh and tasty. 

The cabin crew is hospitable and welcoming. The check in also is done in a professional manner and the queue is also not that long. The flight doesn't offer any find of in flight entertainment except for the complimentary magazine it provides. The flight was on time but got delayed due to traffic at the Delhi airport.

I would definitely recommend this airline if you are travelling on a budget and need to go to a place quickly

title: Nice experience
text: Spicejet offers bare minimum service and you do feel like flying a low cost airline. The staff is nice but the seat quality is poor. At least the cleanliness is good so mot many complaints

title: Luggage Policy
text:
No airline consider laptop and ladies purse. But you employe has harass many travellers. This was my last travel as never I had seen such misbehave in other airline. 

I will prefer to social media to share this new policy from spice jet and suggestion to avoid this airline. Thanks

title: Terrible sector! Don't fly, lest you want to ruin your travels
text: Regular delays of SG 088 from BKK to DEL. Have sent client, relatives traveled, & today I'm traveling with family. All times flight delayed by around 2 to 3 hours. Will not recommend to anyone. Food vouchers at 5 AM can't make-up for ruined travels.

title: It. was a nice experience of flying----
text: On 7th april 2018 we 4 members flew from New Delhi to Guwahati in flight number SG 152 of spice jet , though air craft was common but over all flight experience was nice, display of flight location in sky I front of seat was a nice feature, captain control was appreciable on technical grounds, attendants were friendly ,their on time leaving and arriving performance was also okay---thanks----SSS---

title: need to train staff
text: It is average. Leg space is a major issue. Just because the price is economical doesn't mean the service should be below average. Airhostess seems to be arrogant. Nobody listens even after pressing bell quite a few times, they only appear when they wish to. Also, the ground service seems to be haywire at Dubai airport, they ask to put hand baggage back in check in when passengers are entering the flight saying they don't have space anymore. Staff was rude. Probably give a thought before booking again with spice jet.

title: Affordable
text: I was Travelling from Delhi to Bangalore, Flight service was good , Supportive Staff, Spicejet need to work in Comfortability specially leg room area.

title: A decent flight journey
text:
My wife and I took a car from Kollur to board the flight to Chennai from Goa. For the 5.05 pm flight, we just reached the airport at 4.30. The Spice jet staff at check-in were courteous and that helped in our smooth boarding, after a dash to the airport. Departure was delayed by half an hour due to traffic. Smooth take off and landing. Fairly comfortable travel and courteous in-flight staff. Definitely value for money. 

Water was given only to those who asked for it. I strongly suggest that a small water bottle (at least) and couple of biscuits in a pack are given to every passenger.

title: Fairly Average Flying
text: One of the decent low frill carriers India has to offer. Could definitely provide better service in terms of leg room and hospitality overall

title: Exhausting
text: Spice jet flight from Delhi to Kolkata at 6:50 pm was delayed to depart at 10:30 pm. The wait in Terminal 1 was exhausting and tiring. No update was available.

title: SAME PROBLEM
text: Paid extra for spice max till jammu.but did not get spicemax seats from delhi jammu sector.after pointing out to the air hostess was told that it will be sorted out once u land in jammu.at jammu airport nothing was done.and told to give awritten complaint.the reply in the mail was that we were rude and shouting,and uncoperative.this was the same behaviour of the ground staff 2 years back at the jammu airport.infact the complaint book had my complaint which i had written 2 years back.extremely dissapointed by their treatment twice and at the same airport..the least i expext is an apology for the bad treatment spicejet gave us. no one was asking for arefund. pathetic attitude .disgraceful.

title: Spice jet
text: Unpleasant crew members not even a smile on face.  Food was pathetic. Flight was on time though. Should provide training to staff members.

title: The special fare means nothing
text:
I had booked four tickets on SpiceJet from Chennai to coimbatore for my family. Spicejet called and persuaded me to upgrade to Spicemax - priority check in etc.

Surprisingly they decided to off board us since they were overbooked. No explanations. No point to having a priority check in if , even though you are on time your ticket is unilaterally cancelled. They have agreed to refund the fare and airport authority has advised them to pay compensation. Still ... One cannot compensate for a vacation gone wrong.

title: Nice budget airline
text: Flight was fine. On time. Had pre booked meal, which was just about good. But in seat above of us, folding table tray was missing !! Thank god we were 4 people together as it was family trip, so we adjusted our food in other trays. This could be embarrassing for person travelling alone.

title: Bombardier experience
text:
Spicejet uses Bombardier mini version flights for short trips like this,which is in a way cool having 2+2 seating arrangements.

Crew did excellent service.

title: Budget Airline, so don't really expect the best
text:
I had to travel to Delhi for work and was not getting any other flight while returning. Then my agent found flights (Delhi-Kolkata-Dhaka) which I had to take as there was nothing else available at that time. Since this is a budget airline, I was not expecting a great service. However, my particular flight was on time and we all boarded on time as I could remember.

Crew seemed professional and well mannered. In flight food was decent for a budget airline I would say. As it was few months back and I never had any other flights with Spicejet, I'm unaware of their current performance.

title: Delay, Irritating Music playing Inside, excess passanger filled
text: It was already 45 minutes delay due to operational issues. After they started boarding. When bus reached near flight still plane was not ready. There was music was being played during journey, which was disturbing piece. More passenger observed sitting at backside.

title: Delhi Guwahati Flight
text: The flight was delayed by an hour. Seems it is not very unusual by the way staff at the Gate was responding to the queries of waiting passengers. However there was no further delay after boarding was over.

title: ALWAYS LATE AS USUAL
text: Never opt for Spicejet airlines,the flight are always delayed. Today my flight was delayed from 1.45 hr to more than 10 Hrs. Pathetic situation. Worst airline, it may not exist for more than a year.

title: Business Trip
text:
This was the first time I travelled with this airlines SpiceJet and I liked it
It was spacious and I was surprised to see this
I will recommend this to everyone if they are looking for extra leg room 
Great work üëçüèª

title: Business Class Experiece at a Nominal Price!
text: I am a regular flyer with Spicejet! For many reasons. Their Food is the best! If you Choose a Spicemax seat, you get truly VIP treatment and on top of that , Crew Members are really lovely. Through this review , i am taking time to personally thank RATI ( Crew Member on Kolkata-Dhaka Flight on 16th May Evening Flight). If you take Spicemax , you just take your journey to next level.

title: Boiling hot inside the aircraft
text: Was travelling from Delhi to Mumbai last Saturday. The ventilation / air conditioning was not working, it was suffocating almost, don't know the reasons but no one was able to give a proper reply.

title: The ride was uncomfortable
text: We took an early morning flight. The ac was not working properly in flight. The meal options were also very limited. The seats were cramped. Even the seat belt did not fit me. pathetic experience.I had to pay separately even for choosing seats.

title: Worst travel of my life. Must read if you are traveling through SpiceJet
text:
On 6th June I was traveling to Ahmedabad with flight no.8913. at 6.20 am. My company spent more than 16000 for this travel. till the flight took off the AC was not working.. one of fellow passenger raised the complaint to one of the air hostess. He told her he won't be able to breath properly and the air hostess said we are facing the same issue and if you can't breath then "how can you talk"... 
I just wanted to know is this the way to talk with your customer. 
That fellow passenger fell ill and he was unable breath... Later on medical aid provided to him for which he survived.. 
I could sense if he didn't raised that issue... he couldn't survived.
The service were provided to few customers was only water... And they didn't bothered to ask for anything. 
My suggestion would be not to prefer this flight if you have any health issues because they will make a fun of it.. 
To you service provider- if you want to grow you need to provide at least basic services to your customers..

title: Worst among all the domestic Indian flights
text:
This is one of the budget domestic airlines in India. 

Positives:
> The staff behaviour is average.
> Price
> Good air connectivity among domestic cities

Negatives: 
> They try to charge for every little thing possible. 
> Frequent delays. Makes it difficult when you have connecting flights.

title: worst domestic airline
text:
The Aircraft simply refused to take off and all passengers after check-in were left in the bus staring at the aircraft. Captain Parmar kept checking everything which he should have done earlier and after 45 mintues, declared it unfit to fly. So the bus took us to another flight and this time our original plane took off after 1 hour while we were being shifted to another plane. quite amusing!

Similarly, while coming back from Mumbai to Delhi on 26.5.18, our flight no SG -158 simply stood on the tarmac with all of us inside. After about a delay of 1.30 hours, it took off without even an apology from the Captain or the Crew.

title: A delayed flight causing inconvenience
text:
We( 8 family members) had booked this flight No.SG345 leaving Chennai(MAA) on 16-5-2018 with a scheduled departure of 15-10 hrs. We got the SMS that the flight had been preporned by 10 mts and we were asked to report at 13-00 hrs.
We reached airport well before 13-00 hrs, and we had to wait at the transit lounge for two hours then we came to know that the flight is delayed by one hour due technical snag in the plane and was being attended. We got repeated messages every hour extending the time of departure as the snag was in the process of attention. We were given some snacks at 17-30 hrs as the flight was delayed. Finally we were asked to board the flight at 18-45 hrs in alternate spicejet plane.  Due to the delay by 4 hours our arrival time  at guwahati was in the mid night and we had difficulties in getting a Taxi at exorbitant price to go to Shillong from there.

title: too cramped, delayes flights
text: Flight delayed, no staff to provide information.In flight services were ok. there was fuel smell during landing. The seat reclining needs to be checked as they do not remain upright.

title: Good Flight but ground staff needs to improve
text: The overall experience once you are inside the flight is good, but ground staff is horrible. The people at Bangalore didn't knew what was happening around them and the person at Pune is  someone I would rather never talk to. This experience has ensured that I would probably never take a flight with them again.

title: not bad
text: I found its late running without any proper reason, this happened two times i.e. during Surat to goa and Delhi to Surat. no other problem   every  thing is ok , pl be punctual in time .

title: Worst airline to travel
text: The worst ever service by spice jet. The staff in the welcome desk are just there to acheive the benefits by charging the customers on the name of excess baggage. I will never choose this airline and i recommend you all to be careful before you choose to fly thru this airline. Raj kumar the guy in the counter didnt even considered even though i told him that i am travelling to dubai from hyderabad. What a management from spice jet. Just business orientated. They are not here to provide their service to the customers but to earn money by giving the target to ruin the people and earn money. New way of earning. The information provided is also unclear. Dear management you should pay attention in reviewing your information provided in the internet. This was never exceptional.  Last travel thru this worst airline whom dosent even know how to talk to their Guests.

title: Worstest airlines to fly...
text:
It is the cheapest in terms of quality ...very low graded airlines...twice I had a experience of booking it and both times it got cancelled.and when contacted company they give impossible options of alternate flight.
Kindly someone provide the compensation policy to teach these absent minded people a lesson..

title: Gamble with your peace of mind at your own risk!
text:
I am a frequent airline traveller and have taken hundreds of flights with several airlines. In general, I find SpiceJet OK. 
This particular experience of mine is regarding my latest flight from Dubai to Pune on 26th June. We had been travelling together as a family and had prebooked prepaid Spicemax seats 3A,3B and immediate seats behind us 5A,5B as seen on the seat map(No row 4 on the seat map). Unfortunately, when we entered the aircraft, there was a row 4 present and the family wasnt willing to shift. More surprisingly, while SpiceMax seats are advertised to be with extra legroom, there was NO such difference on this aircraft. Anyways, being a red-eye flight, we didnt have the patience to argue over it. 
We had also pre-booked and pre-paid the kids meals for our 2 children. Surprisingly at meal time, the air hostess informed that there was no such booking reflected on our 3A,3B seats. Since I didnt have the pre-paid meal confirmation printout, I coudlnt argue with her though I asked her to cross check several times since I was very sure I had paid for it. Surprisingly, at the end of meal, she returned and handed over 1 meal apologetically saying she had 'forgotten' about it. She still insisted that there was no additional Kids meal reflecting on her manifesto. I was surprised that my other child did receive the said pre-paid meal but one was missing. Ofcourse it created a rift amongst my two kids to share one Kids meal. I still decided to remain clam and avoid any arguments since I couldnt access my emails while on the flight to show the confirmation nor did I carry a printout(I doubt anyone does that but now learnt to do it the hard way). 
On arrival, I checked my emails and confirmed my suspicion that I had indeed pre-booked and paid correctly and I had been denied my paid service! I decided to raise the matter to SpiceJet by writing to their customer relations helpdesk and was sure that this issue will be resolved quickly since I had all the correct proof. 
Lo and behold, received a reply from Spicejet after a few days that they had checked the matter and that they had handed over the second Kids meal to my wife!!!! I mean how stupid can this answer be! It implied I had not checked with my wife before raising my grievance OR even worse, that I had been lying to get a bloody meal free. 
While I am aghast at this experience and utter disregard to a genuine grievance, I hope the idiots at SpiceJet customer relations and the airhostess enjoy a satisfactory meal at my moneys expense while I now head out to buy my child a toy bag which she missed because I was refused a service which I had paid for!!!! 

Conclusion: Avoid SpiceJet whenever possible!

title: It doesn't keep up the time
text: They don't provide you any snacks even if they are late.If you want to buy samosa  you have to pay Rs 200.They also don't keep up the time.Our flight is suppose to take off at 4.45 pm and the plane took off at 6.10 pm.They didn't inform us earlier.First they told it will be at 5.10 pm then changed to 5.45 pm finally took off at 6.10 pm. We book flight tickets so that we reach early but funny is neither they keep up the  time nor they provide snacks if they are late.We have to wait for 5 hours without anything as well as if we want to buy one samosa pay Rs 200 whereas in Indigo flight for 1 Vada Pav pay Rs 100.

title: Worst airline in India
text:
Don't bother to travel with Spice Jet. They delay flights as and when they deem fit without any concern for passengers. 

Flight SG8172 Goa to Delhi dated 6th June 2018 is delayed. Notification received on 5th June is for a reschedule. Flight will depart at 5:55pm on 6 June. Why no alternative arrangement for an aircraft is made? Passengers may have connecting flight for other destinations. There's no offer for compensation or arrangements for any other alternate to fly out.

Customer support is even worse. They make you hold calls for over 20 minutes and come back with a plain "sorry" and an inability to provide an alternative. 

We are stuck in Goa and further stuck in Delhi with additional unneccessary expense of hotel and new tickets at a premium for Lucknow.

Well done SpiceJet for being the worst in the game.

title: Average domestic flight
text: Our family of 4 travelled on Spicejet from Bangalore to Bagdogra & back. Once you book your tickets, they entice you to upgrade your seats. When you try to do an online check in 48 hrs before, you find that most of the seats are marked with an ‚ÄòX‚Äô & if you do select them have to pay a premium. I have traveled all over the world & don‚Äôt find this anywhere. Strange way to make money from customers. The airline staff were pretty good & efficient. I did manage to get a seat near the emergency exit as it was empty. The food on the airline was pretty good too. All in all an average flight on Spicejet.

title: CARRY YOUR OWN SNACKS AND YOU ARE FINE!!!
text:
We were a group of 8 - four couples, going to the Maldives for a holiday. Delhi-Kochi- Maldives. At Delhi airport the staff at the counter asked for all the passports, took a long while to examine them then gave us the green signal to proceed Flt 561 on 17/03/18.
Scene shifts to International airport Kochi where again Spice Jet counter takes a hell of a long time to examine our passports &then return 7 and find that my passport had CANCELLED stamp on it. I had taken a wrong passport which had been over-looked at Delhi??? So I had to fly back to Delhi to collect the correct passport and join my group in the Maldives one day late. Extra cost Rs.26,000/- and one day lost equal to at least Rs.20,000/-. I think blame should be shared 50:50 and airline should return Rs.23,000/- what do you think?
On return Kochi-Delhi flight SG154 dinner had to be paid for. Staff informed us that an exciting new menu was now available. So we ordered chicken kababs etc. Only I can swear it was not chicken; tasted like sawdust and none of us could chew even one.. Only hope they have switched back to a not so exciting menu.

title: Surprisingly good
text: Not a big fan of this airline.. But certainly much better domestic service than international. No delays, hassle free check in and boarding. The in flight meal was worth it's price for once and the cabin crew was also very polite and reasonable. I don't recommend this airline for international travels but a good option for traveling within India, certainly better than indigo airlines

title: Very badly mentained
text:
It was too messy Floor were not cleaned.
Seats had dirty hand prints .
No water available on flight .

title: Not bad but not good
text: It was an alright airline. The plane was spacious. You could take this airline for domestic flights in India. There wasn‚Äôt much entertainment, just some magazines. The staff were kind (some of them). The food was quite expensive, so fortunately we bought some snacks from Goa Airport. This is the only airline I have taken for a domestic flight in India so I don‚Äôt know how Indigo is but SpiceJet is worth your money.

title: Exactly - Low- Cost Airline
text:
I was caught unaware while web check in. I had pleasant experience while web check in with other air lines.
Here, only middle seats were available for free web check in. That means, couple travelling together is forced different seats.
Rest all the seats were chargeable. 

If you pay Rs.1000 per person per flight (we had break journey and 2 flights from Mumbai-Delhi and Delhi-Bagdogra) you are entitled to priority check in, seats priority and on board meals.

We dropped the idea of web check in and reached Mumbai domestic airport a bit early but in wain. We had been given the most annoying seats. Last seat in different row with no leg room and no seat push up.

Air hostess were high headed and did not even bother exchanging pleasantries. 

Although our return journey from Bagdogra was better if seats are concerned. But flight was delayed by an hour and half.

title: Flight from goa to mumbai
text: Good flight but inflight food service not planned. For such short flights passengers prefer snacks. Most popular snack among non veg is chicken. Sitting on the front row chicken sandwiches were exauhsted. Flying crew was too carefree and the behaviour was if children playing.

title: Trip to Coimbatore
text: The service was excellent and flight left and landed on time. The way they handled handicapped passengers was very good.

title: Waste of money in food
text: I request never have any food in this spicejet Airline totally waste costly n taste nothing, street food are better then this Spicejet Airline.

title: Comfortable seats and most importantly never late.
text:
After using all airlines in India, there's something new I learnt. One that you can buy an economy ticket and upgrade by paying Rs 1200 to 1500 for a seat in the First row which has good leg space. 
Other new thing I learnt and experienced this particular airline is never late, it gets landing priority for some reason. 
I've taken Spice jet 15 to 20 times to all different destinations and Wow! Never been Late.

title: great flying experience
text:
great staff, very professional and friendly. service was awesome, great airlines to fly with.

On time boarding and my journey with a new born was very good.

title: Morning Service to Bengaluru
text:
I had to get into the Q in Chennai airport for checkin, as the  mobile/ webcheckin didn't work. This is something consistently an issue with Spicejet.  Fortunately, on  a Sunday morning there weren't too many passengers at the checkin area. 
The flight landed ahead of time in Bangalore. Didn't have checkedin bags.

title: Bombardier. aircraft. No free Web check in !!!
text:
Something very annoying about Spicejet in recent days is that you are forced to buy a seat during web checkin, else you have to go to the airport for checkin. Not acceptable as a fair practice by any norms. 
Sure the flight was ontime, a small Bombardier with somewhat convenient seats. The flight was smooth and the bags were on the belt in about 15 minutes.

title: Not that spicy
text: An okay type of flight, don't expect any human touch. They are mostly on time but if delayed they never sorry. A great tip, please weigh your stuff properly as they charge you if your luggage is slightly over-weight. Another pointer, if you are carrying something 'FRAGILE', think twice before boarding this flight as your fragile stuff may jumped out of normal belt and no one will be there to help you as the 'Fragile' sticker is already removed. In-flight food is good but really very less options. In-flight staff are also okay and quite moody.

title: Spicejet flight delayed
text:
We booked a flight from Guwahati to Kolkata which had scheduled departure time of 8:45 pm. It was saying "On time" when we reached the airport. But after we did completed security checking suddenly the flight departure time got changed to 11:15 pm. We didn't have clue how airline can reschedule the flight so late. We came to know it was because of the bad weather in Kolkata. However, Indigo flight which had the passengers already boarded could depart from Guwahati at 8:30 pm. We didn't have any option other than waiting till 11:15 pm. But around 10:15 pm, the flight got again rescheduled to 12:05 am. All the passengers had to wait in the airport for these much hours. Airline didn't take any responsibility to serve some food to the passengers untill 11:50 pm when all were starving and were getting ready to board the flight.
Very bad and cheap service from SpiceJet. I haven't faced this kind of situation any time before in any of my flights. We reached Kolkata very last at 2:30 am and had to spent a high taxi fare to reach my home from airport. I decided to avoid late night flight from cheapest airlines.

title: Clean low cost airline but communciation errors
text: Flight seats, and aircraft, boarding process are smooth. However, delays are significant. Best to go early to obtain seats without charge. There are hardly few last rows which can be selected by web check in for free. Meals are costly, but hot and fresh. Range is wide. We got SMS that flight was preponed on 2 occassions; but the flight was delayed. We changed taxi schedule which was not useful.

title: Economy at all level
text: We got the cheapest price for our travel in Spicejet. It was on time to take off and before time to land. The seats are looking old with unmaintained type. The Girls were not that presentable. If you want lowest then Spicejet is the best but you have to adjust with few things.

title: Not reliable
text: don‚Äôt prefer spice jet very unprofessional services.3 times they cancel the flight due to to I have to suffer a lot same thing happen with my other friends also .when call airline gives excuses due to some reason etc etc .its not first time happening again again .please don‚Äôt go for spice jet if you want to save your money and time.

title: Forgot to print my ticket
text: We went in a group and so mass printed our tickets. They forgot to print four of our tickets. So we had to divide the group to wait for the tickets.

title: It is like Air Tran and other no frills airline.
text: This airline offers only "Economy Class, " and some seat with more legs space is available for a premium. One may order pre-packed lunch/snacks while booking the ticket. Water is the only free beverage during the flight. Our flight was in time while going and returning.

title: BOEING SPICE JET SERVICE FROM YOGI GORAKSHNATH AIRPORT GORAKHPUR
text:
Previously smaller planes were flying at this route ,which use to take  about 2 hours to reach Delhi. But now spicejet is flying Boeing plane ,so this time it took 1 hour 15 Mnts to reach Delhi.I had to attend a marriage ceremony so I caught this 12.05 Pm flight from Gorakhpur.I opted for Spicemax seat and my seat No was 1A 1B which had wider leg room.Added advantage was that next to my seat was the seat of Metro man Sridharan ji and next seat on other side was of sri Raj Babbar ji .So I had opportunity to talk with them.Take off and landing was smooth . Overall very pleasant experience.
Satish Tripathi Gorakhpur

title: Frequent flights from New Delhi to Kolkata.
text: During the last three weeks, I had to fly from Delhi to Kolkata 3 times. I travelled  by Sipcejet flight departing from Delhi at 09.25 hours on two occasions. The flights took off in due time, and reached Kolkata before time. So, I have no hesitation in recommending the flight.

title: They changed my flight time
text:
i booked the flight for late night and they moved to me in the next day  morning flight , which make my 7 days plan reduced to 6 day ..the complete plan for every thing has been changed . my hotel booking etc was effected . so bad.

Also , in flight the crew member announced for " check in baggage " will come on belt 2 but actually it was on belt 6. every one was standing on wrong place .

title: First time used Spicejet
text: I like everything in flight. They greeted very well and my luggage weight was 9.73kg. They did not ask for extra money. I like the cleaniless plus humble nature of air hostess. First they served one glass of water to everyone and which is rare in indian (domestic) flights. Fare is little bit highr than Indigo rest i liked the service.

title: Bad A/C
text: It was horrible. Spacing between the seats was too less for a person like who is short felt the pain. An average or tall person, should never go for this flight.

title: Low cost airline, less legroom for tall passengers
text:
On time and being punctual is their USP.
Less legroom, but should not be a problem for short flights ( up to 90 mins ) for tall people. I am 180cm.
Food for purchase is a bit different. 
BAggage comes quickly.

title: my travel to Kolkatta
text: I have traveled to and fro Kolkatta on a leisure cum business trip.It was a good experience.The crew were very cordial and the travel was memorable one.

title: SpiceJet Airlines - quality upscaled
text: I have traveled by SpiceJet airlines quite a few times. Earlier my experience was not that good, as I experienced flight delay multiple times. However recently I see quite a change in Spice Jet, the in-flight menu is quite good, flights are on schedule, appearance & outlook is excellent, seats are very nice, crews are quite well behaved & impressive in their service & presentation. All & above, better than its competitors.

title: Superb flight crew and in-flight service
text:
I was a passenger on your flight SG 161 from Delhi to Mumbai on May 18,2018. My seat number was 7 C. I am a senior citizen. 
  
On board the flight, the team of Ms. Labhanshi, Priya,, Minni and Yeshley had just started serving refreshments. I was really not well and had suddenly started coughing incessantly .... it was not subsiding for a while. Ms. Labanshi was serving someone further up with her back to me. Hearing me coughing, she turned around and without even asking me, rushed with water for me. It helped me a lot. 
  
This gesture of hers, comes not just from training or from her upbringing. I thought it welled up from the deep, innermost and inherent goodness and kindness in her. More Labanshi's would make Spice Jet so much more fun to travel and more of her kind would make society and the world a much better place. 
  

 Also, I was travelling by car from Hardwar to Delhi to board the flight. At the check-in counter, I requested the young lad for an aisle seat. He gave me one so very graciously.

Dr. Arup Ratan Bandyopadhyay

title: Delayed Flight with Average Service.
text:
I chose SpiceJet because of newspaper articles of being the best on time performance airline overtaking Indigo & having highest Load Factor.
My Flight was delayed by 1:50 mts. Over & above that it took another 30 mts for the Flight to Take Off after Taxing the Runway.
I had Pre-booked a Meal of Chicken Tangri, Green Tikka & Hariyali Kebab. The Food was absolutely Cold. The Quality of Food has definitely gone down.
Seats are also very narrow with Limite Leg Space.
I will think twice before selecting SpiceJet again.

title: Cramped seats
text: Seats are extremely cramped and legs start aching on a 2+ hour flight. Over priced food and beverages to top it.

title: own rules which is not matching the airline industry standards
text:
Be careful prior to purchase ticket - at the end of the day you will pay the more amount with less service compare to full fare flight airline.
- do not get trapped in fare difference of INR 1000 or near by compare to full fare airline.
- they will say low cost airline and selling cheap fare, at the end may not work for you.
- cabin baggage rule with normal airline- 7 kg + notebook + purchase during duty free + food if you purchased from airport etc. But not for SpiceJet. they consider that all should not be more than 7 kg. additional you must pay charges per kg. i.e. 60/- Dhs @ Dubai
- I paid 3 kg of additional @ 60/- dhs / kg for my notebook bag with trolly. no duty free purchase + no additional luggage even check in baggage was 7 kg only. 
- staff @ airport so reluctant not listening at all. many other passengers changed like this. this is my recent experience with SpiceJet.
- Main important info. flight was empty. about 40% seats not occupied. and I see this is reason for this un-ethical charges.

title: Terrible Experience
text:
Evening around 9PM day before the flight I received a message from SpiceJet saying flight is preponed by 15 mins and boarding gates closes 45 mins(usual) before departure.  I had to travel 3 hrs to reach the airport. This last minute change gave me a sleepless night and we started @ 5AM with our kids. If I had come 15 mins late will the airline rebook or refund ?  

Finally flight departed 20 mins after the original time.

title: Worst and disgusting airline
text: The worst airline, first delayed for 2 hours then 4 hours and then almost 6 hours, when called customer service and they stated being rude... no courtesy to help the customer. Worst and disgusting service. will never fly spice jet ever.they told me to wait for 6 hours or go to home and come any other day with a new ticket.

title: You need to hope you are lucky!
text:
Spicejet can be really unpredictable.

They cab give best domestic flying time to worst in blink of eye.

Good to bad food.

Broken to good seats. 

Terribly late in on time. 

They cover everything and you need to be lucky!

title: Satisfactory Flight
text: The flight was on schedule. Kochi being a small place all the gate numbers were present in front of me.  It was Sunday 5pm and there was not crowd.

title: early morning flight to Delhi
text: The flight is good. Check in can be made more comfortable by increasing the number of check-in counters. This is specific to early morning flights

title: very late flight from origianl time
text: It was very boring flight with spicejet, 2 hours delay waiting so much. they changed gate after assigning gate. so its very hactict at night time. i suggest to go with other flight to get good experience. other flight will land on time so you can manage your own scheduled for next program. we had big losse because of flight dealy.

title: Always on time!!
text: I've had a pretty great time flying spicejet. As compared to indigo these guys are on time and don't spike the flying time so that even after a delay, the flight shows on time. Value for money.

title: Good Experience
text: Travelling via spicejet for the first time. It was good experience for a low cost airline. The air crew members were ok. Even the seats were comfortable. The flight took off on time. So it it surely recommended. Also at the last minute, that gate was changed, and Spice jet sent a message to inform me.

title: Good
text: Flight are good but very congested sheet, little delay but drop in time. It was Turkeys flight has been operated for domestic drop. Staff were good.

title: Overall good experience
text: The flight was  in time. While check in we found no difficulty.Goa Air port was crowdy one .Reached at Surat In time. Service staff behavior OK

title: Excellent
text: Flight was on time as per schedule, landed at the destination early, completed the journey in 1 hour 25 minutes compared to the scheduled 1 hour and 35 minutes.

title: Mini aircraft - Enriched with all travel comfort and passenger delight!
text: This DH8 type air craft with 72 seats is well maintaining by Spicejet and right from check in/boarding to landing at destination/receive of baggage from belts are getting expedited in well professional manner. Hats of Spicejet and my ultimate choice from Bangalore to hometown is this option only

title: Nice n cool experience, polite n co-operative cabin crew, tasty food and so on......
text:
Cool and memorable experience with family n friends. Cabin crew quite helpful and extending assistance quickly n nicely. Most of the time, Spicejet maintains its schedules and in one event, when flight got delayed, they took care of passengers nicely. 

I wish the Spicejet all the best for future !!!!

title: intime
text: ontime, convenient and economical. the flight was comfortable, clean and well maintained. the take off and landing were perfect

title: Pathetic Experience, Understaffed, uncourteous air crew, no hot meals despite long menu card in the seat pockets
text:
Pathetic Experience, Understaffed, uncourteous air crew, no hot meals despite long menu card in the seat pockets.

I had a seat on the last row. The Air Crew was too slow in serving. For a 1 hour 45 Minutes flight, they took almost entire flight time to serve the beverages, food to other passengers. 

By the time they hit the last row, they did not even offer a glass of water or tea or coffee. 

I will never fly such airlines.

The Air Crew where spicy clothes to attract male travelers. They are totally inexperienced. It will be surprising to note how they can handle the event of emergency? There is total chaos and lack of coordination.

Pathetic experience right from Check In to Flight Delays to Air Time.

title: Small seat
text: First row seats may brought better legroom. Otherwise, it is small. Good take care and smile while serving food.

title: Mediocre type experience
text: The airline is just of the type "does the job". Nothing fancy about it and the main focus of people checking you into the flight is to sell you SpiceMax service. I flew with my wife and 5 month old kid and the priority for the person checking us in was to sell us Max service for an extra of 1000 per person. While selling he totally missed to tell us that power banks are not allowed in check-in bags -- this made us to be taken out while boarding as our bags were detected for power bank which had to be taken out and kept in hand bag. Very uncomfortable experience when you are travelling with a kid and expect extra care from airline staff rather than additional trouble and focus on selling services.

title: Flying to small town
text: I did not know even a regular flight operates in this area. On time and value for money. I saw many other like Alliance Air and Zoom Air getting their flights cancelled, Spicejet was on the dot.

title: Charges for online check in - come on!
text:
I was unimpressed by all the hidden charges when I booked these flights and disgusted when I went to check in online to find that I could only do that if I PAID for the seats. So we didn't do the online on principle and just went to the airport early. Clearly those who did pay got the window seats as my husband and I were stuck in the middle
Flight was an hour later - apparently due to thunderstorms. Can't be helped. Flight was OK - bumpy but to be expected. Bags were delivered quickly at our destination. Staff seemed surly and uninterested unless passengers wanted to buy food.

title: Punctual
text: Flight was on time and ground staff quite friendly. Flight experiences had no flaws and no issue at all. Toilets relatively clean and tidy. On board staff was also smiling and friendly. Landing experience was normal and timelines met sharply. Some of the drinks including water were offered free, which was a kind gesture from the airline.

title: Desert Trip
text: Wonderful opportunity!Golden city visit!Thankyou Spicejet!Flight was very comfortable maintained!The crew members were smart.Enjoyed the experience!Hotel Tokyo Palace was good!

title: Smooth and easy fly with spicejet!
text: The airlines are doing good now and the service has improved. The cabin crew and the ground staff were really pleasant and helpful.

title: Quite efficient !
text: The flight is the Dornier one with the twirling blades in front and a small one too. They do keep up the timings and any delay of few minutes in departure is made good in the flight time. It was an afternoon flight (2.20pm) and is most convenient for Madurai. Avoid buying food on the flight as they are neither reasonably priced nor very good.you can get good offers if you plan early.

title: Great flight,on time departure and helpful staff
text:
I was most impressed with friendly helpful staff both on the ground and in the air.
Very clean modern aircraft 
On time departures

title: SpiceJet
text:
Booking was easy. Very attractive fare. On time performance.  Timings are convenient.
Well mannered and groomed staff on ground as well as aircraft.

title: Unduly delay of flights
text:
My flight has never been on time with SpiceJet. And the air crew was frustrated themselves. The service was not great either.
The leg room was surprisingly comfortable. Even more comfortable than other domestic flights.

title: Shivering
text:
I travel very often but rarely with Spicejet. It was not the first time that they cabin temperature was below 19 degree. I say that because my body is very comfortable till 20 degree. 

There were more than 4 passengers sitting next to me or behind me complained. That includes a child. All the requests to improve the temperature went unheard. They said they do not have blankets on flight.

This reminded me of two earlier experiences. First was same and I shivered all the way. Said the same thing, "No blankets" Next time I was travelling from Delhi to Mumbai, the cabin temperature was very low, I said if I am not provided with a blanket I will deplane , I was immediately given two blankets.

I remember about 5 years back My father was travelling from Varanasi to Mumbai. He got a shivering attack, led to  requirement of Oxygen. They had no oxygen.

I willnever travel by Spicejet.

title: very professional and helpful
text: It was an amazing experience, normally I get goosebumps to fly through Delhi, because my flights get delayed and I have to wait a long time for my boarding pass and it is a lot of running around to get to my connecting flights. I have lost my bags before and all my family members count receive their gifts. so you do understand how much I hated to travel through Delhi. but tried Spicejet and got a very good budget flight and very professional. the moment we landed at the airport I was worried because I had only an hour to catch to connecting flight but they give me the privilege to move in the queue and my boarding pass was already ready so I ran to the next flight and most importantly I didn't lose my bags this time.

title: Good in low budget journey
text: SpiceJet, quite good service the leg space is very less and flight is not that much good but still a good airlines which help you to reach you on time with low charges and without any other issues.

title: Pathetic airline
text: Worst airline ever. Always late departure. Food was stale n pathetic. Spice max was never a spice max. No priority check in, No priority bag handling. Overall not upto the mark. If you CC ceo or higher authority in your email to get resolution they don‚Äôt even bother to acknowledge. Every flight with no good reason delayed. Pathetic airline

title: Really good
text:
Very impressed with everything- online booking, check in, boarding- much easier with the Max service, only Rs1,000 more.
Great on board service.
Best landing ever.
Very polite friendly & efficient staff.
The only complaint was the width of the seat. The fat man next to me kept spilling over to my side.

title: bombardier Q400
text: flew from mumbai to surat.flight delayed by 1 hour.Legspace is very bad.staff not that much helpful.If you fly from spice jet dont overweight the luggage or else be ready for extra payment.they don't have inflight entertainment so pack your mobile with some movies but you dont need it because its just 45 min journey

title: spice jet
text: small flight with good service, the flight went uneventful, food to purchase has good selection and drinks

title: before departure totally spoiled
text: Yes ofcourse I agree with readers review as maintained my favourite airline but seems to be very bad customer service along flight delay mean to cancel all connected flights,shame to passengers let down during their longer journey without prior notice.

title: Why pay extra???
text:
The only problem for the airline is that they ask you to buy preferred seats, meals, legrooms and so on.
While if I check in at the counter, again I am asked so many times for the same thing. Which is kind of forced selling.
At first place it should not be there, as it doesn't help the travelers. And second, it really hurts your image as an airline.
I took the flight from New Delhi- Kochi- Male. The flights were on time and no hassles.

title: Spice Jet to Dehradun from Mumbai
text: Experience for decent . No complains . Just wish that they allow seat blocking when you have done bulk booking especially with kids ...

title: Was better when they started
text: Used to be the most preferred airlines. But now there standards have came down. Starting from the hospitality to grooming they have compromised a lot.  Even the ground staff was rude. They treat their passengers as if they are doing a huge favour and passengers are doing nothing. I don't know how they call themselves number one. In flight crew was also not groomed properly. Even the long hair crew members didn't make the bun. If I compare it indigo airlines then there crew has still maintained there grooming standard. Grooming doesn't mean only doing make up it also means how your hair do and everything. My personal experience was never good with this airlines. I try to avoid taking this airlines but sometime due to time constraints I have to travel with this airlines.

title: SG-1233. Benagluru-Chennai, DELAYED
text: This is an evening service from Bangalore, one has to sacrifice all of the afternoon business to board this on-time. Hence , a delay at departure in Bangalore is not only a huge loss of opportunity, it can also complicate the very purpose of planning to be in Chennai early by evening ! Not a happy experience.

title: An Average Flight
text: Took this Flight on our way back home after visiting Kathmandu. The Flight was delayed by more than Two Hours.After a long Flight Delay was painful. There is no proper communication regarding delay and it was being extended periodically, Reached Chennai after midnight. The Ground Staff were not Cooperative in giving information.Will avoid if I can this Airline in  future.

title: NO for international flights
text:
They do not have tie-ups with most of the airlines. That cause traveler to pay transit VISA for connecting international flights which may be more than amount of airfare paid.
Also, they have non-Refundable policy, rude staff who says it's your fault to check if we have tieups or not. I had to cancel my booking and faced this. Please DO NOT book your flight even if it is offered cheap.

title: Late afternoon flight
text: Had taken my mother and young son,A first time flyers along with other family members for a leisure trip to  Delhi. Had split bookings as senior citizens and friends and family to save few bucks. Have pre booked meals which was very nice.

title: Ok flight
text:
I travelled on Spicejet from Hyd to Colombo, we need to change the flight in Chennai to a separate one for Colombo. I would suggest if you are travelling from Hyderabad to take a direct flight to Colombo since the Immigration in Chennai is horrible with long queues and wait time is nearly 60 min.

I would rate Spicejet as a good one but the problem is with Chennai immigration.

title: Dont take Spicejet onto / from an international airline route
text: On my return leg from our visit to United kingdom on the 13th May 18 ( check this space for a detailed review) I had booked myself on spice jet for the Mumbai to Ahmedabad SG635 for our final leg. This however turned out to be my worst decision of the journey and thoroughly regret not having done my homework on the same. However, I am writing this so that no other international passenger suffers similarly if he does read my review. Typically all other domestic airlines have a seperate excess baggage policy for passengers connecting to / from international airlines within 24 hrs of the journey on their airlines. Goair and Indigo for eg charges INR100 per kg as international allowance for the same. Spicejet has no such policy. They charge normal rates of INR 285 per kg online to INR 300 per kg at counter. So do the math. Typical international allowance is 23 to 30 kg per ticket. Domestic in flight allowance is 15 kg. So in any case you need to buy additional baggage of 8 kg or 15 kg depending on your booking. It will cost you 2850 for 10 kg on Spicejet while other airlines you will get 30 kg for same price! I ended up paying over 10 grand for additional luggage on two tickets!  No wonder they have turned around due to such profiteering. Avoid Spicejet, if you are travelling onwards internationally as you will end up loosing part of your budget. Just to add , the flight SG635 was delayed by over an hour and the inflight quality of tables is shown below. Hope this helps discerning travellers in your planning.

title: Flight delayed for long!
text:
After boarding the aircraft pilot announces change in a tyre and therefore 40mins delay!! Travelling with a kid thats why opted for a flight instead of a train. 
Did not expect this. They should have checked before making us board the flight. It is very inconvinient sitting in this compact aircraft with a kid for so long.

title: SpiceJET
text: The flight staff are pretty decent, no windows nor aisle seats available. Apart from that, things were good, the seating space is very helpful. I mean u can bend and sleep on the food tray. Leg room was good.

title: worst flight
text: The flight was a nightmare. You name a facility and they will not have that.If they would provide services like in-flight entertainment, We would not mind paying more fare price.

title: Nice experience but space for improvement
text: I was travelling from Trivandrum to Bangalore and choose to fly with SpiceJet. I reached the airport on time, but the check-in process was delayed  by about 15 minutes. Once check-in was done, the boarding process started some 30-40 minutes late, and no announcement was made for the delay. Once we boarded the aircraft, the experience was better with the crew taking care of the travellers. Overall a decent experience but lot of scope for improvement.

title: Decent Flight
text: The flight staff from ground to air, are pretty decent however the only thing I didn't like is their web check in service, I mean I woke up at 7.30am prior a day of light to web checkin, the only option for the web check in seats were all middle seats, no windows nor aisle seats available, most of them were asked to pay 150 or 200 rupees extra or you need to be present at the counter to get your seat. Apart from that, things were good, the seating space is very helpful. I mean u can bend and sleep on the food tray.

title: Worst Customer Satisfaction
text: I chose 6:30 PM flight instead of 6:05 Morning flight. I agree It was my fault and reached customer care to re-schedule to morning one. No proper response, attitude is like cancel or rebook we don't care. Finally end up paying additional amount and rescheduled. Good way of cheat customer ...

title: Lack of customer care/worst ground staff
text:
I was standing in a queue for 10mins and late for reporting time because of that ground staffs refused to give me boarding pass and make endless excuses because of that i missed flight,time and money.what kind of hospitality is this who cant show courtesy to there customer or understand the situation.
I will never travel through this airlines   and tell everyone about it,i send mail and did not even get any reply.

title: Please don‚Äôt travel through spicejet
text: Worst airline ever !! Ive travelled for over 7 times it got delayed by 2 hrs everytime . It is the best example to show that people should never travel through something like  spice jet . Its the WORST !! Stupid airline

title: Disappointed
text: Our flight with SpiceJet was at 7 am and at 5:30 am on our way to the airport we were told our flight is 3 hours late with no apology. Such an inconvenience especially as I was travelling with my four-year-old son. The Delhi airport staff had a horrible attitude and  the toilets were disgusting. I will never fly spicejet again or even think of coming to Delhi. If you would like a peaceful holiday, please change your airline.

title: Just a little less worse than before
text:
After hitting lows, there's some service. Flights are on time if they are not cancelled. 

Cabin crew behaves better though expectations are set really low after an awful checkin experience.

title: A good low cost carrier
text: Its an in general review of the airlines. I am a frequent flyer most of the times I would opt between indigo or spice jet. It generally have a record of covering the flying distance in a less time than the stipulated time.  have flied around 10 times in Spice , the only problem is its leg space,

title: Mr
