text: Ground staff were very rude and arrogant. Nothing was organised and when questioned they were very rude and unhelpful. In flight service was also not that great.

title: Average flight and services
text: I think the main problem with Spice jet is the Airbus, in bad weather conditions, it freaks you. During turbulence, the aeroplane suddenly dips, though our pilot was good, and he managed the aircraft well. We safely landed in Delhi but came to know, that few of my friends who have previously travelled with this airlines have faced a similar situation.

title: Customer misbehave
text:
Check- In crew must be polite with customers and be a guide for them as many people fly for first time.
A passenger standing in que just in front of me didn't know how much foreign currency he suppose to carry but the way they behaved and commented which is a shame for them.When the customer show the Indian currency the lady attendant suggested with this currency you can go to Goa not to Pattaya and very proudly said to her co-worker how he suggested the customer.The customer feel so bad for his ignorance that he commits a big mistake.
Brief your staff to first behave properly with passenger.

title: Vacation to Gujarat
text: As a part of our vacation, we travelled from Bangalore to Ahmedabad by Spice Jet. The departure and arrival was on time and the flight was quite neat and less noisy. Being a low-cost flight, I cannot comment on the in-flight services, but the crew seemed cordial. Overall a decent experience.

title: SO BEAUTIFUL AND NICE
text: so beautiful and nice and the staff is good and very nice flight much more so very best journey for me

title: Spicejet seat charges!
text:
I took the SpiceJet flight from Kolkata to Bangalore today (6th May 2018). 
Firstly, the flight was scheduled for departure at 9 AM but it got preponed to 8.45AM. The reschedule happened when we were asleep (post midnight). We were in for a rude shock in the morning and had to rush things up to leave earlier. We had to change our plans to leave from home in a very short notice.
Secondly, when we had tried to web check -in, all window and aisle seats were shown as "paid". Since we were two of us, there was no way we could web check- in without paying extra. Essentially, this is a hidden fee and passengers are exploited to pay upfront or be in an uncertainty.
Thirdly, when we approached the airport check-in counter, we were told that only if we pay Rs.1000 extra per person, we could have 2 seats together. We decided against it and disappointedly went for separate seats. The seats assigned to us were more than 10 rows apart. 
Fourthly, after we had taken our respective seats in the aircraft and after boarding was complete, we found that a seat next to one of our seats was vacant. Good part is, we could sit together. Bad part is, we realized how we had been cheated. There were two seats available next to each other but we were not assigned. Ours was not the only case. The entire aircarft was full of such cases- couples and families separated because every seat except the middle seat is paid. Almost everyone was negotiating with someone else looking to swap seats. Such a pathetic customer experience. 
I don't have a problem with you charging extra, but if someone arrives at the check-in counter early enough when paid seats are unoccupied, assigning seats to members of a family separated by 10+ rows is extremely apathetic.

title: Comfortable and good experience flying spicejet
text: It was an awesome experience flying with spicejet. I traveled with spicejet for the first time. The staff was courteous and helpful. My required special assistance, and the crew happily provided her with all that was required. Splendid journey.

title: Don't be a spice club member
text:
Amount top in spice cash account for ticket booking ,amount deducted pnr generated but asking for payment again as they said didn't receive it , screen shot shared still they don't listen ask for more money and finally they cancel the ticket

DONT BE A SPICEJET CLUB MEMBER

title: Timely service but ill mannered crew
text: The airline is known for its on time service. The boarding was started before time but all the passengers were stranded in the bus for almost half an hour as the flight was not ready. Leg room is very less. The crew is the biggest downside. They are I'll mannered, not ready to help. The food was terrible but may be due to short distance flight.

title: Economical & Worth
text: SpiceJet is value for money flight option. Its economical and worth traveling for short trip. Leg space is a little problem but otherwise all good. Attendants were cordial and took care of arrangements well. Flight started in time and landed in time. All good!

title: timely flight
text: flight was on time, just boarded the flight however airline insisted on priority check in and other add on services, which are useless

title: Vastly Improved Airline
text: I travelled on Spicejet after a decade and was pleasantly surprised to see the improvements that have happened. The flight was on time, the food was delicious and the crew was super efficient. The particular flight  is a non stop one to Port Blair and the timing is perfect. I would strongly suggest to opt for Spice Max which gives you more legroom, priority baggage and complimentary meals.

title: Flight was on time, in flight service was good
text: We opted for SpiceMax for onward journey. Premium seat selection, priority boarding works out great but food (and hence money) gets wasted for kids. Despite priority baggage our bags came out last actually! So its better to select your seats during normal web checkin where you don't have to spend as much. Pre-order food separately if you want.

title: Too cramped seats
text: If you are travelling for leisure, do not ever book spicejet. Seats are too cramped.  They have carved out 2 more rows of standard 30. Landing was too jerky. Airhostess are just ok type. Check in is too clumsy.

title: Not upto the mark
text: Received msg for early departure however flight was delayed by an hour with no information from the airline.

title: Very rude behaviour by lead cabin crew
text:
Firstly , the delay in writing review is because I abroad for last 10 days . 
On 19th April ,  I was on flight no. SG 192 morning service from Bangalore to New Delhi , during in flight service , one of the air hostesses spilled hot coffee on me . Actually the paper cup possibly overturned while she was pouring hot water into it . I was in seat no. 9 D and my entire left side , both shirt and trouser was soaked with coffee stained water . 
I asked the air hostess to help me to clean it up by giving me some wipes and I was given 2 wet wipes . 
Since the entire shirt and trouser was stained , I asked for more wipes but the lead cabin attendant refused to give me any more wet wipe saying that the quota of wet wipes she has given me is over ! When I pointed out that it was her colleagues mistake , she was belligerent saying mistakes happen and refused to apologise ! She even refused to replace the water bottle and snacks tray on which also the coffee had fallen . I was truly shocked by this kind of rudeness . Finally I had no choice but to attend an important meeting at Delhi wearing a coffee stained shirt .

I strongly suggest that Spice jet should be avoided as there are many other domestic airline options available in India

title: Value for money
text: The best thing about this plane was that there was lots of leg room‚ÄîI could stretch out my legs, and was comfortable ,food was nice and most importantly flight was before time and i was first time traveller in spicejet and i enjoyed it

title: More leg room than usual
text:
The best thing about this plane was that there was lots of leg room‚ÄîI could stretch out my legs, and was comfortable even when the person sitting in front tilted their seat back. 

My ticket included a meal, which turned out to be vegetable biryani with mirchi ka salan. I was a little apprehensive about this (I don‚Äôt like very spicy food), but this was actually pretty good. The biryani‚Äôs primary flavour was from browned onions and a judicious mix of spices, plus it had lots of vegetables. The mirchi ka salan had a nicely creamy, nutty gravy. There was also a soft roll with butter (both of which I left, because it just didn‚Äôt go with the rest of the meal). For dessert, there was a brownie (so-so, somewhat dry and a little too sweet for me). There was also a tetrapak of juice, which I skipped. SpiceJet do offer other food‚Äînot hot meals‚Äîfor sale on their flight, but I didn‚Äôt bother to check the menu. 

The flight itself was uneventful and comfortable. It actually departed about 10 minutes before time, so landed a little early than its ETA. Cabin crew were helpful and efficient.

title: Well meaning but inefficient
text: Disorganised boarding, and poor support from cabin staff results in uncomfortable experiences which add to the stress of flying. Besides, the food gets served late and so has to be swallowed fast to meet landing parameters

title: First Flight experience
text: It was the first flight experience for me. Well exciting and little bit fear. The flying was overall good.

title: SpiceJet
text: This is one such airline where you cannot expect to take even a single KG extra with you. Leg space is less as compared to the other airlines. the food served in the flight is good. Cabin Crew is friendly and helpful. The worst part is that they kept most of the seats as paid during online check-in so you will have to part of the long queue at the airport.

title: Surprisingly good experience on a low-cost airline
text: We were extremely impressed by the one flight on this airline. The check-in staff were extremely well groomed, pleasant and efficient. The flight was on time and the cabin staff were of the same high caliber people. The luggage collection at Delhi airport was also quick. As a recommendation. pre-book additional luggage  and any snacks that you intend consuming on the aircraft - a more efficient method of flying with Spice Jet.

title: Need to work on food
text: The overall the experience of the flight was fine but the food taste was bland. They definitely need to work on that. We have ordered for the roll but after having one bite there was no taste at all. We have taken there spicejet max upgrade the c/in was fine but we have to wait for the baggage claim at the delhi airport.

title: No help and support to process a refund of the ticket
text: Service of Spicejet is just pathetic..üò°üò° its been 1 month I have asked them for a resolution of an issue which I faced on 5th April (PNR:MF6Y3U)..I am continuously sending mails and doing phone calls to the customer care..but they have not provided me any solution till now..always they are saying we are working on it and we need some more time..now my question is for a simple resolution they need one month time, still they did not find any resolution..I have never seen such a useless airline in my life..I have been in aborad and boarded so many flights of very small airlines also..they are just so good at their services..they always try to help their customer as much as possible and as soon as possible..it seems FlySpiceJet don‚Äôt bother about customer‚Äôs satisfaction..they are only doing their business..I and my family have been valued customers of Spicejet from last 4-5 years..still I am facing this problem..I will never board again in spicejet in my life and I will also make sure that my friends and relatives to refrain to use Spicejet in future..

title: On time
text: Lovely flying experience with spice jet. On time started and on time landed at Chennai airport. Overall nice.

title: Reminds of Bus Services of Mumbai
text:
Last Sunday took a late night flight from Mumbai to Chennai in SpiceJet. Well the harassment started from the checkin itself and continued till we deplaned. 

Since we had only cabin luggage, went to the self-checkin kiosk, which showed the message‚Äùno free seats left, please contact check-in counter‚Äù. So when we came to the counter we found that out of the 5 counters, only3 were for free passengers and 2 for paid checkin. The que for the free counters were too long and they were taking unnecessary long time for each checkin. Due to this delay, which, perhaps, was intentional, many passengers were forced to go to the paid counter. In a way they were almost forcing people to take a paid seat.

After the painful checkin process, the security check was pretty smooth. However after boarding the plane, the actual pain started. The seats were too cramped. Even the BEST have more leg space in their buses. The flight was delayed because of air traffic congestion and for the entire period AC was off. It only started after the flight was air borne. So one can easily understand the suffering of the passengers. The cabin crew were also reluctant to serve water an I was served water after 5 calls.

The flight reached Chennai well after the scheduled time. Really wouldn‚Äôt have liked to board again but alas had a return ticket as well.

title: Me and SpiceJet for the first time.
text: It was again the first time with SpiceJet. Spice jet is a good option to fly. Free meals will not be available there too. But they will give you superb mouth fresher after meal. The flight will be on time. One bad thing about spiceJet is that, flights used to get cancelled frequently.

title: best service highest level hospitality
text:
I appreciate some kind light food  to be served  passengers anywhere from
and increase scarcity of air hostess further for excellent performance per flight.

title: Met my expectations regarding service and timing.
text: The experience from baggage scan to seat distribution during check in was really good.The airline maintained the much needed punctuality.On board service was also satisfactory.I used to travel by this airline in other segments too.Overall experience is good.

title: Worst Airline
text:
I have booked for a Spice Jet flight SG054 from Dubai to Kozhikode Flight  which was meant to fly from Dubai on 09 Nov 2017.

I got messages in my phone from 09 Nov 2017 from the morning that flight is delayed due to Operational Reasons.

The delay keeps on accumulating every hour and it becomes 11 Hours 35 Minutes.

I trusted you and went to the airport. I got the boarding pass and waited for the flight with 12 Hours Delay.

At the boarding time I got a message in the phone that the flight is cancelled.

The explanation is bad weather in Amritsar.

They  made us wait for 12 hours in the airport and there is no available senior airline staff to explain the situation.

I was wandering in the airport with no support from the airline what to do.

Finally I found a staff and he offered me a refund 7-10 working days or ticket two days later which he cannot promise.

They managed to get out all the passengers out from the airport which is very much inappropriate.

I am outside the airport now writing this E-mail took a flight in double fare which I am waiting again for 8 hours and missed 2 days of vacation out of 7 days.

If there is  an airline breakdown or bad weather in either the origin or destination I would have understood.

I understand that you do not care for your customers and show no respect.

You change your schedules based on your convenience.

This is the worst experience I had in my whole life with any Airlines.

If they had a problem you could have have informed us prior and cancelled the flight instead you made us to wait for 12 hours and then threw out of the airport.

You are operating an International Airline Service which your team is not capable of.

Please at least do not fly to Kozhikode and leave the space so that some other good companies can take over.

title: Lacking Customer Centric Approach
text:
I traveled with SpiceJet in the third weekend of April 2018 from Mumbai to Visakhapatnam. I booked SpiceJet after a really long time. I availed SpiceMax service for Rs. 1200/- for the first Row Window seat with very good Leg Room. Availing this service also gave me a complimentary meal.

I was carrying 1 Luggage bag weighing 18 kilograms (mere 3 kilograms beyond the free allowance). I was not carrying any hand luggage with me. In such a scenario, with my previous experiences, I did not think that SpiceJet would charge me extra. But, my expectations were shattered when the staff was reluctant to consider any request to adjust the hand baggage allowance with the un-utilized check-in baggage allowance.

The cabin crew was very polite and courteous. The Food served was warm and tasteful.

title: A good experience.
text: I reported a bit early at the Airport, but my experience at the check in counter was good. I waited at the Airport, and the waiting was not that bad. The Airports Authority of India has done up the Indian Airports well and some of them are ranked 1st or 2nd at the world level. The Airline staff was very courteous and helpful. The check in, waiting and boarding were comfortable. I think SpiceJet has changed a lot. The in-flight food was also good, but the quantity was not enough for a dinner. The veg meal could have been increased by reducing the cost on packing. I feel it very bad on learning that some of the Airlines are wasting money on packing and reducing as also compromising with the quality or quantity of meals. The flight was slightly turbulent due to air. SpiceJet people do not have good reading material in the plane for passengers, which they should improve upon. Otherwise the plane was good, the flight was good and the crew members were also very courteous except the one who was heading them. He could improve his behaviour a bit more. The landing was soft and the taxing was also not very taxing. However, the baggage kept us waiting for very long. This time was unbearable, this could be reduced and the flight operators should think about it. I wish good luck to the Airline.

title: SpiceJet not to my taste
text: We flew to Goa on 19 March using SpiceJet for the first time. They were not the cheapest flight that we could have used but we went with them after reading some good reviews. I tried to book us in using the online website checkin but whatever I did I could not get my booking details to show so we had to check in at the airport. We left in plenty of time to get to the airport and thankfully the long queue moved at a steady pace. When I booked the flight on line from Australia it said that there was a checkin luggage as part of the cost which was good but it was not overt on what the allowance was. As it turned out it was only 15kg so we had to pay for extra baggage allowance. This was the only concern for the person at the checkin desk who did not ask about the content of our bags at all. When it came to boarding the flight we were asked to step to one side as our bags did not clear security and had not been loaded. It turns out that we had some power packs for our phone chargers in our bag which were not allowed in the undercarriage but when I said we were not advised of this the very official and not polite or helpful girl stated that was not her concern and that the power packs needed to be off loaded. We were not given an opportunity to take them onboard as they were handed over to the security. We got on board to find that the seats were so tightly pushed together it was almost impossible to sit in them. The tray table could not be pulled down because there was no room. The plane was not cleaned prior to takeoff as there was dirt and stuff still in the pockets. I would not recommend this company to fly with.

title: Service
text: I'm sorry to say today my flight is there Chennai to Visakhapatnam I feel very sad  Because I ask glass of water they ingnure me and not Reply anything simply they go I'm not expecting any higher category services because I paid for Economy and I requested to please don't vist this airlines

title: Kept in aircraft with no airconditioning and with insufficient ventilation for 80 minutes
text:
Boarding for SG253 started around 6.00 pm. My wife and I boarded around 6.20 pm. There was no airconditioning and ventilation was insufficient even after boarding was complete. Many passengers complained but no action was taken. Many passengers asked for water but were not given water. 

One passenger used his mobile to complain to customer care. The senior cabin crew shouted at him and falsely accused him of threatening. There was no threatening at all. They wanted to deboard him and caused further delay but they were not putting on the air conditioner to address our complaint.

It was more than one hour by now in inhuman conditions. At 7.40 pm they finally put it on. Just after that they started refuelling. Did they not put it on earlier to save fuel and money? 

Another passenger wanted to put it on Facebook. Again they wanted to deboard him! It looks like the senior cabin crew is using anti terrorism rules to cause terror to the passengers. She should be punished. Spicejet should announce her punishment and apologize to the passengers they wanted to deboard publicly in the newspapers.

In future the crew should record on their mobiles the disputes between passenger and crew and action should only be taken on basis of recording and not false verbal accusations of the crew. If action is taken then the passenger should receive a copy of the recording.

title: Seat reclining has been removed
text: The seat reclining has been removed. The little reclining that economy class had has been removed for want to add more seats I guess. This is one of the worst low-cost carriers. They have cramped the leg space so badly that even a short flight might seem long enough.

title: HOLIDAY.
text: We booked our return flight at a short notice and managed to get four seats. The service was very good.

title: on time
text: We had a comfortable flight from hyderabad to jaipur. It was on time (departure and arrival). however, there was a delay of one hour while coming back.

title: Uncomfortable seats, comfortable flying
text:
Took the 2am flight from DXB to BOM, as it was way cheaper than a full-service plane. The flight was around half-hour late, and the seats really bad. The plane was old and the headrest was non-existent.
The only positive of the flight was that the pilot and staff were decent, and the flying was very smooth.

title: Fly @ spicejet
text: Good flight. Convenient time. on schedule departure and arrival. Friendly staff and easy boarding formalities.

title: Excellent meal service. Pls prebook a hot meal.
text:
I was given a complementary hot meal. Spicejet has upgraded their meals. They are served hot, manyany variants, and served with a dessert, soft bread, butter and full cutlery.
Pls prebook yr meal to hv a broader range.
If possible, buy the first row. One gets meal plus Priority tags on baggage. Dies it work? YES. My bags were the first ones to arrive in the baggage belt.
These are tiny things but they add class to travel. Try it.

title: Perfect timing
text:
I travelled in the flight SG 3403 . The time management is excellent and also we reached 15 minutes ahead of schedule and reached Vijayawada very comfortable.
The hospitality of the crew is superb and very neat aircraft

title: Good flight and good service
text:
We paid for seats in row 3 and ended up in row 1 with loads of legroom; not sure how or why. 
The flight was on time, the service and food was excellent. The cabin crew (all female) were very smartly dressed and were also very good.
Would certainly use SpiceJet again when in India.

title: Budget Air travel
text:
Good budget tickets and service in flight. On time departure and arrival. Good service and hospitality during the flight journey. The seats are comfortable but there is not much leg space available. 

it was a good experience altogether

title: S for Super!
text:
Cost expense is quite average as compared with other airlines. 
Wonderful in flight services.
Though the quality of the food was good but the taste should be something better with.
In flight conditions were cleaned and spacious.

title: Worth flying in
text: Early morning flight at 5.55 am which left on time and reached about 10 minutes early. Good, hot breakfast was served and the air hostesses were friendly and helpful. SpiceJet is worth flying in.

title: NEVER BOOK SPICE JET EVEN IF IT IS CHEAP,CHEATERS,THEY WILL LOOT YOU.
text: Last minute  before boarding they will weigh your baggage,its trap to loot customers,weigh machine is false,even single kilo excess will not be allowed,last minute even you can not return goods to duty free,you are force to pay excess baggage.Indigo Air line is 100 times better,

title: Great flight and amazing good options!
text: This was my second time with this airline and surprisingly was a wonderful one !!last time Bangalore Chennai was a terrible one !What I loved about this flight was the entire experience right from the takeoff to the service to leg space and even the flight departure times !!!probably  the widest assortment of food items on sale on any Indian flight in domestic segment !!!

title: Tight
text: Smallish prop plane. Seats are pretty narrow and there is not much legroom. Not the most comfortable 2 hour flight.

title: Average and not family oriented
text: The flight was on time and the cabin crew were great. Thats why I gave it a 3 star. But these guys are greedy. During web check in, I wanted 3 seats together (since I was flying with my 3 yr old) and it was not possible since window and aisle were charged. They should allow passengers with kids to choose seats together even if they are towards the end. Indigo allows you to do that. Only premium seats should be charged. I was in two minds to take 3 different free seats and allow my daughter to be seated with someone else. This would have created a huge ruckus on the flight and they would have learnt a lesson (perhaps).

title: Poor Customer Service/Disappointing Journey
text: SG 468 flight which was supposed to take off at 1825 hrs got delayed due to reasons best known to spicejet. But there was zero piece of information / announcement at boarding gate by their staff. It was the travelers who stood by themselves in a que after a 15 min delay from the scheduled time is when the spicejet associate mentioned about the delay with a reason of flight just being landed and boarding will start in next 5 mins and will try to take off on the scheduled time. This was crap, just imagine, so this means that in 5 mins the passengers will step out + the aircraft will be cleaned and cleared with a proper set up again. Trust me this never happened and it was a good 1 hour delay. If such delay would have been made by a passenger, will the airlines wait for the passenger, NO. Then the airline rules would have come out on the face of the passengers.

title: Good cheap airlines
text: We upgraded to priority for a very small cost and loved the extra leg room and being the first off the plane to get your luggage.

title: Bumpy, noisy and uncomfortable flight
text: It started with big noise of propeller fans followed by bumpy and turbulent journey. The rest of the discomfort was completed by a serve of icy cold wrap. Not worth at all but unfortunately no other choice with the  flyer.

title: good for budget fliers
text: I had to book at very short notice and the luxury carriers only had steep fares remaining. SO had to compromise. But good for budget carrier. They sell window seats, so be cautious

title: Excellant Off board and on board treatment
text:
The flight scheduled at 15:35 was first delayed to 17:30 & then to 18:20. Reached airport and the airport staff was very helpful and gave me the boarding card for 14:40 flight.

In flight the Air hostess Nandini was very Helpful and Smiling. She gave a very Prompt and effective service. 

Spice Jet  should promote her.

Good Service by Spice Jet

title: Good Flight for Low cost airline
text: Low cost in India. Yes a had a good flight on time and was surprised. Staff real nice and service good

title: UNRELIABLE
text: I havebooked a flight 9 months in advance from Dehradun to Amritsar schedule for 17 Dec 2018. Received email flight was cancelled, no alternative flight provided on that day, we are in a tour in India and have 5 star  hotel booked in Amritar and flying off amritsar to other destinations in Inida

title: Value for money
text:
+ On Time
+ Food was not bad
+ The Host were courteous 

- Could improve on options of Juices i.e. they should keep more PaperBoat packets

title: Comfortable and on time
text: Happy that we chose this airline. Airline staff are polite and helpful. On the whole we had a pleasant experience.

title: Worst Airline
text:
Have to say it was our first time flying with Spicejet and we weren't impressed one bit and currently feel that we would fly again with Spicejet & wouldn't normally give such a low score or review but feel it's needed.

The service offer from the crew on our flight was terrible and lacked any personality whatsoever they may as well been no crew on the flight as not even a basic hello or goodbye sir was used.

Another point of shocking service was that we weren't offered a chance to buy a drink from the trolls service.

The worst part was even basic cabin safety wasn't carried out and it looked like the crew didn't want to ask people to put away tray tables and recline seats back to the seated position.

Overall in one word - Shocking - Spicejet should be very disappointed with the service offer in such a flooded marketplace with budget airlines within India.

title: Fantastic
text: Though the flight got delayed by hours instead of 6 am it left at 8 am, I enjoyed it because I had spice max, there were no long queues, within a minute I got boarding pass. I had extra leg space which was very good, beverage and food were fantastic. Staff both ground staff and in board were helpful. It is the best

title: Nice flight from Mumbai to Amritsar
text:
Nice flight and the flight attendants were descent and well trained. 
Spicejet is best as a low cost airline.

title: Good budget airlines
text:
Travelled in a group of 6 persons and main concern was to keep our expenses to the bare minimum.  Booked tickets nearly two months before flying to take benefit of low prices.

Timings of flight, cleanliness and basic service inside the aircraft is good.

title: Low cost airline
text: It's an economy-low cost airline. You will get whatever you are paying for. Fair in flight and on-ground experience.

title: great experience
text: This time I was with my 1.5 year old daughter had a great experience, everyone is helpful,clean and crisp, on time departure and arrival, good baggage assistant

title: Good experience
text: On time performance. Very good and comfortable travel. Have travelled with spice jet first time. In flight food (chargable) was also good.

title: As usual, normal, average
text: Average journey in economy class. I could not get ear plugs or cotton balls from the crew. My daughter was crying due to ear pain while landing and ascending. There were 2/3 more children crying during ascending and landing due to ear pain. The crew should have ear plugs or at least cotton plugs, at least for children.

title: Best Service
text:
Best service received from Aakansha,
Bikramjij,Chetna and Kiran only short flight but all gave us a best service food was good check in was straight forward in Banglore Airport

title: The last flight with SpiceJet!!!
text: As we had taken return ticket Ahmedabad - Goa - Ahmedabad, the outbound experience was worst, however the inbound experience continued to be the same. We had been rebooked to Goa - Mumbai - Ahmedabad due to summer schedule. The staff doesn't even have cotton balls to be put in ears for children. Whenever you call them for anything their response is very rude. Even asking for water is like you are begging for it. That's it the last flight with SpiceJet, never flying any more with them.

title: The worst airline to fly with
text: This is the worst airline, I have ever travelled with. They rescheduled the flight before 3 days of departure and made a afternoon flight to early morning flight. The reason is the new summer schedule, however this was just a cover to hide their mistakes and earn money. The actual reason to reschedule the flight was due to runway closure for which notice was given to them way to early, but still kept on selling flights with afternoon time to lure customers. The aircraft was not of spicejet it was a lease aircraft with russian staff who were unable to understand hindi and were totally non - co-operative. I am never flying anymore with this airline even if they offer me free ticket or I don't have any other option.

title: Expensive souvenirs broken in luggage despite request
text: It was a bad experience. Despite mentioning that the cargo luggage had delicate souvenirs which couldn't be taken in carry on, they did not handle the baggage properly and it resulted in all of them breaking. This despite them labeling it with the appropriate stickers to mention that it has delicate items.

title: Safe and reliable flight
text: Good service and nice price of our flight, form booking online, checkin , sat in the flight, all we got a good experience, we love the efficient and courtesy of the staffs, meet the schedule also appreciated, a very good choice for domestic flight in India.

title: Pleasant journey
text:
I travelled by SG 3404, ON 31/03/2018.
The flight taken off on well ahead of schedule and reached Chennai well on time.
Cleaning and hospitality of crew is excellent and the flight interior also good had a nice journey

title: Trip to Bangkok
text: Punctual.  The flight was alright.  No food is served.  It was a midnight flight both ways  We chose this airline because at the last moment Thai Airlines tickets were rather expensive.

title: hard sell
text:
given the hard up sell again on this flight with the promise of 'Priority check-in' and then received an email telling me that owing to sever congestion at Jaipur airport we had to be there 2 & 1/2 hours before scheduled departure!
When we got there as requested it was no more than business as usual!
Very disappointed and annoyed.
Then with our upgraded Spice Max ticket where we are supposed to get a meal,none was provided on this flight!
So for all the extra we paid we had no benefit what so ever.  DO NOT PURCHASE SPICE MAX

title: cheap flight - cheap flight service
text:
As the saying goes 'You pays your money - you take your chance'
Spicejet are a cheap flights carrier without the frills......and there are NO frills.
I got suckered into the upgrade of spice max.  Don't fall for it.  It's about 400 rupee more for nothing more than anyone else other than siting in seats 1A&B
But as a means of traveling long distances - then it's all  good

title: Crews on the plane were very cold and unfriendly I found.
text: I have travelled by Jet airways, Air India, Vistara. Unlike the crews of these airlines I found the crews on Spice jet not only unfriendly but lacked the human touch. They are like robots. I felt like they don't enjoy what they are doing but they are just doing it for money. To be professional is one thing but to lack that human to human touch is different. They may as well hire robots to do jobs of the crews. At the end of the flight they stand at the door with a smile to say Thank You. I felt like they were smiling cause they don't have to see us again.

title: Cattle class Airline
text:
This is a cattle class airline if you are only interested in going from point A to point B without expectation for any amenities.

Staff is very unorganized in flight boarding procedures with no preference given to handicapped and senior citizens. Seats are very tight and no to none legroom. All amenities are add on‚Äôs. Probably won‚Äôt fly this airline again unless I have to.

title: Good Flight - Spice MAX
text:
I booked a spice max seat and was happy that despite the chaos at the boarding gate they made sure to let those passengers board first and get seated before the hordes arrived.

The flight itself was smooth with no drama and the only irritating issue was them not being strict with people moving to the spicemax seats during the flight. I paid for the privilege to be there and others moved here and took up all of the space they had not paid for.

title: travel to land of chivalry and culture
text: the journey both ways was comfotable. onward via delhi and return via jaipur. spice jet in flight service is good. wish they had more options on the menu for vegetarians. more indianised stuff. food is an issue both in the airlines and worse at the airports. while you pay star rates, the food particularly at airport lounges is bad. choice is limited and the food stocked for hours and microwaved is awful. tasted the worst biryani at bombay international terminal a few months ago. hyderabad stands out in this respect. a dosa, idli or aloo ka parata is both filling and tasty. there is sufficent choice also. the food in the restaurant on the first floor of jaipur airport was good.

title: unfair treatment
text:
Basic Price is OK. Web check-in is asking for seat selection first. Without that you can't continue. Seats offered are all for sale. Free seats are blocked. Now you must make a choice, either you pay extra money, or you do the check-in at the airport. We decided to pay for the seats, to save time at the airport. We paid by credit Card, which was excepted. After the seat reservation we tried to continue. Web check-in was refused due to the fact, that we paid the ticket with a foreign credit card, we are Germans on vacation in India. Result was that we had to check in at the Airport. Knowing that in advance we would have not paid for the seats, we did it only, because it was a pre-condition for the web check-in. We feel outsmarted and will not use this airline again. 
The flight was normal. Only the wall-covering was undulating, pieces have been missing and the wholes have been covered by tape. Very strange, never saw such kind of damage and repairs at any other air airplane.

title: Good
text:
On-Time departure & Before-Time arrival is a good feeling. That's it. 
The extra pricing for Seat selection, Meals, Tea-Coffee, etc. leaves a bitter taste in ones mouth & mind.

In reality there is almost NIL difference between the fare pricing between LOW-COST & FULL-COST airlines, Only the flight time & availability makes all the decisions.

title: Good for Budget Customer
text: Its good to have connectivity for Jabalpur from Bangalore vis Hyderabad. its small Bombardier Plan less leg space but good trained staff. On time Departure 7 Arrival

title: quick fly
text: small bombardier aircraft but having good sitting arrangement. courteous staff goof flying experience. flied to & fro from Mumbai to Belgaum and return.

title: Excellent Flight Attendants!
text: I flew with SpiceJet for the second time (on my return journey). The flight was on time and the in-flight service was going on as usual. I didn‚Äôt have much expectations on such a short flight. However, when the Kids special meal box was served, my kids noticed the Kit-Kat chocolates missing in both the bags. My son was a fan of it since he got it on the forward journey (CCU-IXZ) a few days earlier. I immediately brought it to the attention of the flight attendants (Sohini and Nandini). They apologized and went to look for it. After a few minutes they came back apologizing saying there has been a mistake by the packaging company, as the special package comes to them pre-packed and Kit-Kat chocolates should have been there. We accepted their apology and moved on. But we were pleasantly surprised when Nandini came back a few minutes later with 2 candies! My kids were very happy to get them. Nandini said that it‚Äôs from her personal bag to make up the missing ones. I was so moved by such a great customer service and attitude towards making things right. That‚Äôs what made my day!! I‚Äôll be flying with you in future because of great flight attendants like them. I have flown numerous times (mostly International) and I expect this kind of great service only from the leading Middle-Eastern airlines. But Nandini and Sohini‚Äôs act changed my attitude towards SpiceJet now.

title: An uneventful Journey-what is expected
text: There were only two airlines operating between Delhi and Gaggal airport at Dharamshala. I chose Spice jet because it was cheaper slightly and also the timings were convenient to us. Plus I like the way spicejet follows up our booking till the date of departure. Any one will like to have an uneventful flight only as far as the flights are concerned because we do not want to have any event which will make us nervous. it was a peaceful flight of 1 hour 10 minutes and we were glad we traveled by this flight. The leg room was OK in the economy class. take off and landing was very smooth

title: Good overall and no through check-in
text: No issues during the flight. We had a couple of hour or layover at Hyderabad. When we requested for through check-in to Tirupati, it was denied. We had to collect out luggage at Hyderabad and recheck-in our luggage.

title: Delays and security
text:
When you fly economy you are expected to put up with a lot.  I mean you can‚Äôt expect great leg room.  
Like many economy airlines the facilities are lacking hence they are economy and keep the price down.  However, customer service should never be lacking. 
I felt very much like a sheep being herded from A to B. The staff at check in were efficient but an occasional smile would not go a miss. 
I travelled 12 times within India with Spice Jet.   For price they are hard to beat.  The experience however was poor and consistently so across all flights.   
The service they offered invariably had to go via another stop even on very short journeys which often meant hours waiting at airports for the next connection.  Again having said that I suppose that‚Äôs how they manage to do it cheap.    Next time I think I‚Äôll try another internal airline.

title: Average airline experience
text:
I traveled from Mumbai to Hyderabad with Spicejet. The overall experience with Spicejet has been average. The flight got delayed by an hour. The in-flight services are also average. You need to pay for everything unlike other airlines where you get complementary food & cold drinks.
The only pros is the cheap flight that you get if you are on a tight budget.

title: Nice Flight Experience
text: I have gone for the Conference... My flight experience is very good with this airlines. Specially there hospitality.

title: First ftime with  spicejet
text: I was first time in spice jet it was very good experience start to end. i mean to say started help to get check in and get boarding pass, very friendly staff in flight as well as supporting me too when i asking for help.

title: Very late
text: I was traveling to ahmedabad from delhi. original time was 18:45 but flght is very late around 45 min from original time. when we ask to staff they only said its late only 5 min or 15 min but not say truth.. after all we safely landed ahmedabad

title: Avoid SpiceJet
text:
My opinion is that this airline is to be avoided for all different reasons
- We were tricked by their app to miss our flight. The flight info was not updated even though we had internet coverage Also the information was confusing
- We could have made the flight anyway, but they refused to sort it out in time. Made us ending up forced to buy a new ticket...
- Their complaint mailbox seems just a fake. The only response we got was an automatic response that our complaint was received, despite many requests for update
- Also- do not use flying for many of the routes, with short travel time and good communication. This is the place to protect the environment, as India is heavily polluted and you will get a major social/cultural benefit taking eg a train, meeting nice Indian people
- last... google airline safety in India. I did not...

title: Flight delayed
text: The Flight was delayed by 3 hours and 30 minutes. The service was average.It almost wasted our entire day as we reached our hotel very late in the evening

title: Value for Money
text: the flight was punctual- check in was smooth. As we have to pay for choice of seat we didn't do a web check in- Food also had to be pre-ordered. so pls do not forget to do that.It was good overall.

title: quick and prompt service
text: Prompt at the check in counter as also in luggage checking .Probably the aircraft arrived late but the staff made it ready to fly on time in quick time .  There were some mismanagement for keeping hand baggages in overhead beans but the staff finally managed it . We had to circle in the air for about 45 minutes so the flight reached late but it was not their fault . Luggage delivery was also smooth . Overall experience is good .

title: on time, decent
text: the food options are really blah. but the flight was fine in terms of on time flying and landing. nothing extra ordinary but a good connectivity.

title: Delayed flight flying experience on 08 March 2018
text:
Departure of the flight was at 5.35pm. Was informed that flight was delayed by 30 minutes. Subsequently further delays resulted in the flight departing at 8pm due "congestion" as announced by the airline. No complimentary water or coffee was provided by the airline at the airport nor inflight. In fact the cabin crew stated we have to pay for our coffee which is an insult to the airlines inability to provide refreshments to passengers of the delayed flight. 
They provided a rose to women passengers inflight because of Women's Day.

title: horrifing experice
text: flying with spice jet from Cochin to Chennai on 19th March 18.00pm flight. arrived at the check in desk in Cochin after scanning the checking luggage. two of us were flying .my friend's case was 22kg instead of  15kg where as minewas 14kg.my friedns didnt have much in his hand luggage same was my caseand we were flying with BA next day morning from chennai to london.on an earlier flight on arrival spice jet was happy to consider out hand luggage allowance to check in luggage allowance.the check in person in Cochin said they cant consider hand luggage allowance.we decided to repack and re scan the cases. one wasmore than 16kg and other more than 17kg where as allowed allowance is 15 plus 7kg of hand luggage per person. told the person in the check in counter that one person have no hand luggage. which she responded that you can repack again. we were asked to pay for 3kg excess . we agreed to pay 1 kg and 2kg separate receipts.the way whole thing was handled by the staff was not pleasant. hope i dint need to fly with this airlines again. and spoil nice time spend in india .

title: Nice flight to Chandigarh
text:
I took a single hop flight to Chandigarh from Kolkata, via Delhi. Probably this is the only airline that provides single-hop to Chandigarh without changing aircraft. The experience was nice, on-time. I pre-booked meals, which was very good. Only problem is with the leg-space (crammed) similar to any other LCC.
Overall a good experience.

title: Flight on Bombaridier Q 400
text: Spicejet is a good low cost carrier. It was a pleasant change to have sufficient leg space in seating and inspite of it being a propeller driven small aircraft.. did not experience any turbulence. The cabin crew was efficient and polite.

title: Review
text:
Air hostress is so polite
They help their first time travelling passengers
Crew members are so beautiful

title: Nice
text: Ahmedabad to Dubai and back in Spicejet. Nice experience in an economy class international flight. All the aspects were up to my expectations. The flight was late to start with, but made up at arrival. The staff was courteous and highly professional. They do lack on one front.... Entertainment.. They could put some magazines or newspapers apart from airport shopping manuals, and comics for kids. That could have helped them to gain a fifth star from me.

title: Anti-anatomy seats
text: All of Spice Jets Boeing 737 jets have seats that are 33 inches from the back of one seat to the one in front.  The reason I know that is that my leg is 35 inches from hip to knee.  I was limping in pain after my trip from Hyderabad to Siliguri and hope never to fly Spice Jet again.

title: I love Spice Jet
text:
Wow what service! My check in was easy the young lady was charming and asked if I wanted to upgrade to more leg room.  I did and was only told about priority queuing.  

The seats were comfortable wide and very nice.  One air hostess coming off the airplane with her bag was arrogant and rude and I thought here we go some princess thinking she better than anyone.  I'm glad she got off was happy that she wasn't our host.  
There were three host a young man and two very attractive young ladies. 

The flight was great and I found out that because I upgraded I was entitle to a meal and drink.  
The food was great the service was excellent and I brought loads of spice jet snacks as gifts for my family.  Shame the card machine wasn't working I would have brought more. 

Overall a very pleasant experience

title: Extra Baggage Charged for the cabin baggage
text: In other airlines, maximum weight for cabin baggage is 7 Kg and Ladies Handbag and laptop bags are not considered within that 7kg range. However, Spicejet has a policy that ladies handbag is also acceptable only when it has minimal weight and laptop bag + ladies handbag + cabin baggage = 7kg.

title: Not very satisfactory experience
text: For my return trip from Bagdogra to Kolkata yesterday I availed Spice Jet flight because of suitability of timing. The aircraft was an ATR with comfortable seats. All passengers were boarded in time but then were made to sit for more than 40-45 minutes without air conditioning and lights and no announcement till the passengers started protesting. The crew were smart and helpful. Unlike other airlines which do not serve hot food in short flights, it offered the same. This experience may be an aberration, but otherwise this airline has improved a lot in recent times.

title: Good Experience: Flight pre-ponement by 20 mins was a Surprise
text:
The flight was pre-poned by 25. The airline made it a point to inform well in time via different channels: Call, SMS and e-mail, however given it was an early morning flight it was still in-convenient.

Other than this everything was good: Food, cleanliness and staff. I think the in-flight food in SpiceJet is better than Indigo. The flight is not very crowded.

title: Good experience to fly with Spicejet
text: It was a good experience to fly with spicejet from Mumbai to Amritsar. In cabin experience was good should spice up ground experience to make it a perfect spice up experience of spicejet. Improve Check in experience through Kisko machines, flight check in counter, baggage delivery. Rest you are doing your best. In cabin food experience is best amongst competitors

title: Comfortable flight although spice max isn't that worth
text:
I flew to Madurai with my Mother in January. We opted for Spicemax seats (1000Rs per passenger).  Seats were no doubt very comfortable and had ample legroom.  Also meals were served in flight. But additional details mentioned like Priority checkin, priority check out and priority boarding are just false. There is no such thing. Believe me. I had to argue with spice jet staff for priority check in. Then we had to stand in regular line for boarding. So pls choose wisely before you opt for spice Max.
Spicejet staff is cooperative. And flight reached on time.

title: Overall Value for Money
text:
Recently I , With my family, traveled to Udaipur & Return ( to go to Nathdwara) and took Spicejet Airlines ,as they had convenient timing and was working out the most Vale for Money. This was my second time in all these years that I flew Spicejet. 

The overall experience, Check-in, Boarding & in cabin services were good and we deed not encounter any issues. The flight from Mumbai was on time , though the flight from Udaipur was delayed by a short time. Overall a good experience.

title: On time departure and arrival
text: I reached the self check in kiosk 60 minutes prior departure, and got my bag checked in and was through security in 24 minutes, in time for boarding the aircraft which actually took off 5 minutes prior schedule. Flight was uneventful, and arrival was 8 minutes before schedule. Good stuff!

title: Flight from bengaluru to goa via mumbai
text: Awful old planes late poor check in procedures dreadful food uncomfortable seats poor service late take off on all legs dirty aircraft

title: Value for money
text: It is worthwhile for the money we paid. For Rs1000 extra we got a few complements. But their ground handling is at a mess.

title: Worst Indian Airline
text: This has over time become the worst airline in India. Their staff ayre rude, they charge for priority check in and then dont open the priority counter. The seats on the flights are getting smaller, almost no leg space, very less seat recline (I flew some domestic flights with no seat recline), shoulder space is alse very bad. I have decided to not fly with them, since the fare difference is not so great and its not worth the torture.

title: Good Airlines
text: Good and descent flight with on time. Crew are helpful. We have to buy to eat and drink except water.

title: SpiceJet Bombardier Q400
text: SpiceJet Bombardier Q400 is a small flight with lot of noise. But the service is good, and it reaches Bangalore on time

title: Just a normal travel experience
text: I am quite neutral to the travel experience with them as my travelling has been quite normal with no issues whatsoever. I am ok to travel with them in future and hope they introduce free snacks like the jet airways flight.

title: Budget indian airline
text: Four hours delay.Two hours we was into the plane and we are waiting for the pilot.Terrible experience.

title: Nothing that really stood out.
text: While I personally did not encounter any real hurdles I heard a couple of passengers complain the check in counter staff were not professional. For me the check in was smooth and yes they were very particular with regards to weight off the bags checked in. Service on flight was similar to the one, one would expect of a budget airline. Sorry but I do not have anything negative to say but there was also nothing that really stood out for me. Hence the non committal 3 star rating.

title: Baggage Allowance
text:
We used spice jet mostly to travel in India.

Good airline, except that we gad a mishap with our baggage handling. One of our bags and two clothing items  was damaged.

We abandoned putting in a complaint because it seemed to take forever.

All I wanted the international travellers to be wary of is that baggage allowance on domestic  air lines was 15 kg per person.

We ran in to trouble because our international airline allowed us 25 to 30 kg per person.

title: Affordable airlines
text:
Booked one month before and got really good prices for the flight..it was an early morning flight..thankfully the ground staff started boarding early..take off was a little shaky as the weather was not good..got window seat luckily...nice landing by the pilot..The experience was nice...
Cost wise recommended..but they dont allow free web check in....

title: Very bad experience with spice jet
text:
Flight SG 913 PNR BFZ65E
Because of heavy traffic in Delhi got stuck and reached late for boarding for 20 min. They didn‚Äôt allow me to board. I requested them badly but they denied.The counter staff is not cooperative 25 min is left for flight departure which is I think enough if they want me to go in,but they are not at all helpful. Intentionally I didn‚Äôt reach late the staff has to understand that. The man standing there simply mark me no show in front of me which is very unhelpful manner. This was my first and last time booked with spice jet never ever travel with this airline in any situation.

title: Hospitality
text: This trip with Spicejet was my fourth during the present year- one to Calcutta and 3 in the route Bagdogra - Bangalore. But to my utter surprise I didn't find one single ground staff or air hostess welcoming with a smile - which costs nil. Although flying sector is merged with hospitality they are most probably ill trained in the matter.

title: Checkin Counter Staff Need to be honest and professional
text:
This is a budget airline. The online check-in is not very helpful as it generally shows many seats already occupied suggesting in a way to go for "preferred seats" with more leg room at extra cost.

The Self Check-in carousels at the airport were not functioning properly. The staff at the check-in counter also make a serious attempt to sell the "preferred seat" at extra cost. This attempt is made in a very dishonest way by claiming that the flight is full even if you are at the airport 2-3 hours before departure, and a seat close to the front of the aircraft is not available.

Check-in Counter staff need to be honest and helpful.

title: Nice experience
text: We were travelling with infants and aircraft crew was very helpful when we needed help in handling the babies. The seats were comfortable. We were provided with food as we did web-check. Overall it was a nice flight.

title: Mediocre low cost airline
text: Ok it is not expensive, but they will try to take money out of you. The say your allowance is 15kgrs and they make you pay 300 rupees for each extra kgr. Bottomline for two cases of 20 kgrs, we have to pay more money than the plane ticket. Zero politeness of helpfulness. The flight just everything average

title: Unwelcome entry
text: Took the 13:10 Hrs flight from Kochi airport.What I disliked was  while entering the aircraft, the hostesses did not even look at the passengers in spite of 2 of them were at the door.It was an hour's flight and arrival was on time.While leaving the craft they said thank you with smiling (or was it grinning?).

title: Can fly SpiceJet
text: The required task was performed - of transporting me from one city to another. Nothing exceptional, but serves the purpose.

title: Good aircraft
text:
Well maintained and polite crew staff made our journey comfortable.
Due to poor visibility although the flight take off was half an hour delay, with their nice hospitality of the crew members of the aircraft, we never found any irritation.

title: Comfortable flight
text: The aircraft was a turboprop, but it was a very comfortable flight.  The staff was courteous and was on time.   We found it fun travelling in a turboprop.  The cabin is less noisy and the view is better.  Overall a good journey

title: travel
text:
The flight was on time and the experience was good.
the service was good. choice of food for in flight order is 
not much unless you pre book your meal.

title: On time, smooth journey
text:
The flight was on time and the travel was smooth. Condition of the flight was good. Checkin process took some time due to the crowd.
Would recommend this flight (SG152, departs at 7.20 am), as it is always on time and reached Delhi in the morning hours.

title: Good to fly with spice
text:
Overall flight experience can be better if adding spice to make it jet experience of Spicejet. Feedback mechanism should be taken seriously and implemented to improve the spice experience. Inflight food experience is one of the best, Airport check in experience should be improved with better customer service, check in flight experience.
Crew members should have more professional approach.
Spice up for great Spicejet experience. Will love to spice up with Spicejet

title: nice trip
text: very good flight we go to bangkok good trip and nice experince with spicejet with delicious food nice trip

title: They r better than Indigo and goair
text:
In economy class service.spicejet is better option than indigo and goair ..... According to my opinion indigo and goair is worst airlines in Service and comfortability as well.
Jet airways is best in class.

title: Should be more accomodative
text: The Airline should be more practical and accommodate the passenger relating to hand baggage. I was carrying a small bag weighing only 9.8 kg. and there was no check in baggage. I requested the check in staff to allow me the same as cabin baggage, since its arrival at Kolkata was at 22:30 hours. A passenger is allowed 22 kgs including cabin + check in baggage, but the staff was reluctant to allow. Of course, in case, I had check in baggage also, in that case the staff was right but with one small bag of less than 10 kg should not have been a problem for them.. GO BY THE RULE BUT TRY TO ACCOMODATE ALSO.

title: SPICE FLIERS
text: Check-in and Immigration was Ok.  I got my choice of Window  seat away from the wings.  Food was so so. Landing was perfect and took time for the bay to bridge across for immigration

title: Flight was congested and late even after delayed departure time
text: We were informed 10 earlier that the flight was delayed to evening due to runway closure at Ahmadabad airport. We reached as per the rescheduled departure time. I wanted to opt for web check in however due to huge costs, I refrained from doing so. The staff was understanding and made sure we got seats together. The flight delayed by 20 minutes. The seats were good.

title: Trip to Chennai and Back
text:
I was travellig on Holi to Chennai, while checking in (which was a great experience) they had stikers in the shape of colour splashes which they put on my jacket, while boarding the plane they were welcoming all passangers with a chandan tikka.
Great initiative Spicejet. 
The journey back was as good, as luck may have it, got emergency exit seats with lots of leg room, the flight took off 20 minutes early, but landed at the scheduled time, that is Delhi Airport.

title: Late leaving but flight OK
text: The flight was very late leaving (1 1/2 hrs) and the waiting room was chaotic.  Boarding was every man for himself but the cabin crew were pleasant and efficient.  There was a very limited selection of food available to purchase but that wasn't important on a 2hr flight.  Overall it was OK for short haul on a budget airline.

title: a decent discount airline experience in India
text: Lie IndiGo, boarding a SpiceJet flight is a bit of a free for all. But, the flight started boring almost 20 minutes early, departed 10m minutes early and landed almost 30 minutes ahead of schedule. The aircraft was a small turboprop (Bombardier Q400), but the overhead bins did accommodate "standard" carryon luggage (albeit sideways). I would suggest paying extra for priority checkin (if available).

title: Good Experiance
text:
Great service provided the flight starts on time. Served hot and delicious. The leg space in the carrier is satisfactory. 

Great service provided the flight starts on time. Served hot and delicious. The leg space in the carrier is satisfactory.

title: Best avoided
text: Very budget airline. No food. Crammed seating. Decent staff. Aircraft build is bad. Shakes violently all the time. Only for emergencies or great savings.

title: Add up spice to Spicejet
text: Adding some more spice to your overall flight experience can make you a great spice in the aviation sector. Good food comfortable sitting space. Little improvment in professional services at ground level and in cabin will make you spice up your customer flight experience.

title: Average!!!!
text: No value for jet Max members.Need to wait for long time while boarding.Then make to wait before reaching flight.

title: Beware of Cheating During flight boarding
text:
SpiceJet operates from Dubai to Pune direct flight. After check in, you are left at Dubai airport for shopping as Dubai has lot of Duty free stuff for purchasing. However beware of hand luggage you are carrying. Although airlines are not that strict if you are carrying Duty free liquor or chocolate. Hand baggage allowance is 7 kg (9kg if you have laptop). If you purchase 2 liquor bottles and chocolates you will cross your baggage allowance. 

At the time of boarding, flight staff check your hand baggage weight. Now you are trapped. You cannot reduce weight and book into luggage. You have only two options either pay excess baggage charge or throw items. 

Be careful, this is new trick by SpiceJet airlines to earn money.

title: Terrible customer service on check in
text: The person checking us in was terrible. He charged us 15000 INR extra baggage. We were traveling on an international flight two days later and explained the circumstances to him. He refused to listen and would not let us speak to a supervisor. We understand that we had to pay excess baggage but he changed the number on us two times. Awful service. Indigo from bengaluru to Mumbai was 1000 times better. More considerate and really tried to help us out. Never flying this airline again!

title: Great service
text: Great service provided the flight starts on time. The flight service are commendable but they are prone to being delayed in short distance. The premium service provided by the service provider is good. For other sectors like delhi to kochi, the food service is superb. Served hot and delicious. The leg space in the carrier is satisfactory. Even the smaller aircraft with 2x2 seats are less noisy as compared to the other carriers, as per my experience.

title: Good Flight
text: It is a basic no frills flight.Polite & Courteous crew. Flight was delayed due to Airport Congestion - however the pilots did their best to minimise the delay. It was a pleasant experience.

title: Cooperative staff of SpiceJet.
text: The on board service was good, leg space also almost comfortable for 4 hrs flight.But for more space they charge money and provide you premium seats. I would recommend this airline as the Cooperative staff was plus pont, they adjusted few kg extra weight of the luggage.tnx.

title: Horrible !!
text: 3rd class service with horrible landing by the captain. Some of your staff is too fast in speaking and announcing things . Little bit of over proudness observered . Seats are worn out , side handles broken .. a complete disaster flying with  you guys .. Big No for spice jet üëéüèªüëéüèª

title: Flight attendants were courteous and friendly. I got complementary class upgradation and got Jain meal of my chioce
text: Though flight was not on time, I have a nice experience as my check-in, and boarding was smooth. I got complementary class upgradation and got Jain meal of my choice.    Flight attendants were courteous and friendly. Flight landing was very smooth.

title: good flight
text: good flight and i really appreciate the pilots first officer and assistant for best flight take off and fight duration and landing ...

title: Not so great
text:
The flight was good  but the crew were too busy with so many things. 
Our flight was from Dehradun to Chennai with a stop at Delhi. It takes only 20 - 25 minutes to fly from Dehradun to Delhi. We had pre-booked our meals. We were served our meals as soon as boarding was completed. We requested them to serve after Delhi but they refused. So we had to eat our meal while taxi-ing and while taking off. They allowed us to have our tray tables open while taking off. It was horrible to have a meal like that.

title: An average experience while booking
text: I booked 4 tickets for my upcoming travel on goibibo and unfortunately the booking was not confirmed by spicejet due to some issue. Looking forward to travel with spicejet and hope it will be a good and comfortable journey.

title: Surat experience
text:
We took SG flight to goa from Jdh thinking for a super pleasure flight since it was an hoping at svt surat 
But it was horrible experience we have to deport the plain I don‚Äôt know for what again get security done and then they asked us to stay in a hall where there was noting to do 
Literally no tea coffee not even water 
I would never take this flight again 
Disappointed

title: Pathetic
text:
Since the time i booked my tickets and until i reached my destination, i kept on regretting as why did i book it with spice jet !

i just had mailed to them about some query... that was not replied on time by them and then consequently another frustrating, horrifying, insulting instances kept adding on.

i had a terrible experience while trying to book pre board meal option... 
and when i got it on board, i cursed myself as why did i book it after checking the taste of it.... it was pathetic.
in fact, i also had booked two bags as well for our kids for Rs. 350 each which was supposed to be in 'airplane shaped bag'.
after seeing those bags, i laughed a loud as those were not at all 'airplane shaped bags' at all from any angle but just one small pouch of very inferior quality easily available on road side.

also the seat size was very small and not at all comfortable... 
seat covers were of inferior quality material, dark brown.... it was giving a feel of any state roadways buses.

also the most annoying things was that in spite of booking six tickets under 'friends & family' scheme.. i very categorically had asked at the counter to provide me with two window seats.... but to my surprise..upon reaching on the plane i found that in my row of the seats, window was not there... that section was blocked for any window.
i had small kids with me who wanted to enjoy the view through it ... but in spite of telling them, booking six tickets, getting the false assurance as well ..i did not get windows to view out..

Their call center is even full of arrogant, nonsense, bullying people...

NEVER EVER WOULD FLY WITH IT IN FUTURE... NOR WOULD LET ANYBODY ELSE IN MY CONTACTS.

title: Hidden fees, and no disclosure
text: We had a very convenient trip booked with SpiceJet, leaving us about 4 hours to make an international connection in Delhi. A few weeks before we were due to go, we were told that our flight had been changed. This meant we now had just 2.25 hours to make our international connection, including picking up luggage, changing terminals, and checking in. We phoned and were told that if we wanted to change to an earlier flight, we would have to pay a fee (this new flight would have us waiting at Delhi airport for approximately 8 hours). Apparently SpiceJet will only allow changes free-of-charge when the flight is changed by 2 hours or more (1.75 hours was within this time limit). If I had elected to cancel our flight at this stage I would have received a reimbursement of approximately half the price of the tickets. So, I agreed to change the flights, and paid the fee for the change. I later decided to purchase flights on Jet Airways, as this flight arrived at a perfect time for our international connection. On contacting SpiceJet to cancel the flight, they now informed me that I would receive only about 10% reimbursement of the original value of the fare. This was a complete surprise as they had neglected to inform me of this new restriction at the time I had initially agreed to pay for the change to the flight. If I had been informed of this I would have cancelled the ticket at that time. This lack of disclosure is unethical business practice. Needless to say, we will not attempt to fly SpiceJet again. Jet Airways, on the other hand, was fantastic, on-time, and cheaper than SpiceJet.

title: "Very Pleasant journey"
text: I went to Dharamshala Trip with my Wife to enjoy our Marriage Anniversary on 19.02.2018. This was very nice journey with SPICEJET. Seats were neat and clean. Crew members were very cooperative during the journey, this was only 1 hr journey but we enjoyed a lot.-thanks

title: Front toilets are for crew only
text: Overall the flight experience was beautiful. The crew members were courteous and helpful. I was travelling with a patient in wheel chair and the ground support team at both the airports gave excellent service. However during flight I found that the crew members at the front were blocking the front toilet with there food trolley and merchandise trolley. Whereas they were using it often. They were redirecting most of the users to rear toilet. Even though in the front seats most of the passengers were travelling with patients they could not use the toilet when required. Though I personally did not require the service but I felt it awkward.

title: This time their was little less spice while flying with spice jet
text: Travelled from Ahmedabad to Mumbai late night. Ground team need to be little friendly to inform passengers for the boarding gate information not being displayed on the board. A professional touch would have made it better. Food was good and cabin crew team was receptive some more professional approach would have added spice to flying experience. Food was good served hot, coffee taste awesome. Hope to have some more spice added to Spice jet flight next time

title: Veery good amongst low cost airlines
text: Flew Spicejet from Jaisalmer to New Delhi (flight SG 2983) and thence to Mumbai (by connecting flight SG 163). Have been flying Spicejet for quite sometime and have  had very satisfactory experience. Catering on this airline offers excellent options, staff is courteous, upkeep and maintenance is very good. Overall, good value for money.

title: Never on time
text:
As it was for a business trip, I had booked my flight tickets through my official travel portal.. quest4travel. To book inflight food, The only option on this website was veg/non veg .. so I opted for non veg, paid and thought i can select a meal on board. But once onboard there was no choice but to stick with meal of the day!
 Flight took off on time but landed half an hour late.

title: Great price
text:
Local travel by air in India is very inexpensive, and compares to other forms of travel, thanks to SpiceJet. The planes are smaller and ours were on time. The staff spoke English and were very pleasant. However baggage allowance is 15 Kg. If you are travelling with a lot of baggage be prepared to pay almost as much as your flight cost.
Note: The Govt of India does not allow pictures or videos to be taken in airports for security reasons.

title: Worst Indian airline.
text: I made my bothways booking at Makemytrip.com on Jan 30, '17 for a scheduled going flight on Feb 24 and a return on Feb 25. This, just a one night trip, was purely to re-connect with my aged parents and their aged friends. My aged parents were travelling after 4 yrs to Jabalpur and visiting their older friends. Since I thought this as great opportunity, I decided to fly for a single night in the hope to meet all together. The flight from Mumbai was at 14:10. I was going to reach Terminal T1 at 12:45. However, I received a email/sms early morning of the same day saying the flight was delayed to 14:50. So I reached at 13:30 to the Spice Jet desk. The staff told me that the counter was closed. I was informed that the erstwhile plane had 80 seats and on account of some technical reasons the plane had been changed to one that had 78 seats. I was the 79th passenger and since I reported last I was offloaded. Since there was no other flight that day and since my parents were returning the very next day I had to forfeit the journey. The worst thing is that the airline knew it had 79 paid passengers but flew a 78 seat aircraft knowing perfectly well that 01 passenger will be offloaded. No software or code sharing glitch but an intentional offload. So much for passenger convenience and service.

title: Good Airlines
text: Spice jet is a decent airlines and with well maintained timings.Traveled many times on this airline and would say always had a good time.

title: Typical cattle class
text: Typical cattle class. Untrained hostesses. They get confused while serving in flight meals (paid). Bad food. Worse packing of food. Dirty stinking toilets. Only good point. Flight reached 10 minutes before time.

title: SG124 Delhi to Jolly Grant
text: On a liesurely Sunday afternoon, it was a breeze through from checkin to security. The boarding was smooth, though through transfer by bus. This airline departs from Terminal 1D of Delhi. This is a Boeing aircraft, it took only 40 minutes of flying time to touchdown at Jolly Grant. The flight was ontime and smooth. The bags were on belt soon, the boring part was the wait for the single bus which was shuttling between the Jolly Grant arrival  terminal and the aircraft.

title: Avearge Budegt Airline
text: Departed on time and reached destination before time. Cabin was clean. Luggage at the belt was quick. Cabin crew are well groomed.

title: family travel
text: travelled from bagdora to delhi first time with my mother good experience to travel with spice jet...

title: Inexpensive, ok for short route
text:
This time we booked ticket for four of our family, the cost was cheap flew to hyderabad. 

Departed / Arrived on time  
Check in ok 
Others are ok.

Hyderabad Airport to Hyderabad is very far, it comes around 30 kms, 45 minutes on express highway. 
Airport to hotel we paid Rs 638.  OLA 
Hotel to airport we paid Rs. 503 OLA

title: Manipulating with passengers. very extremely cheating levels.
text:
The staff is rude and non-cooperative. The rules of carrying luggage are misleading. 
You can carry only 7kgs of 1 bag or else you will be charged an exorbitant fee. Even if you are a family, you will be charged separately based on the individual baggage, which is ridiculous. There is no justification provided but only hidden disclaimers. I mean i don't understand of logic behind that what make deference between carry a luggage with 7 kg in aircraft. it's passengers choice. spice jet gave a free baggage allowance of 22 kg par parsons. so it's passenger choice whether they want to carry a. or else they wanted to give for chek in. what make deference i don't understand spice jet using a same aircraft for passengers and baggages. come on spice jet. i believe u guys have much inefficient to understand. second thing they cheating with costumers regarding the 1 kg charges as they mentioned that spice jet only charging a 80 rs par kg but the moment i got to know it was a 300 rs par kg. i was like what the hell. spice jet airlines manipulates to the travelers. they took from me 1500 rs for the excesses bag of 5 kg. but it was not excesses luggage why i charged because i was not caring a 7 kg of luggage my total weight of luggage it was 21 kg. but still they charged to me. we don't have any others options we have to pay because we can not miss the flight at last months. just because of manipulating information of spice jet airlines. i really very disappointing for this behaviours of airlines. if you guys refunds my 1500 rs chargers. so that'll be great. hospitality even the basic services don't exist for passengers.

title: Good Budget Flight
text: Good budget flight, Flight was bit delayed but managed to cut the time. service offered by Spicejet for Spice max is good

title: amazing on board service crew
text:
from one destination to other and return same day with same flight is happening too often , and every time i fly with spice jet i am floored with their on board service view they are simply superb , i am afraid I don‚Äôt remember their name but flight Kolkata to Bangalore crew and back both flight had some amazing people. 
They serve you with smile and are attentive, i am big fan of their menu variety.
Only one suggestion seats near gates are too clumsy it hardly has any space.

title: Good Budget Airline
text:
