Member of Spice  so had a priority check in otherwise it would have time. I was suprised to learn I was not allowed priority in baggage but only checkin. I had even paid for extra for seat.
Getting GST Invoice Took time and number of mails

title: Good on time Flight
text: Good on time flight landed on time in flight ws good on time luggage arrived. Value for money good direct flight

title: Good service for budget but with some delay
text:
The check-in and boarding was with priority as I was traveling in SpiceMax. The flight was bit delayed  by 30mins. It was a morning flight and the complimentary meals were not that good. The options for breakfast are not good, that's what I felt. 

On arrival, the baggage was delayed although I had priority baggage out. But that's fine for me. Else everything was good. The crew, services etc.

title: Good experience
text:
Long domestic flight. Very convenient. Good service. Good food.
Nice staff. About 4 hours well spent

title: Good service but not on time
text:
I am 6'3feet tall and I chose Spicemax for extra legroom. Along with that SpiceMax gave me priority check-in, boarding and baggage. That was very good, considering I didn't have to wait in long queues. The flight was at night and the complementary meal was fine.

Now regarding their timeliness. The flight I traveled wasn't something which was on-time. First a delay was notified for 1hr and 35mins for operational reasons which changed the time from 11:05pm to 12:40am. But the boarding started only at 12:30am and the plane left the tarmac by 1:20am only. My luggage got a minor damage too. These are the things I didn't liked about Spicejet. Rest all was good. The crew, service.

title: Dissapoints with consistancy
text: This ordinary airline comes my way every time I travel to Coimbatore for at least to or fro journey with matchless consistency of terrible service from cabin space to cleanliness and zero offering pertaining to food, oh yes, even water.

title: Efficient service
text: We flew from Bangalore to Madurai. The overall service was very good and efficient. We were travelling with elders. Staff were courteous and they asked for any help for elders. Would recommend this airline.

title: Efficient and service
text: Spicejet a basic low cost carrier but with good service and efficiently. Highly attentive staff. Food is good but a bit spicy. Got the spice max which gives fast access for yourself suitcases and good seats. Cost a bit extra but worth it.

title: hassle-free!
text:
Booked tickets at 2 pm for a 6 pm flight!
Hassle-free check-in. On time departure, before time arrival- what more can you ask for!
Only cleanliness can be improved upon.

title: Spicejet
text: Spicejet seating is cramped not comfortable for long journey. for tall person its not comfortable at all. wouldn't like to take a long journey flight. took this flight as it was matching the time and dint want to travel by road to Bombay airport where tickets for full service even Emirates airline tickets where cheaper. Both times flights were delayed.

title: Beautiful experience of Spice Jet from Kolkata to Chennai
text:
I travelled with my mother, wife and elder son in Spice Jet flight from Kolkata to Chennai. The visitors lounge in Netaji Airport in Kolkata was awesome. Food Court was good with fish fry, chicken cutlet and Indian dishes. The Spice Jet Airbus took us to the Spice Jet flight,
The seats in the Spice Jet flight were comfortable. We booked the food before. The flight provided us lovely chicken tikka, parsele potato, roll and cold drink. The cold drink even included guava juice. I got two window seats. The view of the clouds, sky from the window was awesome. The flight reached us to Chennai in scheduled time, within 2 and a half hours. It was very eventful journey.

title: Budget travel - expect experience accordingly!
text: Spicejet caters for budget travellers - it has average internal decor, the timing of the flight was delayed for departure but the internal service staff do a reasonable job. The seats are average for such class of airlines.

title: best food on board
text: this time i travelled with spicejet during my ahmedabad trip. on time arrival and departure and no delays. it was a late night flight so i tried their paid on board food for dinner and it was amazing anf reasonably priced too.

title: good, efficient
text:
after long time travelled with SPICE JET. Surely the staff is efficient. 
Eco seats are way too cramped up for space. But thats how it is.

title: Average experience
text: Average experience. Food was good. But they should add some different varities in food. Cheap in rate.

title: Flight Timings
text: Evening Flight of this Airline is always delayed by 40 -50 minutes. I have experience of 2-3 times while airline staff is polite on this and giving that incoming airline arrival late leads to dalay in departure of Pune Flight. Must check timing before leaving to airport for this facility.

title: food
text: can they provide more Upma packets as we found on both our flights no upma available for service.Every thing else is fine, just add variety to food.

title: Pathetic legroom
text:
We were travelling with an infant, The legroom and seat size is impossible to travel with an infant. Onward journey was done by Jet Airways which was way better. 
ATR of Spicejet from JDH to DEL had better legroom than the Spicejet Jet from DEL - BLR.

title: An excellent local Indian airline
text: I have used Spicejet on more than one occasion for local flights within India.  Have found them very efficient and on time.  No problem with luggage and friendly staff.  Definitely recommended.

title: Great Punctuality
text: It was great, The staff is good.They follow the time lines. They keep informing the Travelers, they do check if any guest needs any special assistance during their travel.

title: allways late
text: average air line or ye aise air line hai mai jitne baar bhe travel krta hu such a horrible engine is too much sound to other airline comparisan...

title: NOT EVEN MY SECOND CHOICE
text: Flew this airline recently only due to timing compulsions considering the limitations of flying to Delhi in deep winter-fog , ceremonial events etc. Again disappointed after paying top price. These LCCs are ruthless with their pricing and change policies without really considering Value to Customer. The cabin was poorly lit in a very large aircraft, the service was matter of fact and it was a fairly soul-less experience. But the flight was smooth, that has to be said.

title: Baggage will probably get  checked
text: Due to constraints on baggage weight which was 7 kg / 15.4 lbs you should anticipate luggage being checked as cargo bay luggage.  This could be a concern for computers and other electronics that you don't want to leave your side.  Overhead bin space is severely limited also.  Otherwise, very good service and inexpensive.  Flight departed and arrvied on time.

title: Excellent so professional.
text: Everything great from boarding to professionals on board.  I fly a lot and this was one of my top best experiences.

title: Average at best
text: We were 4 passengers traveling together & despite our best efforts, we couldn't get seats together, neither through web check in nor through airport check in. We got the seats in front of the emergency exit, which meant an extremely cramped seat with nonexistent legroom.

title: Straightforward
text: With the given competition and tight airfares, spicejet has come up with bare minimum frills and fancies on their flights. Every thing (food, drinks, leg space, window...üòÖ) is a payable extra... and being in business myself I totally understand their limitations. The best part I love about this airline is... the flights take off on time... what else do we need on a domestic flight?... I think the airline is doing well and I'm more than willing to pay for the nachos than being stuck on the airport for delays! Cheers Spice jet

title: Poor service
text:
Ground staffs at check in counter and air hostess lack of service mind. They don't care about their passengers.
Food is very poor and expensive.
I do not recommend this airlines to those who travlling in India.

title: Mediocre Fly experience to Hyderabad .........
text:
I was with my family to Hyderabad for my personal trip during Dec 2017.  Initially , the airline announced 15 minutes delay but the original delay was 45 Minutes. All the food items inside the Flight is very expensive & not worth for money.
Due to weather condition, the stability of the flight also added woes to our comfort.

title: Can be best compared with Ryanair
text:
I was travelling from Bangalore to Ahmedabad for some personal reason and I was lucky to get a very cheap ticket 3 days before the departure date ( AMD-BLR ticket costs 5k-8k if booked 3 days prior). The problem with SpiceJet is, they try to extract money out of everything, moving on the path of RYANAIR. Their web check-in is blocked for window and aisle seats, you need to pay for that. food sucks. unfriendly ground staff who actually sets the baggage weigh meter +1.5kg to fool the passenger if the passenger is not alert and add extra baggage charge. try to point out the error and they'll start behaving rudely. 
The same thing happened to me, I did not web check-in to avoid the extra cost and arrived at the counter 2 hours early to get a window seat. As soon as I pointed out the error, the ground staff set the meter to zero, the attendant checking my id said sorry and when I asked for a window seat, she denied saying that the flight is full and you have to adjust with the middle seat. After the gates were closed I realised the flight was going less than 50% in capacity. When I requested if I could change my seat, the air hostess denied saying, I'll be charged.
This airline sucks a big time.

title: First Journey with Spicejet
text: It was the first time, I got chance to fly for the first time to Kashmir from Delhi. It was the flight of Spice jet from T1 domestic terminal of New Delhi. First experience which i had with spice jet is delay takeoff. I can understand it happened many time because of air traffic conjunction but the very less leg space was very annoying thing for me. I was not comfortable with the space of this airline. My height is not too long but yes it is 5.10.

title: Average flight experience
text: Flights get delayed with no back up arrangements or convenience for travelers. Support staff not very supportive.

title: Think Twice If You Have More Than 15 Kilos
text: This budget airline may not be the best choice for the international traveler/tourist because of their baggage policy. If you have more than 15 kilos, you may end up paying much more than flying with a regular airline. That is what happened to me; I payed almost twice because I had 23 kilos. Otherwise, it is a reliable, well-managed budget airline.

title: 30 kg of luggage allowed
text: 23 kg check in luggage , 7 kg check in luggage is allowed. Good looking smart staff. Comfortable chairs. No entertainment on flight less leg room . The plane look old it was Boeing I guess . The flight was on time .

title: DANGERS OF SPEMAX /CHEATING
text:
0N 6/2/18 Me and my wife had travelled from Mumbai to  Mangalore by spice jet flight at 0850 AM .I had paid Rs.1600 extra and booked Spice max. But I was to get priority check in. But that counter was full of ordinary flyers and I had to wait 20 minutes to get a  boarding pass. I had two bags and they checked the weight (20 KG) and put PRIORITY tag for both luggage.so priority check in is only cheating.
In flight my wife got hot meal but I got only cold sandwich.. Again cheating.
In Mangalore airport one bag came first with priority tag and the second bag came much later and priority tag was missing.On inspection I found my bag lock was cut and removed and was open .I had kept 5000 Rupess in an envope on the top of the luggage. it was found missing.
some body from Mumbai or Manglore air port employee-they have cut my bag and taken the packet in day time.So much security and checking. Even then in front of u people are stealing the things.So please donot pay for SPIEMAX .Travel.Travel as ordinary economy.I was again delayed at Mangalore airport to lodge a complaint
As per regulation valuables u cannot keep in checking baggage.
Funniest thing my total luggage weight was 20 kg at Mumbai airport. When the speicejet stafft Manglore checked the weight it was showing 22KG.
how is it possible.
This indicates airlines are over charging for less weight in Mangalore.
OM SHANTI

title: was good
text:
Good experience! 
Staff was good!
Service was nice!
spicejet has improved over the past in service a lot.

title: Surprisingly Good Experience
text: The airline had an excellent fare offered in this route on the day I was browsing for to book and just grabbed it. After hearing some horror stories about some of the Indian Airlines, I was not expecting much. I was pleasantly surprised at the very courteous, professional and helpful attitude at the Check-in counter. The flight took off on time, landed a few minutes earlier, checked-in bags were delivered promptly. In-flight crew also were very good.

title: On time, clean, good landing
text: No frills. Staff friendly, airplane was clean, plane took off on time arrived on time. Pilot good, excellent landing. Leg room tight. Isle was very narrow. There were no free drinks or food on the plane unless you upgraded your seat. We flew this airline because our airline ( Indigo) cancelled their flight. It was fine.

title: horrible seats and terrible leg space
text:
First time travelling through spicejet airlines. on time punctuality was good. flight service was excellent through cabin crew members but what makes flight experience worst is quality of seats and leg spacing.

2hours flight it became a terrible experience because of the inconvinience of the seats and leg spacing as compare to the other airlines which i have travelled.

title: a decent flight
text: spicejet has improved over the past in service though not the best you have in india but on par. its a short flight and journey was comfortable enough

title: SpiceJet Max package without the Max
text:
Within a few hours of booking online, a SpiceJet agent called to sell my family the Max package which sounded attractive.

At the express check-in queue, we were waiting for longer than people in the regular line, mainly because the agent was having trouble with our profile (my credit card had been fraudulently used recently and they didn't know what to do when I couldn't show the card that I had made the booking with).

You receive a complementary meal with the Max package. However, even though we were on the front row, they only had one meal left for four people - we had also pre-booked veg meals online yet the remaining meal was chicken. There also weren't any soft drinks on the flight. I ate the meal and then suffered with sickness for three days.

The staff didn't seem happy and it was a mix of SpiceJet and Corenden crew.

I wouldn't recommend flying SpiceJet - we only took them because of limited options for a direct flight between Jaipur and Dubai.

title: Internal flight
text:
Got to the airport on time having paid extra for SPICE MAX expecting that I would board the plane before others as it said I was guaranteed significantly more leg room, complementary meal, priority check in, priority boarding and priority luggage delivery. I was disappointed from the time I got there as there was no priority check in, the flight was delayed no priority boarding, definitely no significantly more leg room, complementary meal was appalling and the only saving grace was that my luggage was delivered first.  
There was no apology from the airline regarding the delay, the stewards were robotic.  I will think again before I brave myself to fly with them again!

title: Friendly service but no frills
text: The plane looked reasonable and we where greeted friendly. After takeoff they served some water but missed 2 rows. Then came the food service and unless you pay they don‚Äôt offer anything. Not a problem if you are cheaper then there‚Äôs but they where more expensive. Unfortunately our original flight was cancelled so we had no choice.

title: SG-106, Madurai to Chennai.
text: This is a Madurai to Delhi service via Chennai. My booking was for the Madurai - Chennai sector. I was not able to get an aisle seat ( without additional fees); which is my preferred choice,  either during the online booking nor during checkin at Madurai airport. I had SpiceMax. The flight  was almost on-time in Chennai.I didn't buy any onboard food service. The boarding process in Madurai was smooth, though it was not effective.

title: Great Experience
text: We had an excellent travel experience the flight took on and also reached on time. The flight was comfortable, good food and immediate / prompt action by the air hostess for any needs.

title: a good reliable flight
text: A comfortable flight with friendly staff. While the flight take off was delayed due to the delayed in coming flight from Delhi due to fog......I could not fault the service of Spice Jet.

title: Good Budget airline
text: It is your basic budget airline. For 2-3 hours journey it provides ample service. The crew is professional and courteous. Recommend you to upgrade to spice max through their app as it will save you some money. The spice max will give you extra leg space and meal which is quite good.

title: exprince is very good
text: nice flight and services also next time we travel with spicejet and spice max services is very good and seat is more comfortable another normal seat and meal also good and every thing is good

title: Normal flight. Take the card which you paid!
text: Important: For online purchases with international cards: You have to show at the counter the credit card which you have paid the flight, otherwise you have to pay it again and then they return it to you. It happened to us and it was returned in 1 week. Direct flight from Varanasi to Jaipur. The flight were punctual.

title: Always on On time good service
text: its a budget airline hence not much expectation on luxury, the flight is always on time and hospitality is excellent, to upgrade to XL seats or Max seats they charge bit of extra but this is justified with the good legroom / priority check in and check out and meals they provide, highly recommended

title: ONE SHOULD LEARN AT LEAST FROM ONE'S OWN EXPERIENCE
text: Scheduled time of Departure was 19:40 hrs. At 14:47 hrs sms was received stating flight will now depart at 9 pm. It actually left at 9:20 pm. Interior of the Plane was shabby. The Boarding process was most disorderly. No priority was given to Senior Citizens or to Children. Food options were extremely limited.

title: Very helpful checkin staff
text:
Even though I had web checked in, I was not holding the broarding pass. Dep was at 10 pm and I entered the airport at 9.10 pm. Went to the check in counter, the lady there politely said, counter closed for the flight. When I told her I only wanted the boarding pass for the web check in, she was helpful. Requested me to upgrade to a better seat with free meals at a nominal charge, After second thought I agreed and paid. 
Then she instructed a ground staff to escort me fast through security (when there was a big  queue) and then to the boarding gate in time. Lucky me to get the first row with lots of leg room and a nice meal.

Even though the lady was doing her duty, it was a good gesture of her to put a staff along to ensure timely boarding. Couldn't thank her at that time.

title: Clearly a case of miss-guiding passengers.
text: I observed that flights from Jet airways/ Indigo/ Vistara/ Air india were operational at same time duration without any delay but only Spice-jet flight was delayed citing bad weather excuse which seems as wrong excuse to passengers. When many passengers asked same question from ground staff they had no answer. Clearly a case of miss-guiding passengers.

title: Good flight and nice hospitality
text: The flight was on time. The air hostesses were co-operative and gentle. Although the food was not exactly what I had ordered on another flight booking site but the non-veg food was good. I would prefer that the airlines can serve us the exact food that we pre-order. As a whole I have good experience with SpiceJet.

title: Without doubt the worst company I‚Äôve ever had dealings with
text:
We were booked to fly several SpiceJet flights in November 2017. One of these flights was a flight from Delhi to Goa. Shortly over a week before we were due to fly, SpiceJet notified us that the flight was cancelled due to a runway closure. Frustrating of course, but apparently out of their control, so we were initially understanding. What was in SpiceJet‚Äôs control however was the customer service experience that followed.

To summarise what has been a truly horrendous experience spanning 3 months:

‚Ä¢ SpiceJet could offer no alternative flight that day, so I we had to book an alternative flight at 3 x the price.
‚Ä¢ Due to the cancelled flight being the 2nd leg of a connecting flight SpiceJet calculated the refund of the cancelled leg on an unfair ‚Äòkm by km basis‚Äô rather than the price paid for each leg, leaving us out of pocket due to the 2nd leg being much more expensive.
‚Ä¢ SpiceJet erroneously refunded only 1 passenger of the 2 on the cancelled leg, leaving us an additional 7000 INR out of pocket. After querying this we were told the refunded amount was correct and that this was the end of the matter.
‚Ä¢ It took 7 phone calls spanning 3-4 hours in total, over a period of 5 weeks to receive the refund for the 2nd passenger.
‚Ä¢ Each of these phone calls was to a different agent and involved explaining the situation from the beginning each time and battling the front line denials and scripted replies in order to actually discuss the issue.
‚Ä¢ We were assured on each of these phone calls that the refund had already been processed (it hadn‚Äôt) or that it would be processed (it wasn‚Äôt). Only after threatening a credit card chargeback and refusing to end a call to a manager before the refund was manually actioned was the owed money refunded to us, more than a month later.
‚Ä¢ From the UK we spent over ¬£50 on phone calls to India to get our own money refunded.
‚Ä¢ In total due to a combination of administrative failures on SpiceJet‚Äôs behalf, we are out of pocket approximately 22,000 INR (¬£250 GBP).
‚Ä¢ After escalating a formal complaint to the top of their complaint channels we received no apology or acknowledgement of failure and were offered a 2,000 INR SpiceJet travel voucher which we refused.

All in all, this has single-handedly been the worst customer service experience I have ever encountered with any company, anywhere in the world.

SpiceJet may get you from A to B, but if you have to engage with their customer service departments via phone or email for any issues, prepare for a time consuming, fruitless and ultimately incredibly stressful experience.

For your own sanity, I highly recommend you avoid this company at all costs.

title: on time
text: flight on time boarding was well organized even check in process was very comfortable filed staff very helpful

title: Better late than never
text: I travel frequently. I get various experiences. My flight was delayed. I found anxiety on the faces of staff. One man was fighting with the staff so the flight was further delayed. Finally the journey began. I  ordered food but everything in the menu was not available. Nachos were very spicy and I had to wait for the water for longer period. Thanks to the couple sitting next to me. The had some home made food. I enjoyed it.

title: Nice journey
text: We had a wonderful journey as we had got Spice Max, offering premium service. We got Emergency exit seat with good food. Had an enjoyable flight

title: Comfortable & on time
text:
Took the morning flight to Jammu yesterday to visit the Mata Vaishno Devi Shrine and the flight was bang on time during both take off and landing.

Returning back to delhi today through same airline and look forward to similar experience.

title: An On time and smooth service experience !!!
text:
Our via Jaipur flight from New Delhi to Udaipur was on time at all 3 destinations. The staff was pleasant and attentive to the basic requirements of water and help with child related necessities.

The captain was young, vibrant and really nice to speak to. Baggage services were good and all in all we had a trouble free experience with this airline.

title: Holiday trip
text:
First time I try SpiceJet experience was good service was excellent food service was excellent, 
Flight was not on time üò°

title: Spicejet slowly gaining its place
text: Spicejet slowly regaining its place what is lost. Their service is good, but in flight cleanliness is very poor when compared to Indigo. They have to improve that. Its not a kind of complaint and i cant say everyone experience this, but we have a very bad experience when we travel from chennai to kolkata. The landing was highly poor and we heard a big sound while landing. Everyone in the flight complained about this. But the crew is not interested in that. But Indian air space is highly competitive and no airlines will hear our views. So we have to take it as like that. IF we travel and come good then its gods grace. Even if we complain they cant even give their ears to hear that.

title: Spice Jet to Delhi
text:
If you are traveling through India and want to take a carry-on, make sure it stays within the weight limits. 

I had to check my bag because I was over a couple of kilos, but thankfully there was no bag fee. At check-in they were very diligent about weighing every bag. The service was good. You get what you pay for. I slept the entire flight so not sure if they passed out any snacks or drinks, but I did see they were available for purchase.  

To get from city to city in India I recommend this airline.

title: Timely communication in the departure timings...
text: In the rare occurrence, the flight timing was preponed but this was communicated promptly and effectively to all passengers and the flight took off on time. They have a good system in place.

title: Excellent Service...
text: Amazing experience. This airline is changing it's perception at a fast rate and sure to capture significant market share because of its customer centric approach. Will love to fly with it more frequently.

title: Good experience
text: It was a great experience with flying spicejet. Overall good experience but they changed gate entry last monent and thts annoying. Stressful.

title: Great service
text: Great experience with flight and food was delicious. Good and helping staff and highly recommend. Good luck for your business.

title: Travel to Calicut on SpiceJet
text: A very basic airline that uses turboprop plane for short haul flights. Flight attendants are friendly with seats worn out. However the flight was trouble free and meals served is acceptable. Flight is on time no delay.

title: Mumbai to Port Blair via Chennai
text: This was cheapest flight on the date with good cabin crew and stop was at chennai for 3 hours but its totally smooth and comfortable process.

title: Flight to Delhi
text: Flying Spicejet after ages.  Low cost flight and did not expect any frills. We had a few mosquitos for company.  Flight was delayed but it was due to other issues.  No complaints.

title: Flights are always delayed... Neither do they notify you in advance...
text:
Spicejet Flight SG422 ETD was 1.05pm, i received a call/sms at 12.30pm once i was already at the airport, the flight was delayed to 3.55pm... The next airline rates are rocket high with no option for me but to cancel my plans, and following that all my connecting flights. This is utter rubbish..., Such disgusting airline should be banned from flying.. 
This is NOT ACCEPTABLE.. ME AND I WOULD RECOMMEND ALL THAT I KNOW NEVER TO FLY WITH SPICE JET EVER AGAIN.

title: My Flight to Delhi
text:
I flew by Spice Jet after a gap of few years. The Airlines has changed so much, it was a WoW experience. 
My congratulations to Mr. Ajay Singh for turning around the Airlines into a professional one after he took it back from the Maran brothers.

title: Watch out for hidden charges
text:
I've flown SpiceJet a few times and they were very good but I stopped using them for a few years after their financial status looked a bit shaky and I switched to Indigo and Jet. For a booking to Dharamashala they were offering a better price than Air India so I decided to book.

Have your wits about you. If you don't read all the boxes and check everything, you may well find they are adding 'extras' that you don't want. I had to go back and start again to avoid 196 rupees of extras for some kind of 'assurance' that I suspected probably wouldn't apply to non Indian travellers.

I was also disgusted to discover right at the end of the booking process that there was a 1000 rupee extra charge for paying. Credit card, debit card, bank transfer - it seemed there was NO WAY to avoid that. This fee represented an extra 6% on the cost of the booking. Even Ryanair wouldn't be able to get away with tricks like that. They also try to get you to pay an extra 1000 (250 per person per flight) for a seat booking - you have to hunt around to work out how to remove that charge too.

I felt a bit conned. And now reading about all the cancellations people have experienced, I'm also building back up plans in case the whole thing goes wrong.

title: Friendly staff
text:
This airline is value for money and offers comfortable flying experience. I also like their quirky names for their aircrafts which they have named after spices e.g. caraway and Red chilli. You will not forget the plane long after you have deboarded the plane.
1. Staff is friendly and engages with travellers.
2. Pre order a meal for a short flight else staff may not get to your order in time.
3. Our flight was delayed by approx. one hour but passengers were only told after they had started queuing up at the gates. It would be nice if staff could be more pro active in announcing such delays.

title: Flight departed 10 mins early.
text: Had a pleasant journey. Flight departed 10 mins early and arrived 10 mins early. You have to pay extra for web check in, seat selection etc. Best is go early to airport and ask fir window seat or aisle seat and you will get it for no additional cost.

title: Direct from Jaipur to Dubai-Budget
text: For the price, this was a great experience! I had read very negative reviews of this airline and wanted a direct flight from Jaipur to Dubai at a budget rate, so my 9 yr old and I gave it a try. We did not have any delays or problems whatsoever. The check in was speedy and the crew were very friendly and helpful. You need cash to buy food on the flight so keep some rupees if you are leaving India for a while! The best: my son left his IPad on the floor and the airline picked it up and when we called the next day they gave us instructions on recuperating it at the Dubai airport lost and found. This route is a good one for them so don‚Äôt hesitate.

title: Last minute cancellations -- an unreliable company
text:
I initially booked with Spice as they had -- on paper -- the best nonstop connections (early morning one way, late evening for the return leg) between Mumbai and Patna. However, 3 days before the Mumbai-Patna flight I was advised by email that:
- the Mumbai-Patna flight was rescheduled to include a stopover, and it would take almost twice the planned duration to reach Patna.
- the Patna-Mumbai flight the following week was simply cancelled.
No discount was offered on the Mumbay-Patna leg, and it took them 30 days to refund the return ticket. 
This airline appears to be totally unreliable; simply avoid taking it, in particular if you take separately in addition to an international flight. It took me hours to figure out how to connect with my flight departing from Mumbai.

title: Cancelled flights and no support
text:
Two cancelled flight, one on 31st December, re-booked on the same flight the following day.  This was also cancelled.  No alternatives of support provided for the first cancelled flight.  Only after much insistance following the second cancellation did they finally agree to arrange for a car.  This was a 10 hour journey, in a poor quality vehicle with no refreshments provided.
The counter staff were rude, uninterested and unhelpful.  There were several passengers in the same situation, The Spice Jet staff had no idea of how to handle this issue.
Their customer services are currently looking at my complaint however based on their initial response I have little expectation of any satisfaction.
We will NEVER fly with this carrier in the future and strongly recommend that you look at all alternatives.

title: Hope you dont need the WC flight 184 on the 22nd of January
text: A most unpleasant experience.  15 minutes after takeoff I needed the WC urgently with an upset stomache. 3rd row back from the cockpit I was the second passenger to go to the WC. A few minutes later there was a violent banging on the door, and I shouted "busy" but now concerned about what was going on I was uncomfortable.  A gew minutes later the banging started again with more violence than before. I hurried to try to finish and go out and on exiting the WC I asked the stewardess if this was normal to bang on the door when someone was inside. She looked embarrassd and had no reply for me. When I sat down in my seat a crew member from the cockpit rushed out and into the WC, then I understood. When I explained to my wife what had happened she told me it was the steward that was banging on the door. When he arrived at my seat to serve food and drinks I asked him why a crew member had priority i  their necessities over mine. He looked sheepish and had no explanation. I told him I would be making a complaint. He offered a "feedback form" which was never delivered. Sincerely, in all my 100's of flights, I have never been chased out of the WC especially in favor of another crew member! I am apaying client for Petes sake!

title: Hope you dont need the WC!
text: Over all the airline was okay, however, after literally 100's of flights in various corners of the world I had a very most unpleasant experience on my first Spice Jet flight. About 15 minutes after take off from Kochi the seat belt sigh was switched off and as I had an upset stomache I really needed to use the WC. I was the second passenger to go on flight 184 on the 22nd of January. When I got into the WC I was seated doing my business when all of a sudden a loud and violent banging started on the WC door. I shouted "BUSY" and thought it was another passenger. A few minutes later it started again, with more aggressiveness and again I shouted "BUSY" and I resllt was not in a position to stand up and go out. However, I was now disturbed as to what was wrong so I made the best of the situation and went back to my seat, row 3 behind the cockpit. As I exited the WC I asked the stewardess if its normal to bang on the WC door and she gestured like it wasnt her. When I got back to my seat as soon as I sat down a pilot or co-pilot cane out of the cockpit in haste and went straight to the WC where I had been. I explained to my wife what had happened and she told me that it was the steward that had been banging on the door. I them realised that he had been chasing me out in favor of a crew member that needed the WC. When he got to my row to serve food and drink I asked him to confirm that it was.him, and he admitted that it was. I then asked him why anybody elses necessities had priority over mine crew or not and he had no answer for me. When I told him I would be making a complaint he said he would give mea "feedback form" which he never did. Honestly this has never occured in any of the hundreds of flights I have taken and I felt very uncomfortable indeed. So, not a bad airline, as long as you dont need the WC when a crew member does!

title: The worse flight of my life
text:
The flight was supposed to last about 1h55. A the third hour, we finaly landed. We ve heard some passengers saying that we weren't at Mumbai but at 1h flight from there. Passengers have been invited to leave the plane if it was their willing due to the circumstances. We asked a steward what was the reason of this situation and she told us that the plane had no more fuel... That's the reason why the engines were almost off during the half of the flight. That kind of situation is not normal and has to be denounced, if not sanctionned... 
After an hour on the ground, the plane has taken off again and we arrived at Mumbai around midnight instead of 9 pm... and the second part of the flight has been very stressful.It is just unresponsible and inacceptable.

And we received no excuse, no water, no food.

title: Small aircraft with unprofessional crew
text: The aircraft was very small.There was no safety display or instructions by the crew before take off.

title: is spice jet value for money for short trips at short notice
text: in my opinion to get a fist row seat ,on 15 th of this month 2018 jan 2900 plus 1000 plus 399 seat meal combo for onward and return 19 th 2100 plus1000 plus 399 altogether 7600 for a return leaving kochi at 1.10 pm and returning at 3 pm in afternoon just is not value for money ,unless desperately short of time ,or funded by sombody else or on busiuness /official dont spend that kind of money,kindest rgds to spice jet staff ,thank u

title: Average Service as expected from a Budget Airline
text: I didn't expect much from this flight as Spicejet is a budget airline. Overall flying experience is average just as expected from a "no-frill" flight. Check-in was smooth and efficient. Ultra light snacks and fruit juice was served on board. One of the passengers fell sick. The crew handled the situation efficiently. Unfortunately our flight was diverted to near by Fujaira airport, as visibility in Dubai was less than the minimum required. We had to suffer about 10 hours in transit lounge in Fujaira. During this time no proper refreshment was served by the airline except a cheese sandwich. We had to pay for the coffee/tea! Overall, an average flying experience but no complaints.

title: Very small and uncomfortable flight
text: We took this flight from Jaipur to surat, it was delayed by one hour, then we were rushed on and landed at jodhpur where all. The passagers got off except us, after a quick clean and check other passengers boarded. We were delayed for 40 mins, as we were on the flight along time we were offered water! We had our own bottle water, that was a good gesture as I caught the crew having a hot drink and snack!!!! Finally after 4 hours 15mins plus the 2 hours check in time we made it to surat. The seats were uncomfortable, had enough legroom and the flight was not smooth during takeoff or landing.

title: The connecting flight is the same flight and we have to come out of the International Airport and go to the domestic one
text:
The connecting flight is the same flight and we have to come out of the International Airport and go to the domestic one the time is too short we literally had to run all the way through .

Very bad option , even the bags have to checked out and again checked in .

The flight delays really messes up your holiday plans

title: Ok airline
text: Aircraft was on wet lease from Coredon & crew was able to speak more in Turkish but English + Hindi ok. Service not courteous. Purchased Veg. breakfast was horrible. Idli & vada was so hard that broke plastic spoon.

title: Poor service.  Do not bother even after you complain
text: Worst experience I ever had. Staff at airport in dubai was really rude. Luggage were damaged. Reported same at airport. It was on 7 Jan, still no resolution . Deliberately tried to open.  Really unprofessional

title: The best low cost in India
text: Spicejet is the best Indian low cost. The planes are recent the seats are good enough. The vegetarian food (paid) is good. And they are almost on time which is rare in India.

title: Very Unprofessional
text: Flights are regularly late. bad updating system. Very poor ground-staff. if you look carefully you are not always buying the cheapest ticket. but your booking will guarantee a very unpleasant journey

title: Flight on time
text: Winter is generally foggy in delhi and my flight was in the evening. Fortunately visibility was fine so the spicejet 80 seater turboprop aircraft flew in time for udaipur. flight duration was 1 hour and 25 minutes and it landed in time without any delay. This was a clear improvement. The ground service was prompt, aircraft was new and so clean. Air hostesses were young and well dressed. Reading material was also there in the front pocket.  The best thing was that we got our check in baggage as soon as we reached the belt, so prompt. So over all experience was nice.  However, after alighting from the aircrafts we found only two pre-paid taxi booths at the udaipur airport which is around  i 25 km from the city.  Their charges are exorbitant. But what to do as there is no other alternative.  One more thing, spicejet, prior to check in tries very hard through e-mails to sell its (choice) seats, pre-booking of foods etc. They insist on web checking and showing charges nearly 100% seats. I did not fall in the trap. It was a small plane with 2 x 2 seating arrangements, so every seat was either window seat or isle seat.

title: No frill airline and upcoming
text: They have really made a comeback and now connecting small towns has really helped. But the issue with some of the low cost airlines are always the queues at airport checkin. Somehow they need to organise this the most

title: Only Airline on time that night
text:
That night as many as eight flights were delayed due to fog over northern India ..As it was a late night flight was greatly relieved to see that ours was the only flight didplayed as ON TIME.

Took off and landed exactly on time.

title: Oversold the flight
text:
last day or we can say night in Goa was disaster as Spice Jet oversold flight and denied boarding to two passengers (out of group of 20-25) and remaining passengers didn't allowed flight to leave for an hour or more as two were denied boarding till matter was resolved 

it was shock for rest of group and other passengers as flight got delayed and some were unwell and some had to catch connecting flights 

above all airlines benefited from  delay as passengers were forced to buy food due to delay

title: Rather Pricey
text:
Costs over AED1.5k for a relatively short flight to Pune.
Boarding was very crowded and not organised. All passengers had to weigh their hand luggage which is restricted to 7Kg which caused the congestion. Should be done at check in instead.
Flight was smooth and on time so no complaints there.

title: Amazing the way these Budget Airlines are serving
text:
Took Spice jet after a long time,  and was not too sure if I would be comfortable.
Quick Check in,  with a smile.
Seats quite comfortable
Wish I had seen their Menu before take off,  I would surely had ordered.
The Crew was very polite on Ground and also on the flight
Surely they are budget airlines making sure Jet gets a tough time.  
Thank You and Looking forward to more flying with Spice in the air.

My guess is that at this point only Vistar is my first Choice followed by Spice and Indigo.  Sorry no more flying on Jet.

title: Shabby front desk
text: Really the worst airline to travel with. Had an early morning flight and only 1 counter was open when I was checking in. It was the red carpet!!!!!! I was called and they wanted to weigh my cabin baggage. Well it was 9 kgs since I am a platinum traveller wit jet it wasn‚Äôt an issue but the counter fellow said it was 2 kg excess and I told him well it‚Äôs pretty cold outside and my winter wear is inside and he insisted I take them out which I did in a moment and wore them. He rudely said ‚Äúthis is a premium counter‚Äù not to be put down I told him you should have been manning the normal counters as I don‚Äôt see any body paying for your ‚Äúsic‚Äù premium services and flashed my jet platinum and dinners card and to shut him up said I don‚Äôt use your airlines but am paying 8500 rs  for an hours flight as jet doesn‚Äôt have an early morning flight and I have some important work. The flight reached 3and half hour late due to bad weather and I had a joy ride for 3 hrs as they burnt fuel.... what goes around comes around. Avoid this airline.

title: SpiceJet should no longer exist on the market. Their service is unacceptable.
text: Don't travel with Spicejet unless you want your vacation totally screwed up. This was the worse flight agency we had ever encountered with the lowest level of professionalism. We were supposed to fly from Goa to Delhi in order to get our connection flight to Belgrad (Serbia, Europe). Our time in Delhi should have been 3 hours which was considered more than enough to catch our next flight. After the boarding was over and all the passengers were already on the plane, Spicejet crew allowed a group o people standing on the plane stares to literally stop the plane from departing. No one announced us what was going on, even though we asked several questions and insisted that most of the passengers have other flight connections to catch in Delhi. At some point, a stewardess told us that the people from the stairs insisted that the plane has to wait for another two people to join the flight. No clarification was brought to us. It is still unclear if Spicejet sold more tickets than the available ones in the plain, or the group of Indian people making the scandal considered is their right to stop the plane until two more friends will join, but it doesn't matter. What matters is that the crew did nothing, but waited for 1,5 hours after the boarding was finished. The passengers asked them to call the police or the airport security but nothing happened for 1,5 hours. It was a huge chaos. At some point, many passengers, tourist mainly step out of the plane, arguing with the group of people who wanted to stop the plane for departing. No reaction again from the Spicejet crew. Due to this delay, many passengers from the plane lost our connection flights and had to pay a substantial amount of money to change our flight tickets. Please be your own judge if it is acceptable that in 2017 companies like Spicejet should exist on the market?

title: Budget Airline
text:
While touring India we made use of Spice Jet for the flights around Rajasthan. Our initial flight from Delhi on the 26 Dec 2017 was uneventful but i would like to commend the two young cabin crew that handled an extremely difficult local passenger. 
The only complaint that we had was that food can be ordered on line prior to the flight but this was invariably a disaster for cabin crew and staff - the food was normally on given out close to the end of the flight.

title: Local bus type service
text: I booked tickets from bangkok to delhi for 4 person including 1 infant. Spicejet didn't prepared boarding for infant in its system. I am showing infant in my app but spicejet told that ticket is not prepared. I paid there at airport and travelled. It happened with spicejet only. In Other flights i got infant ticket at time of booking. Again flight was 1 stop at kolkata. We have to change flight immigration and terminal change at kolkata in 1 hour. Very hectic flight.

title: Terrible experience on Spicejet flight, delayed due to drunken pilot
text:
The flight scheduled to depart on 00:15 departed at 6:00 due to 
1. drunken pilot not allowed to fly
2. Not closing the check in counter 45 mins as per rules

The Mangalore airport runway closes daily from 00:30 to 4:30. Due to above mistakes of the Spice jet personal resulted in grave trouble to 200+ passengers, many families, children and infants.

To add to this trouble was the bullying attitude of the Spicejet staff, not taking any measure to ease the 6 hour stay in the crammed waiting area. One lone lady personal was only available. After shouting from the passengers some staff came, but didn't help much, just giving wrong reasons for delay.

This was the worst air travel I have done in my 20 year flying. No compensation was provided and nothing was communicated properly.

Boycott Spicejet for the low rate of customer service and arrogant attitude.

title: Only if you can handle the pain
text: The leg room is invisible... seats are choked up together... arm rest are just like a thin scale ,you would keep edging the person next to you... its a painful and uncomfortable airline. just because its cheap doesn't mean its good.. i had to take it since all other flights were booked. never repeating this again and would not recommend

title: Cheap yet Commendable
text: I had a really good experience with this flight. We found this ticket at the last moment when all other carrier became useless for us due to there heavy ticket costs. Spicejet provided us tickets at a really less cost as compared to others. The interior, exterior of the flight, check-in, boarding & in-flight experience was all smooth. Would like to travel again. Please bring some flights for MP & CG to major cities

title: The worst in the world!
text:
If you are thinking of take a flight with spicejet, don‚Äôt do it, please!
I had been on 3 flights and EVERY flight is delayed at least 5 hours and they don‚Äôt even offer you a glass of water!
But if your luggage bag pass 500g, they will charge you!FOR SURE! 
Besides that, i need to tell you that there was a man on my flight that was very SICK, and even so, when we was about 8 minutes to land, they told us that we would overfly the city 45 minutes more because the airport had a heavy traffic.

title: Average service
text: Our flight to Delhi from Varanasi was 5 hours delayed. The staff is slow to response to our inquiries. When we were at check-in we noticed IndiGo taking care of their customers such as scanning their luggage and checking them in so they could at least go through security and relax at their gate. What is Spicejet doing? sitting around in huddle groups laughing and talking amongst themselves instead of taking care of us. Lazy as they can be. Next time, I will only fly IndiGo. Spicejet you are dead to me.

title: Worst Custom Service !!
text:
Unfortunately, one of my bookings didn't go through the complete process of booking and the transaction was canceled as confirmed by the Spice jet customer care. So I booked another flight to the same destination from Spice jet customer care. Later, I found both of my bookings are confirmed. When I called the customer representative to cancel one of my bookings they said we can't provide me full refund and cancellation fee is almost same as my flight cost. As per policy, as said by a customer representative that email ID and phone number didn't match the booking and so they couldn't provide a full refund. When I asked at the security check the name is verified to the Government issue ID and not the phone number and email ID used for the booking even then they didn't provide a full refund because of policy. There's was a lot of back and forth conversation between me and representative and when I threatened that to take this matter to court I got an immediate refund.  
In short, be careful when such a situation happens with the Spice Jet.

title: Good option with low budjet
text: Traveled with Family on 3rd Jan during thick fog season but flight was on time so no hassles. DEL - HYD, on time departure and on time arrival. Overall a good experience wrt budget airline.

title: Spice Jet
text: They have very good service ,food quality not satisfactory as they give only frankie veg or non veg,coffee is good.customer service is good.well mannered staff.

title: No spice or all things nice
text: This was the outbound flight which I had not flown before - I thought it would be good to try it.  I was hassled at the counter for a boarding pass and they would not print it off, even though I was running a bit late.  No help given to sole travellers; most travel in groups; also disappointed they did not offer the same service as Air India on weight for hold luggage - 15 Kilos only as opposed to 24 offer by Air India.  I will not be flying Spice Jet again

title: One of the best airlines I have flown in recent times
text: Fantastic airline, Was dead on time. Beautiful on board service and an airline I would definitely use again.

title: Trip of new career!!!
text:
Nice and well-hospitalized service !!
Albeit it was Bombardier , but the service was exceptional and met the mark.

title: SG103, Dehradun to Chennai. 12th January'18
text:
The flight was delayed by about 45 minutes from Jolly Grant and was further delayed while taking off from Delhi. This is a direct service to Chennai from Doon with a layover in Delhi for 40 minutes. The boarding at Doon was almost a chaos with two other flights departing around the same time from a terminal which can hold only about 100 people ! Each of these 4  flights in the mid day by other airlines are Boeing 777-800 or Airbus A320. Nothing to blame on SpiceJet, but they have to do something about the process of checkin.
The flight was comfortable, the onboard Upma & Idli was decent and the crew were helpful. Sat in the aircraft for almost 350 minutes, gets bit too boring for a domestic flight, but this is definitely  the fastest transfer to Chennai from Doon/Rishikesh.The bags arrived quickly in Chennai.

title: Upgrade to SpiceMax is worth the money
text: Upgrade to Spice max offered faster check-in, priority baggage with preferred seat in front row, free meals, ontime departure and arrival and quick baggage collection was an awesome experience. Very courteous and friendly staff to take well care of you in your journey to give you best of experience.

title: Very Poor
text: Seats are not comfortable. Food is not available as complementary. Food quantity is very less on payment basis also

title: Best flight experience
text: I have been flying SpiceJet since the last 4 years. To be honest, I am a bit of a patron when It comes to SpiceJet. I have lived through the worst phase of the airline in 2014 when cancellations were more common than on-time flights. However, what has struck me over the last 2 years is the transformation that the airline has seen. While most of us would assume that one man cannot weave magic, Mr. Ajay Singh seems to have done precisely that. The flights take off on time, the planes are clean as a classroom, the food is served hot and the crew is courteous. And the long queues at the airport seem to magically disappear without any halla-bulla! Yet it is affordable for middle-class blokes like me. Wonder what the SpiceJet formula is! This is almost surreal!

title: good flight
text: It is a good flight.neat and lean. allowed some extra baggage also.punctual in time.helpful flight crew.

title: Even with spicemax not very good experience
text: The on  line booking of spicemax did not work well and paid for it at counter and there was no choice for breakfast. The flight was on time but the next leg to Calicut was delayed

title: Lots of room for improvement
text:
Had an early morning flight to Kolkata from Bangkok. Crew at the ground were helpful and kind enough to guide through the procedures and other tasks. However, there were few staff who had attitude issues. Not everyone can take airplane and everyone has their first time, the staff should understand this and respect their customers. There is no harm in smiling and explaining. 
On the other hand, all the in-flight crew members were helpful except for one. I forgot to look at her badge. The flight I was in had multiple vacant seats and i noticed other people requesting the flight attendants if they could switch their places. So, i did the same because the person seating next to me looked tired and sleepy. I thought if i moved to another places he can have more space. So i asked one of the attendant and i moved to the vacant seat in front. after a while another attendant came to me and told me that i'll have to switch back to my designated seat later before the plane lands and i was already aware about it as the attendant had already informed me. This attendant was not so happy with me switching seats (God know why) and while she was telling me about moving back to designated seat she had her fingers pointed towards me (in our culture its impolite). This brought my admiration for the airline to a lower level. I believe all the flight attendants are taught about hand gestures and body posture.

title: JOURNEY SPICE JET SG-467 ON 29-12-2017 with my wife
text:
The time selected is around one PM so that I get enough time to morning work in my house and catch a flight 
Also I get enough time in Hyderabad after reaching
I prefer airlines which operates from !A terminal so that for boarding I need not walk more
I had only hand baggage only

title: SG 163 excellent, on time, good service, comfortable seating
text: SG 163 boarded early in Mumbai, departure @4:30pm and arrival on time in Kochi @6:30pm and good service at check-in and in-flight. Zero frill, no inflight entertainment and though paid food offered. Comfortable seating but is better to not check-in online as only middle seat offered at 0 additional cost, rather those who checked in at the airport got window and aisle for no extra cost.

title: One hour delay but cabin crew and the pilot made it a good experience to fly with spice jet
text: Flight was delayed for an hour. Ground staff should have been responsive enough to keep the customer informed about the gate number. Gate number display was missing for the flight at the airport. Cabin crew were very professional and managed the services very well on the short distance flight of 50 minute. Pilot was interacting with passengers and guiding the passenger about the passing by cities. Over all good experience to fly with Spice jet

title: GARIB RATH of AIR
text:
Dubai to Ahmedabad. 
We all know Spicejet is low budget airline but does it mean exteme low quality and lowest quality of services. We feel that we are trapped in seat. 

It feels like extreme vibrations during fly for few times cause of outside weather. 

Food not upto the mark and Feels like even water is to be demanded twice then it is served. 

It was surprising that during check-in they don't inform passenger that your final hand baggage weight will be done at the time of on board.

title: Up grade it helps
text: SpiceJet is a budget airline. They give budget service if you don't up grade. An up grade will get you priority boarding, a seat and a meal. By then you might have paid for a different airline. They try hard and have good service on the flight.

title: Fares are deceptive
text:
Spicejet is a reasonably good economy airline. However be careful of booking them from travel websites. The lowest fare is usually a  " hand baggage only" fare which will not be mentioned on the travel website. You then have to fork out a big premium at the airport.

This time spicejet also managed to misplace the kids lunch I had booked and since the itinery was not returned to me at the counter I could only prove it after we landed. All in very disappointing exp√©rience.

title: Poor service of Spicejet at Varanasi airport
text: We are senior citizens . We had booked 2 Spicemax tickets for 1 January 2018 by paying extra charges . We had selected seats 1A and 1B . As part of Spicemax deal , we were entitled for priority check in . When we reached Varanasi airport , we did not find any priority check in counter . When we approached the Spicejet staff at the airport , they refused to help us for priority check in . As a result , we had to stand in the general queue . I felt cheated as we had paid extra charges for getting special services .

title: NEVER AGAIN
text:
It‚Äôs no surprise that flights get delayed with Fog in Delhi. But what ascertains a stress free, happy customer experience is to inform customer in a timely manner and communicate openly. 

My experience of the SG 2640 from Udaipur to Delhi was abysmal, only helped by one Ground Staff, who had the wherewithal to be honest and communicate openly.  That was Mr Sarvesh - he himself made sure to give me a heads up when I asked him to give me directions on what to do. Our flight was delayed from 8:40 pm to 11:40 pm and then on to 12:10 am, at which time it was cancelled. Now at that late hour instead of helping passengers find local accommodation and transport on their own - we were left abandoned and stressing for our shelter for the night.

Thankfully they did manage to get us onto a flight the next morning, which was again delayed by 2 hours because our pilot was delayed coming into Udaipur.

But the tale of woe didn‚Äôt end there. My luggage albeit marked FRAGILE in several places was mishandled and the handle on my new luggage was broken - the SpiceJet airport counter made me fill out a report right away and told me someone would get back in 48 hrs with a feedback. Called they did - to inform me that the damage to the luggage is not extensive enough for them to attend to. No compensation or repair costs were given.

Basically NEVER AGAIN!

title: Flying  with Spicejet
text: Checking time was quite less as I reached Airport early.This flight was on time but departed about 20 min late. Only problem faced when I tried to web check-in , they have only paid web check-in seats which management should look into.

title: Wonderful Flight Experience
text: The flight was on time. Very courteous, well mannered and managed staff. The flight reached ahead of time as well.  The ground staff however took some more time to deliver the baggage looking to the air traffic. The airline has no flights from Vadodara or would have flied through out.

title: Never ever again, even to get the lowest price
text:
I'm so glad that I've finally found the airline review section on Tripadvisor because the nightmare my sister & I experienced with SpiceJet in 2016 still truly angers me, and if there were an option for 0/5 I would've provided it. If you like at my other reviews, this is my true and valid opinion as I generally tend to be very lenient.

We booked the flight online from the UK, but when arrived at the airport (straight from an international flight) we were informed at the check-in desk that the flight had actually been cancelled and we had not been rebooked at all. They had apparently "informed" us, but I had received no emails or phone calls at all about this. 

Now here's the stupid bit: the original flight going directly from Guwahati to Delhi was cancelled, but then rescheduled for exactly the same departure time so that they could include a stop in Bagdogra. But at the time of cancelling the flight they didn't even refund me. After a lot of arguing, and refusing to leave their customer services desk until we got onto the flight, we eventually got onto the plane. Their staff were incredibly rude and impersonal too. There was a group of French tourists on the same flight who told us that they'd been screwed over 2 days in a row by SpiceJet for exactly the same problem, and the same thing was about to happen to them for a third time which meant they would've missed a wedding. SpiceJet's "call centre" was virtually non-existent too; they seem to have only one operator for a country of more than one billion people. An absolutely 57th class airline and one I will never ever travel with again.

title: goup booking
text:
we were making bulk booking online for travel dates 60 days hence. The portal played a dirty game with us. when we booked for 6 travellers, the ticket price jacked up by more than 1000/- per ticket. Later the tickets were available at lower price till the last day of travel. the portal has been so designed that the moment bulk booking of more than 4 passengers is made the price jacks up. If you make sall bookings of 2 or 3 at a time they remain low. Also the tickets should not be booked in continuation. AI jacks the price.

There should be gap of a day or two in subsequent bookings. This is not so with other airlines. it is pertinent with Spicejet and they are cheating the passengers. this is what they call dynamic pricing. DGCA is not ready to take any conginance of the same as they are corrupted by the management. Proofs of this game has been given to them, but it seems they have thrown this to the dust bin.

So be careful while booking with Spicejet. They are cheats. the same they do with seat allocation. till time of actual check-in at airport all the seat are paid seats. 

What a way to earn by cheating passengers. Please discourage Spicejet. Other airlines are better both in terms of service, pricing and comfort.

title: Average
text: I was lucky I had two flights and both were small aircraft which I prefer. Service was very kind. Check in counter was also same. No delay, no bad experience. Perfect taking off and landing. I knew it was a budget airline but felt like classy, thanks Spicejet.

title: Royal Experience...
text: Spicejet has improved the quality of service recently. The inflight menu option is excellent. The inflight service is amazing. It was a journey fully enjoyed.

title: Poor Service
text: Our flight was delayed for more than 2 hours. There was no proper announcement in place, in this regard, for long time. Leg space between two consecutive rows in an aeroplane was very less, making it difficult to seat comfortably, even though flight time was only for 1 hour. Our return flight was also delayed for more than 1 hour.

title: Very Smooth Flight
text: The check in and check out was very smooth. Staff were polite. The plane was small - a dornier. Took off on time and landed smoothly right on time. The ferry bus at departure and on arrival was also quick. They served a glass of water on the flight. The magazines on the flight were old and boring.

title: Not reliable
text: I booked 6 tickets, one of which I cancelled few days later, on easemytrip portal. It declared " check in baggage allowed ". But when I reached AIRPORT they said I am not allowed any check in baggage and charged me 400 INR for two bags. Originally my flight was scheduled at 1355 hrs. Two days earlier to journey they rescheduled it to 1610 hrs. And at 1400 hrs on 31 December, the date of journey, they further rescheduled it to 1830 hrs. And actually it left later than that! Now strangers landing in megacity at late evening can be troublesome and dangerous.  I tried calling their customer care number, but I was left on hold for 40 mins! Bcoz no executive was free! I suspect they even have any customer care centre! Never travel this airline if you have connecting flight or you are landing in strange city.

title: Excellent service and beforetime arrival
text: This was the smallest aircraft I ever travelled by but everything about it was excellent. Good leg room, neat and clean, and the best part was punctuality.

title: Budget airline
text: Spicejet is good budget airline. But they need to improve on certain things in order to survive in highly competitive market. 1. Flight are delayed  many a times, causing great inconvenience to the passengers. 2. They charge for paying through Internet banking or debit/credit cards for each sector. Whereas digital payment should be rewarded. 3. They can reduce on board refreshment services. 4. Crew members can be more polite and professional

title: Unexpected good experience
text: Very courteous and helpful crew members. Very clean cabin. proper boarding and efficient baggage handling

title: Cheap Fare Airlines
text:
We Travelled by this Spice Jet flight on 28th Dec @11.15 pm from  Pune to Chennai.
the most ideal flight and comfortable timings... We can go round places and can catch this flight during midlight.. Good customer support and smiling faces... We find the Airlines extend affordable fare..In flight Service is good.
Aircraft was little crowded and leg in space was too short.
As this Airlines extend Cheap Fare, they are not providing any eatables Free of Cost inside the aircraft.

However MY suggestions are:

1. They should provide at least Tea or coffee "Free of Cost"
2. They should start awarding Spice Jet Miles and introduce Frequent FLiers membership and provide  Free Air Miles... This will boost their image and for getting more good business..

title: Delays without reason
text: The flight was delayed from its scheduled departure at 2230 hrs for over 6 hours without reason. No prior intimation by SMS or email. Delay was progressive resulting in loss of sleep through the night. It was a typical low cost airline flight otherwise in terms of service, legroom, seat space etc.

title: Delays for no reason - they call it operational reasons
text:
I was travelling on the 14th of Oct and the flight was delayed by 1 hour and 20min. I had a connecting flight of another airline from Chennai airport hence went in to talk to Spice Jet. They told me that we can still make it however there would be no help since the flight delay is not of 1.5 hours as per their policy. The flight landed very late and I missed my next flight for no apparent fault of mine. 

The officials at their Chennai terminal was very rude too. Horrible experience. I doubt their claim of being the best on time flight, may the others are all worse than them in that case.

title: Seats are too cramped for a comfortable flight
text:
-While the airline does send sms for online check-in they don't do online check-ins for international flights. 
-They have no provision for a handbag only fast check in at the counter.
-The staff at the check-in saw our full itinerary but didn't inform us about the need for a visa on arrival at Bangkok airport, unlike all other airlines I have traveled on.
-The seats were so cramped that the four hour flight couldn't end fast enough. My mother who is five feet four inches could not stretch her legs.
-While the flight attendants were very helpful and gave me water every time I asked for it, no one checked the supply for water bottles that could be sold.

title: Comfortable Flight
text: Seats and leg room space is good which i like about the airline. The rest are similar with other airlines. Value for the money

title: Comfortable, Clean, and Friendly
text: I flew between Chennai and Kolkata. While it was a packed plane, it was very comfortable, very clean, and the staff was friendly. I do believe I was the only American on this flight, but felt no discomfort or lack of service. I would highly recommend this airline for domestic within India.

title: Poor and not worth for money...!!!
text: It was first time I traveled on spicejet with my family.  Crew were selling food and other stuff. No legroom and Will not recommend any one.

title: Good flight!
text: It was a return journey from Mumbai. The checking in was fast and lady at counter insisted that I put my hand baggage in check in and i didn't want to do that. Then got boarding pass and everything was fast! Boarding started on time and as usual Journey completed "before time"! Thanks SpiceJet, will come again for sure!

title: Nice comfortable journey!
text: The plane was bombardier! It was good comfortable flight. Good seats. Nice and clean. Almost on time. Checking in can be more easier if guys can work in co ordination. Nice flight if you get in budget!

title: Simply Awful
text:
I thought we had some bad airlines in America but SpiceJet is truly awful.  You really do get what you pay for on this one.

First, when we first arrive for check-in, with a NORMAL airline, you simply give them passports and within 3-5 minutes, you get boarding passes.  The reps usually smile and greet you.  They get trained to at least do that.

Not with SpiceJet.  There's a fellow looking at us with not a hint of friendliness, and seems bothered that he must be there.  I hand him the passports, and he looks at us and says, "tickets please" and puts down the passports, and stares at us.  We traveled a lot in our home country and internationally in past years and this is a first.  He then proceeded to ask us for the credit card that we used to book the tickets ‚Äì also a first.

Then the flight was late by about 45 minutes.  It wasn‚Äôt well communicated what was happening.  We just looked at the clock and scratched our heads.

When we were finally boarding, they tried to pull me aside to charge me more money for the fact that I had a backpack, and then went to the duty-free shop to purchase some chocolates, which added another bag that they then weighed.

The guy just pointed to another queue without really explaining what was going on.  We figured it out they were going to try to extort more money. I handed the duty-free bag to my wife, which they didn‚Äôt bother checking in the first place.  Then they let me through.

This was the first and last SpiceJet experience. Never again for us.

title: Budget Airline with worst customer service
text:
Due due heavy fog and bad weather in Dubai , the flight has been cancelled for 11 hours which is absolutely acceptable,however you don‚Äôt see a single staff to give you a courtesy or offer you a glass of water totally unprofessional approach and not acceptable at all. The airline basically known as budget airline, but i paid decent amount to book the ticket and i fly with them many times, the experience before was outstanding. But this time they make me to re think to book next time because of their customer service. 

Dear all, please think when you book next time in order to save 100$ , we will have many other airline to choose who never disappointed you with at least customer service.

SG 18 , 11 hour delayed on 24 December and no spice jet staff at the counter since the delay üëé

title: On time and comfortable!
text:
The flight SG678 from COK to MAA had been on time, as that was our primary need on the day. 

This flight (do not remember the airline type) was definitely comfortable than the other spicjet‚Äôs we had taken earlier. 

A short and no-complain travel!

title: Economical & On Time
text:
An economical & on time service is good, Boeing 737 had a reasonable leg space, extra leg room seat were vacant & hence shifted me there without extra charges.
I general with 30 Kgs. baggage & price,it was quite satisfying.

title: Better than expected
text: The flight from Madurai took off on time & landed in Chennai after 50 minutes enroute to Delhi. The flight reached Delhi 10 minutes before time. The Aircraft a Boeing 737-800 had reasonably good leg space & was quite well maintained with lively interiors. The service standard of Air hostesses was quite good. All in all very satisfying flying experience.

title: Confusing website & inadequate food
text: Flight booked online. Received sms to warn flight was hand-luggage only. Tried to buy excess baggage but first had to upgrade to a standard ticket. Paid 3500 rupees to upgrade to standard ticket then further 2500 rupees for 20kg excess. On arrival at the airport was compelled to pay another 400 rupee upgrade fee. Despite paying for premium economy all that was on offer was ramen noodles. The airside buses at Port Blair are the worst I have seen so far.

title: On time, lousy food
text: Took spicemax. Seats are too narrow and uncomfortable for a decent size man. Food can be better with more choice.

title: Worst Customer in-flight service
text: it was first time I traveled with spicejet. I felt like I walked into a shop. The crew did not offer a water instead they were focused on selling other stuff. I am foreign national and I travel alot. I have seen any airline charging for even  a coffee. so pathetic!!! and the girls were so rude. I am never in my life ever again traveling with spicejet nor would I recommend this airline to anybody else...

title: Average service and time delay
text: I have very bad experience regarding delay from schedule time in spice jet. Other services are very good and food is too good.

title: Never again
text: The flight was scheduled to depart at 9:20 pm and it finally took off at 2.00 am. There weren't enough seats for the passengers to sit and when we asked the airline officials to make arrangements, they curtly said that they are not responsible for passenger's comforts on the airport since AAI is responsible for the upkeep and maintenance. They were themselves unsure about whether the flight would take off or it would be cancelled. The airline arranged for food to be served but the quality of food was very poor. When the passengers complained they rudely said that they were atleast making arrangements for us to be fed. I would never recommend SpiceJet even if they offer free tickets.

title: Evening flight timings from Ahmedabad to Dubai and return are convenient. No late night flight hassles.
text: We 6 pax paid extra amount for SpiceMax- more legroom, food , priority checking and boarding for our both the flights ( to and fro ). We could get priority checking, boarding, first luggage out and seats with more legroom. Only hassle we faced to get jain meals as crew offered veg meals (of average quality and without choice). While booking for Spicemax , meal options are on Veg and Nonveg. There can be more options. The quality of box in which food is served is of extremely poor quality. For International flights, more food options are required.

title: A Comfortable Airlines
text: The service is good in this Airlines, staff are friendly.  Every time I check-in I request for emergency exit (for much space), it was given.  We can book food and it will be served on board.  Quality of the food stuff is Good.  They do have frequent flyer program for the customers.  I am happy to recommend to others.

title: OMG! Never fly Spice Jet if you can help it
text:
Just arrived into Bengaluru airport this morning (16 Dec) taking the unearthly 5.30am IndiGo flight from Singapore. Starting off our  weeklong holiday, our family of three were all quite excited. Our 10 year old son who wakes up reluctantly for school every day at 6 am, was up at 3 am and ready to ‚Äòhit the road‚Äô to quote him in a jiffy.

Arriving at Bengaluru after 16 long years brought back nostalgic memories; and the new Airport was a pleasing sign of much progress that has happened here since we last visited. 

The SMS from SpiceJet early morning Singapore time telling us to check in 2 hours ahead of time (for a 1 hour flight to Kozhikode) was an ominous sign. Not one but two SMSes. We should have guessed! 

Our joy at djscovering that the domestic airport was just next to the international one was short lived when we saw the serpentine queues to check in. Weaving our way through a wall of holiday makers, we managed to check in to our Spice Jet Kozhikode flight. And the Tiffin Centre breakfast ‚ÄòThali‚Äô was divine (even though Singapore boasts an array of Indian restaurants, local Indian food has its own charm)

That‚Äôs where all the good things come to an end! I must admit Spice Jet really needs to get its act together. One of the worst experiences I‚Äôve had with domestic flights. It seemed the company really believes it is kosher to delay a 1 hr flight by 4 hrs with a simple explanation ‚Äòdue to technical reasons‚Äô. Period. 

A lot of people had to make a lot of noise before the shift manager decided it was time to him to make an appearance. Fully 3 and half hours after the scheduled departure.
