Waiting passengers were served no refreshments, no effort made to establish if anyone had any urgent or serious needs or if alternative plans (the last flight to Kozhikode left at 1.20 pm) were called for. Finally it so turned out that people who made the most noise were given free meals (that too basic minimum). Amazing there isn‚Äôt any handbook to deal with delays which I am sure would be frequent enough. 

At the time of writing, we were still waiting for the departure; for four hours. Phew what a way to start a holiday. 
 
Lesson learnt: no more Spice Jet in our lives; at least not for a while!

title: the good and friendly service makes up for very poor legroom
text: they are efficient, professional, very friendly and forthcoming. amazing! legroom must watch out if you are tall, better pay for extra legroom, but it is makeable on a short distance flight like i had

title: Flight to choose
text: Since the option is given to choose three flights a day,very useful to plan. Other than this there is nothing particular to highlight

title: Horrible flight
text:
Will not recommend any one. It was delayed without information, not properly organized. Horrible ground staff and air hostesses, no punctuality.
Please take other flights but don't take spice jet ever

title: Poor place conditions
text: If you do not have any option only then choose Spice jet. Dirty planes bad service and delays were very annoying

title: You can travel
text: We flew from Bangalore to chandigarh with stop over in Delhi. It was not an enthralling experience but an average flight. Seats were comfortable but pushbacks were not really great. Leg room was good enough. Very bad experience would be seat selection. We were couple traveling and it does not allow to select seats for free. We had to pay for this. Service was average.

title: Good experience to fly with Spicejet
text: It was a overall good experience to fly with Spicejet. Very comfortable take off and landing with nice breakfast onboard. You are spicing up Spicejet

title: SpiceJet flight from Delhi to Pune on 6-Dec
text:
- Me & my friend got late to reach the Delhi airport (Terminal 1D). We were waiting in Check-in queue & there were many passengers ahead of us. However when we told the staff about it, they got us in front & did our check-in first. They could have very well told us that it's our mistake that we reached late, however they didn't do so & helped us. Really really appreciate it !! .. Thanks a ton

- I was lucky to get Emergency Exit seat. It had great leg room & was very comfortable. Thanks to God & also to SpiceJet staff for giving me that seat :)

- Staff was very courteous, helpful & provided good in-flight service. All announcements came at the right time & gave required info. Specially liked the announcement which clearly told that as per seat number you have to board the flight from front door OR back door. These small small things really help. 

- Flight landing was smooth. We reached 5 mins earlier - which was like Cherry on the top !!

Overall had a great flight experience.

title: Professional on time performance
text: I am travelling to Mumbai on SG 488 departing at 7.55 am from Kolkata. I booked Spicemax seat by paying Rs. 800 on the App and selected 1C as my preferred seat. Check-in was smooth, hassle free and fast and was done at the dedicated counter for Spicemax passengers. The lady at the counter was courteous and professional and was wearing a pleasant smile. Flight was on time and boarding started at 7.15 am sharp. Boarding process was smooth as well. The aircraft was a  Boeing 737-800 seies one and the interior in Spicejet signature theme black and red was bright and reasonably clean. Black faux leather upholstered seat had reasonable pitch fir a domestic fliggt abd legroon was good. The push back was sharp at 7.50 am. Flight took off on time. The stewardess was very polite. Complimentary hot breakfast was served. Omlette, croissant, potato crockett and chicken sausages were in the menu. Coffee to my choice was akso made available. Food was of good taste. The flight was smooth and we touched down on time. Good airlines and good option for your domestic travel.

title: no cotton swabs for infants
text: there were no cotton swabs with airlines for infants. mentioned the feedback and got a call after 2 days apparently to intimate vice a verse Wat cabin crew said to feed the baby while taking off and landing.

title: Spicejet Flight from Chennai to Madurai on 6th Dec
text:
We were a group of 5 people + an infant. We were treated well at Check-in and given good seats. Flight was in time, good inflight service, and landed before time.
Was travelling Spicejet after a long time. Was impressed with their in-flight Menu.

title: The atr flight was good , but the food served was ice cold
text:
The flight was plesent , the only draw back was that the on board  pre booked meals was ice cold .

Some thing needs to be done .

Secondly some airports have screening of check in luggage and some don't , so if you happen to see one just get your luggage pass through it .

Otherwise after standing in the queue, you again have to return back to get it screened .

title: Must Improve!!
text: Once it was my fav airlines, but over the years, the cost factor increased, the service gone down, site is not that user friendly. Though I still undertake one odd flight as per its timings but it requires good upgradation and should attract more customers.

title: Cost Effective Convenient Flight
text: Flight was on time, inside service was good, seats were neat, clean and comfortable. Check in was smooth and so was the baggage arrival at Destination.

title: Spice jet
text: Only Biryani is the best thing which this airline company has to offer. there is nothing for comfort.

title: Excellent service for a low cost service provider
text: Good service and cheerful faces of the cabin crew in a full load flight is very much appreciated. Congrats. But, charging extra for all seats for online checkin makes it cumbersome.

title: Smooth Flight
text:
The flight was on time and the snacks served (can pre-book also) were good. The staff were ploite.
The flight was clean and not smelly.
The take off time was adhered to.
On the whole it was a smooth flight.
Leg space was cramped though.May be a problem for tall people.

title: Male Ground Staff @ Tuticorin - Rude
text:
Airline Service really Good and Awesome

BUT  Ground Staff Mr Linga was so rude ! 
Hope SpiceJet makes note of such staff and Train them properly !

title: flight
text: small 40 seat plane felt like a crowded small bus, congested space, very small loo, expensive snacks

title: Small leg space, OK food, attitude while serving
text: In general, the attitude of the air stewards and stewardesses was not really helpful. When asked to help with the luggage, they preferred to just get lost in the crowd and asked for the second time to another person (this time female) she very unwillingly said "yeah ok, but you will have to help me with it" i think the better line would have been, "sure but could you please lend a little hand as well?"

title: Flight attendant always snacking
text:
This airlines is not the best you can find for domestic flight in India, but for the sake of having experience I booked this flight. 
Check-in by web/apps is available however, i have to pay for some amount to be able to check-in, i forgot if its for the seat or anything else, but since can't connect to my ibanking i cancel the web check-in process. 
The check-in process in the airport was smooth. Funny things was the flight attendant are snacking during the flights, and always go back and forth to take something in their compartment which is located above a passenger. I was wondering how convenience is that, i am lucky i was not that passenger. 
Giving service when your mouth is chewing is not a polite gesture in hospitality industry.

title: Nice but can improve
text: I was upgraded to the front of the aircraft free of cost and got a complimentary meal! So i really enjoyed the flight. Economy leg space isn't much. Cabin crew is helpful and friendly. Food is also good. I didn't see any lack in the airline.

title: Overall Okay
text:
I recently travelled on a Spicejet. The departure was delayed by almost 90 minutes and thankfully I was informed quite in advance about it. Hence did not face any issues. In fact, since the original departure time was just too early (around 1.10 a.m.), I was happy to know about the delay. 

There is nothing much to write home about. The service is okay, one just can not distinguish it from other airlines. One must thank the staff for not disturbing our sleep by not making too many announcements.

title: Attitude of ground staff
text:
The attitude of the male ground staff at the check in counter. He acts like a police man, very harsh and not polite to the passengers. He seemed to be the manager or something as all the girls had to ask his permission or advise. 

So please depute a better person with a better behavior in handling passengers.

title: Staff cooperative and considerate of elderly pax,full refund for a flt that could not land due to bad visibility
text: Flt turned around after circling at Amritsar,nothing served during the flt,staff remained courteous.Refund was promised on return,but no sign of it  till 3 weeks later..No information too provided till half an hour after return sector,while circling around.

title: Jodhpur to delhi
text: Flight was late by one hour but no information given by staff. Ground Staff is polite. Cabin crew also nice.

title: Value for money and punctual
text: Travelled for the first time by a flight and i was a little nervous, but Spicejet made my journey easier, their take off and landing was very smooth. i would like to travel with Spicejet again :)

title: Departed Before Schedule and Also Reached Ahead of Schedule.
text:
Our flight was supposed to depart at 9:20am, but to our surprise when the crew members noticed that all the passengers are on board, the flight departed at about 9:10am. We reached Kolkata also again ahead of schedule. Likewise our flight from Kolkata to Dhaka also started and reached ahead of scheduled time. The crew members including the captain were all very friendly. The seats were quite comfortable with sufficient leg space. 

There is only one thing that I did not like. In Delhi we were told that our luggages were booked for Dhaka. But surprisingly we discovered our luggages were circling on the belt in Kolkata. Being confused we took our luggages and dropped again while checking in for Dhaka flight. 

Right after we landed in Dhaka, we got our luggages within a very short time.

title: Good
text: I am frequent flyer to Dehradun which is just 25 mins flight from Delhi . SpiceJet is mostly on time and arrival too is before time . Overall economical and good .

title: Only option in case of emergency
text:
Use it only in case of emergency or book months before your travel. It's really costly at the last minute. 

The worst part is, the cancellation policy. They show the ticket as refundable. But please pay attention to the catch. The cancellation charges would be more than what you pay for the ticket. So ultimately you will not get anything back on cancellation. Instead they can did the ticket as non refundable. 

Though technically they don't show any wrong information while booking, it's morally wrong to do this.

title: Punctual,clean, good service and great value for money
text:
We went to Andaman in Oct'17 on a family holiday. We looked at all options and found the timing of flight as perfect to save time and do little bit of sight seeing as well. Though it was holiday season to Andaman, we got a great discount from clear trip. Though this is a budget carrier, the comfort, service and timing as better than some of the high fare flights I have travelled. 
The family thoroughly enjoyed 2 hrs of  travel both ways. A good carrier to try for others as well as they keep coming up with good offers for a great comfort.

title: A pleasant journey combined with punctuality
text: We enjoyed the hospitality of the cabin crew, as well as the tasty food served by them.  It was a happy experience that the flight was quite in accordance with the scheduled timings, and also no time was lost in waiting for the baggage.   The only irritant was the closely placed seats, even though it was our choice to have the cheaper ones.

title: A Happy Experience
text: I along with my family had booked a return flight from Delhi to Dharamshala. The check in at Delhi and onward flight was comfortable and we reached in time.However, the return flight got cancelled due to inclement weather at Dharamshala. No fault of Spicejet. But, they could have arranged alternate Taxi/Volvo Bus, for interested passengers,on cash payment. We had to take a Taxi from Dharamshala to Chandigarh ,then Volvo Bus from Chandigarh to Delhi Airport and again Taxi to my destination.A two hour journey took us 18 hrs.

title: Delayed flight from Goa
text:
The flight was delayed consecutively for the 2 days on 1st Dec & 2nd Dec.
Further there was no update to the travelers on the mobile numbers or emails provided.
Our flight was at 5:35 pm on 2nd Dec and was delayed to 06:05 and then again by another 15 minutes to 18:20, however the flight took off from Goa Airport at 19:25 hrs- delayed by nearly 2 hrs.

We had to opt for max spice to have a better leg space to have a relaxed journey by stretching out the legs and paid additional Rs 1000/- at airport on check in counter.

title: Efficient flight with add ons
text: This a a simple 3 hour max service from Kochi to Delhi. We'd booked one way economy tickets for about 8000 rupees each. At check in, we were offered an "upgrade" - priority boarding, priority luggage delivery, free in flight meal and seats with extra legroom - all for only 500 rupees more each. The flight was smooth, the service excellent, the meal tasty and we arrived before schedule. Well done, SpiceJet

title: Flight over Indien smog!
text: The staff was very friendly and because we had Spicemax tickets we had enough space for our legs and overwight were OK and a hot meal was included.

title: Average.
text: Very late departure. Flight okay, service okay. No significant problems or commendable characteristics.

title: Poor service
text: Staff are not friendly, very rude, flight was late reason unknown..no information, changed 3 times the timings..

title: Not Worth for money. better go for Air India its more better than it
text: Not very pleasent experience , food worst .. flight atmosphere is also k ... that sound has literally killed me...

title: Mixture.
text: Solid ride in the plane, safety was amazing, very smooth. Some of the downsides is there are no blankets, also there is no food other than what you have to buy.

title: Flight High!!
text:
Flight was comfortable , affordable prices.
Plane was clean , Crew was very helpful & of course on time .

title: Maintenance of timings. In-flight service, Cleanliness, Customer service
text: Excellent Service. Timely service. Clean maintenance and excellent customer service. They provided courteous service. Good announcement and customer care was excellent

title: spice max seats
text: So we had our early morning flight from Goa to get back to Mumbai. We bought it because we were getting it for cheap. The Flight was on time, we even reached back Mumbai on time. There is legroom only if you get to sit on the spice Max seats. We were lucky enough to be allotted those seats. There is pretty less legroom on the other seats. You don't get complimentary food in spice-jet. You need to pay in extra for food and beverage. The service is pretty decent. I was sleeping most o the times so didn't realize how they served others.

title: On dot flight
text: Catching an early morning flight is not a pleasant thing.We were a group and landed late.The counter staff at airport were friendly and took good care.

title: Great
text: Flying with Spicejet as usual was great experience.Reached 20minutes earlier.We purchased a veg thali, price was not high and the quality was very good.

title: DONT BOTHER TO IMPROVE
text:
THEY COLLECT RS1000 FOR MAXX, THE OVERHEAD bins used to have stickers for MAXX customers, when the bags of those who board first put their bags there, the PAYING MAXX customer has to out his luggage elsewhere.
They used to have stickers...now its not there for most of the flights.....the stewards respond rudely to MAXX customers. They do not smile.....and have moody look on their faces. I am a frequent flier with more than million points on other flights. So I know everyone of them.
9 out of 10 still have bad attitude and not improved.

title: Flight from Delhi
text: good flight with great experience for both business and leisure purpose. cooprative while boarding and deboarding

title: Its ok
text: Its ok not very good not very bad.Staff is good but i think need to improve food quality in the flight.

title: Pleasnt surprise
text: I was pleasantly surprised to find that the leg space was the best in the segment, even beating Air India. Further, the food was best in the current lot!

title: Good budget flight, standard fare
text: Good budget flight, on time, economy seats are not great, very ordinary. They do have optional additional space seats in economy, need to be made known more easier.

title: worst service by Spicejet staff at Surat Airport
text:
The airline staff of SpiceJet at Surat Airport is not at all courteous or customer centrist. They just try to find ways how can they snatch more and more money from customer by one or another way.
Also they are not at all flexible on any part of airline services, i felt i have made a mistake by choosing Spice Jet when there are other options available for this travel sector.

title: Impossible to Win
text:
At the checkin I was informed that I was ONE KG overweight! Is it possible for a person to be so exact as to have 15 kg only. There is no way that we can be sure. I am a Senior Citizen and don't like to carry extra handbag - but the lady at the checkin refused to relent and insisted I pay for the One Kg excess!! 
The airline fare is the same as the Full Fare Air India which allows 25kg.
One pays for the food & even water. And even for a seat allocation.
This is a SCAM and baggage allowance must be restored

title: Biased towards specific girls, foreigners
text:
While checking in, i requested an aisle seat, was refused. The girl behind me in the queue requested the same, was given instantly. When i confronted the guy, he had no answer and gave me baseless reasons that she had a medical condition. I was standing there and she simply requested an aisle and was given.

Last year, experienced steward giving preference to foreigners.

title: Squeezing self becomes an art!
text:
I booked my round-trip air tickets with SpiceJet in the month of September 2017. The Ground Staff was quite courteous and so were the crew members inside the aircraft. The food (read breakfast while going and heavy evening snacks while coming back) served was fresh and had variety. But, yes two problems were there. The first one was the Public Announcement system. All the announcements sounded muffled but it was manageable.

Secondly, the leg space and overall space was inadequate as the aircraft was quite small. I was cursing my tall height for the first time. Moreover, it took nearly 2 hours to reach Indira Gandhi International Airport, Terminal 3. 

There was no fault of the airline company but had the aircrafts been bigger and swifter, the journey would have been truly pleasant and comfortable.

title: Worst flight experience i ever faced
text:
Never select this flight as it's only for Labor... They should rename Economy to labor class.

A group of labors was shouting all the time during flight and using abusive words in their conversation . 

Also how can i forget Stinky Food. They offer some juice to recover this. All the messy food they are distributing among their Passengers.

Worst Flight ... Will never Fly with them again .

title: Spice jet
text: Spice jet flight are very nice but leg space was not good little bit uncomfortable üò£ food is high cost

title: on board service wrong methodology.
text: flight was bouncy due to bad weather but on board service to be improved. it was a noon flight and i have to rush to Bhutan immediate after landing hence i book lunch prior booking system by the flight company but it was served to me after almost every body finished and the flight is about to land. the flight was also bouncy during that time it was difficult to finish .i was surprised when it was pre-booked and paid they should serve first to us and then asked the passengers who not decided yet.

title: Good Flight
text: Nice flight, staff helpful. Proper flight announcement. Flight cleanliness is good. Food on order is value for money. Timely schedule.

title: Pathetic excuse for an airline!!!
text: It was the most disgusting experience. The staff was rude and refused to even speak to us or answer our questions. I paid extra for my seat, meal, priority boarding and priority baggage (Spice Maxx). The person in the departure area was rude and obnoxious. The only thing decent was the seat. There were options of meals which were not given to us. We were dumped with whatever the flight attendants felt like giving us. Had to ask three times to be served water. My baggage came out after non priority baggage even though I had paid for priority baggage delivery.

title: calcutta official visit
text: it was on time schedule, while going from bangalore, my experience, even though i have done web check-in, while giving my luggage, counter persons modify the alternate set.

title: Decent service
text: The security check and baggage booking was done swiftly in spite of the rush at thr Bagdogra airport. Boarding, in flight and baggage collection were all smoothly done. The flight attendants were very friendly. Overall, a good experience. Nothing negative at all.

title: Wonderful experience
text: Nothing to complain. Typical flight with nothing much to say. May be good music specially indian bollywood instrumental or any other thing would have be welcomed

title: Travel cheap with cheap service
text:
I wouldn't complain about the delay since it was monsoon. But I paid 1000 rupees extra when I was persuaded to buy priority service- My worst decision. seats were fine but no assistance during the flight change at Kolkata airport, no proper seat on my kolkata to bangkok flight. and when I got MY LUGGAGE AT BKK. MY BAG CAME 1ST YAY!!! NOOOOO IT SMELT LIKE FISH!!! MY WHOLE BAG STANK SO BAD and no one at the airport to assist or register a complain.

so travel only if you are planning on saving of transportation costs but do not buy the BS priority service its a rip off

title: The airline has commendably improved
text:
I was flying spicejet after a considerable time as i had left flying Spicejet after a bad experience in a flight from Pune to delhi where the plane landed at Jaipur due to bad weather in delhi and when the weather improved our plane did not take off as the pilot abandoned the plane on the pretext of duty hours completed.We ultimately remained in the standing plane for more than 6 hrs. The airline also promised INR 1000/ cashback which never came.
Anyway I reluctantly bought this spicejet ticket this time but to my surprise everything changed for good. The ground staff, the buses, the air hostess, before time departure . It was quiet encouraging. Good going Spice jet..

title: These days Spice jet is very very perfect in timing
text: The best in timing. There is no much delay in flight these days. For domestic travel I do recommend Spice jet always!!!

title: Always delayed or cancel flights
text: Flight can get cancelled any time, and when you ask staff about reason they have no answer. Got stuck 2-3 times & delay is regular on this sector. on prebooked meal it was mentioned " Hot & spicy". But received a cold & tasteless snack to eat. Very less options available on this sector, so have to opt for this flight again & again.

title: Hidden costs on cheap tickets, not worth
text: We bought usual cheap tickets well in advance. Prices were comparable with other airlines. But was surprised to find they have hidden costs. Said we cannot carry luggage and took Rs.1200 for just one big suitcase. Did not find the ground stuff helpful either.  Flight time was also longer than usual. Didn't like the experience.

title: Suitabe timings
text: The flight timings are best for Pune travellers. The flight is ON time frequently, hence no issues..

title: Holiday travel
text: We were 6 family members travelling to Kochi. We understand that they do not serve any food or refreshments on the flight and one has to buy. The air hostesses on the flight acted like vendors selling food as they were only interested in selling food items (even water was not served to the passengers). The air hostesses were very rude and did not even treat the passengers with any respect.

title: SPICE-JET HAS CHARM SIMPLICITY AND GRACE OF EVERY  INDIAN CITIZEN
text:
Spice Jet is a very well maintained, ontime record of arrival and departures anmd competent buyt elegant staff. Although not as brillant and extraordinary like JET, neither simple and economy minded like IUndigo Air, Spice Jet has its true different elegant class and a incredible cabin crew staff. To elucidate, I wanted a coffee just minutes before the aircraft descend in to Chennai, My request was done by a one of great flight purser (I forgot his name) and let me tell you the coffee was as good as being served by your mother or wife at home...I really thanked him profusely The cabin crew was humble with humility and accepted my compliments humbly with simplicity
Spice Jet is a very reliable and highly trusted airlines in India and neighbouring countries including Colombo and Kabul

title: A good visit
text: The visit was comfortable. The fight was punctual. The staff was good. It is a budget flight. The legroom was sufficient. No facility of entertainment. But the fight provides the value of money. Recommendable .

title: On Time Performance, Neat & Clean Aircraft, Prompt Service.
text:
As Per Media Reports Spice Jet is No 1 Airline in On Time Performance since quite many months, maybe > 1 year surpassing Indigo Airlines.
My Flight was On Time. A day before my Travel I was contacted by their customer care executive who offered me Spice Max Service @ Rs 500/- Extra instead of Normal Charge of Rs 1000/- which Included Priority Check-in, Priority Baggage, Spice Max Seat with Extra Leg Space & Any Meal of My Choice. It was a Value for Proposition Offer & I Accepted it & Booked the 1st Row Aisle Seat.
I was given a Priority Check-in at a Highly Crowded Goa Airport, My Baggage Arrived 1st at The Ahmedabad Airport. However, My Preferred Non-Veg Meal was Not Available with the Airhostess. She did'nt have a Single Non-Veg Meal from their Highly Publicsied in Flight Menu Card Except Chicken Hakka Noodles which I Refused to Accept & Opted for a Veg Paneer Tikka/Shashlik Roll with Crouqete. It was Very Nice in Taste but was Quite Spicy. Children can't have it. I brought this to the notice of the Airhostess who shrugged her shoulders. I asked for a Customer Feedback Form to complain about the Non Availability of Non-Veg Meal. She made a Face & after my 2nd prompt she Grudgingly gave me the e-mail id card where I can complain. Immediately on my Return on 24th, I sent a mail to them on 27th, but till date, I have neither received an Acknowledgement Nor Any Apology from Them.
Apart from This Incident, Everything was Fine. The Aircraft was Neat & Clean & because of Their RED Decor, The Aircraft Looks More Vibrant than the Indigo Color of Indigo Airlines or Black Leather Seats of Jet Aiways.
On account of the Food Problem, I have Given them Very Good Rating o/wise I would have Rated Them as Excellent.

title: Super first experience
text:
Well, of course we didn't fly to Bulawayo in Zimbabwe, but to Jaisalmer in Rajasthan. But you know: if you want to select Jaisalmer, that wonderful city in Rajasthan does not exist in the list of possible airports on Tripadvisor, and all my requests to add it to the list could anyhow not been resolved.
So, never mind: we took a SpiceJet from Bengaluru via Delhi to Jaisalmer. And some while later the same route back home.
Just to say it: it was great. After so many not so good comments I was quite sceptical, but we both (my wife and I myself in person) were totally satisfied. The service at the counter in Bengaluru was first class, our luggage got all the signs and flags to be directly delivered to Jaisalmer, so we had nothing to do with in in Delhi, later we went as first passengers straight in the plane, the flight was perfect, the food was somehow acceptable, definitely nothing to complain til Delhi. In Delhi Airport SpiceJets are parked on the fields, means one has to take the bus, and whiles boarding the next airplane there is no preboarding or so, but ok, that's not SpiceJet but Delhi Airport ...
The flight to Jaisalmer was fantastique. I love these small airplanes with two seats on every side, so cozy and funny, and that Bombardier thing goes up like a Porsche during start, and brakes like a Ferrari after landing. I simply love it. My wife is not sooo excited but ok, she has other priorities, such as safe flight and no worries with luggage etc. - and since this was also perfect, we were both very much satisfied.
After arrival we were among the first who got the luggage, went out from airport, job done ... really amazing.
The flight back was of same quality concerning service at the counter, service in the airplane etc., we were totally happy. Even though on that day our flights got for several hours delayed - it was one of those days with fog in Delhi and Varanasi and where not else, means not SpiceJet alone but all airlines were totally delayed. So we cannot blame SpiceJet but we were in contrary very happy how smooth the delay was handled - we got SMS and eMails about the delay, so we could stay longer in our hotel, the connecting flight from Delhi to Bangalore was automatically booked, we got even same seats as we had booked originally, so everything was totally perfect. Not a single detail we can remember what would have been not perfect.
Definitely a fine thing. Not only they are the only ones who offer a flight to Jaisalmer, no, they do it also perfect ... that is simply amazing!
We will definitely take them again, next time.

title: Good flght experience...
text: This was two flights connectinng and both went smoothly.  A no frills, nothing to fault experience.  YMMV

title: Cramped and crowded
text: This was my first time travelling from SpiceJet and it did disappoint. The flights are surely economic but the design of the plane is horrible, they seem to have thrown ergonomics away while making the aircraft. It has no leg space and the seats are so close to each other and it is all so cramped. My legs were not fitting properly and I am a 5'5, bless taller people who went in the plane.

title: Not my first preferance
text: Its OK to fly with SpiceJet once in a  while when you have no other better option. This used to be my preferred carrier but over the last couple of years, their services have taken a hit. The class is missing which used to be there during its inaugural days.

title: Very good first trip
text: We took 4 flights in a span of a week. Dubai,Jaipur, Udaipur & back. All of them were good. Surely a good option for the price point. Good food that you have to pay for but it is a budget carrier. The staff on flight were always very kind & friendly.

title: Could be more service oriented!
text: The check-in was awful due to the fact that the airline staff demanded to see my credit card to compare it with the credit card used to purchase the ticket. It happened that the card used to purchase the ticket six months earlier had been cloned and canceled. Therefore I was traveling with a different/new card. They did not want to accept it, called management and left my friend and myself stranded there waiting for their good will. They then requested a letter from my bank confirming that my card had been cancelled. Which is not something banks are used to produce and was impossible to obtain before that flight! They eventually demanded that I wrote a letter to state that the airline would not be liable for any expenditure incurred with my former credit card. I really did not understand the purpose, but I complied and we eventually could check-in. The flight itself was uneventful.

title: Avoid
text: The flight was delayed for more than 2 hours. Moreover, there was no formal announcement from airlines, in this regard. There is no enough leg space for each seat. Besides, airline is charging for each & every additional facility.

title: Horrible service
text:
Spicejet is the worst. They create useless troubles. It is required to show the credit card used to book the flight in order to check in. So, if your father payed for you, or you didn‚Äôt bring that card with you, they don‚Äôt allow you to check in. Mine was a virtual credit card and I spent 30 minutes because I didn‚Äôt have the physical one.
Old and uncomfortable plane.

title: My first experience was good
text: Everything was was good about my first flight with Spicejet. On-time departure, on-time arrival, very well behaved and excellent staff and cabin crew. Should have been more leg space in between 2 seats so that taller people can sit comfortably.

title: Air craft condition
text:
The seats in front of me was broken, hence could not be put upright. Strangely the aircraft personnel who will not even tolerate an ill person to lie back just shrugged it away. When both the passenger in front and I pointed out the inconvenience to the air hostess she actually shrugged and said that he has an option to go for the premium seats on a payment of course.
I had a pre-ordered meal like many others. There was this gentleman who kept trying to grab the attention of the air hostess trying to tell her that he has a health condition and that he needs to eat. But the ladies would not break their self created protocol.

title: Cheap Flight
text: Found the airline penny pincher, 100rs for printing your boarding pass.800rs.for front seats are more expensive than airline fare. But the staff is courteous,helpful. The aircraft is clean and nicely maintained. Inflight staff was knowledgable helpful towards all passengers

title: Cheapest flight journey
text: One of the cheapest journey...  Cost less than an ac bus fare.  Food was not good. Comfortable seats. service was good

title: The only thing good... Cabin Crew
text: One of the worst experience ever.... Scarred me for my life... Lucky it was not my first flight... The cabin is in the pathetic state..... The seat arrangement is horrible and to add to it the plane is so old I don't believe they still can fly... And to add to it the pilot would taxi the plane on the runway like it is a freaking F1 race they are participating in... Hold tight... put seatbelts and pray for a safe journey.

title: if you are 1kg overweight they will charge
text: If you have any extra luggage they will charge you and it is expensive. they even weigh your hand luggage

title: Horrible journey
text: We had unfortunately booked the same airlines for a 2 way journey!! Claustrophobic flight, uncourteous staff during check in! Since i was with an infant and senior citizen, they just didnt budge for my seat preference even when the seats were available! Horrible experience! Never again in SpiceJet!!!!

title: Terrible attitude of ground staff at Ahmedabad
text:
Was flying from Ahmedabad to chennai. Shocking to see the ground staff to display absolute impoliteness. Rude and shocking behaviour. I was tempted to take a picture of the lady and post her picture. If folks from spice jet ever get to see this, I would suggest you find out the lady who was by gate no 7 and was getting passengers to board the bus. I took the 7.15 flight from Ahmedabad to Chennai. 

SpiceJet is known for one good thing and tats their staff quality besides the fact that the flights usually get delayed... 

I can see that u guys r taking efforts to keep up with ur competition Indigo and while u may b inching towards them, it's good to weed out such characters from the organization. 

Inflight staff no complaints... 

Leg room, terrible guys....

title: Great flight
text:
We enjoyed the flight but sad part my seat was moved. The staff were helpful and kind.
We paid for extra baggage which helped as we have international flights from trivandrum.

title: Seats are very congested
text: Seats are too small and also very congested. very un-comfortable while traveller as always. here hyderabad biriyani available in this flight.

title: Very average service
text:
Called the customer service atleast three times for a correct answer .... long waiting :(.... staff has no intention to help you.
Service at the airport was fast and efficient .......... staff needs better traning.

title: Hoarsy voice of Spicejet male staff
text: I visited on 19 November from Spicejet from patna(scheduled to depart at 8:45am) to kolkata .Flight was late by 1 hr.    Staffs of Spicejet ,do not feel need of making smile or cool look towards passengers.Maximum staffs are male with Hoarsy voice.  female airhostess less in number and they keep neutral expression,   donot feel need to smile or making posive looks towards passenger. They never thanked for traveling in Spicejet.   Inside of Spicejet flight has clumsy and little dirty look . In contrast ,indigo is cheap and  has cheerful staffs(only exception is recent  incident of clash by indigo staff with passenger,video became viral and indigo suspended that staff).     I am giving 2 star to Spicejet for providing cheap flight from kolkata to patna about 2000/- only. Spicejet should give training to own staffs ,for keeping smiling face and thanking passenger for travel etc.

title: Very Excellent Service
text: It was very excellent service by Nikita Sharma, Anushka, Exta and Chingriton. Food was very good and amazing and tasty. Flight was very Excellent Service. I enjoyed my flight I will visit again thanks

title: Improved!
text:
Could have missed the flight, but the check in was smooth & fast!
Got a leggy seat (at emergency exit!)
I could have done without the breakfast, not upto the mark :(

title: OK with Spice Jet
text:
We had travelled by Spice Jet flight from Pune to Chennai, departing Pune at 11.15 pm. 
we had taken this flight after our visit to Shirdi.. Most convenient time and the cost was affordable. Journey was good and flight landed on time at Chennai. Of course we know they don't serve anything 'Free of Cost" in the flight except water. OK ... The crew was also good and service oriented.

title: Courteousness
text:
The headline sums up the review.

Upon boarding the aircraft.

The crew normally greets guests at the entrance. However, in my case the crew was busy chatting with each other and didn‚Äôt notice a few passenger I guess.

Basic etiquette perce.

In flight to the crews behaviour pattern and interaction seemed to just be a formality rather than willingly.

- Flight information by the captain
Very information with good amount of insights. Have heard very few captains provide this much of information.
Keep it up.

Lastly, the landing of the aircraft was way to hard and jittery. Once she touch ground, had to literally push against the seat in front due to the forward pressure.

Overall a generous rating of 3 only for the courtesy provided by the captain.
Crew certainly needs to be trained further.

title: Cramped, but OK
text: Plane was OK, but hardly any legroom. Thank goodness for a short flight. Flight was very delayed. Cabin crew was huge, considering there is very little on board assistance needed. Obviously, no food and a low kg luggage allowance. Directions to the bus could have been clearer - we got on the wrong bus and so ended up at the wrong plane, but they happily delivered us to the correct plane safely. Security at the airport could also have been better sign- posted

title: Dissappointing experience
text: This was my first experience with Spice Jet and I am afraid it was disgusting (Onward DEL-IXM on 6/11 and return IMX-DEL on 11/11). The airlines seems to be only interested in selling various goods and facilities like seat location, leg space, priority boarding (a farce anyway), food, merchandise etc etc at exorbitant rates rather than providing basic services to the customers. Imagine receiving more than a dozen communication by sms, mail and voice call to coerce me to buy something! This may make good business sense but it was simply annoying to me. My contact details were shared with the airlines for important information, if any,  and not for unwanted sales talk. On top of all this the management at Madurai airport was deplorable. The boarding pass had no gate number printed, security staff could not help with gate number, there was no announcements that we could hear. The TV screens near all the gates simply displayed "Welcome to Madurai". We reached the gate and boarded the flight by following some passengers whose boarding passes resembled ours. Things went normally during the short flight however in the Delhi-Madurai flight the landings at both Chennai and Madurai were the roughest landings I have ever experienced. I am sorry to say that Spice Jet would be my last choice in future.

title: Boring flight experience on the International route
text:
The start of flight was delayed by 20 mins, but made up and ended up late by only 10 mins. The interior and seats were clean. No entertainment system available. Food & Drinks were available at additional cost. Blankets were not provided. Overall, it was a boring flight experience on the International route.
Being a cheaper provider does not mean that good service cannot be expected. Jet Airways operate with approximately same price on the same route with a better experience.

title: Ground staff
text: It could be easy to talk to the direct management and get proper answers. Ground staff are very arrogant and less responsible. They care a foot about the passengers and answers are very rude. No one wants to waste time with their arguments and try to leave which these staff are using for their rudeness.

title: Poor service for international trips
text: It was a terrible experience flying with spicejet from kolkata to bangkok, the attendants were least bothered to cater to needs of passengers, the food served was some probably some stale food just warmed up before being served. The seats are cramped, offering very less space to move, ypu just have to sit in one position all the time, which is not quite possible in flights beyond 2-3 hours.

title: An easy way to move across India
text: We had only 14 days to spend in our journey in India so to maximize the time cutting distance we used this low cost company. We easily booked everything via website and everything worked perfectly.

title: Low cost with high value
text: We used this company to reach Varanasi just arrived  from Italy exploiting their morning flight of 6:00. We easily booked everything via website and everything worked perfectly.

title: Worlds most awful airline
text: Staff on this airline are most unhelpful and rude. Their computer made an error on the reservation and issued the wrong boarding pass. They recognjzed it and yet made me miss a flight. Did not even offer to rebook on another flight and had to purchase a new tkt on another airline. Was told effectively that if I was a VIP they would have accommodated me but since I was an ordinary passenger they could not help. Will never fly this airline again nor would I recommend it to anyone else

title: On time to your destination
text: For your business travel and if you looking for a budget airlines then SpiceJet will be your first priority destination like Kolkata or Bangkok.

title: Very bad service at checkin desk it doesnt closed gates before boarding time
text: I reached checkin desk at 8.35..Flight time was at 9.30 they closed checkin  desk at 8.30 and on paper checkin time was 8.45 they didnt allow me to get in forcefully i was made to book next flight tickets out of no option. Staff at checkin window were very rude...will never book spice jet flight...

title: Very bad experience with staff in plane
text: It was a really bad Experience, Don't recommend this Airlines at all. We were travelling with Family, when we boarded the flight from mumbai, we had laptop in hand luggage and asked airline staff to accommodate it properly on which he asked us to carry the same on our lap over journey of 4 hours. which is horrible reply by any service industry staff...then staff started misbehaving with me and my elderly parents. this kind of behavior is unexpected from spice jet team and would definitely recommend senior staff to advice their airline crew to learn manner while speaking with customers,

title: Good Flight Eperience
text: SpiceJet as the name suggest it bring Spice in your flight travel experience, which is required for remembering experience. The Airline is low budget airline which doesn't give food on board for free. one has to purchase. It doesn't matter as the price of the ticket is less compared to other airlines. and it hardly matters for short haul flights. Seats are improved compared to few years earlier. Cabin crew seems to be running entire time for dont know reasons. They hardly attend passengers during the flight if they need water or any-other assistance. Given the price and the travel experience one can give it a try. not a bad experience so far....

title: Delayed at Delhi...due to ATC and runway repair
text:
Took the flight from Delhi to Ahmedabad on 07 Nov, when there was runway repair work going on.

Luckily flight was flying, unlike 68 others which were cancelled.

However SMS came to report 120 mins before departure. Initially flight delayed by 30 mins and then by another 60 minutes.

Boarding finished and no push back for another 30 odd minutes.

During the flight, there seemed to be unnecessary delay in serving of meals. Unfortunately being a corporate booking my meal of veg platter was booked. The platter size scares you with 8 big pieces of paneer and 8 big pieces of tandoori aloo stuffed with paneer. This was accompanied by a macaroni salad, dessert and chutney along with a beverage. Just managed to finish half of it .

Sincerely the platter menu needs to be relooked for its size and overdose of paneer.

title: Good option with SpiceMax
text: The choice of upgrading at a nominal cost with SpiceMax offers nice leg room space in the flight and priority boarding and baggage. Worth a try but best enjoyed when the airline uses aerobridge.

title: leg room issues !!!
text: very little leg room and therefore quite uncomfortable. The staff are rushing through the service and therefore do not have time to attend to individual requests.

title: Service Could be better !!!
text:
Staff approached us and offered us seats with more leg room. When we agreed to pay the difference, they charged us again for our minimal excess baggage of a few kgs. 
Staff on this particular were so serious as they rushed through the service. All in all, not very enjoyable. As we upgraded to better seats, we got a complimemtary snack while others have to pay. travelled Air India on my last trip to Goa and i got a complimentary snack and beverage with no extra charge !!!

title: BUSINESS AND PILGRIMAGE TRIP
text: Madam/Sir, I had been to our Kulaideviam temple in Tiuruvadaimaddur located near HP Petroeum of Tirrupanaipettai which is 8 kms from Kumbakonam Bus stand. I reached by car from Trichy airport to Kumbakoinam by Taxy. It was worthy business and piligrimage trip

title: Making money out of "Emergency Exit" seats by giving logic of better leg space.
text:
Emergency Exit should be offered to someone who is willing to operate the doors during emergency and help the crew/passengers. 

Rather focusing & allocating seats on this grounds, Spicejet staff offered for emergency exit seat on chargeable basis giving logic of better leg room space.

Poor approach........

title: Beautiful Spice Jet journey from Kolkata to Bagdogra.
text:
The journey in Spice Jet flight from Kolkata to Bagdogra had been awesome. The amenities in Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose Airport is Kolkata were awesome. The visitors lounge was great. The Food Court was great. The fish fry in the Food Court was very tasty. The air buses of Spice Jet which were air conditioned were very comfortable. The air bridge of Spice Jet was comfortable. 
The seats in the Spice Jet Flight was spacious and comfortable. I ordered pre-booked meal. They gave us chicken biriyani and chicken kabab, kofta in the flight. In an one hour journey the food was very tasty and brilliant. The view of clouds from the window was brilliant. Just because there were nimbus clouds, there was some flight disturbance. But that was natural. The take off and landing of the flight was smooth. The Bagdogra airport was equally good. It is situated around tea gardens and has brilliant ambience. My family members including wife, mother, son enjoyed the journey as well. Only one suggestion, Spice Jet should have TVs inside the flight for entertainment.

title: Maintain the time now a days
text: Now a days Spice Jet maintains on time arrival/departure. staffs are co-operative & good customer service. Travelled Kolkata-Bagdogra, Kolkata-Delhi & it was nice experience.

title: RARFE TREAT AND BLEND OF FORMAL BUSINESS VISIT AND PILGRIMAGE VOW KEPT
text: I am very happy to state that spice jet did provide excellent in-flight services and on time departure and arrival

title: What a shambles
text:
We arrived at the check-in and were made an additional offer by SpiceJet of priority seats, baggage first off, a meal and drinks through out the flight. We thought as it late and a long early day to come we would accept the offer and paid for the package.
The flight was then listed as 30 minutes late and eventually the gate was opened to a real scrum, no control. We did have our priority seat booked eventually obtained begrudgingly by the crew, the flight eventually took off well over an hour late. 
No food as they didn't have enough food on board and then one small drink. The package stated our luggage would have priority off load HA HA, the luggage came with all the other luggage.
Think carefully what this airline offers and what you pay and accept for, as they don't deliver.

title: Rude Behaviour of Staff
text:
was on a business trip my crn number XCZRRT.. very rude behaviour of the senior crew
his name is navneet ...very arrogant attitude kind of show off...iwas wearing a headset and sleeping..he woke me up and started giving actions asking me to pull my seat front kind of he owns the aircraft

title: On time arrivals and professional staff & pleasant flight experience
text:
I had a pleasure to travel in comfort and lucky that day, to be seated next to Mr.Vikram Kumar one of the Spicejet flight commandant (he flew as a passenger, not as staff on duty on that flight). He was humble & pleasant to talk to. I heard some good tips about the flight, landing, about their classy staff Training's that's imparted in different facilities outside India, their management's efforts to keep staff motivated, skilled up appropriately and expanding service sectors etc. Wish him and the staff well! 
SpiceStyle, domestic in-flight sales is great, found some good nifty choices, decently priced that passengers can purchase on-board.
Availability of food choice on flight could be improved though.
Overall great experience and surely an airline with growing reputation that one should fly,

title: Worst flight and very bad maintenance
text:
We had traveled by spice jet to Hyderabad. The flight was very small and movie badly. The maintenance of the flight is worst than state transport bus. The seat were formed out. The cleanliness was very bad with stains and mud out there. The food was limited and we bought chips was not liked by my child. 
We were disappointed by the travel and thought not to travel anymore.

title: Refreshing
text: I had earlier flyed with Spicejet and this time around my opinion of this low cost operator changed a lot.  We got the first seat with a lot of leg room. The crew members were courteous and helpful. Though the choices were limited, the quality of meals were good.

title: Comfortable flight travel
text: Travelled from Mumbai to Kochi on 6th Oct and returned on 11th Oct. The in flight experience was great service was gud but hardly required. The return flight was late but was due to some problems from Mumbai airport. Had a pleasant flight with nice warm staff.

title: The Spice Jet Journey from Kolkata to Chennai was awesome.
text: I was visiting Sri Lanka from Kolkata with my family. I started the journey by Spice Jet flight from Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose Airport in Kolkata. The amenities inside the airport is awesome. There was brilliant Food Court where I had fish fry. The security check system was very organized. The buses of Spice Jet are AC ones and very comfortable. We boarded the flight. The blue seats are very comfortable. The Food inside the flight was brilliant. I booked the food in advance. Spice Jet provided Chicken Tikka, Parsely potato, cake and in cold drinks there was huge variety, from guava juice to mixed fruit juice to coke. Myself, wife Rumi Chatterji, elder son Sathvik Chatterji, mother Supriya Chatterji, chose different cold drinks. The harabhara roll was also awesome. The scene of cirrus clouds from the windows of the flight was worth mentioning. We landed in the Kamraj International Airport in Chennai is due time. Our journey was safe and sound.

title: Bad business policy but helpful staff
text: I had gone to Bali from Mumbai and instead of returning back to  Mumbai I made a four day stop in Delhi for Diwali before heading back home. While returning from Delhi to Mumbai I had loads of luggage with me along with two bottles which I had purchased from duty-free earlier. As per airport policy I can't carry these bottles in hand luggage. Due to this my baggage over exceeded the limit. The staff earlier said that if I reduce my luggage then I don't have to pay. I reduced it in my hand baggage. When I got my bag she checked both my baggage and hand luggage and said your hand luggage is heavy please pay for that. Post this I spoke to the manager on how his staff doesn't info the customer well and he agreed and apologized and agreed to let go of certain kilos for the payment. The rest of the staff also understood my problem and upgraded me with no additional cost

title: Poor Turbulance Handling
text: My heart jumped into my throat when we faced a turbulence from Calcutta to Dhaka in the month of August. Also, our  Luggage was in a bad state when we picked it up from the belt.

title: Apart from prices the flights are not upto the mark.
text: the flight which I have traveled with my family was no more good than an ordinary volvo bus, Not a good exp.

title: In a Bombardier
text:
Despite the noise of the propellers, the timing suited us during our trip...both into Dharamsala and back to New Delhi was a great experience...

Thank you, Spicejet

title: Doesn‚Äôt Stop Disappointing
text:
Just when you think this trip would go okay, there comes another disappointment. My review is based on the 6 spice jet flight I took in one month. From the moment I booked my ticket, I have been having so much difficulty. They sell you tickets with cheap fares and then have hidden feels for every step you take with the final fare coming much higher. 
    Their customer service is so bad and the flight is really difficult. Their cabin crew seemed to be so untrained and couldn‚Äôt find a single smiling face throughout the flight and mostly rude crews commanding passengers. Even their international flights do not even match any of the international flight standards and had so much trouble throughout the journey with this airlines so many times. It‚Äôs high time they upgrade their customer service and their technology.

title: Level Service standard decreasing day by day !!!
text: Level Service standard decreasing day by day !!! Crew members are not responding when we ask for water. They focus only who purchase flight eatable things. They even not bothered kids requirement.

title: Safety is a big concern
text: Spicejet being a budget airline, I expected them to cut some corners, but not offering a belt for my infant was not something I appreciate. Also, they will charge you extra for any and every seat you select, if doing web check-in.

title: They extract money
text:
While checking in I was told that my cargo luggage is 1 kg more than recommended which was 21 kg as I was flying to Bali.
For that they charged me 400 Rs and for what reasons he weighed my cain luggage I don know which he didn't do with other passengers.
The small handbag which I was carrying weighed 6 kgs again 1 kg more than recommended for which he again charged me 350 Rs.
With 750 to pay he offered me a package to pay 1000 rs more and get a better seat and meals on board which I felt he was hardselling.
I didn't opt for that. But I saw many passengers carrying much heavier handbags than me in the cabin and were not charged.
I have written a complaint to spicejet but don't expect them to revert back as it's a dying airline which is on oxygen.
They have to extract money from passengers to sustain I believe.

title: Reasonable airline
text: Flight was on time and seemed to be the preferred airline for internal business travel according to locals and expats. New model planes although heavily used and worn. Slightly unconventional methods (eg skidding on wet taxiway when pilot realised he needed to turn). Would fly again.

title: SpiceJet
text: Terrible is an understatement, sky high ticket prices, opportunistic check in staff charged me for excess baggage at actual extra baggage, worst seating arrangement in aircraft with no leg space for long legged passenger like me, discourteous cabin crew, worst flight ever taken by me. Never again..

title: The worst customer service you can get - At Hyderabad Airport that I can speak about
text:
This airlines is a ripoff. They don't have coordination at the ticketing counters and they will not issue boarding pass even though it was their problem of making people wait in long queues. 
When asked about that they wont respond and tell customers to call online support and online support says to talk to ground crew. No one takes responsibility.
They will not book you on the next available flight and say you have to buy tickets again at the ticketing counter. 
They wont refund a penny of what I paid and I had to spend Rs 28,000 (for two tickets) which is ridiculous to get going in the day. (Unfortunately, I paid and went on their stupid, irresponsible airlines as time was a factor)
THE WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE. Never again if I am planning on flying in India and booking in advance, i will be buying SPICEJET. 

LOOK at the other options available and may this be the last resort.

title: Take spicejet, if there is no other option...
text: 1. They will compromise with everything for a on-time performance. And the sufferer are the fliers. As it provides only paid meal / snacks, but most of the time you will not get the food of your choices. Many of their aircraft are old, makes suffocation many times. Travel only if there is no other option.

title: Before Time
text: we a family of 5 travelled to Male from Bangalore with a change of airport at Thiruvananthapuram. The check in was smooth and while going and coming the plane left before departure time and arrived well in advance. There were personnel at Thiruvananthapuram airport to facilitate the transfer to international airport by taxi. Overall a pleasant flying experience

title: Good Airline
text: Flew this Airline after a long break because of a very disappointing act of the cabin crew about 2 years back. I did tell him that time that with the type of attitude he carried the Airline can shut down and it almost did. Well he did not let me shift from an normal centre seat to the next aisle seat in spite of the aircraft carrying not even 50% load. Just to clarify that I did not shift to a Emergency exit nor the 1st row with more leg space. It was in row I think 23 or 24. Any way this time my experience was quite good and as Spice jet does not open the inventory of seats even 24 hrs before except the centre seats I checked in at the Airport and fortunately the lady did give me an aisle seat. Though the leg space is pretty cramped up compared to any other Airline. I do travel at least twice a month within India.

title: Comfortable airline with reasonable fares.
text:
Way way better than any Indian airline. Firstly it's never late, either on time or 10 mins before time and that matters the most. 
Superb leg space and service. Wish food was served free, but it's ok to pay little.

title: Terrible/Horrible, Pathethic, Worstuuu
text: worst airline, please do not use spice jet airline service, they do not provide even water to drink, they are not professionsals, they do no how to treat a customer

title: Very professional Service
text: It was a good experience travelling in Spice Jet. Inflight services are very good and air hostesses are very nice and professional. However, Ground staff at check-in were rude and not customer friendly. Choosing seat is also an issue as most of the seats are paid seats. Needs some changes.

title: No Customer Services : Avoid
text: Flight was delayed by 1 hours. No specific reason given to the passengers for the delay. As per local airport staff : this particular flight delays every single day. Reason given by airlines - operational reason. Since, the flight was delayed for 1 hour, no complimentary drink, snacks or food offered by the cabin crew as a gesture of goodwill or to compensate the delay. Not even an apology. Expensive menu in the flight with limited choice of food. Most of the items were not available.

title: How can they ask for money while online check in!!!
text:
I feel really annoyed because web portal has only provision of selecting tickets if you are willing to pay between 100 to 1000 INR else your seat will be middle seat, last  few rows.
An example of unprofessionalism and not thinking about flyers who want to seat together. Seriously   please change your thinking and business model. just for 500 rupees you are losing your brand value. Crap. I am not going to fly with you . Mr Ajay Singh, cheap flight does not mean you can harass the travelers like this.

title: Horrible an understatement
text:
Writing about the sorely disappointing experience that my recent DEL-PNQ flight was - flew with them after quite some time, and was reminded just how much their standards and more importantly ethics have fallen.

1. In the days leading up to the flight, I recd SMSes every single day, multiple times a day, asking to upgrade to their SpiceMax seats. I would imagine it's understood that I would have bought a SpiceMax ticket in the first place if I saw value in it, but I don't (a full Rs 1000 extra, are you kidding me?!). Not only that, even at the check-in counter, the staff member kept trying to foist it off on me, recounting the benefits and urging me to upgrade (I felt at that moment as though I was in a KFC/Burger King counter, refusing the extra cheese / toppings they are hell bent on selling me)

2. While doing my web check-in, I was shocked to see that I have to pay extra for EVERY seat, save for some middle seats. Thus, despite checking in online in advance, I and my mother could NOT get seats together. Other low cost airlines at least assign seats together by default, and then charge should you want to change the seats allocated by them; but these guys do not even give a choice in the matter - you have us choose by force, and pay for it too! They hit a new low in my eyes with this cheapest of cheap tactics.

3. Lastly, I was reminded just how big a lie their boast of consistent On Time Performance is - everyone knows the DEL-PNQ sector takes about 1h55m in actuality, but other airlines go at most till about 2h5m factoring in taxiing time and a little bit of buffer; but they go a step further and claim a flying time of 2h20m! They get us to Pune a full 10-15mins late, and at the end still have the gall to say "another before time arrival for SpiceJet"?? Do they really think they can get away with that?? Well they clearly have, considering their disgraceful airline is still flying on Indian skies; but boy, I sure hope and pray not for long...

title: Good airline with minor hiccups
text:
We tried Spicejet for the first time. There is now a good competition in terms of low cost airlines and from a price perspective, Spicejet is competitive although not the most economical option. 

The check in and boarding process was smooth and the flights maintained the time schedules. The check in and on board staff are excellent and accommodating. The meals I booked were not available on board, however, the on board staff went extra mile to ensure that alternative arrangement was made for us. 

The seats are not very comfortable. In both the flights, the leather was worn out and I saw the staff just reusing the fallen headrest cloth than replacing them with new ones.

Overall a good airline, they need to sort out on 

1. Seat comfort
2. Hygiene - replace the head rest cloth 
3. Ensure that the pre-booked meals are available
4. Dont call and pester to upgrade to SpiceMax (No real advantage of this offering)

Positives - 
1. Very good staff
2. On time
3. Smooth check in, on boarding, baggage handling
4. Good choice of food and beverage

title: A good cheap airline
text: I flew in August. The service seem adequate. Staffs were professional. More or less timely. Baggage handling was satisfactory.

title: Economy Airlines
text: The flight was scheduled at 7:40 started on time and reached the destination before time over all travel was very good...and at affordable price

title: SG 678, Chennai - Mumbai.
text: This is a very early morning service to Mumbai. The flight landed in Mumbai well  ahead of schedule. Fortunately,  boarding at Chennai and disembarking in Mumbai were on areobridge. Didn't buy any food onboard. There were a few noisy pax, but the crew intervened and resolved. The seat's recline was bit stiff. Overall, a good and safe  flight.

title: My flight experience with SpiceJet
text:
It was first time I was traveling by SpiceJet in India (domestic travel.)
My travel was in the early hours (6.35AM) I had a premium booking by paying Rs. 1000.00 extra. Checking at around 5.00AM, was easy. The non premium passengers had a very long queue. It would have been better if they sort out this matter for a better experience for the non premium travelers.
With a SpiceJet boarding pass and Mastercard Credit card, there is free entrance to the Premium Lounge located on the first floor, at the Domestic terminal at the departure side.
The lounge was beautifully arranged. Reasonably equipped with food items and on order counter for Dosa and Egg Omlette.
I had a very good experience there.
The flight travel was very comfortable with very cooperative cabin crew. To name Piyanka, who was in the flight from Delhi to Mumbai and Mumbai to kochi. There was a stop over of 1 hour at Mumbai.
Flight was delayed for some time, but was comfortable.

title: a worst case scenario fight ...
text:
why in the world only spicejet have a ''card block'' option...? ..we need to show the original/copy of the credit card used for booking.. i think credit card payments are legitimate ways of payment!. no other aircrafts asks for the same.
-we have traveled many times in spicejet by booking the tickets using the same number. Atleast the proper residence visa holders should be avoided from asking for the credit card details.. IF NOTHING WORKS THEN ONLY I WILL PREFER A SPICEJET... 
- legroom!..a big NO if you guys need proper legroom.. either you should be short or you should be happy with whatever space you will get.. 
- when the person sitting in front pushes the seat back..then your legs will get jammed... :(

title: Low cost Flight.... My Flight Journey to Pune from Chennai and return
text:
We had been to Pune from Chennai during August 17 by Spice Jet Flight... Of course cost wise this flight journey is cheaper...Leg Space is not that much comfortable.. However it is Ok taking into account the journey time viz. 1.45 minutes... Crew is much accommodative..Service is good... Nothing is free inside the craft....except water...
As a gesture and good will, I request the Management of Spice Jet to extend Five Star Chocolates to passengers.....This wont cost them much.

title: Overall experience is good. Leg space is very less
text: The leg space in the flight was very less. Rest experience is ok. Not much can be expected from a flight with low cost ticket.

title: It was good but not now due to some staff
text: Spice Jet was the Best carrier earlier. In Flight experience is also good as per comfort and flight crew but airport staff at Delhi T-1D is not good. Try to fool customers. I stopped travelling after that bitter experience with Spice Jet.

title: Good travel experience with Spice
text: I traveled from Bengaluru to New Delhi in July this year in SpiceJet flight SG 150. The service provided by company was very good and Spice staff is very co-operative and well mannered.

title: Pathetic service
text: I flew from Madurai to Chennai on September 2017 after traveling from USA. When I flew from Chennai to Madurai, I was allowed a hand baggage and laptop bag as per industry standard. However when I flew back to Chennai from Madurai, I was denied. I was asked to check in my hand baggage and was charged INR 2100 for the hand baggage. In fact, I paid only INR 1500 for the ticket. In fact, the airport staff was so rude that they took away my US passport and refused to give until I pay the money. When I reported this to customer service, no apologies. Only comment I received was that they will not return the money. I was not even given a receipt. I believe that airlines and staff are swindling people's money by various methods. I will never recommend anyone to use the services of spicejet.

title: Average flight
text:
you cant expect much from spice jet
its an average flight but you can expect good customer service from them for sure
they even charge you if you have to correct your name

title: SG-206, non stop to Delhi.
text: This is a morning service from Chennai, bit more convenient than those graveyard wake up time flights! Webcheck was helpful to pass through the counter quickly. Nothing special about the flight and it was almost on-time at Delhi. I had breakfast in the Chennai airport, so didn't opt for onboard services. The crew was friendly. I like the Jai Hind !

title: Extremely humble and cooperative staff and good leg space
text:
We had booked our flight from Pune to Trivandrum via Bangalore .The experience with Spice Jet was great as the staff was very cooperative and we were given privilage treatment as we were having an infant with us.

We could even experience a Bombardier flight and Bangalore to Trivandrum is a small.It was a great experience in all.

title: PATHETIC SERVICE

SHAME ON SPICEJET

title: good service

title: Flied Spicy To Jaipur
text: it all started by reaching at Surat Airport ....for your knowledge Surat Airport is a budding airport, as soon as i reached inside Spicejet guy told me to wait as they couldn't handle passengers of three flights at a time being a spice max passenger they checked me in with priority .. SpiceJet uses a Q400 on Surat Jaipur route...  took off on time Q400 is quite spacious from inside but too noisy on SpiceMax seat 1A not too many food options as its a Q400 had to adjust with a sandwich on the name of Meal ...Smoothly landed to Jaipur before time

title: Nice
text: The flight was comfortable. The seats and legroom were fine. I found the food to be a little expensive. The staff was friendly.

title: flights surprisingly good
text: pilot great, fantastic landing and takeoffs. flight comfortable. attendants really slack, no attention to seat belts, seat position or luggage - budget airline so don't expect too much

title: Beware of the Travel Insurance scam
text:
Beware of the Trip insurance Offered.
I had purchased tickets for round trip from Pune to Goa on the Spice Jet site.I had purchased non refundable tickets. The site offered an option to purchase trip insurance for around 179 Rs/pp. I purchased the insurance thinking that if I have to cancel the trip I would be covered. I had to cancel the trip due to health issues. When I did that I was shocked that the insurance covered any cancellations or delays by the airline and not the passengers. So I was insuring the airline in case they had problems!!
As far as I can remember, I could not go back and check, this is not made clear on the site. 
The policy is issued by Reliance. On the certificate at the bottom it states that only Indian Nationals are covered. This fact is not clarified on the site before purchase.
In my opinion this is a novel way to scam customer! 
I did not fly  on this airline and doubt will ever will.

title: Big scam
text:
I had purchased tickets on Spice Jet site for a planned vacation.
I have to cancel the vacation because of illness. I had purchased the "

title: Clean flight great service
text: Right from Check in I was very happy. The services were professional, quick and smart. The flight was one hopping at Pune. Both the sectors Del- Pnq ansd PNQ- COK I was very happy take off  and landing was smooth. The crew was also very helpful and I found they were stretching to cater to everyone's needs.

title: Great

Thank you

title: Good Looking
text: I have travelled on this airline, while going to home. It was a nice experience i felt while travelling on spicejet.

title: Good service

title: Good airlines and service

Pathetic service.. Complete lack of accountability.. This happened two times.. Once they delayed it.. The next time they actually canceled it. Hopeless... I would sincerely request that no one ever has the misfortune to go through what we went through.. Bloody pathetic.. Zero professionalism..

title: worse experience ever

horrible experience with  spice jet
As i have to go on emergency , from dxb to del ..I took spice MAX option for better comfort...but flight was beyond lower than expected .inside rutted smell with torn and ancient used seats .even we buy extra MAX for more comfort ..seat could not recline so all time i sat 90 degree sitting position with infant.

title: staff need to be polite

title: Forever late!!!!!!!
text:
We received a call from Spicejet saying that the flight was going to depart 15 mins prior to the scheduled time and i was quite surprised as they have always let us down with their delays .On arrival at the airport it turns out that the flight was delayed and delayed by more than an hour.Fortunately our connecting flight was only 5 hours later and we made it on time for our connection but i would advise people to think twice before booking on spicejet if you have time constrains!
Quite a crammed up flight too but being a budget airline you shouldnt expect much.

title: Always perfect
text: I always choose Spicejet because of favorable prices and really good service. I never had a delay, and staff is generally nice, considering that this is a low cost airline. when buying a ticket you always clearly know what is included and for what you need to pay extra. Aiplanes are generally clean and new. definetly recommended!

title: Thank You!
text:
Dear Spicejet Team,

I just wanted to thank the entire team of spice jet who took great care of my pet who is Labrador, especially Vivek Sharma, Pankaj, Sandeep and Manish who were very helpful and took great concern of my dog and made sure he was safely transported and also called to check if my pet was reached safely and showed what care really meant... I really appreciate the entire team who went out of their way and extended care.

title: Much better than expected!
text: After reading multiple reviews (post purchasing the ticket...) I was quite nervous for my flight with SpiceJet. I was traveling along and it was my first visit to India, so I decided to pay the nominal additional fee to have Spicemax privileges. I was pleasantly surprised! For a low cost airline, it was good - definitely comparable to flydubai or Pegasus. The airplanes were clean, although a bit old, but no problems with the AC. In fact, I'd recommend taking a cardigan in case as I got a bit cold. The seats recline, the extra legroom is worth it! Staff are friendly although in flight service is slow, so don't be in a hurry. The food prices are reasonable and it's quite good - spicemax includes a beverage and meal. No in flight entertainment, but that did not come as a surprise. The flights were delayed, but only by 15min and the made up time coming back. The price was actually a bit high for a low cost airline, however it was eid weekend which would have an effect. Overall I would use them again.

title: A short flight
text: A short comfortable flight from Dehradun to DELHI. The listed flight time was 1 hour ten minutes but flight time was only little more then 30 mts. We spent more time for the luggage at DELHI. After 5 minutes, a message was displayed that the last bag has come, with more then 75% of the passengers waiting for checked in baggage.  Then after luggage from Air India flight was cleared, they traced and put up our luggage on the carousel and that after nearly an hour.

title: nice but they charge for everything...
text: comfortable flight , good food, but they charge for everything and fool around by saying that they are a low cost airlines. you have to pay even to do a regular web check-in, which actually helps airlines by reducing the check-in ques at the counter.

title: Awesome
text: Awesome experience with spicejet airways what a timing brilliant no matter about the class but punctuality is also

Meal size show how the Airline thinks of Customers and the portion is less for the charges but packing seems Attractive.
Finally when reached Delhi T1 to my surprise the staff starting dislodging food trolley rather passengers and that felt bad since now I could feel who was important for Airlines.
