title: Pleasantly satisfied but seating space is on tighter size.
text: the flight was delayed due to weather but every thing from check in to boarding to take off and then on to Pune landing went in smoothly. The space for person sitting is little uncomfortable for a thin person of 65 kg (me).That the only blemish , a journey of 2 hrs and you r sitting very tight.

title: This spice will make you furious !!
text:
The flight time between Kochi and Delhi is almost three hours. 
I though of upgrading myself to super Economy seats for better comfort. The seat allotted to me was 1A.

The seats are so narrow and it is really disgrace. 1 A seat has one peculiar issue. it is a window seat and window has a slight curve, thus making the seat more tight.

Spice jet seats are worst among all economy class airlines.

I suggest they should be selected last. It is worth spending few hundreds more but to travel in Spice Jet

title: Always late is Known as Spice Jet
text:
My experience with Spice Jet is always with delay of minimum 30 minutes every time.
Support for hand are broken. Seat covers are not clear. Kolkata to Surat flight time on website is 10.20 AM. While on Airport, that flights actual time was 10.50 AM everyday. After this, flight was departed from Kolkata at 11.20 AM. It arrived to Surat at 1.45 PM. More than one hour delay. So anybody if want to reach their destination by delay of minimum 30 minutes, they should prefer Spice Jet. I am Giving Name Delay jet not spice Jet.

title: IndiGo is much better on service
text: The biggest problem is that SpiceJet is not IndiGo. There is no desire or hurry to be on time. Luggage comes later. Service certainly can improve.

title: Avoid SpiceJet if you want your trip to be peaceful...
text:
Wow! What a journey it was until we received a call from SpiceJet regarding reaching airport early as the flight was preponed... Ok accepted, we checked out from hotel and reached on time at airport. Oh! What we found that apart from their routine security check there was no multiple security checks as mentioned in their SMS received from SpiceJet. So our 1 to 2 hours were wasted. Then as usual flight flew on time and approximately at around 4:15pm they very proudly announced "kindly fasten your seat belt as we are going to land BEFORE MENTIONED LANDING TIME". Our flight landed at Mumbai Airport approximately at around 5:00pm and as the plane was finishing the rest formality, by the time my husband and me were seated and watching the loading - unloading of baggages from the another SpiceJet plane, and we saw that one baggage fell down from certain height and we looked at each other and I told my husband that I wish our baggage is safe...
We took our baggage from the belt and when I pressed the button of the handle and as soon as I grabbed it to scroll the bag, my hand got hurt and got one surprise from the SpiceJet üòä which can be seen in the photos.
Then the same story they blame others for the same üôå. We raised the complaint and received a call saying that it will not compensate.

I think I have traveled with SpiceJet three times and always they make passengers to run just to announce "BEFORE MENTIONED LANDING TIME WE WILL BE LANDING"

I think now we all are that smart enough to choose our flights for our next trips because at least from now we have excluded SpiceJet from our list for future travel as reaching on time is more important for SpiceJet then the inconvenience faced by the travelers and the irresponsibility shown towards baggage handling.

SpiceJet onboard staff was so greedy for money that while serving food they were much concerned about giving food and taking money from the customer and they didn't even bother to give a way to the senior citizen who wanted to go to the washroom.

title: Spice Club Trap
text:
This airline is most of the time on-time. Service is good. 
But one should never ever fall in the TRAP of SPICE  CLUB membership. It is just useless. The most useless program run among any airlines in the World. They won't issue any Membership Card. Waste of money. They will give you all the reasons Not to add your points of your bookings to your account. Your initial bonus points gets expire very soon. Extremely BAD ATTITUDE & BAD SERVICE for SPICE CLUB matters.

title: Luggage rip off fees
text: SpiceJet is cheap because they make their costs out of luggage cost extortion fees. They won't tell you how they calculate the fees or a what rate. I had even bought extra luggage allowances when booking. I flew twice with SpiceJet, one flight the luggage was ok, the second flight 2000 Rs for the same luggage. Guess which one was in a rural area? I actually stood on the scales to check if they were working correctly and my weight had dropped 10kg between flights as well.

title: Quick is not always good
text:
I asked a lot for a side seat but I was told there is no side seat left except the premium seats, which I can have if I upgrade. Ultimately got a middle seat.
But when boarded aircraft I could easily find 2 side seats vacant (non premium). Not sure it was a trick to make me get premium seats or was it a reality.
In flight everything was going fast, even the landing was fast and no so smooth. Boarding was quick at counter but making people stand in queue to enter plane. Safety instructions demo were so quick.

title: They serve Tuticorin!
text: Mostly on time, which is a big deal, considering that we are the southernmost (non metro) airport of the country. Efficient service, reasonably priced tickets.

title: temperature inside while aircraft is at base
text:
i have traveled in SPICEJET twice earlier to this particular flight, but this time we found that cooling (AC ) was so very less that including myself many other passengers were trying to check if the vent for air flow was not proper, while the aircraft was at base.
in short cooling was not up to the mark as expected from any airline.
otherwise its all  o.k.

title: Worst flight ever
text:
So far the worst flight i have ever travelled in. 

Starting with the check-in counter i would say they were average nothing out the ordinary, they could have speed up the process if they wanted but silly chit-chats were more important when there is a huge line of customers waiting.

Entering the aircraft you could smell something weird like a stale smell and the cleaning staff didnt even bother  to take out the used tissues out of the pocket right in the front.

The service of the staff was really average as there were just 3 attendants for the entire aircraft which i believe was not enough for a passenger aircraft carrying approx 180 passengers.
The seats were uncomfortable and unfortunately my seat had a problem in reclining back so i was sitting upright, on requesting the staff present i got the most weird reply ever and i Quote " Sir the remaining empty seats have been occupied by the other travellers to sleep on them"  to which my first question was " DID THEY PAY FOR IT?" 
Now i absolutely dont know what was the number 1 thing on their priority list "WHETHER TO SOLVE A PROBLEM IN HAND OR DONT WANT TO WAKE UP ANYONE FROM THEIR SLEEP"  but it didnt happen and i had to sit through 4.5 hours of complete torture.

Did I mention that the flight was delayed by 1.5 hours which we got to know about after sitting in the aircraft so in total 6 hours of complete torture.

All in all it was the worst experience ever and i would not recommend anyone to travel Spicejet even if they give you the tickets for free.

title: TOO SHORT UNIFORM FOR AIR HOSTRESSES
text: i was surprised to see too short uniform for AIR HOSTESSES and i think they were also feeling uncomfortable for the same. It is not a good practice to attract the customers.

title: Undoubtedly worst airlines in India
text:
I have traveled with almost all airlines in India and among that SpiceJet is the worst. Their stewards and hostesses are very unprofessional and look very untidy. They lack basic courtesy how to talk to passengers, they are rude and arrogant.

They have 0 legroom I know I'm tall (6'3") I face legroom issue with all airlines but SpiceJet is pathetic. I sit cramped my leg hurts like hell. I get tensed and worried two days prior to flying with them. 

This review isn't coming from flying just once with them, I've traveled quite a number of times when I have no other option is only time I chose SpiceJet.

title: Good Experience
text:
15/August/17  : Del - Bagdogra
20/August/17  : Bagdogra - Del

The service is satisfactory and flight was well maintained. Satisfactory with overall quality of service and experience.

Suggest that the food taste be checked specially for the Del-Bagdogra sector as improvement is possible.

title: Convenient and comfortable
text: Was on a trip back from Bangalore after a busy business day. The evening flight was on time, and the staff were hospitable & courteous.

title: Cabin female crew extra professional, act such. need to learn about hospitality
text: From the check in desk to airbus every place i could find only extra professional.No moto to serve people. Desk person was trying his best to charge us extra for baggage, cabin crew was busy them self after several reminders not bothers to offer a glass of water. no attention unless you order something.

title: Poor Experience
text: On 30th August I flew from Jaipur to Surat and during take of the Pilot announced that the engine had developed some technical problem and taxied back to the parking slot and there the engineers did something and so the flight was delayed. On 28th August also I flew from Surat to Jaipur and this time also the flight was delayed by 45 minutes and so I missed my hotel dinner.

title: Horrible Experience with Spice Jet
text: Flight was scary. It was too much bumpy even in clear sky. pilots were inexperienced. I have pre-booked 2 meals, but they served me only 1 meal. when asked they said they don't have any info about 2nd meal. completely loss of my money.

title: Sub Par Service
text:
First of all, this was a bombardier. We had a hand baggage only rate and they did try to upsell the front rows. And they had now 5, but with baggage only fare it did not make any sense for us We got seats on the 14th row and the ground staff was helpful as he tried if he could accommodate us in the front rows unfortunately we didnt get the seats. 
The flight was delayed by 20 mins , there was no announcement or updation on the screen which was something they should have done and the airport manager has no idea by when they would be able to give us a confirmed time. 
The flight attendant was giggling and was distracted when they were doing the safety demo which is not professional.The seats were ok. Leg room was average. We didnt order meals so nothing to say about it.

title: Had a good flight
text:
Our flight got 10 mins preponed (that happens rarely!). We were informed through sms quite in advance which helped us pack up our day accordingly with no hassles. The crew was kind and supportive. The flight was good too. Thumbs up to the pilot ! There was no delay at any point of time. 

The seating is a little cramped not very comfortable but as it was just an hour journey. It did not effect much. 

Have a great flight !

title: Customer service
text: At the  checking time the agent ask me for my CC ( I bought my ticket online) anyway when I ask him the reason, in very rude way answered me because I say so, I told him that's no the way to give an answer, he say that's the rules. üò¨ Other than that was good

title: Flight departed late instead of scheduled departure time of 16:25 hours. This led to my missing my connecting flight
text:
Flight took off late and reached bangalore late on 24 August 2017,so much so that I missed my connecting flight by jet airways which departed at the scheduled time of 19:30. Not only that I was late to board the jet airways flight to coimbatore but had to purchase a ticket for the jet airways flight that left only on 25 August at 10:30AM. Costing ‚Çπ6250. 
Will never fly spice jet again . All that spice jet compensated was a meagre ‚Çπ500.

title: Value for money
text:
The flight was overall comfortable. Got the extra legroom seats near the emergency exits upon requesting the ground staff when Boarding from Kolkata. Although, while coming back, the airport staff was a bit hesitant giving those seats but eventually gave those upon insisting.

More In-flight services (like Infotainment systems on each seat) should be promoted in this sector as this is more of a fun-trip kind of sector. Also, the In-flight Food & Beverage services should be priced similar to a local sector and they should not charge a premium just because one is travelling international.
For ex: A normal chicken sandwich costs about Rs.200, but the same was charged at Rs.260 just because the journey was to Thailand!
I mean common, a product price does not change if you are flying 100km or even 2000km. DUH!

title: Fly on Time
text: I travelled to & fro Mumbai - Delhi with Spice Jet. From online promotions, booking, online customer service, checkin, on time scedule, inflight service, inflight food, luggege handelling every aspect was a GOOD EXPERIENCE. One can enjoy flying with SPICE JET. Highly recommeded airlines.

title: Nice flight
text: It's a nice flight ‚úà to travel. On it we feel very curiously and exitmentally. There is a good service for the customer's and the good response from the flight ‚úà service. It is good for all to travel on it.

title: Just like any other flight
text: Serves as an economy flight. Seats are typically cramped for space. Charges a premium to improve anything on that. Check ins are smooth.

title: A below average experience with SpiceJet
text:
I am a frequent traveler in SpiceJet (once in 3 months). Last week when I flew with them from Dubai (boarding on this airline from Dubai for the first time), I had a terrible experience at the boarding gate. 

I carried 13 kgs in hand while the allowance is 7 kgs. I admit that I carried an extra of 6 kgs. I was asked to pay AED 60 per each kg. I paid AED 360 for the excess luggage I have carried. I did not object to them as I am expected to abide by their conditions. 

What happened next was so shameful. I passed the boarding gate and finally when I reached the aerobridge leading to the plane, I found a staff who informed me that the inflight luggage cabin is full and I was asked to handover my baggage and it shall be treated as a checked-in baggage. I was quite surprised and couldn't resist questioning why I was charged for the excess I have carried? My checked in baggage was much lesser than the allowance. The staff was helpless as he was unaware of the excess handcarriage charges those airline guys are making at the boarding gate.

Having said this, I would like the fellow passengers to realise that this is another cheap way of making money and exploiting the passengers. And I have decided that I shall not anymore fly with Spicejet nor shall I encourage my friends, family and known ones to fly with them as they do not reflect any kinda quality in any kinda service they provide to the passengers.

title: Good flight
text: Flight was delayed a bit as the airport is managed by the Air Force. Otherwise, it was good. It was a small aircraft and comfortable.

title: Energetic confident crew
text: The flight was delayed because of technical issues but crew took charge once a nod was given to them They started with two rows for boarding n helpful staff even helped for keeping handbags on Cabin..my flight was booked prior and later changed to different flight..but I was not aware of and on realising..they chef our luggage twice at different points so that it is loaded and no mistake should happen.. and assured us of the same by senior crew..to my surprise.. Flight reached on time and they announced it..long way of hospitality.. Good luck!!

title: Shaky flights!
text: All Spicejet flights including this one had a turbulence. Sometimes they say its due to weather, but it is not always. The preventive maintenance should be done more strictly as this is a general experience with most of the Spicejet flights.

title: Average Flight Poor Food quality
text: Very congested seating. Food quality is poor. Mite in rice is common, but not expected food served in-flight. This is something which puts reputation and trust at risk.

title: Business trip
text: Nice service, on time and good staff. Flying experience was great. Flight was new and clean. Appropriate leg room.

title: cheap no frills airline
text:
not a great airline to fly.
old aircraft, delays, no frills, they want money for everything. we ended up sitting in the aircraft for 1.5hrs on the tarmac. 
i wouldnt fly this airline unless i absolutely had to

title: Stinky Uncomfortable Rude
text:
Don't fell prey to their marketing and promotional low fares .
Airplanes are really old and have a foul smell across the flight.
Airline staff isn't polite either.
Spend few more bucks and have a comfortable journey.

title: Huge improvement from before
text:
I had a very bad experience with Spicejet couple of years back. After which I had completely stopped flying Spicejet. 
Couple of days back, I flew Spicejet after couple of years and I must say, they've improved at-least 5 times. Earlier, their aircraft's looked refurbished and repaired, water leaking, bad service, delays etc. Now most of the aircraft's are new, at-least the ones I traveled in recently, onboard service has improved, checkin is simpler, cleanliness is maintained at all times. Over all a good experience. Keep up the good work SpiceJet

title: Nice Budget Airlines
text: It is nice Budget Airlines. I was bit disappointed with the airlines because i paid for spiceclub membership and could not avail any of the benefits from it because of negligence of SpiceJet. Apart from that it is ok to travel with this airline.

title: Timely Flight to Bengaluru instead of Heavy Rain
text:
Booked on the flight last minute but got the tickets at a decent price. It was raining incessantly in Mumbai yet the delay was only 10 minutes and due to airline traffic congestion.
Landing was a tad bit hard but other than good flight

title: Leg space were not adequate and the personnel of the airlines always insisted for paying more money to get leg spacious
text: Not a good experience . I arrived the airline counter for check in counter more than prescribed two hours but the counter desk girl gave me the last seat of the aircraft saying all the seats are booked and insisted for extra payment for the premium seats in the front. Will never fly on this airline. poor service.

title: Value for Money
text: I liked the quite clean interiors of the aircraft and decent on-board service.Ground Services could improve but Airport Infra could be a major show spoiler.

title: VERY UNIQUE EXPERIENCE  BEFORE BOARDING AT GORAKHPUR  AIRPORT
text:
The Gorakhpur air port is newly built airport . It is 7 Kms from my house.. So I started one and half hour before from my house.Just after reaching i found that road was blocked by barricading,because Chief Minister of U P was arriving from the Airport . So i was stuck ion the way.Hardly 30 Mnt left when police opened the way. I was already late and no hope of catching my flight.I reached at air port only 20 Mnt left. The check in counter was closed..Boarding has started. I requested and told them about my being late. They already new it because ,many passengers were late due to this obstruction.They allowed me on the ground that I have already done my check in.
            The flight started 10 Mnts late but reached at Delhi  T1  domestic air port 10 Mnts before . I was thankful to Spice jet people for this favor. It was comfortable flight .Cabin crew were nice and cordial.    Satish Tripathi Gorakhpur.

title: good airlines
text: Very good air;lines, boeing aircraft, brand new with smart and intelligent staff on board. Reached before ETA. . my first travel. seat space a liitle too narrow although in Spicemax leg space is good and luggage comes in priority.

title: Delayed flights increase your tension
text: I had booked tickets for joining my friends at jaipur for a ten day tour in rajasthan.  On 12 the august the day of travel I received a message  at 6 am, informing the delay of my flight by  1hour 40 mts.  Note the fact that if it is above hrs they may have to refund entire amount.  My connecting flight at hyderabad was at 5.30 pm. Due to the delay I may have less than 30 mts to catch it. As I am a senior citizen, I  wanted help to catch up the connecting flight and after repeated requests they agreed to send a staff at hydrebad.  But at hydrebad Noone came with us and I had to rush.  Fortunately the connecting flight was also late.  The entire day my pressure mounted as I had to reach jaipur in time.  The spice jet offered me an alternate flight from hydrebad at 5 am next day in case I miss the connecting flight.   But they asked me to make my own arrangements to stay at hydrebad.  So in a nut she'll don't book spice jet if you have to be in time for a function.  Above all they do not even offer a cup of drinking water inside the flight.

title: Quiet and good
text: Quiet and uneventful short one hour flight. Check in at Chennai was quick, plane was on time, on board service was good.

title: A nice flight with Spicejet
text: It was a nice & joyfulness  journey , while moving from Delhi to Guwahati with Spicejet .But wile returning , we have not been infomrmed that flight has been change and preponed . Due to this , we have missed our some of visiting places.

title: Spicejet lives up to it's reputation of worst airline ever
text:
The flight was delayed by 45 minutes, as usual. It seems that Spicejet doesn't care about aircraft maintenance. I've flown in 150+ flights but whenever I am flying with Spicejet, there's always an issue with the air pressure - you can feel that because of your ears not popping.

Moreover, Spicejet's inflight magazine claims that it's the most punctual airline in India, pretty shamelessly. All my travels with Spicejet have never departed on time.

title: International Route cannot be preffered
text: This flight is not preferable on the international route, my flight was connecting via Kolkatta, and no crew was there to guide the passanger about the transfer/connecting flight details. Passangers was running here and there and no guidelines, being a frequent traveller i was also lost for a moment. flight was so conjucted and there is no in flight service available if you have not paid extra services.

title: Tiny flight with limited food choice
text:
The staff at check in counter was efficient and nice.

The boarding started on time. The flight is a tiny bombardier flight. If you have a window seat your legs will scrape against the side of the plane. It is really cluttered. The food choice is really limited only 1 option for either veg or non veg sandwich. Cabin crew were helpful.

The biggest negative is that for disembarking from the flight all guest are packed into one bus. Even people who are using wheelchair are packed into crowded buses. It being a small flight is really time consuming to help people in wheelchair off the flights. The entire filled bus is waiting for good 10 minutes for this to happen and bus to move. Bus being already crowded it is really difficult for people in wheelchair to sit comfortably in the bus. Uncomfortable for every one concerned.

title: small flight but smooth fly
text: its just 50 min flight. We started at perfect schedule time. Plane was small (Its Twin Turboprop) but flying was smooth. Seats are 2 X 2 and comfortable. this flight don't fly too high so all the time you can see nice view of ground so take window seat as Jaipur and Udaipur both are having good Landscape.

title: Uncomfortable
text:
The plane was not at all maintained!!
Very much in lack of oxygen and ac, about 80% passengers were facing breathing problem due to ac.
And the fight attendances were ignoring our problem.
Seats were very low quality, gap between the seats were very narrow.
And there was unexpected jerk in the plane, even the it landed very critically.
Overall I should say spicejet can't keep it's fame!!

title: Cost efficient airline but crew staff is not very friendly often
text:
We made a wise decision by opting for SpiceMax class seats of the flight in the front and thus, got seats with better legroom than the other economy class seats in the plane. However, as food was complimentary for SpiceMax option - we got very shabby quality of food along with very rude and cold crew members to make the experience all the more bitter. 

As we opted for Spice-Max Class, the airline promised/ assured on its website to start the serving of the food from SpiceMax class passengers first (as ours were the Pre-ordered meals) before catering to other passengers who would be buying in the flight. The pert & arrogant replies of the serving crew members about Non-availability of the Non-Veg Food supplies on the pretext that it got finished before they reached us - annoyed all of us to the core and we felt cheated.

title: Good friendly ground staff and inflight crew
text: Though a single option ATR service to particular sector but the most efficient friendly ground staff make you flyier like a king. The inflight most pleasant personality and having enhanced friendly skill of inflight crew add to comfort of nearly two hours flight in an ATR. I must recognise inflight raktima who always available to help evryone travelling and make everyone feel at home by her efficient skill. That might be an asset to the airline which only a few airlines possesses. I wish all the beat in carrier to entire team of ground staff and inflight crew and wish special appreciation by airline to crew like raktima. Wishing the airline all the best.

title: Just about average
text:
While I normally wouldn't have landed in this situation, a new office admin who wasn't aware of my travel preference had me booked on a SpiceJet flight and that's how I got to experience this very average airline, which I previously never flew with.

The boarding process seemed a bit hassled but except for Jet Airways, I've had the same experience with most airlines on early morning flights, so I won't pull them up for it.
The seat was a tad bit uncomfortable and I really got the 'coach travel' feels from it.
The food was bad and didn't seem fresh in the least bit, forget about the taste being appealing.

On a positive note, the cabin crew was genuinely very helpful and my co-passenger who was feeling feverish was very well tended to.

title: SpiceJet....not really low cost
text: SpiceJet is not really a low cost airline. Most of the times the ticket fares are almost at par with the other airlines on the Mumbai-Mangalore sector....sometimes more too. You have to buy food in the aircraft....else go hungry! The food is very costly. Add this to the ticket fare and it totals to much more than the ticket fares of the other airlines. Overall experience not satisfactory. Would prefer paying a little more and travelling by some other airline.

title: Budget airline with deteriorating service.
text:
Spicejet is a good budget airlines but overall service is deteriorating.They try to push you for Spice Max & other premium services & try to sell unwanted premium services but act too tough on luggage weight & choice of seats.Crampy aircraft & staff unresponsive.Passengers need to keep reminding for a glass of water to be served.
Snacks are reasonably priced & good.Flights are poor in their timing.

title: Budgeted flight
text: Spicejet is very budgeted airlines and they always try to promote spending extra amount for minimum services. We three want to sit together but they suggested to pay extra amount for giving us the seat at same row.

title: Sticking to the time schedules, good service
text: The flight was full capacity with passengers. Included infants, kids, too. Still the in flight service was efficient and courteous.

title: Nice air hostesses !. But punctuality in flights missing overall !
text: The flight experience was good overall ! The hostesses were very friendly. Other than that it was a routine flight !. The punctuality is missing in SPICE JET flights and the gate changes some times irritates !

title: On time
text:
1. Seats are not comfortable.

2. Aircon was not working. There was minimal circulation.

3. Luggage was handeld in poor manner.

4. Airport checking was easy, less que on Tuesday on that compared to other days.

5. No delay in departure & Arrival.

title: Unhygienic smelling seats
text: My friends and relatives advised me against using this airline - and even asked me to cancel but being a non-refundable round ticket I had no choice.  Fortunately I had bought some extras like legroom, extra weight, food but I must say UNFORTUNATELY after travelling as the seats did not offer enough legroom, weight rates were high, food stale and smelly just as the unclean and smelling seats.  Wonder why DGCA allows such airlines to fly which are a health hazard for the passengers'health.

title: I really loved spice Jet because the landing and take off was very nice even unbelievable so I would love to have fly
text: the crew were very nice have the best behavior i love the food that they have provided it so i wish soon i will have other fly to India

title: it was average experience with spice jet always, we can say cheap flight only is the highlight to fly with spicejet
text: it was not so good experience, normal.Cheap flights is the only main point to choose spice jet, they even not serve any tea or coffee complimentary, food offered was dam expensive.

title: Average exp
text: Pune To Goa No service even  when I was traveling with Baby. Goa to Pune was Awesome - after noticing baby with me they asked me weather I want to change my seat as the new one will be more convenient for mother with Baby.

title: Courteous staff, on time service, no hassles in checking in
text: Easy check in, courteous staff, clean aircraft, on time performance, overall very good, extra legroom and free meal and beverage and priority boarding on paying just Rs.1000 extra.

title: Budget and Comfort
text: Mostly on time Departures and invariably before time arrivals make this my preferred Airline. When booked well in advance, the fare paid becomes value for money.

title: Average but worth for the price they charge
text: Clean and well maintained cabin. Not so much of noise. Overall the Flight experience was good and good for short distant travels. Leg room very short

title: Less Expensive but Below Average Quality
text: The take off and landing of the airline is very rough. I used to think that its because of runway, however, later after traveling by other airlines I came to know that its because of the pilot and the aircraft. Ground staff is also ok. I liked the service of other airlines. You should take this airline only if you are getting it at less cost.

title: FOOD
text:
It was a afternoon flight from Goa.
And we thought we will get hot snacks etc in flight.
to our dismay they had nothing in veg.
Airlines need to understand that passengers start from home/hotel to reach in time for the flight.
Hostess said they have nothing...only little for prebooked passengers.
Does it mean for others they dont carry

title: FAIR PRICE AIR LINE WITH FAIR SERVICE
text:
In aug 2015 i was travelling first time internationally from the same airlines from pune to dubai and duabi to pune and on my return journey i was served half eaten packed meal  ... i was shocked and raised it to the air attendants and they gave me a replacement with a casual attitude .Post i had landed i even did not bother to raise it up with the airline but later on when i started getting promotional mails ... i shared my experience with them ....But a standard revert was given to me from the airline 

Greetings from SpiceJet.
 
This is with the reference to the trailing email. We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you in this regard.
 
The management is really concerned to note your feedback. While the lack of service you experienced is unusual and not the standard of our airline.
 
In closing, thank you once again for taking the time to share your views and concerns with us. May we take this opportunity to thank you for choosing SpiceJet, and we sincerely look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you on board our flights very soon.
 
Should require any further clarification/assistance, please feel free to get in touch with us.

title: Return flight from DEL to Kolkata on SpiceJet
text:
I have written about my journey on the outbound leg from Kolkata. This is about the return leg two days after.  Once again, I had booked a seat paying a premium for Priority Checkin, Seats with Leg Space, and Meal.

This time around, inspite of charging a premium, I was allotted a seat on an aircraft, that did not have premium seats available i.e. the aircraft configuration was such that it did not have those class of seats.

The lady at the counter where I went to get a printout of my boarding pass said so. She wanted to know whether I would still like to fly. I had no other option as it was a Friday evening, wanted to get back home. The least that I expected was a slightly better service and/or a refund or a credit for the next flight. 
None of that was provided.  

So much for Customer Service !!

title: Delayed flights (both ways), no staff at the counter, no help for web-checkedin passengers
text: Pathetic experience. Flight delayed by 1.5 hours, yet there was no communication by Spicejet. In fact i received an sms stating flight is on time and i should reach 2 hours prior due to heavy rush at the gates. No staff was present at the boarding gate for any kind of help.

title: SpiceJet - Not value for Premium paid
text:
I had paid a premium for Seat (1F), Priority CheckIn and Meal. I felt that the value for money was grossly inadequate.
1. Row 1 was packed, and the person sitting beside me was a pain, and added to my miserable journey
2. SpiceJet seats are two narrow for comfortable sitting, and the bulk head space is not adequate enough.
3. Meal is served in packaging that is very unstable and difficult to handle, especially when you are menu includes sambar & dosa. It is extremely difficult to manage all of this in a narrow seat with a paper backed tray. 
I am not a fussy person when it comes to flying or any form of transportation. This was one flight where I had discomfort all the way.

title: No frills airline
text:
Seats are so close to gather that an average height thin person found it cramped ..Imagine the plight of a much taller bigger person.

The journey was much shorter than the reported duration of flying time. So that compensated for the inconvinience

title: Cheapest airfare but nice service
text: I booked for my vacation in Kerala & it was overall a nice experience. Tickets were cheap  but overall service was satisfactory

title: avoid flying spijet
text: on my recent flight from Delhi to silchar via Kolkata I had a terrible experience. The flight from Delhi reached Kolkata early in the morning. at 12.30 I was supposed to board the flight to Silchar. in the departure lounge they announced a delay of one hour. after an hour of waiting they cancelled the flight giving no reason. since  no other flights were available we were all stranded. The officials some dressed in casual attire misbehaved with us and when the passengers protested and refused to leave the security hold they arranged an extra flight the next days. I being a very frequent flier knowing norms services down by DGCA got my accommodation in a hotel not to my liking. I cancelled their tickets and claimed a full refund which was later credited to my account. I asked for compensation as per DGCA noms and they feigned ignorance. I later took up the matter with their nodal officer and they agreed to compensate me with an amount equivalent to my tickets price. my question remains as to why were the other passengers not accommodated? why only compensation to me? they take advantage of the passengers and only those that can show them what's legal and consumer courts they relent. would you like to travel in this airlines which charges a huge cancellation fee but does not provide anything in return unless you take legal course I leave it to your judgement. even their nodal officers no are not displayed in a prominent place as per DGCA NOMRMS.

title: A GOOD EXPERIENCE
text: A good experience,though it was 30 minutes delay on take of but the pilot managed to cover the time and landed on time.The staff was very courteous and the food on sale was hot and tasted good.Cleanliness was up to the mark.The only delay was the baggage coming to the conveyor belts which took more than 30 minutes plus which is not acceptable.

title: Good overall experience
text:
Dehradun to Delhi was a propeller aircraft & from DElhi to Mumbai was a Boeing.

Check in, take off, landing & baggage laim all went off smoothly.

title: Best Airline
text: Best airline in the  budget section. My flight was on time and I reached my destination on time . I recommend it.

title: Nice flight with cheap food
text: The flight was on time and people were also good but I chose meal because it was early morning flight. The meal was really bad and I had to leave my half meal untouched. There was no entertainment on the flight so that you can enjoy a movie while flying.

title: On time departure and arrival
text: Buy the ticket thro' their online site or via sites like MakeMyTrip. One of the best domestic airlines to travel by. Young air hostesses and very helpful.

title: It was fine
text: Flight was fine. On time and comfortable. It reached bangkok on time. Fare was also very reasonable. We booked it for 12K (to and fro)

title: Not a great experience
text:
Flight No. SG 635, Date: 28 Aug 2017
First of all, Airlines are supposed to maintain safety standards of both the plane and the passengers. Spicejet seems to be oblivious of this. The flight attendants were least bothered about this. Many passengers were not wearing their seat belts and were walking around while taxing and even close to takeoff and landing. 

Flight attendants were in their own world. One of the passengers (who was of a south indian origin) was wearing jasmine flowers. The flight crew were making fun of her in front of all (that lady was not able to understand as the crew was talking in Hindi).
This is unacceptable behavior. 

Second, most of seats were broken. I was not able to pull up the seats during take off, when i informed the crew about this, they laughed and said "no problem, you will not fall down". 

If this is the way, flight crew is supposed to behave, then i will be reluctant to fly with Spicejet again.

title: Budget airlines. Thats it
text:
I traveled on spicejet in one of those short term assignments. This is good for budget travels. Occasionally they run this tickets sale, which gets you great deals.
Dont expect a great in flight experience. It's what you pay for.

title: Spends few bucks extra and fly with better people
text: I will like to Spends few bucks extra and fly with better people. These pwople are unprofessional. They dont care about your comfort. Thwy want to mint money by screwing their own customers, while service is 3rd class. They started shouting anout last call, ever before the boarding time written on boardin g pass.

Good quality of services provided

legroom 7/10
services 8/10
staff 9/10

punctuality 9/10

title: Nice Flight with good food
text: I traveled on early morning flight to Chennai and check in experience was fine. The in flight experience was as usual, very tight seats with very little legroom

title: Average service but OK
text: It was fine travelling with Spicejet from Kabul to New  Dehli. the food was fine and service is not bad. I love how they treat customer for check in due to fast and efficient.

title: Very Bad Experience
text:
I had chosen Spice Jet to Fly from Dubai to New Delhi in August 2017
Once we boarded the flight, we found out that the air con is not working or there was minimal circulation of air in the flight, which was packed with passengers.
It was a dreaded situation considering the Dubai temperature in August.
There were young children who were crying and everyone on board was at unease and feeling suffocated.
The air hostesses were trying their best to make people understand - everything will be alright once the flight takes off, but it took almost 1 hour after we boarded the flight to take off
The plane itself seemed quite dirty and smelly
Worst experience

title: Gud
text: Everything was just wao. Comfortable seat, cleanliness everything was good. The check in was smooth, the boarding on time.

title: Worst Ever Experience with Spicejet. Please avoid SPICEJET
text:
Took Spicejet from Chennai to Chandigarh. had a terrible experience in terms of cleanliness, crew friendliness, luggage handling, etc
1. Torn hand rest leatherette which was hurting my arm throughout the flight
2. hand rest cushions were completely worn out 
3. used water bottle, cup, napkins from the previous passenger not cleared from the seat pouch. Not concerned about hygiene and sanitation
4. Drinking water was not up to the mark. Clearly it is not fresh not treated.
5. Crew took several minutes to attend passengers requests.
6. Luggage were handled in a poor manner. My nivea deo stick in the luggage broke and spoiled my entire clothing. I am sure the luggage were thrown, handled without any care.

title: Best in class airline
text:
it's one of the best economy airlines,I have been to every domestic flights in India but I must say it's best,they know how to manage customers and standard.
"Worst is Go air full of attitude"
I really recommend every to use it

title: Horrendous and Greedy
text:
It was my second ever flight with SpiceJet and I had a similar experience I had experienced before when I travelled from Nepal to New Delhi. 

Booking experience is good but they will bombard you with upgrade and food booking emails and SMS. Check-in desks at airport also try to lure you into buying SpiceMax upgrade which I don't think makes sense considering they operate Bombardier planes on most routes.

Talking of boarding experience, staff has no info on when the boarding would start and boarding never commence on time mentioned on the boarding pass.

Coming to the in-flight experience, the staff is always rude, arrogant and carry that horrendous look on their face. They carry a flat face throughout the journey and the only time you see them smile is when you are ready to make in-flight food purchase. This makes me feel that they are in for your money only.

Their fleet is mostly Bombardier planes on short routes or Boeing 737's, cracking sound from speakers during announcements, enough leg room though and no mood lightning is what you can expect inside the plane.

All in all I suggest booking Indigo if you want to go for low cost carrier with better experience. 

Only go for SpiceJet if the ticket cost is too cheap when compared to other airlines or there is no alternate flight available on your route.

title: Decent Flight
text: Not so good but not so bad as well. Airport checkin  was easy with normal and friendly staff. The flight was absolutely fine and all the cabin crew likewise. Restricted legroom, which is again normal for budget airlines. But service was good again.

title: Pathetic Airlines, Pathetic Support, Greedy, Rude Staff.
text:
We had a booking with them. To and Fro. The first leg was good and uneventful, however, the return from Kochi airport gave us a reality shock. So we were traveling with 2 cases, (2 passengers, 1 infant, fee paid). One case 26 KG, 2nd Case 13 KG. We went through with this luggage while going to kochi from delhi. While we were coming back, the luggage stats for the same were 27KG and 13 KG respectively, This Girl, Spicejet Ground Staff at Kochi Airport "Mariya" put us into the over weight luggage penalty zone. First, their staff calls us to buy spice max seats, meals, priority checkin, priority luggage etc. Once you do that, they will rip you off with such marketing gimmicks. We had a spice max ticket. This girl, Mariya, at the time of checkin, on being asked where is the queue to priority, sent us to normal checkin queue. While we were standing, we saw a couple of people moving to her at the counter she was sitting. I told her, we are a max customer with priority check in. She said, you are not. On checking our tickets, she saw we were Max customers. No Apologies, not even a single word. Rudely said, "I am staff here" I know who is a max customer or not. Pathetic attitude, arrogance. On revolting, she instead charged us for the extra luggage. Without any logic. So allowed luggage is 15 KG +7 kg per person. We had one suitcase with 27 KG and one case with 13 KG. We told her we do not want to checkin the small case and will take it in cabin since it was a cabin size bag. She point blank denied. Stating, you cannot take this to cabin. get two suitcases, divide 7 kg each and then take. What messed up logic is this? How can you accept a 27 KG bag of two people combined luggage and not cabin bag? Charged us for extra 4 kg's and rudely said, Do whatever you can do, I will see to it.
ON contacting spicejet support, they point blank declined and stated contact airport staff. Idiots don't know we have to board the plane. We cannot fight things out. There was no airport staff or manage to reach out to. No one is on time. On arrival at delhi, our priority tagged luggage came in the last when all people went off after collecting their's.

I will never fly spicejet again, even by mistake. Pathetic attitude. The staff knows, no one can do a damn thing  about them and they take everything for granted.

title: Good budget flight after Indigo
text: Good flight, service is good, in flight food options are almost at par with indigo airlines. my second choice after Jet and Indigo. But sometimes they have so many nice price deals so i end up booking with them. but on the whole a satisfying experience and no bad experience so far.

title: again same airline who is alredy late
text: after reaching too much late from ahmedabad to chennai 2 days back now time to go to bengalaru all v passengers boarded in flight in time till 15 minutes no announcement when v asked they announce no pilot he is coming from hyderabad .in morning 7 o clock first flight & what is working for surprise to us .any way in next 10 minutes he came & fly to us bengalaru. worst airline .mr ajay singh pl listen.

title: Value for Money
text:
I was travelling from Udaipur-Jaipur on a return trip, on both occasions it was the same Airlines, Spice Jet.
Journey completed in about 1hour on both sides of the trip,the cost of flight was cheap and service was good.In my view one aspect which needs improvement is the way the airline staff welcome you to or from the flight, the attitude should be more humanistic rather than proffessional. Comparing it with train trip would not be justified as normally trains take about 7-8 hours either way and cost of ticket varies from 550-1500 depending on options chosen for A/C travel.(CC,3rd A/C, 2nd A/C or 1st A/C.

title: Solves the purpose
text:
Good enough to solve the purpose. No more no less.
Have very limited food options on domestic flights, so be prepared for that. Congested like most domestic economy flights.

title: Nice seats with good legspace
text: It is definitely better than Indigo and GoAir in terms of seats and leg space. But they could do something about their menu as it is fairly limited.

title: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE-BEWARE
text: I tried to book a ticket on Spicejet's website. They took all information, processed my credit card, but then said the flight was no longer available. So I flew Indigo instead. HOWEVER Spicejet charged my credit card for the flight, and after many calls and emails, and a complaint number I have not gotten a refund. I have spent so much time and energy. My credit card would reverse the fee but I am not in the US to file the paperwork with my Visa card. Spicejet has no customer service!!!! If you want to pay them for NO TICKET, go ahead and use their faulty website. Otherwise go with Air India or Indigo where I have had no trouble.

title: HOW THEY OPERATE
text: i was flying to chennai in last weak as i took spice jet i was little afraid about punctuality .they prove me right that v never fly on time . i recd message in morning v will late by 1 hour when i arrived airport i knew it late by 90 minutes .it was my surprise reason of late is pilot is not available & he is coming from delhi . how they operate only ajay singh know.due to solid air trattif they r getting business else evry one is fad up with services of this airline. i can tell here god gives good wisdom to ajay sing so he can save this airline.

title: Mini Bus
text: The flight is so congested that we were unable to seated comfortably. The boot space is very less and the Mini bus is better than the Spice jet Airways.

title: Amazing
text: An Amazing experience while check-in on time.Spicejet is a very economical airline for domestic flyers. It serves a great food option.

title: Not So Spicy Journey
text: I had travelled with my grand mother and the flight was on time.First time punctual spice jet.The seats were OK and the journey was comfortable.

title: Safe and comfortable flying experience....
text: Spicejet is a very economical airline for domestic flyers. It serves a variety of food options. It was raining outside during landing at Guwahati with lot of thunderstorm. But with the experienced pilot we landed safely. It was a very relaxing journey.

title: Super!
text: On time and extra ordinary service with proper in flight announcement. We have to pay additional for food, but in the sky the cost for the food is fare. Overall compare to other airline the service was little bit up in a Boeing 737 - 800 aircraft.

title: spicy spicejet
text: food was amazing. cabin crew well behaved and helpful. cooling is great. timely operation. check in is convenient

title: VFM..DURING SALE.
text: seats dnt recline or are stuck....we travelled from bengaluru to mumbai  economy..may 2017...but the seats are stuck either they dnt recline or get stuck...these are simple maintenance issues which can be easily solved...i liked how they sent me atc congestion updates....very less legspace....purchased the tickets during sale so cant complain...

title: GOOD
text: SpiceJet is a nice airline. Boarding is fine, aircraft transfer, crew members all great. Good service even after the flight is done. I forgot my mobile phone at the airport and SpiceJet got it delivered to my on the next available flight. Comfort is good too. All in all a good airline

title: Small air flight
text: Flying from Mumbai to Goa for Business trip, in month of January, good in-air staff, polite & respectful.

title: Nice Mini flight
text: I found the mini flight to be more Spacious & Comfortable than jet airways, enjoyed the flying pretty much than too hyped Jet... good fa short flying hours... boarding was really easy & smooth with 2 seater plane its cool to look out & enjoy the travel...

title: Not bad for a local airline
text: For short flights this airline is similar to the likes of Asiaair so if you are ok with them then you will be fine with this airline. This is a no thrills airline but they are very nice in check-in and flight attendants. Even though are flight was a bit late they let us know what was going on without being rude. Clean flight.

title: SG 704 - Hyderabad to Mumbai
text:
It was 22nd July when we were travelling to Mumbai via Spicejet Flight SG470. Flight left hyderabad runway on time at 5:45 AM and was in Mumbai outskirts by 7 AM. It was running heavily that day. Amidst all this, Captain advised to put seat belts on as we were about to land. And then something happened which most of the passengers didn't witnessed since max were sleeping.

We were about to touch runway. Wheels were out however due to runway submerged with water, we just went like a V. Sharp uprise from the ground level, nothing like this we have witnessed in last 10 years of flight travels.

Kudos to captain who flew it in such a seamless way that none of us got panic'd

Special Thanks to captain.

i recommend all to use spicejet as their food are getting better and delicious. Most important hot.

Only thing is they need to reconsider their uniform. Red and Black not at all suiting.

Thanks
Gourab

title: Value for money
text: Travelled pune to dubai return , on spicejet , good value for money , only one thing that should be improved, after landing in pune , luggage service is very slow , it almost took 35 minutes for luggage to come on the belt , rest all ok as its tickets are very cheap

title: Excited
text: Excited on board while i enter into flight, good experience, while i travel all set normal without any delay, one of finest to all kinds of people by choosing this type of flight

title: good
text: i travelled in spice jet from hyderabad to new delhi in the afternoon flight and the service is good

title: Nose Wheel Change
text:
The worst part is when you are herded into a hot airplane and the pilot is missing for a long time. When the pilot arrives he finds something wrong with the nose wheel. It has to be changed. That is where the ordeal starts. Delay after delay till the 12.55 pm flight takes off at 3.45 pm. Of course they sped up and made the one hour thirty minutes flight in a little over an hour. 
Of course the pilot was thinking of safety but the planes are definitely ageing. The windows or portholes have glass which is weathered and like pockmarked skin.
No one can deny that a new fleet would change this airline into a great competitor. The fault lies here not in the stars, that is, the pilots and the crew but in the equipment. Airlines need new planes for better service and everyone's safety.
Sitting in a tight cramped place for three hours is miserable. I will not voluntarily fly in SpiceJet again.

title: Such a little leg space
text: The flight was delayed for almost 40 mins! Everyone was in hurry to just get it over. Staff was trying to cope up with the delay but they were not able to reach out to many passengers. Leg space was so less it was difficult to seat.

title: Pathetic!!
text: International travellers stay away from this airline...flight delayed...flight goes to a different terminal so you have to shuttle across...there is no baggage allowance for international connecting flights although their website alludes to free 15 kilo allowance....which obviously they did not agree to...not again!!!!

title: More than expected
text: It was the first time i was flying international in spice Jet though i have flown in domestic sector in India by spice. The first thing impressed me was while boarding was, that the Co-pilot was right behind me and he addressed me with a hello and smile which normally doesn't happen then onto the flight it was quite comfortable as i had taken the front row seat and made it more comfortable by the attitude of their hostesses Suhaira, Anjana and Oshin were more than friendly and helpful and also had quite good conversation with them as i had taken only one way they had also insisted i travel return only by spice which is a good feel though  unfortunately i could not but sure again i will definitely travel spice jet if this is the hospitality they offer. Food was also quite good. This truly was a good experience. It would be good if the could come up with web check in for their international flights for more convenience.

title: Good job
text: We were traveling from Bangkok to Kolkata. Our bag was not found when we reached Kolkata. We complained and our complaints were filed by people and said that your luggage will be found. Our flight was also from  Kolkata to Gorakhpur. He said we will get your luggage to try. We come to Gorakhpur, we got it.( It was a mistake in our luggage and in the same color as another passenger.) But I would like to thank all the teams of SpiceJet Good job üíÉ‚úàüöÄ

title: Nice
text: Nice airline. Waiting time is more but on that day some weather reason is there. Good staff with co-opartaive nature.

title: Not a comfortable journey
text:
Though SpiceJet claims to be people's airlines for last 12 years, my experience has not been soothing enough.

The flight got delayed unnecessarily because of lack of information on landing space. The seats were crampy.

Only positive is their service staff which is smiling and accomodating.

They might be making inroads into the market again but they have lot it catch up.

title: Nice flight, Ok food
text: It was a flight from kandla to Mumbai. Couldn't find option for Kandla in a list. The staff was good and helpful. The plane was tiny and bit old. Ordered a  sandwich and cold beverages. Sandwich was very cold and tasteless. Rest everything was great.

title: Good flight
text:
Flew from cochin to bangalore and was not disappointed and no complaints as such. Decent sized flight with good leg space. Nice staff and was not disappointed........

title: Worst Airlines with Worst Customer Service
text: Booked two tickets for my parents and intended to change the dates due to personal reason. I bought 2 tickets around 10k and when asked for change in dates they asked me for extra 12k. I am very pissed off what statistics the airlines is maintaining. And the customer service is very bad. Spoke with two agents and both of them are yelling. Agent Deepthi (Don't know if this is her real name) should better train how to speak to customers as you are making money on us and learn a better math for calculation. I am never again going to book with them.. and last yes they do have the cheaper price but not the correct strategy of pricing for running the business.

title: Economical Airline with a lot of food options
text: Spicejet is an economical airline for domestic flyers. It offers services like extra leg room upgradation for a charge of 1000/-  and you can prebook your meal. They have a variety of options in their meal menu and one can easily get the meal of his choice. One more thing i have noticed in this flight is that the air pressure in the cabin is less as compared to when i travelled in indigo flight and this is good as i did not feel much pain in my ears which was severe in case of indigo. The staff is humble and co operative. The seats are comfortable and leg room is also fine. The in flight cabin for hand baggage is also big.

title: Dour looking airhostesses and hard landing by Pilot
text: This is the first time I took a spicejet and this is what I noticed. The airhostesses looked dour and bored. Our plane landed hard on the runway with a loud bump. Somebody inform the Pilot he needs to work on his landing skills.

title: Good Meal Packages
text:
Even if it is late night or sunny afternoon their will be a variety of LUNCH/DINNER to choose. But the best part is that you get your meals served hot.
I would like to give an advice that if you want to make your trip more comfortable and happening you can go and book the Spicemax Seats they are generally more comfortable and have more legroom for an individual and plus you get meals as a BONUS..
ENJOY.

title: Rude staff, Pathetic Service
text: We had planned a trip to Bangkok which was ex-Chennai and we had connecting flights to Chennai. Despite of booking in 6 months advanced, the airline cancelled the flight last moment. To top it, they gave us a replacement through Kolkata with a time difference of 10 hours thus costing us ‚Çπ16,000 in other cancellations. The flight seats were torn and the aircraft was smelly. The staff is so rude they cant even greet properly let alone the services.

title: Rude and cunning staff
text: I booked return ticket from Delhi -Goa-Delhi. Staff of airlines is very rude.When i reached at Delhi airport they said you are late but still 30 min was there.Then i come to know they had already sold my ticket to some other passenger. and told me you are late. You cannot board the flight. Even the other passenger was checking in in front of me.

title: Hot Meals
text:
Not many options in the menu if you do not pre-book the meal.
The snacks are good but the meal is not very tasty. The desert along with the meal was not at all good. They should increase the options.

title: Trip to Mumbai
text: I booked meal during ticketing. Food served was hot and delicious. Seat space is cramped. They have more no. of rows to accommodate more passengers resulting in cramped leg space. Uncomfortable for tall persons. You may have to shell out money for good seats. Bad.

title: Experience of Spice Jet .
text: Over the years , especially after change of it's top management Spice Jet has improved it's customer service , however much more remains to be done . Customer service is a service which the customer retains the impression of the carrier , long after the date of travel .

title: One last fly
text: A flight always bragging about its punctuality lost all my respect today. Asked Murti (check in counter) for a front seat for my granny who is 70 years old. Couldn't do that much. Checked in 1.5 hours before time. He told me seats were full. When asked he told me seats are for sale. Customer convenience  is their last priority. Selling seats today, will soon sell their airlines if this continues.

title: fraud SpiceJet
text:
I know SpiceJet flights are comparotively cheaper, making them the first choice of the travelers..but i would i like to share my experience. First, I booked 3 tickets from Goa to Mumbai for approx 5,000 and it deducted 10,000 from my bank! When I called the customer care center, they just apologized and didn't refund anything. 
Other than that, when I finally boarded the plane, the plane's ACs were OFF. It was really suffocating..a person had an asthama attack due to it and no senior authority took the responsibility. So I would never recommend SpiceJet to anyone.

title: Don't ever Opt for Spice Max, it is false promises
text:
We were travelling to Varanasi from Mumbai and since web check in offers only limited seat options, I upgraded ourselves to Max with priority check-in.

Shocking experience started from the baggage drop counter it self, including standing in long queue, with staff not bothered, no extra benefits as promised. Extremely poor food and service for extra money paid.

Don't go for it, it's not worth it.

title: Lack of concern from airline and staff towards passengers.
text: The flight was delayed by 2 hours and I arrived 5 past 12 at night. Even during the flight when asked for a blanket wasn't given one. Even though the flight was delayed long past dinner time no snacks were served.

title: Before time to destination. Good service
text:
This is one of the best time flight to come back Ahmedabad. Zero problem and on time departure ensured before time arrival. 
Good on board service. Safe and comfortable landing. 
Noice of engine might disturb you.

title: Cost effective travel
text:
The flight was selected as it was the only proper flight offering the direct connection to Amritsar.
The ground staff was very helpful, flight is on time, on- air staff polite, you've the option to pre-book food. Since or flight got late due to some technical issue they gave us packed snacks on board FOC.

title: Good Service
text:
I have traveled from Ahmedabad to Delhi using SpiceJet Airlines. 
It was a good time travelling with them.

title: One of the best economical flight services in India
text: I was always willing to go a foreign country but didn't have enough money to book a flight. But I booked spicejet return ticket with the money I received from volunteer services. All thanks to spicejet economical pricing that helped me in making my dream come true.

title: decent flying experience , i changed my opinion about them
text:
i travelling through spice jet last week , after long time and i had my apprehensions about SJ because of past experience which was about couple of years back.

but this time it was totally different experience i flew from Kol to DEL and back within one week and it was nice change
positives

challenges

overall decent experience wont mind traveling with them next time

title: Great flight with good service
text: I was travelling from Tirupati to Pune Via Hydrabad, this was my first experience with Spice jet, The service was excellent and the hospitality by all the Spice members was good. The flight was on time.

title: nice flight
text: flight was good.. we were travelled in march,2017. good hospitality and staff were good.. they were very dedicated towards their work.

title: Low cost on time flights
text: Slice jet improved over time with lost of facilities at low cost. The best part of it is on time flights

title: great experience
text: spicejet provides great services.. even flight was on time. there hospitality was excellent. we liked there services.we traveled on 12th March,2017.

title: Good Flight
text: Flight was about half an hour late. However it did not matter since the flight was not boring. Food, that we had prebooked arrived shortly. It was delicious. The landing at ND airport was smooth as butter. A special thanks to Captain Sushmita, our flight commander for that.

title: Poor service. No professionalism in their work culture
text:
We were flying back to dubai on 30 june 2017. And as per our tickets flight schedule time was 7:45am but airline changed timing 4 times 7:45 to 09:05 then 10:10 then 11:40.
This is the Worst flying experience i had with Spicejet 
They changed Boarding Gate also without any announcement 7A-4-20B three times 
Finally when they started boarding air craft was not ready for boarding & to take off. They made all passengers to wait for take off.
After 1 hours delay flight took off at 12:50Pm

Bad thing is that they don't apologize for this delay & inconvenient. 
I will mark this Airline Company 2/10

And most careless thing about this airline they don't care about passenger baggage. Bad handling of baggage. They damaged my new trolley bag 
When i wanted to report any authorize person in dubai airport no body was there to listen us. 

I would suggest you all people not to  take this flight in future which is full with the risk n un comfort

title: Terrible
text: Spicejet living up to its expectation ... was late ... insted of 340 scheduled it to 440and finally took off at around 520.... no information from the crew ... crew unprofessional and not helpful .... no blankets available and it was chilling in the aircraft .... not recomended even if its cheep..

title: SpiceJet is a low-cost airline
text: SpiceJet has moved away from the typical low-cost carrier service model of economy class-only seating.The airline offers premium services under the name SpiceMax, whereby passengers can obtain additional benefits including pre-assigned seats with extra legroom; complimentary meals on board; priority check-in and boarding; and priority baggage handling; at a higher fare. Otherwise SpiceJet does not provide complimentary meals in any of its flights for it does have a buy-on board in-flight meal programme. SpiceJet does not operate any frequent-flyer programme and does not provide any in-flight entertainment options.

title: This is to highlight the tactful and wonderful Take-off and LANDING of the aircraft.
text:
I am a frequent flier between Bagdogra -Kolkata-Delhi. But  I face  while the plane starts descending an acute pain in my ears.On 20th June I was travelling by Spice jet.
 This time in spice-jet a special pilot  who took much care The landing was so smooth I didn't know when we came within a 1000 feet and ! I didn't feel anything at all! I thanked him while coming out of the plane thro the lady at the exit. Similar experience I had but with Spice-jet only !This travel was only on 20th June.

title: Not so great
text: Crew were not friendly, they behaved as if we were travelling at their mercy. There was absolutely no announcement from the Captain. Flight was neat and clean.

title: Curt yet courteous
text: Been travelling on an average once a month. Have travelled by the national Carrier and the private operators. Few of the trips have been by the Spice jet, the cost saving airline. Well as expected, not much is desired when you are paying nuts.  The experience was reasonably good, the crew and ground staff were curt yet courteous. So if you want a pleasant experience plan in advance and make sure you don't get into a situation where expectations are not met...

title: Well managed
text: We flew this after a holiday in Rishikesh heading back to Delhi. The flight was surprising not full and took off before its scheduled time, bringing us to our destination well in time. Spice is a no frills airline and the service was fine

title: Small aircraft well maintained.
text: Flight from Amritsar to New Delhi started a few minutes before departure time and landed well on time in Delhi. Had traveled in a small aircraft after a long time probably first time in India but flight was comfortable.

title: Peaceful journey, happy flying
text: Even though the takeoff was started 15 mins late but reached Pune on time. Excellent flying by a Lady pilot without any turbulence. Trusted airlines

title: My most favoured airlines
text: This airlines is really value for money. Courteous staff, good hospitality and well within schedule. Ground staff too very good in dress up, helping and guiding.

title: spice jet cancellation
text: I had booked my my onward and return journey tickets (SG 1027 & 708) during Apr 2017 for travel during Jun 2017 (from Mangalore to Hyderabad) to take advantage of pricing.  The Airline has unilaterally cancelled all the tickets and rescheduled the flights and forced me to revise my journey inline with the availability of their flights in line with my engagements at Hyderabad.  They have expressed their inability to accommodate me in other airlines and insisted that I have to purchase the air tickets of my own and they will only refund the full amount by cancelling the existing booking.   Obviously, I had to incur heavy amount for booking tickets afresh at short notice if I have to opt for alternative airline.  This has resulted in pre-poning of my flights (both onward and return) with Spicejet inorder to avoid payment of double amount to alternate airlines.  besides, I had to stay a day more than the original schedule and spend extra amount for hotel accommodation and elated expenses.

title: Cheap, in all areas
text: Pathetic service. Tried to cut the corners to become CHEAP. rarely uses the Aero-bridges, Food they serve in flight is obnoxiously high priced.

title: Seems service has become better - Spice Jet
text: Spice Jet has improved...service is better, better seats and landed before time..couldn't have asked for more.

title: Best option for Goa from Pune
text:
We usually drive to Goa as a family but I had to attend an alumni reunion and a couple of us from Pune decided to try flying. SpiceJet flies out at a very convenient time (mid-morning) with the return a little later in the afternoon. So it was just perfect for the long weekend.

Flight was on time. Service was as expected for a no-frills airline but SpiceJet does offer good meal options that you can book during the online booking process. Web check-in was also seamless. 

Best part was the actual flight that took just an hour, in fact slightly under. Return flight was delayed by a few hours because of airport congestion in Goa- can't fault the airline overmuch for that.

I like this flight because it works out perfectly for a long weekend.

title: A pleasing Journey
text: The flight to Kolkata was a first hand experience. I have never board a flight. So I was a bit anxious. But after entering the flight, my anxiety ended. All the staffs were courteous. They were helpful . And the flight was in time. The food was good. Nothing to complain about.

title: ultimate travel
text:
our first experience.it was awesome.We took flight to mumbai on april 4rth april 2017 and back to mangalore from mumbai on april 7th 2017.We had very nice experience while coming back.Air hostess were very kind.
I remember Renuka,Lavita,veena if i am not wrong.They were very nice.Very nice journey we had.Thanks to spice jet airlines.

title: Friendly and no fuss airline
text: 30 KG check in baggage is a big plus, flight was on time to take off and landing, friendly boarding process, very courteous and friendly cabin crew ( unlike the cold and unsmiling faces I see in certain other budget airlines), and in this experience, quite careful handling of my checked in baggage- my impression of SpiceJet has completely changed.

title: flight was on time and the service was good.
text: Impressed with the flight's on-time performance. Booked a celebration cake with spicejet and celebrated wife b'day at a height of 35000 ft is a different experience for my family. overall experience with spicejet was good.

title: On time and courteous attendants
text: Was good experience. Nice and courteous staff. On time service. Information about the flight provided was correct and helpful.

title: Spicejet - Mumbai to Vijayawada- Flight Change at Hyderabad
text:
Traveled from Mumbai to Vijayawada by Spicejet. Flight change was smooth at Hyderabad. Pleasant travel from HYD to Vijayawada.Flight duration was 40 minutes and arrived before time. 
Well maintained Q400 aircraft.

title: Average flight experience
text: This is probably the 20th time I have flown SpiceJet, and they have been consistently average every time. While there are no stand-out features to any of their flights across the routes in southern and northern India that I have flown, their staff is courteous, flights smooth, and no-frills at all. They have started self-check in kiosks in a few cities, which is great. While they do offer water for free (one has to ask), nothing else is free on short flights. The staff doesn't go out of their way to help passengers as far as I have seen, but as with the water, one probably has to ask for that too.

title: Ageing Fleet, Pathetic Cabin
text: One of the worst flying experiences in recent times. Boarded a SpiceJet flight from Delhi to Mumbai. As soon as one entered, you could feel that the airplane was a really old one. Things are almost falling apart. Seats? Well it felt as if was travelling on a small route train in an unreserved compartment, seats with negligible cushion. The legroom was nil. I am not a very tall man, but still I struggled. Seat back tray was not functional. I think the ground staff allowed everyone to take as much luggage in the cabin as they pleased. I did not get space to keep my only bag. Moreover the rest rooms were stinking like hell. I am not a very articulate person when it comes to writing, there is so much that I wanted to write. Although couple of members of the crew were friendly and courteous, but still the overall experience was poor. I will not recommend anyone to fly SpiceJet, atleast on the Delhi-Mumbai route.

title: right on time
text: on the way to goa the flight reached 10 mins earlier but on the way back the flight was delayed by 1 hour. but inspite of that the staff and the crew members handled the situation well and after take off covered 20 mins. the check in was extra smooth and the best part the baggage's were out in 5 mins. very courteous and well trained staff.

title: Not very exciting
text: A budget airlines which gives you value for money but other amenities leave room for improvement. Some attention needs to be paid for the delays and harassment thereafter.

title: My first worst experience
text:
This was my first flight with my wife and first flight with Spicejet. I didn't had much expectation from it as it was a direct flight to Kochi. I booked in advance( 40 days before). To and fro from Kochi were direct flights. 
But guess what-- they changed my flight from direct to connecting after 20 days without any good compensation and their reason was operational(Clap). They offered me only 7 days advance flight booking. How can someone change his all plan from Hotels to Office leaves in according to SpiceJet flight?
And my wife totally hates Take-offs and landings. Guess her condition- when you expected only one-take and one landing but instead you got two. That too within 3-4 hour interval. No ear buds or cotton balls were provided in flight.
Story didn't end here. There flights were late also. Instead of reaching Kochi around 12 pm we reached there around 3pm. I will be attaching picture of flight schedule to get you understand better. So our 3 hour flight became 9 hours of flight within India.

What amazed me that in morning flight we need only breakfast to cover the distance and time but when in connecting flight passenger will need lunch also. My question to spicejet is that- aren't you suppose to compensate me when I didn't choose connecting flight intentionally? Out of courtesy - at least - a meal?

title: we were kept in flight for almost 45 min unnecessarily
text: All the passengers had boarded flight on time but we were kept in flight for almost 45 minutes. The AC was also not powerful enough to keep us cool and all the passengers were fiddling with the ac buttons. we were really sweating out in the flight. One time the pilot inform us that the flight was delayed due to technical difficulties which they did not have control on it but the actual facts was that the tire of the flight was being changed which took us so long to take off and we had to take all the trouble. Infact they should have delayed our boarding which would have been better. As far as im concern i will avoid SPICEJET.

title: Flight is ok
text: Hi i have traveled with this flight many times but din't had good experience every flight which i took was with some complaints like recently i opt for max spice and paid for three seats but they cancelled it without any notice to me and due to plane change and when i boarded had several difficulties regarding my check in time .

title: Highly understanding service by Spicejet Airport Manager at Bagdogra
text:
I had to travel back from Gangtok to Delhi on 19th.  From 18th we have been receiving various calls about the burning situation, tourists not allowed to leave Sikkim to West Bengal (Bagdogra being the nearest airport). Our agency Alpfly refused to change the flight and left it to Spicejet to make any changes.  Call centre of Spicejet did not know the situation enroute from Gangtok to Bagdogra and asked us to get in touch with the agency who can only request to make changes. They even asked us, if others can come to airport, why not us.
On 19th morning at 7 a.m. we were asked to leave the resort immediately as there will be a convoy with police escort and we left. At the border of Sikkim there were agitations some stone throwing etc., and drivers of vehicles were scarred to go further.  About 2 hours of unrest, in the hot and humid climate.  It was almost 12.30. 
Then we again started contacting both Alpfly and Spicejet. No respite.
We started moving slowly and within half hour, we were stranded and stopped once again due to a truck burnt with the driver and ambulances and army convoys whizzing past.
It was then, we contacted the grievance cell and were provided airport manager's phone number. It was 13.30 then and our flight was to depart at 15.50. We were the physically and mentally harassed lot.
