But we found a great humane person in the Spicejet airport manager, who informed that it would take about 3 hours of run from the place where we were and assured to put us on flight leaving at 17.25 hours, provided we reach by 16.25, otherwise he informed that he could postpone our flight to next day.  It all cost money.  I pleaded with him that I am a heart patient and would like to get back and also additional cost is of consideration as it was no fault of us.
Some how we could reach the airport by 16.10, thanks to our excellent driver and met him.
Considering that I am a senior citizen and also harrassed lot, he took us to his cabin, gave water and tried to convey our condition to his head quarters to get permission to allow us to travel without paying any extra charge. He showed not only a perfect understanding of the situation but went out of the way in helping us to travel in comfort.  All processes were over and we could board the flight like any normal passenger. Seats with sufficient leg room was also provided.

I cannot forget this gentleman, for us, he was a godsent. He is Mr. Saurav Thapa. God bless him and the airline.

title: Awesome Small aircraft
text: The flight was one of a kind. A very small turbo aircraft. Amazing experience and service was decent.

title: Cheap fares..good experience
text:
The experience was good with spice jet, considering we had got the tickets for a reasonably cheap fare. We booked 1st row and so there was ample leg room.

From the check in counter to landing, to getting our baggage, it was a good experience.

title: Open letter to Kiran Koteshwar CFO of Spicejet Airlines
text:
Sir,

You have my name and you can check your database that I am a loyal customer of your Spicemax.

I boarded Goa to Pune on 31st May,flight - SG 517, Seat no. A1 and A.C. wasn't working. Crew kept promising that it will be on in few minutes which took almost 2 hours in boiling temperature.

Than promised that it will be on as soon as flight take off.

We all trusted your crew's words but it never worked and we landed at Pune all exhausted.

There were around 20 kids crying and few dozen senior citizons trying to survive and suffocating...... for the fresh air. Imagine 200 people sitting in a small room without any ventilation for almost 5 hours !!!

Be human....

Amit Adatia
9766332222
aafirst@gmail.com 

I have balls to write my name and number on public domain.

Prove that you too have ......

title: Very good flight
text:
It was a rainy day in Dehradun. Was definitely concerned about the ride being a bumpy one, but the pilot handled the Bombardier rather well. But for a occasional bump, the flight was surprisingly well handled. Made very good time & landed before schedule!!!
Kudos to the Captain, Ms. Simran!!!

title: The flight was on time and the attendants were courteous and efficient
text: I was impressed with the flight's on-time performance and the efficiency of the boarding and inflight experience, Just one blot o their service though - there is no option to do an online booking and reserve 2 seats together, without being asked for a fee! This is quite akin to blackmail!!

title: Flight Cancelled / Pathetic Service & Rude Staff Behavior
text:
a) Initially the flight scheduled to leave by 1400 hrs  was delayed to 1445hrs and thereafter got delayed to 1545, then 1845 and finally at 1900 hrs we were told that the flight got cancelled due to technical issues

b) We were then asked to either stay back or cancel the flight ticket however we opted to take the next flight as we were helpless as there was no other flight to Pune and the Spice Jet staffs were equally helpless with no clue what needs to be done and were not at all cooperative

c) We were then checked in to a hotel in Madgaon which was a very Lethargic hotel and we had no other option but to accept or leave it, while we had even asked for better hotel to stay in which was declined up front. The hotel staff were equally rude and we were being made to feel as if they were doing a favor on us. We were told that we had to have the Spice Jet Boufet food only which is being served with limited variety and anything over and above that would be charged. The food quality was Pathetic and I had to order separate food for my son and pay for it which is not at all justified.

d) There was no proper coordination between the staffs and no proper transport was provided to us - non AC cabs and an age old Bus to shuttle between hotel and airport. - we were hopelessly at the mercy of Spice Jet

e) As per DGCA guidelines I got my tickets refunded which was not the full amount paid. I also insisted that they pay for the food bill of Rs.2k as I was forced to have food in the airport lounge due to delayed / cancelled flights which again went deaf years. 

You can be assured Spice Jet would never ever listen to your woes as they consider their passengers to be treated the way they want.

Hopeless and Pathetic state of service - Please refrain from taking Spice Jet for any occasions as they are the most unreasonable and unscheduled flight

title: Crew need to be more sensitive towards co passengers of differently abled passenger/s
text:
In spite of the slight delay in takeoff, the flight landed before time. The food and services were also good. 

There was a differently abled passenger with his parents. He was shouting for something which is kept in the overhead cabin while landing. His parents were having a tough time to contain him and as it was landing the parents remained in the seat. Just after landing the parent got up to take something for the kid from and the crew asked him to be seated. Yes, she was doing her duty but there was a debate and an unpleasant moment created. It is not what she said but how she said provoked him.

Overall spicejet is a reliable airlines.

title: Murphy, s law & Tech fail
text: I would like to share with you a recent mess up where murphy's law played a major part aided by technology. Me & my wife were travelling and avoided a hard copy of the printed ticket, prior to the airport mailed my wife ticket to her to avoid waiting at the entrance, when we reached she showed and was let in , when my turn came my mail just vanished and could not be sighted, sought help from son at home he could not find my ticket, My wife entered but could not check in as she was with the trolley with luggage which would have been considered excess, the officer could not help as they were busy and thought its our problem and were left to fend, I went to the ticket counter and gave my name and mobile number but he could not trace on the proposed flight ,  took  a deep breath and thought over again as i still had my wits , trailed the sms message and lo behold finally could trace my booking number , and was told was a group booking to my surprise, a fellow passenger suggested it might be booked by a travel agent , anyway paid Rs 100 and got the ticket printed an was able to get quickly in line. Lesson please carry a print out of ticket with you it might save the horrors , many people may not have the same patience and yes couldnt some one on duty have helped us ...... some challenges while travelling ......

title: taking customer for a ride in guise of upgrading to SpiceMax
text: I was travelling from Srinagar to Bangalore via Delhi on 20.05.2017. I was given an offer to upgrade to SpiceMax for all four of us @ Rs. 1000 each, which means I had to pay Rs. 4,000 for 2 sectors. When I refused, I was offered 50% discount (note this point carefully) and I agreed for the same. Later on, I was told that it was only for Delhi Bangalore sector.  I asked them, in that case, where is 50% discount?  Still I agreed and paid Rs. 2,000/- for 4 of us to upgrade to SpiceMax from Delhi to Bangalore sector.  When I got the boarding passes, I noticed that they had quietly put free meal stickers only on 2 boarding passes and the remaining two boarding passes did not carry the sticker.  When I brought to their notice, I was told that was the offer.  I asked them to cancel the upgrade and asked for refund.  They cancelled the upgrade and told me that I would get back the amount in my credit card account within 5 days.  I fought with them for nearly one month and recently I received an email that money has been refunded to credit card account.  Whereas I am yet to received communication from credit card.  In case I don't get back my money, I will approach consumer forum.  Hence be careful with their offers and check, recheck, reconfirm anything with Spice Jet.

title: Very fussy ground staff
text:
When one books a budget airline, one expects a certain kind of treatment ... but this was worse. 
One can understand the weight limitations for check in and hand luggage but rude behaviour is certainly not acceptable in any service industry.
The check in staff was almost accusatory in their tone and treated customer with scant respect... NOT ON!

title: NO LEG SPACE
text:
The only good thing about this flight is you reach mangalore in an hour 

There is no leg space if you are tall you would find uncomfortable

title: Good Change in time management
text: Check in was smooth, boarding done well in time. Unfortunately there was delay in Bangalore due to traffic congestion @ 11:30pm! Web check-in is only 48 hours before and they sell all the premium(!) seats with as an add on. Didn't find it worth. However, if you want an isle seat beyond 20th raw, better you do online web check in.

title: Service not professional nieither in Airport nor in Aircraft
text:
The service quality at the boarding gate was very poor. It was raining heavily and the staff did not organised for Bus. They expected the passengers to run to the plane. the elderly could not, so by the time they boarded, the elderly were already almost wet. 

There was a competitor airline which offered umbrella. The service quality in flight was also along the same lines, they are so lethargic, that there were multiple flight attendants talking to a customer. Cardinal sin on time bound flights. The passengers who pre-booked their meal but were seated beyond the row 10 had a real struggle getting the meal in time. 

what you pre-book is not provided initially and only if you insist then only form somewhere it is magically pulled out and meanwhile the captain announces that its landing time. 

The attendants seem to be far behind in training and execution comparatively to their peers in other airlines.

title: late departure
text: flight departed 1 hour behind schedule. service was courteous and everything elas was nice. meal quality was excellent.

title: Super Experience
text: SpiceJet's expereice is super right from booking the flight online to check-in clearence when we reach. Ground & as well as in flight staff are very helpful and high standard, i liked it very much. We can pre-book our food & it is served first in very fresh & hot condition. Food is good.

title: I booked it because it was cheap.
text: I had a good time. But the landing was very rough due to the atmosphere. I would not say that it's not a good airline but I get irritated of the selling of food they do. It's like a  market and they don't let you rest.

title: Average flight
text:
We had booked our flight well in advance and reached well before time at check in counter. There was a Que at the counter and counter girl was extremely slow in checking in. She was taking her own time to check, at her leisure pace, the documents and tickets. Even the Que at next counter was moving at much faster (more then double) speed.
The in flight service was reasonably good.

title: Nice airline
text: I have booked flight from Bangkok to Mumbai, It has one stop in Koklata. In kolkata i have to clear immigration and i have to catch domestic flight. the connecting flight have very less time. But the ground staff have helped me lot. Even at the boarding they have provided me the front seats so i can out first from the flight,

title: Family Holiday
text:
We travelled both Delhi -Goa and Goa Delhi with family. The tea we ordered were very cold and the cups very small. To compensate the quantity the airhostess gave a cup of separate hot water !!!!!. There was so much confusion that those guests who pre booked meals also waited for long time before they get their meals.
The flight was also 35 mins late. Have to improve their efficiency.

title: For any servcie ticket price is not enough, PAY EXTRA
text: I am aware that rules of the country allow Airlines to charge extra for certain services. However that doesn't mean that the unpaid services are pathetic. First of all if you want to do a web check-in then every seat apart from the middle ones are Paid. The Aisle seats doesn't have space for even an average indian sit properly forget about the six footers like me. It was a complete pain to travel for those 100 minutes and not booking for sure.

title: Not Bad
text: SpiceJet is good, but could be better....It is getting expensive day by day and other airlines is using this opportunity....Previously it was the cheapest among all, but now its not....overall experience is always good....Nothing bad as such

title: Ontime Performance and Great Service makes it stand out from the crowd.
text: SpiceJet has come a long way from being just an ordinary Low cost airline a few years back, to being the best today.. In terms of Market share, it may be far behind the leader, but in terms of Service and Performance and Comfort, this is far ahead of the leader. Inflight food menu needs a re-look.. I wouldn't be surprised if this goes on to become a market leader in the years to come..

title: Amazing and easy experience
text: I loved everything about this airline, from the funny taglines to the really positive and helpful staff. the whole flight, was really enjoyable,on time and smooth  i just really liked the vibe of this whole company I would highly recommend

title: One of the finest airlines.
text:
Direct daily flight to Jaipur- Chandigarh- jaipur has recently started. This has reduced flying time a lot. Earlier option was via Delhi. 
Before time arrival and departure is the USP of SpiceJet. One change what I have observed is that onboard food quality has improved a lot. Though it's chargeable but worth it. Nice staff. 
Those who are planning to visit Chandigarh, Shimla etc this flight and SpiceJet adds sweet memories to it. 
Must tryüëç

title: spicejet flight from bagdogra to delhi
text: my wife and i had taken spicejet flight from siliguri to new delhi on 20th june 2017.. the flight was on time and it reached its destination before time.. the service of the air hostress was also very good..

title: Short domestic flight
text: Great service. Travel was on time. Baggage came out first as priority, which is what I paid for. Nice new planes and friendly staff. I will travel with them again. Flying is better than travelling all the way by road as the traffic can be very heavy so there would be no guarantee of arriving in time for Delhi connection. For westerners the road travel appears to be very dangerous. They pass on blind bends while honking their horn. I'd rather pay the extra and fly

title: Good services
text: Good services but narrow gap between seats. The service is good but has to pay for everything on board.

title: IXG to BLR
text:
*The only regional airline flight service from Belgaum - IXG currently. Neither choices, nor comparison to make, 

*Odd flight timings.

title: Landed before time
text: I have taken SpiceJet severally and so far have no complain about service or anything. I am yet to taste the food. Only issue I see is to change between the airports. IGI to Palam.

title: SPICE JET MY PREFERRED AIRLINES
text:
I have been a frequent flier, well fly weekly and my favorite Seat is 1D especially in the ER Type planes where the right side you have long leg space. I really need the leg space. I am a Spice club member but its not active according to the COLD Priority Counter personnel who tell you off that the spice club has ended, so Spice Maxx is your way. There is not announcement while the advertisement is still there right at the back of the counter.
The air hostess are ok lot most of them, they are very attentive and are pleasant most of them, except one or 2 that has serious attitude problem. The overhead cabin(for your cabin luggage) for has sticker posted for Spice maxx customers to place your bags, so they respect your money(Extra Rs1000 for MAxx) not like INDIGO, where you pay extra but the overhead cabin in not booked for your seat. You tend to lose it to people who climb in before you.
So SPICE wins there a lot because this is a major issue and it resolve a lot of unnecessary arguments!
Online booking is convenient for Spice with good choice for Vegan and non, I normally go for cup noodles. 
Beverages all airlines still have the same drinks for past 2 years.
There is Bovonto or Thumbs up, Dare I dream of "Root Beer".......
Price range is good for in flight services for Spice. 
Indigo comes in 2nd. For Punctuality Spice has been consistent in ETD and ETA.
While Indigo lags behind. I rarely take Jet Airways because its costlier and none of the special choices of Spice or Indigo at affordable range.
So book earlier on SPICE you get better seats and rates.
All Captains mumble crap over the horn......might as well play music like SPICE does.

title: Spicejet is always comfortable in price and service
text: I had flight from Dehradun to Ahmedabad in May. I had a hold of 6 hours at Delhi Airport. My experience of travelling with Spicejet is always good. Their staff and crew members are very supportive. Also Spicejet has very delicious foods.

title: Why do we have this airline and I wonder how/ why it is surviving so long?
text: You are charged from seat selection to everything and more... be prepared to shell out surprise charges on baggage, food - terribly smelly and dirty seats.

title: Lot of money but pathetic food
text:
I traveled from bangalore to delhi on SG 158 good air hostress helpful cute smile queens I think it was Neha, amanda, mehak. Main issues are Air control and food. Charges r so high but food is much gutter, pathetic even Air Histress agreed. Not even worth of 220 rupees.

Not advise with food on flight.

title: On tine take off and landing
text: budget airline offering good value - on time take off and landing despite heavy Eid traffic. Recommendation for those who need more space book Spice Max

title: good
text: they have improved a few things felt good about that ,overall good, timing was perfect, i would love to travel again.

title: not good
text:
my experience has been very bad with spice jet airline or may be this was the only aircraft.
i was going from del-bom. the aircraft was stinking .proper cleaning was not done and food was as bad as the seats.

title: KHATEE MEETHI AIRLINE
text: Spicejet Airlines Some Time On Time, But Some Time Delay Delay & Then Flight Cancelled, Several Times They Have Cancelled Their Flights

title: Highly improved Services
text: Very highly improvement is visible in each and everything they do, I had lot of bad experiences on my past fly's. In terms of timing and price they are so good.

title: Good Low Cost option to fly
text: I was flying to Bangalore on 23rd Jun'17 by Spicejet . The aircraft was a  Boeing 737 800 series. The departure time was at 17.10 hours. The boarding was smooth. I did web checking which is most convenient way. I selected seat no 7C, which was an aisle seat. The interior of the aircraft was Red which is the signature colour of the airline. Cabin was clean and comfy. There was good food option that can be bought in the flight, however, I was not hungry. The stewardess were smart , polite and helpful, though as a seasoned traveller I hardly need any help. Flight took off late at 5.40 pm due to late arrival of incoming aircraft , now a standard excuse of delays and arrived in Bengaluru at 8 pm. I did not have any checked in luggage so can not comment on baggage handling service. Overall experience good barring delay.

title: Spicejet... Poorest Airline Ever
text:
Travelled to Bangkok by Spicejet... The biggest mistake of my life as a traveller perhaps... Horrible experience. 

Flight delayed by more than 3 hours without any explanation . 
Gate changed by more than 3 times .
Poor leg space. 
No entertainment system in flight. 
At almost same cost, better facilities in Thai Airways.
Air conditioning not so comfortable. 
Stinking flight before take off. 
No air freshener. 
No intimation about delay. 
Seats highly uncomfortable as per standards of international flight. 
Never ever suggested to take such a flight. 
Mere wastage of money and time. 

These are my personal views as per my own experience. 

Thanks for not travelling with Spicejet!!!!

title: Worst airline
text: Worst airline but very cheap the pilot did not drive it properly and the landing was terrible and food was good but you have to pay for food

title: Service was good
text: The flight was good but the seats were not much comfortable but price is less . one unique thing was the flight didnt have spicejet written on it

title: Worst Service Experience
text: Not so good experience with SpiceJet. Many times I have purchased tickets on last minutes by paying more money. But I am not satisfied with the services. The flight is always late. Sometimes more than 30 minutes. Check-in Baggage problem - poorly handled baggage and nobody seems care of it.

title: Kolkata to Bangkok, 1-way red eye flight
text:
This is a true red eye flight. Takes off a bit before 1am (Kolkata) and lands around 4:30am (Bangkok, 1:30 ahead of all of India). So realistically the flight is only 2 hours ---- you may, like the reviewer, truly have slept through the whole airborne experience only to wake up to the bump of the wheels rolling the runway upon landing. 

Not much to recall about the in-flight experience. As for the check-in and deplane processes, those were fairly smooth. Getting baggage after landing fine too. You could complain a little about both airports (e.g. Kolkata is a little short of dining & beverage choices after 10pm; Bangkok-Suvarnabhumi immigration lines are little slow at 5am --- coiled line-up ran for over 30 minutes) but these things aren't exactly within the airline's control.

The high rating had much more to do with the flight prices and route offerings.
Not all low-cost carriers in India offer international flights. (Many of the international routes are more like for expat workers going west from India to the Gulf. There are fewer routes going east of India.) And for a cross-border flight which would cut out one's overnight hotel stay (short red-eye flights, which then require your attention to pass immigration and baggage and locate transportation into the city, are not for the faint-of-heart), the price was rather competitive. At about 5120 INR for the 1-way, it's more attractive than flying with legacy carriers whose 1-way offerings will usually charge you for the economy flexible rates. As remarked above, the red-eye timing here by Spicejet is fairly economical too -- if you can find the stamina to smile to immigration after 2 hours of sleep plus 30 minutes of waiting in a coiled lane, then afterwards waiting and taking the train into the city. (Food you don't have to worry about. Bangkok-Suvarnabhumi has 24 hours convenience stores, and if you can stave off hunger until you are in downtown Bangkok then you're in street food paradise.)

title: It is good for first time air trevelers
text: It is decent budget airline, good for first time air traveler but you cant expect luxury features of full service airlines.

title: decent flight
text: SpiceJet had a good flight, for my mother's first time travel via airplane. It was managed all well. There was no delay - if there was any, they arranged for dinner as flight timings were such.

title: worst flight of my life - utterly horrific
text: It has taken me some time to get over this flight! The flight from Goa was delayed with no explanation, however I soon discovered that the original aircraft had been replaced which a much smaller, tired looking craft. There were 2 air stewards on board apparently, however aside from take-off and off-boarding they were not present at all. We had atrocious turbulence throughout the journey which felt like the pilot had temporarily lost control. passengers were screaming and I was amongst the very distressed. There were no voice overs from the staff or pilot to explain what was going on, no explanation on landing either. When we landed, I was visibly shaken together with a number of other passengers. We explained to the air steward when we were getting off the plane what a terrifying flight it was and he rudely dismissed our feedback saying "well we got here so what?" - appalling journey - enough to put one off flying ever again. For a domestic flight in India it was cheap, but I would almost certainly only fly with Air India in the future.

title: Bad Service... Pathetic Flight
text:
We were going in a holiday to goa and unfortunately booked Spicejet from delhi to goa, flight SG171. The flight was ready to take off but unfortunately there wasn't any aircon available. The pilot makes an announcement that the air conditioning will be on when the flight will take off. On the runway due to congestion we had to wait for more than 30 minutes. Small kids and their mothers were going and requesting the staff that we are feeling suffocating and please do something but the crew members weren't hearing. People became really angry and said we will not let the flight take off if aircon isn't put on. On a holiday would you want to listen to such chaotic things. If these cheap airlines can't manage then they should stop the service. Atleast don't harass people. 

Our misery didn't end, we had to flew back from Goa to Delhi iin SG 172 on 14th June, today. We had paid for our meals and had priority booking too. Our seats were 1, 2D . When the air hostess approached us, my daughter asked for coke, she said that we won't be able to serve as all beverages are over, only hot tea is there. I said we paid and the thing is you justed started to serve then how come nothing is there, to which she replied that we don't get refill in Goa, we get stock only once when we take off from Delhi. How cheap can it get and how can airlines behave like this. 

Noone should board SPICEJET ever ... If I had negative rating , I would give then lesser than zero for sure.

title: Good Airline
text: This is also cheap cost airline in india. Legroom space is more compare to other cheap cost airline. Over all its good.

title: Value for money
text:
Gets you to the destination in the cheapest way possible. A no frills airline with good service. Even in times of crisis they managed to put together everything. Kudos to the team. 
Suggestions: kindly add more destination and more connection

title: Decent  Airline
text: Staff at the check in counter at Jaipur  was very efficient and supportive. But boarding process from Gate 1 C was a bit slow. Flight was very comfortable .

title: Worst Airline
text:
SpiceJET is worst airline.  We were denied boarding at Hyderabad (Telangana, India) airport because we came at late.  We reached check-in counter at 2.10pm for a 3pm departure time.  Check-in rules say 45min before departure time.  We were before 50min and we were still denied boarding.

At SpiceJET check-in counter, it is not important when you reach the counter but it is when the agent finishes chatting on phone.  If you have to be lucky otherwise you will have to buy another ticket for another flight.  This is what they call great experience at SpiceJET check-in process.

We decided to fly(Hyderabad-Vizag < 60min flying time) due to old people back pain issues and ticketing staff do not care !!. Their motive is to sell another ticket at the expense of needy and handicapped customers.  Shame on your SpiceJET

WORST AIRLINE CUSTOMER SERVICE and OUR LAST FLIGHT ON SPICEJET

title: "Value of time"
text: I was traveling the first time with the spicejet on 7/06/2017 which was the bad experience when flight got delayed by 12hrs 45mins. But it's value me on 10/06/2017 which was the best experience,excellent services, most importantly "speed"when even reached Dubai before the time. Excited for the next trip. Well done team!!!

title: Decent low Frills airline with good food options
text:
I would rate all three airlines equally good- Indigo, Goair and spicejet. You can choose any as there is hardly any difference. 

Tip : Their food options are definitely better than all other domestic carriers. So do try out their menu ( Select meal options while booking if you really want to be sure about it's availability)

title: VERY SUPPORTIVE
text: Wonderful assistance by the crew and staff and we reached in time to the destination without delay and the crew was very supportive with the passangers and they are very helpful towards the fisrt time travelling passangers.

title: 0 star staffs
text: We have no other option for domestic flight to tutucorin so we got to opt for spice jet. The staff here are very rude and inhumane .My wife along with one year old infant we're travelling and she asked if there was separate counter to one of the staffs , she replied having baby gives you no special permission you got to stay in the queue like others . Like the way she replied was totally rude and they were least bit helpful .. it's not like we want to take advantage it's just that the situation was tough and we required a bit of support .. low cost airline doesn't mean you can treat us the way you want . We are there because we have only SpiceJet as the only option .

title: Typical low cost airline
text: It is a typical low cost airline in India. But they try to provide the best within their limitations. Choice of food and beverages, generally, go for a sixer and hence little can be expected in that direction. The staff are well groomed and helpful. Good low cost option in India

title: A short and smooth flight
text: I bought Spicemax and it was a good buy for Rs.600/per person. The Spicejet staff helped with the initial Baggage scanning and they were extremely courteous.. In flight Service has scope for improvement as attendants were not rude but did not exude politeness. Leg Room was ample for Spicemax seats and the best part of it is that our luggage arrived first which is a novelty. Thank you Spicejet and Spicemax

title: Quite effective
text: FLIGHT @ 10.20 was on time. Service was good. Ground staff and boarding/checkin process was good. Leg room not great. Choice of food on board adequate.

title: SpiceJet at its best
text: SpiceJet is a very good airline. It's a economy airline that fits your pocket well. The staff is amazing and take good care of you. The best thing they did is they celebrated my daughter's‚Äã birthday on board. Thank you SpiceJet staff. Love to fly with you.

title: Good
text: Good services in very reasonable prices. Easy to book tickets from website and mobile app. Fly with time. Good hospitality and services. One of the Good airlines in India. I recommend to fly with SpiceJet.

title: Leg Room
text: While time of boarding they have taken 2k extra from me & told that i will get special Leg Room which will be more comfortable & they have given me two window seats.But after paying 2k i didn't got any Leg room & all seats were the same also for the window seat they have charged me extra.

title: Worst Air Line Company.
text: Worst Air Line Company. They delayed My flight from KOCHI To Hyderabad on 31st may 2017 for more than 5 hrs. the actual time for departure is 3:30 Pm and the flight departed at 8:00 Pm. they didn't provide any type of facilities to their customers. When i ask to their customer care, then they said that the only way is to refund my booking amount. I have to present in an business meeting in Hyderabad at 7:30, so i book that flight for 5019 Rupees. Due to their mistake, i lost my meeting and clients. i ever felt a worst and irresponsible experience from any other airline company. So Be Careful and Brave before booking Spice jet.

title: Journey by Spice Jet
text: A trip was for Andaman and our journey was started from Calcutta airport. Availed Spice Jet. Schedule departure was 12.10 pm, but flight departed at 3.13 pm from Calcutta airport. The flight landed in Port Blair airport at 5.11 pm. Due to late arrival by three hours, we did not move any where on that day and we missed our first day schedule  which was listed in our package  that made us disappointed.

title: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE
text: Hated the experience. The flight was delayed as the AC was not working. The food was ice cold and that too I had to pay for it. The crew were good though. Hated the airline as it was stinking. I became sick in the airline which is very rare as I am a frequent flier and I am never sick in air. NOT WORTH IT

title: Not so smooth
text: The flight was good. The only issue we had was that our baggage was damaged during the transit. But the ground staff handled the situation well. They paid us compensation money without any arguments and polite manner. Thanks for your service

title: Worst experience....
text:
The flight was at 6.45 pm, it was informed through sms one day prior that due to terminal congestion at Ahmedabad kindly report to check in 180 mins. After reaching at airport the sms came 4 pm that your flight is delayed due to operational reasons and will now depart at 8.05 pm and after waiting for so long, again it was screened that the flight will be depart at 8.50 pm... Refreshments where offered as gesture but hope better service would have been offered...
It was really worst experience and waste of time......

title: A nice budget airline
text:
Right from ticketing till landing the flight experience was  pleasent. The queue for senior citizens is a big boon. The hostesses were polite and helpful and tried their best to meet sitting requirements to accommodate four of us near to each other.In flight service was efficient. How ever a suggestion the menu should be tailor made to the time of flight proper breakfast at the breakfast time, proper lunch at the lunch time and so on.A person to catch the 7.20 flight has to reach airport has to reportat 5.20 am which means he has to leave home at around 4 am if it is a three hours flight he won't land before  10 am  therefore he has to miss the breakfast. May be a good idea to introduce meals on order and those not opting for it can be served snacks as now
Cheers for good service

title: Lovely staff, Patriotic airline
text:
The chatty pilot on Spice Jet kept our spirits high on the 5 hour flight to Guwahati with a stopover at Delhi.

It was Republic day and when the aircraft landed at Delhi and also at Guwahati, they played the National Anthem.

Besides the Republic Day celebrations were reflected in the paper cups with which the air hostess served water.

title: Average Flying experience
text: Travelled from BLR to DEL, Seats are very small, seat covers are not good. Crew service is good. delayed 30 minutes

title: Most Apathetic, Indifferent and Inhospitable Ground Staff
text:
I have had the most disturbing and distressing experience with SpiceJet's ground staff at Rajiv Gandhi Hyderabad Airport while trying to board the flight SG 1215 from Hyderabad to Pune. Their apathetic, indifferent, inhospitable and totally non-cooperative attitude caused me and my colleague to actually miss the flight! In particular, a Mr Raghavender was very high handed and non-cooperative, ignoring our plight, and instead walking away while talking on his phone. 
All in all, the staff displayed a complete indifference and almost perverse pleasure in our plight of missing the flight. 
There was a serious apathy towards us and they did not make even the slightest effort to resolve our problem. 
Strangely, even the CISF jawans (bless them!) admonished the airline staff for causing us to miss our flight and told them that it was 'just not right'.
I have flown innumerable times, but this was really a first for me.

title: Excellent staff
text: I traveled on May 11th and did enjoy my flight. Only thing I didn't like was that it didn't take off on time. There was a delay of at least 30 minutes... not sure if the delay was due to spicejet or other factors. Very professional and courteous hostesses.

title: cramped seats
text: very little leg room and very small seats compared to the other low cost carriers.the aircraft was jerking almost through out the journey

title: Cheap fares
text: Will recommend to fly as it's offering cheap fares. Worth for the fares.  Food also not too bad for the price I paid. Services limited to few airport destinations. Apart from that it's good for middle class people to travel. Good so far.

title: Jumping Jack and Jills !
text: A short late night flight, but what a flurry of activity. The departure Gate changed, there were no announcements, everyone struggled to get their cabin baggage in place, some 'hid' theirs under their seats despite orders to the contrary. The flight took off late, but much to the glee of the pilot, he announced - 'We have once again landed before time' ! Little did he know that the bone tired hostesses were jumping and running in the aisle all the time to complete their chores ! Poor things kept slipping and skidding ... meeting the demands of their job. Wonder if they are human !

title: Flight
text: It was our First experience on this flight. The food was good enough, but there needs to be more variety on Non-veg food items. The flight attendants need to be a little more professional in their approach. Other than that it was a pleasant experience

title: The landing & takeoff was bad
text:
I had a bad experience with the flight landing especially in both way while on Spice flight. The plane levelling during landing approach was horrible and many in our cabin really thought the pilot would crash the plane. This was on 19th May from PB to Chennai. I am an experienced flyer and this possibly was the worst landing.

They dont have a good specific lounge or area or even a courteous staff. For everything there is $$$ involved. I understand nothing is free & being a no-frill, this is how it is but at the end of the day for everything there is money and allowing elderly, woman with kids for quick checkin etc is all missing

title: experience
text:
I am  frequent traveller of Spicejet 
earlier until I had a very bad experience 7 years back, 
when I lost my baggage worth Rs 70,000/-. You had sent me a cheque of Rs.1200/- which I had not  deposited. After which I stopped travelling by Spicejet.

Now when I had again begun to travel with Spicejet regularly, comes another jolt.
Day before yesterday I flew from Hyderabad to Vizag hassle free by Indigo with two hand luggages (without any check-in baggage).  Today when I took the Spicejet flight to Hyderabad from Visakhapatnam with the same baggage, while issuing a boarding pass Ms. Manasa said my hand baggage was in excess of 2kgs.
When I explained to her that I had travelled with the same luggage without any issue earlier, she called one Mr. Akhil. 

Mr. Akhil wanted to know what was in the bag, I showed him my camera and Mac Book. He was fine with it.
But after an hour later while boarding into the aircraft, Ms.Manasa stopped me and asked me to pay Rs. 1200/- for excess baggage. I was kept aside away from the queue and subjected to great embarrassment before rest of the passengers. Mr.Akhil too came there and demanded in a more harsh manner. 

This is not a matter of money, but the way your people behaved with a guest. If they had to collect the money, they should have done it while issuing the boarding pass.
So again I am forced to take a decision not to fly by Spicejet any more.

I hope you people change you attitude and become Guest-friendly 

Regards
VV Ramana

title: Best in odd destination
text: its low-cost airline and fly from many odd destinations were limited direct flight to Mumbai with very reasonable pice

title: Horrible SpiceJet
text: Their buses are broken, they forced us to walk on the runway without escort, they force people to pay for legitimate baggage after changing the dimensions on their own. The plane was stinking with urine smell and the staff faced the other way when we complained. Passengers cannot shout because now the staff can throw you out on minimal charges.

title: India's worst airline
text:
They simply want to make money. Forget courtesy, the staff is ill-mannered and has been trained to harass and extort money from hapless passenger, forcing them to fork-out money.
 
While all airlines in the world allow specific dimension of luggage as hand carry, we were forced to convert it to check-up luggage just so that SpiceJet could make INR 400 extra üòÇüòÇüòÇ lol. 
The staff looks like beggars staring at people for food, in our case they were looking beggingly at our luggage and just in case they can make a few pennies extra.
All we  could do is to throw the shortchange at the ragged beggars.
Nice going SpiceJet, you are truly the beggars of the Indian skies.

title: Good experience for a budget airline
text: Got an excellent deal while booking this ticket, I was not sure how reliable their service would be since I had to catch an international connection. Based on the research I did they seem to be a reliable airline. The flight was on time, check in was easy. They kept on sending me reminders to be at the airport at least 2 hours before departure, not sure if they would have done anything differently if I got there only an hour before. They didn't let me do web checkin since I had bought the ticket using an international credit card. I bought the fare with baggage check in option, the price difference was only minimal. This helped to make sure that my cabin baggage would be of the right size and weight, not that they checked either while checking in but budget airlines tend to be strict about it.

title: Pathetic experience. Never again
text: I had the worst 1st experience with spice jet, pathetic to say the least. To start with there was a long queue at check-in.We arrived 3 hours prior to our flight. I had to wait for 1.5 hours in the queue with my parents. My father is 64 years old. The girl at the counter from India don't remember her name was very rude and other girl who was from other country was still courteous.  We had 4 seats reserved in one row and when we entered our flight the people sitting and the back of our seat was already there and to my surprise they had kept the luggage above my seats as well. We had two hand luggage - one of them was an electronic item, called the flight attendent Mr. Sanjay told him that this area belongs to us and we have to keep our luggage to my surprise he told me sorry they already occupied it and I can't tell them to keep it any where else plus the attitude he was speaking with my mom was pathetic and rude.We had 4 seats reserved and the luggage area above our seats should be given to us it's also mentioned on one the luggage shelf the seat number. So the end of the story is Mr. Sanjay kept one of our luggage 15-20 seats ahead of us and other one which was a PS4. I had to carry it on my lap for 4 hours night journey from  Dubai to delhi. It moreover looked like a general bus in India rather than a plane. Also when i received one of my checked baggage it had a dent and it was brand new safari bag.

title: What a change!
text:
I had boarded Spicejet in many occasions and in different sectors. But the recent change in attitude in the business model of the airlines is definitely driving them to a positive direction.
This is a low cost carrier but offers a reasonable seat comfort with moderate leg space at the price. 
More interesting was their punctuality. I was landed nearly 30 minute before time! 
In flight cabin crew were well groomed.
Food (to purchase at extra cost) is filling and a number of varieties are offered to the pre-booked customers.

title: The airline which has taken me ONTIME mostly
text: Very Punctual Courteos Staff You pay extra for what you eat ie expensive but good Nothing more to write about

title: Stinking smell inside the aircraft
text: SpiceJet is a nice airlines. I recently travelled to Bangkok. Flight was on-time. In-flight service is good. Cabin crews were perfect and efficient on duty. One thing I would like to say that there was stinking smell all around the cabin right from the time we boarded. It was horrible at the time of off-boarding. Surprisingly cabin crews didn't pay attention to it. My suggestion is, they should spray freshener time to time to keep the cabin pleasant.

title: Ontime Everytime
text: Spicejet is Ontime everytime and best airline for domestic travel and strongly recommonded for those who cares the time most.

title: Overall a good experience
text: This was my first time experience with Spice Jet and I will rate it as very good. The staff is courteous and service is good. Legroom is bit of a issue with Spice Jet but then I was offered seats with better legroom with compliments. The flight was on schedule and overall i enjoyed travelling with Spice Jet.

title: Good to travel with but less in number
text: Good looking Air Hostess and fare in service. However there are many chargeable items and sometime confusing. please get yourself clarified, Ask for water but air hostess forgot ! anyway it happens at times and i have not insisted.

title: CCU - MAA by Spicejet leased carrier Corendon Airlines 737-800
text:
Initially I was amazed. Spacious legroom... Flight Attendants and pilots are non indians.  Cabin crew didn't care to assist passengers to keep bags in the overhead compartments. Their are also not humble, smiling and polite at some guests.
Ultimate thing was.... No AC, just warm breeze from vents. Some people approached cabin staffs. But reply was just 'OK'. I thought that I have to tolerate for two hours and write complaint at MAA (coz I cannot jump after the flight has moved from the gate). Then our goodness!!, AC was ON after take-off.

+ve's: Super spacious legroom, Cabin crew appreances.

-ve's: No AC until take-off, cabin crew performance.

Will recommend Spicejet to someone? 
I don't recommend normally in this regards. just go for value for money airlines or take the cheapest flight.

title: A Disgruntled Customer
text:
To whom it may concern,

I'm writing to you as a customer of your airline on numerous occasions, I was greatly offended and insulted by a staff member and so called leader of a spice jet team, Sangeeta was her name as I was checking in on my flight between Jammu and Srinagar. 

She was extremely rude, unhelpful and a terrible representative of your normally trusted company.

Sangeeta continued to be courteous and kept me waiting at your desk for an hour and a half, and was unwilling to provide customer service on any level.

If you honestly value customers and customer service I urge you to at least speak to your employee about her behavior.

I hope next time I fly with spice jet to experience the same level of quality I had enjoyed in the past apart from the last time I flew in the above mentioned situation.

Emraan Ellahie

title: Spicejet cares
text:
As soon as we settle down in the aircraft the air hostess brings water for all passengers.  This was a  pleasant surprise. Spicejet Cares for its passengers.

When I have requested for water in the other airlines which are not low cost, I am told we will be given water shortly.  Just before the aircraft is about to take off the air hostess runs to my seat to hand me over a bottle of water previously in other airlines.  This airline was nice to serve water to everyone before taking off.   You truly impress your passengers.

Another surprise came in. The Pilot announced that the temperature being kept in the aircraft is at 26 degrees.  He further announces if any passenger feels that they need to increase or decrease the temperature should just inform the crew. Never earlier have I heard this on any flight. This shows you care for us.

The air hostesses on the flights are smart and humble.  I must congratulate the training team at the airline for making this difference.

I would love to travel again by Spicejet because I had a wonderful experience and thought of sharing with you all.

title: Nice
text: The staff were kind and helpful.Some of the seats were not maintained so well.The food options were only snacks such as chips and cup noodles which were food enough for a small flight.I really liked the music  they played at the start of the flight.There was nothing for entertainment during the flight so it was a bit boring.This airline is good for domestic flights but not for international flights.

title: Childish Staff and terrible experience
text:
We have traveled in April'17 from Chandigarh- Delhi- Mumbai.
The flight from Chandigarh to Delhi was delayed by 1.5 Hrs. 
when asked about connected flight from Delhi, a lady on the check-in counter told that it will be waiting for us till we reach. But another fellow told after sometime that there would be some alternate arrangement through other airlines and we could not go together as family due to lack of availability of seats.

Finally they managed to accommodate us in both flights but the experience was disturbing.
Also, the cabin staff was behaving childish that I could not explain in words.
Seat was also not comfortable.

Overall it was terrible experience.

title: OK good
text: Good flight journey but they could provide good snacks other than sandwich, popcorns and cup noodles.  This is a 2 hr journey and the time is actually mid-day and with these mini snacks one cannot complete their lunch.

title: A lot left to desire!
text: Announcements were very very unclear & could not be made out at all. While going to board the aircraft,we had to wait a long time in the bus,before we were allowed to board. On landing in Chennai, had to wait on the tarmac for a bus to take us to the terminal. Looks like there was only 1 bus to ferry passengers to the terminal! Not done at all.

title: Great service
text: Great service by Spicejet. Reached Goa before time. Keep it up. Please start the in flight entertainment system soon

title: Just OK
text:
We traveled from Kochi to Chennai last Sunday. We reached the airport by 3:00 p.m for the 6:00 p.m flight. I had booked on hand baggage only fares. I completed the web check in the previous day itself and went to the check in counter just to collect the boarding passes. But the guy at the check in counter wanted to weigh all the bags(5 of them as we were a total of 5 including children), even though I told him the collective weight was well within the baggage limit.On weighing, we found that the bags weighed approx. 9.x/10.x/2.x/3.x/4.x kgs. He told us to rearrange the bags to less than or equal to 7kgs. Anyways, did all the reshuffling and came back to recheck the weight of the bags (7.x/8.x) only two bags were rechecked for weight). This was totally unwanted as I was traveling with kids and elderly person (Mom).
The flight took off 10 minutes late (6:10 p.m instead of 6:00 p.m) but reached Chennai on time. The aircraft was ok (Bombardier Q400) and the flight was uneventful

title: Fast & cheap local travel
text:
We have used spice jet flight for srinanagar to Jammu and return journey during 22nd April.the flight was on time. we got a return flight at less than 5k for 3 people- cheaper than taxi fare.
The travel time is 40-50 mins.The inly problem is srinanagar to Jammu airways don't allow cabin baggage. We were being allowed 7kg person luguage inspite of hand bag tickets.
Good source to travel between the 2 City

title: Absolute torment
text:
The good things:
* They did not loose my baggage
* Did not cancel, in-spite of 2hr 45mins of delay

The bad things:
* Smelly flight, the inside of the flight smelled rotten
* The delay, flight STA 22:25 IST, ATA 00:40 IST
* Even the airline staff at gate had no clue when the flight will leave!!

title: Smelly and poorly maintained Bombardier Q400
text:
First the good things:
* On time departure from Hyderabad
* Ahead of time arrival at Chennai.
* Price of the lower side
* Baggage arrive reasonably fast

Not so good Things:
* Staff in aircraft mentioned wrong baggage belt#
* No too many in flight food options
* The air inside the aircraft smelled like a rotten the whole while it was in flight from Hyderabad to Chennai
* The in-flight crew's morale seemed low.

title: Bad customer service and zero consciousness towards passenger safety
text: Ground staff at the boarding gate in Delhi lacked basic CS skills and a robot could have done a better job.  No announcements during in flight turbulence and AC failure.  Bags arrival at MAA took ages.  The cabin crew or captain did not bother keeping us informed of what's happening even during worst turbulence and AC failure.  When asked,  cabin crew had the audacity to say this was normal in any flight!! Pathetic experience overall abd I'll surely try abd not fly this airline any more.

title: Unexpected but very good experience
text: I was late for flight and i purchased ticket from Airport and rep gave me ticket and add extra meal into it and gave me first seat in front row. I was overwhelmed. Crew was nice and food was nice. Overall experience was very good.

title: Its ok
text: Summer timetable of this flight(SG15/16) is excellent. very convenient to fly to dxb to amd or vice versa. all other flights are late nights. Leg room is not the best but its ok for short duration of 2 to 2.5hrs journey.

title: Great
text:
Great flight with this airline.
Loved that the plane had propellers.
Small plane but only flying for about an hour so it was fine.

title: Nice internal flight
text:
Difficult to book online however persevere.  Decent Indian internal flight, not up to European  standards.  Staff good however flight busy.  I got to the airport early and the desk was not staffed, I asked someone in the company uniform and he gat me some incorrect advice, this could have been a language issue.
Once the desk opened I had to tell someone to get in the queue as he was attempting to push in.  Once at the desk, staff where great.  I would recommend this airline.

title: Fly Smart
text:
SpiceJet is the only LCC option in Mumbai Mangalore sector.(Indigo is launching BOM-IXE service effective 1st May) Fares are almost comparatively same with that of Jet airways. since 90 days advance fare comes around 2.4k, in past I have chosen this airline multiple times.
I purchased additional service spicemax through spicejet app it costs around Rs. 799. through their website they charge 1000 Rs.

I found this add on very beneficial, this product is similar to business class product of other FSC's, except lounge. What I enjoyed from spicemax is  Priority Check in, boarding extra legroom seat and complimentary meal. hot meal served on board was delicious. but they disappointed me on baggage delivery, although my bag was tagged with priority unfortunately it was the last one to arrive in conveyor belt.

Overall in flight experience was good.

title: Good service, but aging aircrafts
text: Great on-ground service and helpful personnel. In general decent schedules and pricing. However, aircrafts are ageing and worse compared to other domestic carriers. Also, their customer centre was very annoying in calling up multiple times to sign you up for the SpiceMax service.

title: Convenient
text: It is a direct flight and at convenient time. Turbo aircraft so do mind the hand baggage size. Staff was efficient and overall a good experience

title: in-flight experience was not good
text: in-flight experience was not good because I was made to change my seat against my wish. This resulted in me getting my "per-booked" meal when the aircraft was approaching landing & I had to gobble my meal. A bad experience... overall.

title: nice flight
text: comfortable flight, nice in-flight service, good meal. On-time dep & arrival. Overall a pleasant experience.

title: on-time take-off
text: Flight started on time. Courteous ground crew & in-flight crew. Delicious meal was served. Overall .. a nice flight.

title: nice service
text:
it was my third booking with spice jet, its so glad to write the every time i reach to my destination before the landing time.this airlines offers various meal but some meal need to book before the take off of the flight. cabin staff were so ( i could not remember 
 all name only shivani i remembered) friendly & courteous to the passengers.
thanks spice jet for a safe and caring flight.

title: average airline
text:
Average flight, started 40 min. AFTER time i.e. flight was late by 40 min. Courteous ground crew and nice in-flight crew.
Kindly adhere to the timing ... team SpiceJet !!!

title: Great 1st timer flying with SpceJet
text: Fast check-in process, good flight attendance and smooth flight take-off and touch down. It was a nice flying with SpiceJet.

title: budget travel...
text: booked the ticket just a few days before the travel to delhi...it costed around 7k...eateries inside the flight are costly...and just had a sandwich alone... 1 small 200ml water bottle was given as complimentary...smooth travel... timely travel...

title: Budget Travel
text: Good flight services but they need to replace the Airline carrier as they are age old and needs a lot of maintenance

title: Quick Flight
text:
Flight was delayed a bit. Explanation for delay (cascading delays at other airports) were not really a good reason. However, we did get enough SMSes about the delay well in advance and it helped us in our planning. Surprisingly, the flight was reasonably full for this vague city. Later, I was surprised to learn that SpiceJet operates two flights to TCR from Chennai daily. Little taken aback by this passenger traffic. It was a no-frills flight, but we hd pre booked our sandwiches - which by the way - were really good. I relished my Chicken Sandwiches really a lot. Wish they had served Tea / Coffee, but they did not. 

Flight made good time. Overall, was quite satisfied. Great one hour alternative to 14 hours in train. Thumbs Up!!

title: On time, cheap and confirtable
text: Good experience with spicejet. Got cheap tickets, flight was on time. I made a mistake in the name while booking but got corrected without any trouble with the help of customer care.

title: Paid for premium seating and still got my hand carry luggage taken away!!!
text: OMG!!!  NO AC on the flight - Bad smells coming from the bathroom (gagging in my seat much of the flight) - Many passengers not even offered water - No bathroom in the back of the plane, only the front. This meant my paid for premium front row seating SuCKED!!! - Stopped in Jaipur to unload and load additional passengers.  Sat on the tarmac sweating like crazy as it was near 46 degrees celsius, plane shut off and no AC.  Very miserable flight!!!  Also witnessed at least 4 other carryon bags that were larger than mine being allowed on board while mine had been taken away.  Really upsetting!!  Made for a stressful situation in Delhi trying to catch my next flight which was departing shortly after our late arrival and even later luggage arrival.  NOT FLYING WITH THIS AIRLINE AGAIN!!!

title: You guys really needs to work on customer experience
text:
As a 1st time #FlySpiceJet traveler writing about my experience with Delhi-Guwahati flight recently..

From Delhi -

#you changed gate number then what was printed on boarding pass
#your flight was not on time.. kept flyers guessing
#your ground staff just keeping gossiping amongst themselves with no update or info
#no priority queue for family with small kids or elder folks, just everyone kept in one single LONG line..this is not done
#you keep folks in bus waiting in mid of strip. make them wait inside airport then their hands tied to bus ceiling handlers.

From Guwahati - 

#flight was supposed to fly from gate on 1st floor. Boarding time was 3:20. At around 3:20 when anxiously with no info we asked few people one of your ground staff told that gate has changed to one on 1st floor. THERE WAS NO WIDER INFO Available on this..100s of folks just kept shocking...
#your flight never flies on time. supposed to fly at 3:50..was around 30 mts delayed. you claim 85% on-time. If this means 15% was one of our flights i agree with data else you know this is ll marketing gimmicks.. 
#again no priority queue..just everyone gets in one long zig-zag queue..
One thing which was good is in-air staff behavior towards customers..
I thought IndiGo was worse after my last year experience but seems you guys score worse then them now..

You guys seriously need to enhance your #customerexperience from ground till landing..

title: Not so good !!
text: We took this this flight because the timings suited us. While landing at Chandigarh twice the pilots aborted the landing in spite of being close to runway which was scary. After landing when I asked a crew she said it was due to visibility. It sounded little odd because it was mid February and outside temperature was 22* and weather was perfect clear which we could see from our plane window. The legroom is much better in Indigo than Spice.

title: GOOD STAFF
text: Pleasant and memorable trip excellent on board staff and service to passengers was excellent  money worth flying

title: An airline much obsessed with paid marketing features
text:
Boarding was in time and smooth. I found reading light and air flow controller above my seat was not functioning. This indicates lack in details of maintenance. Flight took off as per schedule and food & beverage service started. As per airlines practice, food was being served to passengers who pre-booked their meals. Air hostess were in no hurry. After considerable time, I requested for a cup of coffee. I was replied that service is being done one by one and pre-booked meals will be served first. Food & beverage service was bound up swiftly after that none of passengers got hint of that. Later I requested for cup of coffee again. I received a reply that only 35 minutes left in decend to Delhi so coffee can not be served.
So, I felt like pre-booking a very essential in case you are travelling with Spicejet.

title: Getting Back on Tracks Again
text: I traveled on 15th March from Delhi to Mumbai . As for as Planes of Spicejet are concerned they are new & neat & clean . Crew services getting better when compared with Indigo. However Whether we do web check in or at Airport ,they never offer front seats free of costs .On Average it was nice to travel in Spicejet

title: Good
text: Overall experiece with this airline was good including Check Inn, cleanliness, staff behaviour, etc.

title: Cabin Crews are very rude
text:
Dear All,

      I have traveled few international Airline British, Luftanza and Air France, KLM  and also domestic airline like jet airways.   But in Spicejet crews are very rude with passenger and never smile and response properly.  We have asked for a glass of water for my son,  the crew (lady) was looking at me like is going to beat.  I recommend to airline for sending these kind of people for training in BA, Luftanza, AF.  For these people and Indian Airlines no difference. This is second time happened with me.  This time traveled on 11th April 2017

title: Trip on 23-Dec-16
text: Traveled on 23-Dec-16 & the flight was scheduled at 13:05 hours. Everything was good in flight except leg space. I experienced discomfort. Although I have not booked Spice max seats, but at least sufficient leg space should be available for all the seats.  Spice jet needs to look into this segment. Staffs are very helpful.

title: Punctual. No stress
text: Was impressed with the efficiency and punctuality of Spicejet. I had seen some mixed reviews and had really low expectations. While legroom was not great (as can be expected on these short hops), everything else worked like clockwork.

title: Professional airlines!
text: Actually I had 4 flights with them and I was surprised, they were on time, hassle free, affordable, crew friendly and welcoming. No nightmare as I though it would be. Planes new and buy on board program, don`t expect the frills, at least they deliver what they promise.

title: Good one
text: I have get flight from Ahmedabad to Coimbatore.I have fly lot of time in spice jet.This time getting boarding pass makes delay in counter.they send message 180 minutes before come and get boarding pass.when I came airport counter  they open after 4am.Remain services is satisfied.counters only making delay to me.

title: Good travel
text: We went to Pune from Chennai through SpiceJet flight...Timing was 5 a.m.The flight arrived by time...Seats were good... Service was also good...Rates were reasonable when compared to some other flights...They allowed 15 KGS of checked-in luggage...Overall we had good experience....

title: Awesome turnaround
text:
Its quite amazing to see the turnaround achieved by the airlines new management within these two years. 
Our flight was on time and the best part is that they have tied up with ‚ÄúChaayos‚Äù and do serve Masala tea on flights.

title: SPICEJET- An airline tailored to your specific needs
text:
The Spicejet packet is tailored to your specific needs, and so are the bold on services you can purchase. Like I did, a hot meal served piping hot to me after 23.00 hours in mid air, with a drink, and an insurance package.

The staff where great, when we arrived here- but still had a smile on their face.

Well done guys.

title: Timely performance
text: This is  good flight for pune to dubai taking  three hrs journey.you can catch at 8 pm from pune and reached 10 pm dubai,

title: "ZERO - BUDGET" airlines.
text:
I came to Dubai on Sunday, 2nd April 2017, night 11.30 flight. SG13.

1. Checking & boarding went smooth.
2. All economy flight, so no warm welcome neither while boarding nor alighting (its a budget airlines). It looked that crew members were forced to stay on board.
3. Pre-start safety instruction, looked funny. Crew were not interested, they assumed that everybody knows.
4. Water was served in the cups, which had no shapes. I took an extra cup to hold it. Spicejet saves on cups (budget airlines).
5. It was quite cool temperature inside the flight and I was almost shivering, others may be. I requested for a blanket. My request was ignored. I was told that blanket is not provided in this flight. I had to stand near the tail to get some warmth. The crew asked to the captain if she can provide me the blanket. Later they reduced the temp. But blanket was NOT provided till we landed (budget airlines). 
6. No toiletries, even a basic soap was provided inside the toilets (budget airlines).
7. Inflight entertainment? what is that? (again budget airlines).
8. In short, it was an ordinary a/c. bus, flying in the air.
9. Seats were ok ok, the leg of my previous seat was broken.

For food, no comments, I did not eat.

Humbly speaking, I have been travelling to various parts of globe since years, even with budget airlines, believe me, never ever had such experience.

Now I realize my mistake, I have not taken any photo or recorded the talk. 

I would never recommend anyone, unless there is no other option.

title: Average
text: The staff on the flight were lovely. Leg room is really restricted. We were lucky as without asking we got moved to the section with extra leg room but if that had not happened it would have been an uncomfortable flight. Can not fault the staff they were excellent.

title: Cheap and Cheap
text: For people concern with  budget, spicejet is an low cost option for them. It was my first flight and I had a higher expectation (thanks to movies). But truly speaking, the sits were dirty and the air-hostess were not that beautiful as I imagined.

title: Gautam Khawani
text: Wowww..what a turn around..very very impressed..they are the best in the Indian flying industry now..will surely travel with them as a first option. Too many things are right..service approach all superb. They getting the know how of the flying industry

title: SpiceMax a Scam
text:
I booked a Spicejet flight (Delhi-Bagdogra) recently and received a call from Spicejet‚Äôs Sales person to upgrade to a SpiceMax seat. I was told that by doing so I will get, apart from other things, Unlimited Meals and Beverages on board, and there will be an Onground Staff at Bagdogra who will keep our luggage with him and we will just have to get in touch with him to collect our luggage at Bagdogra.

However, we didn't get Unlimited Meals and Beverage and even our previously pre-booked meals were denied to us, stating that we are now entitled to 'complimentary meals'. Also, there were no options available on board. Even the meal choices which were supposed to be on the particular date were not available on board. For one of the choices we were even told that it has just finished, even though we were sitting on the 3rd row and only 1 person ordered the particular option before us. When we tried to order a Beverage (after meals were over) we were told that we will have to pay for the same. Even the air hostess was very rude when we tried to ascertain the things and told her what the sales staff told us during the upgradation. .

Upon reaching Bagdogra, we were shocked to see that there was no Onground staff to assist us with luggage. We had to negotiate the crowd and pick up our luggage from the belt ourselves.

All in all, it seems that Spicejet fools people by promising something else and not delivering the same and get away with it because what can a passenger do once he is onboard.

Very disappointed.

title: S means Spicejet with services
text: In Spicejet, S means services and literally they are provides on demand in flight after comeback. Even they have launched many services like Spiceclub etc.

title: Again same problem flight was delayed. but much better then before service.
text: This time again i had a horrendous experience with spicejet airlines with my flight being delayed for 4 hours which led to a meeting cancelation and a total ruckus of plans. The flight SG-827. The ground staff was not at all helpful when asked about the status of the flight. always late. I received flight schedule change every other hour. and after so much of turbulence unfortunately flight reached by 8:00 P.m at Hyderabad which was supposed to reached by 4:00 p.m. i would like to say u that u should only improve ur flight schedule on time. and if any by chance your flight schedule changes. so in that case if anyone have a connected flight from others  places u should arrange something for your passenger. because in that case somebody loss flight also and time and loosing amount of money also. and one good things happen this time that i got a complementary veg meal ü•ò i don't know why it's was given to me. but after so much of thinking about i remember that i completed about food,flight for both and about cabin crew attitude so maybe as an service recovery they provide me a meal. i really appreciate for your kindness and thanku so much for your great service this time. and i would like to take name of duty manger ms puspha who take care of entire passenger at the time of deadly flight. she offered a meal for each and everyone at the airport. I believe next time flight schedule on time and will be leave happily.

title: Freshlook
text:
I am a frequent flier with other Premiere Airlines but the first time I travelled in Bombardier and it was with Spice Jet. It was a wonderful experience.

Earlier Spice Jet flights were delayed or cancelled but now they are on time and no more cancellations. They have changed the attire of cabin crew and it is really different. Good turnaround.

title: Mid range Airlines
text: I travelled twice with this airlines and both times  food was not served with this airline. Even the water was given in small disposable glasses. Not feeling like travelling in some airlines, Rajdhani Train gives more benefit that this flight. Best if you get very good deals or at cheap rates.

title: Very bad condition of cabin
text:
Initially,  when I went to the check in counter,  the representative was very slow. I had to ask her to speed up because she was busy speaking to her colleague. 
That was not the end. The moment we entered the aircraft,  the condition of the upholstery was pathetic.  The seat covers were almost ripped and the cushion too uncomfortable to sit.
I am a frequent flyer but this was the worst experience I had with Spicejet. Since then, I promised myself that I will not fly with Spicejet

title: Awful service  - do not use, book with Indigo instead! REALLY AWFUL SERVICE.  You will be delayed or cancelled
text:
Booked a return flight from Chennai to Kochi, on the return leg we were notified that our flight was delayed by 5 hours.  Called customer service and was told that we could be put on an additional earlier flight instead.  Arrived at the airport for said flight and was told it had now been cancelled.  Asked when the next flight was leaving and the manager on site, Vishnu P (he refused to provide me with his full surname) said he had no idea.  He gave us the following options: 

Wait for another flight - even though they had no idea when it would leave and if it would even be a feasible option.  We noticed on the board all flights for spice jet were cancelled. 

Book with Indigo and pay the full fare (this was based on a full refund of the spicejet flight)

As we needed to return to Chennai that evening we had to go and book the indigo flight.  Once we booked our flight with Indigo, Spice jet staff then told us they would only refund the return leg and not the whole journey.  The original spice jet return cost 8,424.00 INR the new Indigo flight (one way) cost 8,344.00.  Therefore we had to pay an extra 4,400 INR.

Argued with them at the airport and they would not do anything further for us, told us to email customer relations to complain. 

Emailed them yesterday, responded today saying that they would not offer us the difference back in the fare - even though they had cancelled the flights.  Offered us credit on the airline that we can use - only valid for 6 months.  Told them that I do not live in India neither do I plan to travel to India in 6 months.  Said 'sorry' then cut the phone.  Worst budget airline EVER.   DO NOT BOOK WITH THEM.

title: worst.
text: is never on time. was late by more than 2 hrs. cramped seats. complete no-no for people above average height.

title: Loved the meal, Loved the couteousy
text: You will love the courtesy they show while you start boarding. Hassle free process at ground. Delicious meal is being served in the air also. smooth take off and smooth landing, it shows how much experienced pilots they have.

title: Worst flight ever
text:
I frequently travel into different airlines across the globe and spicejet is the worst among them. 

I generally do not post my feedback but I had terrible experience with spicejet, I went on honey-moon on 20th Feb 2017. My flight was from Ahmedabad to Chennai and then connecting to port-blair after 2 hours of halt. On 16th Feb evening, I got message from spice jet that my connecting flight from Chennai is delayed and now it will be departing at 4:30 PM (I was suppose to reach port-blair at 1:30 PM) and now my halt at Chennai became 7 hours. When I asked customer care what option I do have, they simply dropped my call, I called again with angry tone and then they gave me two option either cancelled ticket and refund or wait at the Chennai airport! Both are worth less.

When I asked them to transfer to their supervisor, they just give me one email id custrelations@spicejet.com and told to drop mail and they will return within 24 hour and I did! My marriage was on 18th Morning and I was dropping mail to them on 16th. C'mon guys if customer is asking for help, at least reply within your ETA.

By my all surprise, they replied my email on 20th Feb (after my flight reached to port-blair and perhaps preparing for return trip) with one line explanation that passengers are already been departure in to flight. 

I would like to thank spicejet for wasting my one day itinerary of my trip and making me realize that this is worst airline in India!

My personal suggestion is to travel in any other flight/train or bus rather than Spice Jet!

title: nice airline but horrible website
text: quite comfortable craft and seating compared to its contemporary ones. but its websites sucks ur time as i always face problems in signing in and its app is not better than website.

title: No process to ensure canceled ticket amount is credited to customer
text: The flight from Indore to Delhi and back was cancelled by Spice jet . they did not bothered even to start the process of refund of ticket fare . Even after repeated reminders , it took 6 months to get the refund . It is harassing the customer for no fault of his . Airline itself cancelled the flight on last minute . did not bothered to help book another flight and even payment  release took 6 months . pathetic

title: Discourteous Staff at jabalpur
text:
Prashant and Aditya are two counter clerks at Jabalpur who have no idea what good customer service is. They are rude and discourteous. 

I am visiting from the US on a tour of India. Do not fly Spicejet because they charge exorbitant fees for excess baggage. Any thing over 15kgs is excess despite international standards being 70 pounds.

Fly GOAir and Vistara because they do not charge these fees.

Additionally, the say they serve hot meals on advance request...Not true on Jabalpur flight.

Stay away from Spicejet. I will never fly them again.

title: New Delhi to Bangalore@Spicejet
text:
Great improvement in services by Spicejet over the last one year. More punctual now. Flight attendants are more attentive of late. However overall the airline needs to train its staff particularly in the business sectors like Delhi-Bombay or Delhi-Bangalore.
Great choice in terms of fares and safe bet to do Point A to B travel

title: Before time departure and arrival but no announcement of gate change
text:
Yesterday I flew the last flight out of Ahmedabad at 10.30 pm. Though thankfully my impression of the airline has improved now with the improved efficiency level. It took off and landed before time.

Gate number 1 on the first floor was printed on the boarding pass and the airport monitors displayed "Now Boarding" Gate 6, on the ground floor with no announcement. It was slightly chaotic because of different floors.

title: Flew from Mumbai to Kochi Monday March 20
text:
Be very careful of this airline. They do not deliver what you think they promise.
We were asked if we wanted to upgrade our seating, they declined. They then promised a two for one upgrade, which we accepted which included premium seating and a meal.(breakfast). We were given only one meal when we thought we had paid for two. Even after showing the lead flight attendant the receipt, they refused us one of the meals. 
The food was extremely poor anyway.
Do not fall into their trap

title: Before time but poor airline experience
text:
This was a morning flight. So I had booked my breakfast in the airline itself.I had also ordered a beverage.Though the breakfast was served timely,the staff forgot about serving me the beverage and gave it to me ten minutes before landing.Further the cabin was full of all sorts of pungent smells midway in the flight.If it wouldn't have been a budget airline and not reached its destination before time,I would have given one star.
Try spicejet if there is a discount or no other option is left.
