title: Average experience
text: I have travelled by SpiceJet flight SG488 from Kolkata to Mumbai on a Saturday in February.I had only hand baggage and collecting boarding pass from SpiceJet counter was done smoothly. Boarding was on time. The experience went downhill from here. I had not prebooked any food and wanted to buy breakfast or atleast a sandwich but nothing was available which really bad. The flight was scheduled to reach Mumbai at 10.50 am but reached late by 10 min. Overall not a good experience.

title: VALUE FOR MONEY
text: The cabin crew were courteous and flight reached destination well in time. I wish, the seats had little more leg room, because, it is very inconvenient for the passenger on the middle seat.

title: Flight of Economy
text:
Check in was smooth
Selected Spice Max seats so leg room was comfortable or this can be cramped
Got complimentary food and drinks 
Took off and landed on time

title: Worst possible service for senior citizens
text:
My in-laws, both senior citizens who suffer from walking disabilities and asthma, were subjected to some callous and heartless treatment by the SpiceJet staff. I had asked for two wheelchairs for them at the aircraft gate upon arrival in Ahmedabad. This request was made to their Dubai office well in advance and then again at the check-in counter at Dubai airport. On both occasions, I was assured that it would be done. However, upon arrival in Ahmedabad, not only the wheelchairs were not provided, the crew abandoned the aged couple and walked off. With great difficulty, they managed to disembark from the aircraft with their cabin baggage and board the bus on the tarmac, again without any assistance whatsoever. Upon reaching the terminal, no airline staff came forward to help. Finally, a kind policeman arranged for two wheelchairs. By this time, they were close to collapse.

Subsequently, a phone call to their customer service center in India resulted in a casual verbal apology with the suggestion that the complaint should be made to their customer service department.

title: Good Flying
text: Airlines try to provide better service, cost you pay there is nothing much you expect, its budget airlines.

title: On time flight to Mumbai
text: I have travelled by Spice Jet flight SG488 from Kolkata to Mumbai. I only had hand baggage and boarding pass collection at Spice Jet counter followed by security check at the airport happened smoothly. We were taken by Spice Jet bus for boarding into the aircraft. Since it was Holi festival, I was welcomed into the aircraft with a colourful tika on my forehead. Only source of entertainment inside the flight was the Spice magazine. I had pre booked chicken sub for this flight which was served along with complimentary tea/coffee/juice. The flight touched down in Mumbai Airport before scheduled time of 10.50 am.

title: Flight only for skinny people
text: I opted for Spice Jet for my Goa trip, disappointed by their seat space, economy class always is shrinked I know that, but my flight was even worse and choked me for 2-3  hours. I paid extra for premium seats but even that was waste of money

title: flying out of small airports in this airline is very unreliable
text: These airlines also fly from small airports and the flight timings keep on changing all the time. On some occasions the flights have been cancelled without any notice. The ground staff are very unreliable and they do not even have the courtesy to arrange for conveyance  to take you to the nearby town where you can make alternative arrangements for transport ( these small airports are far away from the towns ). Always check the departure time before you leave for the airport.

title: No value for money!
text:
This is the first time I flew Spice Jet purely because of the convenience of the flight timings and I have to say the experience was disappointing. From my journey from Mumbai to Male, I was booked for Spice Max which assures you extra leg space. I was seated in the front row and the leg space was barely enough! Secondly, the seats were smaller than the usual seats in Air India or Jet Airways. Thirdly, the food quality was below expectations. I was entitled to a complimentary breakfast which was scrambled eggs and the food was rubbery and chewy! They also had a couple of hours delay in Kochi but the staff wasn't even conveying the exact time that we had to wait. They kept saying boarding starts in 15 min each time and kept pushing deadlines. Also, no offer to serve snacks or food inspite of being way beyond lunch time. 
During return from Male to Mumbai, I was again on Spice Max. The hostess asked me for a choice of non veg and veg and when I opted for non veg, conveniently told me she doesnt have the option.. why ask then??? Also, delay for the Mumbai flight from Cochin..

Not worth flying at all.

title: Flight was late approx. by 4 hours
text: Services by the crew was O.K. Check-in  was efficient but the flight was delayed, though they said due to foggy weather I have doubt. As a budget airline seats were more or less comfortable. Receiving of luggage also delayed.

title: Super travel time with spicejet on 12th March 2017 pune to goa............very good experience.
text: Super travel time with spicejet on 12th March 2017 pune to goa............very good experience. I really service from spicejet airlines......................................................

title: They are prone to reschedule flight very easily.
text:
They are prone to reschedule flight very easily. If you have a connecting flight or you really have any particular work at a specific time after reaching destination, then please stay away from SpiceJet.

This is not only the time I experienced it but most of the time I flew on Spice I encountered the same problem.

title: Kochi to Mumbai - Everything within expectations
text:
Although Kochi is a smaller airport with older facilities like old school security checking and boarding gates, however everything from flight information to boarding and then in flight services was well managed. 
As a result , I reached before time to my destination. Well done Spicejet.

title: Want to share my Super duper bad experience
text:
Date is 18feb 2017, Me n my hubby were traveling to male, maldives via kochin for honeymoon trip. At mumbai we got a call from spice jet airlines where r u guys? I said we r on our way n will be reaching domestic airport in 2mins. That Guy said ok no problem come u have 10 mins. Then we will close boarding. We reached within 2 mins.we had done priority checking they spice max. We reached airline baggage check in desk. 1st Lady said Mam go to next desk, I can't do ur priority check in, although we already booked spicemax. 2nd lady- Nisha said Mam u r late we can't do ur boarding as we need to scan ur passport. I said Mam we r travelling to domestic flight y u need passports to scanned(Although we had to do with all legal formalities at kochi international airport). We requested her number of times madam Nisha we had our bookings. We will loss our hotel bookings. I am a doctor i had commitments with my patient n work too. We requested number of times madam plz do favour for us. But she did not. Then she wasted our entire so that we can't do our check in. Then she said Mam I can give u next day 19 Feb flight but that to only one. After few mins she said Mam we can't give u tomm flights seat. I can give u 20 Feb flights seats. We requested her like anything else. But she didn't responded. Then we said Mam give us whatever possible. By meanwhile flight took off. Then she made us to wait for 2 hours t domestic mumbai airport. We had bookings at hotel at maldives for 18-19 Feb of about 25,000/ which was non-refundable. We had to extend our trip for further 2 days. So there was further hotel accommodation expenses of 2 extra days. N return flight to bhopal we had to cancel, so again flight rebooking expense. 
That day 18 Feb 2017 was a fest of year. There was psychological stress, airlines spoiled our mood, unnecessary expenses(although we paid In advance), time wastage(I am doctor), airlines disrespect for their passengers. Disheartening for us as we were travelling for our first trip after wedding. 
Please think before travelling they spice jet. They can do anything with u at anytime for there welfare. Don't think about passengers n their commitments üôè

title: Long Wait Time At The Airport
text: We took this flight in December 2016 while coming from Bangkok to Kolkata and the journey was Ok without any issues but every time its the same issue [I took the same flight in Sep 2016] of long waiting time at the Bangkok airport before boarding and waiting in queue again for long time before getting onto the plane even though it was much better this time than the last time because they called inside the flight by their Seat number rows.Other than that the flight was good the price was very economical and they landed on time in kolkata.

title: An average flight compared to spicejet standards
text:
This was a mid morning flight.Three incidents happened with me which I didn't like and hence I deducted two points:
1.The stairway was not aligned at the back.So I had to board the flight from the front which was quite an uncomfortable distance.
2.Due to some reason,mid flight there were obnoxious smells of pain relief spray and human excreta.
3.The attendant forgot to serve me a beverage that was part of my meal and she served it ten minutes before landing.
These two were positive points of the flight: 
1.The food ordered was good
2.The flight landed before its scheduled time.
It was an average flight all in all.

title: Spicejet the number one airlines in India
text:
A really good airline 
Punctual
Great hygiene and cleanliness in the aircraft
Fine leg room
Good service 
I have flown with them a lot of times 
And never have been dissappointed 
A great airline in terms of aircraft maintenance ground service etc.

title: if it would be possible, no more flying with this company
text: if it would be possible, no more flying with this company....such a dissapointment. If you can, please dont use their service

title: Still tops the list of worst airlines in India
text:
10yrs ago I flew spicejet first time and said to myself 'never again'. Ended up flying this yr again and same effect again, only worse. 
Don't know where to start...
At check-in the gentleman had a frown instead of a smile, he was more pre-occupied with what's going on around him than his own counter, forget a greeting Not even a hi, not even once did he make direct eye contact with the customer and if that's not rude enough, he garnished it up with his aggressive and tone and behaviour. Standing in front of him seemed like we where some petty criminals cought red-handed by police rather than an airline counter. When I wished him good morning he stared at us like I had just hurled an insult at him and didn't even bother to reply back. 
Anyhow, requested him to try to put me and my wife's seat together if possible and for the first time he spoke the only few words in the whole check-in process saying very sternly 'No, your seats are seperate. It's a busy flight' 
Boy was I glad to get away from the counter. 
Here is what surprised me More, the seat next to me was empty. 
Requested a hostess if I can get my wife to sit there and got same reply that the flight is full, didn't understand how was any1 getting on that seat now since the boarding had finished and captain had ordered for the doors to be closed. 
In a service industry it's the smiles, politeness and courteousness and a friendly and professional attitude of the staff that helps to succeed and survive.

title: Good & Cheap
text: It was my first experience with them and i am satisfied with it. Service was good, Staff was helpful just they have to work on to add more check in counters in airport as sometimes the queue is really long. Flying on almost every destination of India and now a days it is becoming one of the low cost carrier, Good job.

title: Style over substance
text:
During our India tour we were booked to fly with Jet Air, Indigo, Vistara and Spicejet.
There are possibly cost variations, but Spicejet's promotions are all style and no substance. The plane was small, noisy and cramped. There was dreary last century music playing throughout the flight (definitely not hip or spicey). Staring at seat backs all advertising 'United India Insurance' was not exactly enthralling either. Where is the 'fun' in even having to pay for a small bottle of water? Vistara may be a more expensive airline, but their complimentary chicken curry and bread was brilliant.

title: Kerala To Delhi
text: We , the 25 couples travelled from Trivandrum to Delhi via Kochi flight on 28/1/2017. The ground staff at luggage counters & gate was co-operative. During the flight also we enjoyed the food. It was of good quality & fresh. Cabin staff behaviour was very good towards travellers during the flight hours. Though it was flight of slightly above 4 hrs, but it landed on time. We enjoyed the Spice Jet flight. Good work done.

title: Spouse camp in  Kerala
text: I  along with my better half & 24 colleague couples  travelled on 23/1/2017 from Domestic terminal of Delhi Airport to Kochi just before sunrise. Only 3 luggage counters were operative in place of 6-7 available & it took slightly longer for our group for check in our luggage.Though the staff on duty was quite co-operative. During the flight we enjoyed & cabin staff was outstanding in knowledge & their behaviour. I extend sincere thanks to Spice Jet for maintaining high standards in their flight. Pilot was experienced & It landed on time at destination. Thank You. Spice Jet keep it up.

title: Nice Alternative‚Äù
text: SpiceJet one of the cheapest  airline in domestic travelers. They have very clean seats and aircraft. For most of the flights, Spicejet charges money for online seat selection. Whereas, other Indian airlines don't. food is ok.

title: Good economical flight
text: it is very economical flight make it reach to every middle class. On board services are ok but need to improve a lot.

title: Timeli Arrival
text: Aamazing experience. very timely and good service. Quick checking n boarding. Glad we selected this Airlines.

title: the flight experience is just ok
text: the flight experience is average. since web check was done, got front seats. the cleanliness, linen over the seats was average.

title: nice alternative
text: i traveled from Chennai to Ahmadabad in this flight it was on time and cost of travel was also nominal. this helped me to reach in proper time

title: Never liked SJ before
text: Never had good feeling in SJ before, but my recent travel in SJ had been wonderful. They were on time and the staffs were courteous, though the travel time is only 40 mins, food was served.

title: The flight attendent was non-cooperatve
text: The person sitting next to me was not keeping his laptop and mobile away and had his tray table open during take off. When I brought it to the attention of the flight attended she snapped back at me with the gesture that I am doing it why are you cribbing.  It sounded very rude to me.

title: Not customer friendly
text:
Recently I had a bitter experience with SpiceJet Airlines. 
I with my two other colleague booked for our travel from Bagdogra to Chennai.
We thought we could break the travel by going from Bagdogra to Kolkata and from Kolkata to Chennai. So when we were booking, we booked one from Bagdogra to Kolkata. Then when we looked for booking from Kolkata to Chennai, we found the same flight after 30 minutes layover at Kolkata goes to Chennai. We thought that we could book the travel from Kolkata to Chennai in the same flight and may get boarding done at Bagdogra, combing the two tickets.
The travellers are same, the flight is same.
But the airlines refused two have combined boarding at Bagdogra. Since we have booked separately, we have two PNR numbers, we can not check in at Bagdogra by combining the two travels.
What the airlines say is that we need to checkout at Kolkata and get another Boarding pass then check in again for proceeding our travel to Chennai. But the flight will be there only for 30 minutes, but we should check in at least before 45 minutes of departure.
We explained the situation but in vain. We need to cancel our travel and rebook the entire travel which costed us about INR 18,000. 
We have also asked our booking agent for help, which we didn't get in time. In addition, the booking agent added additional cancellation processing charge for their part.

A very very bad experience.

title: Horrible flight service
text:
Hi Guys,

I have travelled multiple times due to lack of option or last minute travel.Below is my review:

1.Flight quality is horrible.It will create lot of noise.You wont be able to listen anything for at least 2 days after your travel from a spicejet flight.

2.Leg space is very bad w.r.t other flight operators.

3.Chances of delay is more thats what I have seen.

4.Cancellations chances are also more.They will ask you to take money or reschedule it.Rescheduling they can do from other places also if tickets are not there.E.G, you booked ticket from gorakhpur and they cancelled the flight.They will tell you to come to Delhi and take other flight.They will neither give the cab/train charges nor compensate the money for flight as GKP flight is costlier than delhi flight.

5.Their customer care is pathetic.You just dial their number, you will come to know.It will connect after 30 minutes.And then they will move you from one option to other option.You will loose lot of money in calling that pathetic customer care.

6.Customer care people are rude.

I would have rated negative but that option is not there.

Thanks.

title: Nice !!
text: Had to fly to jaipur on urgent basis, got the best fare available on internet. Everything on time whenever i have chosen them.  Service was nice as well, i always choose spice jet to travel will fly again !! üòä

title: Not allowed even 600 grams extra weight
text: We were four persons returning from Thiruvanthapuram to Delhi on 28 Jan 2017 by 09.35 morning flight.Our checked in baggage weight was 62.4 kg.That exceeded by 2.4 kg.in total or mere 600 grams extra for per person.But they did not allow and we had to move some 2.5 kg.goods to cabin bag.They should allow such a small overweight.

title: Very congested
text: seats were really congested. My travel was very uncomfortable. If it's a big or a fat person, I can't tell you what his experience would be. Need little more space!!

title: An epitome of care and  OTP
text: A red hot  spicy aircraft , of late emerging as On TIme Performance and for the past four months it is maintaining its time sense. Well groomed staff  on board Gurveen and Waylon were pleasingly served the guests in their 90 mnts long flight. A little extra money can get extra leg room and this seat entitles a complimentary snacks...

title: Flight Delayed By 30 Minutes But got Spacious Emergency Exit Row Seats
text: While returning back from Bangkok to Kolkata in September 2016 we opted for Spicejet as it was the cheapest and the journey started well with a very smooth check in but after the security check the flight started getting delayed and our wait became longer and as all the seats near the Gate were full we had to stand for 30 minutes.Also the staff did not organize the entry in to the flight well as all the people waiting were allowed boarding at once and it was a nightmare, instead they should have called people in batches based on their seat numbers.Finally On entering the flight we were happy that we were given Emergency Exit Row seats as they had huge Leg space but a person was occupying our seat and we had to argue with him to get our seat.After that the Journey was smooth without any hiccups.

title: One of nicer experiences on the avaition industry is with spicejet
text: i hv travelled with spicejet multiple times and it has been a great experience.looking fwd to more such trips.

title: average
text: not bad but could be better . food is good, chk in was smooth baggage was a little delayed, leg space seating ok take only aisle seat.

title: Very poor services
text: I had a horrendous experience with Spicejet with my flight being delayed for over 3 hours which led to a meeting cancelation and a total ruckus of plans.

title: Worth a value
text: Definitely recommended low cost airlines.  Worth a value paid. Comfortable flight experience as it just over one hour flight. Nothing much with service involved but cabin crew Priya has a great positive attitude and customer skills.

title: Kochi to Mumbai
text: Airline is good, neat & clean. In flight staff are very good. The airline is very professional. Everything you have to purchase like seat, food etc. Please not no web check in allowed by airline. You have to occupy the seat which allotted by airline.

title: Mixed experience.
text: They Cheated us while travelling from kolkata to portblair and asked extra money for the seats that we have already selected while booking. But in flight service and in the returning flight the experience was opposite.  staffs were very friendly.

title: Mixed Bag

It appeared to be a leased aircraft hence besides a fresh coat of paint from the outside the inside was really decrepit. Flight was on time and the rest of the service was efficient.

title: A Ha ha ha ho ho travel
text:
As mentioned in subject traveled with small flitted .... even its small flite its keep the name od spice jet with their regular delay ... worst part is that its got extended at last 1 hr to 2 more hour that time i did the check in and inside cbe airlonge nothing to do...

seats wee prety good and average service you can expect

title: Never fly spice jet
text: Although their check-in was expedient, they charged us more for an extra bag than a seat on the actual airplane.  Then they didn't take american express even though the flight had been purchased on that same card.  I would rather pay slightly more for much better service.

title: Best Airlines for Ahmedabad to Dubai
text:
Spicejet has started low cost airlines from Ahmedabad to Dubai and return.

All Gujarati's first choice is SpiceJet, because of its time and price. Both are very comfortable for all Gujarati.

Thanks SpiceJet for this service

title: Definitely Terrible
text: Terrible is the word to explain my experience with Spicejet. Booked it twice and flight was delayed on both the occasions for 2 hours. Can't explain the frustration that I had to go through when I called them and asked to reschedule my flight to an earlier date with no charges because it was their fault but they still didnt

title: Most punctual
text: Most important is the punctuality. The flight docked into an aerobridge in Kolkata, which very few economy airlines do

title: A trade-off between budget and service
text:
The journey was good. However, even after reaching almost 2.5 hours before flight time, according to the boarding pass dispatcher only middle seat was available across all the rows. This is not not even possible considering when the passenger reaches so early to the airport. It was evident that the person was lying about the available seats.
Also, if a passenger pays additional 1000 bucks, he/she will get extra good treatment during the journey compared to other passengers in the same class. Ideally this differentiation should be on the basis of which class the passenger travels. The thing over here is, the passenger who hasn't paid those extra bucks sees extra treatment given to his/ her fellow passengers and has no idea about the extra bucks scheme. This creates a negative impact on the passengers. SpiceJet should definitely look in this matter.

title: Review Spice Jet
text: The flight has very good service as the flight was delayed but they had given the best service possible the in-service was also good . The seats was very comfortable  and they had done their best

title: Gave a non reclining seat without warning.
text: A Seat was allotted which was was non reclining seat. They must tell the costomers prior to issuing such seats.

title: best in budget
text: great budget flight, nice experience, great cabin crew, always there for you, beautiful cabin crew I must say, my flight was delayed due to foggy conditions because of that cabin crew was there to help with any problems, free water was provided, healthy environment was created, no body is anxious. Love to travel on spice jet again.

title: Well Spiced
text: The flight was on time and the check in was well assisted. The flight attendants were pleasant and cooperative. Nice to be greeted by a smile at midnight and early morning. Overall a great improvement in the services by this airline.

title: Flight experience
text: The service was generally good. It was on time. Seating was average. Reached destination on time. I did not opt for additional benefits or priority checkin and checkout or leg space. Probably due to the poor leg space, the passenger behind was resting his legs on my seat which created discomfort.

title: first fly travel
text: Spicejet is a Low Cost Airline, it was just a cheap and convenient option for me. I took flight from delhi to goa. However, the comfortable seats, very professional and friendly cabin crew and the background musicreminded me of how a flight must actually be. It's all about the experience to me

title: Kids flew using UNMR
text: My kids flew down from Jodhpur to New Delhi on 25 Dec. Their services are good. Since kids were flying alone proper assistance was given at an additional cost. However booking procedure is not consistent. One executive refused defence personnel discount, while 5 minutes later on a different call, the same was given. Also there is not much difference in the cost as they claim after taking defence forces discount. Its more of a farce and misleading. Otherwise services are good.

title: Really Good
text:
Spice Jet is an under-rated airline, it deserves a lot more kudos and improved perception than what I think people generally feel about this airline.
They do not have the constant chest thumping attitude of Indigo or the supercilious attitude of Jet Airways; they look laid back but their flights are always on time and their on board service pretty good.
The Spice Jet Max option is a great one to get additional services and extra leg room at a minimal cost and I highly recommend this. I am sure with time, they will extend this to cover more seats on the aircraft.
The only reason I choose other airlines at times is because Spice Jet does not have the flights at desired timings, Indigo scores very well there.
I strongly recommend Spice Jet to my fellow travellers.

title: Nightmare!
text:
I flew Delhi to Goa on 19 December 2016 and when my bag arrived it was open. I complained to SpiceJet ground staff and they took a photograph of the bag as it had arrived, clearly showing it had been opened in transit. They then asked me to check contents to see if anything was missing. I did so and there were a number of items missing. I asked for a written report and they flatly refused to give me one! I argued with them but they told me they could only provide a Property Irregularity Report (PIR) for missing bags!! They asked me to write a list of the missing items on a piece of paper, that they took from me advising that they would check with Delhi and call me. Luckily my companion took a photo of the list before we left the airport else I would have no evidence of this at all because I heard nothing more from them.

Returning to Delhi on 30 December - with a different airline - I went to the airport 2 hrs early so I could visit Spice Jet office and demand a PIR. I was told the manager was in a meeting - and he stayed in it for nearly 3 hrs before I eventually had to leave! I did at least manage to get the two SpiceJet staff members to come to us when I insisted they provided the photo of my opened bag, which I copied to my phone.

The way I was treated was unbelievable, until I was shouting in frustration trying to get them to simply provide a PIR! They continued to refuse. With hindsight I realise I should have reported this to the Goa police on 19 December so that at least I'd have a report for my insurance company - who are refusing to recompense me without a PIR! They do not accept that an airline would not have provided this if I had reported a loss to them!

Meanwhile, I have exchanged countless emails with SpiceJet Customer Service/Nodal - and written to SpiceJet owner Ajay Singh - who keep telling me they are investigating this matter.

Coincidentally, whilst writing this, a few minutes ago I received a phone call from SpiceJet in India telling me they want 2 more days to investigate.  I repeated for the zillionth time, that all I want is a PIR.  The reply - 'Madam, we are looking into this but you did not write a report at the airport in Goa'

This is a dishonest airline and I would not recommend anyone to risk flying with them!

title: Still there is spice in it
text: Spicejet had a remarkable turnaround under the new management from near shutdown to ordering around 200 flights quite recently... It is a low cost airline offering attractive fares during off season sales... Travelled recently multiple times in its economy class... On time every time and for the past few months it is staying on top for on time performance... Aircraft cabin and seats were good... Cabin crew took good care and all services were generally good from check in till arrival at destination... Food and beverages served were good but the food box was not comfortable to use in one of the flights... They are offering many add ons at reasonable price... Definitely Spicejet has spice in it...

title: Good option but need improvement in many areas
text:
Myself along with my parents traveled via Spice Jet to Kolkata from Chennai. It was a good experience, but improvement is needed in various areas.
* Boarding calls were not given, so it became difficult for us to keep watching the Indication boards
* Welcome Drink / Beverages were not given.

Air hostess / Cabin crew's service were really good. Instructions were given appropriately. Overall the travel was good.

title: Worst flying experience ever
text:
I had to travel to Chennai from Mumbai, the flight was at 10.30 pm and the flight boarding started late. The delay is understandable due to weather. So we boarded the flight around 11pm and there was no AC during the time we were inside the aircraft. Til 12 p m the flight did not take off.  
The ac was not switched on and even water was not offered. When we wrote to the SpiceJet they gave a replay stating due to humid weather the AC effect was not there. And just standard replied thanks for writing and all. No rectification or anything.

title: Good Option for a Low Cost airline
text: I had some negative feed back about the ailine and was hesitant to opt for Spice Jet. But at last booked our return flights from Ahmedabad to Dubai and we have had a good in flight experience. Having Spice Max on our return, we were taken good care and the food served was good and hot. Both the  flights were confortable. The ground staff and the in flight crew provided  efficient service

title: bad experience this time  ..
text: travelled from chennai to kolkata on 23 jan. the flight was supposed to depart at 1450 hrs but was being postponed continuously  ..  the spicejet staff at the departure hold initially indicated that due to to "jallikettu"issue, people were not able to reach the airport and once half the number of people arrive, the flight would take off  ..  initially the flight was delayed by 40 minutes  .. then another display indicated a further 40 minutes delay  ..  after some time , the ground staff indiacated that the flight would depart at 1800 hrs  ..  after an hour we were informed that the departure time would be 2100 hrs  ..  we were surprised to see that other airlines were being operated from chennai airport with not much delay  ..  indigo , jet airways , etc were operating with only a slight delay in services  ..  finally the ground staff indicated that crew had to come from delhi to cater to the aircraft as crew could not reach the airport and spare crew was not available  ..  we felt really cheated by the attitude of the airline as the flight got delayed by close to 7 hours  ..  many families with children were present at the airport waiting to board the airline  ..  the airline could have arranged to put the passengers on alternative flights destined for kolkata  .. other airlines were flying afterall  ..  the handling of the situation was extremely pathetic and the hardship on the passengers should have been avoided  ..

title: Red.Hot.Spicy.. As they say
text: Currently providing better services than Indigo and Jet Airways. Go for SpiceMax, if you are boarding SpiceJet.

title: Apalling service from ground staff n telephone customer service
text: Ground staff rude n un co-operative with elderly traveller due to which missed the flight. Raised a complaint with call centre n when chased up after a day was told to complaint by email n wait further.

title: never take this airline
text: i has booked my ticket earlier, i checked in to the airport before 40 to departure, and i wasn't allowed to take the flight. the staff said that the plane has already taken off, you were supposed to show up two hours before the time of departure...

title: Shocking experience
text: Bangalore to Cochin. Delayed by 2 and a half hours. No apologies or anything from the staff. No legroom whatsoever and food was terrible. They're a budget airline and you can tell by the poor service they provide. Only use if you absolutely must!!

text:
