This flight is don't have any in flight service nor Entertainment...

title: Worst airline
text: Worst airline can't web check in waste of money my family tried web checking in from Dubai to Pune even that web check in didn't work do not use horrible service after paying money.

title: Rising from ashes..it
text: At one point of time, it was near to be shut down but with the change in Management it bounced back from the brink of disaster. Its a good budget airline. only issue is little space for legs.

title: TRIP TO KOLKATA
text: it was a wonderful experience for me as i was travelling for first  time in a plane...i was very excited to know how the plane travels...what are various facilities provided...as i travelled i came to know things step by step..it was a wonderful experience

title: Sad experience
text:
I was booked on SG777, scheduled from New Delhi to Ahmedabad at 18:55 pm on 9th January. 
The flight was delayed by more than 2 hours, yet I got no intimation from the airline. When it got further delayed, exhausted, I asked the in-flight attendants to upgrade me AS I entered the craft and I was willing to pay for a good leg stretch. It's a short flight, an hour and 20 minutes.

I was offered upgrade and that too emergency exit after 30 minutes of being air bound. I had no choice but to decline.

title: Surprisingly good
text: Well I traveled by Spicejet after 2 years. It was not at all as the earlier versions. They have improved a lot with the experience. I was travelling by SpiceJet SG - 475 from New Delhi to Guwahati. My flight was at 3.20 PM but it flew @4:00 PM :( . The weather suddenly changed and it was showering might be for this reason, but then also all the flights were travelling on time. Other than that their staffs are very polite.Lets see next time when I travel again by Spice Jet for my final judgement.

title: Flight # 103, Spicejet
text: The flight from Dehradun to Delhi ( Terminal 1D)  continues to Chennai from Delhi as 103. The flight was delayed by about an hour at Dehradun, considering the current one-time performance of SpiceJet , this was bit unusual..The flight was not fully loaded, rest of the services and comforts on board were good as ever. The bags were on the belt in less than 10 minutes !!

title: Unclean interiors
text: I flew with Spicejet from Bangalore only because IndiGo was fully sold out for the date. When I saw my seat, there were bits of paper lying on my seat. When I sat on my seat after clearing it, I saw that there was a coffee cup in the front pouch from which the remaining coffee was still dripping. That was my only flight with Spicejet. I have never booked with them again.

title: Surprisingly impressive
text:
Recently I undertook a flight from Delhi to Kolkata on the 21st of January 2017 on SG 253.
I want you to first note that since 2012, I had not taken any flight on Spicejet as my impression about the airline had been relatively poor. I did take a flight last year in May/June from Kolkata-Chennai and back but the experience was very average. Lately I had been reading a lot about the on-time performance of Spicejet and also good reviews from friends so I decided to experiment by taking this above mentioned flight.
Starting with the check-in which was extremely smooth. I had topped up my ticket with Spice Max and the line was relatively empty and my turn came in quite fast. The lady at the counter was quick and efficient. I was impressed at that. She also guided me where the door would be and I was there at the Gate and here I was greeted warmly by one of your staff. It was cold and breezy outside so I requested that I could stand just a feet inside the gate till the bus arrives and she obliged. The other passengers did go outside and were waiting for the bus. When the bus arrived she politely asked me to proceed. The bus ride to the aircraft was also smooth. I went to the flight and then seated myself on my Emergency Reclining Aisle seat. Soon the airhostess came and briefed us of the procedure and the flight then took off. Extremely smooth take off as well. Later the food service commenced and all the 4 onboard crew were smartly dressed (I least expected them to be smart looking in fact but they were young and quick and polite and efficient). The food service was good and quick. I do not remember the names of all 4 of them but I do recall one was Misba, another was Alpana and one I think was Sandeep but not sure and last one was Evlyn (spell check). The landing also was very smooth once again. The flight took off 10 minutes late but landed 5 minutes early. This was once again true to the spirit of ontime impression that I had been given lately. Seated next to me was Ms Oindrila Das. I happened to speak to her and she was going to be joining the fleet as an Onboard crew she said. She had just finished her training and was on her way back home (Kolkata) before she is posted in Hyderabad. The chat with her further made me impressed that the company is hiring efficient and polite crew. I am sure that the company will go a long way if they keep this spirit up and hire efficient staff on ground, and on board the way they have been doing.

Only one thing is of concern to me. I originally had a SpiceJet account since 2010 and later in April 2016 I created a Spice Club account. Both accounts have the same email id and the same mobile number. But sadly now when I am trying to merge both together I am unable to do so. The SpiceJet account is showing separate and when I try to Upgrade the SpiceClub account then it shows I am already registered with the same mobile number. I am sure that a lot of other users must be facing the same issue and SpiceJet should make provision for smooth merging of both by a simple command or click.

title: Bag's lock was missing and they don't even care
text: My flight took off on 22nd January 2017 from Ahmedabad and reached Mumbai at 6:10 AM. When I got my luggage I found that lock was missing and chain of the bag was broken and slightly opened. I raised a complaint with subject Bag's lock was missing. But after two days I came to know that subject was changed to lock was damaged and they are not ready to give me any compensation.

title: One leg in the Coffin!
text:
Other airlines were not available, hence I had to chose this one! When I reached airport, 2 hours were remaining to flight departure and check-in was not started yet. The Fat Lady issuing did not bothered listening to me that check-in baggage was fragile. So tag was needed. After I shouted, she is like - get lost! 

Flight was delayed for more than an hour, however no information was given to customers. No one was available at the boarding gate to answer. 

After an hour, boarding gate was changed twice, passengers were not informed about it. It was really a headache to customers with limited mobility. 

When landed at Ahmedabad, aerobridge was not provided. Again problem for some people. It took more than 30 minutes to receive the luggage.

title: Awful and ugly
text:
Starting from the check-in , i was asked for upgrade to forward of the plane with extra charge ofcourse.
boarded the plane only to find out that the rows of seats behind me were of extra legroom, Mine was awful.
Would never like to fly ever again.

title: Damn good airline now
text: I flew spicejet after a long gap - almost 3 years, as I always fly Jet, Indigo. This time selected spicejet as I wanted to fly in at a particular time. Excellent boarding experience, inflight service as well as boarding experience. Perfectly in time both ways and Well trained crew. I would definitely prefer spicejet over Indigo now, as my experience with Indigo has not been great last 5-6 times. Well done Ajay Singh and team. Keep up good work.

title: Useless airline
text: Very bad airline, feels like a bus... it wasn't even cheap and still the service was terrible. The seat back rest wasn't working and i suffered for 1 hr (30 mins delayed on the airport), they refused to give me a better seat, and shifted me to another seat of the same kind, no compensation for their terrible service and comfort. I give up on this airline. The air hostess is well trained to argue with the guests. (i wrote to their customer relations team and no one cared to respond)

title: Good Budget Fleet in India
text: A good Budget Airlines. I can rate Spicejet next to indigo in India. Large fleet available next to indigo. The only problem with spicejet is very less legroom and they are littlebit down in the cleanliness. Their seats are not clean and good. (I have travelled 3 times with them, either their seats are with dirt or the fabric facing our seat is like that. They have to improve cleanliness of their fleet. But generally rating they are ontime all the 3 times i fly with them.

title: Cheap quality,but costly amount
text: I travelled from Hyderabad to dubai since 2months ago in the spice jet.I found that the cost is so much for this flight.But after getting into flight,i feel very bad by sawing it's food and services.There is nothing to tell about it.It is a cheap quality product and charging huge amount from the customers.I don't likes it.It is worthless flight service.

title: GREAT SERVICE @ AFFORDABLE PRICE
text: very good service at an affordable cost, hassle free check in, from the grounds staffs to the in flight service crew service was excellent ...

title: New Planes and New Seats
text: I was pleasantly surprised that a budget airline like Spice Jet could provide such good service and planes. I feel that it is the best budget airline that I have every flown. Although I have flown budget airlines only in Europe, Canada, and USA, compared to them Spice Jet could be almost luxury for the price you pay. Given a choice between Spice Jet and other carriers in India, I will choose Spice Jet over others in a flash.

title: Good Service
text: We flew to Colombo with SpiceJet. The price of tickets was highly reasonable and the service was the best.

title: Cheap ticket
text: The cheap ticket and short term to fly from BKK - CCU. If you are a traveler budget and need to fly to India, Kolkata, the best way to save up your money you can fly with this airline. No food, No any drinks to serve you. only drinking water. If you need more you can pay. But only 2and half hrs. to fly. Not clean much and old a little bit for aircraft. almost safety and standard flight. if you not expect for any services and need cheap ticket i think this good choice for you.

title: Low experience with low cost airline
text: I chosen SpiceJet airline to fly from Delhi to Jammu however The flight was really not good the flight was not at all clean the seat covers were tired off push back was not working seems like they are using there very old flight for the service in flight food was ok the staff was not at all cooperative I asked for a tissue paper they given me the same after 15 min that too after 2nd reminder

title: poor service
text:
the check in process was such a mission. They could see we were tourists and saw that we had other international flights to catch. we where 5kgs combined over weight. and had to pay extra. but people infront of us and behind us had alot of excess baggage and didn't have to pay. 

Pathetic service

Had to pay for food - very expensive.

title: Worst flying experience ever!!!!
text: Staff are very unprofessional and rude. All they wear is jeans and a top which looks disgusting. Air con broke so the aircraft was red hot and set off late on both flights. It felt more like catching a bus than a normal flight!

title: Awesome Journey
text: Imagine reaching Mumbai from Hyderabad during  peak hours,  that too on a Friday evening,  before time... Unbelievable right?  Well, this is what just happened to me with SpiceJet... In this age where Airline announcements about delays during evening peak hours,  about congestion at Mumbai,  being common,  it was a surreal experience..  Also,  whoever said that Airline food has to be boring never flew on Spicejet... Trust me and that's coming from a person who has endured the tasteless sandwiches and boring Cup noodles on Low Cost Indigo Airlines and the highly cost cutting induced economical food served on Full Service Jet Airways... Their Red,  hot spicy menu was awesome and the meal booked by me (Grilled chicken breast with mushrooms served with pasta and rice), was out of this world... I have been observing drastic improvements in their service standards for quite some time now.... Kudos to SpiceJet and keep up the good work...

title: Best low cost airline in the world
text: I travelled from Chennai to Port Blair by SpiceJet. The flight landed before time. The aircraft was clean. The seats were comfortable. The meal was yummy though it was buy on board. I extremely enjoyed the journey and recommend everyone to choose this airline.

title: Worst Airline
text: I was a corporate customer. I was entitled for complimentary meal as mentioned on my ticket but I was denied for the same. Even after showing my ticket, crew denied me the same. To make it worse, my baggage was mishandled. It was damaged from the front. Even after 11 days, I am not able to get any satisfactory response from airline. The only mail they have sent to me is "We cant help in this." While at airport I was asked to file the complaint and wait for response from airline. I should have asked them to handle that issue there only.

title: Dont ever fly with SpiceJet
text: I was on a trip to Bangkok by SpiceJet flight SG83 from Kolkata airport. I checked in my luggage and on arrival at Subarnabhumi Bangkok airport I found that my luggage (a rucksack) was not at all present. We were 7 in a group and all of my fellow had there luggage while mine was missing. I lodged a complain at the bangkok airport. I made whole of my Thailand trip without my bag and on last day I enquired the Bangkok airport about my bag and they said my bag is at Kolkata airport. On arrival at Kolkata airport SpiceJet people told me that the don't know anything about my bag. They even didn't lodged a complaint. After 15 days still now I didn't get my bag back and they didn't compensate me anything.

title: Average - They want money for everything
text:
Very Money minded people.They allow 7 kgs in cabin including laptop.Not even a cup of tea is free.
Pathetic service for web check-ins.
Choose SpiceJet if no other option.

title: Late and Unregretted
text: The flight was delayed by hours.  No reason stated.  The staff were robotic.  Flight is decent, taking off and landing are perfect.  Period.

title: Say thanks to me for review
text:
Flight was late
Ground host at gate pass was unapologetic 
So terrible engine sound even inside the flight
Seats were so comfortable for kid travellers only
I am thankful for enough leg room unless I thought you would have sacrificed this too. And thanks for keeping leg room for free unlikely you charge for it for front seaters

title: Traveller's Delight
text: i, kashi krushna,with Ms Avani Pandya,flew this airline on 31st Dec,2016,and 8th Jan,2017,by flight #s 607/608/611/612. All four flights experiences was very memorable. I have flown this airline before but, these trips being longer made the difference. Officials at Chennai airport were more than willing to help. Flights were punctual except one,intimation of which i received 2 days in advance. A little variety in food on flight may be asking for too much in today's competitive times,but will be appreciated.

title: always late
text: v used this service again but regret to inform as usual late this flight too they showing right time v borded too in time when doing boarding no announcement to board later seats passenger first since boarding was through aero bridge there were too much rush inside flight no management & flight first delay due to boarding not systematic secondly became late by 1 hour when reached bengalaru thet do not understand time value of passengers . in future i always avoid this airline. leg room too they have reduced too much even a person can not seat with comfort .what airline doing no one can think

title: What A Christmas!
text:
We traveled on the morning of 24th of December 2016 to Goa from Delhi. And what a welcome it was onboard! The entire plane was decked up in Christmas colors. The seats had all santa caps and there was confetti stuck on the overhead luggage stow-aways. On every seat there was a beautifully wrapped package containing almond cup cakes. There were jingles playing and 2 air-hostesses were decked up as lady-santas!
Even though the flight was running half an hour late, passengers completely forgot about the delay and were completely submersed in the decor and feel. 
A great start it was to our holiday. Thankyou Spicejet.

title: Great experience
text: Crew members of Spicejet are really good both at the ground and on board. Our take off and landing was smooth. Overall, it was a comfortable journey with Spicejet. I will definitely recommend to others.

title: Check-in Bag lost by SpiceJet
text: On 29th Dec 2016 I took the SpiceJet flight SG83 for Bangkok airport. I checked in my luggage (a rucksack bag) but on arrival at Subarnabhumi, Bangkok airport I found that my bag is missing. I immediately lodged a complain at the airport. They provided me a contract number for enquiring about the status of the bag. I made my whole Thailand trip without my belongings. But on the day of returning I enquired the Bangkok airport about my bag and they said my bag is at Kolkata airport itself. But on arrival at Kolkata airport on 4th Jan SpiceJet authorities said they don't know about my bag. They rudely behaved with us and didn't lodged complaint that night. I lodged a complaint next day and they said I have to wait for 48 hrs for any update. I waited but they didn't replied me. Now it is more than 72 hrs and still I didn't get any update about my bag.

title: Delayed and Bad Service Provided
text: I was travelling in a Family with Two Infants - 1.5Years of age. The flight actual schedule was 19:35hrs and the same delayed by 20:30hrs as per the Airline SMS received on 27th Dec 2016 by 13:00hrs. Later received an another SMS saying that the flight is rescheduled again by 23:00hrs. But, while reaching the airport by 20:00hsr found that the flight is still delayed and departing by 23:45hrs. When checked with the Front desk Counter and response was very bad and rude. Meanwhile there was a Jet Airways and an another spicejet flights departing from Madurai by 21:45hrs. A rescheduling or modifiying the tickets are requested but no consideration has been given. Finally we have wait at the airport for 4hrs with Infants is worst experience of my family trip had to madurai. It really spoils the entire trip and this was the last flight departed by 00:05hrs finally from Madurai. Bad Customer service and please do not book spicejet at all.

title: Excellent Airline... Bang on time
text: The ground staff is friendly and cooperative. The aircraft has decent legroom. On time every single time and most of the times they arrive at the destination either bang on time or before the arrival time.

title: Seats are tiny
text: The cabin staff were very good and managed to serve food and drinks on a 45 minute flight,leg room is good but the seats are very narrow

title: Godd services
text: good experience with this, i love to fly more with this company, i enjoy food and timing no other problems.

title: value for money but the they are not punctual
text:
value for money but the they are not punctual.

the flight got delayed but couple of hours but no one bothered to inform on time.

title: ‚ÄúGood Experince with SpiceJet‚Äù
text: I have travelled first time in jet.SpiceJet is a low-cost airline. It felt like a local bus than an international flight.

title: GREAT
text: I Enjoyed great experience with spicejet. I got a ticket at low fare. Flight is good and I got timely updates from spicejet

title: Good Experince with SpiceMax
text: During my trip to Goa, I decided to buy SpiceJet product "SpiceMax" and I was satisfied with the service provided through this product. I was checked in through priority check-in Counter.My Luggage was tagged with priority Tags. Check-in Staff was very efficient and knew her job very well. SpiceMax Seats are quite comfortable with extra Legroom. They did provide complimentary meal. I had also pre-booked meal which was served hot and was tasty. Crew was great!  A very decent flight Experience.

title: Bowled
text: I am rating SpiceJet high only for one reason and that one reason is something another airline would not do.  We traveled from Bombay to Delhi only to realise that we had left our wallet back on the flight in the seat pouch only after an hour of embarking the aircraft.  The wallet had some money but more importantly it had documentation and cards that most wallets would have.  Whilst I called the call centre as soon as we realised that we had left our wallet back in the flight and the representative could not do much which is where I feel all airlines can improve.  All of them need to have all communication channels open.  What really bowled me over is that I got a call from the airline airport staff proactively and they informed me about the wallet.  They were so helpful.  Post all required documentation, checks and verification they rightfully handed over the wallet to us.  It was a real surprise and I was really bowled.

title: Low cost Airline
text: Flight is ok but services are getting worst. They are least bothered about the passengers as they have started thinking as passengers are travelling for free.

title: Pleasent experience
text: Very good experience with Spicejet, got timely updates of my travel and they also offered special package at extra cost which included seats with more leg room, meal and baggage handover. But since we were traveling with friends i didnt opted but it was a good deal. Coming to the flight it was good and on time. Did online checkin and it was hassle free.

title: Inefficient customer service
text:
I recently flew Spice Jet to India from Dubai. I understand Spice Jet is a low cost airline but due to the season, the price we paid was not cheap. 

Customer service whether from inflight attendants or ground staff is terrible. The check-in process is slow. The food offered in the plane, although priced like any A-class restaurants, lacked taste or quality. 

They will never miss an opportunity to squeeze every penny from your pocket. I had an excess luggage of 1 kg and yet had to pay for it. The ground staff forgot to give immigration card at the counter and had to run back & forth to get an immigration card. 

The only thing that was positive was that the flight had sufficient leg-space even in economy class. I understand it's a low cost  airlines but to train staff well to deliver a friendly customer service, it doesn't take much. Does it?

title: Delaying and noisy flights
text: I was travelling from Pune To Ahmedabad via SpiceJet SG-524 on 17 Aug16 with my wife and cousin. It was not a very delightful experience flying with SpiceJet. Firslt of all flight was too noisy, also Staff looked so lethargic and didn't even have smile on their faces which confused me a lot. SpiceMax food is although good option as they just provide glass of water for entire flight time.

title: On time Airline
text: Even though the weather in Delhi was bad, most of us expected the flight to get delayed, but Spicejet has proved again that it values time of the passengers. The flight started dot on time and also landed on time. I had the similar experience a week back when I was flying with the same airlines from Visakhapatnam to Hyderabad.

title: Average Flight
text:
SpiceJet is a low-cost airline. It felt like a local bus than an international flight. The seats are not comfortable enough or cushioned enough.. So sitting for three hours can be a pain. there is no legroom ,no adequate push back of seats...They don't include meals in the Airfare but you can purchase food in flight if u want....Flight was sooo suffocated even in winters, cant imagine for summers... 
The good thing is when they are on time and in our case recently have been landed before time, which on a regular basis is commendable.

title: Nice flight
text: This was the nice flight , early morning flight at 6.40 am and reach coimbatore at 10.40  via chennai, Considering Budget Airline,SpiceJet has been providing great service. They are mostly on time arrivals. Friendly and caring crew.

title: CLUB SPICEJET FOOLED ME WITH THE PROGRAMME
text: We got a spice club membership after payment but never got what we paid for and has not got credit back of the money in the account also

title: Good services but not the best
text: SpiceJet services are good but not the excellent. Meal and beverage choices are excellent. But their staffs do not know how to greet passengers warmly, how to talk politely with them. The only advantageous thing is that for Rs 1000 per passenger, you get extra legroom seats, complimentary meal and beverage, priority baggage delivery at destination airport, priority check-in and boarding. Aircraft was not at all clean. The passenger who sat at my seat in the previous flight had just messed up the entire seat and the airline staff did not even bother to clean the area.

title: Nice Journey and On Time
text: It was a mid night flight from Kolkata to Bangkok and the journey was fairly smooth and with out any stress.The flight started on time and landed at Bangkok on time.The cabin crew have to be trained proper etiquette and manners because one of the crew members were making fun of accent of an Foreign national.

title: Reasonably Priced Airlines
text:
I needed to fly from Pune to Coimbatore and got a cheap deal by purchasing two separate tickets with the first one from Pune to Bangalore on SpiceJet.

This is a low-cost airline that has managed to become the fourth largest airline in India by the number of passengers carried. The planes were good, at check in the staff member tried to sell me an upgrade, but the trip was too short to benefit from that and the upgrade itself was not worth it.
 
The airline has a 15kg baggage allowance, so I left most of my luggage in Mumbai and only took what I needed which was well under the limit. What was interesting that nearly every person in front of me checking in had to pay an overweight fee - a good way for the airline to push up its profits.

The staff was courteous and efficient, both at check in and on boarding the plane. As a budget airline, they sell food and other beverages, and have quite a nice variety.

A good airline to use for short trips.

title: Good service for the Price you pay
text: Considering Budget Airline,SpiceJet has been providing great service. They are mostly on time arrivals. Friendly and caring crew.

title: Stuck in Jaipur
text: Booked a flight from Jaipur to Jodhpur for the 17/December/2016, 1.20PM departure, stopping over in Dehli (FLIGHT NO. (AI) 492 and (AI) 475. Myself and my friend Sarah get to the airport, check in and then find that we weren't given our tickets from Dehli to Jodhpur. We questioned this and we're told that our flight to Jodhpur now leaves earlier and we therefore won't make the flight. And apparently that was the only flight... So what were they going to do? Nothing until I argued with the manager. The airline ended up paying for our taxi, however this was not ideal - a 6hr journey by car with a non-english speaking taxi driver. Also our flights were worth more than the cost of the taxi certainly. Poor communication - where was our notification of the change in time? Poor customer service.

title: On Time
text: Good ground staff team, easy, comfortable boarding and most important one is ON time flight. Some how I felt cabin crew needs hospitality training.

title: Add reasonable spice to your life (Travel)..!!!
text: Well, I travelled with my wife during Nov and Dec 2016. We were on our honeymoon trip. Well overall it was a fairly good experience. The most important factor of fligt punctuality was very much there. Service was good but the flight often runs out of inflight meals sold on board. So ordering at time of flight booking is a good idea, if the facility is there. Cleanliness was taken care of. Beautification can be handled with more better.

title: Nice flight, quick route
text: The flight operated on time, but took the shortest route. We took off at 2PM and landed at 2.45 PM at Pune.

title: Worst Experience
text: I have never experienced such a terrible customer service from any other Airlines. We were a group of three friends travelling from Chennai to Colombo on a leisure trip and the flight was cancelled without even intimidating any of the passengers via phone or sms. We traveled from Bangalore to Chennai to catch the flight but after reaching the airport, was informed that the flight was cancelled. Later, after long talks with the management we got our next flight booked which was a connection flight from Madurai to Colombo in Spicejet. After a long wait in Chennai International Airport we boarded the flight to Madurai and the flight landed 20 minuites late and to our surprise we came to know that our connection flight departed without 8 of its passengers. We contacted the customer care via phone and they informed that its the passengers mistake and never even bothered to address the issue. In Madurai, we met a group of idiotic spicejet staff who were not at all helpful but also unprofessional. We were again asked to catch the next flight back to Chennai as there was a flight avaialbale from Chennai to Colombo. We missed our 2 days of stay in Srilanka because of the irresponsible staff and management of Spicejet.

title: On TIME
text: I have travelled many times by spicejet from delhi to across India,  and I found it very convenient and On time....

title: On Time Performance
text:
Performance of Spicejet has improved tremendously. Had an on time flight during last journey. Customer Service and in flight experience was also good.
Only request is if in flight food menu could have reasonable prices.

title: My Climate Reality Training
text: I have always opted for SpiceJet as my domestic flier. The flights are cosy, decent, economical & hospitable. Its the most decent of domestic flights, when it comes to fly within India. The aircrafts are really robust & one feels safe flying in them. Not that there are safer domestic flight operators, but they will cost you a little bit more.

title: Much Improved
text:
I travelled to Tirupathi along with my cousin in the month of October 2016. He has booked the flight tickets by this Airlines. 

I had a bad experience with Spice Jet, last year, where we were travelling from Hyderabad to Madurai. The flight was delayed by more than four hours. The flight which was to take off at 10.00 AM to Madurai, finally took off at 14.30 on that day.

With this background, I was under the impression that this flight to Tirupathi may also be delayed. But contrary to apprehensions, the flight took off at the scheduled time with out any fuss. 

Of late, the services of Spice Jet has improved and what I am given to understand is that the flights are regular now a days. The service is also improved when compared to the earlier days.

So I can now recommend to my friends and relatives to rely on Spice jet.

title: First Flight Journey
text: Spicejet fight journey is my first flight journey and first journey always is excellent. best services and good staff.

title: Bad Experience
text: Had asked for a glass of water after i finished light meal which I had asked on board. the crew was going to wind up and proceeding for clearance. We did not get water repeating bell twice. That may be due to some technical difficulty or we do not know  what. Finally I had to go to Crew Cabin Pay Rs. 50/- for a bottle of water. So my suggestion is to appoint trained staff who understand the needs of the customer, since its a service industry and customer should not be ignored under any circumstances.

title: Average Service in compare to Indigo, Jet airways and Air India
text: Traveled some time for Mumbai to Goa, Mumbai to Banglore etc but found there services and flight very ang in compare to other airlines mentioned above.. so for me spice jet is last choice..

title: GET BULLIED BY THE FEMALE CREW
text:
I CANT BELIEVE WHAT I JUST HEARD, my co passenger asked the crew, can you tell me how long is the duration of this flight, and she said" you should check it before booking the flight" and left, while we were boarding the flight she stood there wishing people looking at the ceiling, hands behind leaning against the wall.. 

If this customer service, then i am speechless... i fairly had a good impression on Spice jet till now

title: The most wretched travel experience
text:
I was to reach Aizawal for an important Valedictory function from Mumbai. We left early morning from Mumbai  to Guwahati by Indigo and I chose the first flight out of Guwahati, being Spicejet. 
When we reached Guwahati , the Spice jet flight was announced in time for departure at 12.15 hrs. We were told to move to the departing gate for boarding. Just as we stood there waiting for the departure call, we were shocked to hear that the flight had been cancelled.
There was chaos and finally we learnt that we were to report to the ticketing office for further information..
  There a set of incompetent staff just could not handle the situation. After almost two hours we were told to go to a Hotel called the Airport Nest. The horrible experience in that hotel shows the standard that Spice Jet keeps. 
     After spending an uncomfortable night there we were asked to go to the airport with 12 passengers huddling into a mini van  along with luggage.We had been assured that the Spice Jet staff would be there and they would assist us with our fresh booking and luggage.
    No such help was shown. On the contrary, the Spicejet staff could not find our boarding pass. They had misplaced it.
Finally we were directed to the Jet Airlines counter to pick up our fresh boarding pass from Jet Airlines.
   I must admit that the Jet airline staff helped us with our screening of the baggage and even getting our check-in done.
     I must say this was the most miserable flying experience .
Never again will I travel by SPICE JET again.

title: Value for money
text: Again they proved their service is a good one. They have provided good service and the flight landed before time. This is my second time on this sector with SpiceJet. Overall experience is good and value for money.

title: Gooood
text: It was good, clean and vibrant interior, comfy seats and friendly crew. Was travelling with group and we had our fun.

title: AWFUL GENTRY
text:
I had to take this urgent flight to Dubai and I had no option but this. The atmosphere in the flight be it the gentry or the seat comfort level was pretty much awful. Adding on to that they have these numerous schemes for which they charge a lot like if you want a better leg space pay more, for a window seat pay more and blah blah.
It felt like a local bus than an international flight.

title: Great Job
text: Very happy with Spicejet while flying from Abd to Goa.  They 'upgraded' us to Premium seats i.e. the first 3 rows of the flight when we checked in without having to pay anything extra.  Moreover our luggage was out within 2 minutes on arrival at Goa. The takeoff and landing were smooth.  I am especially happy because we travelled with our 20 month tod.

title: Need good aircraft
text: Need better aircraft, the interior of the aircraft is bit old including the seats too. The flights are not on time. They have to be strict on the timings.

title: Cattle class airline
text: This route is frequented by passengers without any basic manners! Passengers knowingly harassing flight staff, trying to board flight with over excess baggage limit without paying extra charges and harassing other passengers by forcing them to carry theirs! Passengers carrying banned substances while boarding, all drunk and misbehaved which led to delay of flight! At a point made me feel ashamed as all other international flights were being boarded hassle free, this one to India was creating unnecessary commotion!

title: Average
text: Their Customer dealing is very poor.The air hostesses were very slow in their service.Moreover there was not effective management while serving food.I was not at all satisfied

title: Pathetic Airline
text: I along with my wife were returning from Sikkim via Bagdogra to Mumbai by this airline. Our first leg of flight was from Bagdogra to Delhi at 03:25 pm and next connecting flight was scheduled at 09:30 pm from Delhi to Mumbai. Our 03.25 pm  flight was delayed and left at around 04.10 pm . The height of poor service was our Delhi 9.30 pm Flight was delayed to 10.45 pm as per first msg. then to 11.25 pm then to 11.45 pm then after arguments the Spice Jet Personnel announced after the Flight lands we will board and depart. He gave a timing of 12.50 am But finally the flight departed for Mumbai at 2 am . It was just pathetic Experience. Spice people told passengers that they had kept refreshments but not more than handful of passengers were aware about this. They did not even have the decency to inform all passengers. If they can send messages for flight delay they can sure msg. every one about refreshments provided. Pathetic Experience.

title: Horrible experience with spice jet .
text: Spice jet really needs to upgrade the status of their flights..old flights which are not able to fly even in the light fog also..horrible experience made me sit at flight for more than 3 hours..should avoid spicejet flights and prefer rest one

title: Double charged...
text:
Discount airline you pay to sit at the front. I paid the extra money for 2 tickets at the front. At check in the person said i owed more. New plane fee... I said no i paid for everything at time of purchase. She said priority seating fee... Again i said no you can see on my tickets evrything is paid for. She kept demanding & after arguing & having the line be held up i relented. So... funny...in flight spice jet magazine had her listed as a top employee for increasing revenue for the company-boo!
.

title: Poor onboard service
text: Nothing hot and spicy meals. Only cold sandwiches.  Never do a prebooking meal in these bombardier jets even though travel time is 90 mins. There won't be any option to swap also, if it doesn't look good.

title: Got it for the best Price
text:
The only positive I can say about Spice jet is, I got the deal for a better price than other airlines. But the experience I have with this airline is not that great.
1. Legroom is very less, you feel congested after a while.
2. Flight didn't start on time.
3. There was a huge line near check-in counter but they just had 2 counters to manage at peak times.
4.

title: Genuinely the worst experience of our lives
text: Flight was delayed. Pre-paid in flight food was cold and not cooked properly. Air conditioning was broken and it was approximately 45 degrees. No apologies made. Seats are horrible and you stuck to them. An irritating theme tune is played for the duration of the flight. No space whatsoever to sit let alone sleep.

title: Only talk. No Service.
text: Traveled via Spice Jet from Delhi to Mumbai on 3rd December 2016. I was travelling with with my mother in law who is about 80 years old and has problem in ascending and descending. During checkin I requested for wheel chair assistance which the travel desk of Spice Jet promised. At first they said that wheel chair was not available. After some time the wheel chair arrived but now the poster who was to take the wheel chair was not available. When I talked to the Travel help, I was told to wait for some time. However, even after waiting for fifteen to twenty minutes when there was no response and the travel desk seemed to be non committal wrt the time frame, she was forced to walk.

title: Value For Money
text: It is a best low cost airlines which I have traveled with. The staff in the flight are very helpful and courteous. Will Love to travel again.

title: Ticketing policy of Airlines
text:
I had to make an urgent trip and made the ticket booking online around 5 pm the day before the flying day and was shocked at the fare of around Rs. 4000, for the onward journey and almost 3 times of about for the return flight on the same day. Due to the fact I had to make the trip, and convenient flight times 
of this particular Airline, l purchased the ticket.

However, on my way to the Airport I got the message of flight delay of over 2 hours. And on reaching the Airport counter I was told about further delay, however they were kind enough to offer full refund as the delay was over two hours and I was lucky to get a flight on AI, which incidentally was on time .

However my point is, when checking online at the Airport I was shocked to note the return fare has come down to the same as the onward journey! 

Whatever the policy being followed by the Airlines, i felt cheated and unfair to the traveller. I had paid around Rs.15,000/- where as I should have been charged only about Rs. 8,000/-

The Airlines and the Authorities should take serious view of the present ticket pricing policy of Airlines and maximum ticket price ceiling should be regulated and not allow Airlines to charge unreasonable and exorbitant price for a ticket.

To top it all, my return flight was also delayed and had to take an earlier flight, which the Airline allowed, thank God for small mercy's.

title: Fresh, Functional and Frugal
text: Efficient and punctual airlines. Reasonable fares. Flies across India to many small and large cities. Flight schedules and travel times are praiseworthy.

title: Great on time experience.
text:
I was returning in evening flight. It was also on time and almost full. 
Seats were comfortable, staff was nice and quick at their work. 
On time arrival and luggage recovery was also good. 
Great job. Keep it up.

title: Nice timely flight with good breakfast
text:
I had visited Hyderabad through this flight. It was fast checkin with nice services by ground staff. 
Flight departed on time and reached before time. Food during flight (prebooked) was good in taste

title: Best Service
text:
Best service and upselling skills offered by Mr.S.Bhaskar employee#111457.Mr.Bhaskar was very polite in his communication and also offered me to upgrade to first row with spacious leg room including food and beverage. It was indeed the best experience and looking forward to flying with Spice Jet.
Regards 
Chandra Shekharan Swamy

title: Best Check-In Service
text:
My first flight with Spice Jet and I had the best experience ever created starting right from the check-in counter(assisted by a very professional gentleman Mr. Amir Ansari employee#441823) he was very kind enough in offering options for my flight in terms of seat selection, helping attitude and more over a quick service.
Regards
Chandra Shekharan Swamy

title: Spicejet with spicy flavour
text: It was a trip for team building. Big plane, nice hospitality. Food served was also good. Comfortable experience.

title: They get the job done
text:
Flying in the Bombardier Q400 is an experience by itself. The staff is kind and on the job. The ground staff is courteous.
The flight's on time. Quite smooth take off and landing.

title: Average
text: Spicejet calls itself an economy carrier however tickets are almost at par with Jet or AI. The legroom in the aircraft is less and they do not even provide basic drinking water unless you pay extra for it. I would recommend paying a little more and taking AI or Jet.

title: So So
text: The passengers were called for boarding and were made to wait at the gate for a long time in Goa Airport, for whatever reasons best known to them. The flight arrival at Chennai was also delayed.

title: SpiceJet offers good fares but rewards program needs to improve
text:
SpiceJet offers cheap flights but the rewards program needs to improve. First of all, you have to have a reserve in the rewards program, meaning you have to fill cash into their wallet and redeem it against your bookings. Why not give the option of book by credit/debit cards? And Spice Club members don't get significant discounts, so what's the point in being a member.

Secondly, the crew don't smile even when smiled at. They are curt and noncommittal, though professional. The crew needs to smile more like in other airlines. Are they too much stressed? Is it the new trend, the new norm? I don't know.

title: India's Worst Domestic Airline - What a poor attitude!!!
text:
I had recently flown with them from Amritsar to Mumbai, as they are the only airline providing a direct connection. That's it. That is the only good thing. Rest all are bad.
Firstly the cabin was dirty.
Secondly the food they sell was not as per the preference. 
Thirdly crew members were looking like unhappy souls, no smile on their lips. (are not they getting their salary in time?)
Fourth, the extremely poor attitude. Seats near emergency exit were priced at Rs.1000 higher for having more leg space. Even though they are non-reclining. Even the hand rest was missing at the window side.
One tall fellow passenger who was finding it just to difficult to keep his legs within the available space, requested the air hostess if the vacant seat near the emergency exit can be given to him. He was refused saying those are premium seats and extra money has to be paid. First they cannot provide adequate leg space and then Rs.1000 was more important for them than helping a customer. With such poor attitude they cannot survive long. they are far behind the Jet Airways service levels and standards.
I strongly recommend not to use this airline, unless one gets a special offer or some routing advantage.

title: Total Exprience is Very Best with Spice Jet
text: Totally Very Good Experience after Travel with Spice-jet not Travel Regular only some time travel this flight nut after all Very Good Experience with Spice Jet ####Run India with Spice Jet

Spice-jet is Like to Red Rose and His Staff is Very Helpful in Red Dress and air hostess

title: Poor Flight
text: Very very poor flight i ever used. Staff was so rude in flight service also zero. I really never had that pathetic experience ever. Can't recommend to any one.

title: Travel at sun rise time
text: I went to Bangalore from Chennai with my family.Flight came from kolkata on time.Service and space provided for passenger is comfortable.At morning time It pass through more clouds and snow.Seat and food quality is good.Overall It is very good to travel by spicejet because of lower cost.

title: Money Money Money
text:
Pretty average flights, had loaded the flight time with plenty of buffer to give you false sense of arriving on time or before time.
What I didnt appreciate was the height of money mindedness. Right after you book, till the last possible point, they would want to sell you something or other. Buy leg room, extra luggage, food, pay for extra baggage, prebook your seat - even while web-checkin EVERY window and isle seat was paid, except possibly for last 2-3 rows. Very annoying experience!!!

title: Happy customer
text: Spicejet is value for money. Not only they give good service but the best thing about this airline is that they serve HOT TASTY food unlike other airlines. I appreciate the airlines that they are committed in serving best to passengers. Would love to recommend to my friends and family too. Thank you for making my day :)

title: Always delayed
text:
We had taken a Spicejet flight from Amritsar to Mumbai, since it is one of the few airlines to offer direct flight. Once the tickets were booked, it was terrible, we received flight schedule change every other day. The direct flight was made a via flight, so it was via New Delhi. Worse even the connecting flight was 2 hrs. late. We were to land in Mumbai at 2100 hrs. but ended up at 0100 hrs. 
Moreover, inspite of the flight delay they did not even serve us water, and they were out of food supply. It was a nightmare.

title: PUNCTUAL FLIGHT
text:

the first leg from Dehradun to Delhi was completed before time.
even the Delhi to Mumbai leg was completed on time.
the seats were comfortable and the service good.

title: FLYING CITY BUS
text:
Journey though short but was really uncomfortable. I feel that all flights know the exact ATR timings for all flights to take off and hence should adjust the Flight Boarding timings. We were boarded in flight and kept awaiting for at least 40-45 mins in the flight before take off. That was really uncomfortable as the Air-conditioning inside the plane was not 100% and that caused a suffocating feeling.

Further the seats and the space between two rows is disgusting. Having paid this high amount to travel we had a feeling of local city Bus travelling in the flight.

In fact having paid similar or lesser amount to my other destinations with JET and INDIGO Airways the Journey was more comfortable and especially seats and spacing between two rows were really comfortable and also to mention the Air-conditioning.

In future SPICE JET will be my last choice and that too in case of any emergency. There were few others too who found themselves uncomfortable and they may not write to you but surely they will not opt for SPICE JET anymore.
.

title: Mangalore-New Delhi

title: Complete Uncertainty
text: There is not certainty about routes in the airlines. title: NOT UPTO MARK
text: myself & my better half travelling from chennai to mumbai on 28 july 16 this flight late from chennai it self by more than 90 minutes so our connecting train from mumbai to vadodara v could not catch & v hv to live in mumbai nearby hotel & catch another flight next day morning this time not spice jet of course & reach vadodra nextday morning. usually this airline delay most of their flight & this time v were victim of same.always avoid this airline .

title: Beware excess baggage ripoff
text:
Flew two International flights to get to Delhi, my luggage weighed in at 25kgs on both airlines. I tried paying online for extra kgs to 25kgs 4000 rupees both ways, website would not accept international card. At the airport next day Spicejet's scales in Delhi weighed same bags at 33kgs, so another 500 rupees for the extra 5kgs on top, (very kindly let me off the 3kgs). I was told 500 rupees was a one off and would not pay coming back.
Dharamsala 2 weeks later back to Delhi scales come in again 33kgs, this time charged 8kgs excess, even though I tried to explain that I paid the 500 and that was a one off, the attendant would not relent. Insult to injury, this time the charge was 1400 rupees.
Flight to Bangkok the day after Air India, baggage 25kgs and four days later to Melbourne on Jetstar the same.
Its speaks loudly of a blatant wrought.
Flight it self was good both ways.

title: Spice at its best
text: SpiceJet, though low-cost carrier of India, but still maintains great International Standards. The crew was soft-spoken, quick in service, and above all, always smiling even when we had bad weather and turbulence, still they kept smiling and consoling us that everything is fine. Even in that bad weather, the Pilots landed the aircraft safely. I am really happy with their services

title: Rigid, Insensitive Service provider
text: Insensitive, Rigid service from SpiceJet. Their flights get delayed and they give many reasons and apologize for inconvenience. I was travelling with the family with 2 kids and was late by 10 min for check in and the rigid staff just kept arguing and didnt issue boarding pass. My flight was at 6:55 pm and i reached to the check in counter by 6:25 due to heavy traffic and fog in Delhi. The airline staff didnt allow to check in mentioning rules of check in requirement of 45 min prior to departure. If they were sensitive and considerate, they would have allowed us check in but they were not at all concerned about us. Their several flights were also delayed due to heavy fog but I doubt they will just say it is due to bad weather; then why not in my case where I was late by 10 min to check in and they didnt allow us board the flight..!!!

title: Enjoyed the flight
text: It was a great pleasure travelling by Spice Jet for my family trip.The crew members were cooperative.Flight was exactly on time at arrival and departure.value for money service.The crew didn't forget to greet my son whose birthday was falling in this week by giving him a greeting,Excellent guys keep it up.

title: No consideration for passengers
text:
I flew from New Delhi to Jammu on 01.11.16. I had purposely booked SpiceJet since it was supposed to be an early morning flight enabling me to attend to my chores in Jammu. However, nominal delays kept happening till I boarded the flight. After that, it was pure frustration. We kept on sitting in our seats with no signs of either the flight taking off or any announcement from the staff. The flight which was supposed to take off at 08:40 am finally took off at 10:15 am well past the time it was supposed to land in Jammu.
On top of that, more frustrating was the lack of any info coming from the flight attendants. They could have been apologetic & could have kept the passengers occupied with serving of some snacks, something to drink (juice/water), confectionery. However, there was none of that.
Really disappointing.

title: Good flight

title: worth the money.. no frills !!

No cumbersome middle seats and the legroom is much better than the ATR crafts of other airlines. Its a no frill airline. so what you pay is what you get.  That said,  i fly them most for the short flights within south India. of the 5 times i flew,  4 times, they were ahead of schedule for landing. But 1 time, it was delayed for 3.5 hrs at departure and no intimation was provided before 1 hr of the flight.  so i had to wait in the airport for 4 hours before flying. That was one annoying experience.

title: Comfy

title: Customer service has a new low!
text:
Pathetic service by ground staff at Chennai. Special mention of Mahesh - the shift manager. Me and my wife reached the check in counter well in time before scheduled departure and keeping the high security arrangements at Delhi in mind; we had minimized our hand luggage and tried and adjusted almost everything into our check in bags. When we reached the counter and our bags were weighed by the check in staff; we were told that there was an excess of 2 kgs that we needed to pay for. Now, having worked in the aviation industry myself for a good 6 years in a managerial capacity; I am a person well versed with aviation regulations and would never want to go against them. I am also aware of the repercussions of weight variations with regards to the safety and financial implications. We tried explaining it politely to the staff at the counter and then the manager Mahesh that it was only due to the high alert (we were flying when high alert was sounded across the Nation at major airports) that we had checked everything in and since we were not even carrying any hand bag; this small waiver may please be considered. However; the customer service skills had gone for a toss when we heard blunt and blatant NO and moreso; we were given the routine and mundane excuses of how the staff would have to bear the "LOSS!!!" if we refused to pay!!! We surely got upset with the behavior of the staff that was appalling and accepted to make the payments. Meanwhile; the check in counter staff had already asked us our seat preference and we happily requested him to give us a window and an aisle with the middle seat vacant if that was not asking for too much. Remember, we put in a preference as we were asked by the staff. Now, when it came to paying; the staff again asks us to move out and go and make the payments at the ticketing counter!! So, when I am gone to make the payments under protest; the staff is yet again rude and has the audacity to ask my wife to move out of the queue in order to make way for the other passengers who were "waiting??!!". And he goes on to mention that he would not release the boarding cards unless he sees the receipt for the INR 300 odd that I had gone to pay already and that he could see me doing so just across at their own ticketing counter. Now, does the airline think I would have run away without paying INR 300 when I have entrusted you with all my valuable luggage??!!! Pathetic! Now, after the check in and security and after the boarding was complete; we noticed after take off that at least three rows (18 seats) behind us were all absolutely vacant and in our row; the third seat was occupied by another passenger!! Here, please refer to my previous statement of how we were asked for a seat preference at the check in. Now, my question is why ask if you have already decided to punish the passenger just because you have an altercation with the passenger at the counter?! Upon arrival at Delhi; we had to wait for almost half an hour for our bags and this, I am assuming was because of our fault of checking in first!!! Overall, a pathetic experience of flying with Spicejet and never in my life am I going to fly with this airline again. Being a customer service professional myself and having conducted various mystery audits and soft skills training sessions for brands across the board; this essentially has stood out as one of the worst ever memories and is an indication of orientation towards making money at the cost of losing valued customers.
Furthermore; when we wrote to their customer service and even escalated the issue to their nodal officer; all we received were typical computer/robot - like responses and zero levels of understanding. The personal touch that should be existent was completely missing and till date we do not know if those who mailed us back were humans or computers as we did not even receive ONE phone call personalizing and empathizing with the entire issue.

title: Not so great.
text: Not so great airline except that it has the best fitted timings if you need to go to Ahmedabad. If you get a window seat, then you feel the most uncomfortable. Very minimal seat comfort for a person with 6 feet height. Have never taken breakfast on board so cannot comment on food quality.

title: Decent and ok
text: As this is a no frill airline nothing much was expected. The crew was good and seats were ok. Though the flight started late they managed to land on time.Overall it was a decent flight.

title: Incredible deception!
text:
27 Sept I missed my flight No 2192. At the airport I asked the spice jet  staff to find me a place on the next flight as I had to catch my international flight. They apologized as the flight I wanted to take is fully booked. They proposed that I wait till last moment may be someone would cancel or doesn't show. I waited around 2 hours and the concerned employee came with the good news: they found a seat for me. He accompanied me to another office to pay. I got the chock of my life as the price was almost 4 times the price I paid for my missed flight!. I had to pay 12530 rupees! I was told that prices went up last month and that I was luck to pay this amount!. 
At the check in they charged me 7100 rupees extra weight! They didn't even consider any discount as I didn't have any handbag which  passengers are allowed to carry!
I was on the plane and we took off. I went to wash my hand and I got the chock of my life: 15 seats were vacant! But to make more money they lied and they gave me a seat with extra legroom despite the fact that my original ticket was on economy! 
I was furious and when I arrived home I wrote a complaint  but I got no action taken regarding the deception and dishonesty of staff! 
I will never ever use spice jet again!
P.s. There is an excellent semi sleep bus which costs rupee 800 only!

title: good flying.....
text: Great flying. To and fro journeys' connecting flights are all on time. Flights are maintained very neat. Cabin crew also cool.....

title: Most pathetic airlines ever
text:
Dear All,
SpiceJet is most pathetic airlines you will travel with. Firstly they charge you Rs. 20000 for booking a connecting flight ticket 3 months before and then reschedule one flight such that you need to go into time machine to travel to your destination. When asked upon, their customer service executive says, we can't do anything in this and then forcefully reschedules the ticket without even taking the passengers consent. When you drop a email to them, they only ask for apologies and nothing else. 
I booked a flight from Dehradun to Varanasi via Delhi for 22nd Oct'16 in month of July'16. Dehradun to Delhi flight was supposed to depart at 12.40 and reach Delhi by 13.55 and then Delhi to Varanasi flight was suppose to depart at 18.15. These people preponed the Delhi to Varanasi flight by 6 hours and 15 mintues and it departed at 12.00. How can any one board this flight. On top of that airline was not ready to help at all. They were only giving lame excuses. 
 
PATHETIC COMPANY, WORTHLESS MANAGEMENT.

I'll never fly with SpiceJet and urge everyone to not fly with them. Spending extra Rs 1000 with other carrier is more wise than spending whole night at airport.

title: OK kind of airliner
text: Decent airliner with comfortable seats. There is nothing too special or bad about this airliner. Food is always available in any flight. Never got any issues with spicejet.

title: Marvelous Experience

title: An low-cost airline

title: Leg space for boeing 747 was terrible
text: Leg space for boeing 747 was terrible. They gave me last row seat, so i could not sit comfortably. Try to ignore this carrier

title: Worst flight experience i ever had
text:
What was supposed to be a 3 hour long night flight from banglore to delhi turned out to be nightmare. I was going home from banglore to nainital, i booked 12.10am flight from banglore to delhi, first the flight got delayed to 12.30am, at 12.30 it got delayed again till 1am, 1am they told that the flight which was supposed to go burst its tyre and they are arranging for a new tyre, they didn't even provided us with an estimated time and told us that it will be fixed when we get a tyre. We even told them that we have already booked out tickets for forward journey, and they replied that you can cancel the flight and take your money. The flight took off @4am, i had a train form delhi which i missed because of the flight.
I wont suggest taking their night flight and i wont be flying with them anytime soon

They didn‚Äôt serve hot beverage like tea as it was short flight and eating option there was only some paneer roll. Thankfully we had carried something to eat.

title: ON TIME ...EVERY TIME
text: This was my 12th flight and all the time it was ON time and ground personal at the airport are very friendly and helpful

title: Trip to Vizag
text: It was 3rd time I was traveling in a plane. The plane was bigger than the other 2 travels made by Air Costa. In Air Costa we had to buy everything except water. Spice Jet gave us water only. All the other things are twice the cost of outside which I didn't like. If you are traveling on Airplane that doesn't mean we need to shell out twice the amount from our pockets for little things also. I decided not to travel on domestic flights after this trip for overnight journeys(12 hours on train or bus). hope govt. keeps a tab on the prices.

title: Best leg room
text:
I have traveled to kochi to Delhi on 16 Oct 2016. The staff is very polite. The food quality is good, but the Leg room and sitting space impress me a lot. I have never seen such leg room in any domestic airline for economy class. The only bad thing about the airline is they charge you for all seats while e-check in even for center seats they charge you rs.100 where as in other it is completely free, on the same hand if I go to check-in counter they would not charge. In simple words for e-cheking they charge you.

Rest everything is good.

title: Subjected to undignified experience
text:
Here is the story. 

I booked 2 tickets for my relatives through Spicejet website from Chennai to Kochi(16Oct 10AM flight SG 3263). They are 2 middle aged women, one of them who is mentally challenged. I booked a seat close to the door, for their convenience paying Rs.200 extra. I got a call from Spicejet customer care, that as part of promotion, they are willing to upgrade the seat to "premium class"(front row) with Rs.300 more which otherwise would cost Rs.1800 extra. I fell for it and upgraded the ticket. Everything went smooth until the passengers boarded the flight and occupied the front row seats.

Soon after the airline personnel asked them to move to a seat further down 4 rows. Reason cited was that it was a mistake to allot these seats as they are "emergency seats", and they would not allow online booking of these seats again. After some arguments, my relatives had to occupy the seats pointed to them. Soon after, they could see some big shot honcho occupying the front row emergency seats from which our humble travelers were re-seated from.

Why does the SpiceJet airline allow its loyal passengers be subjected to this kind of humiliation. If it really was so much about emergency, why don't they allow the VIP to board the plane in ordinary seat("cattle class") instead. This is a prime example of VIP culture in India where the ordinary citizens suffer. Anyone in the airlines listening? Its not about the refund or the amount of inconvenience. Its about dignity. Airlines wanting to earn a few extra bucks at the cost of passenger dignity. Shame.

title: Good service from a budget Airline
text: Flying on a Budget airline, our expectations were low. We were presently surprised with the treatment. WE had booked the first row seats which in my opinion, on Spicejet are the best seats on the air. Meals were prebooked and service was with a smile, something which is  now absent on most airlines. The airhostesses haad enough time to take care of our needs, a rarity these days.

title: Spicejet Turboprop
text:
Got a spice jet flight thinking it was cheap (3050 Rs) until I checked in to connect to an international flight. India domestic rules are max of 15kg and I was 19kg. they wanted extra 750Rs (I think) to take my back on board to connecting international flight with 23kg limit.....  I said no and walked away but they followed me and asked me to come back but pay.

 I said No, I wasn't going to pay that much. In the end they put me on the flight (only passenger in the terminal, the rest were on the plane. 

They took me and a staff member of a bus (for the two of us) across the tarmac to the plane after I paid I think 300 or 400Rs. I felt the way India does ticket sales a then swamps you with extra for 'overweight' when their limit is 5 or more kg under the international limit is a joke. Most foreigners carry far more baggage than domestic passengers but they also allow people to carry on board what would clearly not fit the the western 7kg bag size and shape... It is a joke and clearly simply revenue gathering.  So be aware of it and pack accordingly if you are in India on domestic travel.
They weren't unhelpful in the end but I had to fight for the right to fly in the beginning.

title: can never trust SG to reach in time
text: Good at service , hostile and energetic flight purser the major concern is flight is never on time delayed during departure as well as during coming back to mumbai ...it really matters a lot when you are heading for business meet and this is the only first flight available

title: AMAZING_TIMELY ARRIVAL AND DEPARTURE
text: Overall Nice Experience. Regular updates by the Captain and the Crew to the passengers. Crew helpful, gentle. Flights schedule on time. Food was average.

title: A average flight expirience
text: Had an average experience. Once thing to be noted is that when I checked in online, I had to pay for any seat I choose. The pricing is Rs 250 or Rs 150 for window or aisle seats depending on position and Rs 99 for middle seats (this is a bit too much. Indigo don't charge for the normal middle seats). Spicemax is Rs 799 where you get more legroom.

title: can never trust to reach in time
text: Flight gets delayed by 4 hours,nobody is informed.People keep waiting anxiously only to know it is still not confirmed how much more time would it take.

title: Spicy enough
text: The airlines is good, but still needs to improve a lot and especially on their food products. Otherwise everything is pretty good.

title: Low leg space, carefree service
text:
SpiceJet planes have low leg space. Punctuality and other in-flight experiences are good. Food though payable, has always been warm and good. They would do good to warm the bread they serve as well. 

The airline's ground service crew however, needs a lesson in hospitality. I've always had bad service experiences. I've at least been asked twice to interchange check-in luggage and hand baggage because check-in was a little on the higher side while my hand baggage was way within limits. Priority check-in is not always available even at airports like Delhi.

title: 4 hours to Chennai from Doon, SG 103
text: Perhaps, this is the fastest flight to Chennai from Dehradun, through Delhi. You don't have to leave the aircraft in Delhi. That for sure is a huge plus point. The baggage handling and check-in at Dehradun was  chaotic. There is only one Veg lunch item on board for purchase ( INR .300). This was a big put-off.

title: The SpiceMax service is good when you are travelling with Infants.
text: I travelled on 27th Sep'16 with my wife and infatn daughter. I reached little late and the boarding was closed. But upon little pleading, they upgraded me to Spicemax Service (which cost 1K per seat) and let me check-in. I really loved the spicemax service, as it gives extra legroom (which comes in handy when you are traveling with infants). They also give Priority Check-in and Check-out service with complementary food and beverage. i like the flight and there service

title: Efficient pocket friendly flights
text: Very punctual. Food is payable for but tastes good. Staff is courteous n polite. However, the plane itself looks/feels old and seems to need to be replaced with new fleet.

title: Good flight -bad landing
text: The flight was in a turbo prop air-craft. Hardly 20 to 30 seats. The advantage of flying turbo -prop is that you fly at a lower level , so you can enjoy the view of hills,forest and water bodies which abound in this route. But I regret to say that my flight had a very rough landing at new Tirupati airport.

title: on time,hassle free journey
text: It was an excellent journey with spicejet,good value for money.fares are also very low compared to other airlines.

title: Horror
text:
One of the most pathetic flights to take. I've taken this same flight a few months back around June/July this year. The flight is of 6:35 AM and a great time to take a flight to reach Mumbai for a 9-10 AM meeting. That one was delayed for well over 2 hours due to "Tehcnical Reasons"

Now, i took this flight about a week back, i was so happy that the pushback and gates closed on time at around 6:25AM. Long taxi to the runway and after a 4-5 second thrust we slowed down again. 

Of course this was due to technical problems and safety is the most important aspect of flying, but there has to be something wrong in the way Spicejet maintains their aircrafts. 

I would not recommend anyone to board this. 

* If flying, make sure you take the Spice Assurance as an add on. In case of delays it compensates with a voucher of Rs 500/1000. Not that this helps, but for an additional Rs 49 it's not a big deal.

title: Red hot Spicy experience
text:
The Flight was very good with delicious menu on board.
Clean and well maintained flight with good entertainment on board.
friendly on board staff and good guest services.

title: EXCELLENTSERVICE MOSTLY ON TIME
text: Its an excellent trip for us the timely arrival and departure with excellent on board services.Really a Recommendable airlines!!!!!

title: Good !
text: I am a frequent flyer with Spicejet and I appreciate them mainly on one aspect. They were in time always

title: value for money
text:
A real value for money service... i was booked though MMT and got cheaper rate.
The flight was looking nice and service was good.

title: Flying with SpiceJet
text: The flight was pleasant and comfortable. It kept its promise and reached on time for the onward journey as well as the return bound. The food was excellent quality, and the menu had a good selection of items.

title: PUNCTUAL AND EFFICIENT
text: We booked the flight for 28 September and got the sms a night before to report 120 minutes before departure at 0925 hours. It was unnecessary panic as those who arrived just about 45 minutes earlier were able to board the flight. The flight took off and landed on time. The staff were courteous and efficient.

title: Getting there!!!!
text:
The flight was comfortable and on time. Good food served. Although you have to buy them. 

There were number of cabin crews but yet they struggled to manage the passengers. It seemed the crews need more training. 

Good value for money. I will definately recommend it to everyone.

title: Excellent when on Time
text:
A no frills airline, very convenient. The Timings that they have managed from Dubai - Pune and return are excellent, giving a person time to finish his day in either place and depart.

Spice Max is the obvious choice, more leg room, hot meals and seats upfront. Smiling staff, quite helpful.. The best is when they are ontime and in a few cases recently have been landed before time, which on a regular basis is commendable.

The downside if the departure time from Dubai.. 11.30.. Any delay messes you up as you reach at 5 AM and on a working day can be a disaster. Similarly when they are late from Pune, they can be horrendously late.. On the total trips so far, the hit rate of OTD has been 80%, which is extremely good.. 

Only tip: The seats are not comfy enough or cushioned enough.. So sitting for three hours can be a pain in the butt ofcourse... :)

title: SpiceJet.....
text:
I was travel by Spice Jet Airlines form Ahmedabad to Delhi for Business trip. I had not really read any reviews about them or their service but purely booked with them because of the lowest fares. During the period we traveled (Sep last week), Spice Jet offered the lowest prices among all other airlines. Also, I had known that it is one of the trusted names when it comes to domestic flying. Flight on time take off and over all nice experience.  
But as far as Cleanliness as concern flight is not clean so far. Must be improved

title: Spicejet has changed for the better
text:
Over the past 6 months Spicejet has really pulled up its socks.
The flights are on time the ground and aircrew are courteous.
Beats Indigo hollow.
Keep up the good work Spicejet!

title: Quite good airlines with great food at reasonable rates
text: I took a 'SPICEJET' flight 10 days ago from Vizag to Hyderabad even though I'm a regular with 'INDIGO' airlines. The price was good & service was also satisfying but the flight took off a little later than specified time ( which doesn't happen with INDIGO) . Food options are really good at reasonable prices! The leg space was average. If you are looking for a low cost airlines with good food service, then go for it.

title: Delayed to serve pre-book meal
text:
At the time of collecting the boarding passes the front desk executive insist us to avail the spicemax facilities, while denying the offer they provided the 16 D-F seat arrangement for us. Which are just the before seats of the emergency exit. Travelling with a Kid whose age is less than 3 years is very painful to travel with such seat arrangement.

The flight was just 60 min duration and we had pre-booked meal, as our seating arrangement was meddle of the cabin, they started to serve, rather I say that they started selling the food from front row and the crew was very late to reach us with food. Last of all, I knock the crew member to serve us the food, as we were travelling with a Kid and for delay serving of food we was not able to feed our kid during lunch hours. 

The cabin crew needs much more attentive for the families those are travelling with Kid or aged person.

title: Great Experience
text: I had been in BOMBARDIER Q400 flight which has a seating capacity of 78. It was a small and well maintained flight. We had reached our destination well in advance. The staff are very patient and answer to anything you ask. The best part is you can carry some eatables with you instead of spending a huge amount of money for food in the flight.

title: SpiceJet experience
text: I used SpiceJet airways during my travelling in India. I had no chance to choose the airlines, it was organized by the company. Flight was okay, me and my colleague were the only two guys onboard who had dinner during the flight. The main meal was so spicy that I was not able to eat it. Really SpiceJet!! :-D The rest of the menu was good. We flew onboard B737, obviously not new but no problem during the flight. Final evaluation - common airways, normal services, no problem.

title: Comfortable flight, good services, punctual
text: Good airline to fly with for short trips. Punctual in service, just a suggestion to make more on board snacks available on time

title: Cheap and very accessible overall good value for money
text: Cheaper than the train and very reliable we have used Spice jet on several occasions. There is an easy to use on line booking system. The only down size is that you get pestered with e-mails and offers. We live in the UK and none of these are relevant. Also we booked at the check in and again no hassle. with very friendly staff

title: A low-cost airline
text: SpiceJet is a low-cost airline headquartered in Gurgaon India...They serve Hot food with reasonable rates,..service is good with smile.. ontime Airline..Flight timiing is good .10/10

title: Excellent!
text:
On time performance is what a traveller looks at and that I experienced with Spice Jet.
Good Show and Good Luck.

title: spicejet experience
text: i came from Dubai to New delhi & after short break to kolkata on dt 27 sept,2016.. in spicejet flights, cabin crew are good , but there is no legroom ,no adequate push back of seats. no attention to passengers, only knows that how to earn profit against minimum investment.Disastrous.

title: Very punctual
text: I was really impressed by punctuality and staff courtesy. Flight information though sms was an added advantage.

title: Buy from McDonalds/KFC and Travel In SpiceJet
text: Best part is that you can buy eatable stuff from KFC or McDonalds or Bikaner from the Airport and you can take it along with you in the flight and have it. You can also carry packed peanuts or chips and enjoy them in flight. Instead of spending huge amount on food in the flight you can buy from airport and take it with you in the flight.

title: One of my worst experiences....
text: The flight was due for 11 AM... got delayed to 12:30 PM... was boarded at 1 PM... flew at 1:30 PM... reached at 2:45 PM... Now it's upto you to decide... My decision: will never ever fly by Spicejet, till I have some other options, however costly it may be...

title: airtravel in india
text:
Well maintained aircraft with good onflight experience.
usually on time and possible delays are explained.
vegeterian menu was good.
The staff are courteous, and helpful.
Wish they could slowly restore all their previous flight routes

title: Jet like a jet
text:
