I usually prefer flying with Spice jet as they are always on or before time, their food service and hospitality is really great. 

Most of the time I book a pre-meal while booking my flight as it seems a bit cheap than buying in mid air. Also when you book a meal with your ticket they serve you on priority before serving rest of the passengers.

The steward and hostesses are quite polite and help you in every possible way. They also take special care of old people and people flying with babies.

But the best thing about them is on time boarding and arrival. There might be cases of delay but every time I flew with Spice I arrived a little early and so they won me to always opt for their service.

title: On Time
text: Spice jet is improved a lot. Its on schedule now. And hassle free check in. Excellent support from the air crew.

title: Good Flight and Airline
text:
Was a good flight. Started little late,but reached before time.
No complaints. Staff was good and no issues at all.

title: It has always been a good experience flying with Spicejet.
text: We traveled on 2nd. July 2016 from Amritsar to Chennai via Mumbai. It was a family tour from Pakistan to India to see our relatives in Chennai & Vaniyambadi. We crossed Border by foot on the same day and got this flight which was booked earlier through Make my trip. It was my third or fourth experience using the same Airline for domestic traveling in India. The flight was on time and onboard experience was good like all the previous traveling experiences. Spicejet is providing good services to its Clients.

title: Good enough
text: This is my regular route and I have had experience with multiple airlines. We started late and reached late. Not so happy with the seats and they are not as comfortable as indigo. So 4 stars

title: a very happy journey
text: There is no direct flight from Hyderabad to Colombo. We did some research and found that the spice jet flight via Madurai was the fastest because of only one hour stopover in Madurai.Originally we were worried that the time may not be sufficient for customs and immigration. But the booking clerk in their office at Begumpet airport said that their staff in Madurai will help us. Her statement proved to be true.Both on onward and return flights the Spicejet staff helped us fully. I also add the point that the same aeroplane flies from Hyderabad to Madurai and from Madurai to Colombo. so the question of missing the connecting fight does not arise at all.

title: Excellent Hospitality and Punchuality
text: I had been to Hyderabad with my family for admission of my daughter. While travelling first time in Spice Jet I have experienced that they are maintaining excellent neat and cleanliness inside the flight, sitting arrangement is excellent as well as hospitality shown by the Air hostess inside the flight is excellent and at last but not least maintaining punctuality in arrival as well as in departure of flight.

title: amaging for first time
text: wonderful travel for first time and everything feel good experience in flight also we are very enjoyed lot

title: Worse
text: The waste of money , waste of time , altogether SPICE JET. Have few experience with this flight about time, they fly either by late or reach by late. Not at all timing. Once had bad experience , they revised the flight chart without knowing me, I have took ticket one month before . When I came for flight they told , the flight has gone , its rescheduled and we have informed by text message , I didn't even a got a message ! What a billshit. They should have call and inform the customer instead of messaging ! And didn't have refund and didn't change the ticket to next flight ! I have given complaint ! Poor flight service

title: Back to the UAE
text: We actually flow from Dubai to Delhi to Ahmedabad and now this was our last leg back to Dubai. Everything was fine. We asked for two adjacent seats and with a little hesitation the same were given.

title: Way to Ahmedabad from Delhi
text: Excellent service. Only problem was we four were given for seats in four different corners. The check in counter lady said if we pay Rs.2,000 she can give us four seats together. Amazing...................

title: Holiday to Delhi and Ahmedabad
text: Had a nice budget flight. Can purchase food in flight, which is reasonably priced. Crew is smiling and cheerful.

title: Average Performance
text: Flying with spicejet was nit very good experience. they need to upgrade themselves to compete with competitors

title: Nice flight
text:
Excellent flight. with just over 30 minutes stopover at Chennai this was a good flight for us. I had taken Spicemax which was worth its price as I had kids and needed space. the only problem is the space on the 3 left side seats at the first row. they do not offer as much space the right hand side ones give. crew was warm and friendly. I really liked the concept of Upyoga in the air and could sense the frustration of crew members when so few passengers were even watching them. The management should think of something innovative for adoption of this initiative which is indeed a wonderful one.

on the food side had opted for Diabetic meal for my father and veg for us and am happy what came to us. Food was really hot and tasty. 

Finally Madurai airport doesn't have the priority boarding and I fail to understand why? Overall good experience and worth a travel.

title: Improved
text:
This time I am impressed with SpiceJet, unlike few other times I have flown in the same sector or reverse.

The floor was clean, and so were the seat pockets (it weren't a year ago), except for the blocked sink in the lavatory, rest were all fine.

The inflight magazine also covered interesting stories and the crew were friendly.

The only change I would like to see is in the uniform the crew wears, the top looks like it is of poor material, and the jeans on the bottom is a big NO

title: Goodone
text: Very good flight. Reached destination on time . Out side airline service is good. Take off is smooth....

title: Does Its Job very Well !
text:
Low Cost , 3 Flights timings Per day to choose from and on time . For short route domestic flight what more can we expect ?

Less leg room , Never opt for a Wing seat , The flight vibration is a bit high and even an hour flight would be a bit irritating, If not fly with cotton plug.

title: Worst  flying  experience
text: The flight was delayed by 45 min. The seats are too small . You  cannot  even move  .Cramped leg space although  I  was in the 1st row. The cabin staff is most discourteous. Shall never travel by spicejet come what may.

title: It was a jet plane with just few peoples. we reached our destination 10 mins before sheduled time.
text: as this was a jet plane so we disappointed to see the size of the plane. i suffered from air sickness and their staff was so co-operative .  we have reached our destination 10 minutes before scheduled arrival, that is the plus point.

title: Delayed
text: I booked my flight ticket, 10 days before my journey,when i went to airport, spice jet person told me, the flight is delayed by 5hrs, worst service, they never care about the passenger, when i raised my voice another spice jet person came and arranged another flight, i never recommend to travel in spicejet flights...

title: Good budget airline
text: Decent budget airline. Interaction with them through call center and check in was good. They respond to you quite well. They try to sell additional services through call, msg and emails, sometimes that irritates. Seat is very congested unless you upgrade it to Spice max. There was a delay in getting the baggage (More than 20 mins).

title: Good airlines, from all local indian airlines on international sector, i prefer spicejet
text: with airlines having appointed western or international experienced flight supervisor on board, the service of staff have improving to international standards. most indian airlines have poor wine or drinks menu (even though its paid) and no idea of how to serve their whiskies and wines. only with spice jet i have experienced some better knowledge. though most of these sectors are shorter, i do love to try other services being in service sector myself.

title: Don't go by SpiceJet ever
text: What a bad experience...plane was in such a bad condition feels like sitting in Punjab roadways...worst leg space...and for sure low budget pilots r on board who really don't know how to fly.....worst take off and landing....all the passengers were frightened....guys do think 10 times before flying with SpiceJet....better go with Indigo/air India or jet airways.... Would request this airline to stop playing with people's life....and get atleast some trained pilots....

title: good service
text: Traveled from Delhi to Bangalore. flight was on time and even reached Bangalore 15 min before the actual arrival time. initially little bit worried about the delay in the fight schedules, but for me on that day , the flight was on time. staff are very attentive and taking care of passengers very well.

title: You should improve ambience, in-flight cleanliness
text:
We are a family travelling to Kochi; kids around and we noted it that all the seats in both the rows had so much dirt and not yet cleaned too. 
When we opened the lid for dishes we found all previous passenger eatables; the seats were too congested too.

Didn't expect a uncleaned journey, and in-flight experience.

title: Return from the mini vacation
text: The flight was on time and onboard experience was good. The food was average and the service was good enough. The seats were not so comfortable. The leg space was so small. The overall experience was average.

title: Relaxing time
text: The flight was fine. The seats were bit conjusted. The food was very tasty. In Flight  service was also good enough. Flight was on time. Leg space was not enough to rest your legs properly. Pre board experience was good.

title: A Total Ripoff through excess baggage charges for international passengers
text: I was travelling from New York to Tuticorin and booked spicejet from Chennai to Tuticorin sector...While checking in my luggages at Chennai and Tuticorin (return), I had to pay extra INR 300 per kg... they did not consider that I am a international passenger and carry luggage per standard international luggage policy...They said they can wave the fee only if I fly by spicejet.. I asked whether they have spicejet to New York...the answer is no...then no reason to apply their luggage policy on the international passenger where they cannot fly... As per doctor advice I had to carry a medical equipment (CPAP) with me as a cabin baggage, they put the equipment on the weigh machine and charged extra for that...money monsters!!! never listen to customers!!! never again!!!

title: Short Trip to Dehradun
text: We rode a quick 30 minute flight to Dehra Dun from Delhi. It was quick and painless.  No food or beverage is offered for free but you can buy snacks and soda's.  They do not serve alcohol on domestic flights.  Nothing fancy.

title: Spice Jet - Not a pleasant experience
text:
I travelled by Spice Jet from kochi.The boarding was supposed to be at 1825 hrs but the flight itself was late and arrived at 1900hrs.
The staff announced that priority passengers and Passengers with infants and kids board first. 
Staff should have managed the orderly boarding of passengers more efficiently.(when they announce priority passengers and passengers with kids to board first,they should allow the passengers with kids to board first,rather than asking them to wait in the general line).
In the aircraft my 5 year old had tough time putting on the seat belt.
the airplane was probably an old one. Food available in the flight was ok.

it is flight meant for budget travel and spice jet should probably look at better managing passenger experience for repeat customer business.

title: Ok Airline
text: This was my first time experience flying SpiceJet and it was an OK experience for me. The staff was not as helpful as other airlines and seemed semi professional. Also, the cabin crew should be better at controlling loud passengers.

title: A good flight but take care of being on time
text: I have traveled so many times in Spice jet. Overall flight experience is good, Staff is caring paid food available and good.Flight is having Bombardier aircraft which is very good. On time is a major issue for spice jet.Cabin crew and in flight experience was very good.Boarding and baggage claim was also good.overall good experience .They just need to take care of being on time.

title: My first flight experience
text:
This airline became infamous for various reasons in between - however I can tell you that it has improved a lot. If you enter the flights now, you can get a fresh and positive vibe - the management is probably trying a lot to ensure they get their reputation back.

They do not serve any meals free of cost - you need to buy if you want to eat something.

One problem still there for spicejet - cancellation of flights which can land you up in trouble, I guess they should try to make this minimal.

title: Not flying with them again
text: to start with they did not allow to check in online, then on the airport we request for one aisle seat however the guys could not hear it and gave two middle seats. not sure what was going in his head however how do you expect a couple to travel in two middle seats.. finally managed to change it in flight however air hostess are at best indifferent they dont even respond to a basic good morning. in the end seats have no leg room. I am not very tall however still struggled through out the flight to place my feat properly.

title: Never fly with Tham again
text:
I had the worst flight experience with spicejet
I highly recommend you to read my email to spicejet I know it is long but I really right it for you to know
The email as follows:

I want to tell you a story about my worst flight experience

On the 28th Augost I missed my flight from Delhi to Port Blair,

Missing ¬†the Flight was myown fault .

However it has apeared that since then you would not do ENYTHING to halp your costumers:

First we had to buy the full ticket again, even though we missed only the First section from Delhi to Kolkata. Athough ¬†went on the same flight from Kolkata to Port Blair as our first order, what led ,if you are still following, to the absurd fact that we bought tickets to a flight which we already had sits on, (Who needs logic)¬†

I wish it would end by that.¬†

but you had your plans, so we bought the new tickets but something weird happened; your representative in Delhi's airport said she does have two tickets for us for the next flight however for different prices (one was about 22000 Rupees and the other one was about 23000 Rupees) we figured there will be at list a difference for the more expensive ticket, maybe a meal or maybe just a good seat. As you can guess we were refuted.¬†

So far it's OK if you love money so much who are we to stop you from getting it, after all we were just two stressed and afraid costumers who wish to get to their destination, who wouldn't take advantage of those two.

At ¬†this point a dim light at the bottom of my empty pocket appeared:

Your representative told us to make a phone call to the number on the wall behind her and ask for a tax refund for our missed flight.¬†

Here I will skip ahead a little bit, we landed at Port Blair and were about to start our vacation in Andaman Islands. We tried to call however a surprise reviled a voice mail answered us saying: "This number doesn't exist", we tried the two numbers on the flight ticket but again "This number doesn't exist" we tried from another phone and one day after, still no answer.

A big airways company and there is no way to contact!

After a little bit more than a week we called and got the long awaited answer,

We asked for the refund and yet another obstacle was raised,

the refund goes to the agency we bought the tickets from, a small agency office in Manali got our refund, "Can't I give you my bank account details and you will send it to me" I asked your representative, "No" was the answer "you look for their number on line and call them".

I went on an errend on the internet to find the small agency we bought the tickets from but as I said before "small agency"

So I don't know if I will ever see my money again, but you can be surely certain of one thing: I will never fly again with Spicejet and I will tell this story to anyone who think about flying with you and post whereever i can because as i said before it is my responsibility¬†

¬†

Good bye

title: Budget travel ; half good half bad
text: To start with, the flight was delayed by 25 minutes because of which I missed my train. I had paid for priority luggage but the guy at counter failed to notice it and sent my luggage.It dawned to me after a while that he didn't put any priority tag and I went back to him and showed him my ticket n priority luggage.Then he did promptly call up the guys inside and at arrival I did get my luggage out first. Although because of the delay I still missed my train. The service provided in flight was good. Staff are helpful. Seats are comfortable with sufficient legroom. Although the front half window and aisle seats are given at extra price as is the case with all budget airlines nowadays.

title: Good experience
text: Took the flight from Hyderabad to Bangalore on the 14th. Spice Jet has regained its reputation for timeliness and reliability. Food fare is better than Indigo and that is a big plus when making a choice. Booking ahead of flight also is at a discount on on-flight prices.

title: Budget Airline
text: its a good option if you are looking for a domestic travel in India. Budget airline but not so comfortable journey. I would prefer other airline if i get any option in the same price.

title: Good service
text: I flew from Dubai to Kochi on a daytime flight which they have changed timings now. Service  is Ok and food and beverages have to be bought.( I think so.) It kept scheduled time for dep and arrival.

title: Budget Travel
text: My First Flight with Spicejet .. Reached the Destination  before the Estimated time i.e within 45 mins .But 30 mins was wasted for baggage collection @Airport.. Anyways In Flight Service was well above expectations .

title: Good experience
text: My first experience was with SpiceJet and it was really good experience. It landed before the scheduled time. Overall experience with this flight is good

title: Not up to the mark in anyway
text: SpiceJet Airlines was something I have been avoiding for a while and after a lot of thought with no choice ended up taking this flight. I was not at all impressed for the price that I paid for this airline. The staff seems to always be in a hurry to make announcements. The announcements seems to not have evolved over time and is quiet boring per say rather than grabbing the passengers attention. They boast about the new menu on board which I feel has been prepared without a lot of thought into it. They serve biryani on board and the packaging makes it even more of a messy affair to eat. The food on board is quiet expensive as compared to the other competing airlines. At the airport, the check in staff is all over the place and there has not been a single time when I have seen them smoothly operating the check in process of passengers. I definitely do not recommend this airline but if you dont have a choice then you dont have a choice.

title: comfortable and economical
text:
On time Every time is what they say and they reached ahead of time which was really wonderful
low cost but comfortable,

title: Poor Journey Experience
text:
I had a terrible experience flying in SpiceJet SG084,the size of the seats are pretty congested and for a person like me who has some height the leg space was pretty bad even if I had opted to seat near the emergency doors,I have travelled in Indigo,Kingfisher Air Asia,everywhere you will find the Leg space near the emergency door is good but out here it was very bad. Moreover the flight Airhostess were not well dressed and the seats were not clean.

I would recommend not to travel in Spice Jet as long as you do not have any other option

title: VERY GOOD,BUT...
text: In my opinion after Indigo and Jet Airways, Spice Jet is the third best airline in India where domestic travel is concerned.At times they are able to offer a much better fare than many of the other domestic airlines,including the 2 described above.Their ticketing service section, however, needs to be managed a bit more professionally.

title: improved a lot..................
text: very nice experience fro a low cost carrier, the flight was on time to and fro the journey, crew was helpful, and menu choices were just great.

title: Never choose this!
text: The SpiceJets flights are too congested to travel. Please give it a miss if you have another option. The back seats are not worth taking. You cannot push your seats behind and the people sitting before you can do so. Their seats are millimeters away from your face. It feels like you are in a very congested local train travelling in mid-air. The services are more or less same for every airline in the Economy class.

title: Budget travel - Not so comfortable.
text: The bombardier flight from Visakhapatnam to Chennai was very congested. It makes a lot of noise. Not so good flight. I got headache after travelling in this flight.

title: Small plane. On time service. Courteous staff.
text: Small plane. On time service. Courteous staff. Had to buy meal, but price was not bad. wide selection.

title: Professional service, before time arrival
text:
I was traveling to Chennai on Business & boarded SG 626 (CCU to MAA) on a clear afternoon. I had opted for SpiceMax seat select & got a preferred seat on first row. The summary of the flight goes like:

Good:
- On time departure
- Before time arrival (awesome)
- Professional service on board
- Food quality was "ok" (nothing great though)

Bad:
- Flight appeared lacking some basic maintenance w.r.t. interiors
- Seats/interiors could have been through a round of cleansing

title: TERRIBLE FLYING EXPERIENCE
text: I was very disappointed with the class this flight belongs to as people beside my seat was having homemade food scattered and was very untidy.The air hostess was a little impolite and did not smile even once.Seats leather was dirty and torn as if rats are also flying with the passengers.Would like to see the airconditioning being improved in future too.

title: Great value for money and affordable in very low cost if you book early.
text: Great value for money and affordable in very low cost if you book early. We went to Coimbatore with a well planned date and returned to Hyderabad via Cochin in the same carrier

title: Best meal options inflight for domestic sector
text: Spicejet has evolved quite a lot in terms of their customer experience from the last time I've flown with them. 2 great initiatives worth mention are the "Hot Meals" and "SpiceMax". Found the SpiceMax package/bundle real amazing value for money and the menu options in Hot Meals took me for a real surprise. Never expected such an elaborate menu on a domestic flight and even the food that was served turned out to be true to the promise. Any day better than the cup noodles and ready to eat packages you receive in other budget airlines!!

title: Low priced tickets but pathetic management
text: Management is pathetic. When we entered no air conditioner was working and the flight got delayed for 1 hour and still there was no AC. Disheartened.

title: Good
text: Good value for money if you book in advance, meals on payment, I think they should give complimentary cold/ hot drink at least.

title: Not seen a Professionalism to a staff
text:
Normally I travel with Indigo and Jet Airways, but this time, I tried with Spicejet.
Feel Not much happy as compared with mentioned two airlines.

title: Chennai to Bangkok spicejet
text: Took the Chennai to Bangkok spicejet last week. Impressed by the way the three young hostesses handled things during the flight. They were always smiling and wore a pleasant face all through the flights duration. There were lot of young male passengers and were some unreasonable requests for food and beverage. But these girls handled them very professionally with a smile all the time. I've not noticed this kind of attitude with economy flights. Many times i have seen frustrated hostesses on Airasia or giving a rude look when asked for a facility. I didnt see any passenger dissatisfied with the service and everytime they interacted with the inflight crew they were left with a smiling face. This is the first time I take an internation flight on Spicejet and it was a very welcoming experience!

title: After a long time - in a propeller driven aircraft.
text:
It was in 1970 when I had flown in a propeller driven aircraft - which was it ? Caravelle,
Yes, Google Baba confirmed it. This was a Bombadier - 78 seater - 2 x 2 - tiny - the first impression - looked like a ST bus!! 
Non eventual flight - in time - arrived before time.

title: Cheap Ticket But no Management & Care
text: In a year every month this airline give wrong promises to the flyer by misleading advertisements about cheap tickets but when we visit it is not so. Plus pricing is mostly confusing to people. This Airline will charge for extra baggage over and above a miserly 15kg allowance, they will charge for a window or AISLE seat, for food etc. and you will not get any legroom at all. Poor condition flight with uncomfortable seat and look like never cleaned from many days. The Pay food is very costly & terrible. No personal attention & care to any flyer. (Sr. citizen or Handicap). I seen that many times Flights are not maintained well and travel mostly on non peak hours. So many times flights are cancelled & not ON TIME (no any punctuality seen in this flight). I feet very much uncomfortable with this airline when flight was cancelled and running late.

title: SpiceJet has got better
text: Earlier when i travelled in spicejet i had not experienced a better quality of service but looks like they have improved a lot over a period of time.

title: Good being cheap
text: Good being cheap. Arrived way ahead of scheduled time. Ok service as everything is paid including seat allocation, food. Only a cup of water is free.

title: Spicejet- Changing my ratings after last weeks travel
text:
After my previous experience of missing push back buttons. I was in for a surprise this time around. Well maintained aircrafts greet you at the airport. Inside the aircraft i was amazed on seeing the new casual dress for the cabin crew. Its chic and modern. Good thinking by spice jet team. 

What stole my heart this time around was the NAMASTE (gratitude) offered by Cabin crew at the end of the flight for flying with Spicejet.

I am a foodie and I guess I will travel more by spice jet to try their new and improved menu.

I guess the new approach will take them to newer heights and certainly to more new places.

Thanks for the better Ride this time.

title: They keep cancelling flights
text:
They keep cancelling the flights which the passengers are informed of around 48-96 hrs prior departure. Though they refund in full but booking another flight around 96 hours before departure costs much more.

Also the flight in use is a Turboprop aeroplane which makes a lot of noise. The noise is so much that even after landing your ears need one hour to become normal.

No hot beverages are allowed / provided on the plane.

title: excellent value
text:
I was not sure what to expect with Spice, as the flight was so cheap!  When I booked on line it also gave me the facility to add the VIP lounge for 500 IND Rupees... as this is barely ¬£6.00 I thought why not, not really expecting much!  Well, I highly recommend this option.  There was a free buffet, and chefs cooking to order, tea and coffee and soft drinks all included.  With free wi-fi.  I was very impressed.
Checking in was no problem.  I had a few hours, as I had travelled from the UK, but they checked me in anyway.  They were really friendly and helpful.  I was over the weight limit, and suggested I took some stuff out of my bag, but I paid for it, as it was only 200 rups. 
The flight itself was fine.  Not too full, and we took off on time, arrived in time, both ways.  
I had heard rumours that they were not very good.  I found nothing wrong.  And much cheaper than the other airlines.

title: Good Service
text: Well, Spice Jet is low cost serving airline and this one I preferred since long time. I have never felt any issues on this flight and reached on time to Kochi. Staff is helpful either. Just that on Flight food and beverages cost is little high.

title: Wonderful flight but bad service
text:
Spicejet was a wonderful experience for me. Their flights were great. The cabin crew were really awesome. I enjoyed flying with them. I just didn't like their ground crew and their telephone service because of their pathetic service. We went on a trip to Andaman and we took Spicejet. It was a pleasant experience while going to Port Blair. While returning, the flight was rescheduled. It was rescheduled for the next day. We got the information just an hour before the flight. Lucky, we did not vacate the hotel by then. So, we extended. When I called their customer service, they were very rude when I questioned about the schedule and why is this a last minute information. When inquired about the stay options or arranging a ticket in another flight, the rep said "either you travel the next day or you can cancel the ticket and take a refund for the money paid". I booked the tickets well ahead for cheaper rates and the current rate on that particular day was triple the rate that I booked in any airlines. This really irritated me. I spent another 4000 INR to stay there for a day to catch the flight the next day.

While entering the Port Blair airport, the security personnel did not agree to look into the mobile and they definitely needed a printout. Without any options and without any internet or computer centers nearby, we went to the spicejet counters asking if they could print the tickets for us. They charged 100 INR for each ticket. That too, without a receipt. From that day, we stopped using SpiceJet and switched to Jet Airways which is an awesome experience till now.

title: Wont feel to travel again
text:
Wont feel to travel again with spiCejet
No cleaning in flight
Cold food in flight
Air hostesses were fine
2 star only for being before time arrival

Staff are fine... Always a bus to take you to flight

title: flight to pune
text: Air craft has came late from Mumbai, when we boarded the plane, AC was down due to auxiliary supply unit was down and it was not repaired. all passengers were sweating. Crew were helpless, aircraft commander was apology frequently.

title: Good customer care during their bad times
text:
I traveled with Spicejet a couple of time due to their low cost compared to other airlines in 2013-2015. During December 2014 I was booked on a flight from BLR TO VTZ. During their crisis state most of their flights were cancelled. Spice was good enough to keep me updated and book me on their available flight from BLR TO CHENNAI AND Chennai to VTZ or opt for a full refund.
I had to choose the connection flight as the other flights were costly as travel was a few days away, Though the flight was late by about 2 hours they rescheduling me free of cost helped me not spend a lot of money on the new ticket

title: Bangalore to Rajahmundry VIA Hyderabad
text:
My flight was in the morning from Bangalore to Hyderabad with a connection to Rajahmundry. Things till the checkin were smooth. Now comes the announcement that the flight to Hyderabad was delayed by about an hour. This not a great issue for me as i had a connection flight with 3 hours wait time and this will just help me kill some time. Reached Hyderabad with about 45min delay. Now I go the gate and wait for my next flight.

Just about an hour left for my flight and still see no one from spicejet at the gate. After searching I find some guy from Spicejet who on enquiring tells me that the flight was delayed by 4 hours. They guys havent even informed and not even bothered to arrange something for the wait time.

title: Aista Tournament
text: Small plane with huge noice to travel. seat are comfort then Jet Airways. food is chargeable.hospitality is good.

title: Getting more comfortable and more dependable - Spicejet
text:
It was after long time I selected to fly Spicejet. This time it was to Leh Via New Delhi from Bengaluru. 
I Must say Spicejet has really developed them self from a less preferred airline to a Dependable airline. 
In flight service and check in, everything has improvd a lot.
Wuld love to travle often hemceforth

title: Misleading Advertising
text: In a year every month this airline promises wrong and misleading advertisements about cheap tickets but when we visit it is not so, further flights are not maintained well and travel mostly on non peak hours. Plus pricing is mostly confusing

title: Bad experience
text:
there was some medical emergency and we booked the spice jet flight from pune to delhi (SG-184) for date 01-sep-2016 .
my wife and my daughter (1 year old) was reached there before 35 minutes to actual take off time (4pm). 
she request them but they refused her request , she cried in-front of them they didn't show any humanity and started laughing on my wife and daughter .
she felt sorry for not reached before 45 minutes as per airlines rules , but they didn't respond and started laughing on her .

when airlines will late then they easily announce that flight is such time late but when a human being in emergency was late they showed no responsibility.

So,shame on your airlines and your staff ,who does not respond to human values .

title: Spice Jet Airlines where senior employee is king and premier class customer is thash
text:
We flew on Spice Jet service SG 254 on 27\8\16 in first row  which has premier class seats.The aircraft was clean and descent and our check in and boarding experience was OK.
However, we had a shocking experience during serving of in flight meals.In order to avoid telling the dozing Spice Jet captain occupying seat on my left to mind his forearm to enable me to take my tray out from the arm rest, she disturbed the passenger on my right by taking out her tray, though the passenger had already declared that she did not want food to be served at that point of time. The flight attendant had indicated to me that i should keep my food items on the tray  meant for passenger on my right and eat from there.
Still more shocking was the explanation given by senior flight attendant who said that the flight attendant's action was perfectly justifiable as the passenger travelling on my left was captain in their airlines.
E mail to the company on their official contact address meant for their customer remained unanswered for more than five days.
In the days of fierce competition for acquiring passenger loyalty, Spice Jet has demonstrated that as far as they are concerned, senior staff is the king and paying premier class customer is a trash.

title: very interesting.. gr8 xperience
text:
very interesting.. gr8 xperience
had multiple flight within india as well as on returning back to delhi via kolkata

title: Economy Travel(?)
text: Travelled in SpiceJet from Chennai to Delhi. On time departure and ontime arrival to delhi. Seats are so congested and there is very less leg space. Food is good. It was heavy rains in delhi, but we had smooth landing in delhi. Its quite surprising, why pilot didn't  speak anything in the entire journey.

title: Such a pleasant surprise this time.
text:
Flew SpiceJet after years since I wasn't overtly thrilled with my past experiences mainly involving the cleanliness and maintenance of the aircraft. This time, flew the BOM-ATQ-BOM (I think SG is the only airline that does a direct flight to Amritsar from Mumbai) sector and I must say that I was pleasantly surprised with how the airline seems to have made a turn for the better. Service on ground was fine, the lady at the counter in both BOM & ATQ did greet us with a smile. Since we were a family of 5, we opted for the web check in, which charges a fee but I'd say it's worth it, especially if you want to be seated together.  The flight attendants did their jobs very well, with a smile. I really like their casual weekend uniforms, they give such a lovely pop of colour. The menu seemed pretty vast, although it stated that you'd need to pre-book certain meals if you wish to partake of them. Aircraft out of BOM (names Sumac) was a newer B737-800, very clean and well maintained. Aircraft on the way back (named Nigella) was an aging 737-800, however it was fairly ok in terms on cleanliness. Seats are what you'd expect on an LCC, we were blessed to have some kind pax in front of us who didnt recline their seats onto our noses.
Overall a surprisingly good experience. I wont hesitate to fly with Spicejet again in the future.

title: Full marks for that excellent turnaround
text:
For sheer resilience and brilliant eye candy, this is the flight to pick. The crew does not pretend to be extra sweet. They are. But pre-book your food. There are no free lunches here. If you are above 5'8" blame yourself. or buy that damned seat with a whee bit more leg space.
Aside, the best pilots of the bombardiers here.

title: Spicy Air
text: Excellent airlines and service quality is very good. Always offer cheap fair but never offer foods. For foods you have to pay additional amount.

title: The best airlines of all times
text: The best airlines i  ever flew with the crew members including the Pilots are very polite and humbly. Being an aviation enthusiast i can say that the take off and landing done was very soft.You can hardly realize that you are one the ground

title: Memorable experience this time
text: This time very good experience with spicejet. We pay extra INR.1000/- for spice max for both pax and for both sector. In spice max they provided priority check in, check out, extra leg room seats, even meal also. After meal, we asked for coffee, they provided without any charge.

title: flight delayed
text: Flight was delayed so little bit disappointment. Spice jet you get good leg space and food is good and tasty than other air lines.

title: Budget Plane with comfortable service
text: The travel is good and the crew are very supportive in managing and providing the services. Almost on time without any delay

title: Sad experience: Low cost but vvv low on service
text: I had booked 4 tickets on SpiceJet (to & Fro) for our family vacation. The experience of ground staff at checkin counters, boarding staff at gate and then in flight staff - all was pathetic. They have just basics in place with no lessons on service of customers or handling their queries. The in flight service was sad as the staff did NOTHING AT ALL to help any passenger except sell F&B...they would not resolve any queries or arguments that passengers were getting into between themselves. Sadly the people too ...some of their first time flyers were too clumsy and ill-behaved. Hope I do not have to fly Spice jet ever again

title: Not highly recommended
text:
Spicejet is not a airline that i would recommend. They have ways to earn money for everything. They provide flight at reduced pricing but then charge you for check-in baggage. 

The costing for additional baggage is also expensive. The staff are not friendly, but they are not rude either. No in flight entertainment. The food is average for the price paid.

title: Nice Experience
text: Had a smooth check in. Though the departure was a little late, they landed ahead of the arrival time. An ever smiling crew. As of now had a nice experience with Spice Jet.

title: Missing Push Back bottons
text:
I am an ardent fan of Spicejet, with the way it has made its recovery from troubled times. The new logo and services are awesome. However I was travelling on 13th June from Delhi to Pune and the Aisle seat that I was provided did not have the push back button (not the emergency exit seats). The push back buttons were broken for the entire row and had gone inside the arm. On asking the cabin crew for change of seats, I was asked to pay for the extra leg room space seats, The crew wasn't courteous enough to have me seated on the other seat and chose to keep the seat empty. 
This attitude wasn't expected from an airline of Spicejet's repute.

Hope I do not have to face the same when i travel next on spice jet. Will be travelling again on 28th Aug. Hope things have changed and will change (if not changed yet).

title: Disappointment while you fl !
text: Got my tickets at a fab rate hence booked a flight instead of a volvo Bus..but the journey was not very pleasing!Bought an upgrade at the check in counter at an additional INR 500 which i eventually thought was a waste considering the flight was empty!!Terribly noisy and bumpy ride..only positive side Good Popcorn ,newly launched on the menu and the service by the air hostess while serving the food and overall conduct !!!

title: Its good.....
text: There is not much difference as far as you are travelling in economy class. Timings, comfort are similar to any other airline. Sometimes they offer cheaper fare. Nothing more than that.

title: Average service.
text:
Both the take-off and landing time was as per schedule. This isn‚Äôt a regular commercial A320 but a Bombardier plane which can carry 80 passengers. No coffee or tea was served since the flight duration was short (60 minutes).
The baggage was sent to the belt quite quickly. Nothing special about this flight since only Spice Jet and Air India flies on this route there isn‚Äôt much option left for one to try.

title: Early morning flight with Spiceject
text: Early morning flight from goa. The flight boarded on time and had reached earlier 10 mins.The only thing which delayed was the luggage waiting time. this exceeded more than half hour. Though it was a comfort trip.

title: Good Clientele Gesture
text: Though I travel by Spicejet sometimes and have knowledge about the Inflight lucre and charm of the Spicejet Hosts, this time also they had their hospitality with sincere smile as always...I am associated with one of the Indian Aviation Organisation by profession so I compare and always assess performance and professionalism in that regard what matters to run an Airline with true spirit and I can say that a person with content heart might like the hospitality and gesture of the Airline within the perview of the functionaries The Spicejet is rendering..I was with my ailing and operated left hand due to Cancer and the flight attendant without wasting a second took my cabin baggage all the way upto 11D to load the same into the loft and all the hosts were very sincere to their best to please all the guests at their best..I was fortunate and am happy by sharing this as an acknowledgement.

title: Was not allowed to board
text: I reached in time for my Chennai Pune flight, but they closed the boarding gates early and did not allow 10 passengers to board.

title: The rating itself is the title
text: One of my worst nightmare. Once i entered the flight it was like entering into an age old cave. Starting from the interiors to the seats all are in shabby conditions. The authorities should think that it is reflecting the ugly shape of the country. It is an international flight. So there should be some protocol before sending the flight to an international route.

title: Flight from coimbatore and chennai
text:
Keeping in mind the turnaround time factor staff at Coimbatore airport acted swiftly to board the pax in the aircraft with the shortest possible time and made them comfortable. 
Again a courteous and personal inflight service ... My compliments to the inflight crew.

title: Flight to Coimbatore from Chennai and back
text:
A very brisk and courteous inflight  service ... Within a shortspan of about 40 minutes flight even the food was served to SpiceMax seat pax like me quickly and neatly.

My compliments and appreciation to the inflight crew .

title: Very poor in time management - Do not plan this
text: Never plan any spice jet flight if you want to travel on time. i have had lot of experience in domestic flights and at times I had to go in Spice Jet for timing of the flight or no other option - almost all the time there has been lot of delay - atleast by an hour in several segment. Not sure, whether they are looking to streamline or not !! Better to pay more and go in different airline !

title: Pathetic flight, SPICEJET should be the last option
text:
this flight was pathetic, we were made to sit in the aircraft , the AC on the ground was not working you can imagine the tube with hot air being blown. in such a situation you tend to get Nausea, when asked the reason the crew along with the pilot said that ground ACs are not functioning only after  takeoff the air will be cool.

Also the management is least bothered wrote so many mails but no use. since then i never took spicejet and will never take also recommend others to not take.

title: Landing could have been better
text: It was a morning flight on a weekday with a 2 hours layover in Delhi. Both the flights were on time. The service was overall good including managing the turbulences. However, there is scope of improvement in flight landings, they were slightly twitchy. Another problem was baggage handling, my friend's luggage bag was mishandled and the handle set broke. Must say here that the airlines could have managed the luggage in a better way.

title: For once they got it right
text:
This was one of the rare occasions where Spice Jet didn't disappoint.
Will remember this fact for quite sometime.

title: Service becomes better
text: Spice Jet is coming out from average to good in 2016 as service becomes better. Hopefully, they will be doing better like Indigo.

title: Spice Jet
text: It's always good to fly with SpiceJet. Plane is clean, friendly crew,  good hospitality & food. Always on time.

title: Never Trust this for schedule its better to travel by train
text:
You are never sure if after paying for the ticket you will board or not that if they are full and usually they overbook the flight and at the last moment they will refuse to give you the boarding pass even if you are on time and standing in the queue , they will close the counter and will say that you are late. you beg or shout no result the company manager will appear and will try to console you that he is not the company and the company policy is that you are at fault. So you sue the company and its out of his hand and he can not re imburse your paid amount as he will write on your paper ticket that its a NO SHOW Ticket that you also can not take any claim fro the travel company too.
you will cry for some time and will come out to look the other option to travel repenting that you chose to fly SPICE JET.
THIS IS A REGULAR PRACTICE as it happened with us on 16th Aug 2016. some other passengers were also crying and the travelers flying with other airlines some were laughing at us and some were advising that no travel again on this airlines.............

title: comfortable flight.was upgraded to larger leg space without extra payment.
text:
Request for free upgrade at check counter.Be early for that.
The reservation also helped me change my flt time without problem.

title: Not a human attitude
text:
we were travelling in a group of 10 people and my colleague had her 3 year old daughter accompanying her. It is ok we all got seats scattered, my colleague and her daughter was given seats in different locations! she got it in 26th raw and her daughter was put in 3rd raw. A passenger checked in later was given seat next to her!
The check-in counter lady was so insensible!

title: Bad attitude by air hostess. Pathetic sarvice by spicejet airlines.
text:
On 14/08/2016 th Aug I was to take a flight SG 512. Bad Attitude by their Air Hostess.. it was bed experince.14th Aug 16 I was to take a flight on Spicejet which was to depart at 18:25 p.m and finally departed at 19:00 pm. A delay of half & hour. There was no one in the departure lounge from the Airline to keep the passengers informed of the delays. I will not fly on this airline again.
Pathetic and simply terrible. The staff in the flight was simply rude. No manners at all. Being a frequent flier I would never EVER recommend this airline simply because of their staff and callousness. This kind of service will lead Spicejet no where. Management needs to figure out how to make their planes fly on time.
Traveled 3 time with spice jet and had the worst travelling by air experience. Boarded a flight from Hyderabad on 14/08/2016 to Ahmedabad. The seats were just pathetic, the kit in the back seat were not complete.. it just had a magazine there was no menu. The light over the seat wasn't working. A chewing gum stick at my seat. The cabin crew had their attitude.. very poor hospitality.
And finlly i ordar for a nonveg pasta hot meal. Pasta tasted as if they were prepared a week ago and the meal were no where near hot and so bland that we could not eat it after one spoonful. I will never order the food again on this airline. The advertisement of the food options made it look like they are going to be great but "yuck" is the word i can best use for the food served. They charge¬† me for 300 rs. No valu of money.and When i went for washroom inside the flight.there was no tissue papar...
This was wandor..really..can't belive.. inflight attendant, non cooperative and treat all guest alike, they need to be trained to differentiate between people with travel purpose and people with alter. By mistek i booked the flight 14 of spet 16. When i reached at the airport.that time i get to know that. I made a mistek. Same time i requstead to the customer care desk.that it was my misteak.but can u plzz do somthing for me.b'coz i have to fly today any how a 14/8/2016. But he denied and told me that i have cancel it and make a new booking some how my ticket was refundable. So i cancel the my ticket and book the new one..if he help me over there..and ask me to pay difference amount of airlines..so that can much better..byt some how i loss 2500 rs. And the same time i booked ticket amount of 4400. It was my misteak i do agree. But if that time he help me out some how. so at list. I saved my 3000 rs.which was i lost.motive...please look in to the mettar..and do the need full. Still wating for the refundable money..i did not get any mail or any msg¬†
No confirmation from spicejet airlines. For refundable amount money till now.

title: the seasta re in the worst condition ever
text: I have traveled in this airlines couple of times and both the times ,the seats were in the worst condition ever.Also the food they service on plane is very bad and vada sambar and idly is not an comfortable dish to eat on plane of short duration. .Also the service could be improved

title: Delayed start but landed almost on time
text:
The start was delayed and no prior intimation
Check in was easy - no crowd
Had paid for seats so could get the front few rows
Very gloomy hostess- was just doing a job without even a smile 
Did not eat anything so cannot comment on food - 
Would rate it as an average experience!

title: Fly only if no option
text: If you have no option then only fly spice jet. It is highly priced as it is one of the only options after air India express that flies directly to Pune. Not very comfortable. Staff is decent.

title: Very average airline
text: If I have to say all in a nutshell, avoid this airline, unless you have no options.  Being a low cost airline does not mean delivering poor service.  I am actually surprised how this airline is surviving in the competitive industry in the domestic Indian sector.  Firstly all their low cost ads are a hoodwink.  They add several line items to the price of the ticket and you end up paying more than a regular airline.  Exceptionally poor record on time.  They have a standard answer that says, "in coming flight is delayed".  Poor attention to detail both inside the flight and in the counters.  Most flights are also small and the legroom is cramped.  In flight service actually sucks with very little to offer.  The in flight meals are very costly as well.  So called low cost carrier with amazingly low quality of service.

title: Standards have really go down
text:
The standards of the Airline has really gone down to the dumps. We normally used to fly this airline and it was always good. This time starting from the staff who are all very grumpy and never see a smiling face they also tend to be rude.
Inside the aircraft the stink is so bad that you feel like running out, either it is some fishy smell or disinfectant smell that has been sprayed to counter all dirty smells. We also took the return flight (SG 608) that was also too bad and on the same lines.

title: DO NOT FLY THIS AIRLINE
text: NO customer service. Delayed flight. They have surprise charges. The airplane bathroom smelled. The food was awful. The people at the desk are not human. What a joke this airline is.

title: Book SpiceJet and get ready for a delayed flight
text:
This was my 1st ever SpiceJet experience. I got an SMS notification and was told that my flight is delayed. Later in the airport again we were told that it again got delayed to 12.10 pm due to operational reasons.
After that boarding started late considering 12.10 departure.
During taxi to the runway captain told us that flight got delayed as the aircraft reached Delhi late after completing its international travel.
Due to which flight managed to take off at around 12.35 pm.
Since the flight was delayed I was hungry but I when I asked to on board crew for lunch they said its not available, which was very depressing for me.
The flight landed very very late and took much more time than usual flight air time of that sector.
The flight attendants were not in good professional attire.
Seats were very uncomfortable, aircraft was very old looking, noise in the cabin was very high.

Poor show Spicejet.

title: Flying with SpiceJet
text: This was a average flight and staff looks without energy. The service is dull as they takes to long for service inflight services.

title: Impressive On time performance
text: Very efficient flight crew. Despite departure delay on the previous leg, the flight still took of on time and arrived Delhi on dot. Amazing because it was the busy hour at Delhi in the evening. Impressed with their clinical efficiency, both aircrew and ground staff.

title: Nice and Efficient
text: Very efficient check in services. The flight was on time and comfortable. The baggage claim was equally efficient. Overall, I would like to travel Spicejet again.

title: Value for Money!!
text: Budget Airlines... No free food... no in flight entertainment... you have to pay for everything... always check timing before arriving airport because mostly flights are delayed... decent service... dont expect much... value for money!!

title: bad
text: the groundstaff treat customers like beggers. everytime they think that all customers are cheaters..

title: good
text: rovide warm welcome and provide good response our request.maintain the timing everything is perfect.

title: SpiceJet! Never again...
text:
Most often than not cheap air tickets come at a price... In our case.. precious time lost on a Goa trip. Our flight was delayed by 4 hrs and no one had a clue nor courtesy to explain why. The crew sucked at their attitude... and I just hate their uniform. 
Next time I'm ok with a little more money but I want hassle free and on-time travel.

title: Excellent Service
text: Even though the flight was delayed, crew on board was helpful, considerate and provided food to everyone, while being apologetic.

title: Delay as usual
text: Flight of Spicejet got delayed by 1.5 hours & reached us to Mumbai by 2 am instead og 1230 am. They informed this by evening over phone & msg when we were on our way to airport from Noida & there was no reason to go back. Whole night got spoiled.

title: You get what you pay for
text: This is a low cost airline with ditto service. Check in was fast and efficient. Security can take time in Delhi, but that is not to blame the airline for. On board: no food, no coffee or newspaper. But we landed safe and on time so not bad.

title: budget travel with not much comfort
text: if you just want to reach at your destination irrespective of comfort then you can go for it. it is fine for 1-2 hour flight, avoid for long flights.

title: Terrible Airline in terms of Customer service and Management.
text:
The Check In was smooth and then the lady on the desk pointed out to me a issue regarding my booked seats on my return flight from dubai. They were booked and as isle seat at the emergency exit and extra payment was charged for extra leg room seat. The seats which were booked were alloted online knowing that we had a child travelling with us which should not be allowed to be booked at emergency exit. We were changed to another seats because of the same. 

Secondly we had booked food online so that we can get the food on priority but the air hostess forgot to read our name on the list and were served upon asking that we had booked our food online. She did apologize but it was not a sincere one. The experience was as if she was doing some favor to us by serving us food that we had paid for in advance. 

Third on reaching Dubai when we received our luggage it was torn. We asked the attendant standing near the belt and he said that you can complain for the same online or at India.  This as usual everyone knows that later nobody would believe our complain as we had nothing else to prove that the baggage was torn by the spice jet ground crew. 

Fourth on taking our return flight we had booked priority seats which included food and priority luggage. But we were told that the food was not included even though it was mentioned in our tickets. I had personally confirmed twice from customer care about the inclusion or else i would have paid for it. On a lot of argument too they checked with the customer care and said that it would have been a mistake and we had to pay for the food in the flight. The food choice were also not available on flight as the food mentioned in the menue was exhausted. We had to do with what was available which in itself if very poor service and management. 

We did not even get priority luggage and it came as normal luggage with a priority tag on it much later that other baggage without the priority tag on it.
I was travelling on holidays with my family and the travel experience with Spice Jet was the worst one and i pledged never to book or travel on spice jet ever again.

title: Attempts to rip off customers pretty blatant
text: A pleasant start goes a long way to a satisfactory journey and earning loyal customers. Some airlines just don't get the idea and Spicejet is among them. The fact that they covet your money is evident right from the start and shines far above their service. First stop is online check in. To be able to check in online, passengers must select a seat which costs a 100 rupees. No option of proceeding to check in with any seat allotted by the airlines. Then comes the experience at the real check in. The carryon baggage allowance is 7 kg which INCLUDES the laptop bag. It is hard to comply with this allowance. The airlines offers to charge for extra weight up to 12 kg to be carried on board. And that is in spite of not having any checked in luggage (I had a 15 kg allowance that I did not use). So, the point here is to rip off or inconvenience most of the passengers. Come to think of it, the airlines would be better off allowing passengers to take their bags on board as checking in a bag only increases the load on their labor in handling the bags thrice. But, they prefer to be pennywise and earning the wrath of the customers who are going to choose another airline in a route where there are multiple options for airlines (In the Thoothukudi-Chennai route, Spicejet is the only service provider and the people in the Thoothukudi counter think that they can impose whatever they want on the customer not realizing that the same passenger has the liberty to choose another airlines in other routes). Anyway, Thoothukudi airport is a horrible, little airport that lacks even basic amenities like bottled water beyond the security check area that the entire journey turns sour at the starting point. Given that Spicejet had a full flight and I paid top money for the ticket bought 5 days before the journey, I hope to see more competition and better passenger amenities in the future.

title: Quick flight to Guwahati
text: Good and timely flight. Ground and on-board staff are helpful and supportive.Services are up to mark of their advertisement.

title: Quick Flight to Agartala
text: Good flight and maintained time. Staff is as usual courteous and co operative. Ground and on board staff are supportive. Seating arrangement is good but leg space is less but you can avail their other option. service on board is good and prompt.

title: Good experience....timings can be improved....
text: Good service from the staffs....very friendly and helpful....as an airlines the timings can be improved since the flight was delayed for sometime....also there was no Priority Boarding from Kolkata....but the same was available from Bangkok.....

title: Comfortable flight to Goa
text: Used Spice Max. was worth it paying for better seats, food, priority boarding and luggage handling. It was a Bombardier turboprop for this sector. No problems.

title: Flight journey to Tirupathi from Hyderabad on Spicejet
text: It's great experience as usual with SpiceJet. I have very pleasant journey with my family. Even though the flight fares are concession fares I did not see any difference in the treatment.

title: Good.flight..but ground service was.quite bad
text:
We reached the airport about one hour before closure of check in time. There was a long queue.  After 50 mins we were still in the queue.  With the closure of the check in time nearing.. We tried to request some other counter to help us..but they refused.  Ultimately had to resort to breaking the queue.  Usually before flight closing the airline makes an announcement.. Asking for passengers to come forward.  They did nothing here.  It is only when we.broke .the queue did they then ask other passengers to.ckme forward.

Quite ridiculous....

Otherwise it was a pleasant fljght

title: Efficient and timely service
text: The low cost carrier is the only airline serving this small town of India. With one daily service to Bangalore and Mumbai, the airline provides vital connectivity to this upcoming smart city. The turnaround is quick, baggage handling is efficient, on board service is good. If you book in advance, you may get a good price. The cabin crew are quietly efficient. The aircraft maintenance is good. Great value for money.

title: Legroom :)
text: The flight was delayed by 30 mins. Had picked seat no 29A on the Boeing 737. Brilliant for those who desperately need the legroom.

title: Rude ground staff
text: I was traveling alone for my brother marriage... It was just 2 kg sweets packed I was carrying as extra baggage... I told the lady that I will Cary in hand luggage & informed her that I am going for my brother marriage & travelling alone ... But she was so rude that she asked me to throw the sweets or ask the person who dropped me to take back sweets... She didn't understand the sentiment... Ultimately charged me for the baggage... It seems that they were sitting there to earn for extra baggage & be rude

title: Value for Money
text: If you are looking for a low fare trip this the most preferred airlines. I may not recommend this airlines to business travelers as it is rarely on time. However, for a leisure trip with no timelines to meet, this can be a good value for money airlines.

title: Not very good for Travel
text: This is not much very good option to travel. But if you get the ticket is less cost you can use. The leg room for domestic flights is very less.

title: Surprisingly a good experience
text:
No doubt they have come up well after lot many downs in the previous year.. And more over a huge make over in the service quality.

Cabin experience surpassed all the budget airlines in India. Food also tastes good. Timelines they have been maintaining these days. Also the advent of spice club is a good move. Over all one of the best economic flying experience in India

title: budget flight with necessary facilities
text: I am using spice jet for travelling inside india because its rate will be less when compared to other airlines, also the airline staff are friendly , young and energetic. I have seen they will always maintain timing. I recommend spice jet for domestic flyers.

title: Horrible experience! Wouldnt recommend!
text: Got to the airport more than 2hrs earlier as advised. Flt delayed,known thro' a sms. No executive to help. Had bked & paid for food on flt, given to me just before landing after being reminded. Return trip was also a disaster. The safety strap on my box was missing & the built-in lock was tampered with. Wrote to customer relations, got an acknowledgement that they wld get in touch with me.More than 2 wks have passed,no news. SpiceJet is best avoided!

title: Good flight but nothing great
text: The flight from kolkata was at the middle of the night. Staff were very confused and boarding was very inefficient. Food options were very poor. Seats were acceptable and the aircraft was clean.

title: very good
text: Normally I travel in business class, since on this sector only economy class is available, this time I travelled by spicejet. On time , clean, cordial staff & they have tasty food also. I like it.

title: Pathetic Service
text: Flight was rescheduled multiple times, had to follow up and argue with executives. Pathetic service!

title: Very average but affordable with good connectivity!
text: It is a very basic low cost budget airlines. They have good connectivity but not so reliable. The aircrafts are alright and the ambiance is good. The cabin crew are mostly least bothered and are not so well trained. The food quality and taste is above average but is a little expensive. They have good schedules and are punctual mostly. All in all spicejet is alright if its the cheapest available.

title: a good one for a budget trip
to bangalore
text:
Good timely service.  No frills, basic flight, but meets the expectations.  The cabin was clean and service was as expected.  

For me, the first priority is safe and timely flight which the carrier meets.    Want more legroom, but on short flights I am OK.  

Rest are frills, but not motivating enough to pay more.  I prefer whosoever wants frill, pay and buy.

title: Value for money flights
text: Spice jet are good value for money internal flights within India. Similar to UK Easyjet You have to purchase food and drinks however the flights are usually short in duration so if you have had a cuppa at the airport that will suffice I would recommend

title: Small Plane & Right Time Arrival
text: Small plane, 2/2 seat. The fly time was around 45 minutes - 1 hour. The plane reached Delhi on right time. The overall experience was reasonable.

title: COMFORTABLE AND SUPERB TAKE OFF & LANDING
text: Its my second flight travel in Spicejet , the staffs were pleasing everything was nice and comfortable, the take off and  landing was excellent.The seats were also ok but not very much comfortable but legroom space was good.

title: Improved Services after change in management
text: Found lot of difference in the attitude, behavior and Hospitality of the crew. Smile and comforting treatment was a welcome change.

title: Best in Budget
text: Travel led with my family , timing , seats are okay but check in staff always favorable to travelers,i can say it's one of the best for airlines to travel in budget.

title: Low cost airline
text:
Low cost airline. Experience was not that great.
Seats were not so clean.
The table attached to the seat was broken.
The flight was delayed by 30 mins due to some technical fault it seems.

title: Very bad
text:
Spicejet is not only a low cost carrier but very low in sevice too. Their fleet are smaller giving less legroom and also the take off and landing are very shaky and bumpy. The food items are a bit expensive and they just add a few inches of legroom space and charge for that additional space calling it a strategy.  While cost-cutting is an international behavious it should never be done at the cost of passenger discomfort. I have travelled far and wide even in low cost Airlines like South West Airlines even then the service was not as bad as Spicejet. The staff wear a gloomy face and the geound staff are utterly helpless and useless as hey follow the orders of the seniors. One good thing is that they dont charge for contacting the crew in-flight or the ground staff at terminals. 

I have decided not
To travel
Spicejet.

title: Wouldn't fly with them again
text: From check-in to arrival was not impressed with this airline.  Confusion at the airport didn't help.  If we had to fly domestic in India again would definitely try IndiGo.

title: Uncomfortable flight
text: Flight got delayed by 3.5 hours. It was quite irritating. As per government policy though I was provided dinner at airport. After a long wait flight finally started. Seating were very uncomfortable. Very little leg space and limited inclination. A disappointing flight overall.

title: very  nice flight
text: have  provide   warm welcome  and  provide   good response our  request.maintain the timing everything is perfect.

title: A Comfortable short Flight to Jabalpur.
text: The whole family was traveling for a holiday to Jabalpur. The airport staff were found to be very helpful and efficient. Baggage arrival at Jabalpur was delayed due airport facilities being limited and monsoon season.

title: A decent budget option
text: The service was good, though the in flight menu could be better. Nothing exceptional to be mentioned. The comfort level was just fine.

title: Super Economy
text:
Overall good experience in the spicejet trip made to hyderabad recently.
Everything was pretty good. will travel again soon.

title: Flying with spicejet was spicy
text:
The best part of this flight was that it was handled and managed by all Females pilot and crew members. I must say it takes a lot of guts and that they were all very efficient in their role.It was a sort of inspiration for others. Flying experience was just out of the world. Even though the flight took off late by almost 20 minutes, that was not an issue at all.

Overall I must say that it was a fabulous experience and we all had a great time flying, more particularly my son who was desperate to board a flight.

Looking forward to fly again with Spicejet very soon.

title: Hassle free travel with an old plane
text: Service is not good as compare to other flights but a price is affordable. Sometimes it is also not fly on time. we have to wait for 15-30 min extra.

title: Awesome flight!!
text: Went to dubai via spicejet airlines as i got a good deal. The spacing between the seats is less . However one tends to compromise as the price is less. However the flight started a bit late and we got a meal for delayed flight but otherwise it was a smooth journey and we reached in time that our sightseeing was not affected.

title: Visit to Jabalpur
text: After its new incarnation, service quality and timeliness as well as in cabin food quality has improved a lot.

title: Good Experience
text: Nice experience. Hassle free check in. Good on air food and beverages. Professional staffs and crews.

title: Quite Affordable Price but Low Service
text: I have observed that Spice jet has more often delays and Service provided is also very much average but the thing that makes it going is pretty cheap fares

title: A smooth sailing, dot on time ride
text:
It was a although a long wait to board the plane but once in the ambiance was perfect and the flight crew very cordial and helpful. The ride was not bumpy at all in spite of the abundant clouds.
Overall the time saved at this cost was a great relief than coming back by train which takes 24 hours.

title: On time
text: I was not very pro to Spicejet but this time its changed. I think they have addressed their weaknesses and working on it. It  was on time departure and arrival. Aircraft was clean and crew members were well groomed.  This time highly recommended.

title: Value for money
text: I would rate this trip as true value for money.Yes they were a bit delayed but thats just about it.Overall was quite happy.

title: Before Time
text: Have traveled to many destinations but this was the first time that my flight took off at the right time but reached the destination before arrival time, the interior of the flight was not up to the standard but understandable as being low budget airlines, they need to at least have some good seating seats which were literately worn out, the rest staff crew were good, the only needs is to upgrade the interiors of the planes..

title: hyderabad mumbai trip
text: The flight I took was on time departure.However I regret to inform that the aircraft was not clean and was full of mosquitoes.I wish that the spicejet team takes care of these small issues to make the passengers happier.

title: Peaceful flight in an ATR
text:
I have been flying with SpiceJet from Pune to Chennai for multiple reasons in the past. The latest flight was from Goa to Pune and I would like to comment upon that.
Punctuality: Very punctual. The flight was pretty short but left on time and reached on time without any deviations in route.
Ground and on-board service: The spicejet staff was very courteous and welcoming even on the small ATR aircraft. The check-in was quick in-spite of a long queue. We were flying with a baby and expected the air hostesses to give us some advice, but none of that came from them.
Cleanliness: The aircraft was very clean and being an ATR the leg space was a little better. 
In-flight entertainment: Missing as this was a domestic flight.
Food: The food had to be purchased and was not that great at all.
Flight experience: The ATR flew under the clouds so we had a great view from up above and the pilots made every possible attempt to avoid any turbulence. 
Overall rating: 4.

title: Best for price
text: Economic class fares are really low, which is the reason all flights are mostly full. Staff and service are also at par. Still we expect there could be little more width and leg space. At least, entertainment screens should be provided.

title: Sharp Proffessionalism
text: The service and ambiance provided by them where out of high grade professionalism.Flight was punctual.

title: Good
text: Pretty good. The food was good. I opted for Jain Vegetarian and Hindu Vegetarian meal. The flight attendents were courteous and helping.

title: Every time, on time
text: One thing about Spicejet is they are on time. Hardly any delay is seen. Pricing is also very good, I got a good deal on this one !

title: NO TIMING MAINTENENCE
text: They never maintain timings, Last time i booked tickets 2 months in advance and at the last moment my morning fkight was changed to an evening one. When i told that i do not want a change as i had to attend a function which was in afternoon and i had booked my flight accordingly. They refused for any refund.

title: It was a nice and smooth journey
text: It was a comfortable journey. I have opted for the same flight many times and it is always on time. Sometimes it reaches before time as well but never late if the weather is good. Will continue journey with SpiceJet always.

title: Great Improvement
text: There has been considerable improvement in service, customer handling, operational efficiency after the new management has taken over. I must compliment them.

title: return trip to mumbai
text: The aircraft was old but in nice condition.we selected this for economical rate as well as direct flight to mumbai.The flight was in time and in fact it arrived at mumbai well 25 minutes in advance which is worth appreciating.

title: Budget airlines
text:
SpiceJet offers reasonably cheap travel options and that is the only major reason that i would choose spicejet if i do not have the option of other good airlines. 
Timings wise they are not too accurate and often have seen delays in their flight. 
Food quality is good but not that great. The crew is good and courteous, however in times of delay they are not too transparent or do not have enough information. 
The leg room is not too great it is just about average. 
If price is your criteria then choose this airlines as it offers some of the cheapest prices for flights.

title: Mid Range Airline but service can be improved yet
text: I have traveled many times in Spice Jet from Bangalore to Chennai & Return. Couple of times from Pune to Bangalore ... Price wise the airlines charges was normal but the service can be improved. Even the counter staff at the gate were not so friendly. When approached with the flight delay information, they advised us to check the display and no reason for delay announced. Service should be focus of improvement for this airline. Recently couple of my friends said that the service has improved

title: Nice turnaround
text: I stopped flying spice jet when there was a lot of trouble with the airline in keeping flights operational and on time. However booked it as the flying out time was suiting me and was pleasantly surprised. The airline has improved much over the year or two. The on flight menu almost holds a spread of options, reasonably priced. The staff is smartly dressed in a top and jeans - that's much functional and easy I guess. Seats were clean and the flight was on time. I did have to pay for the seat I chose but that's ok till the time the fares are under control. I liked the experience. It was lively and jovial.

title: On time, good cabin crew, slightly rough landing
text: Good experience overall, but the landing could have been better, flight crew was very helpful, no issues checking in

title: Value for money
text: This is one of the best airline in India and totally a value of money. budget airline and offers good service. The best part is punctuality which makes me choose this airline.

title: unresonable delay
text: Flight was delayed by 6 hours and reason given was OPERATIONAL REASONS, i do not understand the meaning of that. end of the day i reached in the night instead of 2 pm in the afternoon. Hope they improve

title: Not that great
text: I took a late night flight from Delhi to Bangalore. What i liked was my meal for sure, it was  pretty good but i was not very happy with the cleanliness of the craft. The service was fairly okay.

title: Trying to fool passengers
text: I was travelling with my family (husband and two kids). When we were boarding from Mumbai, the SpiceJet employee at the airport told us that we four of us cannot get the seat together and if we want the seat together, we need to pay extra for the prime seats. We refused to pay extra as we had already paid enough for the ticket price.
