We took seats at different places and when we boarded the flight my children were sitting side by side at the front whereas me and my husband were on the back side. When the flight took off, we realized that there were 2 seats vacant at the place, my kids were sitting and so we (me and my husband) went and sat near the kids. So, ultimately the flight employees were trying to cheat us and get more money from us by telling us that there are no seats vacant altogether.

title: a good budget airline of in india
text: being a budget airline ,keep your expectation on any laxury can be expensive , recently they are mostly on time, check in was smooth, very conjested seating, if you are taller than 5.5 ft better pay for a exit room seat for a comfortable flight. inflight meals can be pre booked or payable on spot.

title: only flight flying between chennai to tuticorin(thoothukudi)
text: since this is the only flight option so far (in future some more airlines may come) to fly between tuticorin to chennai, both this cities are in tamilnadu only and the travel time will take 75 mins, i enjoyed travel in this flight first time with my family, the height of flying of this flight is very low compared to other flights, we can see the land and vehicle moving there until we reach the destination.

title: Wasted money by booking meal with flight
text: I was traveling from Bangalore to Delhi along with family so I had pre-booked my meal during booking flight.But during the flight,the meal served was neither complete nor appropriate in quantity as stated while pre-booking. When I highlighted it to customer care, they agree to give me a food voucher applicable on my next flight within 6 months instead of refunding the money thus making it compulsory to me to book another flight to utilize my money even if not I am not destined to anywhere thus in the end my money went waste due to pre-book of my meal.

title: hassle Free On -time Travel.
text:
Have travelled around 3 times on Spicejet.
Good thing is their flight were always On-Time.
Aircraft was bit small.  Bombardier Q400.

title: Good for Budget travel
text: Goa flight from Mumbai at 11:00 pm is generally late by 1 hour. We had booked this flight on offer and really got it for ho away prices. As it is just 1 hour journey we weren't really bothered for service or quality

title: good after revival
text: its a good low cost carrier. was surprised to see the crew from a Russian  surrounding. but good thing they were following the procedures and were speaking in hindi. food was good as per normal standards, right on time. less leg space atleast for a tall guy like me.

title: A hassle free journey at an affordable price
text:
On many occasions I have traveled in Spice jet , be it official or family tour, never faced any trouble. in this context I would like to mention another Airline named Indigo where me and my friend experience I am giving below which may help other travelers:

  " Me and one of my close friend planned a vacation at Jammu and Kashmir in April 2014. After Darsan of MATA VAISHNODEVI my flight to Srinagar from Jammu was on 14th April(by GoAir). My son  came to Delhi from Kolkata on 14 April itself by taking a morning Indigo Flight,  joined by my friend  and his family at Delhi Airport and then they all supposed to fly to Srinagar by afternoon Indigo Flight on the same date. As I travel from Jammu so all of us will meet at Srinagar airport on 14th April afternoon and then proceed to pre-booked hotel. Accordingly I booked all the Air tickets, car and hotel using my debit and credit cards for both the families. My son reach safely at Delhi Airport. Now the worst part started. - I was utterly shocked when I got a call from my friend when I was at Jammu Airport that Indigo denied him the boarding by saying that his ticket was cancelled within 10minutes of booking by the person who booked it.  This is simply absurd. If it is so then why there was no communication from Indigo either by phone, message or mail about this and no refund also, Rather there was communication from indigo long after booking  that your tickets are confirmed. As they reach well in advance at Airport so next few hours they along with my son , who happened to be a doctor at Kolkata and my friend‚Äôs son in law who is also a doctor at AIR India DELHI, running from person to person of Indigo Airlines requesting so that something can be done. But most unfortunately nothing was done. We were very upset and because of this continuous conversation over telephone I was about to miss my flight from Jammu to Srinagar.   To save the tour, friend‚Äôs daughter some how managed tickets next day obviously at higher price - but was very furious and wrote a letter to Indigo Airlines which I am reproducing below.

"My father had booked an Indigo flight from Delhi to Srinagar on flight 6E555 for April 14, 2014 with booking reference number H3RFJS. He had booked this flight on January 21, 2014 at 2:49 pm following which he has a confirmation mail from indigo about his ticket being confirmed once at 2:49 pm and again at 3:42 pm on his e-mail id ajoychatterjee14@gmail.com. However, on reaching the airport on April 14, 2014, he was informed that his tickets were cancelled about which he was not informed earlier through mail or message by indigo. He was unable to board the flight and had to purchase tickets at higher costs for the next day and abandon his plans at Srinagar for that very day. The utter callousness of the airlines about the whole affair is appalling and the fact that he was not completely uninformed by the airlines about the cancellation is not a matter of joke. In the Airport the airline authority has informed him that his tickets were cancelled on the same day within 8 minutes of booking while he has received a confirmation mail 45 minutes later about his booking being confirmed of which there is a proof. Therefore, on this basis I would be forced to take legal action against these airlines for mental and physical harassment of my parents along with monetary loss. I therefore, request the airlines to look into the matter and inform at the earliest what steps they are taking, or else I would have to resort to a legal course."  

Note: a refund amt. of 4138/- received only on 22nd  April in my SBI A/c, though it was told to her during conversation over phone that same has been refunded immediately after cancellation.

title: nice budget option to fly
text: it was a business trip for a short period, find spicejet an economic option, with good service.definitely recommend.

title: Had a good experience
text: The experience was good. However, due to Bad weather, landing of the flight was delayed and hence flight got delayed causing hardship. Lounge facility were inadequate at Jolly Grant due to 3 flights getting clubbed and getting delayed.

title: Average.........
text:
They announced a promo flight for Holi and get it cancelled after a few days.
After that I had to fight for my refund.
Disappointing service standard.

title: Cheap Airlines with the cheapest attitude
text: Its the worst of SpiceJet that I have ever travelled. I requested that my mother has an issue so get her an aisle seat but they gave her a middle seat with 0 legroom. There was this funny smell in the aircraft.

title: Delayed Flight, Lackadaisal Attitude
text:
While taking this  flight which was the second  leg of the Journey was delayed. The staff didnot bother to inform us until we changed terminals and were stuck in the Airport for 6 hours. 
The ground staff at the Airport on request and questioning said that seats in an earlier flight were not available, though a net check showed otherwise.
Besides the crew in the aircraft was making a lot  of noises in the rear despite the fact that is was late in the night and most of the Passengers were on a connecting fllight with a long layover at Delhi.

A written Complaint with respect to the flight is yet to be Addressed with a proper reply.

title: Average Service
text:
The service was not bad, in fact there is no inflight service available. There are few things available on paid basis.
Flight was delayed.
flight attendants are hospitable.
Overall a average feeling.
Cost wise affordable !

title: Budget airlines, you get what you pay for and sometimes less
text:
Being the cheapest option available, i was not expecting anything but i found out that even there was a sub low level standard when I got to know that the seats in the airplane were not even equipped with push back mechanism. Staff's behavior was also rude and not typical Spicejet that I have experienced in other spicejet flights.
You get what you pay for, but even for that this was a bad experience.

title: CHEAP AND BEST FLIGHT
text: spice Jet offers Good service at cheap price. I am travelling twice or thrice a year from kolkata to chennai. Food provided onboard is good.It is better to prebook your mael.You can book it online also even on a later date after ticket booking.There is no means of entertainment e.g. TV/Movies/audio provided by airline on board.In my opinion paying extra for priority boarding is not worth because there is hardly any time delay in boarding .On board staff is very cordial.Overall a very good experience.

title: Extremely Late
text: If you are travelling thru this airline make sure u hv atleast few hrs in hand. Mostly the flights are delayed. We had plans to go to shillong that night and we got delayed because of the same and lost quite a bit of money there

title: Somewhat ok..
text: I I have taken this for Delhi to chennai .. regarding baggage no uniformity is there .. If u have more than 7.5 kg u must put in check-in told by counter in charge where as I have seen so many had more than that weight in aircraft ..? Counter service not so cordial .. anyhow we have to compromise since it is a cheaper  flight ? Service is normal

title: So So... Value For Money Airlines
text: Got A Very Good Deal From goibibo. Hence Booked this flight instead of my prefered airlines. Also booked some "Hot Non Veg Kebab Platter". Flight Took Off Before Time And Landed At Mumbai Before Time As Well...No Issues With That. But Leg Space Was Pathetic. My Pre-Booked Platter Was By No Mean "Hot"...It Was Cold.....

title: Delay in takeoff... normal service
text: No proper timing .. poor announcement. . We want to ask the timing often .. service is normal ok . Budget flight .. so we can't say about it much.. why don't they offer foods in affordable price ? People are getting food from outside .. They should think and have a good decision on this would help them for better business

title: Good and comfortable flight.
text:
the flight was affordable, comfortable .. overall good.
the food on the flight was good but was served late..

title: Bangalore-delhi-dehradun
text: in time departure and early schedule landing,kind,courteous service,on board sales items quality and verity with price was excellent

title: SpiceJet Worth Booking During Offers
text:
SpiceJet is neither too good nor too bad kind of airline. If you are able to book cheap tickets during their offer period it's worth flying in it. The flight I traveled was old and cleanliness is okay. No free lunch/snacks. On time is somewhat off time with this airline.

Overall this airline is not bad. Definitely pick it up with reduced ticket price.

title: OK Budget Airine
text: This is a budget airline and as such nothing special about it. The food available has less options and not all routes are well served.

title: Too much money minded
text:
While it is very good to see the bounce back of this airline it is very annoying to see the way they try to extract money from every opportunity. You try to web checkin every seat is for a price, but when you check in at the airport it is for Free! same issue when you try to check in at the kiosk you will get only middle row seats. I wonder if they want to enable the customer with the technology or discourage / extract money for making their life easy
Highly dissappointed

title: hyd conf trip
text:
good aircrafr
pretty hostess
food available at cost  good warm food
ambience is good
good ground handling

title: low cost domestic with great value fotr money
text:
the shortest & fastest way to pune from cochin 
on top of it cheapest too , about 1000 cheaper than indigo which does not have a direct flight 
This is a direct flight too
Check in procedures can be better

title: Poorly organised
text:
Ground staff very poorly organised
Boarding is quite chaotic as they dont use line managers or people to guide so anybody walks in from anywhere to board
Announcements are missing
Flight gets delayed andstaff do the disappearing act right then
On board meals were also poor to average in offering

title: Not bad for low budget trips.
text: First of all, spice is struggling to be in the market & offering sometime very cheap options also..so price wise its very good & service & punctuality wise its not up-to the marks, but still they are doing many efforts to be in the best class..overall its worth travelling with them..

title: good experience
text:
The check in and Boarding was easy and quick. Inflight cleanliness was great.
The crew members are  well trained and courteous. the food was great. a nice experience.

title: Horrible services
text:
Spicejet refuses to learn from their earlier mistakes.  Flight scheduled from Madurai for 0705 pm leaves at 0805 pm, which is still ok...we land at 0900 and then wait for baggage till 0945...can u beat it.

The poor guys at the counter have no clue and blame it on rain, trolley congestion etc...when all this is not happening for other airlines which came in after us.

Unfriendly crew serve you as they have done you a favour.

title: Don't fly with Spice Jet unless there really is no alternative
text: I had only two choices after three months in HP, Spice Jet or Air India. Air India didn't have the times I needed and despite only one previous experience with Spice (also a truly terrible experience) I was reluctant to fly with Spice again. Still, no choice. I was carrying pottery in my carry-on luggage. Spice Jet said it was a potential threat to staff and had to go in the hold (although people could buy glass bottles to put in their hand luggage after check in! Half of it was broken when I got to Mumbai. The fragile stickers had no effect (ok it could be ground-staff not Spice Jet). However, no other airline has stopped me carrying pottery before (I'm a potter and a teacher). A couple of days before my flight my 3 hour wait in Delhi for my Mumbai connection was extended to more than 6! I might as well have gone with Air India. Operational issues was the excuse. The later plane was completely full. Was my original flight cancelled to consolidate two half-full planes? I suspect so. So, Spice Jet? NEVER AGAIN!!!!!!!

title: Nice Air Travel Experience on a no frills flight
text: Enjoyable Flight. Terminal staff and flight crew were very efficient and courteous. The flight was on time and the luggage handling was good (no unnecessary waiting at the belt). Will certainly like to travel again with this airline.

title: What do you Expect from Cheap Airline ?
text:
common, what do you expect from a Cheap airline ticket ? flight was okay, crew members are like others flight attendants, seats were okay too. they charged for extra space seatings, as all other flights do. also they charged for window tickets if u will ask them personally than. or else ur luck.

about food. average. most of food was not available in the plane which is mentioned in ON BOARD MENU. 

I WANT TO ADD ONE THING IS , THEY DONT STOP PEOPLE / TRAVELERS WHO WERE DRUNK. THEY ALLOW THEM ON BOARD. WHICH IS NOT GOOD FOR THOSE WHO DONT DRINK AND TRAVEL.

title: Very less leg space terrible customer service
text: It's a pretty short flight of just 1hr and 15 mins, there was absolutely no legroom was very uncomfortable. Very rude service. Ask for water they take forever to get it.

title: Very Nice Flight Attendants!
text: Had the chance to finally flying on Spice Jet and had a great flight experience. The flight attendants were very friendly and very attentive the entire flight. The plane was clean and the seats were fairly spacious in comparison to other airlines. I would definitely fly them again if the opportunity arises.

title: Value for money
text: Affordable price and value for money. last time we went flight was delayed and we need to wait 2 hours at the airport.

title: Never take spicejet for international tour
text:
Booked spicejet from dubai to mumbai but was very bad experience. Small flight with more passengers. No legroom or not onboard service. Ask for the water for which they said to wait a while and instead of providing water staff started distributing custom clearance forms.
Very bad experience and also tired of seating in small seat for more than 2hours.

title: Reasonable price
text:
I take mostly this this career because there is no hassle of passing through security check again at Chennai airport as you continue your trip in the same career. Whereas in other careers like Jet airways, you have to get down at Chennai, rush through the security check  with your hand baggage and change the aircraft within a short transit time even if your checked in baggage is booked directly. Compared to Jet airways aircrafts which normally fly in this sector Chennai-Madurai-Chennai, the Spice jet aircrafts are much better. Service is alright.
In this particular trip I even got upgraded automatically and got more spacious seat with more leg space.

title: Pathetic !!
text: The flight which I boarded was really pathetic man !! The seats were not properly clean and was torn from sides too. The seats were really not comfortable and have less legroom !!

title: Awesome!
text: Exquisite and amazing. The staff were very polite and co-operating. There was little turbulence due to bad weather; however, its worth for, since I still remember the chilling effect throughout my spine (although its nothing serious; now I burst in laugh whenever I remember the situation) ;)

title: Lot of Delays
text: Let me clarify that the prices offered by SpiceJet was unbelievable. I got the tickets at a very good price. The only problem i suffered from was delays. The delays were communicated once we reached the airport and the delay was more than that of an hour. The service in the flight was really good and the staff were very polite too. However this Airline charges for the seat near the emergency window which offers extra leg space. The overall service of the staff  was pretty good and they were polite too.

title: A bumpy ride
text: It was kind of like the "greyhound bus" of airlines. Not so bad really. Crowded, late, but we got there safe. Nice people.

title: Cabin Crew is very cordial and caring
text: Intimation about delay of the flight for the second time (after one SMS in the morning) was not properly intimated to the Guests at the Airport.

title: Amazing
text: Amazing experience; specially since it was my first air travel. Got a window-seat, thereby the memory is still afresh.

title: Poor Reputation in India.  Well deserved.
text:
Staff both at the terminal and on the plane were very pleasant, but other than that, I can't think of a single compliment.  
*  At both airports, in fine weather, Spice Jet flights were the ONLY ones listed on the board as late for arrivals and departures.
*  There were fewer desk staff at the terminal than other regional airlines, so the line was long.  Still, the guy at the desk persisted in trying to upgrade passengers (for a fee paid there, which requires him to then leave the desk to get some form) which slowed down the line even further.  
*  We did get suckered into paying for the upgrade, which was supposed to give us early boarding, better seats, a free meal, and first luggage delivery upon arrival.  However, by the time the plane arrived, the crowd surged forward and there was no sequenced boarding, our luggage was close to dead last, the seats, though further forward, were in a plane with no differentiation of seats, and the meal was the smallest airplane meal I have ever seen.  Misleading all around.
*  In Kochi, gate labeling did not occur until late (since the plane was late) so at the time of original planned departure, there was no posted information.  (It is a small airport so every departing flight sits in the same large waiting area).  
*All of a sudden, once the plane did arrive, there was no audio announcement. So travelers had to scope out each gate for the whole delay, to ascertain where to go when it did arrive. 

My traveling friends in India had warned me away from Spice Jet.  They were right.  Never again.

title: Spice Jet and Air India is only the option...!
text: Non reliable flights due to weather conditions at Dharamshala. Very less legroom. No good option for meals. As there are not much option of flights to this place so u have no choice. Small bombardier planes are the limitation for cabin space and leg room. However frequency of flights is good.

title: SpiceJet
text: Was pretty apprehensive taking my first flight on SpiceJet, but was pleasantly surprised. Check-in was smooth as I had upgraded to SpiceMax, flight took off just in time and landed 10 minutes early. The only grey area was the food provided which they need to improve big time.

title: Worst airline in India
text:
Spicejet is one of the worst airline service in india.

I had my bad experience with them. I was unable to reach on time because the flight was 5 hours late.

Can you imagine 5 to 6 hours in regular time.

I suggest people to avoid Spicejet and rather try Vistara or Indigo in place of Spicejet

title: Need to improve on attitude
text: This was a good airline but it seems lately there is shift in their attitude ,rather than customer oriented they have started money orientation .Spice Max ,the new program they have started with priority boarding ,priority luggage ,food ,leg room they are charging rs 1000/- per ticket .If you see 3-4 min more at boarding and 3-5 minutes more at luggage belt is worth paying extra and above all the food is of no quality.They need to improve .If they want to charge more do charge but offer something substantial.

title: Flight back to Delhi on a rainy day
text:
Have travelled in Spicejet some 2-3 times before but then that was 3-4 years back.Decided to travel once again and it was a good decision. Ferry from Terminal gate to plane in a shuttle to board.
Upon boarding asked for water and was served in a disposable cup.After all, this experience has been missing for some time now.
Anyways, took off from Bangalore and was smooth.Turbulent weather didnt allow seatbelts to go off for sometime even after  taking off. After reaching a good height (and plane was stable) signs were put to rest.Crew team onaboard started serving the pre-ordered food(they serve you cheaper if booked early) and then took rest  of the orders from fellow travellers,Normal transactions -10,20,50,100 Rs notes above 33 k Ft height :).
I like to have tea/coffee for sure onboard since can not sleep . Am not priviledged to dose off like my fellow travellers who fall asleep even before plance takes off.Anyhow, ordered pre-mixed tea and was indeed good, though costlier than on ground.
Seats are bit clamped in 787 airliner - guess this is 180 seater plane.But good enough for a small journey of upto 3 hours. I was pleasently surprised noticing leatherite seat covers -I have not seen these even in costliest airlines atleast in INDIA.Though these were clean and no litter in front or beneath it.

The services were par excellent. Better than other airlines - Red colored uniform of the crew adds to their vitality and vigour. Good choice of color !! 

Have seen a lot of office personnel also now going for this airline since these No-frills are becoming more conscious of time discipline.Families find this convenient due to low fares compared to other higher costing airlines.Remains a favourite with students and young working professionals who do frequent up and down to their home towns. 
Only missing thing is airway to directly take you to terminal entry upon deboarding the plane.Guess, this is their model.
Overall, a very good Indian airline for class and mass.

title: Plane was old,otherwise not too bad
text:
I was coming back from Pune ( PNQ ) via Bengaluru on flight SG 517. The departure time was at 1550. Flight arrived at Pune,more or less on time. Boarding got delayed as there was a last minute announcement by a stern faced lady from Spicejet,saying boarding would commence from 1st floor. So every person,both young and old had to climb stairs at the last minute,and then walk on endless corridors at Pune Airport, to board the plane through the only possible aerobridge at Pune airport.

Boarding done,but they closed the doors late. Trundled out of apron area,towards runway at a leasurely pace. Started to rain by that time. While plane was on main runway,it was raining cats and dogs. We thought possibly that was the reason for the delay. But finally we saw a ATR plane with its lights blazing coming down to land. Takeoff was fairly smooth,considering the fact that it was raining pretty heavy.

Flight went towards Bengaluru. We had to go all the way down from Pune to Bengaluru,as this flight to Kolkata from Pune was via Bengaluru,for some inexplicable reason. Anyway,weather was bad outside and we experience quite a turbulence during our one hour ten minutes flight. Then we realized that this particular plane was quite dated. It was a Boeing 737. Usually all the low cost airlines utilize the newer Airbus A-320 , or even the Neo in some cases. But SpiceJet chose to use this old aircraft. We reached Bengaluru eventually,and although it was a one hour stopover,again we got delayed as boarding at Bengaluru for newer passengers got delayed. There was a customary check-up of plane,and onward journey baggage's. After that one chap came inside and asked too see our boarding passes. Then boarding started with newer set of passengers,while we sat at our allotted seats.
Finally plane took off,slightly delayed,and once it was fully airborne,snacks and tea was served. Airhostesses , this time were a smiling lot,especially one called Shohini. She was both nice and caring. Came with glasses of water to drink. We didn't have any meal,as we were full. I bought a pair of chips ( Pringles ) and tea for me and my friend. Flight was more or less uneventful,although we reached Kolkata somewhat on time. I was amazed at better service and staff attitude,than what I had seen on earlier occasions.

Except the very old planes they are using,service and other things aboard Spicejet are not too bad actually

PS - The particular plane on which we traveled this time, did not have any Spicejet livery.

title: Not so good
text:
The flight was taken in the evening and delay is always irritating
Suprised with the total comittment to timliness.
Specially in comparision to indigo where time is biggest factor
Even the flight experience was not that great

title: Average service and affordable price
text: Service is not good as compare to other flights but price is affordable. Some time it is also not fly on time. we have to wait for 15-30 min extra.

title: Not worth
text:
Spice jet is low cost airline. Not maintain Cleanliness inside the flight.
Leg space is not there for econimy class.

title: A nice travel.
text: Had a nice flight from Mumbai to Kochi in SG163 on 26 July. The Priority check in was very convenient. Thanks Spicejet. The seats had enough leg room (Priority). Food was nice. My grandson who had his birthday in this week was specially honoured with a Birthday card signed by the Captain and the crew.

title: My experience with SpiceJet
text: I booked a SpiceJet because I was not having options at that time. Flight is delayed by 6 hours on this hot route. My flight is scheduled at 7:45 am and I got a call from them one day before in night around 12:30 am and said that your flight is delayed and now it will depart at 11:30 am. I had a connecting train booking from Mumbai at 1:30 pm. So, I think it's fine for me. But when I reached to airport, I got to know now this flight will depart at 12:45 pm almost 6 hours of delay. And because this delay, I missed my train and they never compensate for it. Really a poor experience.

title: Affordable Price and Good Service
text: Affordable Price and Good Service. On Schedule. Had a Good Trip. We have booked onboard dinner and it was excellent.

title: value fro money
text:
Good value for money service. Often take the early morning out and late evening return.
almost always manages a before time landing.

title: devastating will never take spice jet and never recommend anyone
text:
date of journey is 16 july (sg2174 ) SG109 AT SEAT 14 C having a bad back had requested them at ticket counter to give seat near to exit door for which they gave me non adjustable chair and not even told anything about it ..
THE CABIN CREW WERE TOTALLY INSANE AND PATHETIC IN TERMS OF quality and service ,My name is javed am a Manager in Travel and tourism industry,
my complaint was that SG109 AT SEAT 14 C  while travelling back to CHENNAI ,there was continuous baby crying with a full blast for full journey, from 6 or 7 seat no god knows exactly which seat exactly,and parents were not even interested in trying to stop the child after some time second child also got this and started in full blast, crying it out,,the air hostess the leader of them,didn't even bothered to stop them .which i and other passenger also elderly couple also noticed. as we started to travel from bus while coming down from plane,we chatted about it, as per them parents were least bothered to stop child from crying and crew leader could have tried to stop have them stopped diplomatically,which she didn't .later at baggage counter at chennai there was mechanical error for ten fifteen minutes ,with big HEADACHE and unhappy mind like several other i searched for spice person found him after ten minutes ,when asked for DUTY MANGER or senior official he told i have to go to 2nd floor to speak to him lol why he cannot come down there was landline there and wireless ??? but self went and spoke to him as per him all staff on board were new thats why it happened but no apology no regret about it from his end,anyhow wrote a complaint on his book uptill now still waiting for a person from spice to contact fyi my date of journey is 16 july could u believe it

title: Affordable by many!
text: Efficient and prompt service. Seat comfort is normal and Ok for a travel of 1 or 2 hrs. Paid service is Nice. Only water will be served if unpaid. Handling of Luggage is fantastic.

title: I view from Hyde to Bhopal.perfect maintaining of schedule.crew gave gd hospitality. Nice experience to travel in spice
text: Good experience to travel in spice jet. I asked for a seat near window which was provided. Crew are very corteus friendly and obliging.with smile they serve.

title: Worst in terms of punctuality
text: There is no fixed time for flight as they keep on changing every half an hour, my flight was rescheduled for 5 times and on complaining there is a standard reply "Technical issues"

title: Good Budget flights.
text: A very good airline with good services. It's recommended for people travelling with a little less budgets. The seating is as same as any other budget airline. The Check-ins were easy and I really loved the tag-line of the airliner 'With all are heart'. The crew truly worked according to their company's Tagline. Would surely recommend for Budget Travelers.

title: Value for money and Safe :)
text: SpiceJet means value for money and safe. Though they should give complementary sandwiches still I always prefer to travel with them.

title: INEXPERIENCED AIRHOSTESS I KNOW ALL TYPE !
text: Flight was a very short flight from Kolkatta to Bagdogra pretty uneventful, due to the short duration some of the passenger in certain rows did not get to buy refreshments. As we were about to land the airhostess comes upto me and says, "sir, please straighten/make your seat upright". I had not pressed the button to push the seat during the whole flight. I said it is up right. it was marginally at an anlge 5-10 degrees. She then pressed the button and pushed the seat forward and gave me that look and said "see". I was shocked for a bit that an air hostess could should attitude to a customer. I called the head attendant and told her about what happened.I usally fly Indigo or Air India. I found spice jet services have really come down. Management should pay attention to the young ones they hire, As i am not particularly keen to fly Spice Jet if i had other choices with a few extra rupees.

title: Poor services in International flights
text: I have booked this flight for a family trip to Chennai with my family we were around 20 numbers with a wheelchair user. As marked on the site I have made all the arrangements with the company for the wheelchair user. On the site there are no information about the type of the aircraft it was marked SG2 only. At the check-in in CMB we had some problem with the staffs, they said there are no arrangements made by the company for the wheelchair user and this plane small and not suitable for that. Finally after a long arguments they have arranged a couple of staff to take care of it. The aircraft was a twin propeller type, narrow body the seats were so tiny and hard. The engines were so noisy. No meals were provided and no entertainment in flight. On our return we had the same problem with the wheelchair user in MAA and one of us had to carry him in the arms to the flight. I think this kind of small companies only focusing money but not the comfort of the passengers. Must improve their services.

title: Budget Flights
text:
This plane id extremely budget friendly, but there are no entertainment available, at all.
No TV, no food along with ticket price, so youll have to either sneak in your own food or just purchase it from the plane.

title: Pathetic...
text: This airline is like Indian railways......All the times they are late...i never reached destination on time..

title: Poor service always
text: The check in staff was very rude and behaving properly. And they are not even sharp in their work. They issued a boarding pass of my colleague for my spouse even after giving identity card and separate ticket. Never recommend

title: Travelled couple of times and found the service OK
text: If you want to go for a chaper option, the spicejet is the best airlines in India. Personally, it is not my favourite as it delays or cancels their service now and then. Hope the management will definitely look after this point and will take the corrective action.

title: Good flight
text: First flight that we traveled in India, it was very comfort and safe. Food was very excellent. check in and seat selection was very easy through online.

title: Flew with a Cockroach
text:
I recently travelled in your flight SG 264 from Kolkata to New Delhi (2030 depart) on 29th July 2016.
I was seated at 15F.

Midway through the flight my co passengers panicked, it turns out there was a cockroach flying around. A while after I again saw the cockroach on the corner of front seat and had to brush it aside.

Same was informed verbally to your cabin crew by the passengers who were seated on 15 E and 15 D.

This was a poorest experience I have ever had at during my travel with Spice.

title: Adventurous experience with Spice Jet
text: We have booked a flight from Delhi to Varanasi and then we came to know we got a bombardier :)...Its a tiny aircarft...and it was my first time with such a flying duck...The seats are cramped and small...even the DTC bus seats are more comfortable then this..Ohh then the flight took off and i was praying all the time till we landed...Its engine sounds like they are going to blow off and it was shaking like hell...but the captain is pretty cool...he keep on chatting with the passengers :) via inflight radio...he lets you know which place they are flying over now...that will help in settling the nerves..thankfully we landed on time..I won't go in any bombardier now  :(

title: I and my husband were opted for vegeterian food and food was awesome. we both liked the service.
text: I and my husband were opted for vegetarian food and food was awesome. we both liked the service. we have travelled through indigo as well but this flight served us better.

title: WORST AIRLINE EVER
text: Worst airline ever, our jopurney from Delhi top Goa was horrible after multiple delays, we were offered INR1000 per passanger for the delay based on Spice assurance which we had purchased. We requested the same to be used for excess luggage and we were told we cannot. And can only be used in the next flight, we requested it to be used for the return flight and were denied, saying next purchase . Who would ever fly them again, with hat happened next?  Our return flight goa-del was also del;ayed, thank god it was not canned, like the poor folks going to lucknow who were stranded 15 minutes before boarding with no assistance. Our fliught goa del was delayed and when it landed, we were rushed into the aerobridge where we were made to wait standing for 30 minutes. Lots of elderly people and kids were there, couped up in the same passage, no assistance, nothing. best of all the flight was not even cleaned before we were made to board. Pathetic airline. Dont waste your resources, spend a little extra and fly in a better airline.

title: Horrible experience
text:
Last month was flying from Delhi-Mumbai on a weekday due to some work by a morning flight.
By the time I checked in (5.45am), the flight was on time, but as I crossed the security check(in another 10mins I guess) I got a message that the flight is delayed by 2hours. 
When the passengers asked the airline staff at the boarding gate the reason for the delay, answer was cause of some technical issues and they don't have any other aircraft to send us to Mumbai. Airline staff were not interested in listening to the issues and were arrogant. Airport Manager was also not available at the airport to address our queries.
One should not take a morning Spicejet flight as you might end up spending a couple of hours at the airport.

title: poor service
text: had a poor flying experience with this airlines the couple of times that i booked. the flight is never reliable to be departing on time

title: Ontime experience
text:
After long gap, I have travelled by spicejet and it is a very pleasant experience. Flights are ontime (travelled 2 times in a span of 2 days). Seats are ok. Legspace is just ok. Some "seat number labels" are either torn or missing. Windows are not clean.

Ontime landing and take off makes up for all minuses.

title: Budget Flight
text:
There are only 2-3 airlines which fly on this route directly. Out of all of them, SpiceJet is fairly new.
For a budget flight, its good. But I would still prefer Air India Express over it, if the price is same or slightly higher.
You don't get complimentary water or food. You need to buy whatever you want to eat (there is a decent variety available).
Flight attendants are friendly and helpful. Some of the seats (chairs) are damaged.

title: Spicejet needs to improve a lot to compete with other airlines
text: Spicejet is alow cost economy airline which is in direct cometetion with Indigo in terms of routes and fares. The fares sometimes beat other airlines ' however the service provided is not up to the mark. In flight staff behaves as if they are working in DTC bus and speak casually and un professionally with customers and amongst themselves. The aircrafts are not very clean and their schedules keep changing.

title: Great Service
text:
I usually prefer to fly with spice jet, as its budget airline with good service, on my last trip from Ahmedabad  to dubai i get a chance to meet wonderful service oriented staff, like Sushant, Renuka, Puja and Priyadarshani. thanks for making my trip comfortable.
a small suggestion as a loyal customer, spicejet must provide bottle of water instead of serving it. that's just a suggestion not a negative mark. over all trip was great and pleasant.

title: Poor experience
text: I flew Spice-jet and indeed was a horrifying experience, flights were delayed multiple times in the round trips and at last moments. It ruined my holiday to be honest, will think twice before i fly with spice jet

title: Best Low Cost Airline
text: India's best low cost Airline. All add on service are reasonable. Staffs are also good. Baggage handling is also good.

title: Low cost airline with average services
text: It was fine, but in my last trip they did not serve food despite advance payment. Return flight was cancelled they did not arrange flight in case they can.

title: Good airline, but delayed somtimes
text:
After a long time I used this airline, because they have very limited flights after they suffered with loss and reduced the flight.
satisfactory service

title: Worst Airline (SpiceJet)
text:
Heights of the unprofessional attitude. This is reference to flight SG16 on 30/06/2016 from dubai to ahmedabad. When we reached to ahmedabad from dubai we didnt know what was coming. After waiting for our luggage at conveyer for about half an hour we were told by spicejet representative that spicejet missed around 150 bags at dubai airport itself. After digging more we came to know that this wasnt the first time. There were few bags which came for the customers who travelled before 2 or 3 days. Same thing happened with another flight also which came from Masqat to Ahmedabad. After considering the situation we demanded to speak with the duty manager there who didnt come at all. There was no one who can take the responsibility. Spicejet representatives were also taken aback by such a fiasco by their airline. The poor reason they gave was that because of Eid there was a very heavy rush and this happened. Because of heavy rush they already charged almost 1.5 to 2 times then regular fair and even after that they are giving service like this. Some of us has paid even for priority baggage even those bags were also missed. After 2 hours negotiations we were told that luggage will come within 1-2 days and will be delivered to you by courier. So i waited for one day and and called the number given by them. Now instead of one day they are telling it can take 2-3 days. 

I am travelling in international routes since last 2 years and this is the most poor service i receives by any airline operating internationally.
I strongly recommend to avoid spicejet for any of your international or domestic travels. Hats off to #spicejet

title: A great Flight
text:
Fantastic takeoff and landing.
Early by a few minutes. Excellent legroom.Full Flight. Great Service.
Never thought turbo prop will be this good.

title: no proper response from the staff
text: The flight from Kochi to Delhi on 25 June, 2016 was late by 2 hours initially which got extended with 1 more hour and again extended 1 more hour. No messages were sent regarding the delay. Reason given was technical issues which I do understand but the problem was there was no proper response from the staff when we enquired. 5 hour long wait at the airport, was provided with food and small bottles per boarding pass along with food. No provision of extra water, we had to buy that. When asked about the flight, which was the timing after first delay the crew said "we have no idea" and were reluctant to call the manager. A really poor experience, not because the flight was delayed but because the passengers were not given proper attention. Will think twice before travelling with SpiceJet again. Disappointed.

title: on time
text: travelling a low cost airline there isnt much to say you get what you pay for all low cost airlines are minimum service no reason to complain

title: Loosing its charm since 2014.
text:
I traveled from BLR to BOM and return in flight SG - 418 and SG - 435. I was really upset with the behavior and smartness spicejet staff had shown to me. I had booked my ticket with my husband and we wanted two seats together. Just that the two tickets were booked separately and we requested if these two can be given seats together as my husband was unwell and I didnt want to leave him alone during the flight. However, the answer that I got during checkin was: no two seats are available together and if we need it, we have to pay 1000 bucks to upgrade to spicemax level. This is so pathetic guys!! We decided not to upgrade and request within the flight only. We still requested if we two can get seats in rows that are closer to each other. But look at the staff's smartness - she gave us one seat near the back door exit and one near the front door exit. So in this case, I cant even see how my husband is doing. And moreover, both the seats were middle seats - so cant be exchanged too!! Our fellow passengers on isle or window seat, would NEVER want to shift to a middle seat! How cheap one can get seriously!!

When we boarded the flight - for both routes - BLR to BOM and BOM to BLR - we spotted empty seats just one row ahead or behind. And when we inquired, those seats were not booked by anyone. 

We would never want to travel by Spicejet as this is not the first time but several times we have seen them fetching money and forcing us to suffer. This company is just running after money now! It has lost its charm and respect. All they need is money- and doesnt care about the customers.

title: Spice Jet - Horrible Experience...Chennai- Delhi Flight
text: Last month took a flight of late evening. Flight delayed by 3 hours. After a lot of efforts & promise ( In Front of Chief of Chennai CISF)of free food & night drop assistance flight left. But crew refused to give food except normal snacks. On asking they blamed passengers for misbehaving & at Delhi airport troubled 10-12 passengers. At 3.00 AM they confined them for 30 minutes in bus & purposely cornered them from other passenger.  At 3.00 am they forced 2-3 passengers to apologize for so called cooked up misbehave  (requesting for food for few kids & women as per promise made by Staff at chennai ) before exit gate in front of few security persons & took ID cards copies. Passenger has no choice as one wanted to go visiting his ailing mother.Very bad experience. So many passengers has missed their Train , Connected Domestic & Overseas flights ....

text: Well the title always signifies whats wrong with the airlines its there priorities they have been calling me up every day since my booking and urging me to upgrade to business  class  i had fallen it for once before and I told them politely that seating in the front seat or the emergency exit does not qualify as business class in my dictionary. And after checking in I found out that airlines had been delayed by 30 min which gradually became 50 min but they cheeky packed every one in the buses lest it become 1 hour as it was the late night flight and they have to arrange for food of the passengers if got delayed more than an hour so after waiting for nearly 15 minutes in buses we boarded the plane the seat i was sitting  6A its reclining was not working so i had to push the seat  manually to get some leg space ........ so from now on i am going to push spice jet away till they improve ........   i had much better experience with indigo and Go airlines.

title: Misbehaving Staff @ Airport Check-in Counter | Horrible in Flight Experience - HoneyMoon Trip almost spoiled
text:
I  am Dhaval Sarvaiya passenger of flight No SG 160 boarded from Mumbai to Delhi flight on 10th March,2016.
 
MUMBAI AIRPOT SPICE JET BAGGAGE CHECK-IN COUNTER  :-
We had checked in  spicejet flight No SG 160 at Mumbai Domestic Terminal 1B by 5:25 AM and the boarding was to begin by 05:35 AM for the flight to depart at 6:05 AM.
We are well in time and things would have worked well had the Spice Jet Staff Ms.Apinder at the Check-In Counter not messed up.
When we reached there she initiated the conversation with a Rude COUNTER CLOSED Comment.
We (Me& my wife) pleased her | requested her that we are already in time , please let us check-in and board , she replied rudely and then agreed for Baggage Check-In where again our Baggage turned out to be excess by around 5-6 Kgs she is like either pay Rs.7000 or empty the baggage.
My wife ran to her Mom who was standing Outside and emptied the Bag and came back. Meanwhile at the Counter I pleaded and requsted Ms.Apinder to kindly let us checkin and find a solution to the matter rather she again started with her Counter Closed Story.
I kept my calm until my wife returned and the Baggage were again weighed.
Now she claimed Rs.3000 and she threatened Counter closed either pay Rs.3000 or CANCEL YOUR TICKET FLY FROM ANOTHER FLIGHT AND PAY THE DIFFERENTIAL.
How can your staff use such a language be permitted at the Check-in counter, whilst I am deciding what to She suddenly starts Sir Counter Closed. Surprising I was wondering whether she was there to guide and cater us or to threaten and remove Money from us.
This hampered my temper and I had to raise my voice which led in introduction of one of her Senior Ms.Asmat or Ms. Kashir who profusely requested us to make payment and we did agree to make the payment.
And again , Ms.Apinder had her dialogue , even after Check-In and payment WE DO NOT GUARANTEE WHETHER THE BAGS SHALL REACH SRI NAGAR | DELHI
This was the most disgusting statement one can ever hear, It was only my helplessness that I wanted to Board the flight there and then and all was in her hand else I would have registered a Complaint there and then against her this language and would have seen to it that she is dismissed. She took an advantage of my helplessness.
Next moment after payment Ms.Asmat is like we have not paid , however they allowed us to board the plane.
SECURITY CHECK-IN
All in the rush and Bush and Security Check-In I forgot my Laptop at the Security Tray as the Spice Jet Person standing at the Security was announcing my wife‚Äôs name as if waiting alone for me. ( Though the Bus to the plane consisted almost half a dozen people)
ON-BOARD THE PLANE
At the plane we had a Max Seat and Complimentary Meal ‚Äì but when we called for Jain Meal ‚Äì they din have and they offered us some cashewnuts and real | Tropicana Mixed Fruit Juice which on the first Sip me and my wife saw each Other‚Äôs Face- it tasted disaster -  We both saw the Manufacturing date which showed 13-09-2015 and six months to expiry which means the Product was to EXPIRE IN 3 DAYS WHAT IS THE ON-BOARD CREW DOING??
 
DELHI AIRPORT
The Boarding female Ms.Sana | Ms.Monica just announced our name , when we approached them they are like we have not paid Rs.3000 at the Mumbai Baggage Check-In and to move further to Sri-Nagar We shall have to pay an Extra Rs.3000 to move our Baggage‚Äôs and reach them safely at Sri-Nagar.
NOBODY ON EARTH CAN BE MORE HELPLESS THEN THIS THIS WAS UTTER DISGUIST AFTER MAKING A PAYMENT OF RS.3000 AT MUMBAI WE WERE AGAIN CALLED FOR MAKING PAYMENT AT DELHI FAILING WHICH OUR LUGGAGE WILL NOT MOVE.
They said CCTV shows we have not made payment whereas we called Ms.Asmat (9619188072) she agreed taking the money but she was like she again handed over to my wife and that is clearly seen in CCTV, we called for the CCTV footage which was refused by the Delhi Team as well as Mumbai Team. They just wanted to THREATEN US AND REMOVE MONEY FROM US.
Again Ms.Monica, like Ms.Apinder used the same Language Luggage will not board until you make payment. This was horrible.
We requested and pleaded for the CCTV Footage but how will they show when they did not have one. IT was only FAKE to draw more money from me.
I was allowed to Board only after made payment again to Ms. Sana | Mr.Ankur and they wrote on the Back of the Slip about payment at Delhi.
Enough of Explanation, now I wish following action: -
1.     Show Cause Notice to Ms.Apinder | Ms.Monica as to how they could say things like you Miss your flight | Board another flight | Luggage will not board | No Guarantee that Luggage will reach Sri Nagar. -

2.    Compensation for the physical Hardship and trouble and Loss of Laptop which contained personalized |Confidential data. Rs.15000/-

3.    Compensation for Non-Compliance for a Jain Meal On-Board wherein I am eligible for ONE Rs.1000/-

4.    Compensation for providing Expired Products on Board which Could have resulted Health Hazards for me and My wife. Rs.1000/-

5.    Refund of the Excess Rs.3000 given at the Delhi Airport.

I claim a total of Rs.20000/- from SpiceJet for all the Mishap that it caused on 10th March 2016 or else I file a suit in the Court of Law for all the Damages to me and my wife
 
Please issue a cheque favouring Dhaval Sarvaiya and let us end it all.

PS : I am a Chartered Accountant by profession , I neither have time neither Money nor Interest in fighting a legal case.
I am a Gujrati Banya and I wish to live calm and peacefully.
The amount above is not a Monitory Compensation for all what we experienced and suffered that day , its just an indication to SpiceJet to improve the Staff Behavior and the hazards. Once you pay for it and realise the pinch of what and how your staff behaves and next time onwards all will be Good.

Attached : Boarding Passes & Receipts of Payment.
Trailing E-mail  :Proof of Laptop Loss.

title: Improved a lot since my last travel

text: Flight was on time, hospitality was just good. Flight landed before time. However, the meals offered could have better options.

title: Spicy Services
text: Spicejet as known, is one of the budget airlines in India. The services are good. On time most of the time. The food is fab. Air hostesses - Ooh la lah! :P The best part i believe is the spicy names they assign to each of their flights. Overall - A smooth - fab experience.

title: Poor on board servie
text:
The service seemed to be disorganised and confined to a group of passengers. Majority of the passengers were not even asked if they wanted to purchase anything. I had a pre booked sandwich and had to call the attendant to ask for it. She looked confused as if i was not on her list. A sandwich came a while latet without asking which one did i prefer. I asked for a soft drink and the prompt reply was that i need to pay for it!!!! Did i at any point say that it was complimentary ???
 A while later i was handed over a pack of juice and was told that no fizzy drinks were available.
 I asked for a receipt of my payment to which i was told that spicejet does not issue receipts... later the CS told me that they do issue receipt for payments made on board.
 The sandwich pack did not have any date of packing not the expiry. - The CS commented that since the food is fresh, it does not need an expiry date !!

title: an average experience

Customer service representative named GURU PRASAD (spicejet tirupati) has completely lack of customerservice knoweledge suggested me to buy a bag and adjust the lugguage. I dont understand one point in this senario , what you people expect from a passenger travelling from tirupati will carry , ofcourse its prasad from temple . Spicejet representative objected me in this case. It was completely unprofessional from your part .

It was very stuffy, humid and hot all through the 50+ minutes. The on-time performance was satisfactory. Its not a good idea to order food/refreshments on this short flight.

title: Airline from hell
text: Our original flight was taking us from Mumbai to Hospet but got cancelled for stupid reasons. Replacement flight to Belgaum also got cancelled and replaced with a flight to Goa, not even near our original destination. Eventually they organised a taxi to Belgaum and from there we were on our own. Return flights all got cancelled too without informing us but this time no taxi was provided. Never again!

title: Terrible
text:
My Wife & I with our two children were booked on Spicejet SG96 from BKK to MAA on 4th June 2016 scheduled to depart at 3.50am from BKK.

Being one of the only few airlines who do not have Express Self Check In at the world class airport, we had no choice but to que up at the check in counters which were opened by the outsourced Turkish Airline Staff. The outsourced staff lacked courtesy and did not understand a pinch of what the travellers said. Horrible reception.

After a sluggish issue of boarding passes (even the boarding passes are not their own), which took 1 hour, we completed Immigration swiftly.

We reached the gate No. D8 allotted to Spicejet by 12.45pm expecting to take a power nap at the world class airport's waiting area at the boarding point. But alas, there was nobody from Spicejet who could come and open the access controlled waiting area. Almost 150 plus passengers, including children, feeding mothers and elderly people were made to wait at the entry point of the Gate D8 upto 3.50am.

(1.) Spicejet did not have the courtesy to announce the delay.
(2.) Spicejet did not have any staff at the airport to open the gate so that the passengers could rest and use wash rooms, drinking water fountains, etc.
(3.) Spicejet did not update the delay in the flight information system both online and at the airport.
(4.) Spicejet started the boarding at 3.55am and boarding ended at 4.20am instead of 3.50am (30 mins late)
(5.) The airhostesses on board were poorly trained and hence could not handle the hand baggage of passengers properly. Ultimately, the flight was delayed by another 15 minutes because they had to offload around 10 nos. of hand baggage and issue receipts to the passengers for the same.
(6.) The worst was yet to come. After landing at Chennai Airport and clearing immigration (which took 30 minutes), the baggage was still to arrive. The bags arrived after a 40 minute delay.
I don't think anything more needs to be said about this airline. My pics will say it all.

title: Average Airlines

I will not fly on this airline again.

They have very good food though for the money they charge!! Make sure you give them a good reason for not giving you a seat way at the back of the aircraft for if the flight is not that full, you will be pretty annoyed that seats in the front were empty and not given to you at check in.

text: I hace been to spicejet twice and both the time experience was not so good. Seats are not comfortable and for the whole journey, there was so much noise in the aircraft itself that you can not even tolerate. Though it is in budget but do not compromise on your convinience.

title: Value for Money!
text: Budget Airlines with good service. I flied many times with SpiceJet. All I like about it is low cost. of-course you have to pay extra for food.

title: Always on time
text:
took this flight from ahmedabad to pune. a airbus 320 less legroom due to spicemax. meal served was good.
on time gaurenteed.

title: Never flying with spicejet!
text:
Six of us travelling together from Dehradun to Delhi to Kolkata on a family vacation. We booked spicejet flights(the worst decision ever made). Dehradun to Delhi flight was delayed by half an hour and was not even announced. Okay. We arrive in Delhi. During the check in, the lady sitting at counter B06 decided to separate the whole group. Each of us were given middle seats in various corners of the aircraft. The lady had the guts to talk spitefully  to my father and ask him to pay to get 6 six seats together. What's the point of booking tickets together and arriving for check in way ahead of time. Then we wait for another two hours delayed flight. The staff of spicejet is the most unprofessional and has given us horrible treatment all throughout without coordinating the information on flight delays. Indigo Airlines - you rock. I have new found respect and love for Indigo. The
Indigo operates more flights and handles more passengers than spicejet. Maybe spicejet should take a cue and start taking lessons from Indigo on operations and customer management. 
Today I have my family with me. So I know I am comparatively safer with them at 2am in the night when I arrive in Kolkata. What if I was alone and I had no one to receive me this late at night? People book a certain flight according to their convenience. Spicejet needs to reconsider it's strategy and do something about this because I have never met anyone with good experience with spicejet since a long long time. 
The system still showed 22:30 as ETD. While we actually left at 23:30 hours. We waited till the air hostess and stewardess manually counted the no of passengers on board. Spicejet managed to spoil out good night sleep with their awful loud music as well. 
Thank you for such an horrible experience.

title: waste of time
text:
most hopeless airline...perpetually delayed..should change their tag line to' never on time'. 
flight on 24th may got delayed from 1315 to 1345 hrs...they send a message to check in 3 hours prior..on reaching the airport at 1030, no staff was there who finally arrived at 1105 and started baggage scan at 1118 hrs!!! 

terrible congested plane, ac was not turned on till take off....
do not fly this airline even if they offer slightly cheaper fares!!!

title: Average Airlines
text: It was my 3rd flight with the spice jet, and for the 2nd time the it was late. Food is okay but air staff is nice. Engine is quite noisy. Complete experience was good, check in was easy as well as the baggage was on time. Good for people with low budget, but not for those who would like a peaceful and hassle free journey throughout. You may suffer little ups and downs while in business with SpiceJet.

text: I traveled in this airline a lot of times and always with a frown . As for as i'm concerned this airline is a cramped airline , poor legspace  and hooked seating arrangement , if you travel in a window seat , alas , the situation will be a pity. They gave water only in 150 ml paper cups . Only thing we appreciated was their sticking to  time schedule . My experience with this airline was not pleasant . Flight was comfortable.But during announcements,the air hostess was laughing in between,they could have been more professional.

title: old but good
text: The plane looked quite old and tiny, but the legroom is quite spacious and the flight itself was quite pleasant and on time. Given the price you pay, it's definitely good value for money.

title: Bumpy flight in adverse weather
text:
We ( self ,wife -65 years and mother aged 85 years) were in the evening Bombardier service from Bangalore to Mangalore on 12 th May ,Thursday.We would like to record the extreme appreciation of the skills of Capt. J Sandhu and lady first officer ,for what we consider as the most bumpy weather affected flight and long and long and long descent into Mangalore in thunder,lightning and rain ! 
As for us,we have been flying for over 22years now all over domestic and international routes.Last time we had experienced a nearly similar flight was from Las Vegas to Charlotte in stormy conditions but yesterday's was the most difficult one we were in a smaller aircraft.
The crisp announcement of the lady first officer ( could not get the name correctly ... ms Jaiswal ?) just before descent..."expect turbulence next two minutes all the way till we land..." was an understatement . It was probably 15 minutes or more of approach and a treat to watch the Arabian Sea side approach and the relief when we saw the landing gears open .
Thank you Captain and First Officer and thank you Crew on board and entire Spice Jet Team.
Look forward to more flights on Spice Jet.
C B Subramanian mr
Radha Subramanian Mrs
Mangalore
cbs1306@gmail.com
radhajee@gmail.com

title: Delay experts - Avoid to fly them
text: A delay with no announcements or updates until the staffs were questioned about. Pathetic people at gates with no basic courtesy and high on attitude. It was a delay which kept advancing by 10mins with every new person who came to speak to us every time we expressed our dis-satisfaction. Its a pity state for elders connecting beyond at midnight. A product never to fly with....

title: worst experience of flying
text: I feel sorry but my experience has been very bad as the person issuing the tickets on the airport fooled us ! I paid extra money for the premiere class but I found no difference between the normal and premier!  I paid 2000 rs pp for the upgradation  and this was my experience

title: Good Service and focuss a lot on Security.
text: I must say that apart from the leg room in the flight, everything is perfect. Be it the staff, the airhostess or the food served, everything is good. The most important part to be shared about this airlines is its security. I had some medicinal stuff in my baggage which i was carrying for myself on my trip. They were the ayurvedic medicnes all i liquids which i think were not captured properly in the X-Ray machine. Even when i passed the security check which is done at the airport i recieved a call from their representative in a very polite manner to be with them for the physical checkup of my baggage. The representative was polite enough and took me through the physical checking c\point nd very quickly did all the formalities re-issued my boarding pass and then i boarded the plane. I was really impressed that the airlines are giving a thought security and are working over the same.

title: On time experience delivered
text: As the air line is known for on time arrival, that is maintained on my last trip. Nothing more to mention a business flight on time performance what a traveller expects

title: Nice for short distance domestic travel
text:
It was my personal trip from Vizag to Hyd'bad. I booked the tickets on line at the company's web site. I didn't have any discounts. I was not happy witht he extra charges for seats and Rs 300 for paying by credit card is too much! I don't know if this is the norm across airlines, as this is my first time flight.

The flight came on time or even before time perhaps! I went in 2 hours before and all checking, etc are smooth and I got in to my seat in time. The flight started on time and the travel was smooth without any thing to bother. I think we traveled perhaps for about 45 to 50 min and already reached Hyd'bad (which takes up to 16 hours by train). The pilot announced that we are 6 min before schedule while landing. 

The experience was nice and I didn't buy anything in flight or at the airport. I chose a window seat while booking for an extra Rs 300 :( The view was quite nice and we flew above the clouds!

title: Holiday turned into a horrid-day by SpiceJet
text:
Flight Number : SG 178 (later converted to SG 174)
Goa to New Delhi
Date : 6th April, 2016
Seat : 11D

We had gone family holidaying to Goa and UNFORTUNATELY, booked ourselves on a SpiceJet flight. People I know were livid and the reaction was - "Why SpiceJet"? Are you mad ?
Well, I could not understand at that time, but later did. 

The flight was originally supposed to depart at 5.10 P.m. At some time later (though about one month in advance) the message was received that due to summer schedule (as if the airlines did not know that they will have one) my flight has been changed to SG 174 departing at 7.00 p.m. (1.50 hrs. later). 

On the day of the flight, till about 3 hours in advance, the airlines kept telling us the time as 7.00 p.m. and then suddenly changed it to 7.50. When we reached the airport the timing had changed to 8.30 and then 9.15.

It was interesting, as I and many others like me, had family with them and small kids. Interesting because we were not informed till the time we had cleared security. After much hullaboo, we were able to trace out an officer from spicejet who was not ready to come and speak to passengers.

Lot of trouble was taken by passengers and finally CISF people tracked the officer and informed and requested him to come and speak to us. Heated words were exchanged, however, no explanation was forthcoming. All which was told to us that due to operational reasons, the flight was delayed. It was not at all bothered to explain the 'operational reasons' to the passengers. 

After much cribbing the officer arranged water because passengers were threatening to take action. The airlines promised to arrange for snacks immediately and dinner, free of cost. However, the snacks turned out to be one frooti, one banana and one 5 rs. wafers packet. Dinner was moved from airport and was promised to be provided on plane.

Finally, the plane arrived at left the airport at about 10.00 p.m. ... about 5 hours delayed ..from its original schedule. After at least 4 or 5 rescheduling.

There were people who missed their connecting flights and trains. There were people who had to spend extra in delhi to stay back and get tickets done for next day. There were people who had to shell out extra money because of taxi charges going up at middle of night. There were people again, who were going to miss their meetings because they will reach so later. Kids were to miss their schools.

Further, when the passengers boarded the flight there was no dinner for them as promised by the official on ground. It was such arrogance and cheating at its best, that spicejet would win hands down. I remembered Shashi Tharoor and "CATTLE CLASS". Guess, Mr. Tharoor did not take it seriously but SPicejet did.

It was a pathetic flight and Spicejet turned out to be completely nonchalant about its functioning giving two hoots to passengers comfort or convenience. No one was bothered even to speak or inform the passengers.

The airlines should be held responsible for harassment they meted out to passengers and officials, including senior officials should be proceeded against in court for their fraudulent ways. The airlines did not bother to contact any of the passengers.

title: Never Flying with SpiceJet again
text:
I was travelling with my family from New delhi to Udaipur, the scheduled departure was 01:30 in the afternoon, I reached airport and and did my check in and just when I crossed the security checks, I received a text from the airline, that the flight will now depart at 6:30 in the evening.
I asked spice jet staff about the cause of delay but they could only tell me this "Boarding process will start shortly. we have arranged some snacks for you, You can have it, from the KFC counter".
People were getting frustrated by each passing moment, and the SJ staff could only talk about the snacks they are providing and also they really didnt care about the passengers, they were all standing there in a group making jokes and laughing.
So it was finally 6:30 in the evening, and still there was no flight, passengers got angry and started shouting on the staff, suddenly one of the got ready to deliver the reason for delay.
So basically that guy through some technical terms related to flight and planes and told us that in this weather we cant fly, but luckily there was one Air Force Veteran, who was travelling with us, who told that guy, to stop fooling people,  he explained to him and other passengers that the reasons he is giving are just absurd.
so finally at 7:15, i boarded the flight.
My 3 day trip turned to 2 day trip. Spent my entire day at the Airport, for just 1hr 15 min flight. Would Have reached early if I had taken the arly morning train. Thank you SpiceJet for ruining that trip for my family.

title: Bad. Not the Airline for me!
text: Having a connection to Dubai out of Delhi I depended on this airline to be true to its word but at the last possible moment they informed us that there would be a delay of slightly less than an hour (because then they would have to either refund or put us on another flight) and they used airspace closure over Delhi as excuse.  Yet Indigo leaving slightly before Spicejet's adjusted time had clear and direct access to Delhi airspace.  Methinks, the airspace closure story was invented to avert liability for their delay.    On the way to the airport, the telephone helpdesk was obstructionist and when we went to the kiosk at the airport the young lady called the official somewhere in an office and received authorisation for a full refund so I could buy a ticket on Indigo right next door.  Several times I heard her on the phone confirming the full refund (I was also insured) and I rechecked by asking, "so it's a full refund?" before I purchased the ticket next door.  After the ticket was purchased I returned to Spicejet kiosk to arrange for the full refund only to be told that they cannot refund me in full because the flight was delayed by less than an hour.  ( I checked with the authorities and the flight actually pushed back well after the hour which make their stated time a joke).  On trying to reason with them you were up against a brick wall.  I am still awaiting feedback from civil aviation in Delhi to ascertain if there was any closure of airspace by them, which I suspect may not have been the case.  Subsequently sharing my ordeal with others, no one had anything good to say about them.  Why do you want to buy so much bad exposure?  Don't they know a happy customer is your best publicity?  Even though I lost a lot of money having to buy a more expensive last minute ticket from Indigo, the loss to Spicejet would only have been the difference between the full refund and the percentage they paid out because of the insurance.  Its costing them far mor than that in bad publicity.  So silly.

title: Flight delayed by more then 3 hours for regular two days I have observed

Very bad state of affairs. This flight was meant to fly at 10:10 am and scheduled to arrive Goa by 12:45 but without any prior intimation, it was declared at the airport that flight is delayed due to technical issues and it departed around 12:30 pm on that day. 

I was on a business trip and our event was there and I was supposed to overall look at the finer points of preperation but everything went for a toss. That was a bright sunny morning and no chance of delayed due to fog but it seems it was a connecting flight which was running late. 

But very next day on Feb 1 my other group was also booked on the same flight and same story they also landed around 3:00 pm where else actually supposed to land at around 12:40 pm. 

This kind of service will lead Spicejet no where. Management needs to figure out how to make their planes fly on time.

title: Thrilling Experience

But any how we finally reached the destination.

title: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE! PASSENGERS KEPT WAITING ON THE AIRBRIGE FOR BOARDING FOR 1HOUR AT MIDNIGHT
text:
SPICE JET A1684 SCHEDULED FOR DEP AT 23.00HRS ON 17TH APRIL 2016 .
When we arrive at the airport we were informed that the flight was delayed by 50 mins!! (no textmsg/call/email was received from them). After an hour they announce it had been further delayed by another 10 mins!! WHY WERE WE NOT INFORMED AT THE BEGINNING THAT IT WAS A ONE HOUR DELAY? BECAUSE OF THE COMPENSATION CONSEQUENCES?
That was not all, they asked us to board after one and a half hour...
When WAITING  to board we were all sent on the Airbridge, there we were made to wait for OVER 90 MINS by MS  ASMAT (SPICE JET DUTY MANAGER)  who thereafter  tells us that the flight would not take us  FROM MUMBAI TO GOA but would take us  FROM MUMBAI VIA NAGPUR TO GOA. 
and SHE SAID If we were not interested in going via Nagpur then we would be put on the next connecting flight at 11.00am the next day!!!  There was supposed to be another flight at 5.00am in the morning but guess they cancelled that too???.
Ms ASMAT was most uncooperative, saying she could not contact her seniors who were busy at a meeting in Delhi!!!  Imagine all the passengers standing on the airbridge at 1.00am... and these inhumane staff of Spice Jet supposedly holding meetings in Delhi at this unearthly hour... and we were given No reason whatsoever about the change in route by Duty MAnager Ms ASmat ..except one word "emergency"

AS WE ALL REFUSED AND HAD TO SHOUT OUR PROTESTS  NOT TO AGREE TO GO TO NAGPUR AND MOST OF THE PASSENGERS WERE ALREADY ON THE AIRBRIDGE (which was sooo full AND DANGEROUS) THEY THEN TOOK US TO GOA WHERE WE ARRIVED AT 3.00AM.

This is happening time and time again with Spice Jet!! THEY CANCEL/ DELAY THEIR FLIGHTS TO GOA AND DO NOT INTIMATE BY SMS/EMAIL/phone calls about their change of schedule and always have the same excuse "AN EMERGENCY HAS CROPPED UP!!"
The same problem took place over the GoodFriday and Easter weekend where they cancelled their flights and delayed flights for over 7 hours...again without intimating the passengers.
WAKE UP SPICE JET...YOU CAN FOOL SOME OF THE PEOPLE SOME OF THE TIME BUT YOU CANNOT FOOL  ALL THE PEOPLE ALL THE TIME!!

title: Cost effective
text: SpiceJet is a budget Airlines. Service is good. Food is chargeable. Mostly on Time. No inflight entertainment.

title: Worst Flight Experience
text: The flight was delayed for about 30mins and the customer service on board was not that much. Could have been better.

title: Okay but nothing special
text: I flew from Jaipur to Dubai with SpiceJet. I've heard about better experiences from those who've travelled the route (or a similar route) with a UAE or Qatar based airline. The flights were on time and were fine; food was okay on board, but nothing special ("Okay, but nothing special", is how I'd sum up the whole flight). Check-in lines were very long and the wait was ridiculous as they also had to check the visas of all Indian passengers. SpiceJet didn't seem to have enough people working the check-in counters. Also they had trouble understanding that I would receive a visa on arrival in Dubai. Calling in advance to ask some questions of the airline also left me shaking my head at their customer service as they were not helpful. I think I've decided that SpiceJet is fine for an Indian domestic flight, but I wouldn't choose them again for an international flight until they work out some kinks.

title: First and last time
text: A regular visitor to India, and have used all the lo cost airlines and found them all to be excellent. First time this year I used Spicejet. And guarantee will be my last. Got an email before day i travelled saying owing to congestion at Goa airport, please check in 3 hours before departure. Knowing the congestion part to be true, I assumed their staff must start earlier than other carriers. Like a good traveller, having nothing on that morning anyway, I duly turned up near 3 hours before to find.. well.. nothing. Staff start 2 hours before like everyone else. When check in finally opened, 2 members of staff on economy desk. Took almost 30 minutes and i was only about 8th in queue. (Vistara airlines on next desk had 7 desks open) Flight was over an hour late - not a single announcement made in airport - then when finally boarded, the heat on the aircraft was hotter than outside, the staff looked beyond disinterested, the worn out tatty leather seats were covered in crumbs and rubbish. All in all, easily the nastiest out of all the airlines I have flown within india. Avoid avoid avoid.
