title: Rude crew and worst flight
text:
On 31 march we had travelled on spicejet from mumbai to dubai 1.30 am flight.We had 8 tickets including 2 chikdren and 2 infants.

1. Check-in staff was very helpful.

2. From 1.30 the flight got delayed to 2.30. There was no announcement, no apology from ground staff.

3. 2.00 am they started boarding passengers in the buses with so slowly that we were sure this flight would not leave before 3.30. No information provided and no apology.

4. After we finally board the plane by 3.15 since ours was a first seat and conveniently all doors were kept open we had to endure Mosquitos biting us which was worse than railways also.

5. When we argued with the staff that why no information from your side regarding delay the crew member argues with us in a rude manners that we are waiting for few more passengers.

Then what about us who were on time and also this could have said in a sweet and calm manner when already tempers were flying due to delay

6. Finally the flight was flown at 4.00. For delay refreshments are served which is spicy cup o noodles. That's not refreshment and we are paying for our seats. Not all can eat packaged cup o noodles

7. As we had paid extra for our seat complimentary meal was provided manchurian with noodles. Comeon who eats spicy manchurian at 4 in the morning.

Overall worst experience and never will fly spicejet

title: Worst experience
text:
Yesterday on 8th Apr'16 I had scheduled flight from Cochin to Delhi with SpiceJet Airline at 12:10 afternoon. Before 5 minutes of departure time they announced that there may be a delay of 1 hour in departure. After passing next 1 hour they announced that there may be further delay of more 2 and half hours. After fighting for approx 2 more hours they said flight is canceled. Even after that they didn't arrange any alternate flight for passengers, and they were even not regret about their such rude behavior.
This was my first and last experience with SpiceJet, I'll never travel with them.

title: worst quality of luggage caring service from Spice jet
text:
I had booked tickets from Kolkata to Colombo and return and I would like to inform you that I was not at all getting good co -operation and support from SpiceJet ground staff.
 
On 23rd flight was scheduled at 12:30 and from boarding counter it has been strike out through pen and departure time changed to 1:30. At eleventh hour I have got a call and it was informed that flight was again rescheduled at 12:30.Not sure why all the decision has been made at very last minute and passengers have to face consequences.
 
Again on 27th night @Colombo internation Airport , I have requested the person at Spicejet boarding counter to put a fragile sticker in my luggage but when I took the luggage at Chennai, I saw the sticker has been removed and saw one of my valuable thighs got damaged and liquid got spread out from a medicine bottle.
 
Even the air hostage in flight from Colmbo to Chennai was not communicating properly and she is without the name batch.
I am pretty disappointed for the above mentioned issues.
I have launched a email complain but haven't got any satisfactorily answer from Spicejet.

title: Go for it, if you have no problems with delays....!!
text:
-In my entire trip to and fro, Spice Jet was delayed twice.
- I missed my transport at Bangkok which i already booked, had to pay extra.
- Do not go for Spice Jet if you have a connecting flight or booked a transport.
- Their staff attitude towards delays is very normal and casual.
- Takes away the charm of the trip.
- Seats are comfortable and found better than economy seats in other airlines

Go for it, if Flight delay does not bother you

title: Very average service.
text: They are not a very good airlines and quality of co passenger is also not very good. Earlier they has a lot of problems but now they try to maintain their timing. Almost all their seats are chargeable even after web checking opening.

title: Not a Great Experience
text: On Check in we were asked to upgrade for spicemax by paying extra 15 dollars for priority boarding,Hot Meal and extra legroom but we found that none of the services were rendered.When we asked the air hostess for a meal she offered us a pack of cashews and a drink and even our seat was not that comfortable.We felt cheated.The pilots announcements were not clear and audible.Overall did not like the airline and would not recommend it to anyone.

title: Delicious food
text: Ordered through the spicejet application and so got 50% discount. The breakfast meal was served on Kolkata-bangalore route. It was delicious!

title: CHeapest and On Time
text:
The cheapest and the best for quality of service.
 Staff do a great job at representing the brand and have their images painted on the aircraft for their outstanding service.
It was a hassle free flight.

title: No frills but on time
text: We flew 4 segments on SpiceJet and we departed on time and arrived on-time or before every single time. Boarding and unboarding was efficient. This is no-frill airline at best.

title: Good ontime performance with good service
text: Red,Hot & Spicy. They really mean it. The food is really good & seats are really comfortable. Cabin crew is very helpful.

title: Flight can be cancel anytime
text:
The aircraft is awesome.
In flight service is good and crew are well behaved.
Well low budget air lines. 
Seat is comfortable.
Enough but not enough legroom. 

The flight can be cancel anytime.
The flight adjust is horrible. Do not add any schedule with Spice jet flight, might be delay/you  will miss the next one.

title: Pathetic experience for an airline
text:
While Spicejet has come a long way, and have been pioneers in low cost flights, I would rate their in flight experience not more than 2 stars.
Poor legroom, unclean seats, expensive, not to mention poor in taste in-flight meals (Jet airways gives it for free at the same cost).
Besides, our flight on  both our journeys were delayed by almost half an hour. Since it was a domestic airport, we cant really blame the airlines, the air traffic has simply increased too much. However, they dint really seems apologetic and neither made an effort to cover it. While some can argue that you cant squeeze in luxury at low costs, I beg to differ by taking examples of Indigo and Jet airways.

title: horrible experience
text:
We were having flight around 18:45 on 13th December 2015, but the flight was delayed stating that there is some technical problem with the flight. But after two hour they constantly said that there is technical problem with the flight. Later they have boarded the entire passengers to the flight when the situation was getting worse.
And in the flight we came to know that the flight has not having any pilot and the pilot have to brought all along from Delhi to fly the flight.
When the passengers got angry the air hostess demanding for the explanation of such worse service the air hostess (namely Debosmita and Sohini Debpriya) started saying that they are lady and the passengers have no right to demand such type of explanation and began to threat the passengers that if you dont want to fly then you can leave the flight. 
And ultimately the flight took the runway near about 22:30 after 4 hours of delay

This is the horrible experience which a passenger face when you travel with Spice Jet

title: Good experience
text: Good service and on time. worth to fly by it. On the front of airplane beside the the front exit door you can find the name of a Indian spices(outside).

title: Good but.........
text: Very  Good Experiance with spicejet From bengaluru to mumbai within 45 min we reach to mumbai but seats are very congested overall good experience

title: Great inflight service
text: Superior in flight service with hot breakfast and warm smile. The channel music is the best amongst domestic airlines in the country.

title: Always running late on small city sectors
text: First the good news, SpiceJet is often cheaper than any other airline ticket.  Also I have always found the air crew to be delightful.  Bad news is the Airline is short of planes so when a flight gets delayed its compounded throughout that route.  Just look at the arrival and departure board at any of India's airports.  Ground staff I have now found at Jaipur, Varanasi and Dharmshala are simply not willing to help passengers.  Oddly enough the other airlines assist where necessary.  When you check in your luggage they deliberately don't tell you the weight, then don't be surprised if they grab your hand luggage, weigh it and then demand additional money.  On one sector I was charged three kilos additional weight even though my check-in luggage was three kilos under.  At the time I was to tied to repack all my luggage.

title: Spice Max - A Super Experience
text: Tried the Premium Service Offering from Spicejet on a One Stop Flight. It was a Super Experience with Excellent Service standards - A Value for Money offering, especially on a Long duration flight - with Extra Legroom as well as Meals and a Soft Beverage. Definitely Worth it - Frequent Flyers must try it out as otherwise the Seat Legroom is Very Poor in Spice Jet.

title: spice
text: Flight: -SPICEJET" Flight time was 7:30 in the evening. ..Spicejet sent 3 messages starting 8PM till 10PM saying flight will be delayed ... Spicejet don't deserve to be in Airline business

title: Customer service Standard varies with destination
text: I have been in Spice jet flights many times and I am disappointed with their service standard varies depending on flight destination. It was pleasant flight from Chennai but was poor flight from bagdogra to CCU. Inflight music is awesome.

title: Cheap flights, Staff and service could be better
text:
The price of tickets are best in the industry and the cabin baggage only fare is very good for budget travelers and business travelers. The ground staff and the cabin crew are not so helpful/friendly. This can be improved significantly. 
The aircraft is a clean 747-800 Boeing aircrafts. On time performance is great and we arrived 15 min before our scheduled arrival. However, we need to wait for more than 30 min to get out our checked in baggage. This could be improved.

title: Best Service among Budget Airline
text: One of the few budget airlines where seats are wide and comfortable. The staff are extremely cordial and the ground staff are willing to help at every step.

title: Good Service
text: Spice jet service is better now. Check-in is fast and friendly, flight timing respected. My two flights took off on time.

title: Nice flight
text: This flight was pretty descent with no extra perks to offer but I had booked a surprise birthday cake for my uncle on Spicejet and they delivered the cake right on time in the flight and the crew was also very cooperative and cheerful

title: Best low cost carrier
text: They full-fill their promise of on time arrival. Tickets are very economic, if you purchase them well in advance. They provide bunch of add on service, which are really innovative and customer friendly.

title: A cheap airline whose only objective is to fleece money
text: I would not travel by Spicejet again, the customer care, the ground staff are arrogant and unhelpful. a very disappointing experience.Anything but punctual.

title: SpiceMax seats rock
text:
SpiceJet has made a real turnaround with the SpiceMax seats. For tall people this is a blessing on budget carriers. Although there are other benefits like free food and higher baggage allowances the real benefit is the seat pitch!
And ofcourse the fact that they are the only airline to pay the likes of Pink FLoyd and other rock bands makes a difference.

title: Spice Jet
text: The worst airline presently operational in India.  They got on some BH Airline aircraft for AMD-MUM route.  During peak summer the AC was not working upon boarding and when asked, the extremely rude attendant said, it will be started once the aircraft is on Taxi mode.  Horrible service.  Very badly maintained seats.  Not at all recommended.

title: Easy on the pocket but rarely on time
text:
Spicejet has probably one of the largest connectivity in India. The reason i would opt for spice jet is only because at times its easy on the pocket.

Very unfortunate that almost every time (15 odd times) i have traveled by Spicejet, they are always delayed. I am not sure if its just a coincidence for me. The Ground staff attitude is not very welcoming. The in flight crew are friendly but i dont see them proactively working for their guest.

title: "SPICY AIRLINE"
text: "SPICEJET is the cheapest and best airlines in domestic travel india.sometimes tickets prices are cheaper than train price.it will be possible in spicejet only.thats why i travel sin spicejet"

title: Pathetic & Insensitive, Never Again!
text: Flight time was 5:30 in the evening. They abruptly called us at 3:30 stating some emergency. Post reaching the airport early we were told that the flight got delayed by 2 hours and we have to wait, after two hours the same story of 2 more hours delay, again same and this misery continued till 09:30 PM. Imagine our plight with an infant. My baby was completely restless and got sick the another day sue to such negligence from Spice-jet, incidence like these makes me loose faith in our constitution which never punishes such ignorant management. I pledge to never myself or my family and friends ever associate with Spicejet in any manner.

title: Very Good & On time
text:
Very good service and on time commitment.
The crew was good & supportive. 

Captain used to share information each and every 30 minutes of the flight.

title: low cost flying experience!!!
text: It was a good experience to fly with spice jet. We travelled from calicut Kerala to chennai Tamilnadu. The fares were very good especially if we book very earlier and that through online ticket sites. The flight was on time and the check in was also smooth. The flight was a small one and the cabin crew were nice and helpful. No complimentary food was available and pre booking is available for the same.Altogether it was a nice experience flying with spice jet.

title: Variety of food available in flight
text: Variety of veg/ non-veg is available on the flight. Good flight for Bagdogra to Bengaluru as it haults only for 1 Hr 10 mts in Kolkata.

title: Check their website for Great Deals on Flights
text: Great website for easy flight searches and booking.  This low cost airline, really makes it hard to deal with other forms of travel throughout India.  The service is sparse but for flights under 100 bucks, its a great way to go. The employees all seem happy and efficient.

title: Never think of it
text: SpiceJet has sister airlines partners (all equally bad). For first, there is very limited leg room. You absolutely wait for the flight to land since the minute you settle down. They never have any food on board except peanuts and chips. Who would want that on a late night flight! Never even think of it unless as a last resort.

title: spicejet spicy
text: i travelled delhi to kochi in spicejet airline the overall expierience was good and on board entertainment also good in spicejet

title: SpiceJet Experience
text: Ahmedabad to Delhi with SpiceJet. A good experience. Customer service at Ahmedabad was excellent. Managed to book in early and the whole process was calm and smooth. Flight left slightly early and arrived 10mins early in Delhi. The onboard experience was also fine. Seats spacious enough and staff conscientious. Absolutely no complaints from any side

title: Higher Price for LCC
text:
Spicejet had 2 or 3 flights per day from Coimbatore to Hyderabad with Good Demand.
But still they have their prices high for this route.

There are around 10 Buses on this route and I wish if Spicejet Price Reasonable, then they will be 100% loaded with Flyers.

title: recently travelled
text: Its a good low cost carrier to travel domestic as I have recently travelled with it to Goa. Leg space is above average and food is nice. For sure I'll be flying with them in future for my domestic travel..

title: cheap and cheerful, very cheap!
text: Super cheap but you get what you pay for - no free meal or drinks and old planes with uncomfortable seats. Fine for short domestic flights on a budget.

title: Very cheap, but delayed flight and awful costumer service.
text: They sent us an email 20 hours before our flight saying that our 6 pm flight from Jaipur to Delhi was 4 hours delayed, so we had to book another flight with them to early that day if not, we would have lost our connection flight in Delhi. We ended up flying with them at 10 am and loosing the whole day in Jaipur, we lost a booked guided tour and asked for at least a compensation meal on board and nothing. The woman at the SpiceJet counter in Delhi Domestic Airport was so rude that she basically told me I had been stupid for not cancelling the flight and booking with another airline. Weird concept of costumer service, not recommended.

title: Good for a low cost airline
text:
The flights to and from Bagdogra were quite late, but this may have been due to circumstances beyond the control of the airline.

Check in was no problem and efficient. If you order food it is quite good. They do not seem to have alcohol aboard. Flight attendants were pleasant.

Online reservations are efficient. Overall everything was fine, and the price was great.

title: small -stuffy aircraft plying from chennai to calicut airport( not in proper calicut)
text: not even a bottle of drinking water provided, as complimentary courtesey, although the tickets cost around Rs 3300/- incl. all taxes + 5kg baggage@ 1000 extra

title: Average Airlines
text: This was first time with SpiceJet. There was a mix experience of some goods and bad. First the airlines IVR call disturbed us at 11:55 PM. It was so disturbing when you are on holiday and in midnight you get such calls. The message was for the delay of around 30 minutes. But we reached airport accordingly. Flight took off around at the delay of 1 hour. The airport and in-flight staff is ok kind of. No one can expect In-flight magazine was of last month after 7 days of start of next month.

title: Worst one .  only choose if you do  not have any other option
text:
This will be the worst airline in India . 
most of the time it will be delayed . 
In flight service was not so appreciable . 
To be improved a lot . you can choose this if you do not have any other option

title: warm welcome on board
text: the check in luggage was ust a walk through and the staff was very courteous, the flight crew was nice and helpful and the flight was on time.a very good expierence keep it up

title: average
text: Frankly speaking, nothing special......Average low-cost company providing average service and flight. But good landing down

title: Good Airline - Avoid SpiceMax
text:
Was tired after work. Had to take an early morning flight back to Delhi. The airline counter recommended that I should try "SpiceMax". I considered their recommendation, Paid INR 1000.

My SpiceMax Experience:-

Legroom is Average
Priority Luggage In & Out - No
Average Food/Snack
Priority Check-In (Not Applicable to Me)

Am not complaining, But the SpiceMax is just not worth it. Instead pick up a SpiceJet Club membership. You get a free air-ticket on your birthday :- )

title: Spice adds in Spice Jet
text: Good as far as budget airlines are concerned but too many rescheduling and delay and cancellations makes one upset but improved a lot than before.

title: Cheapest Indian International flyght
text: Cheapest Fastest air line for Dubai from Ahmedabad. Well dressed, crew and cabin staff and frequent technical and commercial information announcement by Captain I experienced first time. Time departure and early arrival really appreciable.

title: Poor ground handling staff and tired cabin crew
text:
Spicejet in domestic sector is much better than their international flights. The international ground staff specially in Dubai was very bad. The cabin crew looked as if they hated their work and haven't slept for days together. 
Please imporve if you want to retain your customers.

title: Bad experience
text: I took the flight on 28th Feb, 2016. The previous night i got  a message informing that the flight will leave at 7.15 am instead of 6.55 am, a delay of 20 minutes. On the day of my flight i took of to the airport around 4.30 am with my mother 92 years old, since their message suggested that i reach the airport at least 20 hours before the scheduled departure. When i went to check in, i was told as a matter of information that the take off will be at 8 am. No regret/apologies. No intimation til 7.45 am when suddenly they started the boarding process. Finally the flight took off around 8.20 am almost 85 minutes late. On board there was no apology from the captain or any of the other crew. Instead they were asking the passengers to hurry up so that the flight can take off. Very very shabby service.

title: Value for money
text: Spicejet is also a Good choice for low-cost airlines. They are always on Time. Service is just excellent. Try SpiceMax to get more privileges and extra legroom.

title: WORST AIRLINES
text: This is the worst airline in India.It delayed both time my return trip by 45min and 2hr  respectively.new delhi to varanasi 1st and 2nd march 2016.

title: Poor experience
text: It was a quite distressed experience right from the check-in to boarding to check-out. Even though i had a mini suitcase with me which would have been easily taken along in the cabin, I was made to check it in because it weight 9 kgs (just 2 kgs more than the prescribed). The flight was delayed by 25 mins. During the flight, I felt thirsty and when i asked for some water, i actually a half of the smallest cup. When i asked for another, it never came. After landing at bangalore, my suitcase was the last that came out. The reason i didnt want it to check in was because it was so small i actually feared it might get lost.

title: Not bad
text:
We flew on spicejet from Mumbai to Delhi and then to Bagdogara ( which is the nearest airport for Darjeeling ) We found the service satisfactory. The check in was efficient. There is no IFE but the food for sale was okay. No issues with legroom ( I am six feet tall ). The flights were on time ( landed even before time ).
Though we did not purchase the window seats, they were available at the time of check in.

title: Good Flight service but we cannot rely on you Spicejet
text:
I loved everything of yours except the moment I cannot forget where I booked tickets for AMD to CCU for may 2015 at a cheapest price and later on you cancelled all the service saying that you have closed the route. 
That moment I was refunded full money but it affected my whole plan and I have to bear alot much more money expense on ticket fare just because of you Spice Jet

title: Ok, but not on time
text: the check in process at spice jet counter was easy and light, non wastage of time too. and the cabins are also ok, The meal is also nice thought not very tasty but ok, but the airlines are very late, my flight was almost late by 30 mins in evening at delhi and we reached around 45 minutes late at kolkata.

title: the Indian Ryan Air
text: After flying Air India I was sadly disappointed in this airline.  We had a 2.5 hour flight at breakfast time and weren't offered so much as a water and were constantly sold snacks and perfumes and such.  They sell you lots of add ons when purchasing, too, like "bags out first" and "priority check-in" as well as bags (we had to pay to get over 15kg, unlike Air India where it's included).  The staff were EXTREMELY rude, very unlike our other experiences at airlines in India.  No greetings or smiles whatsoever.  Lines were long and chaotic at the check-in desk.  My husband put his seat back because the man in front of him reclined and the man behind him told the flight attendant he wasn't comfortable so she very gruffly told him to put it up.  My husband unfortunately had to ask the man in front of him to do the same as the seats are TINY.  Overall a bad experience and would avoid if possible.

title: Nice Experience Flying
text: The flight was really good to have a nice experience. The staff was quite good and decent to help. The good point is the flight is really worth value for money.

title: Not too COOL...
text: Overall experience was good but the starting of the journey was rather difficult as the air conditioning was not turned on and on asking the answer was that the system will be live after take-off. The scene was quite like sitting in an oven....

title: good experience, very punctual and nice pilots who has connected with passengers
text: good experience, very punctual and nice pilots who has connected with passengers which is very rarely i found in my earlier trips. pilot was keep on informing about the external atmosphere, place where we have reached and speed at which we were flying.

title: Horrible International Flight! Don't book unless you want nightmare!
text: Horrible for international flights, no blanket if you feel cold. No leg room when the flight is long. Absolutely no consideration for passengers. Do not fly at all, less baggage allowance for international flight!

title: Ok
text:
Didnt have much of a choice as spicejet were the only with offeres on this sector. Hence with fares they offered the best. The booking experience, i booked my ticket online and was initially overwhelmed with what were of additional costs and what was standard. Regualr emails and sms alerts were sent before my trip, but none of this took place for the return leg of my journey. I know why! Before embarking on the journey airlines such as these are inclined to show customer service, as they do not want passengers to cancel as its a loss to the airline. But when one leg of the trip has been undertaken passengers cannot cancel as their at loss. 

Flying experience:
Very good as a matter of fact. Smooth take offs and good cruising experience, landings are rather harsh and bumpy, but that depends on pilots. 
In flight service is nothing great i must say. Someone should teach spice jet air hostess to smile, as its comes with a lot of effort that exhausts them. 

On my return from Colombo, the flight was late, ground staff in Colombo are useless as they could not decide which gate we had to go and no one informed the passengers of the 40 min delay.  

All in all an OK experience. There is room for improvement, but shall see how long it lasts.

title: Good flight
text: I flew from Bengaluru to Calicut once, it was a nice flight for me but no even drinking water provided, and the staff thinks they only the English speakers and no one els understands their language, however it was nice and good flight based on their fare. it was a small flight with fan on both the sides instead of engine jets.

title: Worst experience
text: Traveled first time with spice jet and had the worst travelling by air experience. Boarded a flight from New Delhi on 13/02/2016 to Udaipur. The seats were just pathetic, broken back seat carriers, the kit in the back seat were not complete.. it just had a magazine and a menu. The light over the seat wasn't working. A chewing gum stick at my seat.. The pics will speak of all of it.. The cabin crew had their attitude.. very poor hospitality...

title: BAD,  always late
text:
Bad is the only word from start to end

they offer cheap tickets when u book

then story begins:

u cant check in without money
no seats window or aile only middle

if u dont check in when u reach airport last row seats or pay 1000 or bargain to 1000 for 2 sets or 900 even emergency exit on sale....
so u end up paying more......

take off and landing....horrible:-(  rental plane with foreigner or indian low cost pilots....scary ride

Above all......always late

Please be careful next time

title: Horrible food served during the Delhi - Hyderabad flight
text: Prebooked 2 sandwiches and 2 hot meals. Sandwiches tasted as if they were prepared a week ago and the hot meals were no where near hot and so bland that we could not eat it after one spoonful. I will never order the food again on this airline. The advertisement of the food options made it look like they are going to be great but "yuck" is the word i can best use for the food served. No leg space as we were just in front of the emergency row and felt suffocated

title: SG has changed for the better
text: I decide to put down this review after few flights with SG recently. There are positive signs of revival and am happy to see that as a customer its looking good. Good fares is what attracted me even though i was a bit apprehensive given the "not so great" track record with cancellations. I guess that is the forgettable past now and SG is coming up with some brilliant ideas. The Spice Max concept is lovely and i must say i have become a fan. Other airlines should follow suit. Service on board is good and so has been the take off and landing. Do maintain it.

title: Can be better
text: You get good deals when you book inadvance , aircrafts can be better. Their new dress code is welcome. They are on a comeback mode so maybe they need more time to get on par with the other competetiors, till then we say CAN BE BETTER

title: good flight
text: Worth paying the extra for Spicejet max which gives priority check-in, front row allocated seats, priority baggage deliver and on-board food etc, Makes a difference !

title: Worn out
text:
My first trip on Spice Jet.

The quality of seats was a shocker.

Everytime that I travellled on other airlines, I could see a much better aircraft. 

Also the staff were casual at times, which obviously was never a scenario seen earlier.

title: Poor Service and Non Cooperative staff with low care for the traveller
text:
We had booked for the travel to Vishakhaptnam for our annual get together of the company and to our surprise, when we reached airport we were told that flight is rescheduled from Morning 6 to afternoon 12. No message was sent and no intimation given, on questioning they showed their system showing some message sent to a number of ours, which was never received by us.
When we asked them to adjust us to other flight as we have connecting flight they refused. Sad, not recommended.
inflight attendant, non cooperative and treat all guest alike, they need to be trained to differentiate between people with travel purpose and people with alter motive.

title: FLY HIGH HAPPILY!
text: Booked in advance, about 3 months before, and got very attractive rates for tickets. Enjoyed the airline / service and the craft, but was unhappy of them changing the scheduled flight timings, and their rigid excess baggage policy, even though we were 6 tourist passengers.

title: Never on time but Good food and liberal weight allowance
text:
I had a liking for Spicejet for they were liberal about their weight allowance and lived upt my reputation this time too. Very sadly they are known for not being on time and they lived upto that ill reputation too. For Once I thought they will be and the flight was at 11.10 and we were ready to take off at 11 itself. I was tired and went off to sleep and to my "Expected" surprise woke up at 11.45 to see that the flight had not taken off. 
The leg space is oK as per Economic Airlines and food is good. I has a Paneer Tikka  and it was great. The service was good and the staff is very friendly and humble.
Really pray when will they learn to be in time or is it a Habit which will never change.

title: A pleasant experience, thanks to timeliness and smiling faces
text:
The greetings were enthusiastic and warm. Flight cleanliness and space were as is usual for the economy segment of the routine Indian middle class carrier. The take off was delayed by a bit but lost time was made up for en-route.
A couple of my friends have had multiple delays while traveling with Spicejet. But I so far have not come across such incidents. All in all, a reasonable choice in it's price range.

title: First and Last flight with SpiceJet...
text:
Initial pre-flight, things was going well, and all passengers were on board for departure, but, when we came inside the plane we saw some Spicejet employees discussing something inside the cockpit. It continued for 10 min even after the departure time.

The airplane itself looked too old and don't have the freshness inside. 

I was in the middle seat next to my brother who is in Window seat, and, we saw the jet fuel is just loading (remember all passengers are on board).

So I planned to take a nap and wonder what, my reclining seats are not working, its all stuck it doesn't moved back, I called flight attendant and he told he can change my seat, but I don't wanted to leave my brother alone so I said that I will adjust here.

Next, when I checked the seat pockets I found the air sickness back was full of puke and was really disgusting ( worst quality cleaning, housekeeping).

There were only two(2) flight attendants and I complained them about my issues they apologized and assured that this won't happen again.

At last the flight reached Mumbai CSIA it's already half an hour late, and we were flooded with apologies from the crew (those two(2) persons) till arrival.

Finally, I am not gonna book Spicejet again.

title: On Time means Spice Jet
text: its was good said flight was code share with BM Airliance crew are not India but they are providing very good facility

title: Excellent Service
text: Always on time, extra leg room inside the flight. Very help staff. The only negative thing is they do not offer any snacks/drinks

title: on time landing
text: i flown from Bangaluru to hydrabad. i got spicejet service in my budget. most impotent one is they did't delayed me. they landed on time. i relay appreciating that service

title: Helpful staff
text:
Myself & My wife were to travel from  Mangalore to Pune via Bangalore (2 hrs halt)

On the date of travel, spicejet called me and stated that the Mangalore to bangalore flight would be delayed by 2 hrs due to fog at Bangalore (10 January 2016) and Iwe would miss our connecting flight to Pune for sure as delays were accumulating since morning.

They gave me an option to travel to Mumbai from Mangalore  by the afternoon flight and promised me road transport from Mumbai airport to Pune. The staff in Mangalore was very helpful and they gave details of who from Mangalore has talked to whom in maumabi for this arrangement

On arrival at Mumbai airport, the staff immediately took me to a waiting taxi which started for Pune.

Thanks to Mangalore & Mumbai Spice jet staff. I reached Pune earlier than what I had planned.

Thanks

title: On time,
text: On time, that's very big achivement by Spice Jet, Loved it, nice service though we didnot apply for food, still nice staff, and cru members. loved the journey, we took 4 time ride in Spice jet, Mumbai-chennai, Chennai - port blair. Vice & versa, resonable rates. we got upgraded to Spice MAX , so very happy at the time.as it was my birthday too.

title: Bumpy ride
text: Right from the take off at Madurai till the landing in Chennai of flight no. SG-104, the ride was bumpy. Without much clouds in sight. the aircraft bumped a lot, immediately after take off and at the landing in Chennai, the landing was very rough.

title: An Expensive Low Cost Affair
text:
Ummm, ok so i never liked travelling by SpiceJet and try avoid flying if possible. However, for my return journey to Bombay, I didn't have any other option than to book this.
I try not be prejudiced about things or people or places in life, however, certain things or places justify the prejudice time and again and SpiceJet is one of them. Here are the few reasons why I dn't like flying it;
1) I do understand that when you do the same thing day in and day out, it does tend to get weary, however, this is a service and hospitality industry and moreover the job is self chosen right, even if you want to murder somebody, you have to be polite. However, I have never felt hospitable with SpiceJet. I am never said "Welcome on-board with a smile" nor "thank you". Sigh, anyways...
2) Out of the 4 toilets, the nearest 2 toilets (the ones near the cockpit) is always busy. So if you have ur seat up-front, you will have to walk all the way back till the tail-end.
3) There was an announcement made about the luggage coming on conveyer belt no.7, however, there was no conveyer belt no.7.
4) The announcements very unclear and at times inaudible.

Anyways, the above have been my experiences with SpiceJet not only this time but earlier as well whenever I've flown. Maybe they find me ugly and not worth acknowledging :). You might have had good experiences with them. 

As for me, i'll try and avoid taking SpiceJet for my future voyages unless there is no other option.

title: Travel by Air- Nothing more than that
text:
Cheap Tickets but actually depends when your buy. 
Baggage Claim takes time
Crew Good 
Flight announcement audible

title: Need to pay for every value add..
text:
On a morning flight from Mumbai , was traveling by Spicejet. the food options inside the flight were minimal and the crew did not seem too knowledgeable about the manifesto and the choices made by customer.
Overall the journey was a bit tiring.

title: good timings
text:
amount for seat not good...lot of families requesting for seat change..
its disturb to airhostess work

title: Good Budget Airline
text: This airline is awarded with highest load factor award ina row for last 7 months.Since owner changed this airline is performing extremely well.Good Ground & Cabin staff.Almost ontime performance.One must opt if it meet your time date requirement

title: good airline
text: The fight was good and on time to Delhi and mumbai. Inflight services were also reasonable. Best of luck

title: nice airline ti fly with
text: the aircraft was different than other airlines and sitting arrangement was also different for two rows but the flying experience was good and the flight was late the staff at the check in counter was help full and polite

title: Good Connectivity to and from Hyd
text: Spicejet offers good connectivity from Hyderabad and flights are available at cheap rates, almost i get the tickets whenever i need to travel, even during promotion times.  paid food also is excellent on board.

title: Budget airline, a little too comfortable seats and they tore my luggage
text: It is a budget airline, though I booked the tickets on the travelling day so the costed me a lot then double. The seating was quite uncomfortable, very little legroom and no food was offered. Not even paid. I was surprised as that's how they make additional money. My main cry was that they tore off my luggage. It is 3 month old leather bag but when I received it, it looked more like 10 year old luggage. I had wished to use it for a long time as it was a damn good looking bag.

title: Good budget airline
text: This is a budget airline so cant expect much of service from them. Journey was ok. but no enough leg space.

title: 5 out of 10
text: Journey was ok not an comfortable Journey,No Leg Room space.Staffs in airport was not friendly rude staffs not customer friendly.If no other possibility you can try...

title: Budget Airline.
text:
This is a budget airline so cant expect much of service from them i guess. while boarding the flight the entire crew members were chatting & laughing loudly amongst themselves without even bothering to welcome or acknowledge the guests.
other than that the rest was ok.

title: Good budget airline
text:
India's best budget airlines !!!

I booked this flight because of best low fares available with different travel agents. Please don't except any extraordinary services/treatment from the airline at this price.

You can web check-in by paying some charges which is worst part of this airline.

Food given in the airline was also good.

title: Nice Flying experience but very uncomfortable seats.
text: Runs on time but aircraft is not so good. It's an turbo-prop bombardier q400, which flies slow, less high (around 19000fts) and too much vibrations. Since MAA-CMB is not so busy route and often few passenger travels, it is reasonable to use small aircraft, but same aircraft flies between Bangalore-Chennai and Hyderabad sector as well, which is little bit annoying. Seats are in 2x2 format and legroom is not enough for taller person like me. However, overall it's a good budget airline.

title: When things are normal , Service look good. when faced with a challenge, they fail. Systemic improvement required...
text:
My past experience with spicejet has been not so bad, but the latest flight experience on 03rd Feb was one of the worst. 

Flight SG 3106, originally supposed to depart GOI at 16:50 and arrive MAA at 18:25 but my experienced happened to be as below...

1. Flight was reported to be late with ETD, revised to 17:35
2. There was further delay, departure was not at 17:35
3. More delay after boarding aircraft due to technical problem
4. Delay in landing after arriving the destination for want of ATC clearance

To add to all the above, one of the baggages (hand baggage, checked in before boarding due to size) was missing. I had to run around here and there asking for it keeping my family (spouse and a 3 yrs old child hungry and waiting, yes, even though, the flight was so late, passengers were not offered any food. my family and I just had some beverage that we purchased on board, that too, we couldn't get food & drinks of choice on board, even for purchase, they carry very limited stock and don't  seems to have any plan to load additional food even there is expected delay, which was the case here)

Our missing baggage travelled to BLR with the plane, while we were waiting. Thanks to the local manager Mahesh, who investigated and confirmed that the baggage in there in the plane and will come to chennai by the same plane later in the night and and a spicejet staff, Jayakrishna, who was on night shift and promised to take care of collecting it from the plane, we left the airport at around 11 p.m. while the scheduled time of arrival was 6.25 p.m. 

As I mentioned at the start, past experiences have been ok, which means, when things go normal... it is normal. but when there is a challenge, there seems to be no preparedness to handle it. This is more of a problem with the system than with individuals....

title: Be careful to book
text:
On Sun 17 Jan 2016 we got the check in Dep 8.30 AM. After 3 hours the flight had been cancelled. Spice Jet got 1 bottle of whiskey which the security had taken out of our suitcase and handed over to them. 
One of their employees promised that we would get a refund for the cancelled flight. At the counter they refused to give back our whiskey bottle.
I did not get any answer on my emails: Perfect Customer Relations Management !

title: Very good budget airlines
text: This is my favorite airlines as they started the 1st direct flight from Pune to Kochi [my home town] which helped me to avoid traveling to Mumbai to catch a flight for Kochi. In all these years I have been using their service only once or twice had my flight been delayed / rescheduled. Other than that they are normally on time or before time. Good to hear that with the recent internal restructuring and changes the airlines as such is doing fine.

title: spicejet absolute budget airline
text:
budget airline with no frills , and economical but at the cost of the comfort and space.
service is not extraordinary.

title: Lose your spice not your Spirits
text:
Hi,
Caution to anyone who is travelling Spice Jet..

I unfortunately to travelled via  Spicejet to Goa..I lost all my 

spirits....
Firstly, the flight got delayed by 4 hours only apologising for the 

inconvienience via a small message and making you wait at the airport 

for hours not to mention they did not even have the courtsey to serve 

tea to their waiting customers.
Secondly, they charge extra for checkin luggage- which is fine, 

however they do not take care of that luggage. I lost all my 4 bottles 

of vodka and wine from the beautiful Goa which all in all is 

priceless....again only an apology and Sir next time we will serve you 

 better.......
Spice Jet going the Kingfisher way....Losing the Spirit...
Lose yours Spice but your spirits....Ditch Spicejet.....

title: needs lot of improvement
text: there was No in-flight entertainment, nothing at all, and its good only for economy travel    and its saving grace is that its on time departure & arrival. All in-flight snacks are extra, nothing included, how is it a cheap airline I don't get it. Our flight was for 3 hours only so thank god for that.

title: dont waste money on spice max
text:
we booked spice max and let me tell you there is nothing special. the promised aero bridge priority entrance wasn't there. they charged us 1200/-rs total (300/kg) for extra 4 kgs, when the in-flight brochure states 900 rs for up-to 5 kgs extra. the flight was delayed.
food is good, but most of it isn't available, unless you have booked previously online though they charge you 25 rs extra inflight, yet not available.
not looking forward for another journey with this airline anytime sooner.
prices are low though.

title: Comfortable Ride
text:
Had a comfortable ride from Kochi to Bangalore at a cheap price.
CheckIn was smooth, in flight service was adequate

title: Economical flights but service needs to be improved
text:
I flew to Mumbai in December via Spice Jet and had to face a lot of inconvenience due to flight timings. 

Had earlier booked an afternoon flight which had postponed due to winter schedule. However, on the day of travel it was preponed and I received an intimation just an hour before take off. Thankfully, I stay close to the airport so could make it on time.

title: Worth for money.
text: This is good service from Dubai to Pune and return. Its value for money although not great. You need to buy lot of stuff like seats, luggage, food etc while you are booking, which increases the price.

title: Business Visit
text: The airline is staffed with young professionals groomed to customer relationship and manner. The food on board is deep for pocket and offsets the low cost airfare.

title: What a turnaround!!
text:
Travelled this Jan with family. What a turnaround - from what I experienced many years back and after the series of bad media. Good food, much more energetic staff, nice inflight mag. For a low frill category-you have options (for a price - which is fair deal)

1. The first 5 rows are seats with extra leg room and added meal. But you pay for each sector which I suggest should not be the case for same airline connecting flights only sectors.

2. Meal upload should be balanced. You don't get your choice - first come first serve if you have bought the max seats at the airport. Maybe some upfront discounts for such travelers.

title: so so seating
text: this is like so so experience and say it is average flight. it has ok seating  comfort and the behavior of air hostesses  is average. over all experience is better than other competitors.

title: Worst seating
text:
We flew last week from Delhi - Goa and back on SG and it was the worse flight experience we had. The seating is cramped and the aircraft seats are in a bad condition esp on the flight  back from Goa . 
Both sectors we had flight delays and the staff and crew were most unapologetic about the same . The baggage took hours to come . 
Very poor experience

title: Afoordable & Nice.
text:
Spice jet flights are economical. 
And the journey of one & a half hour goes quite well. 
You can't expect a miracle in one hour. 
So, yes; it is good.

title: international sector
text:
we traveled to Dubai this month and had quite a comfortable flight. we did not face any delays and were well look after in the flight. Despite being a budget airline they had a good menu to offer for inflight services.
the only problem was at Dubai airport where the airline did not have its own staff and were relying on Danata. slight hiccup at the time of check in but overall a good trip.

title: Spicejet
text: The flights were getting late quite often. And we faced this problem thrice. Once my mom's flight was delayed by 5-6 hours. Though the airlines provided free dinner but that could not lessen the problems of a delayed flight.

title: Horrible
text: The flight was delayed by 4 hours, they kept telling 15 mins - 30 mins and did not bother to inform correct information. the staff was rude and big hassle for old age people. Did not like the service. Cheap it is but trains are better if you like cheap. at least hassle is not there.

title: Average but cheap airline
text:
I flew Spicejet during the times when they were knee deep in financial troubles. Everyday, they would cancel/ reschedule flights in bulk. I was really scared but thankfully, my flight being on important routes, was not cancelled. Only, the time was changed by 50 minutes, which was okay for me.
The experience was like just another budget airline, crammed space, no free food (Honestly though, this is like asking for a lot). Took off on (rescheduled) time and landed on time, and that's all that mattered to me.
You might want to look at other options for a while, until they completely sort out all their troubles. Fly Jet/ Indigo, or even Air India on less important routes, even if they cost a bit more.

title: Will never fly again, totally unsafe(cracked window)
text:
Will never fly again with spice jet again. The flight was delayed by 3 hrs for operational reasons, well no fog or rain or thunderstorm or anything it was just normal day. 

After getting onboard found that my out side window was having cracks when I tried to report they ignored like they dont care at all. I was praying that hope this is not my last flight of life. Only good thing was food. Rest everything was terrible.

title: Could improve communication
text:
There is only one negative point regarding this journey that I booked with SpiceJet. Given that I had booked a few months in advance, they changed the flight timings due to their new winter schedule. The only glitch with the new schedule was that I would miss my connection to Colombo. I had to reshuffle last minute to book an earlier flight to Chennai, but the staff were very helpful and I got a full refund for the Mumbai Chennai leg.

Otherwise, value for money.

title: Strictly Average
text:
Very very average. Staffs aren't very attentive. Cant expect much as this is a economy flight.

Staffs attire could be improved and they need training on how to respond to customer.

title: Good experience
text: The flight was on time. The check in was smooth. In flight experience and  was also very good, particularly the instant tea
